na saṃśayaḥd na ca dveṣo sti me karṇa tvayi satyaṃ bravīmi ted tejovadhanimittaṃ tu paruṣaṃ cāham abruvamd akasmāt pāṇḍavān hi tvaṃ dviṣasīti matir mamad tenāsi bahuśo rūkṣaṃ śrāvitaḥ kurusaṃsadid hantāsi samare vīrāñ śatrupakṣakṣayaṃkarad brahmaṇyatā ca śauryaṃ ca dāne vā paramo nidhiḥd kulabhedabhayāc cāhaṃ sadā paruṣam abruvamd iṣvastre vīra saṃdhāne lāghave strabale pi cad sadṛśaḥ phalgunasyāpi kṛṣṇasya ca samo balea samudra iva sindhūnāṃ jyotiṣām iva bhāskaraḥc satyasya ca yathā santo bījānām iva corvarāa parjanya iva bhūtānāṃ pratiṣṭhā suhṛdāṃ bhavac bāndhavās tvānujīvantu sahasrākṣam ivāmarāḥd mānahā bhava śatrūṇāṃ mitrāṇāṃ nandivardhanaḥd kauravāṇāṃ bhava gatir yathā viṣṇur divaukasāma svabāhubalavīryeṇa dhārtarāṣṭrapriyaiṣiṇāc karṇa rājapuraṃ gatvā kāmbojā nihatās tvayāa girivrajagatāś cāpi nagnajitpramukhā nṛpāḥc ambaṣṭhāś ca videhāś ca gāndhārāś ca jitās tvayād tathātibalavān rājā jarāsaṃdho dbhutopamaḥd samare samaraślāghī na tvayābhyadhiko raṇea himavaddurganilayāḥ kirātā raṇakarkaśāḥc duryodhanasya vaśagāḥ kṛtāḥ karṇa tvayā purād utkalā mekalāḥ pauṇḍrāḥ kaliṅgāndhrāś ca saṃyuged niṣādāś ca trigartāś ca bāhlīkāś ca jitās tvayāa tatra tatra ca suyodhanamd aparāvartino ye rthās te na śakyā nivartitumd daivaṃ puruṣakāreṇa ko nivartitum utsahetd pṛthivīkṣayaṃ śaṃsanti nimittānīha bhāratad bhavadbhir hi purā dṛṣṭvā kathitāni ca saṃsadid ajeyāḥ śaravarṣaiḥ pṛthak pṛthaka saṃkṣobhyamāṇā droṇena bhidyamānā mahācamūḥc vyaśīryata sapāñcālā vāteneva balāhakāḥa bahūnīha vikurvāṇo divyāny astrāṇi saṃyugec apīḍayat kṣaṇenaiva droṇaḥ pāṇḍavasṛñjayāna te vadhyamānā droṇena vāsaveneva dānavāḥc pāñcālāḥ samakampanta dhṛṣṭadyumnapurogamāḥa tato divyāstravic chūro yājñasenir mahārathaḥc abhinac charavarṣeṇa droṇānīkam anekadhāa droṇasya śaravarṣais tu śaravarṣāṇi bhāgaśaḥc saṃnivārya tataḥ senāṃ kurūn apy avadhīd balīa saṃhṛtya tu tato droṇaḥ samavasthāpya cāhavec svam anīkaṃ mahābāhuḥ pārṣataṃ samupādravata sa bāṇavarṣaṃ sumahad asṛjat pārṣataṃ pratic maghavān samabhikruddhaḥ sahasā dānaveṣv ivaa te kampyamānā droṇena bāṇaiḥ pāṇḍavasṛñjayāḥc punaḥ punar abhajyanta siṃhenevetare mṛgāḥa atha paryapatad droṇaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ balaṃ balīc alātacakravad rājaṃs tad adbhutam ivābhavata khacaranagarakalpaṃ kalpitaṃ śāstradṛṣṭyācaladanilapatākaṃ hrādinaṃ valgitāśvamc sphaṭikavimalaketuṃ tāpanaṃ śātravāṇāṃrathavaram adhirūḍhaḥ saṃjahārārisenām saṃjaya uvācaa tathā droṇam abhighnantaṃ sāśvasūtarathadvipānc vyathitāḥ pāṇḍavā dṛṣṭvā na cainaṃ paryavārayana tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā dhṛṣṭadyumnadhanaṃjayauc abravīt sarvato yattaiḥ kumbhayonir nivāryatāma tatrainam arjunaś caiva pārṣataś ca sahānugaḥc paryagṛhṇaṃs tataḥ sarve samāyāntaṃ mahārathāḥa kekayā bhīmasenaś ca saubhadro tha ghaṭotkacaḥc yudhiṣṭhiro yamau matsyā drupadasyātmajās tathāa draupadeyāś ca saṃhṛṣṭā dhṛṣṭaketuḥ sasātyakiḥc cekitānaś ca saṃkruddho yuyutsuś ca mahārathaḥa ye cānye pārthivā rājan pāṇḍavasyānuyāyinaḥc kulavīryānurūpāṇi cakruḥ karmāṇy anekaśaḥa saṃgṛhyamāṇāṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavair vāhinīṃ raṇec vyāvṛtya cakṣuṣī kopād bhāradvājo nvavaikṣataa sa tīvraṃ kopam āsthāya rathe samaradurmadaḥc vyadhamat pāṇḍavānīkam abhrāṇīva sadāgatiḥa rathān aśvān narān nāgān abhidhāvaṃs tatas tataḥc cacāronmattavad droṇo vṛddho pi taruṇo yathāa tasya śoṇitadigdhāṅgāḥ śoṇās te vātaraṃhasaḥc ājāneyā hayā rājann avibhrāntāḥ śriyaṃ dadhuḥa tam antakam iva kruddham āpatantaṃ yatavratamc dṛṣṭvā saṃprādravan yodhāḥ pāṇḍavasya tatas tataḥa teṣāṃ pradravatāṃ bhīmaḥ punar āvartatām apic vīkṣatāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ cāsīc chabdaḥ paramadāruṇaḥa śūrāṇāṃ harṣajanano bhīrūṇāṃ bhayavardhanaḥc dyāvāpṛthivyor vivaraṃ pūrayām āsa sarvataḥa tataḥ punar api droṇo nāma viśrāvayan yudhic akarod raudram ātmānaṃ kirañ śaraśataiḥ parāna sa tathā tāny anīkāni pāṇḍaveyasya dhīmataḥc kālavan nyavadhīd droṇo yuveva sthaviro balīa utkṛtya ca śirāṃsy ugro bāhūn api sabhūṣaṇānc kṛtvā śūnyān rathopasthān udakrośan mahārathaḥa tasya harṣapraṇādena bāṇavegena cābhibhoc prākampanta raṇe yodhā gāvaḥ śītārditā ivaa droṇasya rathaghoṣeṇa maurvīniṣpeṣaṇena cac dhanuḥśabdena cākāśe śabdaḥ samabhavan mahāna athāsya bahuśo bāṇā niścarantaḥ sahasraśaḥc vyāpya sarvā diśaḥ petur gajāśvarathapattiṣua taṃ kārmukamahāvegam astrajvalitapāvakamc droṇam āsādayāṃ cakruḥ pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ sahaa tān vai sarathahastyaśvān prāhiṇod yamasādanamc droṇo cireṇākaroc ca mahīṃ śoṇitakardamāma tanvatā paramāstrāṇi śarān satatam asyatāc droṇena vihitaṃ dikṣu bāṇajālam adṛśyataa padātiṣu rathāśveṣu vāraṇeṣu ca sarvaśaḥc tasya vidyud ivābhreṣu caran ketur adṛśyataa sa kekayānāṃ pravarāṃś ca pañcapāñcālarājaṃ ca śaraiḥ pramṛdyac yudhiṣṭhirānīkam adīnayodhīdroṇo bhyayāt kārmukabāṇapāṇiḥa taṃ bhīmasenaś ca dhanaṃjayaś caśineś ca naptā drupadātmajaś cac śaibyātmajaḥ kāśipatiḥ śibiś cahṛṣṭā nadanto vyakirañ śaraughaiḥd śreṇīkṛtāḥ saṃyati moghavegād dvīpe nadīnām iva kāśarohāḥa teṣām atho droṇadhanurvimuktāḥpatatriṇaḥ kāñcanacitrapuṅkhāḥc bhittvā śarīrāṇi gajāśvayūnāṃjagmur mahīṃ śoṇitadigdhavājāḥa sā yodhasaṃghaiś ca rathaiś ca bhūmiḥśarair vibhinnair gajavājibhiś cac pracchādyamānā patitair babhūvasamantato dyaur iva kālameghaiḥa śaineyabhīmārjunavāhinīpāñśaibyābhimanyū saha kāśirājñāc anyāṃś ca vīrān samare pramṛdnāddroṇaḥ sutānāṃ tava bhūtikāmaḥa etāni cānyāni ca kauravendrakarmāṇi kṛtvā samare mahātmāc pratāpya lokān iva kālasūryodroṇo gataḥ svargam ito hi rājand sa tu kṛtvā mahatkarma droṇaḥ parabalārdanaḥa evaṃ rukmarathaḥ śūro hatvā śatasahasraśaḥc pāṇḍavānāṃ raṇe yodhān pārṣatena nipātitaḥa akṣauhiṇīm abhyadhikāṃ śūrāṇām anivartināmc nihatya paścād dhṛtimān agacchat paramāṃ gatima pāṇḍavaiḥ saha pāñcālair aśivaiḥ krūrakarmabhiḥc hato rukmaratho rājan kṛtvā karma suduṣkarama tato ninādo bhūtānām ākāśe samajāyatac sainyānāṃ ca tato rājann ācārye nihate yudhia dyāṃ dharāṃ khaṃ diśo vāri pradiśaś cānunādayanc aho dhig iti bhūtānāṃ śabdaḥ samabhavan mahāna devatāḥ pitaraś caiva pūrve ye cāsya bāndhavāḥc dadṛśur nihataṃ tatra bhāradvājaṃ mahārathama pāṇḍavās tu jayaṃ labdhvā siṃhanādān pracakrirec tena nādena mahatā samakampata medinīd vicitrajāmbūnadabhūṣitadhvajaṃd mahārathaṃ rukmarathaṃ nipātitamd niśamya kaś cid dhi na harṣam eyivānd ṛte mṛdhe drupadasutāt sasṛñjayāt dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa kiṃ kurvāṇaṃ raṇe droṇaṃ jaghnuḥ pāṇḍavasṛñjayāḥc tathā nipuṇam astreṣu sarvaśastrabhṛtām apia rathabhaṅgo babhūvāsya dhanur vāśīryatāsyataḥc pramatto vābhavad droṇas tato mṛtyum upeyivāna kathaṃ nu pārṣatas tāta śatrubhir duṣpradharṣaṇamc kirantam iṣusaṃghātān rukmapuṅkhān anekaśaḥa kṣiprahastaṃ dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ kṛtinaṃ citrayodhinamc dūreṣupātinaṃ dāntam astrayuddhe ca pāragama pāñcālaputro nyavadhīd diṣṭyā sa varam acyutamc kurvāṇaṃ dāruṇaṃ karma raṇe yattaṃ mahārathama vyaktaṃ diṣṭaṃ hi balavat pauruṣād iti me matiḥc yad droṇo nihataḥ śūraḥ pārṣatena mahātmanāa astraṃ caturvidhaṃ vīre yasminn āsīt pratiṣṭhitamc tam iṣvastravarācāryaṃ droṇaṃ śaṃsasi me hatama śrutvā hataṃ rukmarathaṃ vaiyāghraparivāraṇamc jātarūpapariṣkāraṃ nādya śokam apānudea na nūnaṃ paraduḥkhena kaś cin mriyati saṃjayac yatra droṇam ahaṃ śrutvā hataṃ jīvāmi na mriyed daivam eva paraṃ manye na sunītaṃ na pauruṣamd madīyo nāyako yatra guṇaśreṣṭho hataḥ paraiḥa aśmasāramayaṃ nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ sudṛḍhaṃ mamac yac chrutvā nihataṃ droṇaṃ śatadhā na vidīryatea brāhme vede tatheṣv astre yam upāsan guṇārthinaḥc brāhmaṇā rājaputrāś ca sa kathaṃ mṛtyunā hataḥa śoṣaṇaṃ sāgarasyeva meror iva visarpaṇamc patanaṃ bhāskarasyeva na mṛṣye droṇapātanama dṛptānāṃ pratiṣeddhāsīd dhārmikānāṃ ca rakṣitāc yo tyākṣīt kṛpaṇasyārthe prāṇān api paraṃtapaḥa mandānāṃ mama putrāṇāṃ jayāśā yasya vikramec bṛhaspatyuśanastulyo buddhyā sa nihataḥ kathamd guṇānāṃ sarvayodhānāṃ sthitir āsīn mahādyutiḥd yaṃ mṛtyur vaśagas tiṣṭhet sa kathaṃ mṛtyunā hataḥa te ca śoṇā bṛhanto śvāḥ saindhavā hemamālinaḥc rathe vātajavā yuktāḥ sarvaśabdātigā raṇea balino ghoṣiṇo dāntāḥ saindhavāḥ sādhuvāhinaḥc dṛḍhāḥ saṃgrāmamadhyeṣu kaccid āsan na vihvalāḥa kariṇāṃ bṛṃhatāṃ yuddhe śaṅkhadundubhinisvanamc jyākṣepaśaravarṣāṇāṃ śastrāṇāṃ ca sahiṣṇavaḥa āśaṃsantaḥ parāñ jetuṃ jitaśvāsā jitavyathāḥc hayāḥ prajavitāḥ śīghrā bhāradvājarathodvahāḥa te sma rukmarathe yuktā naravīrasamāhitāḥc kathaṃ nābhyataraṃs tāta pāṇḍavānām anīkinīmd taṃ tu rukmarathaṃ dṛṣṭvā vidravanti sma śatravaḥd divyam astraṃ vikurvāṇaṃ saṃgatāḥ sarvataḥ parea jātarūpapariṣkāram āsthāya ratham uttamamc bhāradvājaḥ kim akaroc chūraḥ saṃkrandano yudhia vidyāṃ yasyopajīvanti sarvalokadhanurbhṛtaḥc sa satyasaṃdho balavān droṇaḥ kim akarod yudhia divi śakram iva śreṣṭhaṃ mahāmātraṃ dhanurbhṛtāmc ke nu taṃ raudrakarmāṇaṃ yuddhe pratyudyayū rathāḥa nanu rukmarathaṃ dṛṣṭvā pradravanti sma pāṇḍavāḥc divyam astraṃ vikurvāṇaṃ senāṃ kṣiṇvantam avyayama utāho sarvasainyena dharmarājaḥ sahānujaḥc pāñcālyapragraho droṇaṃ sarvataḥ samavārayata nūnam āvārayat pārtho rathino nyān ajihmagaiḥc tato droṇaṃ samārohat pārṣataḥ pāpakarmakṛta na hy anyaṃ paripaśyāmi vadhe kaṃ cana śuṣmiṇaḥc dhṛṣṭadyumnād ṛte raudrāt pālyamānāt kirīṭinād utsṛjya sarvasainyāni droṇam evābhidudruvea tair vṛtaḥ sarvataḥ śūraiḥ pāñcālyāpasadas tataḥc kekayaiś cedikārūṣair matsyair anyaiś ca bhūmipaiḥa vyākulīkṛtam ācāryaṃ pipīlair uragaṃ yathāc karmaṇy asukare saktaṃ jaghāneti matir mamaa yo dhītya caturo vedān sarvān ākhyānapañcamānc brāhmaṇānāṃ pratiṣṭhāsīt srotasām iva sāgaraḥd kṣatraṃ ca brahma caiveha yo nvatiṣṭhat paraṃtapaḥd dṛptānāṃ pratiṣeddhā ca cakṣur āsīd acakṣuṣāmd amarṣī cāvalipteṣu dhārmikeṣu ca dhārmikaḥe sa kathaṃ brāhmaṇo vṛddhaḥ śastreṇa vadham āptavāna amarṣaṇo marṣitavān kliśyamānaḥ sadā mayāc anarhamāṇaḥ kaunteyaḥ karmaṇas tasya tat phalama yasya karmānujīvanti loke sarvadhanurbhṛtaḥc sa satyasaṃdhaḥ sukṛtī śrīkāmair nihataḥ kathama divi śakra iva śreṣṭho mahāsattvo mahābalaḥc sa kathaṃ nihataḥ pārthaiḥ kṣudramatsyair yathā timiḥa kṣiprahastaś ca balavān dṛḍhadhanvārimardanaḥb vā kathaṃ nihataḥ pāpai raṇe brāhmaṇapuṃgavaḥc na yasya jīvitākāṅkṣī viṣayaṃ prāpya jīvatia yaṃ dvau na jahataḥ śabdau jīvamānaṃ kadā canac brāhmaś ca vedakāmānāṃ jyāghoṣaś ca dhanurbhṛtāmd adīnaṃ puruṣavyāghraṃ hrīmantam aparājitama nāhaṃ mṛṣye hataṃ droṇaṃ siṃhadviradavikramamb paśyatāṃ puruṣendrāṇāṃ samare pārṣato vadhītb ke purastād ayudhyanta rakṣanto droṇam antikātb ke nu paścād avartanta gacchato durgamāṃ gatimc kathaṃ saṃjaya durdharṣam anādhṛṣyayaśobalamd brahmakalpo bhavad brāhme kṣātre nārāyaṇopamaḥd brahmakṣatre ca yasyāstāṃ vaśe sthāṇor ivākhiled sarvān hi māmakān yuddhe sahāśvarathakuñjarānd yudhiṣṭhirasya tapasā hatān manyāmahe kurūna ke rakṣan dakṣiṇaṃ cakraṃ savyaṃ ke ca mahātmanaḥc purastāt ke ca vīrasya yudhyamānasya saṃyugea ke ca tatra tanuṃ tyaktvā pratīpaṃ mṛtyum āvrajanc droṇasya samare vīrāḥ ke kurvanta parāṃ dhṛtimd kaccin nainaṃ bhayān mandāḥ kṣatriyā vyajahan raṇed rakṣitāras tataḥ śūnye kaccin naiko hataḥ paraiḥd na sa pṛṣṭham ares trāsād raṇe śauryāt pradarśayetd parām apy āpadaṃ prāpya sa kathaṃ nihataḥ paraiḥd yaḥ sa devān sagandharvān sayakṣoragarākṣasānd jetum utsahate droṇaḥ sa kathaṃ nihataḥ paraiḥa etad āryeṇa kartavyaṃ kṛcchrāsv āpatsu saṃjayac parākramed yathāśaktyā tac ca tasmin pratiṣṭhitamd kaccin nainaṃ bhayāt kṣudrāḥ pārthebhyaḥ pradadū raṇed goptṛbhis taiḥ samutsṛṣṭaḥ kaccin naiṣa parair hataḥd dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ hi paśyāmi nighnantam iva brāhmaṇamd vāryamāṇaṃ raṇe tāta drauṇināmitatejasāa muhyate me manas tāta kathā tāvan nivartyatāmb kṣaṇam ekam ahaṃ sūta na śakṣyāmīti jalpitumc bhūyas tu labdhasaṃjñas tvā pariprakṣyāmi saṃjaya vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa evaṃ pṛṣṭvā sūtaputraṃ hṛcchokenārdito bhṛśamc jaye nirāśaḥ putrāṇāṃ dhṛtarāṣṭro patat kṣitaua taṃ visaṃjñaṃ nipatitaṃ siṣicuḥ paricārakāḥc jalenātyarthaśītena vījantaḥ puṇyagandhināa patitaṃ cainam ājñāya samantād bharatastriyaḥc parivavrur mahārājam aspṛśaṃś caiva pāṇibhiḥa utthāpya cainaṃ śanakai rājānaṃ pṛthivītalātc āsanaṃ prāpayām āsur bāṣpakaṇṭhyo varāṅganāḥa āsanaṃ prāpya rājā tu mūrchayābhipariplutaḥc niśceṣṭo tiṣṭhata tadā vījyamānaḥ samantataḥa sa labdhvā śanakaiḥ saṃjñāṃ vepamāno mahīpatiḥc punar gāvalgaṇiṃ sūtaṃ paryapṛcchad yathātathama yat tad udyann ivādityo jyotiṣā praṇudaṃs tamaḥc āyād ajātaśatrur vai kas taṃ droṇād avārayata prabhinnam iva mātaṅgaṃ tathā kruddhaṃ tarasvinamc āsaktamanasaṃ dīptaṃ pratidviradaghātiname vāśitāsaṃgame yadvad ajayyaṃ pratiyūthapaiḥa ati cānyān raṇe yodhān vīraḥ puruṣasattamaḥc yo hy eko hi mahābāhur nirdahed ghoracakṣuṣāe kṛtsnaṃ duryodhanabalaṃ dhṛtimān satyasaṃgaraḥa cakṣurhaṇaṃ jaye saktam iṣvāsavararakṣitamc dāntaṃ bahumataṃ loke ke śūrāḥ paryavārayana ke duṣpradharṣaṃ rājānam iṣvāsavaram acyutamc samāsedur naravyāghraṃ kaunteyaṃ tatra māmakāḥa tarasaivābhipatyātha yo vai droṇam upādravatb yaḥ karoti mahatkarma śatrūṇāṃ vai mahābalaḥb mahākāyo mahotsāho nāgāyutasamo balec taṃ bhīmasenam āyāntaṃ ke śūrāḥ paryavārayana yad āyāj jaladaprakhyo rathaḥ paramavīryavānc parjanya iva bībhatsus tumulām aśaniṃ sṛjana vavarṣa śaravarṣāṇi varṣāṇi maghavān ivac iṣusaṃbādham ākāśaṃ kurvan kapivaradhvajaḥe avasphūrjan diśaḥ sarvās talanemisvanena caa cāpavidyutprabho ghoro rathagulmabalāhakaḥc rathanemighoṣastanitaḥ śaraśabdātibandhuraḥa roṣanirjitajīmūto mano bhiprāyaśīghragaḥc marmātigo bāṇadhāras tumulaḥ śoṇitodakaḥa saṃplāvayan mahīṃ sarvāṃ mānavair āstaraṃs tadāc gadāniṣṭanito raudro duryodhanakṛtodyamaḥd gadāsividyutkalilaḥ śātravāṇāṃ bhayaṃkaraḥa yuddhe bhyaṣiñcad vijayo gārdhrapatraiḥ śilāśitaiḥc gāṇḍīvaṃ dhārayan dhīmān kīdṛśaṃ vo manas tadād yadāyāt katham āsīd vas tadā pārthaṃ samīkṣya haa kaccid gāṇḍīvaśabdena na praṇaśyata vai balamc yad vaḥ sa bhairavaṃ kurvann arjuno bhṛśam abhyagāta kaccin nāpānudad droṇād iṣubhir vo dhanaṃjayaḥb vāyur meghān ivādityād reṇūn iva mahābalaḥc vāto meghān ivāvidhyan pravāñ śaravanānilaḥd ko hi śakto raṇe jetuṃ mānavaḥ pārtham īkṣitume ko hi gāṇḍīvadhanvānaṃ naraḥ soḍhuṃ raṇe rhatif yam upaśrutya senāgre janaḥ sarvo vidīryatea yat senāḥ samakampanta yad vīrān aspṛśad bhayamc ke tatra nājahur droṇaṃ ke kṣudrāḥ prādravan bhayāta ke vā tatra tanūs tyaktvā pratīpaṃ mṛtyum āvrajanc amānuṣāṇāṃ jetāraṃ yuddheṣv api dhanaṃjayama na ca vegaṃ sitāśvasya viśakṣyantīha māmakāḥc gāṇḍīvasya ca nirghoṣaṃ prāvṛḍjaladanisvanama viṣvakseno yasya yantā yoddhā caiva dhanaṃjayaḥc aśakyaḥ sa ratho jetuṃ manye devāsurair apia sukumāro yuvā śūro darśanīyaś ca pāṇḍavaḥc medhāvī nipuṇo dhīmān yudhi satyaparākramaḥa ārāvaṃ vipulaṃ kurvan vyathayan sarvakauravānc yadāyān nakulo dhīmān ke śūrāḥ paryavārayand taṃ rathānāṃ varaṃ vīraṃ sadā yuddheṣu durmadamd nakulaṃ pāṇḍavaśreṣṭhaṃ ke vīrāḥ paryavārayana āśīviṣa iva kruddhaḥ sahadevo yadābhyayātb sahadevaṃ samāyāntaṃ parasenāvidāraṇamc śatrūṇāṃ kadanaṃ kurvañ jetāsau durjayo yudhid amoghabāṇaḥ siddheṣuḥ śatrubhir yudhi durjayaḥa āryavratam amogheṣuṃ hrīmantam aparājitamb ārāvaṃ tumulaṃ kurvan vyathayan bhairavaṃ raṇec abhiprāyaṃ jñātvā droṇo rthatattvavitc taṃ varaṃ sāntaraṃ tasmai dadau saṃcintya buddhimān droṇa uvācaa na ced yudhiṣṭhiraṃ vīra pālayed arjuno yudhic manyasva pāṇḍavaṃ jyeṣṭham ānītaṃ vaśam ātmanaḥa na hi pārtho raṇe śakyaḥ sendrair devāsurair apib sthite pārthe dharmarājo naiva śakyo mayā raṇec pratyudyātum atas tāta naitad āmarṣayāmy ahama asaṃśayaṃ sa śiṣyo me matpūrvaś cāstrakarmaṇic taruṇaḥ kīrtiyuktaś ca ekāyanagataś ca saḥa astrāṇīndrāc ca rudrāc ca bhūyāṃsi samavāptavānc amarṣitaś ca te rājaṃs tena nāmarṣayāmy ahama sa cāpakramyatāṃ yuddhād yenopāyena śakyatec apanīte tataḥ pārthe dharmarājo jitas tvayāa grahaṇaṃ cej jayaṃ tasya manyase puruṣarṣabhac etena cābhyupāyena dhruvaṃ grahaṇam eṣyatia ahaṃ gṛhītvā rājānaṃ satyadharmaparāyaṇamc ānayiṣyāmi te rājan vaśam adya na saṃśayaḥa yadi sthāsyati saṃgrāme muhūrtam api me grataḥc apanīte naravyāghre kuntīputre dhanaṃjayea phalgunasya samakṣaṃ tu na hi pārtho yudhiṣṭhiraḥc grahītuṃ samare śakyaḥ sendrair api surāsuraiḥ saṃjaya uvāca evam ukte tadā tasmin yuddhe devāsuropamea sāntaraṃ tu pratijñāte rājño droṇena nigrahec gṛhītaṃ tam amanyanta tava putrāḥ subāliśāḥa pāṇḍaveṣu hi sāpekṣaṃ droṇaṃ jānāti te sutaḥc tataḥ pratijñāsthairyārthaṃ sa mantro bahulīkṛtaḥa tato duryodhanenāpi grahaṇaṃ pāṇḍavasya tatb skandhāvāreṣu sarveṣu yathāsthāneṣu māriṣac sainyasthāneṣu sarveṣu vyāghoṣitam ariṃdama saṃjaya uvācaa tatas te sainikāḥ śrutvā taṃ yudhiṣṭhiranigrahamc siṃhanādaravāṃś cakrur bāṇaśaṅkharavaiḥ sahaa tat tu sarvaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ dharmarājena bhāratac āptair āśu parijñātaṃ bhāradvājacikīrṣitama tataḥ sarvān samānāyya bhrātṝn sainyāṃś ca sarvaśaḥc abravīd dharmarājas tu dhanaṃjayam idaṃ vacaḥa śrutaṃ te puruṣavyāghra droṇasyādya cikīrṣitamc yathā tan na bhavet satyaṃ tathā nītir vidhīyatāma sāntaraṃ hi pratijñātaṃ droṇenāmitrakarśanac tac cāntaram amogheṣau tvayi tena samāhitama sa tvam adya mahābāho yudhyasva madanantaramc yathā duryodhanaḥ kāmaṃ nemaṃ droṇād avāpnuyāt arjuna uvācaa yathā me na vadhaḥ kārya ācāryasya kathaṃ canac tathā tava parityāgo na me rājaṃś cikīrṣitaḥa apy evaṃ pāṇḍava prāṇān utsṛjeyam ahaṃ yudhic pratīyāṃ nāham ācāryaṃ tvāṃ na jahyāṃ kathaṃ canaa tvāṃ nigṛhyāhave rājan dhārtarāṣṭro yam icchatic na sa taṃ jīvaloke smin kāmaṃ prāptaḥ kathaṃ canaa prapated dyauḥ sanakṣatrā pṛthivī śakalībhavetc na tvāṃ droṇo nigṛhṇīyāj jīvamāne mayi dhruvama yadi tasya raṇe sāhyaṃ kurute vajrabhṛt svayamc devair vā sahito daityair na tvāṃ prāpsyaty asau mṛdhea mayi jīvati rājendra na bhayaṃ kartum arhasic droṇād astrabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭhāt sarvaśastrabhṛtām apid anyac ca brūyāṃ rājendra pratijñāṃ mama nityadāa na smarāmy anṛtāṃ vācaṃ na smarāmi parājayamc na smarāmi pratiśrutya kiṃ cid apy anapākṛtam saṃjaya uvācaa tataḥ śaṅkhāś ca bheryaś ca mṛdaṅgāś cānakaiḥ sahac prāvādyanta mahārāja pāṇḍavānāṃ niveśanea siṃhanādaś ca saṃjajñe pāṇḍavānāṃ mahātmanāmc dhanurjyātalaśabdaś ca gaganaspṛk subhairavaḥa taṃ śrutvā śaṅkhanirghoṣaṃ pāṇḍavasya mahātmanaḥc tvadīyeṣv apy anīkeṣu vāditrāṇy abhijaghnirea tato vyūḍhāny anīkāni tava teṣāṃ ca bhāratac śanair upeyur anyonyaṃ yotsyamānāni saṃyugea tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇamc pāṇḍavānāṃ kurūṇāṃ ca droṇapāñcālyayor apia yatamānāḥ prayatnena droṇānīkaviśātanec na śekuḥ sṛñjayā rājaṃs tad dhi droṇena pālitama tathaiva tava putrasya rathodārāḥ prahāriṇaḥc na śekuḥ pāṇḍavīṃ senāṃ pālyamānāṃ kirīṭināa āstāṃ te stimite sene rakṣyamāṇe parasparamc saṃprasupte yathā naktaṃ vanarājyau supuṣpitea tato rukmaratho rājann arkeṇeva virājatāc varūthinā viniṣpatya vyacarat pṛtanāntarea tam udyataṃ rathenaikam āśukāriṇam āhavec anekam iva saṃtrāsān menire pāṇḍusṛñjayāḥa tena muktāḥ śarā ghorā viceruḥ sarvatodiśamc trāsayanto mahārāja pāṇḍaveyasya vāhinīma madhyaṃ dinam anuprāpto gabhastiśatasaṃvṛtaḥc yathādṛśyata gharmāṃśus tathā droṇo py adṛśyataa na cainaṃ pāṇḍaveyānāṃ kaś cic chaknoti māriṣac vīkṣituṃ samare kruddhaṃ mahendram iva dānavāḥa mohayitvā tataḥ sainyaṃ bhāradvājaḥ pratāpavānc dhṛṣṭadyumnabalaṃ tūrṇaṃ vyadhaman niśitaiḥ śaraiḥa sa diśaḥ sarvato ruddhvā saṃvṛtya kham ajihmagaiḥc pārṣato yatra tatraiva mamṛde pāṇḍuvāhinīm saṃjaya uvācaa tataḥ sa pāṇḍavānīke janayaṃs tumulaṃ mahatc vyacarat pāṇḍavān droṇo dahan kakṣam ivānalaḥa nirdahantam anīkāni sākṣād agnim ivotthitamc dṛṣṭvā rukmarathaṃ yuddhe samakampanta sṛñjayāḥa pratataṃ cāsyamānasya dhanuṣo syāśukāriṇaḥc jyāghoṣaḥ śrūyate tyarthaṃ visphūrjitam ivāśaneḥa rathinaḥ sādinaś caiva nāgān aśvān padātinaḥc raudrā hastavatā muktāḥ pramathnanti sma sāyakāḥa nānadyamānaḥ parjanyaḥ sānilaḥ śucisaṃkṣayec aśmavarṣam ivāvarṣat pareṣām āvahad bhayama vyacarat sa tadā rājan senāṃ vikṣobhayan prabhuḥc vardhayām āsa saṃtrāsaṃ śātravāṇām amānuṣama tasya vidyud ivābhreṣu cāpaṃ hemapariṣkṛtamc bhramad rathāmbude tasmin dṛśyate sma punaḥ punaḥa sa vīraḥ satyavān prājño dharmanityaḥ sudāruṇaḥc yugāntakāle yanteva raudrāṃ prāskandayan nadīma amarṣavegaprabhavāṃ kravyādagaṇasaṃkulāmc balaughaiḥ sarvataḥ pūrṇāṃ vīravṛkṣāpahāriṇīma śoṇitodāṃ rathāvartāṃ hastyaśvakṛtarodhasamc kavacoḍupasaṃyuktāṃ māṃsapaṅkasamākulāmd keśaśaivālasaṃyuktāṃ māṃsāsṛkkardamāruṇāma medomajjāsthisikatām prāsyandayan droṇaḥ keśaśaivalaśāḍvalāma nihatān prāṇinaḥ saṃkhye droṇena balinā śaraiḥc vahantīṃ pitṛlokāya śataśo rājasattamad uvāha śataśo rājan pitṛlokāya vāhinīma śarīraśatasaṃbādhāṃ dṛḍhakārmukāḥc sarvataḥ pratyagṛhṇanta tad abhūl lomaharṣaṇama śatamāyas tu śakuniḥ sahadevaṃ samādravatc saniyantṛdhvajarathaṃ vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥa tasya mādrīsutaḥ ketuṃ dhanuḥ sūtaṃ hayān apic nātikruddhaḥ śaraiś chittvā ṣaṣṭyā vivyādha mātulamd bhittvā ca śaravarṣeṇa śakuniṃ pratyavārayata saubalas tu gadāṃ gṛhya pracaskanda rathottamātc sa tasya gadayā rājan rathāt sūtam apātayata tatas pradoṣe puruṣarṣabhac bahubhis tena cābhyastas taṃ vivyādha śatādhikaiḥa viviṃśatiṃ bhīmaseno viṃśatyā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥc viddhvā nākampayad vīras tad adbhutam ivābhavata viviṃśatis tu sahasā vyaśvaketuśarāsanamc bhīmaṃ cakre mahārāja tataḥ sainyāny apūjayand cakre taṃ sarvasainyāni prahṛṣṭāny abhyapūjayana sa tan na mamṛṣe vīraḥ śatror vijayam āhavec tato sya gadayā dāntān hayān sarvān ivaa tasyāśvān ātapatraṃ ca dhvajaṃ sūtam atho dhanuḥc nipātya nakulaḥ saṃkhye śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau pratāpavānd ciccheda samare yattaḥ sa ca yuddhād upāramata dhṛṣṭaketuḥ kṛpenāstāñ chittvā bahuvidhāñ śarānc kṛpaṃ vivyādha saptatyā lakṣma cāsyāharat tribhiḥa taṃ kṛpaḥ śaravarṣeṇa mahatā samavākiratc nivārya ca raṇe vipro dhṛṣṭaketum ayodhayata sātyakiḥ kṛtavarmāṇaṃ nārācena stanāntarec viddhvā yuyudhāte parasparamc yathā devāsure yuddhe balaśakrau mahābalaua lakṣmaṇaḥ kṣatradevena vimardam akarod bhṛśamc yathā viṣṇuḥ purā rājan hiraṇyākṣeṇa saṃyugea tataḥ prajavitāśvena vidhivat kalpitena muhuḥc samādattārjunis tūrṇaṃ pauravāntakaraṃ śaramd tasya saṃdhitam ājñāya sāyakaṃ ghoradarśanama dvābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ hārdikyaś cakarta saśaraṃ dhanuḥc tad utsṛjya dhanuś chinnaṃ saubhadraḥ paravīrahāe udbabarha sitaṃ khaḍgam ādadānaḥ śarāvarama sa tenānekatāreṇa carmaṇā kṛtahastavatc bhrāntāsir acaran mārgān darśayan vīryam ātmanaḥa bhrāmitaṃ punar udbhrāntam ādhūtaṃ punar ucchritamc carmanistriṃśayo rājan nirviśeṣam adṛśyataa sa pauravarathasyeṣām āplutya sahasā nadanc pauravaṃ ratham āsthāya keśapakṣe parāmṛśata jaghānāsya padā sūtam asināpātayad dhvajamc vikṣobhyāmbhonidhiṃ tārkṣyas taṃ nāgam iva cākṣipata tam ākalitakeśāntaṃ dadṛśuḥ sarvapārthivāḥc ukṣāṇam iva siṃhena pātyamānam acetanama tam ārjunivaśaṃ prāptaṃ kṛṣyamāṇam anāthavatc pauravaṃ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā nāmṛṣyata jayadrathaḥa sa barhiṇamahāvājaṃ kiṅkiṇīśatajālavatc carma cādāya khaḍgaṃ ca nadan paryapatad rathāta tataḥ saindhavam ālokya kārṣṇir utsṛjya pauravamc utpapāta rathāt tūrṇaṃ śyenavan nipapāta caa prāsapaṭṭiśanistriṃśāñ śatrubhiḥ saṃpraveritānc cicchedāthāsinā kārṣṇiś carmaṇā saṃrurodha caa sa darśayitvā sainyānāṃ svabāhubalam ātmanaḥc tam udyamya mahākhaḍgaṃ carma cātha punar balīd dudhāva sahasā khaḍgaṃ carma cātirathaḥ punaḥa vṛddhakṣatrasya dāyādaṃ pitur atyantavairiṇamc sasārābhimukhaḥ śūraḥ śārdūla iva kuñjarama tau parasparam āsādya khaḍgadantanakhāyudhauc hṛṣṭavat saṃprajahrāte vyāghrakesariṇāv ivaa saṃpāteṣv abhipāteṣu nipāteṣv asicarmaṇoḥc na tayor antaraṃ kaś cid dadarśa narasiṃhayoḥa avakṣepo sinirhrādaḥ śastrāntaranidarśanamc bāhyāntaranipātaś ca nirviśeṣam adṛśyataa bāhyam ābhyantaraṃ caiva carantau mārgam uttamamc dadṛśāte mahātmānau sapakṣāv iva parvataua tato vikṣipataḥ khaḍgaṃ saubhadrasya yaśasvinaḥc śarāvaraṇapakṣānte prajahāra jayadrathaḥa rukmapakṣāntare saktas tasmiṃś carmaṇi bhāsvarec sindhurājabaloddhūtaḥ so bhajyata mahān asiḥa bhagnam ājñāya nistriṃśam avaplutya padāni ṣaṭc so dṛśyata nimeṣeṇa svarathaṃ punar āsthitaḥa taṃ kārṣṇiṃ samarān muktam āsthitaṃ ratham uttamamc sahitāḥ sarvarājānaḥ parivavruḥ samantataḥa tataś carma ca khaḍgaṃ ca samutkṣipya mahābalaḥc nanādārjunadāyādaḥ prekṣamāṇo jayadrathama sindhurājaṃ parityajya saubhadraḥ paravīrahāc tāpayām āsa tat sainyaṃ bhuvanaṃ bhāskaro yathāa tasya sarvāyasīṃ śaktiṃ śalyaḥ kanakabhūṣaṇāmc cikṣepa samare ghorāṃ dīptām agniśikhām ivaa tām avaplutya jagrāha sakośaṃ cākarod asimc vainateyo yathā kārṣṇiḥ patantam uragottamama tasya lāghavam ājñāya sattvaṃ cāmitatejasaḥc sahitāḥ sarvarājānaḥ siṃhanādam athānadana tatas tām eva śalyasya saubhadraḥ paravīrahāc mumoca bhujavīryeṇa vaiḍūryavikṛtājirāma sā tasya ratham āsādya nirmuktabhujagopamāc jaghāna sūtaṃ śalyasya rathāc cainam apātayata tato virāṭadrupadau dhṛṣṭaketur yudhiṣṭhiraḥc sātyakiḥ kekayā bhīmo dhṛṣṭadyumnaśikhaṇḍinaue yamau ca draupadeyāś ca sādhu sādhv iti cukruśuḥa bāṇaśabdāś ca vividhāḥ siṃhanādāś ca puṣkalāḥc prādurāsan harṣayantaḥ saubhadram apalāyinamd parivavruḥ sma te sarve pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathāḥd harṣayantaś ca saubhadraṃ roṣayantaḥ sutāṃś ca tee tan nāmṛṣyanta putrās te śatror vijayalakṣaṇama athainaṃ sahasā sarve samantān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥc abhyākiran mahārāja jaladā iva parvatama teṣāṃ ca priyam anvicchan sūtasya ca parābhavātc ārtāyanir amitraghnaḥ kruddhaḥ saubhadram abhyayāt dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa bahūni suvicitrāṇi dvaṃdvayuddhāni saṃjayac tvayoktāni niśamyāhaṃ spṛhayāmi sacakṣuṣāmd na hi devāsuraṃ yuddham īdṛgrūpaṃ bhaved itid cintayāmi ca yuddhāni śrutvā ghorāṇi saṃjayaa āścaryabhūtaṃ lokeṣu kathayiṣyanti mānavāḥc kurūṇāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca yuddhaṃ devāsuropamama na hi me tṛptir astīha śṛṇvato yuddham uttamamc tasmād ārtāyaner yuddhaṃ saubhadrasya ca śaṃsa me saṃjaya uvācaa sāditaṃ prekṣya yantāraṃ śalyaḥ sarvāyaṣīṃ gadāmc samutkṣipya nadan kruddhaḥ pracaskanda rathottamāta taṃ dīptam iva kālāgniṃ daṇḍahastam ivāntakamc javenābhyapatad bhīmaḥ pragṛhya mahatīṃ gadāma saubhadro py aśaniprakhyāṃ pragṛhya mahatīṃ gadāmc ehy ehīty abravīc chalyaṃ yatnād bhīmena vāritaḥa vārayitvā tu saubhadraṃ bhīmasenaḥ pratāpavānc śalyam āsādya samare tasthau girir ivācalaḥa tathaiva madrarājo pi bhīmaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahābalamc sasārābhimukhas tūrṇaṃ śārdūla iva kuñjarama tatas tūryaninādāś ca śaṅkhānāṃ ca sahasraśaḥc siṃhanādāś ca saṃjajñur bherīṇāṃ ca mahāsvanāḥa paśyatāṃ śataśo hy āsīd anyonyasamacetasāmc pāṇḍavānāṃ kurūṇāṃ ca sādhu sādhv iti nisvanaḥa na hi madrādhipād anyaḥ sarvarājasu bhāratac soḍhum utsahate vegaṃ bhīmasenasya saṃyugea tathā madrādhipasyāpi gadāvegaṃ mahātmanaḥc soḍhum utsahate loke ko nyo yudhi vṛkodarāta paṭṭair jāmbūnadair baddhā babhūva janaharṣiṇīc prajajvāla tathāviddhā bhīmena mahatī gadād sāgnidīptā mahāraudrā gadā sā śuśubhe tadāa tathaiva carato mārgān maṇḍalāni ca bhāgaśaḥc mahāvidyutpratīkāśā śalyasya śuśubhe gadāa tau vṛṣāv iva nardantau maṇḍalāni viceratuḥc āvarjitagadāśṛṅgāv ubhau śalyavṛkodaraud kopatāmrekṣaṇau vīrau śatrusaṃghavimardanaud mahāmātrau mahotsāhau gadāyuddhaviśāradaua maṇḍalāvartamārgeṣu gadāviharaṇeṣu cac nirviśeṣam abhūd yuddhaṃ tayoḥ puruṣasiṃhayoḥa tāḍitā bhīmasenena śalyasya mahatī gadāc sāgnijvālā mahāraudrā gadācūrṇam aśīryataa tathaiva bhīmasenasya dviṣatābhihatā gadāc varṣāpradoṣe khadyotair vṛto vṛkṣa ivābabhaua gadā kṣiptā tu samare madrarājena bhāratac vyoma saṃdīpayānā sā sasṛje pāvakaṃ bahua tathaiva bhīmasenena dviṣate preṣitā gadāb bhīmarūpā mahāvegā gadā śalyaṃ raṇe nudatc tāpayām āsa tat sainyaṃ maholkā patatī yathāa te caivobhe gade śreṣṭhe samāsādya parasparamc śvasantyau nāgakanyeva sasṛjāte vibhāvasumd punaḥ śalyena bhīmasya gadāgrād gadayā hatātd saṃgharṣaṇād utthito gnir dīpayām āsa medinīmd punaś ca bhīmasenena śalyasya mahatī gadād tāḍitā sahasā rājan visasarjātha pāvakama nakhair iva mahāvyāghrau dantair iva mahāgajauc tau viceratur āsādya gadābhyāṃ ca parasparama tato gadāgrābhihatau kṣaṇena rudhirokṣitauc dadṛśāte mahātmānau puṣpitāv iva kiṃśukaua śuśruve dikṣu sarvāsu tayoḥ puruṣasiṃhayoḥc gadābhighātasaṃhrādaḥ śakrāśanir ivopamaḥa gadayā madrarājena savyadakṣiṇam āhataḥc nākampata tadā bhīmo bhidyamāna ivācalaḥa tathā bhīmagadāvegais tāḍyamāno mahābalaḥc dhairyān madrādhipas tasthau vajrair girir ivāhataḥa āpetatur mahāvegau samucchritamahāgadauc punar antaramārgasthau maṇḍalāni viceratuḥa athāplutya padāny aṣṭau saṃnipatya gajāv ivac sahasā lohadaṇḍābhyām anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥa tau parasparavegāc ca gadābhyāṃ ca bhṛśāhatauc yugapat petatur vīrau kṣitāv indradhvajāv ivaa tato vihvalamānaṃ taṃ niḥśvasantaṃ punaḥ punaḥc śalyam abhyapatat tūrṇaṃ kṛtavarmā mahārathaḥa dṛṣṭvā cainaṃ mahārāja gadayābhinipīḍitamc viceṣṭantaṃ yathā nāgaṃ mūrchayābhipariplutama tataḥ sagadam āropya madrāṇām adhipaṃ rathamc apovāha raṇāt tūrṇaṃ kṛtavarmā mahārathaḥa kṣībavad vihvalo vīro nimeṣāt punar utthitaḥc bhīmo pi sumahābāhur gadāpāṇir adṛśyataa tato madrādhipaṃ dṛṣṭvā tava putrāḥ parāṅmukhamc sanāgarathapattyaśvāḥ samakampanta māriṣaa te pāṇḍavair ardyamānās tāvakā jitakāśibhiḥc bhītā diśo nvapadyanta vātanunnā ghanā ivaa nirjitya dhārtarāṣṭrāṃs tu pāṇḍaveyā mahārathāḥc vyarocanta raṇe rājan dīpyamānā yaśasvinaḥa siṃhanādān bhṛśaṃ cakruḥ śaṅkhān dadhmuś ca harṣitāḥc bherīś ca vādayām āsur mṛdaṅgāṃś cānakaiḥ sahad atha maḍḍukabherimahāmurajāḥd paṇavānakadundubhijharjharibhiḥd vinadanti bhṛśaṃ saha śaṅkharavaird vividhaiś ca narottama siṃharavaiḥ saṃjaya uvācaa tad balaṃ sumahad dīrṇaṃ tvadīyaṃ prekṣya vīryavānc dadhāraiko raṇe pāṇḍūn vṛṣaseno stramāyayāa śarā daśa diśo muktā vṛṣasenena māriṣac vicerus te vinirbhidya naravājirathadvipāna tasya dīptā mahābāṇā viniśceruḥ sahasraśaḥc bhānor iva mahābāho grīṣmakāle marīcayaḥa tenārditā mahārāja rathinaḥ sādinas tathāc nipetur urvyāṃ sahasā vātanunnā iva drumāḥa hayaughāṃś ca rathaughāṃś ca gajaughāṃś ca samantataḥc apātayad raṇe rājañ śataśo tha sahasraśaḥa dṛṣṭvā tam evaṃ samare vicarantam abhītavatc sahitāḥ sarvarājānaḥ parivavruḥ samantataḥa nākulis tu śatānīko vṛṣasenaṃ samabhyayātc vivyādha cainaṃ daśabhir nārācair marmabhedibhiḥa tasya karṇātmajaś cāpaṃ chittvā ketum apātayatc taṃ bhrātaraṃ parīpsanto draupadeyāḥ samabhyayuḥa karṇātmajaṃ śaravrātaiś cakruś cādṛśyam añjasāc tān nadanto bhyadhāvanta droṇaputramukhā rathāḥa chādayanto mahārāja draupadeyān mahārathānc śarair nānāvidhais tūrṇaṃ parvatāñ jaladā ivaa tān pāṇḍavāḥ pratyagṛhṇaṃs tvaritāḥ putragṛddhinaḥc pāñcālāḥ kekayā matsyāḥ sṛñjayāś codyatāyudhāḥa tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇamc tvadīyaiḥ pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ devānām iva dānavaiḥa evam uttamasaṃrambhā yuyudhuḥ kurupāṇḍavāḥc parasparam udīkṣantaḥ parasparakṛtāgasaḥa teṣāṃ dadṛśire kopād vapūṃṣy amitatejasāmc yuyutsūnām ivākāśe patatrivarabhogināma bhīmakarṇakṛpadroṇadrauṇipārṣatasātyakaiḥc babhāse sa raṇoddeśaḥ kālasūryair ivoditaiḥd prajānāṃ saṃkṣaye ghore yathā sūryodayo bhavetd śūrāṇām udayas tadvat sa āsīt puruṣarṣabhaa tadāsīt tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ nighnatām itaretaramc mahābalānāṃ balibhir dānavānāṃ yathā suraiḥa tato yudhiṣṭhirānīkam uddhūtārṇavanisvanamc tvadīyam avadhīt sainyaṃ saṃpradrutamahārathama tat prabhagnaṃ balaṃ dṛṣṭvā śatrubhir bhṛśam arditamc alaṃ drutena vaḥ śūrā iti droṇo bhyabhāṣatad bhāradvājam amarṣaś ca vikramaś ca samāviśatd samuddhṛtya niṣaṅgāc ca dhanur jyām avamṛjya cad mahāśaradhanuṣpāṇir yantāram idam abravītd sārathe yāhi yatraiṣa pāṇḍareṇa virājatād dhriyamāṇena chattreṇa rājā tiṣṭhati dharmarāṭd tad etad dīryate sainyaṃ dhārtarāṣṭram anekadhād etat saṃstambhayiṣyāmi prativārya yudhiṣṭhiramd na hi mām abhivarṣantaṃ saṃyuge tāta pāṇḍavāḥd mātsyapāñcālarājānaḥ sarve ca sahasomakāḥd arjuno matprasādād dhi mahāstrāṇi samāptavānd na mām utsahate tāta na bhīmo na ca sātyakiḥd matprasādād dhi bībhatsuḥ parameṣvāsatāṃ gataḥd mamaivāstraṃ vijānāti dhṛṣṭadyumno pi pārṣataḥd nāyaṃ saṃrakṣituṃ kālaḥ prāṇāṃs tāta jayaiṣiṇād saṃjaya uvācad yāhi svargaṃ puraskṛtya yaśase ca jayāya cad evaṃ saṃcodito yantā droṇam abhyavahat tataḥd tadāśvahṛdayenāśvān abhimantryāśu harṣayand rathena savarūthena bhāsvareṇa virājatād taṃ karūśāś ca matsyāś ca cedayaś ca sasātvatāḥd pāṇḍavāś ca sapāñcālāḥ sahitāḥ paryavārayana tataḥ śoṇahayaḥ kruddhaś caturdanta iva dvipaḥc praviśya pāṇḍavānīkaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram upādravata tam avidhyac chitair bāṇaiḥ kaṅkapatrair yudhiṣṭhiraḥc tasya droṇo dhanuś chittvā taṃ drutaṃ samupādravata cakrarakṣaḥ kumāras tu pāñcālānāṃ yaśaskaraḥc dadhāra droṇam āyāntaṃ veleva saritāṃ patima droṇaṃ nivāritaṃ dṛṣṭvā kumāreṇa dvijarṣabhamc siṃhanādaravo hy āsīt sādhu sādhv iti bhāṣatāma kumāras tu tato droṇaṃ sāyakena mahāhavec vivyādhorasi saṃkruddhaḥ siṃhavac cānadan muhuḥa saṃvārya tu raṇe droṇaḥ kumāraṃ vai mahābalaḥc śarair anekasāhasraiḥ kṛtahasto jitaklamaḥa taṃ śūram āryavratinam astrārthakṛtaniśramamc cakrarakṣam apāmṛdnāt kumāraṃ dvijasattamaḥd bāṇair nivārayām āsa paśyatāṃ sarvadhanvināma sa madhyaṃ prāpya senāyāḥ sarvāḥ paricaran diśaḥc tava sainyasya goptāsīd bhāradvājo ratharṣabhaḥa śikhaṇḍinaṃ dvādaśabhir viṃśatyā cottamaujasamc nakulaṃ pañcabhir viddhvā sahadevaṃ ca saptabhiḥa yudhiṣṭhiraṃ dvādaśabhir draupadeyāṃs tribhis tribhiḥc sātyakiṃ pañcabhir viddhvā matsyaṃ ca daśabhiḥ śaraiḥa vyakṣobhayad raṇe yodhān yathāmukhyān abhidravanc abhyavartata saṃprepsuḥ kuntīputraṃ yudhiṣṭhirama yugaṃdharas tato rājan bhāradvājaṃ mahārathamc vārayām āsa saṃkruddhaṃ vātoddhūtam ivārṇavama yudhiṣṭhiraṃ sa viddhvā tu śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥc yugaṃdharaṃ ca bhallena rathanīḍād apāharatd taṃ vijitya mahātejā bhāradvājo mahāmanāḥa tato virāṭadrupadau kekayāḥ sātyakiḥ śibiḥc vyāghradattaś ca pāñcālyaḥ siṃhasenaś ca vīryavāna ete cānye ca bahavaḥ parīpsanto yudhiṣṭhiramc āvavrus tasya panthānaṃ kirantaḥ sāyakān bahūna vyāghradattaś ca pāñcālyo droṇaṃ vivyādha mārgaṇaiḥc pañcāśadbhiḥ śitai rājaṃs tata uccukruśur janāḥa tvaritaṃ siṃhasenas tu droṇaṃ viddhvā mahārathamc prāhasat sahasā hṛṣṭas trāsayan vai yatavratama tato visphārya nayane dhanurjyām avamṛjya cac talaśabdaṃ mahat kṛtvā droṇas taṃ samupādravata tatas tu siṃhasenasya śiraḥ kāyāt sakuṇḍalamc vyāghradattasya cākramya bhallābhyām aharad balīa tān pramṛdya śaravrātaiḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathānc yudhiṣṭhirasamabhyāśe tasthau mṛtyur ivāntakaḥa tato bhavan mahāśabdo rājan yaudhiṣṭhire balec hṛto rājeti yodhānāṃ samīpasthe yatavratea abruvan sainikās tatra dṛṣṭvā droṇasya vikramamc adya rājā dhārtarāṣṭraḥ kṛtārtho vai bhaviṣyatid asmin muhūrte droṇas tu pāṇḍavaṃ gṛhya harṣitaḥe āgamiṣyati no nūnaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrasya saṃyugea evaṃ saṃjalpatāṃ teṣāṃ tāvakānāṃ mahārathaḥc āyāj javena kaunteyo rathaghoṣeṇa nādayand mā bhaiṣīr iti saṃvārya śarair droṇam avārayata śoṇitodāṃ rathāvartāṃ kṛtvā viśasane nadīmc śūrāsthicayasaṃkīrṇāṃ pretakūlāpahāriṇīma tāṃ śaraughamahāphenāṃ prāsamatsyasamākulāmc nadīm uttīrya vegena kurūn vidrāvya pāṇḍavaḥa tataḥ kirīṭī sahasā droṇānīkam upādravatc chādayann iṣujālena mahatā mohayann ivaa śīghram abhyasyato bāṇān saṃdadhānasya cāniśamc nāntaraṃ dadṛśe kaś cit kaunteyasya yaśasvinaḥa na diśo nāntarikṣaṃ ca na dyaur naiva ca medinīc adṛśyata mahārāja bāṇabhūtam ivābhavata nādṛśyata tadā rājaṃs tatra kiṃ cana saṃyugec bāṇāndhakāre mahati kṛte gāṇḍīvadhanvanāa sūrye cāstam anuprāpte rajasā cābhisaṃvṛtec nājñāyata tadā śatrur na suhṛn na ca kiṃ canaa tato vahāraṃ cakrus te droṇaduryodhanādayaḥc tān viditvā bhṛśaṃ trastān ayuddhamanasaḥ parāna svāny anīkāni bībhatsuḥ śanakair avahārayatc tato bhituṣṭuvuḥ pārthaṃ prahṛṣṭāḥ pāṇḍusṛñjayāḥe pāñcālāś ca manojñābhir vāgbhiḥ sūryam ivarṣayaḥa evaṃ svaśibiraṃ prāyāj jitvā śatrūn dhanaṃjayaḥc pṛṣṭhataḥ sarvasainyānāṃ mudito vai sakeśavaḥa masāragalvarkasuvarṇarūpyairvajrapravālasphaṭikaiś ca mukhyaiḥc citre rathe pāṇḍusuto babhāsenakṣatracitre viyatīva candraḥ saṃjaya uvācaa te sene śibiraṃ gatvā nyaviśetāṃ viśāṃ patec yathābhāgaṃ yathānyāyaṃ yathāgulmaṃ ca sarvaśaḥa kṛtvāvahāraṃ sainyānāṃ droṇaḥ paramadurmanāḥc duryodhanam abhiprekṣya savrīḍam idam abravīta uktam etan mayā pūrvaṃ na tiṣṭhati dhanaṃjayec śakyo grahītuṃ saṃgrāme devair api yudhiṣṭhiraḥa iti tad vaḥ prayatatāṃ kṛtaṃ pārthena saṃyugec mātiśaṅkīr vaco mahyam ajeyau kṛṣṇapāṇḍavaua apanīte tu yogena kena cic chvetavāhanec tata eṣyati te rājan vaśam adya yudhiṣṭhiraḥa kaś cid āhvayatāṃ saṃkhye deśam anyaṃ prakarṣatuc tam ajitvā tu kaunteyo na nivartet kathaṃ canaa etasminn antare śūnye dharmarājam ahaṃ nṛpac grahīṣyāmi camūṃ bhittvā dhṛṣṭadyumnasya paśyataḥa arjunena vihīnas tu yadi notsṛjate raṇamc mām upāyāntam ālokya gṛhītam iti viddhi tama evaṃ te sahasā rājan dharmaputraṃ yudhiṣṭhiramb kṣobhayitvā balaṃ teṣāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahātmanāmc samāneṣyāmi sagaṇaṃ vaśam adya na saṃśayaḥa yadi tiṣṭhati saṃgrāme muhūrtam api pāṇḍavaḥc athāpayāti saṃgrāmād vijayāt tad viśiṣyatea droṇasya tu vacaḥ śrutvā trigartādhipatis tataḥc bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito rājann idaṃ vacanam abravīta vayaṃ vinikṛtā rājan sadā gāṇḍīvadhanvanāc anāgaḥsv api cāgaskṛd asmāsu bharatarṣabhaa te vayaṃ smaramāṇās tān vinikārān pṛthagvidhānc krodhāgninā dahyamānā na śemahi sadā niśāḥa sa no divyāstrasaṃpannaś cakṣurviṣayam āgataḥc kartāraḥ sma vayaṃ sarvaṃ yac cikīrṣāma hṛdgatama bhavataś ca priyaṃ yat syād asmākaṃ ca yaśaskaramc vayam enaṃ haniṣyāmo nikṛṣyāyodhanād bahiḥa adyāstv anarjunā bhūmir atrigartātha vā punaḥc satyaṃ te pratijānīmo naitan mithyā bhaviṣyatia evaṃ satyarathaś coktvā satyadharmā ca bhāratac satyavarmā ca satyeṣuḥ satyakarmā tathaiva caa sahitā bhrātaraḥ pañca rathānām ayutena cac nyavartanta mahārāja kṛtvā śapatham āhavea mālavās tuṇḍikerāś ca rathānām ayutais tribhiḥc suśarmā ca naravyāghras trigartaḥ prasthalādhipaḥa mācellakair lalitthaiś ca sahito madrakair apic rathānām ayutenaiva so śapad bhrātṛbhiḥ sahad maladāś ca karūśāś ca daradāś ca mahārathāḥd taṅkaṇāś ca parādāś ca yugapatte samāgatāḥa nānājanapadebhyaś ca rathānām ayutaṃ punaḥc samutthitaṃ viśiṣṭānāṃ saṃśapārtham upāgatama tato jvalanam ādāya hutvā sarve pṛthak pṛthakc jagṛhuḥ kuśacīrāṇi citrāṇi kavacāni caa te ca baddhatanutrāṇā ghṛtāktāḥ kuśacīriṇaḥc maurvīmekhalino vīrāḥ sahasraśatadakṣiṇāḥa yajvānaḥ putriṇo lokyāḥ kṛtakṛtyās tanutyajaḥc yokṣyamāṇās tadātmānaṃ yaśasā vijayena caa brahmacaryaśrutimukhaiḥ kratubhiś cāptadakṣiṇaiḥc prāpya lokān suyuddhena kṣipram eva yiyāsavaḥa brāhmaṇāṃs tarpayitvā ca niṣkān dattvā pṛthak pṛthakc gāś ca vāsāṃsi ca punaḥ samābhāṣya parasparamd dvijamukhyaiḥ samuditaiḥ kṛtasvasty ayanāśiṣaḥd muditāś ca prahṛṣṭāś ca jalaṃ saṃspṛśya nirmalama prajvālya kṛṣṇavartmānam upāgamya raṇe vratamc tasminn agnau tadā cakruḥ pratijñāṃ dṛḍhaniścayāḥa śṛṇvatāṃ sarvabhūtānām uccair vācaḥ sma menirec dhṛtvā dhanaṃjayavadhe pratijñāṃ cāpi cakrirea ye vai lokāś cānṛtānāṃ ye caiva brahmaghātināmc pānapasya ca ye lokā gurudāraratasya caa brahmasvahāriṇaś caiva rājapiṇḍāpahāriṇaḥc śaraṇāgataṃ ca tyajato yācamānaṃ tathā ghnataḥa agāradāhināṃ ye ca ye ca gāṃ nighnatām apic apacāriṇāṃ ca ye lokā ye ca brahmadviṣām apia jāyāṃ ca ṛtukāle vai ye mohād abhigacchatāmc śrāddhasaṃgatikānāṃ ca ye cāpy ātmāpahāriṇāma nyāsāpahāriṇāṃ ye ca śrutaṃ nāśayatāṃ ca yec kopena yudhyamānānāṃ ye ca nīcānusāriṇāma nāstikānāṃ ca ye lokā ye gnihorāpitṛtyajāmb satyam ākramatāṃ ye ca pratyādityaṃ pramehatāmc tān āpnuyāmahe lokān ye ca pāpakṛtām apia yady ahatvā vayaṃ yuddhe nivartema dhanaṃjayamc tena cābhyarditās trāsād bhavema hi parāṅmukhāḥa yadi tv asukaraṃ loke karma kuryāma saṃyugec iṣṭān puṇyakṛtāṃ lokān prāpnuyāma na saṃśayaḥa evam uktvā tato rājaṃs te bhyavartanta saṃyugec āhvayanto rjunaṃ vīrāḥ pitṛjuṣṭāṃ diśaṃ pratia āhūtas tair naravyāghraiḥ pārthaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥc dharmarājam idaṃ vākyam apadāntaram abravīta āhūto na nivarteyam iti me vratam āhitamc saṃśaptakāś ca māṃ rājann āhvayanti punaḥ punaḥa eṣa ca bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ suśarmāhvayate raṇec vadhāya sagaṇasyāsya mām anujñātum arhasia naitac chaknomi saṃsoḍhum āhvānaṃ puruṣarṣabhac satyaṃ te pratijānāmi hatān viddhi parān yudhid na hy arjuno raṇe rājan mithyā kiṃ cit pravakṣyatid hatāṃs traigartakān paśya mā sma te kaśmalaṃ bhavet yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa śrutam etat tvayā tāta yad droṇasya cikīrṣitamc yathā tad anṛtaṃ tasya bhavet tadvat samācaraa droṇo hi balavāñ śūraḥ kṛtāstraś ca jitaśramaḥc pratijñātaṃ ca tenaitad grahaṇaṃ me mahāratha arjuna uvāca sarvathā na nivarteyam āhūto haṃ paraṃtapa trigarto bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ sa mām āhvayate bhṛśam tavāpi tu raṇe rakṣā vihitā me janādhipa nirapekṣo gamiṣyāmi vadhāyaiṣāṃ durātmanāma ayaṃ vai satyajid rājann adya te rakṣitā yudhic dhriyamāṇe hi pāñcālye nācāryaḥ kāmam āpsyatia hate tu puruṣavyāghre raṇe satyajiti prabhoc sarvair api sametair vā na sthātavyaṃ kathaṃ cana saṃjaya uvācaa anujñātas tato rājñā pariṣvaktaś ca phalgunaḥc premṇā dṛṣṭaś ca bahudhā āśiṣā ca prayojitaḥa vihāyainaṃ tataḥ pārthas trigartān pratyayād balīc kṣudhitaḥ kṣudvighātārthaṃ siṃho mṛgagaṇān ivaa tato dauryodhanaṃ sainyaṃ mudā paramayā yutamc gate rjune bhṛśaṃ kruddhaṃ dharmarājasya nigrahed grahaṇe dharmarājasya kṛtotsāhaṃ mahāmṛdhea tato nyonyena te sene samājagmatur ojasāb vegena śaṅkhān āpūrya harṣayukte mahāsvanec gaṅgāsarayvor vegena prāvṛṣīvolbaṇodake saṃjaya uvācaa tataḥ saṃśaptakā rājan same deśe vyavasthitāḥc vyūhyānīkaṃ rathair eva candrārdhākhyaṃ mudānvitāḥa te kirīṭinam āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā harṣeṇa māriṣab atīva saṃprahṛṣṭās te hy upalakṣya dhanaṃjayamc udakrośan naravyāghrāḥ śabdena mahatā tadāa sa śabdaḥ pradiśaḥ sarvā diśaḥ khaṃ ca samāvṛṇotc āvṛtatvāc ca lokasya nāsīt tatra pratisvanaḥa atīva saṃprahṛṣṭāṃs tān upalabhya dhanaṃjayaḥc kiṃ cid abhyutsmayan kṛṣṇam idaṃ vacanam abravīta paśyaitān devakīmātar mumūrṣūn adya saṃyugec bhrātṝṃs traigartakān evaṃ roditavye praharṣitāna atha vā harṣakālo yaṃ traigartānām asaṃśayamc kunarair duravāpān hi lokān prāpsyanty anuttamānd mayā hatā hi saṃgrāme lokān prāpsyanti puṣkalāna evam uktvā mahābāhur hṛṣīkeśaṃ tato rjunaḥc āsasāda raṇe vyūḍhāṃ traigartānām anīkinīma sa devadattam ādāya śaṅkhaṃ hemapariṣkṛtamc dadhmau vegena mahatā phalgunaḥ pūrayan diśaḥa tena śabdena vitrastā saṃśaptakavarūthinīc niśceṣṭāvasthitā saṃkye aśmasāramayī yathād sā senā bharataśreṣṭha niśceṣṭā śuśubhe tadād citrapaṭṭe yathā nyastā kuśalaiḥ śilpibhir naraiḥd svanena tena sainyānāṃ divam āvṛṇvatā tadād sasvanā pṛthivī sarvā tathaiva ca mahodadhiḥd vyūḍhānīkais tu taiḥ sarvaiḥ pṛthivyāṃ samarārṇaved svanena sarvasainyānāṃ karṇās tu badhirīkṛtāḥa vāhās teṣāṃ vivṛttākṣāḥ stabdhakarṇaśirodharāḥc viṣṭabdhacaraṇā mūtraṃ rudhiraṃ ca prasusruvuḥd tato vyupāramac chabdaḥ prahṛṣṭās te tato bhavana upalabhya ca te saṃjñām avasthāpya ca vāhinīmc yugapat pāṇḍuputrāya cikṣipuḥ kaṅkapatriṇaḥa tāny arjunaḥ sahasrāṇi daśa pañcaiva cāśugaiḥc anāgatāny eva śaraiś cicchedāśuparākramaḥa tato rjunaṃ śitair bāṇair daśabhir daśabhiḥ punaḥc pratyavidhyaṃs tataḥ pārthas tān avidhyat tribhis tribhiḥa ekaikas tu tataḥ pārthaṃ rājan vivyādha pañcabhiḥc sa ca tān prativivyādha dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ parākramīa bhūya eva tu saṃrabdhās te rjunaṃ sahakeśavamc āpūrayañ śarais tīkṣṇais taṭākam iva vṛṣṭibhiḥa tataḥ śarasahasrāṇi prāpatann arjunaṃ pratic bhramarāṇām iva vrātāḥ phulladrumagaṇe vanea tataḥ subāhus triṃśadbhir adrisāramayair dṛḍhaiḥc avidhyad iṣubhir gāḍhaṃ kirīṭe savyasācinama taiḥ kirīṭī kirīṭasthair hemapuṅkhair ajihmagaiḥc śātakumbhamayāpīḍo babhau yūpa ivocchritaḥa hastāvāpaṃ subāhos tu bhallena yudhi pāṇḍavaḥc ciccheda taṃ caiva punaḥ śaravarṣair avākirata tataḥ suśarmā daśabhiḥ surathaś ca kirīṭinamc sudharmā sudhanuś caiva subāhuś ca samarpayana tāṃs tu sarvān pṛthag bāṇair vānarapravaradhvajaḥc pratyavidhyad dhvajāṃś caiṣāṃ bhallaiś ciccheda kāñcanāna sudhanvano dhanuś chittvā hayān vai nyavadhīc charaiḥc athāsya saśirastrāṇaṃ śiraḥ kāyād apāharatd jahāra pārthaḥ sainyeṣu sahasre dve ca yodhināma tasmiṃs tu patite vīre trastās tasya padānugāḥb bhūyiṣṭhaṃ pratiruddhās te hatair yodhair yaśasvinaḥc vyadravanta bhayād bhītā yena dauryodhanaṃ balama tato jaghāna saṃkruddho vāsavis tāṃ mahācamūmc śarajālair avicchinnais tamaḥ sūrya ivāṃśubhiḥa tato bhagne bale tasmin viprayāte samantataḥc savyasācini saṃkruddhe traigartān bhayam āviśata te vadhyamānāḥ pārthena śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥc amuhyaṃs tatra tatraiva trastā mṛgagaṇā ivaa tatas trigartarāṭ kruddhas tān uvāca mahārathānc alaṃ drutena vaḥ śūrā na bhayaṃ kartum arhathaa śaptvā tu śapathān ghorān sarvasainyasya paśyataḥc gatvā dauryodhanaṃ sainyaṃ kiṃ vai vakṣyatha mukhyagāḥa nāvahāsyāḥ kathaṃ loke karmaṇānena saṃyugec bhavema sahitāḥ sarve nivartadhvaṃ yathābalama evam uktās tu te rājann udakrośan muhur muhuḥc śaṅkhāṃś ca dadhmire vīrā harṣayantaḥ parasparama tatas te saṃnyavartanta saṃśaptakagaṇāḥ punaḥc nārāyaṇāś ca gopālāḥ kṛtvā mṛtyuṃ nivartanam saṃjaya uvācaa dṛṣṭvā tu saṃnivṛttāṃs tān saṃśaptakagaṇān punaḥc vāsudevaṃ mahātmānam arjunaḥ samabhāṣataa codayāśvān hṛṣīkeśa saṃśaptakagaṇān pratic naite hāsyanti saṃgrāmaṃ jīvanta iti me matiḥa paśya me strabalaṃ ghoraṃ bāhvor iṣvasanasya cac adyaitān pātayiṣyāmi kruddho rudraḥ paśūn ivaa tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ smitaṃ kṛtvā pariṇandya śivena tamb evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ bībhatsuṃ keśavaḥ śatruvāhinīmc prāveśayata durdharṣo yatra yatraicchad arjunaḥa babhrāje sa ratho tyartham uhyamāno raṇe tadāc uhyamānam ivākāśe vimānaṃ pāṇḍurair hayaiḥa maṇḍalāni tataś cakre gatapratyāgatāni cac yathā śakraratho rājan yuddhe devāsure purāa atha nārāyaṇāḥ kruddhā vividhāyudhapāṇayaḥc chādayantaḥ śaravrātaiḥ parivavrur dhanaṃjayama adṛśyaṃ ca muhūrtena cakrus te bharatarṣabhac kṛṣṇena sahitaṃ yuddhe kuntīputraṃ dhanaṃjayama kruddhas tu phalgunaḥ saṃkhye dviguṇīkṛtavikramaḥc gāṇḍīvam upasaṃmṛjya tūrṇaṃ jagrāha saṃyugea baddhvā ca bhṛkuṭīṃ vaktre krodhasya pratilakṣaṇamc devadattaṃ mahāśaṅkhaṃ pūrayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥa athāstram arisaṃghaghnaṃ tvāṣṭram abhyasyad arjunaḥc tato rūpasahasrāṇi prādurāsan pṛthak pṛthaka ātmanaḥ pratirūpais tair nānārūpair vimohitāḥc anyonyam arjunaṃ matvā svam ātmānaṃ ca jaghnirea ayam arjuno yaṃ govinda imau yādavapāṇḍavauc iti bruvāṇāḥ saṃmūḍhā jaghnur anyonyam āhaved anyonyaṃ samare jaghnus tāvakā bharatarṣabhaa mohitāḥ paramāstreṇa kṣayaṃ jagmuḥ parasparamb rudhirokṣitagātrās te prekṣamāṇāḥ parasparamc aśobhanta raṇe yodhāḥ puṣpitā iva kiṃśukāḥd rudhirotpīḍanās te tu rudhireṇa samukṣitāḥd candanasya raseneva vyabhrājanta raṇājired tataḥ prahasya bībhatsur vyākṣipad gāṇḍivaṃ bhṛśamd nyahanat tāñ śarais tīkṣṇais tamaḥ sūrya ivāṃśubhiḥd hatāvaśiṣṭās te bhūyaḥ parivārya dhanaṃjayamd sāśvadhvajarathaṃ cakrur adṛśyaṃ śaravṛṣṭibhiḥa tataḥ śarasahasrāṇi tair vimuktāni bhasmasātc kṛtvā tad astraṃ tān vīrān anayad yamasādanama atha prahasya bībhatsur lalitthān mālavān apic mācellakāṃs trigartāṃś ca yaudheyāṃś cārdayac charaiḥa te vadhyamānā vīreṇa kṣatriyāḥ kālacoditāḥc vyasṛjañ śaravarṣāṇi pārthe nānāvidhāni caa tato naivārjunas tatra na ratho na ca keśavaḥc pratyadṛśyata ghoreṇa śaravarṣeṇa saṃvṛtaḥa tatas te labdhalakṣyatvād anyonyam abhicukruśuḥc hatau kṛṣṇāv iti prītā vāsāṃsy ādudhuvus tadāa bherīmṛdaṅgaśaṅkhāṃś ca dadhmur vīrāḥ sahasraśaḥc siṃhanādaravāṃś cogrāṃś cakrire tatra māriṣaa tataḥ prasiṣvide kṛṣṇaḥ khinnaś cārjunam abravītc kvāsi pārtha na paśye tvāṃ kaccij jīvasi śatruhana tasya taṃ mānuṣaṃ bhāvaṃ bhāvajño jñāya pāṇḍavaḥc vāyavyāstreṇa tair astāṃ śaravṛṣṭim apāharata tataḥ saṃśaptakavrātān sāśvadviparathāyudhānc uvāha bhagavān vāyuḥ śuṣkaparṇacayān ivaa uhyamānās tu te rājan bahv aśobhanta vāyunāc praḍīnāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ kāle vṛkṣebhya iva māriṣaa tāṃs tathā vyākulīkṛtya tvaramāṇo dhanaṃjayaḥc jaghāna niśitair bāṇaiḥ sahasrāṇi śatāni caa śirāṃsi bhallair aharad bāhūn api ca sāyudhānc hastihastopamāṃś corūñ śarair urvyām apātayata pṛṣṭhacchinnān vicaraṇān vimastiṣkekṣaṇāṅgulīnc nānāṅgāvayavair hīnāṃś cakārārīn dhanaṃjayaḥa gandharvanagarākārān vidhivat kalpitān rathānc śarair viśakalīkurvaṃś cakre vyaśvarathadvipāna muṇḍatālavanānīva tatra tatra cakāśirec chinnadhvajarathavrātāḥ ke cit ke cit kva cit kva cita sottarāyudhino nāgāḥ sapatākāṅkuśāyudhāḥc petuḥ śakrāśanihatā drumavanta ivācalāḥa cāmarāpīḍakavacāḥ srastāntranayanāsavaḥc sārohās turagāḥ petuḥ pārthabāṇahatāḥ kṣitaua vipraviddhāsinakharāś chinnavarmarṣṭiśaktayaḥc pattayaś chinnavarmāṇaḥ kṛpaṇaṃ śerate hatāḥa tair hatair hanyamānaiś ca patadbhiḥ patitair apic bhramadbhir niṣṭanadbhiś ca ghoram āyodhanaṃ babhaua rajaś ca mahad udbhūtaṃ śāntaṃ rudhiravṛṣṭibhiḥc mahī cāpy abhavad durgā kabandhaśatasaṃkulāa tad babhau raudrabībhatsaṃ bībhatsor yānam āhavec ākrīḍa iva rudrasya ghnataḥ kālātyaye paśūna te vadhyamānāḥ pārthena vyākulāśvarathadvipāḥc tam evābhimukhāḥ kṣīṇāḥ śakrasyātithitāṃ gatāḥa sā bhūmir bharataśreṣṭha nihatais tair mahārathaiḥc āstīrṇā saṃbabhau sarvā pretībhūtaiḥ samantataḥa etasminn antare caiva pramatte savyasācinic vyūḍhānīkas tato droṇo yudhiṣṭhiram upādravata taṃ pratyagṛhṇaṃs tvaritā vyūḍhānīkāḥ prahāriṇaḥc yudhiṣṭhiraṃ parīpsantas tadāsīt tumulaṃ mahat saṃjaya uvācaa pariṇāmya niśāṃ tāṃ tu bhāradvājo mahārathaḥc bahūktvā ca tato rājan rājānaṃ ca suyodhanama vidhāya yogaṃ pārthena saṃśaptakagaṇaiḥ sahac niṣkrānte ca raṇāt pārthe saṃśaptakavadhaṃ pratia vyūḍhānīkas tato droṇaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahācamūmc abhyayād bharataśreṣṭha dharmarājajighṛkṣayāa vyūhaṃ dṛṣṭvā suparṇaṃ tu bhāradvājakṛtaṃ tadāc vyūhena maṇḍalārdhena pratyavyūhad yudhiṣṭhiraḥa mukham āsīt suparṇasya bhāradvājo mahārathaḥc śiro duryodhano rājā sodaryaiḥ sānugaiḥ sahaa cakṣuṣī kṛtavarmā ca gautamaś cāsyatāṃ varaḥc bhūtavarmā kṣemaśarmā karakarṣaś ca vīryavāna kaliṅgāḥ siṃhalāḥ prācyāḥ śūrābhīrā daśerakāḥc śakā yavanakāmbojās tathā haṃsapadāś ca yea grīvāyāṃ śūrasenāś ca daradā madrakekayāḥc gajāśvarathapattyaughās tasthuḥ śatasahasraśaḥa bhūriśravāḥ śalaḥ śalyaḥ somadattaś ca bāhlikaḥc akṣauhiṇyā vṛtā vīrā dakṣiṇaṃ pakṣam āśritāḥa vindānuvindāv āvantyau kāmbojaś ca sudakṣiṇaḥc vāmaṃ pakṣaṃ samāśritya droṇaputrāgragāḥ sthitāḥa pṛṣṭhe kaliṅgāḥ sāmbaṣṭhā māgadhāḥ paundramadrakāḥc gāndhārāḥ śakuniprāgyāḥ pārvatīyā vasātayaḥa pucche vaikartanaḥ karṇaḥ saputrajñātibāndhavaḥc mahatyā senayā tasthau nānādhvajasamutthayāa jayadratho bhīmarathaḥ sāṃyātrikasabho jayaḥc bhūmiṃjayo vṛṣakrātho naiṣadhaś ca mahābalaḥa vṛtā balena mahatā brahmalokapuraskṛtāḥc vyūhasyopari te rājan sthitā yuddhaviśāradāḥa droṇena vihito vyūhaḥ padātyaśvarathadvipaiḥc vātoddhūtārṇavākāraḥ pravṛtta iva lakṣyatea tasya pakṣaprapakṣebhyo niṣpatanti yuyutsavaḥc savidyutstanitā meghāḥ sarvadigbhya ivoṣṇagea tasya prāgjyotiṣo madhye vidhivat kalpitaṃ gajamc āsthitaḥ śuśubhe rājann aṃśumān udaye yathāa mālyadāmavatā rājā śvetacchatreṇa dhāryatāc kṛttikāyogayuktena paurṇamāsyām ivendunāa nīlāñjanacayaprakhyo madāndho dvirado babhauc abhivṛṣṭo mahāmeghair yathā syāt parvato mahāna nānānṛpatibhir vīrair vividhāyudhabhūṣaṇaiḥc samanvitaḥ pārvatīyaiḥ śakro devagaṇair ivaa tato yudhiṣṭhiraḥ prekṣya vyūhaṃ tam atimānuṣamc ajayyam aribhiḥ saṃkhye pārṣataṃ vākyam abravīta brāhmaṇasya vaśaṃ nāham iyām adya yathā prabhoc pārāvatasavarṇāśva tathā nītir vidhīyatām dhṛṣṭadyumna uvācaa droṇasya yatamānasya vaśaṃ naiṣyasi suvratac aham āvārayiṣyāmi droṇam adya sahānugama mayi jīvati kauravya nodvegaṃ kartum arhasic na hi śakto raṇe droṇo vijetuṃ māṃ kathaṃ cana saṃjaya uvācaa evam uktvā kiran bāṇān drupadasya suto balīc pārāvatasavarṇāśvaḥ svayaṃ droṇam upādravata aniṣṭadarśanaṃ dṛṣṭvā dhṛṣṭadyumnam avasthitamc kṣaṇenaivābhavad droṇo nātihṛṣṭamanā ivad sa hi jāto mahāraudro droṇasya nidhanaṃ pratid martyadharmatayā tasmād bhāradvājo vyamuhyatad nāśakat taṃ tataḥ kaś cid anīke prativīkṣitumd tataḥ kirann iṣūṃs tīkṣṇān drupadasya varūthinīmd bhāradvājo yayau tūrṇaṃ pārṣataṃ varjayan yudhid drupadasya mahat sainyaṃ vārayām āsa brāhmaṇaḥa taṃ tu saṃprekṣya putras te durmukhaḥ śatrukarśanaḥc priyaṃ cikīrṣan droṇasya dhṛṣṭadyumnam avārayata sa saṃprahāras tumulaḥ samarūpa ivābhavatc pārṣatasya ca śūrasya durmukhasya ca bhārataa pārṣataḥ śarajālena kṣipraṃ pracchādya durmukhamc bhāradvājaṃ śaraugheṇa mahatā samavārayata droṇam āvāritaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhṛśāyastas tavātmajaḥc nānāliṅgaiḥ śaravrātaiḥ pārṣataṃ samamohayata tayor viṣaktayoḥ saṃkhye pāñcālyakurumukhyayoḥb abhavat tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ parasparavadhaiṣiṇoḥc droṇo yaudhiṣṭhiraṃ sainyaṃ bahudhā vyadhamac charaiḥa anilena yathābhrāṇi vicchinnāni samantataḥc tathā pārthasya sainyāni vicchinnāni kva cit kva cita muhūrtam iva tad yuddham āsīn madhuradarśanamc tata unmattavad rājan nirmaryādam avartatad naiva khaṃ na diśo bhūmir babhāse na ca bhāskaraḥa naiva sve na pare rājann ajñāyanta parasparamc anumānena saṃjñābhir yuddhaṃ tat samavartataa cūḍāmaṇiṣu niṣkeṣu bhūṣaṇeṣv asicarmasuc teṣām ādityavarṇābhā marīcyaḥ pracakāśirea tat prakīrṇapatākānāṃ rathavāraṇavājināmc balākāśabalābhrābhaṃ dadṛśe rūpam āhavea narān eva narā jaghnur udagrāś ca hayā hayānc rathāṃś ca rathino jaghnur vāraṇā varavāraṇāna samucchritapatākānāṃ gajānāṃ paramadvipaiḥc kṣaṇena tumulo ghoraḥ saṃgrāmaḥ samavartataa teṣāṃ saṃsaktagātrāṇāṃ karṣatām itaretaramc dantasaṃghātasaṃgharṣāt sadhūmo gnir ajāyataa viprakīrṇapatākās te viṣāṇajanitāgnayaḥc babhūvuḥ khaṃ samāsādya savidyuta ivāmbudāḥa vikṣaradbhir nadadbhiś ca nipatadbhiś ca vāraṇaiḥc saṃbabhūva mahī kīrṇā meghair dyaur iva śāradīa teṣām āhanyamānānāṃ bāṇatomaravṛṣṭibhiḥc vāraṇānāṃ ravo jajñe meghānām iva saṃplavea tomarābhihatāḥ ke cid bāṇaiś ca paramadvipāḥc vitresuḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ śabdam evāpare vrajana viṣāṇābhihatāś cāpi ke cit tatra gajā gajaiḥc cakrur ārtasvaraṃ ghoram utpātajaladā ivaa pratīpaṃ hriyamāṇāś ca vāraṇā varavāraṇaiḥc unmathya punar ājahruḥ preritāḥ paramāṅkuśaiḥa mahāmātrā mahāmātrais tāḍitāḥ śaratomaraiḥc gajebhyaḥ pṛthivīṃ jagmur muktapraharaṇāṅkuśāḥa nirmanuṣyāś ca mātaṅgā vinadantas tatas tataḥc chinnābhrāṇīva saṃpetuḥ saṃpraviśya parasparama hatān parivahantaś ca yantritāḥ paramāyudhaiḥc diśo jagmur mahānāgāḥ ke cid ekacarā ivaa tāḍitās tāḍyamānāś ca tomararṣṭiparaśvadhaiḥc petur ārtasvaraṃ kṛtvā tadā viśasane gajāḥa teṣāṃ śailopamaiḥ kāyair nipatadbhiḥ samantataḥc āhatā sahasā bhūmiś cakampe ca nanāda caa sāditaiḥ sagajārohaiḥ sapatākaiḥ samantataḥc mātaṅgaiḥ śuśubhe bhūmir vikīrṇair iva parvataiḥa gajasthāś ca mahāmātrā nirbhinnahṛdayā raṇeb gajair gātravaraiḥ kṣuṇṇā viṣāṇaś ca nipātitāḥc rathibhiḥ pātitā bhallair vikīrṇāṅkuśatomarāḥa krauñcavad vinadanto nye nārācābhihatā gajāḥc parān svāṃś cāpi mṛdnantaḥ paripetur diśo daśaa gajāśvarathasaṃghānāṃ śarīraughasamāvṛtāc babhūva pṛthivī rājan māṃsaśoṇitakardamāa pramathya ca viṣāṇāgraiḥ samutkṣipya ca vāraṇaiḥc sacakrāś ca vicakrāś ca rathair eva mahārathāḥa rathāś ca rathibhir hīnā nirmanuṣyāś ca vājinaḥc hatārohāś ca mātaṅgā diśo jagmuḥ śarāturāḥa jaghānātra pitā putraṃ putraś ca pitaraṃ tathāc ity āsīt tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ na prajñāyata kiṃ canaa ā gulphebhyo vasīdanta narāḥ śoṇitakardamec dīpyamānaiḥ parikṣiptā dāvair iva mahādrumāḥa śoṇitaiḥ sicyamānāni vastrāṇi kavacāni cac chatrāṇi ca patākāś ca sarvaṃ raktam adṛśyataa hayaughāś ca rathaughāś ca naraughāś ca nipātitāḥc saṃvṛttāḥ punar āvṛttā bahudhā rathanemibhiḥa sa gajaughamahāvegaḥ parāsunaraśaivalaḥc rathaughatumulāvartaḥ prababhau sainyasāgaraḥa taṃ vāhanamahānaubhir yodhā jayadhanaiṣiṇaḥc avagāhyāvamajjanto naiva mohaṃ pracakrirea śaravarṣābhivṛṣṭeṣu yodheṣv ajitalakṣmasuc na hi svacittatāṃ lebhe kaś cid āhatalakṣaṇaḥa vartamāne tathā yuddhe ghorarūpe bhayaṃkarec mohayitvā parān droṇo yudhiṣṭhiram upādravat saṃjaya uvācaa tato yudhiṣṭhiro droṇaṃ dṛṣṭvāntikam upāgatamc mahatā śaravarṣeṇa pratyagṛhṇād abhītavata tato halahalāśabda āsīd yaudhiṣṭhire balec jighṛkṣati mahāsiṃhe gajānām iva yūthapama dṛṣṭvā droṇaṃ tataḥ śūraḥ satyajit satyavikramaḥc yudhiṣṭhiraṃ pariprepsum ācāryaṃ samupādravata tata ācāryapāñcālyau yuyudhāte parasparamc vikṣobhayantau tat sainyam indravairocanāv ivad tato droṇaṃ maheṣvāsaṃ satyajit satyavikramaḥd avidhyan niśitāgraiś ca paramāstraṃ vidarśayand tato sya sāratheḥ pañca śarān sarpaviṣopamānd amuñcad antakaprakhyān saṃmumohāsya sārathiḥd athāsya sahasāvidhyad dhayān daśabhir āśugaiḥd daśabhir daśabhiḥ kruddha ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathīd maṇḍalaṃ tu samāvṛtya vyacarat pṛtanāmukhed dhvajaṃ ciccheda ca kruddho droṇasyāmitrakarśanaḥd droṇas tu tat samālakṣya caritaṃ tasya saṃyuged manasā cintayām āsa prāptakālam ariṃdamaḥa tataḥ satyajitaṃ tīkṣṇair daśabhir marmabhedibhiḥc avidhyac chīghram ācāryaś chittvāsya saśaraṃ dhanuḥd ācāryas tasya vai cāpaṃ ciccheda tribhir āśugaiḥa sa śīghrataram ādāya dhanur anyat pratāpavānc droṇaṃ so bhijaghānāśu viṃśadbhiḥ kaṅkapatribhiḥa jñātvā satyajitā droṇaṃ grasyamānam ivāhavec vṛkaḥ śaraśatais tīkṣṇaiḥ pāñcālyo droṇam ardayata saṃchādyamānaṃ samare droṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahārathamc cukruśuḥ pāṇḍavā rājan vastrāṇi dudhuvuś ca haa vṛkas tu paramakruddho droṇaṃ ṣaṣṭyā stanāntarec vivyādha balavān rājaṃs tad adbhutam ivābhavata droṇas tu śaravarṣeṇa chādyamāno mahārathaḥc vegaṃ cakre mahāvegaḥ krodhād udvṛtya cakṣuṣīa tataḥ satyajitaś cāpaṃ chittvā droṇo vṛkasya cac ṣaḍbhiḥ sasūtaṃ sahayaṃ śarair droṇo vadhīd vṛkama athānyad dhanur ādāya satyajid vegavattaramc sāśvaṃ sasūtaṃ viśikhair droṇaṃ vivyādha sadhvajama sa tan na mamṛṣe droṇaḥ pāñcālyenārdanaṃ mṛdhec tatas tasya vināśāya satvaraṃ vyasṛjac charāna hayān dhvajaṃ dhanur muṣṭim ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathīc avākirat tato droṇaḥ śaravarṣaiḥ sahasraśaḥa tathā saṃchidyamāneṣu kārmukeṣu punaḥ punaḥc pāñcālyaḥ paramāstrajñaḥ śoṇāśvaṃ samayodhayatd avākirac charais tūrṇaṃ bhāradvājaṃ samantataḥd hayeṣu ca viṣakteṣu vimukho bhavad āhavea sa satyajitam ālakṣya tathodīrṇaṃ mahāhaveb vegena mahatāmṛdnād vāto drumam ivocchritamb tataḥ pāñcālaputrasya yuddhe satyajitas tathāc ardhacandreṇa ciccheda śiras tasya mahātmanaḥa tasmin hate mahāmātre pāñcālānāṃ ratharṣabhec apāyāj javanair aśvair droṇāt trasto yudhiṣṭhiraḥa pāñcālāḥ kekayā matsyāś cedikārūṣakosalāḥc yudhiṣṭhiram udīkṣanto hṛṣṭā droṇam upādravana tato yudhiṣṭhiraprepsur ācāryaḥ śatrupūgahāc vyadhamat tāny anīkāni tūlarāśim ivānilaḥa nirdahantam anīkāni tāni tāni punaḥ punaḥc droṇaṃ matsyād avarajaḥ śatānīko bhyavartataa sūryaraśmipratīkāśaiḥ karmāraparimārjitaiḥc ṣaḍbhiḥ sasūtaṃ sahayaṃ droṇaṃ viddhvānadad bhṛśamd krūrāya karmaṇe yuktaṃ cikīrṣuḥ karma duṣkaramd avākirac charaśatair bhāradvājaṃ samantataḥa tasya nānadato droṇaḥ śiraḥ kāyāt sakuṇḍalamc kṣureṇāpāharat tūrṇaṃ tato matsyāḥ pradudruvuḥa matsyāñ jitvājayac cedīn kārūṣān kekayān apic pāñcālān sṛñjayān pāṇḍūn bhāradvājaḥ punaḥ punaḥa taṃ dahantam anīkāni kruddham agniṃ yathā vanamc dṛṣṭvā rukmarathaṃ kruddhaṃ samakampanta sṛñjayāḥa uttamaṃ hy ādadhānasya dhanur asyāśukāriṇaḥc jyāghoṣo nighnato mitrān dikṣu sarvāsu śuśruvea nāgān aśvān padātīṃś ca rathino gajasādinaḥc raudrā hastavatā muktāḥ pramathnanti sma sāyakāḥa nānadyamānaḥ parjanyo miśravāto himātyayec aśmavarṣam ivāvarṣat pareṣāṃ bhayam ādadhata sarvā diśaḥ samacarat sainyaṃ vikṣobhayann ivac balī śūro maheṣvāso mitrāṇām abhayaṃkaraḥa tasya vidyud ivābhreṣu cāpaṃ hemapariṣkṛtamc dikṣu sarvāsv apaśyāma droṇasyāmitatejasaḥd śobhamānāṃ dhvaje cāsya vedīm adrākṣma bhāratad himavacchikharākārāṃ carataḥ saṃyuge bhṛśama droṇas tu pāṇḍavānīke cakāra kadanaṃ mahatc yathā daityagaṇe viṣṇuḥ surāsuranamaskṛtaḥa sa śūraḥ satyavāk prājño balavān satyavikramaḥc mahānubhāvaḥ kālānte raudrīṃ bhīruvibhīṣaṇāma kavacormidhvajāvartāṃ martyakūlāpahāriṇīmc gajavājimahāgrāhām asimīnāṃ durāsadāma vīrāsthiśarkarāṃ raudrāṃ bherīmurajakacchapāmc carmavarmaplavāṃ ghorāṃ keśaśaivalaśāḍvalāma śaraughiṇīṃ dhanuḥsrotāṃ bāhupannagasaṃkulāmc raṇabhūmivahāṃ ghorāṃ kurusṛñjayavāhinīme manuṣyaśīrṣapāṣāṇāṃ śaktimīnāṃ gadoḍupāma uṣṇīṣaphenavasanāṃ niṣkīrṇāntrasarīsṛpāmc vīrāpahāriṇīm ugrāṃ māṃsaśoṇitakardamāma hastigrāhāṃ ketuvṛkṣāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ nimajjanīmc krūrāṃ śarīrasaṃghāṭāṃ sādinakrāṃ duratyayāme droṇaḥ prāvartayat tatra nadīm antakagāminīma kravyādagaṇasaṃghuṣṭāṃ śvaśṛgālagaṇāyutāmc niṣevitāṃ mahāraudraiḥ piśitāśaiḥ samantataḥa taṃ dahantam anīkāni rathodāraṃ kṛtāntavatc sarvato bhyadravan droṇaṃ kuntīputrapurogamāḥd te droṇaṃ sahitāḥ śūrāḥ sarvataḥ paryavārayand gabhastibhir ivādityaṃ tapantaṃ bhuvane yathāa tāṃs tu śūrān maheṣvāsāṃs tāvakābhyudyatāyudhāḥc rājāno rājaputrāś ca samantāt paryavārayand śikhaṇḍī tu tato droṇaṃ pañcabhir nataparvabhiḥd kṣatravarmā ca viṃśatyā vasudānaś ca pañcabhiḥd uttamaujās tribhir bāṇaiḥ kṣatradevaś ca saptabhiḥd sātyakiś ca śatenājau yudhāmanyus tathāṣṭabhiḥd yudhiṣṭhiro dvādaśabhir droṇaṃ vivyādha sāyakaiḥd dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca daśabhiś cekitānas tribhiḥ śaraiḥa tato droṇaḥ satyasaṃdhaḥ prabhinna iva kuñjaraḥc abhyatītya rathānīkaṃ dṛḍhasenam apātayata tato rājānam āsādya praharantam abhītavatc avidhyan navabhiḥ kṣemaṃ sa hataḥ prāpatad rathāta sa madhyaṃ prāpya sainyānāṃ sarvāḥ pravicaran diśaḥc trātā hy abhavad anyeṣāṃ na trātavyaḥ kathaṃ canaa śikhaṇḍinaṃ dvādaśabhir viṃśatyā cottamaujasamc vasudānaṃ ca bhallena preṣayad yamasādanama aśītyā kṣatravarmāṇaṃ ṣaḍviṃśatyā sudakṣiṇamc kṣatradevaṃ tu bhallena rathanīḍād apāharata yudhāmanyuṃ catuḥṣaṣṭyā triṃśatā caiva sātyakimc viddhvā rukmarathas tūrṇaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram upādravata tato yudhiṣṭhiraḥ kṣipraṃ kitavo rājasattamaḥc apāyāj javanair aśvaiḥ pāñcālyo droṇam abhyayāta taṃ droṇaḥ sadhanuṣkaṃ tu sāśvayantāram akṣiṇotc sa hataḥ prāpatad bhūmau rathāj jyotir ivāmbarātd taṃ hatvā vibabhau droṇaḥ kurubhiḥ parivāritaḥa tasmin hate rājaputre pāñcālānāṃ yaśaskarec hata droṇaṃ hata droṇam ity āsīt tumulaṃ mahata tāṃs tathā bhṛśasaṃkruddhān pāñcālān matsyakekayānc sṛñjayān pāṇḍavāṃś caiva droṇo vyakṣobhayad balīa sātyakiṃ cekitānaṃ ca dhṛṣṭadyumnaśikhaṇḍinauc vārdhakṣemiṃ citrasenaṃ senābinduṃ suvarcasama etāṃś cānyāṃś ca subahūn nānājanapadeśvarānc sarvān droṇo jayad yuddhe kurubhiḥ parivāritaḥa tāvakās tu mahārāja jayaṃ labdhvā mahāhavec pāṇḍaveyān raṇe jaghnur dravamāṇān samantataḥd vārdhakṣemis tu vārṣṇeyo droṇaṃ viddhvā śarottamaiḥd navabhiś cāvanīpālaḥ punar vivyādha pañcabhiḥd citrasenas tato droṇaṃ pāñcālas tv ardayac charaiḥd punar vivyādha saṃkruddhaḥ senābinduś ca pañcabhiḥd suvarmā pañcabhiś caiva dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pañcabhiḥd śikhaṇḍī navabhir bāṇaiś cekitānaś ca pañcabhiḥd sātyakiś ca catuḥṣaṣṭyā rājan vivyādha sāyakaiḥd sucitro daśabhir bāṇair droṇaṃ viddhvānadad balīd taṃ droṇaḥ samare rājañ śaravarṣair avākiratd apātayat tato droṇaḥ sucitraṃ sahasārathimd sāśvaś ca samare rājan hato vai prāpatat kṣitaud pātyamāno mahārāja babhau jyotir ivāmbarāta te dānavā ivendreṇa vadhyamānā mahātmanāc pāñcālāḥ kekayā matsyāḥ samakampanta bhārata dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa bhāradvājena bhagneṣu pāṇḍaveṣu mahāmṛdhec pāñcāleṣu ca sarveṣu kaś cid anyo bhyavartataa āryāṃ yuddhe matiṃ kṛtvā kṣatriyāṇāṃ yaśaskarīmc asevitāṃ kāpuruṣaiḥ sevitāṃ puruṣarṣabhaiḥa sa hi vīro naraḥ sūta yo bhagneṣu nivartatec aho nāsīt pumān kaś cid dṛṣṭvā droṇaṃ vyavasthitama jṛmbhamāṇam iva vyāghraṃ prabhinnam iva kuñjaramc tyajantam āhave prāṇān saṃnaddhaṃ citrayodhinama maheṣvāsaṃ naravyāghraṃ dviṣatām aghavardhanamc kṛtajñaṃ satyanirataṃ duryodhanahitaiṣiṇama bhāradvājaṃ tathānīke dṛṣṭvā śūram avasthitamc ke vīrāḥ saṃnyavartanta tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya saṃjaya uvācaa tān dṛṣṭvā calitān saṃkhye praṇunnān droṇasāyakaiḥc pāñcālān pāṇḍavān matsyān sṛñjayāṃś cedikekayāna droṇacāpavimuktena śaraugheṇāsuhāriṇāc sindhor iva mahaughena hriyamāṇān yathā plavāna kauravāḥ siṃhanādena nānāvādyasvanena cac rathadvipanarāśvaiś ca sarvataḥ paryavārayana tān paśyan sainyamadhyastho rājā svajanasaṃvṛtaḥc duryodhano bravīt karṇaṃ prahṛṣṭaḥ prahasann ivaa paśya rādheya pāñcālān praṇunnān droṇasāyakaiḥc siṃheneva mṛgān vanyāṃs trāsitān dṛḍhadhanvanāa naite jātu punar yuddham īheyur iti me matiḥc yathā tu bhagnā droṇena vāteneva mahādrumāḥa ardyamānāḥ śarair ete rukmapuṅkhair mahātmanāc pathā naikena gacchanti ghūrṇamānās tatas tataḥa saṃniruddhāś ca kauravyair droṇena ca mahātmanāc ete nye maṇḍalībhūtāḥ pāvakeneva kuñjarāḥa bhramarair iva cāviṣṭā droṇasya niśitaiḥ śaraiḥc anyonyaṃ samalīyanta palāyanaparāyaṇāḥa eṣa bhīmo dṛḍhakrodho hīnaḥ pāṇḍavasṛñjayaiḥc madīyair āvṛto yodhaiḥ karṇa tarjayatīva māma vyaktaṃ droṇamayaṃ lokam adya paśyati durmatiḥc nirāśo jīvitān nūnam adya rājyāc ca pāṇḍavaḥ karṇa uvācaa naiṣa jātu mahābāhur jīvann āhavam utsṛjetc na cemān puruṣavyāghra siṃhanādān viśakṣyatea na cāpi pāṇḍavā yuddhe bhajyerann iti me matiḥc śūrāś ca balavantaś ca kṛtāstrā yuddhadurmadāḥa viṣāgnidyūtasaṃkleśān vanavāsaṃ ca pāṇḍavāḥc smaramāṇā na hāsyanti saṃgrāmam iti me matiḥa nikṛto hi mahābāhur amitaujā vṛkodaraḥc varān varān hi kaunteyo rathodārān haniṣyatia asinā dhanuṣā śaktyā hayair nāgair narai rathaiḥc āyasena ca daṇḍena vrātān vrātān haniṣyatia tam ete cānuvartante sātyakipramukhā rathāḥc pāñcālāḥ kekayā matsyāḥ pāṇḍavāś ca viśeṣataḥa śūrāś ca balavantaś ca vikrāntāś ca mahārathāḥc viśeṣataś ca bhīmena saṃrabdhenābhicoditāḥd eṣa cāpi mahābāhur himavān iva susthiraḥd vadhiṣyati mahārāja gadayā bhīmavegayāa te droṇam abhivartante sarvataḥ kurupuṃgavāḥc vṛkodaraṃ parīpsantaḥ sūryam abhragaṇā ivad samareṣu tu nirdiṣṭāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ kṛṣṇabāṃdhavāḥd hrīmantaḥ śatrumaraṇe nipuṇāḥ puṇyalakṣaṇāḥd bahavaḥ pārthivā rājaṃs teṣāṃ vaśagatā raṇed māvamaṃsthāḥ pāṇḍavāṃs tvaṃ nārāyaṇapurogamāna ekāyanagatā hy ete pīḍayeyur yatavratamc arakṣyamāṇaṃ śalabhā yathā dīpaṃ mumūrṣavaḥe asaṃśayaṃ kṛtāstrāś ca paryāptāś cāpi vāraṇea atibhāraṃ tv ahaṃ manye bhāradvāje samāhitamc te śīghram anugacchāmo yatra droṇo vyavasthitaḥe kākā iva mahānāgaṃ mā vai hanyur yatavratam saṃjaya uvācaa rādheyasya vacaḥ śrutvā rājā duryodhanas tadāc bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito rājan prāyād droṇarathaṃ pratia tatrārāvo mahān āsīd ekaṃ droṇaṃ jighāṃsatāmc pāṇḍavānāṃ nivṛttānāṃ nānāvarṇair hayottamaiḥ dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa sarveṣām eva me brūhi rathacihnāni saṃjayab tān ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi vistareṇa pṛthak pṛthakb dūyate me manas tāta droṇaṃ prati paraṃtapab śrutvā bhīṣmasya nidhanaṃ tadvad etad bhaviṣyatic ye droṇam abhyavartanta kruddhā bhīmapurogamāḥ saṃjaya uvācaa ṛśyavarṇair hayair dṛṣṭvā vyāyacchantaṃ vṛkodaramc rajatāśvas tataḥ śūraḥ śaineyaḥ saṃnyavartatad sāraṅgaiś ca yudhāmanyur uhyamāno hayottamaiḥd paryavartata durdharṣaḥ kruddho droṇarathaṃ pratid pārāvatasavarṇais tu hemabhāṇḍair mahājavaiḥd pāñcālarājasya suto dhṛṣṭadyumno bhyavartatad pitaraṃ tu pariprepsuḥ kṣatradharmā yatavrataḥd siddhiṃ cāsya parāṃ kāṃkṣañ śoṇākṣaḥ saṃnyavartatad padmapatranibhaiś cāśvair mallikākṣair alaṃkṛtaiḥd śikhaṇḍī kṣatradevaś ca svayaṃ pratvarayan yayaua darśanīyās tu kāmbojāḥ śukapatraparicchadāḥc vahanto nakulaṃ śīghraṃ tāvakān abhidudruvuḥa kṛṣṇās tu meghasaṃkāśāḥ sahadevam udāyudhama   prāvahann uttamaujasama durdharṣāyābhisaṃdhāya kruddhaṃ kruddhāya bhārataa tathā tittirikalmāṣā hayā vātasamā javea avahaṃs tumule yuddheb dantavarṇās tu rājānaṃ kālavālā yudhiṣṭhiramc bhīmavegā naravyāghram avahan vātaraṃhasaḥa hemottamapraticchannair hayair vātasamair javec abhyavartanta sainyāni sarvāṇy eva yudhiṣṭhirama rājñas tv anantaraṃ rājā pāñcālyo drupado bhavatc jātarūpamayacchatraḥ sarvaiḥ svair abhirakṣitaḥa lalāmair haribhir yuktaiḥ sarvaśabdakṣamair yudhic rājñāṃ madhye maheṣvāsaḥ śāntabhīr abhyavartataa taṃ virāṭo nvayāt paścāt saha śūrair mahārathaiḥc kekayāś ca śikhaṇḍī ca dhṛṣṭaketus tathaiva cae svaiḥ svaiḥ sainyaiḥ parivṛtā matsyarājānam anvayuḥa te tu pāṭalapuṣpāṇāṃ samavarṇā hayottamāḥc vahamānā vyarājanta matsyasyāmitraghātinaḥa hāridrasamavarṇās tu javanā hemamālinaḥc putraṃ virāṭarājasya satvarāḥ samudāvahana indragopakavarṇais tu bhrātaraḥ pañca kekayāḥc jātarūpasamābhāsaḥ sarve lohitakadhvajāḥa te hemamālinaḥ śūrāḥ sarve yuddhaviśāradāḥc varṣanta iva jīmūtāḥ pratyadṛśyanta daṃśitāḥa āmapātranibhākārāḥ pāñcālyam amitaujasamc dāntās tāmrāruṇā yuktāḥ śikhaṇḍinam udāvahana tathā dvādaśasāhasrāḥ pāñcālānāṃ mahārathāḥc teṣāṃ tu ṣaṭ sahasrāṇi ye śikhaṇḍinam anvayuḥa putraṃ tu śiśupālasya narasiṃhasya māriṣac ākrīḍanto vahanti sma sāraṅgaśabalā hayāḥa dhṛṣṭaketuś ca cedīnām ṛṣabho tibaloditaḥc kāmbojaiḥ śabalair aśvair abhyavartata durjayaḥa bṛhatkṣatraṃ tu kaikeyaṃ sukumāraṃ hayottamāḥc palāladhūmavarṇābhāḥ saindhavāḥ śīghram āvahana mallikākṣāḥ padmavarṇā bāhlijātāḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥc śūraṃ śikhaṇḍinaḥ putraṃ kṣatradevam udāvahand rukmabhāṇḍapraticchannāḥ kauśeyasadṛśā hayāḥd kṣamāvanto vahan saṃkhye senābindum araṭṭajāḥa yuvānam avahan yuddhe krauñcavarṇā hayottamāḥc kāśyasyābhibhuvaḥ putraṃ sukumāraṃ mahārathama śvetās tu prativindhyaṃ taṃ kṛṣṇagrīvā manojavāḥc yantuḥ preṣyakarā rājan rājaputram udāvahand yuvānam avahan yuddhe yantuḥ preṣyakarāḥ hayāḥa sutasomaṃ tu yaṃ dhaumyāt pārthaḥ putram ayācatac māṣapuṣpasavarṇās tam avahan vājino raṇea sahasrasomapratimā babhūvuḥpure kurūṇām udayendunāmnic tasmiñ jātaḥ somasaṃkrandamadhyeyasmāt tasmāt sutasomo bhavat saḥd sahasrasomapratimā hayāḥ kanakabhūṣaṇāḥd vīraṃ tam avahan yuddhe heṣamāṇāḥ samantataḥa nākuliṃ tu śatānīkaṃ śālapuṣpanibhā hayāḥc ādityataruṇaprakhyāḥ ślāghanīyam udāvahana kāñcanapratimair yoktrair mayūragrīvasaṃnibhāḥc draupadeyaṃ naravyāghraṃ śrutakarmāṇam āvahana śrutakīrtiṃ śrutanidhiṃ draupadeyaṃ hayottamāḥc ūhuḥ pārthasamaṃ yuddhe cāṣapatranibhā hayāḥa yam āhur adhyardhaguṇaṃ kṛṣṇāt pārthāc ca saṃyugec abhimanyuṃ piśaṅgās taṃ kumāram avahan raṇea ekas tu dhārtarāṣṭrebhyaḥ pāṇḍavān yaḥ samāśritaḥc taṃ bṛhanto mahākāyā yuyutsum avahan raṇea palālakāṇḍavarṇās tu vārdhakṣemiṃ tarasvinamc ūhuḥ sutumule yuddhe hayā hṛṣṭāḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥa kumāraṃ śitipādās tu rukmapatrair uraśchadaiḥc saucittim avahan yuddhe yantuḥ preṣyakarā hayāḥa rukmapṛṣṭhāvakīrṇās tu kauśeyasadṛśā hayāḥc suvarṇamālinaḥ kṣāntāḥ śreṇimantam udāvahana rukmamālādharāḥ śūrā hemavarṇāḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥc kāśirājaṃ hayaśreṣṭhāḥ ślāghanīyam udāvahana astrāṇāṃ ca dhanurvede brāhme vede ca pāragamc taṃ satyadhṛtim āyāntam aruṇāḥ samudāvahana yaḥ sa pāñcālasenānīr droṇam aṃśam akalpayatc pārāvatasavarṇāśvā dhṛṣṭadyumnam udāvahana tam anvayāt satyadhṛtiḥ saucittir yuddhadurmadaḥc śreṇimān vasudānaś ca putraḥ kāśyasya cābhibhoa yuktaiḥ paramakāmbojair javanair hemamālibhiḥc bhīṣayanto dviṣatsainyaṃ yamavaiśravaṇopamāḥa prabhadrakās tu pāñcālāḥ ṣaṭ sahasrāṇy udāyudhāḥc nānāvarṇair hayaśreṣṭhair hemacitrarathadhvajāḥa śaravrātair vidhunvantaḥ śatrūn vitatakārmukāḥc samānamṛtyavo bhūtvā dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ samanvayuḥa babhrukauśeyavarṇās tu suvarṇavaramālinaḥc ūhur aglānamanasaś cekitānaṃ hayottamāḥa indrāyudhasavarṇais tu kuntibhojo hayottamaiḥc āyāt suvaśyaiḥ purujin mātulaḥ savyasācinaḥa antarikṣasavarṇās tu tārakācitritā ivac rājānaṃ rocamānaṃ te hayāḥ saṃkhye samāvahana karburāḥ śitipādās tu svarṇajālaparicchadāḥc jārāsaṃdhiṃ hayaśreṣṭhāḥ sahadevam udāvahana ye tu puṣkaranālasya samavarṇā hayottamāḥc jave śyenasamāś citrāḥ sudāmānam udāvahana śaśalohitavarṇās tu pāṇḍurodgatarājayaḥc pāñcālyaṃ gopateḥ putraṃ siṃhasenam udāvahana pāñcālānāṃ naravyāghro yaḥ khyāto janamejayaḥc tasya sarṣapapuṣpāṇāṃ tulyavarṇā hayottamāḥa māṣavarṇās tu javanā bṛhanto hemamālinaḥc dadhipṛṣṭhāś candramukhāḥ pāñcālyam avahan drutama śūrāś ca bhadrakāś caiva śarakāṇḍanibhā hayāḥc padmakiñjalkavarṇābhā daṇḍadhāram udāvahand rāsabhāruṇavarṇābhāḥ pṛṣṭhato mūṣakaprabhāḥd valganta iva saṃyattā vyāghradantam udāvahand harayaḥ kālakāś citrāś citramālyavibhūṣitāḥd sudhanvānaṃ naravyāghra pāñcālyaṃ samudāvahand indrāśanisamasparśā indragopakasaṃnibhāḥd kośaiś citrāntarāś citrāś citrāyudham udāvahana bibhrato hemamālāś ca cakravākodarā hayāḥc kosalādhipateḥ putraṃ sukṣatraṃ vājino vahana śabalās tu bṛhanto śvā dāntā jāmbūnadasrajaḥc yuddhe satyadhṛtiṃ kṣaimim avahan prāṃśavaḥ śubhāḥa ekavarṇena sarveṇa dhvajena kavacena cac aśvaiś ca dhanuṣā caiva śuklaiḥ śuklo nyavartataa samudrasenaputraṃ tu sāmudrā rudratejasamc aśvāḥ śaśāṅkasadṛśāś candradevam udāvahana nīlotpalasavarṇās tu tapanīyavibhūṣitāḥc śaibyaṃ citrarathaṃ yuddhe citramālyāvahan hayāḥa kalāyapuṣpavarṇās tu śvetalohitarājayaḥc rathasenaṃ hayaśreṣṭhāḥ samūhur yuddhadurmadama yaṃ tu sarvamanuṣyebhyaḥ prāhuḥ śūrataraṃ nṛpamc taṃ paṭaccarahantāraṃ śukavarṇāvahan hayāḥa citrāyudhaṃ citramālyaṃ citravarmāyudhadhvajamc ūhuḥ kiṃśukapuṣpāṇāṃ tulyavarṇā hayottamāḥa ekavarṇena sarveṇa dhvajena kavacena cac dhanuṣā rathavāhaiś ca nīlair nīlo bhyavartataa nānārūpai ratnacitrair varūthadhvajakārmukaiḥc vājidhvajapatākābhiś citraiś citro bhyavartataa ye tu puṣkarapatrasya tulyavarṇā hayottamāḥc te rocamānasya sutaṃ hemavarṇam udāvahana yodhāś ca bhadrakārāś ca śaradaṇḍānudaṇḍajāḥc śvetāṇḍāḥ kukkuṭāṇḍābhā daṇḍaketum udāvahand keśavena hate saṃkhye pitary atha narādhiped bhinne kapāṭe pāṇḍyānāṃ vidruteṣu ca bandhuṣud bhīṣmād avāpya cāstrāṇi droṇād rāmāt kṛpāt tathād astraiḥ samatvaṃ saṃprāpya rukmikarṇārjunācyutaiḥd iyeṣa dvārakāṃ hantuṃ kṛtsnāṃ jetuṃ ca medinīmd nivāritas tataḥ prājñaiḥ suhṛdbhir hitakāmyayād vairānubandham utsṛjya svarājyam anuśāsti yaḥd sasāgaradhvajaḥ pāṇḍyaś candraraśminibhair hayaiḥd vaiḍūryajālasaṃchannair vīryadraviṇam āśritaḥd divyaṃ visphārayaṃś cāpaṃ droṇam abhyapatad balīa āṭarūṣakapuṣpābhā hayāḥ pāṇḍyānuyāyināmc avahan rathamukhyānām ayutāni caturdaśaa nānārūpeṇa varṇena nānākṛtimukhā hayāḥc rathacakradhvajaṃ vīraṃ ghaṭotkacam udāvahand bharatānāṃ sametānām utsṛjyaiko matāni yaḥd gato yudhiṣṭhiraṃ bhaktyā tyaktvā sarvasvam īhitamd lohitākṣaṃ mahābāhuṃ bṛhantaṃ taṃ varadhvajamd mahāsattvā mahākāyā sauvarṇe syandane sthitamd nānādhvajapatākena nānākavacavājināa suvarṇavarṇā dharmajñam anīkasthaṃ yudhiṣṭhiramc rājaśreṣṭhaṃ hayaśreṣṭhāḥ sarvataḥ pṛṣṭhato nvayuḥe varṇaiś coccāvacair divyaiḥ sadaśvānāṃ prabhadrakāḥf saṃnyavartanta yuddhāya bahavo devarūpiṇaḥa te yattā bhīmasenena sahitāḥ kāñcanadhvajāḥc pratyadṛśyanta rājendra sendrā iva divaukasaḥa atyarocata tān sarvān dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ samāgatānc sarvāṇy api ca sainyāni bhāradvājo tyarocatad saṃjaya uvācad atīva śuśubhe tasya dhvajaḥ kṛṣṇājinottaraḥd kamaṇḍalur mahārāja jātarūpamayaḥ śubhaḥd dhvajaṃ tu bhīmasenasya vaiḍūryamaṇilocanamd bhrājamānaṃ mahāsiṃhaṃ rājataṃ dṛṣṭavān ahamd dhvajaṃ tu kururājasya pāṇḍavasya mahaujasaḥd dṛṣṭavān asmi sauvarṇaṃ somaṃ grahagaṇānvitamd mṛdaṅgau cātra vipulau divyau nandopanandakaud yantreṇāhanyamānau ca susvanau harṣavardhanaud śarabhaṃ pṛṣṭhasauvarṇaṃ nakulasya mahādhvajamd apaśyāma rathe tyugraṃ bhīṣayānam avasthitamd haṃsas tu rājataḥ śrīmān dhvajo ghaṇṭāpatākavānd sahadevasya durdharṣo dviṣatāṃ śokavardhanaḥd pañcānāṃ draupadeyānāṃ pratimārathabhūṣaṇamd dharmamārutaśakrāṇām aśvinoś ca mahātmanoḥd abhimanyoḥ kumārasya śārṅgapakṣī hiraṇmayaḥd rathe dhvajavaro jaitras taptacāmīkarojjvalaḥd ghaṭotkacasya rājendra dhvaje gṛdhro vyarocatad aśvāś ca kāmagās tasya rāvaṇasya yathā purād māhendraṃ ca dhanur divyaṃ dharmarāje yudhiṣṭhired vāyavyaṃ bhīmasenasya dhanur divyam abhūn nṛpad trailokyarakṣaṇārthāya brahmaṇā sṛṣṭam āyudhamd tad divyam ajaraṃ caiva phalgunārthāya vai dhanuḥd vaiṣṇavaṃ nakulāyātha sahadevāya cāśvijamd ghaṭotkacāya paulastyaṃ dhanur divyaṃ bhayānakamd raudram āgneyakauberaṃ yāmyaṃ giriśam eva cad pañcānāṃ draupadeyānāṃ dhanūratnāni bhāratad raudraṃ dhanurvaraṃ śreṣṭhaṃ yaṃ lebhe rohiṇīsutaḥd taṃ tuṣṭaḥ pradadau rāmaḥ saubhadrāya mahātmaned ete cānye ca bahavo dhvajā hemavibhūṣaṇāḥd dadṛśus tatra śūrāṇāṃ dviṣatāṃ śokavardhanāḥd tad abhūd dhvajasaṃbādham akāpuruṣasevitamd droṇānīkaṃ mahārāja paṭe citram ivārpitamd śuśruvur nāmagotrāṇi vīrāṇāṃ saṃyuge tadād droṇam ādravatāṃ rājan svayaṃvara ivāhave dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa vyathayeyur ime senāṃ devānām api saṃyugec āhave ye nyavartanta vṛkodaramukhā rathāḥa saṃprayuktaḥ kilaivāyaṃ diṣṭair bhavati pūruṣaḥc tasminn eva tu sarvārthā dṛśyante vai pṛthagvidhāḥa dīrghaṃ viproṣitaḥ kālam araṇye jaṭilo jinīc ajñātaś caiva lokasya vijahāra yudhiṣṭhiraḥa sa eva mahatīṃ senāṃ samāvartayad āhavec kim anyad daivasaṃyogān mama putrasya cābhavata yukta eva hi bhāgyena dhruvam utpadyate naraḥc sa tathākṛṣyate tena na yathā svayam icchatia dyūtavyasanam āsādya kleśito hi yudhiṣṭhiraḥc sa punar bhāgadheyena sahāyān upalabdhavāna ardhaṃ me kekayā labdhāḥ kāśikāḥ kosalāś ca yec cedayaś cāpare vaṅgā mām eva samupāśritāḥa pṛthivī bhūyasī tāta mama pārthasya no tathāc iti mām abravīt sūta mando duryodhanas tadāa tasya senāsamūhasya madhye droṇaḥ surakṣitaḥc nihataḥ pārṣatenājau kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥa madhye rājñāṃ mahābāhuṃ sadā yuddhābhinandinamc sarvāstrapāragaṃ droṇaṃ kathaṃ mṛtyur upeyivāna samanuprāptakṛcchro haṃ saṃmohaṃ paramaṃ gataḥc bhīṣmadroṇau hatau śrutvā nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahea yan mā kṣattābravīt tāta prapaśyan putragṛddhinamc duryodhanena tat sarvaṃ prāptaṃ sūta mayā sahaa nṛśaṃsaṃ tu paraṃ tat syāt tyaktvā duryodhanaṃ yadic putraśeṣaṃ cikīrṣeyaṃ kṛcchraṃ na maraṇaṃ bhaveta yo hi dharmaṃ parityajya bhavaty arthaparo naraḥc so smāc ca hīyate lokāt kṣudrabhāvaṃ ca gacchatia adya cāpy asya rāṣṭrasya hatotsāhasya saṃjayac avaśeṣaṃ na paśyāmi kakude mṛdite satia kathaṃ syād avaśeṣaṃ hi dhuryayor abhyatītayoḥc yau nityam anujīvāmaḥ kṣamiṇau puruṣarṣabhaud tau droṇabhīṣmau nihitau kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥa vyaktam eva ca me śaṃsa yathā yuddham avartatac ke yudhyan ke vyapākarṣan ke kṣudrāḥ prādravan bhayāta dhanaṃjayaṃ ca me śaṃsa yad yac cakre ratharṣabhaḥc tasmād bhayaṃ no bhūyiṣṭhaṃ bhrātṛvyāc ca viśeṣataḥa yathāsīc ca nivṛtteṣu pāṇḍaveṣu ca saṃjayac mama sainyāvaśeṣasya saṃnipātaḥ sudāruṇaḥd kathaṃ ca vo manas tāta saṃnivṛtteṣv avartatae māmakānāṃ ca ye śūrāḥ kāṃs tatra samavārayan saṃjaya uvācaa mahad bhairavam āsīn naḥ saṃnivṛtteṣu pāṇḍuṣuc dṛṣṭvā droṇaṃ chādyamānaṃ tair bhāskaram ivāmbudaiḥa taiś coddhūtaṃ rajas tīvram avacakre camūṃ tavac tato hatam amanyāma droṇaṃ dṛṣṭipathe hatea tāṃs tu śūrān maheṣvāsān krūraṃ karma cikīrṣataḥc dṛṣṭvā duryodhanas tūrṇaṃ svasainyaṃ samacūcudata yathāśakti yathotsāhaṃ yathāsattvaṃ narādhipāḥc vārayadhvaṃ yathāyogaṃ pāṇḍavānām anīkinīmd evam uktvā svayaṃ bhīmam abhyayāt tanayas tavad krūraṃ dṛṣṭvā tu te putraṃ bhīmaseno bhyavartataa tato durmarṣaṇo bhīmam abhyagacchat sutas tavac ārād dṛṣṭvā kiran nyavārayata rājānaṃ pāṇḍavaśreṣṭhaṃ dharmātmānaṃ yudhiṣṭhiramc veleva sāgaraṃ kṣubdhaṃ madrarāṭ samavārayata taṃ dharmarājo bahubhir marmabhidbhir avākiratc madreśas taṃ catuḥṣaṣṭyā śarair nyavārayata tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ vṛddhayoḥ sahasenayoḥc yathā mahāyūthapayor dvipayoḥ saṃprabhinnayoḥa vindānuvindāv āvantyau virāṭaṃ matsyam ārcchatāmc sahasainyau sahānīkaṃ yathendrāgnī purā nakuladāyādas tribhir bhallaiḥ susaṃśitaiḥc cakre vibāhuśirasaṃ bhūtakarmāṇam āhavea sutasomaṃ tu vikrāntam āpatantaṃ śaraughiṇamc droṇāyābhimukhaṃ vīraṃ viviṃśatir avārayata sutasomas tu saṃkruddhaḥ svapitṛvyam ajihmagaiḥb avidhyat saṃgare so pi punaḥ punar nanādayatc viviṃśatiṃ śarair viddhvā nābhyavartata daṃśitaḥd sālvo bhīmarathaḥ śūraṃ śrutasenaṃ mahāhaved droṇāyābhimukhaṃ yāntaṃ śaraugheṇa nyavārayata atha bhīmarathaḥ śālvam āśugair āyasaiḥ śitaiḥc ṣaḍbhiḥ sāśvaniyantāram anayad yamasādanama śrutakarmāṇam āyāntaṃ mayūrasadṛśair hayaiḥc caitrasenir mahārāja tava pautro nyavārayatd tam tumulas tayoḥ puruṣasiṃhayoḥc sainikānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ tayoś ca prītivardhanaḥd aṅgadaṃ pañcabhir bāṇair avidhyat sa paraṃtapaḥd aṅgado daśabhir bāṇaiḥ punar enam avākiratd tataḥ samabhavad yuddham vyadhamat pāṇḍavīṃ camūmd pāṇḍyam indram ivāyāntam asurān prati jaghnuṣamd samarthaḥ sāyakaughena dvīpaṃ sindhur ivāvṛṇotd gadāparighanistriṃśapaṭṭiśāyodhanopalaiḥd kaḍaṅgarair bhuśuṇḍībhiḥ prāsatomarasāyakaiḥd tasya sindhupater vāhān vyadhamat pāṇḍyarāṭ svayamd vīro vīreṇa saṃkruddho droṇāyābhimukhaṃ vrajand alambuṣas tu saṃkruddho ghaṭotkacam avārayatd mṛgarkṣayuddhe tiṣṭhantaṃ rathe vīro ratheṣubhiḥd tāṃ pāṇḍavīṃ mahāsenāṃ devasenopamāṃ raṇed avākirac charaugheṇa asurā iva tāvakaḥd pārtham indram ivāyāntaṃ droṇaṃ prati nijaghnuṣamd samārcchat sāyakaughena svayaṃ rājā nyavārayatd sa nṛpaṃ sāśvayantāram arātighnam arātihād amṛdnāt taṃ pṛṣatkena duryodhanam ariṃdamamd sa jyāṃ mṛdnatpṛṣatkena spṛṣṭvā vṛkṣam ivāśaniḥd vīro vismāpayan yuddhe droṇāyābhimukho vrajatd alambusas tu
