yuddhaṃ rakṣogrāmaṇimukhyayoḥc tādṛg yādṛk purā vṛttaṃ śambarāmararājayoḥd bhāradvājas tu senānyaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ mahārathamd tam eva rājan saṃpaśyann atikramya tathā bahūnd mahatā śarajālena kirantaṃ śatruvāhinīmd avārayan mahārāja sāmātyaṃ sapadānugamd tathānye pārthivā rājan bahutvān nānukīrtitāḥd samasajjanta te sarve yathāyogaṃ yathābalamd hayair hayāḥ samājagmuḥ kuñjarair eva kuñjarāḥd padātayaḥ padātaiś ca rathair eva ratharṣabhāḥd akurvann āryakarmāṇi tatra te puruṣarṣabhāḥd kulavīryānurūpāṇi saṃsṛṣṭāś ca parasparama evaṃ dvaṃdvaśatāny āsan rathavāraṇavājināmc padātīnāṃ ca bhadraṃ te tava teṣāṃ ca saṃkulama naitādṛśo dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ saṃgrāmo naiva ca śrutaḥc droṇasyābhāvabhāveṣu prasaktānāṃ yathābhavata idaṃ ghoram idaṃ citram idaṃ raudram iti prabhoc tatra yuddhāny adṛśyanta pratatāni bahūni ca dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa teṣv evaṃ saṃnivṛtteṣu pratyudyāteṣu bhāgaśaḥc kathaṃ yuyudhire pārthā māmakāś ca tarasvinaḥa kim arjunaś cāpy akarot saṃśaptakabalaṃ pratic saṃśaptakā vā pārthasya kim akurvata saṃjaya saṃjaya uvācaa tathā teṣu nivṛtteṣu pratyudyāteṣu bhāgaśaḥc svayam abhyadravad bhīmaṃ nāgānīkena te sutaḥa sa nāga iva nāgena govṛṣeṇeva govṛṣaḥc samāhūtaḥ svayaṃ rājñā nāgānīkam upādravata sa yuddhakuśalaḥ pārtho bāhuvīryeṇa cānvitaḥc abhinat kuñjarānīkam acireṇaiva māriṣad tatra yuddhāny adṛśyanta pradṛptāni bahūni caa te gajā girisaṃkāśāḥ kṣarantaḥ sarvato madamc bhīmasenasya nārācair vimukhā vimadīkṛtāḥa vidhamed abhrajālāni yathā vāyuḥ samantataḥc vyadhamat tāny anīkāni tathaiva pavanātmajaḥa sa teṣu visṛjan bāṇān bhīmo nāgeṣv aśobhatac bhuvaneṣv iva sarveṣu gabhastīn udito raviḥa te bhīmabāṇaiḥ śataśaḥ saṃsyūtā vibabhur gajāḥc gabhastibhir ivārkasya vyomni nānābalāhakāḥa tathā gajānāṃ kadanaṃ kurvāṇam anilātmajamc kruddho duryodhano bhyetya pratyavidhyac chitaiḥ śaraiḥa tataḥ kṣaṇena kṣitipaṃ kṣatajapratimekṣaṇaḥc kṣayaṃ ninīṣur niśitair bhīmo vivyādha patribhiḥa sa śarārpitasarvāṅgaḥ kruddho vivyādha pāṇḍavamc nārācair arkaraśmyābhair bhīmasenaṃ smayann ivaa tasya nāgaṃ maṇimayaṃ ratnacitraṃ dhvaje sthitamc bhallābhyāṃ kārmukaṃ caiva kṣipraṃ ciccheda pāṇḍavaḥa duryodhanaṃ pīḍyamānaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmena māriṣac cukṣobhayiṣur abhyāgād aṅgo mātaṅgam āsthitaḥa tam āpatantaṃ mātaṅgam ambudapratimasvanamc kumbhāntare bhīmaseno nārācenārdayad bhṛśama tasya kāyaṃ vinirbhidya mamajja dharaṇītalec tataḥ papāta dvirado vajrāhata ivācalaḥa tasyāvarjitanāgasya mlecchasyāvapatiṣyataḥc śiraś ciccheda bhallena kṣiprakārī vṛkodaraḥa tasmin nipatite vīre saṃprādravata sā camūḥc saṃbhrāntāśvadviparathā padātīn avamṛdnatīa teṣv anīkeṣu sarveṣu vidravatsu samantataḥc prāgjyotiṣas tato bhīmaṃ kuñjareṇa samādravata yena nāgena maghavān ajayad daityadānavānb tadanvayena nāgena bhīmasenam upādravatc sa nāgapravaro bhīmaṃ sahasā samupādravata śravaṇābhyām atho padbhyāṃ saṃhatena kareṇa cac vyāvṛttanayanaḥ kruddhaḥ pradahann iva pāṇḍavamd vṛkodararathaṃ sāśvam aviśeṣam acūrṇayatd padbhyāṃ bhīmo py atho dhāvaṃs tasya gātreṣv alīyatad jānann añjalikāvedhaṃ nāpākrāmata pāṇḍavaḥd gātrābhyantarago bhūtvā kareṇātāḍayan muhuḥd lālayām āsa taṃ nāgaṃ vadhākāṅkṣiṇam avyayamd kulālacakravan nāgas tadā tūrṇam athābhramatd nāgāyutabalaḥ śrīmān kālayāno vṛkodaramd bhīmo pi niṣkramya tataḥ supratīkāgrato bhavatd bhīmaṃ kareṇāvanamya jānubhyām abhyapātayatd grīvāyāṃ veṣṭayitvainaṃ sa gajo hantum aihatad karaveṣṭaṃ bhīmaseno bhramaṃ dattvā vyamocayatd punar gātrāṇi nāgasya praviveśa vṛkodaraḥd yāvat pratigajāyātaṃ svabalastham avaikṣatad bhīmo pi nāgagātrebhyo viniḥsṛtyāpayāj javāta tataḥ sarvasya sainyasya nādaḥ samabhavan mahānc hā hā vinihato bhīmaḥ kuñjareṇeti māriṣaa tena nādena vitrastā pāṇḍavānām anīkinīc sahasābhyadravad rājan yatra tasthau vṛkodaraḥa tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā hataṃ matvā vṛkodaramc bhagadattaṃ sapāñcālaḥ sarvataḥ samavārayatd bhīmo pi dorbhyāṃ nāgendraṃ nipīḍyāmocayad balīa taṃ rathai rathināṃ śreṣṭhāḥ parivārya samantataḥc avākirañ śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ śataśo tha sahasraśaḥa sa vighātaṃ pṛṣatkānām aṅkuśena samācaranc gajena pāṇḍupāñcālān vyadhamat parvateśvaraḥa tad adbhutam apaśyāma bhagadattasya saṃyugec tathā vṛddhasya caritaṃ kuñjareṇa viśāṃ patea tato rājā daśārṇānāṃ prāgjyotiṣam upādravatc tiryagyātena nāgena samadenāśugāmināa tayor yuddhaṃ samabhavan nāgayor bhīmarūpayoḥc sapakṣayoḥ parvatayor yathā sadrumayoḥ purāa prāgjyotiṣapater nāgaḥ saṃnipatyāpavṛtya cab prāgjyotiṣānādhipater gatvā nāgam abodhayatc pārśve daśārṇādhipater bhittvā nāgam apātayata tomaraiḥ sūryaraśmyābhair bhagadatto tha saptabhiḥc jaghāna dviradasthaṃ taṃ śatruṃ pracalitāsanamd tato yudhiṣṭhiro dṛṣṭvā daśārṇādhipatiṃ hatamd mahatā rathavaṃśena prāgjyotiṣam abhidravata upasṛtya tu rājānaṃ bhagadattaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraḥc rathānīkena mahatā sarvataḥ paryavārayata sa kuñjarastho rathibhiḥ śuśubhe sarvato vṛtaḥc parvate vanamadhyastho jvalann iva hutāśanaḥa maṇḍalaṃ sarvataḥ śliṣṭaṃ rathinām ugradhanvināmc kiratāṃ śaravarṣāṇi sa nāgaḥ paryavartataa tataḥ prāgjyotiṣo rājā parigṛhya dviparṣabhamc preṣayām āsa sahasā yuyudhānarathaṃ pratid āpatantaṃ tu saṃprekṣya nāgaṃ sātvatapuṃgavaḥd avidhyat pañcabhir bāṇaiḥ śitair āśīviṣopamaiḥd so tividdho balavatā satyakena viśāṃ pated vyavartata paritrāsān maṇḍalāni śarārditaḥa śineḥ pautrasya tu rathaṃ parigṛhya mahādvipaḥc abhicikṣepa vegena yuyudhānas tv apākramata bṛhataḥ saindhavān aśvān samutthāpya tu sārathiḥc tasthau sātyakim āsādya saṃplutas taṃ rathaṃ punaḥa sa tu labdhvāntaraṃ nāgas tvarito rathamaṇḍalātc niścakrāma tataḥ sarvān paricikṣepa pārthivāna te tv āśugatinā tena trāsyamānā nararṣabhāḥc tam ekaṃ dviradaṃ saṃkhye menire śataśo nṛpāḥa te gajasthena kālyante bhagadattena pāṇḍavāḥc airāvatasthena yathā devarājena dānavāḥa teṣāṃ pradravatāṃ bhīmaḥ pāñcālānām itas tataḥc gajavājikṛtaḥ śabdaḥ sumahān samajāyataa bhagadattena samare kālyamāneṣu pāṇḍuṣuc prāgjyotiṣam abhikruddhaḥ punar bhīmaḥ samabhyayāta tasyābhidravato vāhān hastamuktena vāriṇāc siktvā vyatrāsayan nāgas te pārtham aharaṃs tataḥa tatas tam abhyayāt tūrṇaṃ ruciparvākṛtīsutaḥc samukṣañ śaravarṣeṇa rathastho ntakasaṃnibhaḥa tato ruciraparvāṇaṃ śareṇa nataparvaṇāc suparvā parvatapatir ninye vaivasvatakṣayama tasmin nipatite vīre saubhadro draupadīsutāḥc cekitāno dhṛṣṭaketur yuyutsuś cārdayan dvipama ta enaṃ śaradhārābhir dhārābhir iva toyadāḥc siṣicur bhairavān nādān vinadanto jighāṃsavaḥa tataḥ pārṣṇyaṅkuśāṅguṣṭhaiḥ kṛtinā codito dvipaḥc prasāritakaraḥ prāyāt stabdhakarṇekṣaṇo drutama so dhiṣṭhāya padā vāhān yuyutsoḥ sūtam ārujatb rathaṃ babhañja saṃkruddhaś caṇḍavāto yathā drumamb yuyutsus tu rathād rājann apākrāmat tvarānvitaḥb tataḥ pāṇḍavayodhās te nāgarājaṃ śarair drutamc putras tu tava saṃbhrāntaḥ saubhadrasyāpluto rathama sa kuñjarastho visṛjann iṣūn ariṣu pārthivaḥc babhau raśmīn ivādityo bhuvaneṣu samutsṛjand sa bhīmenātha bahudhā dantābhyām avapīḍayand mokṣito yuddhaśauṇḍena nāgāyutabalo gajaḥa tam ārjunir dvādaśabhir yuyutsur daśabhiḥ śaraiḥc tribhis tribhir draupadeyā dhṛṣṭaketuś ca vivyadhuḥd cekitānaś catuḥṣaṣṭyā sottarāyudhikaṃ punaḥd pratyavidhyac charaiḥ sarvān bhagadattas tribhis tribhiḥa so riyatnārpitair bāṇair ācito dvirado babhauc saṃsyūta iva sūryasya raśmibhir jalado mahāna niyantuḥ śilpayatnābhyāṃ preṣito riśarārditaḥc paricikṣepa tān nāgaḥ sa ripūn savyadakṣiṇama gopāla iva daṇḍena yathā paśugaṇān vanec āveṣṭayata tāṃ senāṃ bhagadattas tathā muhuḥa kṣipraṃ śyenābhipannānāṃ vāyasānām iva svanaḥb rajaś ca sumahad rājann antarikṣaṃ samācinotb sa reṇumārgo viyati bhāti daṇḍa ivotthitaḥb samucchrito bhṛśārtāyā senāyā subhujo yathāb abhidhāveti kaunteyaṃ saṃcodayad ivārjunamc babhūva pāṇḍaveyānāṃ bhṛśaṃ vidravatāṃ svanaḥa sa nāgarājaḥ pravarāṅkuśāhataḥpurā sapakṣo drivaro yathā nṛpac bhayaṃ tathā ripuṣu samādadhad bhṛśaṃvaṇiggaṇānāṃ kṣubhito yathārṇavaḥa tato dhvanir dviradarathāśvapārthivairbhayād dravadbhir janito tibhairavaḥc kṣitiṃ viyad dyāṃ vidiśo diśas tathāsamāvṛṇot pārthiva saṃyuge tadād samantatas tatra janādhipeśvaraa sa tena nāgapravareṇa pārthivobhṛśaṃ jagāhe dviṣatām anīkinīmc purā suguptāṃ vibudhair ivāhavevirocano devavarūthinīm ivaa bhṛśaṃ vavau jvalanasakho viyad rajaḥsamāvṛṇon muhur api caiva sainikānc tam ekanāgaṃ gaṇaśo yathā gajāḥsamantato drutam iva menire janāḥ saṃjaya uvācaa yan māṃ pārthasya saṃgrāme karmāṇi paripṛcchasic tac chṛṇuṣva mahārāja pārtho yad akaron mṛdhea rajo dṛṣṭvā samudbhūtaṃ śrutvā ca gajanisvanamc bhajyatāṃ bhagadattena kaunteyaḥ kṛṣṇam abravīta yathā prāgjyotiṣo rājā gajena madhusūdanac tvaramāṇo bhyatikrānto dhruvaṃ tasyaiṣa nisvanaḥa indrād anavaraḥ saṃkhye gajayānaviśāradaḥc prathamo vā dvitīyo vā pṛthivyām iti me matiḥa sa cāpi dviradaśreṣṭhaḥ sadāpratigajo yudhic sarvaśabdātigaḥ saṃkhye kṛtakarmā jitaklamaḥa sahaḥ śastranipātānām agnisparśasya cānaghac sa pāṇḍavabalaṃ vyaktam adyaiko nāśayiṣyatid siṃhanādaṃ mahat kṛtvā dhanurbāṇaravaiḥ sahad vidrāvyamāṇaṃ saṃpaśya hatabhūyiṣṭhanāyakamd dṛṣṭvā vinadya sahasā mama senāṃ pramṛdnatia na cāvābhyām ṛte nyo sti śaktas taṃ pratibādhitumc tvaramāṇas tato yāhi yataḥ prāgjyotiṣādhipaḥa śakrasakhyād dvipabalair vayasā cāpi vismitamc adyainaṃ preṣayiṣyāmi balahantuḥ priyātithima vacanād atha kṛṣṇas tu prayayau savyasācinaḥc dāryate bhagadattena yatra pāṇḍavavāhinīa taṃ prayāntaṃ tataḥ paścād āhvayanto mahārathāḥc saṃśaptakāḥ samārohan sahasrāṇi caturdaśaa daśaiva tu sahasrāṇi trigartānāṃ narādhipac catvāri tu sahasrāṇi vāsudevasya ye nugāḥa dāryamāṇāṃ camūṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagadattena māriṣac āhūyamānasya ca tair abhavad dhṛdayaṃ dvidhāa kiṃ nu śreyaskaraṃ karma bhaved iti vicintayanc ito vā vinivarteyaṃ gaccheyaṃ vā yudhiṣṭhirama tasya buddhyā vicāryaitad arjunasya kurūdvahac abhavad bhūyasī buddhiḥ saṃśaptakavadhe sthirāa sa saṃnivṛttaḥ sahasā kapipravaraketanaḥc eko rathasahasrāṇi nihantuṃ vāsavī raṇea sā hi duryodhanasyāsīn matiḥ karṇasya cobhayoḥc arjunasya vadhopāye tena dvaidham akalpayata sa tu saṃvartayām āsa dvaidhībhāvena pāṇḍavaḥc rathena tu rathāgryāṇām akarot tāṃ mṛṣā tadāa tataḥ śatasahasrāṇi śarāṇāṃ nataparvaṇāmc vyasṛjann arjune rājan saṃśaptakamahārathāḥa naiva kuntīsutaḥ pārtho naiva kṛṣṇo janārdanaḥc na hayā na ratho rājan dṛśyante sma śaraiś citāḥd tato naivārjunopendrau na rathaḥ sāśvaketanaḥd dṛśyante śaravarṣeṇa prabalena samāvṛtāḥd tatas tena śaraugheṇa mahatā samavāstṛtaḥd nāśakan nāma bībhatsur amitrān pratibādhituma yadā moham anuprāptaḥ sasvedaś ca janārdanaḥb tato janārdanaḥ pārthaṃ pratyuvāca hasann ivab vajram astraṃ tu saṃdhāya jahi saṃśaptakān ihac tatas tān prāyaśaḥ pārtho vajrāstreṇa nijaghnivāna śataśaḥ pāṇayaś chinnāḥ seṣujyātalakārmukāḥc ketavo vājinaḥ sūtā rathinaś cāpatan kṣitaua drumācalāgrāmbudharaiḥ samarūpāḥ sukalpitāḥc hatārohāḥ kṣitau petur dvipāḥ pārthaśarāhatāḥa vipraviddhakuthāvalgāś chinnabhāṇḍāḥ parāsavaḥc sārohās turagāḥ petur mathitāḥ pārthamārgaṇaiḥa sarṣṭicarmāsinakharāḥ samudgaraparaśvadhāḥc saṃchinnā bāhavaḥ petur nṛṇāṃ bhallaiḥ kirīṭināa bālādityāmbujendūnāṃ tulyarūpāṇi māriṣac saṃchinnāny arjunaśaraiḥ śirāṃsy urvīṃ prapedirea jajvālālaṃkṛtaiḥ senā patribhiḥ prāṇabhojanaiḥc nānāliṅgais tadāmitrān kruddhe nighnati phalgunea kṣobhayantaṃ tadā senāṃ dviradaṃ nalinīm ivac dhanaṃjayaṃ bhūtagaṇāḥ sādhu sādhv ity apūjayana dṛṣṭvā tat karma pārthasya vāsavasyeva mādhavaḥc vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā talam āhatya pūjayatd karmaitat pārtha śakreṇa yamena dhanadena cad duṣkaraṃ samare yat te kṛtam adyeti me matiḥd yugapac caiva saṃgrāme śataśo tha sahasraśaḥd patitā eva me dṛṣṭāḥ saṃśaptakamahārathāḥa tataḥ saṃśaptakān hatvā bhūyiṣṭhaṃ ye vyavasthitāḥc bhagadattāya yāhīti pārthaḥ kṛṣṇam acodayat saṃjaya uvācaa yiyāsatas tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pārthasyāśvān manojavānc apraiṣīd dhemasaṃchannān droṇānīkāya pāṇḍurāna taṃ prayāntaṃ kuruśreṣṭhaṃ svāṃs trātuṃ droṇatāpitānc suśarmā bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ yuddhārthī pṛṣṭhato nvayāta tataḥ śvetahayaḥ kṛṣṇam abravīd ajitaṃ jayaḥc eṣa māṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ suśarmāhvayate cyutaa dīryate cottareṇaitat sainyaṃ naḥ śatrusūdanac dvaidhībhūtaṃ mano me dya kṛtaṃ saṃśaptakair idama kiṃ nu saṃśaptakān hanmi svān rakṣāmy ahitārditānc iti me tvaṃ mataṃ vettha tatra kiṃ sukṛtaṃ bhaveta evam uktas tu dāśārhaḥ syandanaṃ pratyavartayatc yena trigartādhipatiḥ pāṇḍavaṃ samupāhvayata tato rjunaḥ suśarmāṇaṃ viddhvā saptabhir āśugaiḥc dhvajaṃ dhanuś cāsya tathā kṣurābhyāṃ samakṛntataa trigartādhipateś cāpi bhrātaraṃ ṣaḍbhir āyasaiḥc sāśvaṃ sasūtaṃ tvaritaḥ pārthaḥ praiṣīd yamakṣayama tato bhujagasaṃkāśāṃ suśarmā śaktim āyasīmc cikṣepārjunam ādiśya vāsudevāya tomarama śaktiṃ tribhiḥ śaraiś chittvā tomaraṃ tribhir arjunaḥc suśarmāṇaṃ śaravrātair mohayitvā nyavartataa taṃ vāsavam ivāyāntaṃ bhūrivarṣaśaraughiṇamc rājaṃs tāvakasainyānāṃ nograṃ kaś cid avārayata tato dhanaṃjayo bāṇais tata eva mahārathānc āyād vinighnan kauravyān dahan kakṣam ivānalaḥa tasya vegam asahyaṃ tu kuntīputrasya dhīmataḥc nāśaknuvaṃs te saṃsoḍhuṃ sparśam agner iva prajāḥa saṃveṣṭayann anīkāni śaravarṣeṇa pāṇḍavaḥc suparṇapātavad rājann āyāt prāgjyotiṣaṃ pratia yat tadānāmayaj jiṣṇur bharatānām apāyināmc dhanuḥ kṣemakaraṃ saṃkhye dviṣatām aśruvardhanama tad eva tava putrasya rājan durdyūtadevinaḥc kṛte kṣatravināśāya dhanur āyacchad arjunaḥa tathā vikṣobhyamāṇā sā pārthena tava vāhinīc vyadīryata mahārāja naur ivāsādya parvatama tato daśa sahasrāṇi nyavartanta dhanuṣmatāmc matiṃ kṛtvā raṇe kruddhā vīrā jayaparājayea vyapetahṛdayatrāsa āpaddharmātigo rathaḥc ārchat pārtho guruṃ bhāraṃ sarvabhārasaho yudhia yathā naḍavanaṃ kruddhaḥ prabhinnaḥ ṣaṣṭihāyanaḥc mṛdnīyāt tadvad āyastaḥ pārtho mṛdnāc camūṃ tavaa tasmin pramathite sainye bhagadatto narādhipaḥc tena nāgena sahasā dhanaṃjayam upādravata taṃ rathena naravyāghraḥ pratyagṛhṇād abhītavatc sa saṃnipātas tumulo babhūva rathanāgayoḥa kalpitābhyāṃ yathāśāstraṃ rathena ca gajena cac saṃgrāme ceratur vīrau bhagadattadhanaṃjayaua tato jīmūtasaṃkāśān nāgād indra ivābhibhūḥc abhyavarṣac charaugheṇa bhagadatto dhanaṃjayama sa cāpi śaravarṣaṃ tac charavarṣeṇa vāsaviḥc aprāptam eva ciccheda bhagadattasya vīryavānd saṃnyavārayad asyāśu laghutvāt pākaśāsaniḥd vavarṣa śaravarṣaṃ tu punar eva dhanaṃjayaḥa tataḥ prāgjyotiṣo rājā śaravarṣaṃ nivārya tatc śarair jaghne mahābāhuṃ pārthaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ca bhārataa tataḥ sa śarajālena mahatābhyavakīrya tauc codayām āsa taṃ nāgaṃ vadhāyācyutapārthayoḥa tam āpatantaṃ dviradaṃ dṛṣṭvā kruddham ivāntakamc cakre pasavyaṃ tvaritaḥ syandanena janārdanaḥa saṃprāptam api neyeṣa parāvṛttaṃ mahādvipamc sārohaṃ mṛtyusāt kartuṃ smaran dharmaṃ dhanaṃjayaḥa sa tu nāgo dviparathān hayāṃś cārujya māriṣac prāhiṇon mṛtyulokāya tato krudhyad dhanaṃjayaḥ dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa tathā kruddhaḥ kim akarod bhagadattasya pāṇḍavaḥc prāgjyotiṣo vā pārthasya tan me śaṃsa yathātatham saṃjaya uvācaa prāgjyotiṣeṇa saṃsaktāv ubhau dāśārhapāṇḍavauc mṛtyor ivāntikaṃ prāptau sarvabhūtāni menirea tathā hi śaravarṣāṇi pātayaty aniśaṃ prabhoc bhagadatto gajaskandhāt kṛṣṇayoḥ syandanasthayoḥa atha kārṣṇāyasair bāṇaiḥ pūrṇakārmukaniḥsṛtaiḥc avidhyad devakīputraṃ hemapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥa agnisparśasamās tīkṣṇā bhagadattena coditāḥc nirbhidya devakīputraṃ kṣitiṃ jagmuḥ śarās tataḥa tasya pārtho dhanuś chittvā śarāvāpaṃ nihatya cac lāḍayann iva rājānaṃ bhagadattam ayodhayata so rkaraśminibhāṃs tīkṣṇāṃs tomarān vai caturdaśac prerayat savyasācī tāṃs tridhaikaikam athācchinata tato nāgasya tad varma vyadhamat pākaśāsaniḥc śarajālena sa babhau vyabhraḥ parvatarāḍ ivac   tad vyaśīryata bhūtalec viśīrṇavarmā sa gajaḥ śaraiḥ subhṛśam arditaḥc babhau śirasi mātaṃgoa tataḥ prāgjyotiṣaḥ śaktiṃ hemadaṇḍām ayasmayīmc vyasṛjad vāsudevāya dvidhā tām arjuno cchinata tataś chatraṃ dhvajaṃ caiva chittvā rājño rjunaḥ śaraiḥc vivyādha daśabhis tūrṇam utsmayan parvatādhipama so tividdho rjunaśaraiḥ supuṅkhaiḥ kaṅkapatribhiḥc bhagadattas tataḥ kruddhaḥ pāṇḍavasya mahātmanaḥa vyasṛjat tomarān mūrdhni śvetāśvasyonnanāda cac tair arjunasya samare kirīṭaṃ parivartitama parivṛttaṃ kirīṭaṃ taṃ yamayann eva phalgunaḥc sudṛṣṭaḥ kriyatāṃ loka iti rājānam abravīta evam uktas tu saṃkruddhaḥ śaravarṣeṇa pāṇḍavamc abhyavarṣat sagovindaṃ dhanur ādāya bhāsvaramd tau vidhyamānau nārācair bhagadattena bhāratad jagmatur naiva saṃmohaṃ cukṣubhāte na cācyutaua tasya pārtho dhanuś chittvā tūṇīrān saṃnikṛtya cac tvaramāṇo dvisaptatyā sarvamarmasv atāḍayata viddhas tathāpy avyathito vaiṣṇavāstram udīrayanc abhimantryāṅkuśaṃ kruddho vyasṛjat pāṇḍavorasid tad astram udyataṃ dṛṣṭvā vāsudevaḥ pratāpavānd arjunaḥ pṛṣṭhataṃ kṛtvā pratijagrāha vīryavāna visṛṣṭaṃ bhagadattena tad astraṃ sarvaghātakamc urasā pratijagrāha pārthaṃ saṃchādya keśavaḥa vaijayanty abhavan mālā tad astraṃ keśavorasib padmakośavicitrā ca sarvartukusumākulāb jvalanārkenduvarṇāḍhyā tārakojjvalapāvakāb tayā padmābhiśobhinyā vāyukampitalolayāb śobhate bhyadhikaṃ śauriratasīpuṣpasaṃnibhaḥb keśavaḥ keśimathanaḥ śārṅgadhanvārimardanaḥb sandhyābhrair iva saṃchannaḥ prāvṛṭkāle nagottamaḥc tato rjunaḥ klāntamanāḥ keśavaṃ pratyabhāṣataa ayudhyamānas turagān saṃyantāsmi janārdanac ity uktvā puṇḍarīkākṣa pratijñāṃ svāṃ na rakṣasid idam astram avasthāpya prāptaṃ māṃ devakīsutad kimarthaṃ puruṣavyāghra svayaṃ pratigṛhītavāna yady ahaṃ vyasanī vā syām aśakto vā nivāraṇec tatas tvayaivaṃ kāryaṃ syān na tu kāryaṃ mayi sthitea sabāṇaḥ sadhanuś cāhaṃ sasurāsuramānavānc śakto lokān imāñ jetuṃ tac cāpi viditaṃ tavaa tato rjunaṃ vāsudevaḥ pratyuvācārthavad vacaḥc śṛṇu guhyam idaṃ pārtha yathā vṛttaṃ purānaghad yeyaṃ lokadharā devī sarvabhūtadharā dharād sakāmā lokakartāraṃ nārāyaṇam upasthitād sa saṃgamya tayā sārdhaṃ prītas tasyai varaṃ dadaud sā vavre viṣṇusadṛśaṃ putram astraṃ ca vaiṣṇavamd babhūva ca sutas tasyāṃ narako nāma viśrutaḥd astraṃ ca vaiṣṇavaṃ tasmai dadau nārāyaṇaḥ svayamd tad etan narakasyāsīd astraṃ sarvāhitāntakamd tasmāt prāgjyotiṣaṃ prāptaṃ sarvaśastravighātanamd nāsyāvadhyo sti loke smin mad anyaḥ kaś cid arjunad saṃjaya uvācad tasmān mayā kṛtaṃ hy etan mā te bhūd buddhir anyathād anunīya tu dāśārhaḥ pāṇḍavaṃ tvarito bravītd jahi prāgjyotiṣaṃ kṣipraṃ vākyaśeṣaṃ ca me śṛṇua caturmūrtir ahaṃ śaśval lokatrāṇārtham udyataḥc ātmānaṃ pravibhajyeha lokānāṃ hitam ādadhea ekā mūrtis tapaścaryāṃ kurute me bhuvi sthitāc aparā paśyati jagat kurvāṇaṃ sādhvasādhunīa aparā kurute karma mānuṣaṃ lokam āśritāc śete caturthī tv aparā nidrāṃ varṣasahasrikāma yāsau varṣasahasrānte mūrtir uttiṣṭhate mamac varārhebhyo varāñ śreṣṭhāṃs tasmin kāle dadāti sāa taṃ tu kālam anuprāptaṃ viditvā pṛthivī tadāc prāyācata varaṃ yaṃ māṃ narakārthāya taṃ śṛṇua devānām asurāṇāṃ ca avadhyas tanayo stu mec upeto vaiṣṇavāstreṇa tan me tvaṃ dātum arhasia evaṃ varam ahaṃ śrutvā jagatyās tanaye tadāc amogham astram adadaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tad ahaṃ purāa avocaṃ caitad astraṃ vai hy amoghaṃ bhavatu kṣamec narakasyābhirakṣārthaṃ nainaṃ kaś cid vadhiṣyatia anenāstreṇa te guptaḥ sutaḥ parabalārdanaḥc bhaviṣyati durādharṣaḥ sarvalokeṣu sarvadāa tathety uktvā gatā devī kṛtakāmā manasvinīb vyajāyata dharā devī putraṃ putraśatāvaramc sa cāpy āsīd durādharṣo narakaḥ śatrutāpanaḥa tasmāt prāgjyotiṣaṃ prāptaṃ tad astraṃ pārtha māmakamb tad astraṃ devagandharvayakṣapannagarākṣasānb sarvān samāgatān hanyāt kiṃ punas tvāṃ dhanaṃjayab bhogināṃ caiva durdharṣaṃ mayā dattaṃ surāsuraiḥb jahi prāgjyotiṣaṃ pārtha purā sarvān hinasti saḥc nāsyāvadhyo sti lokeṣu sendrarudreṣu māriṣaa tan mayā tvatkṛtenaitad anyathā vyapanāśitamc viyuktaṃ paramāstreṇa jahi pārtha patitān narānc viṣāṇaiś cāvaniṃ gatvā vyabhindan rathino bahūna narāntraiḥ ke cid apare viṣāṇālagnasaṃsravaiḥc babhramuḥ śataśo nāgā mṛdnantaḥ śataśo narāna kāṃsyāyasatanutrāṇān narāśvarathakuñjarānc vīrā duḥsādhyāś cāpi viplavea dāvāgnyabhiparītānāṃ bhūrigulmatṛṇadrumec vanaukasām ivāraṇye tvadīyānām abhūd bhayam saṃjaya uvācaa samare tyugrakarmāṇaḥ karmabhir vyañjitaśramāḥc sakṛṣṇāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ pañca devair api durāsadāḥa sattvakarmānvayair buddhyā prakṛtyā yaśasā śriyāc naiva bhūto na bhavitā kṛṣṇatulyaguṇaḥ pumāna satyadharmaparo dātā viprapūjādibhir guṇaiḥc sadaiva tridivaṃ prāpto rājā rūpeṇa vikrameṇa śrutena cac vinayāt sahadevasya sadṛśo nakulasya ca dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa abhimanyum ahaṃ sūta saubhadram aparājitamc śrotum icchāmi kārtsnyena katham āyodhane hataḥd vaiśaṃpāyanaḥd abhimanyuṃ hataṃ śrutvā dhṛtarāṣṭro janeśvaraḥd vistareṇa mahārāja paryapṛcchat sa saṃjayam saṃjaya uvāca sthiro bhava mahārāja śokaṃ dhāraya durdharam mahāntaṃ baṃdhunāśaṃ te kathayiṣyāmi tac chṛṇua cakravyūho mahārāja ācāryeṇābhikalpitaḥc tatra śakropamāḥ sarve rājāno viniveśitāḥd aṇusthāneṣu vinyastāḥ kumārāḥ sūryavarcasaḥd kesarāṇi ca padmasya sukumārāṇi bhāratad kumārā rājalokasya nikṣiptāḥ kesaropamāḥd karṇikāstho mahārāja tasya duryodhano bhavata saṃghāto rājaputrāṇāṃ sarveṣām abhavat tadāc kṛtābhisamayāḥ sarve suvarṇavikṛtadhvajāḥa raktāmbaradharāḥ sarve sarve raktavibhūṣaṇāḥb te rathāśvavarāḥ sarve sarve raktavibhūṣaṇāḥc sarve raktapatākāś ca sarve vai hemamālinaḥd candanāgurudigdhāṅgāḥ sragviṇaḥ sūkṣmavāsasaḥd sahitāḥ paryadhāvanta kārṣṇiṃ prati yuyutsavaḥa teṣāṃ daśasahasrāṇi babhūvur dṛḍhadhanvināmc pautraṃ tava puraskṛtya lakṣmaṇaṃ priyadarśanama anyonyasamaduḥkhās te anyonyasamasāhasāḥc anyonyaṃ spardhamānāś ca anyonyasya hite ratāḥd duryodhanas tu tathāc pārśvataḥ sindhurājasya vyarājanta mahārathāḥd tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇamd tāvakānāṃ pareṣāṃ ca mṛtyuṃ kṛtvā nivartanam saṃjaya uvācaa tad anīkam anādhṛṣyaṃ bhāradvājena rakṣitamc pārthāḥ samabhyavartanta bhīmasenapurogamāḥa sātyakiś cekitānaś ca dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥc kuntibhojaś ca vikrānto drupadaś ca mahārathaḥa ārjuniḥ kṣatradharmā ca bṛhatkṣatraś ca vīryavānc cedipo dhṛṣṭaketuś ca mādrīputrau ghaṭotkacaḥa yudhāmanyuś ca vikrāntaḥ śikhaṇḍī cāparājitaḥc uttamaujāś ca durdharṣo virāṭaś ca mahārathaḥa draupadeyāś ca saṃrabdhāḥ śaiśupāliś ca vīryavānc kekayāś ca mahāvīryāḥ sṛñjayāś ca sahasraśaḥa ete cānye ca sagaṇāḥ kṛtāstrā yuddhadurmadāḥc samabhyadhāvan sahasā bhāradvājaṃ yuyutsavaḥa samavetāṃs tu tān sarvān bhāradvājo pi vīryavānc asaṃbhrāntaḥ śaraugheṇa mahatā samavārayata mahaughāḥ salilasyeva girim āsādya durbhidamc droṇaṃ te nābhyavartanta velām iva jalāśayāḥa pīḍyamānāḥ śarai rājan droṇacāpaviniḥsṛtaiḥc na śekuḥ pramukhe sthātuṃ bhāradvājasya pāṇḍavāḥa tad adbhutam apaśyāma droṇasya bhujayor balamc yad enaṃ nābhyavartanta pāñcālāḥ sṛñjayaiḥ sahaa tam āyāntam abhikruddhaṃ droṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā yudhiṣṭhiraḥc bahudhā cintayām āsa droṇasya prativāraṇama aśakyaṃ tu tam anyena droṇaṃ matvā yudhiṣṭhiraḥc aviṣahyaṃ guruṃ bhāraṃ saubhadre samavāsṛjata vāsudevād anavaraṃ phalgunāc cāmitaujasamc abravīt paravīraghnam abhimanyum idaṃ vacaḥa etya no nārjuno garhed yathā tāta tathā kuruc cakravyūhasya na vayaṃ vidma bhedaṃ kathaṃ canaa tvaṃ vārjuno vā kṛṣṇo vā bhindyāt pradyumna eva vāc cakravyūhaṃ mahābāho pañcamo nyo na vidyatea abhimanyo varaṃ tāta yācatāṃ dātum arhasic pitṝṇāṃ mātulānāṃ ca sainyānāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥa dhanaṃjayo hi nas tāta garhayed etya saṃyugātc kṣipram astraṃ samādāya droṇānīkaṃ viśātaya abhimanyur uvāca śṛṇu rājan mahābāho vacanaṃ mama suvrata purā garbhagate vāpi cakravyūhapraveśanam mukhāt kṛṣṇasya rājendra śrutam asmi mayā prabho tasmād vyūhaṃ praviśyāmi cakrākhyaṃ nṛpasattamaa droṇasya dṛḍham avyagram anīkapravaraṃ yudhic pitṝṇāṃ jayam ākāṅkṣann avagāhe bhinadmi caa upadiṣṭo hi me pitrā yogo nīkasya bhedanec notsahe tu vinirgantum ahaṃ kasyāṃ cid āpadi yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa bhindhy anīkaṃ yudhā śreṣṭha dvāraṃ saṃjanayasva naḥc vayaṃ tvānugamiṣyāmo yena tvaṃ tāta yāsyasia dhanaṃjayasamaṃ yuddhe tvāṃ vayaṃ tāta saṃyugec praṇidhāyānuyāsyāmo rakṣantaḥ sarvatomukhāḥ bhīma uvācaa ahaṃ tvānugamiṣyāmi dhṛṣṭadyumno tha sātyakiḥc pāñcālāḥ kekayā matsyās tathā sarve prabhadrakāḥa sakṛd bhinnaṃ tvayā vyūhaṃ tatra tatra punaḥ punaḥc vayaṃ pradhvaṃsayiṣyāmo nighnamānā varān varān abhimanyur uvāca yāto ham arjunād rājan subhadrāyāṃ tathaiva ca mahadbalena saṃpūrṇaṃ paśyadhvaṃ pauruṣaṃ mama sarvān haniṣyāmi kurūn droṇamukhyān narādhipa yaiḥ kṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ karma pāṇḍavānāṃ mahātmanām jyeṣṭhā mātā madīyā yat sabhāṃ nītā durāsadaiḥ duḥśāsanena ca tadā pāpena duṣṭakarmaṇā pāñcālāṃ prati rājendra yat kṛtaṃ duṣṭakāribhiḥ tat sarvaṃ cādya tadvyūhe darśayiṣyāmi lāghavāta aham etat pravekṣyāmi droṇānīkaṃ durāsadamc pataṃga iva saṃkruddho jvalitaṃ jātavedasama tat karmādya kariṣyāmi hitaṃ yad vaṃśayor dvayoḥc mātulasya ca yā prītir bhaviṣyati pituś ca mea śiśunaikena saṃgrāme kālyamānāni saṃghaśaḥb dusthāni sarvasainyāni matkathā    c adya drakṣyanti bhūtāni dviṣatsainyāni vai mayād nāhaṃ pārthena jātaḥ syāṃ na ca jātaḥ subhadrayād yadi me saṃyuge kaś cij jīvito sumitrāśvān raṇe kṣipraṃ droṇānīkāya codaya saṃjaya uvācaa saubhadras tu vacaḥ śrutvā dharmarājasya dhīmataḥc acodayata yantāraṃ droṇānīkāya bhārataa tena saṃcodyamānas tu yāhi yāhīti sārathiḥc pratyuvāca tato rājann abhimanyum idaṃ vacaḥa atibhāro yam āyuṣmann āhitas tvayi pāṇḍavaiḥc saṃpradhārya kṣamaṃ buddhyā tatas tvaṃ yoddhum arhasia ācāryo hi kṛtī droṇaḥ paramāstre kṛtaśramaḥc atyantasukhasaṃvṛddhas tvaṃ ca yuddhaviśāradaḥd droṇo hi kṛtavān yatnaṃ śastrāstrakṛtaniśramaḥd tvaṃ tu bālaḥ sa balavān saṃgrāmāṇām akovidaḥa tato bhimanyuḥ prahasan sārathiṃ vākyam abravītc sārathe ko nv ayaṃ droṇaḥ samagraṃ kṣatram eva vād vyavasāyo hi me yoddhuṃ raṇotsavasamudbhavaḥa airāvatagataṃ śakraṃ sahāmaragaṇair ahamb athavā rudram īśānaṃ sarvabhūtagaṇair vṛtamc yodhayeyaṃ raṇamukhe na me kṣatre dya vismayaḥd yac caitat paśyase sūta sayodhāśvarathadvipame na mamaitad dviṣatsainyaṃ kalām arhati ṣoḍaśīm evam apy ucyamānaḥ sa sārathis taṃ punaḥ punaḥ vīra te tena mā yuddham iti saubhadram abravīta api viśvajitaṃ viṣṇuṃ mātulaṃ prāpya sūtajac pitaraṃ cārjunaṃ saṃkhye na bhīr mām upayāsyatia tato bhimanyus tāṃ vācaṃ kadarthīkṛtya sāratheḥc yāhīty evābravīd enaṃ droṇānīkāya mācirama tataḥ saṃcodayām āsa hayān asya trihāyanānc nātihṛṣṭamanāḥ sūto hemabhāṇḍaparicchadāna te preṣitāḥ sumitreṇa droṇānīkāya vājinaḥc droṇam abhyadravan rājan mahāvegaparākramāḥa tam udīkṣya tathāyāntaṃ sarve droṇapurogamāḥc abhyavartanta kauravyāḥ pāṇḍavāś ca tam anvayuḥa sa karṇikārapravarocchritadhvajaḥsuvarṇavarmārjunir arjunād varaḥc yuyutsayā droṇamukhān mahārathānsamāsadat niśitadhārāgraiḥ śātravāṇām aśātayata vanāyujān pārvatīyān kāmbojāraṭṭabāhlikānc sthiravāladhikarṇākṣāñ javanān sādhuvāhinaḥa svārūḍhāñ śikṣitair yodhaiḥ śaktyṛṣṭiprāsayodhibhiḥc vidhvastacāmarakuthān padātyoghāṃs tvadīyān eva bhārataa evam ekena tāṃ senāṃ saubhadreṇa śitaiḥ śaraiḥc bhṛśaṃ viprahatāṃ dṛṣṭvā skandenevāsurīṃ camūma tvadīyās tava putrāś ca vīkṣamāṇā diśo daśac saṃśuṣkāsyāś calannetrāḥ prasvinnā lomaharṣaṇāḥa palāyanakṛtotsāhā nirutsāhā dviṣajjayec gotranāmabhir anyonyaṃ krandanto jīvitaiṣiṇaḥa hatān putrāṃs tathā pitṝn suhṛtsaṃbandhibāndhavānc prātiṣṭhanta samutsṛjya tvarayanto yodhān paryāpnuta narādhipama purābhimanyur lakṣyaṃ naḥ paśyatāṃ hanti vīryavānc tam ādravata mā bhaiṣṭa kṣipraṃ rakṣata kauravamd abhimanyur asau vīro viṣṇutulyaparākramaḥd saubhadro ayam āyāto asmāñ jetuṃ mahābalaḥa tataḥ kṛtajñā balinaḥ suhṛdo jitakāśinaḥc trāsyamānā bhayād vīraṃ parivavrus tavātmajama droṇo drauṇiḥ kṛpaḥ karṇaḥ kṛtavarmā ca saubalaḥc bṛhadbalo madrarājo bhūrir bhūriśravāḥ śalaḥa pauravo vṛṣasenaś ca visṛjantaḥ śitāñ śarānc saubhadraṃ śaravarṣeṇa mahatā samavākirana saṃmohayitvā tam atha duryodhanam amocayanc āsyād grāsam ivākṣiptaṃ mamṛṣe nārjunātmajaḥa tāñ śaraugheṇa mahatā sāśvasūtān mahārathānc vimukhīkṛtya saubhadraḥ siṃhanādam athānadata tasya nādaṃ tataḥ śrutvā siṃhasyevāmiṣaiṣiṇaḥc nāmṛṣyanta susaṃrabdhāḥ punar droṇamukhā rathāḥa ta enaṃ koṣṭhakīkṛtya rathavaṃśena māriṣac vyasṛjann iṣujālāni nānāliṅgāni saṃghaśaḥa tāny antarikṣe ciccheda pautras tava śitaiḥ śaraiḥc tāṃś caiva prativivyādha tad adbhutam ivābhavatd tato rathāḥ padātyoghāḥ kuñjarāḥ sādinaś ca haa tatas te kopitās tena śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥc parivavrur jighāṃsantaḥ saubhadram apalāyinama samudram iva paryastaṃ tvadīyaṃ tad balārṇavamc abhimanyur dadhāraiko veleva makarālayama śūrāṇāṃ yudhyamānānāṃ nighnatām itaretaramc abhimanyoḥ pareṣāṃ ca nāsīt kaś cit parāṅmukhaḥa tasmiṃs tu ghore saṃgrāme vartamāne bhayaṃkarec duḥsaho navabhir bāṇair abhimanyum avidhyataa duḥśāsano dvādaśabhiḥ kṛpaḥ śāradvatas tribhiḥc droṇas tu saptadaśabhiḥ śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥa viviṃśatis tu viṃśatyā kṛtavarmā ca saptabhiḥc bṛhadbalas tathāṣṭābhir aśvatthāmā ca saptabhiḥa bhūriśravās tribhir bāṇair madreśaḥ ṣaḍbhir āśugaiḥc dvābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ śakunis tribhir duryodhano nṛpaḥa sa tu tān prativivyādha tribhis tribhir ajihmagaiḥc nṛtyann iva mahārāja cāpahastaḥ pratāpavāna tato bhimanyuḥ saṃkruddhas tāpyamānas tavātmajaiḥc vidarśayan vai sumahac chikṣaurasakṛtaṃ balama garuḍānilaraṃhobhir yantur vākyakarair hayaiḥb abhyadravata taṃ kārṣṇim aśmakendraḥ kṛtatvaraḥc dāntair aśmakadāyādaṃ tvaramāṇo bhyahārayate vivyādha cainaṃ daśabhir bāṇais tiṣṭheti cābravīta tasyābhimanyur daśabhir bāṇaiḥ sūtaṃ hayān dhvajamc bāhū dhanuḥ śiraś corvyāṃ smayamāno bhyapātayata tatas tasmin hate vīre saubhadreṇāśmakeśvarec saṃcacāla balaṃ sarvaṃ palāyanaparāyaṇama tataḥ karṇaḥ kṛpo droṇo drauṇir gāndhārarāṭ śalaḥc śalyo bhūriśravāḥ krāthaḥ somadatto viviṃśatiḥa vṛṣasenaḥ suṣeṇaś ca kuṇḍabhedī pratardanaḥc vṛndārako lalitthaś ca prabāhur dīrghalocanaḥe duryodhanaś ca saṃkruddhaḥ śaravarṣair avākirana so tikruddho maheṣvāsair abhimanyur ajihmagaiḥc śaram ādatta karṇāya parakāyāvabhedanama tasya bhittvā tanutrāṇaṃ dehaṃ nirbhidya cāśugaḥc prāviśad dharaṇīṃ rājan valmīkam iva pannagaḥa sa tenātiprahāreṇa vyathito vihvalann ivac saṃcacāla raṇe karṇaḥ kṣitikampe yathācalaḥa athānyair niśitair bāṇaiḥ suṣeṇaṃ dīrghalocanamc kuṇḍabhediṃ ca saṃkruddhas tribhis trīn avadhīd balīa karṇas taṃ pañcaviṃśatyā nārācānāṃ samarpayatc aśvatthāmā ca viṃśatyā kṛtavarmā ca saptabhiḥa sa śarārditasarvāṅgaḥ kruddhaḥ śakrātmajātmajaḥc vicaran dṛśyate sainye pāśahasta ivāntakaḥa śalyaṃ ca bāṇavarṣeṇa samīpastham avākiratc udakrośan mahābāhus tava sainyāni bhīṣayana tataḥ sa viddho stravidā marmabhidbhir ajihmagaiḥc śalyo rājan rathopasthe niṣasāda mumoha caa taṃ hi viddhaṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā saubhadreṇa yaśasvināc saṃprādravac camūḥ sarvā bhāradvājasya paśyataḥa prekṣantas taṃ mahābāhuṃ rukmapuṅkhaiḥ samāvṛtamc tvadīyāś ca palāyante mṛgāḥ siṃhārditā ivad eko nekāñ jaghānāśu prāṇinām antako yathād kālāgnisadṛśo vīrye mātariśveva vai javed yudhyamāno mahābāhuḥ śakratulyaparākramaḥd jaghāna samare sarvān nānāśastraviśāradānd itīva teṣāṃ samare mahātmād pratāpavān nītivatāṃ variṣṭhaḥd yuddhe ca tasmin sa mahābalo ripūṃśd cakāra sarvān iṣubhiḥ pradagdhānd saubhadraśaranirbhiṇṇāḥ samare maravikramāḥd evaṃ śalyo vimṛditas tava pautreṇa bhārataa sa tu raṇayaśasābhipūjyamānaḥpitṛsuracāraṇasiddhayakṣasaṃghaiḥc avanitalagataiś ca bhūtasaṃghairativibabhau udakrośan mahāśabdaṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīta tasyārjuniḥ śirogrīvaṃ pāṇipādaṃ dhanur hayānc chatraṃ dhvajaṃ niyantāraṃ triveṇuṃ śamyupaskarama cakre yugeṣāṃ tūṇīrān anukarṣaṃ ca sāyakaiḥc patākāṃ cakragoptārau sarvopakaraṇāni cae vyadhamal lāghavāt tac ca dadṛśe nāsya kaś canaa sa papāta kṣitau kṣīṇaḥ praviddhābharaṇāmbaraḥc vāyuneva mahācaityaḥ saṃbhagno mitatejasāe anugāś cāsya vitrastāḥ prādravan sarvatodiśama ārjuneḥ karma tad dṛṣṭva praṇeduś ca samantataḥc nādena sarvabhūtāni sādhu sādhv iti bhārataa śalyabhrātary athārugṇe bahuśas tasya sainikāḥc kulādhivāsanāmāni śrāvayanto rjunātmajama abhyavartanta saṃkruddhā vividhāyudhapāṇayaḥc rathair aśvair gajaiś cānye pādātaiś ca balotkaṭāḥa bāṇaśabdena mahatā khuranemisvanena cac huṃkāraiḥ kṣveḍitotkruṣṭaiḥ siṃhanādaiḥ sagarjitaiḥa jyātalatrasvanair anye garjanto rjunanandanamc bruvantaś ca na no jīvan mokṣyase jīvatām itia tāṃs tathā bruvato dṛṣṭvā saubhadraḥ prahasann ivac yo yaḥ sma prāharat pūrvaṃ taṃ taṃ vivyādha patribhiḥa saṃdarśayiṣyann astrāṇi citrāṇi ca laghūni cac ārjuniḥ samare śūro mṛdupūrvam ayudhyataa vāsudevād upāttaṃ yad yad astraṃ ca dhanaṃjayātc adarśayata tat kārṣṇiḥ kṛṣṇābhyām aviśeṣayana dūram asyan guruṃ bhāraṃ sādhayaṃś ca punaḥ punaḥc saṃdadhad visṛjaṃś ceṣūn nirviśeṣam adṛśyataa cāpamaṇḍalam evāsya visphurad dikṣv adṛśyatac tamo ghnataḥ sudīptasya savitur maṇḍalaṃ yathāa jyāśabdaḥ śuśruve tasya talaśabdaś ca dāruṇaḥc mahāśanimucaḥ kāle payodasyeva nisvanaḥa hrīmān amarṣī saubhadro mānakṛt priyadarśanaḥc saṃmimānayiṣur vīrān iṣvāsāṃś cāpy ayudhyataa mṛdur bhūtvā mahārāja dāruṇaḥ samapadyatac varṣābhyatīto bhagavāñ śaradīva divākaraḥa śarān vicitrān mahato rukmapuṅkhāñ śilāśitānc mumoca śataśaḥ kruddho gabhastīn iva bhāskaraḥa kṣuraprair vatsadantaiś ca vipāṭhaiś ca mahāyaśāḥc nārācair ardhanārācair bhallair ajñalikair apid tāṃs tathā dravato dṛṣṭvā saubhadraḥ prahasann ivaa avākirad rathānīkaṃ bhāradvājasya paśyataḥc tatas tat sainyam abhavad vimukhaṃ śarapīḍitam dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa dvaidhībhavati me cittaṃ hriyā tuṣṭyā ca saṃjayac mama putrasya yat sainyaṃ saubhadraḥ samavārayatc   mama pautro jighāṃsatic yathā caiva hi yat sainyaṃd yat sainyaṃ mama putrasya mama pautraḥ prabādhatea vistareṇaiva me śaṃsa sarvaṃ gāvalgaṇe punaḥc vikrīḍitaṃ kumārasya skandasyevāsuraiḥ saha saṃjaya uvācaa hanta te saṃpravakṣyāmi vimardam atidāruṇamc ekasya ca bahūnāṃ ca yathāsīt tumulo raṇaḥa abhimanyuḥ kṛtotsāhaḥ kṛtotsāhān ariṃdamānc rathastho rathinaḥ sarvāṃs tāvakān apy aharṣayata droṇaṃ karṇaṃ kṛpaṃ śalyaṃ drauṇiṃ bhojaṃ bṛhadbalamc duryodhanaṃ saumadattiṃ śakuniṃ ca mahābalama nānānṛpān nṛpasutān sainyāni vividhāni cac alātacakravat sarvāṃś caran bāṇaiḥ samabhyayāta nighnann amitrān saubhadraḥ paramāstraḥ pratāpavānc adarśayata sindhurājasya tat karma prekṣyāśraddheyam uttamamd vivyadhuḥ śaravarṣeṇa samantān nṛpasattamāḥd saṃchādyamāno bahubhiḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathaiḥd na vivyathe mahārāja divyam astram upāśritaḥd chittvā ca tāñ śarān rājañ śaravarṣaiḥ pṛthagvidhaiḥd chādayām āsa tān sarvāṃs tad abhūd romaharṣaṇama saṃkruddhān pāṇḍavān eko yad dadhārāstratejasāc tat tasya karma bhūtāni sarvāṇy evābhyapūjayana saubhadreṇa hataiḥ pūrvaṃ sottarāyudhibhir dvipaiḥc pāṇḍūnāṃ darśitaḥ panthāḥ saindhavena nivāritaḥa yatamānās tu te vīrā matsyapāñcālakekayāḥc pāṇḍavāś cānvapadyanta pratyaikaśyena saindhavama yo yo hi yatate abhavad raudraṃ saubhadrasyāribhiḥ sahaa teṣāṃ śarān seṣvasanāñ śarīrāṇi śirāṃsi cac sakuṇḍalāni sragvīṇi kruddhaś ciccheda phālguniḥa sakhaḍgāḥ sāṅgulitrāṇāḥ sapaṭṭiśaparaśvadhāḥc adṛśyanta bhujāś bṛhadbalamc aśītyā kṛtavarmāṇaṃ kṛpaṃ ṣaṣṭyā śilīmukhaiḥa rukmapuṅkhair mahāvegair ākarṇasamacoditaiḥc avidhyad daśabhir bāṇair aśvatthāmānam ārjuniḥa sa karṇaṃ karṇinā karṇe pītena niśitena cac phālgunir dviṣatāṃ madhye vivyādha parameṣuṇāa pātayitvā kṛpasyāśvāṃs tathobhau pārṣṇisārathīc athainaṃ daśabhir bāṇaiḥ pratyavidhyat stanāntarea tato vṛndārakaṃ vīraṃ kurūṇāṃ kīrtivardhanamc putrāṇāṃ tava vīrāṇāṃ paśyatām avadhīd balīa taṃ drauṇiḥ pañcaviṃśatyā kṣudrakāṇāṃ samarpayatc varaṃ varam amitrāṇām ārujantam abhītavata sa tu bāṇaiḥ śitais tūrṇaṃ pratyavidhyata māriṣac paśyatāṃ pratyavidhyad asaṃbhrāntas tad adbhutam ivābhavata māgadhasya punaḥ putraṃ hatvā ṣaḍbhir ajihmagaiḥc sāśvaṃ sasūtaṃ taruṇam aśvaketum apātayata mārtikāvatakaṃ bhojaṃ tataḥ kuñjaraketanamb jayākāṅkṣī kṛtavān idam apriyama na lubdho budhyate doṣān mohāl lobhaḥ pravartatec madhu lipsur hi nāpaśyaṃ prapātam idam īdṛśama yo hi bhojye puraskāryo yāneṣu śayaneṣu cac bhūṣaṇeṣu ca so smābhir bālo yudhi puraskṛtaḥa kathaṃ hi bālas taruṇo yuddhānām aviśāradaḥc sadaśva iva saṃbādhe viṣame kṣemam arhatia no ced dhi vayam apy enaṃ mahīm anuśayīmahic bībhatsoḥ kopadīptasya dagdhāḥ kṛpaṇacakṣuṣāa alubdho matimān hrīmān kṣamāvān rūpavān balīc vapuṣmān mānakṛd vīraḥ priyaḥ satyaparāyaṇaḥa yasya ślāghanti vibudhāḥ karmāṇy ūrjitakarmaṇaḥc nivātakavacāñ jaghne kālakeyāṃś ca vīryavāna mahendraśatravo yena hiraṇyapuravāsinaḥc akṣṇor nimeṣamātreṇa paulomāḥ sagaṇā hatāḥa parebhyo py abhayārthibhyo yo dadāty abhayaṃ vibhuḥc tasyāsmābhir na śakitas trātum adyātmajo bhayāta bhayaṃ tu sumahat prāptaṃ dhārtarāṣṭraṃ mahad balamc pārthaḥ putravadhāt kruddhaḥ kauravāñ śoṣayiṣyatia kṣudraḥ kṣudrasahāyaś ca svapakṣakṣayam āturaḥc vyaktaṃ duryodhano dṛṣṭvā śocan hāsyati jīvitama na me jayaḥ prītikaro na rājyaṃna cāmaratvaṃ na suraiḥ salokatāc imaṃ samīkṣyāprativīryapauruṣaṃnipātitaṃ devavarātmajātmajamd saṃjaya uvācad evaṃ vilapamāne tu kuntīputre yudhiṣṭhired kṛṣṇadvaipāyanas tatra ājagāma mahān ṛṣiḥd tam arcitvā yathānyāyam upaviṣṭaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraḥd abravīc chokasaṃtapto bhrātuḥ putravadhena saḥd adharmayuktair bahubhiḥ parivārya mahārathaiḥd yudhyamāno maheṣvāsaiḥ saubhadro nihato raṇed bālaś cābālabuddhiś ca saubhadraḥ paravīrahād anupāyena saṃgrāme yudhyamāno vināśitaḥd mayā proktaḥ sa saṃgrāme dvāraṃ saṃjanayasva naḥd praviṣṭe ca parāṃs tasmin saindhavena sma vāritāḥd nanu nāma samaṃ yuddham eṣṭavyaṃ yuddhajīvibhiḥd idaṃ caivāsamaṃ yuddham īdṛśaṃ prakṛtaṃ paraiḥd tenāsmi bhṛśasaṃtaptaḥ śokabāṣpasamākulaḥd śamaṃ naivādhigacchāmi cintayānaḥ punaḥ punaḥd taṃ tathā vilapantaṃ vai śokabāṣpasamākulamd uvāca bhagavān vyāso yudhiṣṭhiram idaṃ vacaḥd yudhiṣṭhira mahāprājña sarvaśāstraviśāradad vyasaneṣu na muhyanti tvādṛśā bharatarṣabhad svargam eṣa gataḥ śūraḥ śatrūn hatvā bahūn raṇed abālasadṛśaṃ karma kṛtvā vai puruṣottamaḥd anatikramaṇīyo vai vidhir eṣa yudhiṣṭhirad devadānavagandharvān mṛtyur harati bhāratad yudhiṣṭhira uvācad ime vai pṛthivīpālāḥ śerate pṛthivītaled nihatāḥ pṛtanāmadhye mṛtasaṃjñā mahābalāḥd nāgāyutabalāś cānye vāyuvegabalās tathād naiṣāṃ paśyāmi hantāraṃ prāṇināṃ saṃyuge kva citd vikrameṇopapannā hi tejobalasamanvitāḥd atha ceme hatāḥ prājñāḥ śerate vigatāyuṣaḥd mṛtā iti ca śabdo yaṃ vartate ca gatārthavatd ime mṛtā mahīpālāḥ prāyaśo bhīmavikramāḥd rājaputrāś ca saṃrabdhā vaiśvānaramukhaṃ gatāḥd atra me saṃśayaḥ prāptaḥ kutaḥ saṃjñā mṛtā itid kasya mṛtyuḥ kuto mṛtyuḥ kena mṛtyur imāḥ prajāḥd saṃjaya uvācad haraty amarasaṃkāśa tan me brūhi pitāmahad taṃ tathā paripṛcchantaṃ kuntīputraṃ yudhiṣṭhiramd āśvāsanam idaṃ vākyam uvāca bhagavān ṛṣiḥd atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamd akampanasya kathitaṃ nāradena purā nṛpad sa cāpi rājā rājendra putravyasanam uttamamd aprasahyatamaṃ loke prāptavān iti me matiḥd tad ahaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi mṛtyoḥ prabhavam uttamamd tatas tvaṃ mokṣyase duḥkhāt snehabaṃdhanasaṃśrayātd purā vṛttam idaṃ tāta śṛṇu kīrtayato mamad dhanyam ākhyānam āyuṣyaṃ śokaghnaṃ puṣṭivardhanamd purā kṛtayuge tāta āsīd rājā hy akampanaḥd sa śatruvaśam āpanno madhye saṃgrāmamūrdhanid tasya putro harir nāma nārāyaṇasamadyutiḥd śrīmān kṛtāstro medhāvī yudhi śakrasamo balīd sa śatrubhiḥ parivṛto bahudhā raṇamūrdhanid vyasyan bāṇasahasrāṇi yodheṣu ca gajeṣu cad sa karma duṣkaraṃ kṛtvā saṃgrāme śatrutāpanaḥd śatrubhir nihataḥ saṃkhye pṛtanāyāṃ yudhiṣṭhirad sa rājā pretakṛtyāni tasya kṛtvā śucānvitaḥd śocann ahani rātrau ca nālabhat sukham ātmanaḥd tasya śokaṃ viditvā tu putravyasanasaṃbhavamd athājagāma devarṣir nārado sya samīpataḥd sa tu rājā mahābhāgo dṛṣṭvā devarṣisattamamd pūjayitvā yathānyāyaṃ kathām akathayat tadād tasya sarvaṃ samācaṣṭa yathā vṛttaṃ nareśvarad śatrubhir vijayaṃ saṃkhye putrasya ca vadhaṃ tathād mama putro mahāvīrya indraviṣṇusamadyutiḥd śatrubhir bahubhiḥ saṃkhye parākramya hato balīd ka eṣa mṛtyur bhagavan kiṃvīryabalapauruṣaḥd etad icchāmi tattvena śrotuṃ matimatāṃ varad tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā nārado varadaḥ prabhuḥd ākhyānam idam ācaṣṭa putraśokāpahaṃ mahatd nārada uvācad śṛṇu rājan mahābāho ākhyānaṃ bahuvistaramd yathā vṛttaṃ śrutaṃ caiva mayāpi vasudhādhipad prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā tadā brahmā ādisarge pitāmahaḥd asaṃhṛtaṃ mahātejā dṛṣṭvā jagad idaṃ prabhuḥd tasya cintā samutpannā saṃhāraṃ prati pārthivad cintayan na hy asau veda saṃhāraṃ vasudhādhipad tasya roṣān mahārāja khebhyo gnir udatiṣṭhatad tena sarvā diśo vyāptāḥ sāntardeśā didhakṣatād tato divaṃ bhuvaṃ khaṃ ca jvālāmālāsamāvṛtamd carācaraṃ jagat sarvaṃ dadāha bhagavān prabhuḥd tato hatāni bhūtāni carāṇi sthāvarāṇi cad mahatā krodhavegena trāsayann iva vīryavānd tato haro jaṭī sthāṇur niśācarapatiḥ śivaḥd jagāma śaraṇaṃ devaṃ brahmāṇaṃ parameṣṭhinamd tasminn āpatite sthāṇau prajānāṃ hitakāmyayād abravīt paramo devo jvalann iva mahāmuniḥd kiṃ kurma kāmaṃ kāmārha kāmāj jāto si putrakad sthāṇur uvācad kariṣyāmi priyaṃ sarvaṃ brūhi sthāṇo yad icchasid prajāsarganimittaṃ hi kṛto yatnas tvayā vibhod tvayā sṛṣṭāś ca vṛddhāś ca bhūtagrāmāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥd tās taveha punaḥ krodhāt prajā dahyanti sarvaśaḥd brahmovācad tā dṛṣṭvā mama kāruṇyaṃ prasīda bhagavan prabhod na krudhye na ca me kāma etad evaṃ bhaved itid pṛthivyā hitakāmāt tu tato māṃ manyur āviśatd iyaṃ hi māṃ sadā devī bhārārtā samacūcudatd saṃhārārthaṃ mahādeva bhāreṇābhihatā satīd tato haṃ nādhigacchāmi tapye bahuvidhaṃ tadād sthāṇur uvācad saṃhāram aprameyasya tato māṃ manyur āviśatd saṃhārārthaṃ prasīdasva mā ruṣo vibudhādhipad mā prajāḥ sthāvarāś caiva jaṅgamāś ca vyanīnaśand tava prasādād bhagavann idaṃ vartet tridhā jagatd anāgatam atītaṃ ca yac ca saṃprati vartated bhagavān krodhasaṃdīptaḥ krodhād agniṃ samāsṛjatd sa dahaty aśmakūṭāni drumāṃś ca saritas tathād palvalāni ca sarvāṇi sarve caiva tṛṇolapāḥd sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva niḥśeṣaṃ kurute jagatd tad etad bhasmasād bhūtaṃ sarvaṃ jagad anāvilamd prasīda bhagavan sa tvaṃ roṣo na syād varo mamad sarve hi naṣṭā neṣyanti tava deva kathaṃ canad tasmān nivartatāṃ tejas tvayy eveha pralīyatāmd upāyam anyaṃ saṃpaśya prajānāṃ hitakāmyayād yatheme prāṇinaḥ sarve nivarteraṃs tathā kurud abhāvaṃ neha gaccheyur utsannajananāḥ prajāḥd adhidaive niyukto smi tvayā lokeṣu lokahand mā vinaśyej jagannātha jagat sthāvarajaṅgamamd nārada uvācad prasādābhimukhaṃ devaṃ tasmād evaṃ bravīmy ahamd śrutvā hi vacanaṃ devaḥ sthāṇor nihatapāpmanaḥd tejaḥ saṃveṣṭayām āsa punar evāntarātmanid tato gnim upasaṃhṛtya bhagavāṃl lokasatkṛtaḥd pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca kalpayām āsa vai prabhuḥd upasaṃharatas tasya tam agniṃ roṣajaṃ tathād prādurbabhūva viśvebhyaḥ khebhyo nārī mahātmanaḥd kṛṣṇā raktāmbaradharā raktajihvāsyalocanād kuṇḍalābhyāṃ ca rājendra taptābhyāṃ samalaṃkṛtād sā viniḥsṛtya vai khebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āśritād smayamāneva cāvaikṣad devau viśveśvarāv ubhaud tām āhūya tadā devo lokādinidhaneśvaraḥd mṛtyo iti mahīpāla jahi cemāḥ prajā itid tvaṃ hi saṃhārabuddhyātha prādurbhūtā ruṣo mamad tasmāt saṃhara sarvās tvaṃ prajāḥ sajaḍapaṇḍitāḥd mama tvaṃ hi niyogena tataḥ śreyo hy avāpsyasid evam uktā tu sā tena mṛtyuḥ kamalalocanād dadhyau cātyartham abalā praruroda ca susvaramd pāṇibhyāṃ pratijagrāha tāny aśrūṇi pitāmahaḥd nārada uvācad sarvabhūtahitārthāya tāṃ cāpy anunayat tadād vinīya duḥkham abalā ātmany eva prajāpatimd uvāca prāñjalir bhūtvā latevāvarjitā punaḥd tvayā sṛṣṭā kathaṃ nārī īdṛśī vadatāṃ varad krūraṃ karmāhitaṃ kuryāṃ mūḍheva kim u jānatīd bibhemy aham adharmād dhi prasīda bhagavan prabhod priyān putrān vayasyāṃś ca bhrātṝn mātṝḥ pitṝn patīnd anudhyāsyanti ye deva mṛtāṃs teṣāṃ bibhemy ahamd kṛpaṇānāṃ hi rudatāṃ ye patanty aśrubindavaḥd tebhyo hi balavad bhītā śaraṇaṃ tvāham āgatād yamasya bhavanaṃ deva na gaccheyaṃ surottamad prasādaye tvā varada mūrdhnodagranakhena cad etad icchāmy ahaṃ kāmaṃ tvatto lokapitāmahad iccheyaṃ tvatprasādād vai tapas taptuṃ prajeśvarad pradiśemaṃ varaṃ deva tvaṃ mahyaṃ bhagavan prabhod tvayā hy uktā gamiṣyāmi dhenukāśramam uttamamd tatra tapsye tapas tīvraṃ tavaivārādhane ratād na hi śakṣyāmi deveśa prāṇān prāṇabhṛtāṃ priyānd brahmovācad hartuṃ vilapamānānām adharmād abhirakṣa māmd mṛtyo saṃkalpitāsi tvaṃ prajāsaṃhārahetunād gaccha saṃhara sarvās tvaṃ prajā mā te vicāraṇād bhavitā tv etad evaṃ hi naitaj jātv anyathā bhavetd nārada uvācad bhavatv aninditā loke kuruṣva vacanaṃ mamad evam uktābhavadbhītā prāñjalir bhagavanmukhīd saṃhāre nākarod buddhiṃ prajānāṃ hitakāmyayād tūṣṇīm āsīt tadā devaḥ prajānām īśvareśvaraḥd prasādaṃ cāgamat kṣipram ātmany eva pitāmahaḥd smayamānaś ca lokeśo lokān sarvān avaikṣatad lokāś cāsan yathāpūrvaṃ dṛṣṭās tenāpamanyunād nivṛttaroṣe tasmiṃs tu bhagavaty aparājited sā kanyāpi jagāmātha samīpāt tasya dhīmataḥd apasṛtyāpratiśrutya prajāsaṃharaṇaṃ tadād tvaramāṇā ca rājendra mṛtyur dhenukam abhyayātd sā tatra paramaṃ tīvraṃ cacāra vratam uttamamd samāhitaikapādena tasthau padmāni ṣoḍaśad pañca cānyāni kāruṇyāt prajānām abhayaiṣiṇīd indriyāṇīndriyārthebhyaḥ priyebhyaḥ saṃnivartya sād tatas tv ekena pādena punar anyāni sapta vaid tasthau padmāni ṣaṭ caiva sapta caikaṃ ca pārthivad tataḥ padmāyutaṃ tāta mṛgaiḥ saha cacāra sād punar gatvā tato nandāṃ puṇyāṃ śītāmalodakāmd apsu varṣasahasrāṇi sapta caikaṃ ca sānayatd dhārayitvā tu niyamaṃ nandāyāṃ vītakalmaṣād sā pūrvaṃ kauśikīṃ puṇyāṃ jagāma niyame dhṛtād tatra vāyujalāhārā cacāra niyutaṃ punaḥd pañcagaṅge ca sā puṇye kanyā vetasakeṣu cad tapoviśeṣair bahubhiḥ karśayad deham ātmanaḥd tato gatvā mahāgaṅgāṃ mahāmeruṃ ca kevalamd tasthau cāśmeva niśceṣṭā prāṇāyāmaparāyaṇād punar himavato mūrdhni yatra devā purāyajand tatrāṅguṣṭena sā tasthau nikharvaṃ paramā śubhād puṣkareṣv atha gokarṇe naimiṣe malaye tathād akarśayat svakaṃ dehaṃ niyamair manasaḥ priyaiḥd ananyadevatā nityaṃ dṛḍhabhaktā pitāmahed tasthau pitāmahaṃ caiva toṣayām āsa dharmataḥd tatas tām abravīt prīto lokānāṃ prabhavo vyayaḥd mṛtyo kim idam atyarthaṃ tapāṃsi carasīti had tato bravīt punar mṛtyur bhagavantaṃ pitāmahamd nāhaṃ hanyāṃ prajā deva svasthāś cākrośatīs tathād etad icchāmi sarveśa tvatto varam ahaṃ prabhod adharmabhayabhītāsmi tato haṃ tapa āsthitād bhītāyās tu mahābhāga prayacchābhayam avyayad ārtā cānāgasī nārī yācāmi bhava me gatiḥd tām abravīt tato devo bhūtabhavyabhaviṣyavitd adharmo nāsti te mṛtyo saṃharantyā imāḥ prajāḥd mayā coktaṃ mṛṣā bhadre bhavitā na kathaṃ canad tasmāt saṃhara kalyāṇi prajāḥ sarvāś caturvidhāḥd dharmaḥ sanātanaś ca tvā sarvathānupravekṣyatid lokapālo yamaś caiva sahāyā vyādhayas tathād ahaṃ ca vibudhāś caiva punar dāsyāma te varamd yathā tvam enasā muktā virajāḥ khyātim eṣyasid saivam uktā mahārāja kṛtāñjalir idaṃ vibhumd punar evābravīd vākyaṃ prasādya śirasā tadād yady evam etat kartavyaṃ mayā na syād vinā prabhod tavājñā mūrdhni me nyastā yat te vakṣyāmi tac chṛṇud lobhaḥ krodho bhyasūyerṣyā droho mohaś ca dehināmd brahmovācad ahrīś cānyonyaparuṣā dehaṃ bhindyuḥ pṛthagvidhāḥd tathā bhaviṣyate mṛtyo sādhu saṃhara vai prajāḥd adharmas te na bhavitā nāpadhyāsyāmy ahaṃ śubhed yāny aśrubindūni kare samāsated te vyādhayaḥ prāṇinām ātmajātāḥd te mārayiṣyanti narān gatāsūnd nādharmas te bhavitā mā sma bhaiṣīḥd dharmo mṛtyo māraṇe prāṇināṃ ted tvaṃ vai dharmas tvaṃ hi dharmasya ceśād dharmyā bhūtvā dharmanityā dharitrīd tasmāt prāṇān medinīṃ gātrair āditya iva pātitaḥd subhadrāṃ nanu śocāmi yā putram apalāyinama raṇe vinihataṃ śrutvā śokārtā vai vinaṃkṣyatib śrutvā nipatitaṃ śūram anaghaṃ kṛtalāghavamc subhadrā vakṣyate kiṃ mām abhimanyum apaśyatīe draupadī caiva duḥkhārte te ca vakṣyāmi kiṃ nv ahama vajrasāramayaṃ nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ yan na yāsyatic sahasradhā vadhūṃ dṛṣṭvā rudatīṃ śokakarśitāma hṛṣṭānāṃ dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ siṃhanādo mayā śrutaḥc yuyutsuś cāpi kṛṣṇena śruto vīrān upālabhana aśaknuvanto bībhatsuṃ bālaṃ hatvā mahārathāḥc kiṃ nadadhvam adharmajñāḥ pārthe vai dṛśyatāṃ balama kiṃ tayor vipriyaṃ kṛtvā keśavārjunayor mṛdhec siṃhavan nadata prītāḥ śokakāla upasthitea āgamiṣyati vaḥ kṣipraṃ phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥc adharmo hi kṛtas tīvraḥ kathaṃ syād aphalaś cirama iti tān prati bhāṣan vai vaiśyāputro mahāmatiḥc apāyāc chastram utsṛjya kopaduḥkhasamanvitaḥa kimartham etann ākhyātaṃ tvayā kṛṣṇa raṇe mamac adhakṣyaṃ tān ahaṃ sarvāṃs tadā krūrān mahārathānd bālam ekaṃ parikṣipya hatvā hṛṣṭān pranarditānd saṃjaya uvācad putraśokārditaṃ pārthaṃ dhyāyantaṃ sāśrulocanama nigṛhya vāsudevas taṃ putrādhibhir abhiplutamc maivam ity abravīt kṛṣṇas tīvraśokasamanvitama sarveṣām eṣa vai panthāḥ śūrāṇām anivartināmc kṣatriyāṇāṃ viśeṣeṇa yeṣāṃ yuddhena jīvikāa eṣā vai yudhyamānānāṃ śūrāṇām anivartināmc vihitā dharmaśāstrajñair gatir gatimatāṃ varaa dhruvaṃ yuddhe hi maraṇaṃ śūrāṇām anivartināmc gataḥ puṇyakṛtāṃ lokān abhimanyur na saṃśayaḥa etac ca sarvavīrāṇāṃ kāṅkṣitaṃ bharatarṣabhac saṃgrāme bhimukhā mṛtyuṃ prapnuyāmeti mānadaa sa ca vīrān raṇe hatvā rājaputrān mahābalānc vīrair ākāṅkṣitaṃ mṛtyuṃ saṃprāpto bhimukho raṇea mā śucaḥ puruṣavyāghra pūrvair eṣa sanātanaḥc dharmakṛdbhiḥ kṛto dharmaḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ raṇe kṣayaḥa ime te bhrātaraḥ sarve dīnā bharatasattamac tvayi śokasamāviṣṭe nṛpāś ca suhṛdas tavaa etāṃs tvaṃ vacasā sāmnā samāśvāsaya mānadac viditaṃ veditavyaṃ te na śokaṃ kartum arhasid kālo grasati kaunteya viśvam etac carācaramd nālaṃ buddhis tathāpy asya pumān vāpi virajyated utpattau ca vipattau ca karmaṇā galahastinād baddhaḥ śakuntavaj jīvo madhye svapnopamā gatiḥd na śocanti kṛtaprajñāḥ śvasatām upakalpanātd nūnaṃ jātena martavyaṃ kim u śocasi bālavata evam āśvāsitaḥ pārthaḥ kṛṣṇenādbhutakarmaṇāc tato bravīt tadā bhrātṝn sarvān pārthaḥ sagadgadāna sa dīrghabāhuḥ pṛthvaṃso dīrgharājīvalocanaḥc abhimanyur yathā vṛttaḥ śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ tathāa sanāgasyandanahayān drakṣyadhvaṃ nihatān mayāc saṃgrāme sānubandhāṃs tān mama putrasya vairiṇaḥd kṣipraṃ drakṣyanti me nūnaṃ mama putraṃ nihatya vaia kathaṃ ca vaḥ kṛtāstrāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ śastrapāṇināmc saubhadro nidhanaṃ gacched vajriṇāpi samāgataḥa yady evam aham ajñāsyam aśaktān rakṣaṇe mamac putrasya pāṇḍupāñcālān mayā gupto bhavet tataḥd sūnoḥ pāṇḍavapāñcālān agopsyaṃ taṃ mahāraṇea kathaṃ ca vo rathasthānāṃ śaravarṣāṇi muñcatāmc nīto bhimanyur nidhanaṃ kadarthīkṛtya vaḥ paraiḥa aho vaḥ pauruṣaṃ nāsti na ca vo sti parākramaḥc yatrābhimanyuḥ samare paśyatāṃ vo nipātitaḥa ātmānam eva garheyaṃ yad ahaṃ vaḥ sudurbalānc yuṣmān ājñāya niryāto bhīrūn akṛtaniśramāna āho svid bhūṣaṇārthāya varmaśastrāyudhāni vaḥc vācaś ca vaktuṃ saṃsatsu mama putram arakṣatāma evam uktvā tato vākyaṃ tiṣṭhaṃś cāpavarāsimānc na smāśakyata bībhatsuḥ kena cit prasamīkṣituma tam antakam iva kruddhaṃ niḥśvasantaṃ muhur muhuḥb mahendram iva tiṣṭhantaṃ vajrodyatamahābhujamc putraśokābhisaṃtaptam aśrupūrṇamukhaṃ tadāa nābhibhāṣṭuṃ śaknuvanti draṣṭuṃ vā suhṛdo rjunamc anyatra vāsudevād vā jyeṣṭād vā pāṇḍunandanāta sarvāsv avasthāsu hitāv arjunasya manonugauc bahumānāt priyatvāc ca tāv enaṃ vaktum arhataḥa tatas taṃ putraśokena bhṛśaṃ pīḍitamānasamc rājīvalocanaṃ kruddhaṃ rājā vacanam abravīt yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa tvayi yāte mahābāho saṃśaptakabalaṃ pratic prayatnam akarot tīvram ācāryo grahaṇe mamaa vyāḍhānīkaṃ vayaṃ droṇaṃ varayāmaḥ sma sarvaśaḥc prativyūhya rathānīkaṃ yatamānaṃ tathā raṇea sa vāryamāṇo rathibhī rakṣitena mayā tathāc asmān api jaghānāśu pīḍayan niśitaiḥ śaraiḥa te pīḍyamānā droṇena droṇānīkaṃ na śaknumaḥc prativīkṣitum apy ājau bhettuṃ tat kuta eva tua vayaṃ tv apratimaṃ vīrye sarve saubhadram ātmajamc uktavantaḥ sma te tāta bhindhy anīkam iti prabhod tatas tam apratiratham ahaṃ saubhadram abravamd droṇānīkam idaṃ bhindhi dvāraṃ saṃjanayasva naḥa sa tathā codito smābhiḥ sadaśva iva vīryavānc asahyam api taṃ bhāraṃ voḍhum evopacakramea sa tavāstropadeśena vīryeṇa ca samanvitaḥc prāviśat tad balaṃ bālaḥ suparṇa iva sāgarama te nuyātā vayaṃ vīraṃ sātvatīputram āhavec praveṣṭukāmās tenaiva yena sa prāviśac camūma tataḥ saindhavako rājā kṣudras tāta jayadrathaḥc varadānena rudrasya sarvān naḥ samavārayata tato droṇaḥ kṛpaḥ karṇo drauṇiś ca sa bṛhadbalaḥc kṛtavarmā ca saubhadraṃ ṣaḍ rathāḥ paryavārayana parivārya tu taiḥ sarvair yudhi bālo mahārathaiḥc yatamānaḥ paraṃ śaktyā bahubhir virathīkṛtaḥa tato dauḥśāsaniḥ kṣipraṃ tathā tair virathīkṛtamc saṃśayaṃ paramaṃ prāpya diṣṭāntenābhyayojayatd gadāhasto bhyayāt tūrṇaṃ jighāṃsur aparājitamd gadinaṃ tv atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā vāsavasyātmajātmajaḥd sa jagrāha gadāṃ vīro gadāyuddhaviśāradaḥd gadāmaṇḍalamārgasthau sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥd tau saṃprajahratur vīrāv anyonyasyāntaraiṣiṇaud tāv anyonyaṃ gadāgrābhyāṃ tāḍitau yuddhadurmadaud indradhvajāv ivotsṛṣṭau gatasattvau mahīṃ gataua sa tu hatvā sahasrāṇi dvipāśvarathasādināmb aṣṭau rathasahasrāṇi nava dantiśatāni cac rājaputraśataṃ cāgryaṃ vīrāṃś cālakṣitān bahūna bṛhadbalaṃ ca rājānaṃ svargeṇājau prayojya hab tato duryodhanasutaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ hatavān balīb gataḥ sukṛtināṃ lokān ye ca svargajitāṃ śubhāḥb adīnas trāsayañ śatrūn nandayitvā ca bāndhavānb asakṛn nāma viśrāvya pitṝṇāṃ mātulasya cac tataḥ paramadharmātmā diṣṭāntam upajagmivānd vīro diṣṭāntam āpannaḥ śocayan bāndhavān bahūnd tataḥ sma śokasaṃtaptā bhavatādya sameyuṣaḥa etāvad eva nirvṛttam asmākaṃ śokavardhanamc sa caivaṃ puruṣavyāghraḥ svargalokam avāptavān saṃjaya uvācaa tato rjuno vacaḥ śrutvā dharmarājena bhāṣitamc hā putra iti niḥśvasya vyathito nyapatad bhuvid vyathito nyapatad bhūmau duḥkhārtaḥ sa mumoha caa viṣaṇṇavadanāḥ sarve parigṛhya dhanaṃjayamc netrair animiṣair dīnāḥ pratyavekṣan parasparama pratilabhya tataḥ saṃjñāṃ vāsaviḥ krodhamūrchitaḥc kampamāno jvareṇeva niḥśvasaṃś ca muhur muhuḥa pāṇiṃ pāṇau viniṣpiṣya śvasamāno śrunetravānb triśikhāṃ bhrukuṭīṃ kṛtvā krodhasaṃraktalocanaḥc unmatta iva viprekṣann idaṃ vacanam abravīta satyaṃ vaḥ pratijānāmi śvo smi hantā jayadrathamc na ced vadhabhayād bhīto dhārtarāṣṭrān prahāsyatia na cāsmāñ śaraṇaṃ gacchet kṛṣṇaṃ vā puruṣottamamc bhavantaṃ vā mahārāja śvo smi hantā jayadrathama dhārtarāṣṭrapriyakaraṃ mayi vismṛtasauhṛdamb mayi vismṛtasauhārdaṃ duryodhanahite ratamc pāpaṃ bālavadhe hetuṃ śvo smi hantā jayadrathama rakṣamāṇāś ca taṃ saṃkhye ye māṃ yotsyanti ke canac api droṇakṛpau vīrau chādayiṣyāmi tāñ śaraiḥd rājan droṇamukhāṃs tāṃs tān vārayiṣyāmy ahaṃ śaraiḥa yady etad evaṃ saṃgrāme na kuryāṃ puruṣarṣabhāḥc mā sma puṇyakṛtāṃ lokān prāpnuyāṃ śūrasaṃmatāna ye lokā mātṛhantṝṇāṃ ye cāpi pitṛghātināmc gurudāragāmināṃ ye ca piśunānāṃ ca ye tathāa sādhūn asūyatāṃ ye ca ye cāpi parivādināmc ye ca nikṣepahartṝṇāṃ ye ca viśvāsaghātināma bhuktapūrvāṃ striyaṃ ye ca nindatām aghaśaṃsināmc brahmaghnānāṃ ca ye lokā ye ca goghātinām apia pāyasaṃ vā yavānnaṃ vā śākaṃ kṛsaram eva vāc saṃyāvāpūpamāṃsāni ye ca lokā vṛthāśnatāmd adattvā bhuñjatāṃ yā vai māṃsaṃ vā sā gatir mamae tān ahnaivādhigaccheyaṃ na ced dhanyāṃ jayadrathama vedādhyāyinam atyarthaṃ saṃśitaṃ vā dvijottamamc avamanyamāno yān yāti vṛddhān sādhūṃs tathā gurūna spṛśatāṃ brāhmaṇaṃ gāṃ ca pādenāgniṃ ca yāṃ labhetc yāpsu śleṣma purīṣaṃ vā mūtraṃ vā muñcatāṃ gatiḥe tāṃ gaccheyaṃ gatiṃ ghorāṃ na ced dhanyāṃ jayadrathamf śītabhītāś ca ye viprā raṇabhītāś ca kṣatriyāḥf teṣāṃ gatiṃ gamiṣyāmi na ced dhanyāṃ jayadrathama nagnasya snāyamānasya yā ca vandhyātither gatiḥc utkocināṃ mṛṣoktīnāṃ vañcakānāṃ ca yā gatiḥe ātmāpahāriṇāṃ yā ca yā ca mithyābhiśaṃsināma bhṛtyaiḥ saṃdṛśyamānānāṃ putradārāśritais tathāc asaṃvibhajya kṣudrāṇāṃ yā gatir mṛṣṭam aśnatāmd yaḥ pratyavasito vipro na saṃnyāsaṃ punaś caretd prāyaścittena yasya syāc chuddhas tasya ca yā gatiḥe tāṃ gaccheyaṃ gatiṃ ghorāṃ na ced dhanyāṃ jayadrathama saṃśritaṃ vāpi yas tyaktvā sādhuṃ tadvacane ratamc na bibharti nṛśaṃsātmā nindate copakāriṇamd tathā devalakāñ śrāddhe satataṃ paṅktidūṣakānd ye bhojayanti saṃmūḍhās tāṃ gatiṃ samavāpnuyāma arhate prātiveśyāya śrāddhaṃ yo na dadāti cac anarhate ca yo dadyād vṛṣalīpatyur eva cad matsyakacchapabhakṣāṇāṃ bhakṣyamastakaśāyināmd saindhavānāṃ gatiṃ yāmi śvo na hanyāṃ jayadrathama madyapo bhinnamaryādaḥ kṛtaghno bhrātṛnindakaḥc teṣāṃ gatim iyāṃ kṣipraṃ na ced dhanyāṃ jayadrathama dharmād apetā ye cānye mayā nātrānukīrtitāḥc ye cānukīrtitāḥ kṣipraṃ teṣāṃ gatim avāpnuyāme yadi vyuṣṭām imāṃ rātriṃ śvo na hanyāṃ jayadrathama rājñāṃ ca samakṣaṃ pṛthivīpatea asurasuramanuṣyāḥ pakṣiṇo voragā vāpitṛrajanicarā vā brahmadevarṣayo vāc caram acaram apīdaṃ yat paraṃ cāpi tasmāttad api mama ripuṃ taṃ rakṣituṃ naiva śaktāḥa yadi viśati rasātalaṃ tadagryaṃviyad api devapuraṃ diteḥ puraṃ vāc tad api śaraśatair ahaṃ prabhātebhṛśam abhipatya ripoḥ śiro bhihartāa evam uktvā vicikṣepa gāṇḍīvaṃ savyadakṣiṇamc tasya śabdam atikramya dhanuḥśabdo spṛśad divama arjunena pratijñāte pāñcajanyaṃ janārdanaḥc pradadhmau tatra saṃkruddho devadattaṃ dhanaṃjayaḥa sa pāñcajanyo cyutavaktravāyunābhṛśaṃ supūrṇodaraniḥsṛtadhvaniḥc jagat sapātālaviyaddigīśvaraṃprakampayām āsa yugātyaye yathāa tato vāditraghoṣāś ca prādurāsan samantataḥc siṃhanādāś ca pāṇḍūnāṃ pratijñāte mahātmanād anṛtyad iva gāṇḍīvaṃ śarās tūṇīgatā mudād nirākrāmann iva tadā svayam eva mṛdhaiṣiṇaḥd bhīmasenas tu saṃhṛṣṭaḥ pratyabhāṣata bhāratad dhanaṃjayam abhiprekṣya harṣagadgadayā girād pratijñodbhavaśabdena kṛṣṇaśaṅkhasvanena cad nihato dhārtarāṣṭro yaṃ sānubandhaḥ suyodhanaḥd atha mṛditatamāgryadāmamālyaṃd tava sutaśokamayaṃ ca roṣajātamd vyapanudati mahāprabhāvam etand naravara vākyam idaṃ mahārtham iṣṭamd saṃjaya uvācad atha śaṅkhaiś ca bherībhiḥ paṇavaiḥ sainikās tathād sasūtamāgadhā jiṣṇuṃ stutibhiḥ samapūjayand tadā bhīmaṃ balaṃ sarvaṃ tena nādena mohitamd tāvakaṃ tan mahārājaṃ viṣaṇṇaṃ samapadyata saṃjaya uvācaa śrutvā tu taṃ mahāśabdaṃ pāṇḍūnāṃ putragṛddhināmc cāraiḥ pravedite tatra samutthāya jayadrathaḥa śokasaṃmūḍhahṛdayo duḥkhenābhihato bhṛśamc majjamāna ivāgādhe vipule śokasāgarea jagāma samitiṃ rājñāṃ saindhavo vimṛśan bahuc sa teṣāṃ naradevānāṃ sakāśe paridevayana abhimanyoḥ pitur bhītaḥ savrīḍo vākyam abravītc yo sau pāṇḍoḥ kila kṣetre jātaḥ śakreṇa kāmināa sa ninīṣati durbuddhir māṃ kilaikaṃ yamakṣayamc tat svasti vo stu yāsyāmi svagṛhaṃ jīvitepsayāa atha vā stha pratibalās trātuṃ māṃ kṣatriyarṣabhāḥc pārthena prārthitaṃ vīrās te dadantu mamābhayama droṇaduryodhanakṛpāḥ karṇamadreśabāhlikāḥc duḥśāsanādayaḥ śaktās trātum apy antakādritama kim aṅga punar ekena phalgunena jighāṃsatāb pratijñātaṃ na jānāmi sarvān vijñāpayāmi vaḥc na trāyeyur bhavanto māṃ samastāḥ patayaḥ kṣiteḥa praharṣaṃ pāṇḍaveyānāṃ śrutvā mama mahad bhayamc sīdantīva ca me ṅgāni mumūrṣor iva pārthivāḥa vadho nūnaṃ pratijñāto mama gāṇḍīvadhanvanāc tathā hi hṛṣṭāḥ krośanti śokakāle pi pāṇḍavāḥd vaśam eṣyanti catvāras tam ṛte sarvapāṇḍavāḥa na devā na ca gandharvā nāsuroragarākṣasāḥc utsahante nyathā kartuṃ kuta eva narādhipāḥa tasmān mām anujānīta bhadraṃ vo stu nararṣabhāḥc adarśanaṃ gamiṣyāmi na māṃ drakṣyanti pāṇḍavāḥd vṛttam āsthāya tanyūjyaṃ sicsopanīto bhavāmy ahamd duḥśalā bhrātṛsauhārdān māṃ rakṣasyatha vā dhruvama evaṃ vilapamānaṃ taṃ bhayād vyākulacetasamc ātmakāryagarīyastvād rājā duryodhano bravīta na bhetavyaṃ naravyāghra ko hi tvā puruṣarṣabhac madhye kṣatriyavīrāṇāṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ prārthayed yudhid eṣāṃ hi naradevānāṃ mattamātaṅgagāmināmd saṃghātam upayātānām api bibhyet puraṃdaraḥa ahaṃ vaikartanaḥ karṇaś citraseno viviṃśatiḥc bhūriśravāḥ śalaḥ śalyo vṛṣaseno durāsadaḥa purumitro jayo bhojaḥ kāmbojaś ca sudakṣiṇaḥc satyavrato mahābāhur vikarṇo durmukhaḥ sahaḥa duḥśāsanaḥ subāhuś ca kaliṅgaś cāpy udāyudhaḥc vindānuvindāv āvantyau droṇo drauṇiḥ sasaubalaḥd ete cānye ca bahavo nānājanapadeśvarāḥd sasainyās tvābhiyāsyanti vyetu te mānaso jvaraḥd māyāvī balavāñ śūro rākṣasaś cāpy alambusaḥd ime ca tvābhigopsyanti sainyena mahatā vṛtāḥa tvaṃ cāpi rathināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ svayaṃ śūro mitadyutiḥc sa kathaṃ pāṇḍaveyebhyo bhayaṃ paśyasi saindhavaa akṣauhiṇyo daśaikā ca madīyās tava rakṣaṇec yattā yotsyanti mā bhais tvaṃ saindhava vyetu te bhayama evam āśvāsito rājan putreṇa tava saindhavaḥc duryodhanena sahito droṇaṃ rātrāv upāgamata upasaṃgrahaṇaṃ kṛtvā droṇāya sa viśāṃ patec upopaviśya praṇataḥ paryapṛcchad idaṃ tadād arjunasyātmanaś cārthe viśeṣaṃ paryapṛcchataa nimitte dūrapātitve laghutve dṛḍhavedhanec mama bravītu bhagavān viśeṣaṃ phalgunasya caa vidyāviśeṣam icchāmi jñātum ācārya tattvataḥc mamārjunasya ca vibho yathātattvaṃ pracakṣva me droṇa uvācaa samam ācāryakaṃ tāta tava caivārjunasya cac yogād duḥkhocitatvāc ca tasmāt tvatto dhiko rjunaḥa na tu te yudhi saṃtrāsaḥ kāryaḥ pārthāt kathaṃ canac ahaṃ hi rakṣitā tāta bhayāt tvāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥa na hi madbāhuguptasya prabhavanty amarā apic vyūhiṣyāmi ca taṃ vyūhaṃ yaṃ pārtho na tariṣyatia tasmād yudhyasva mā bhais tvaṃ svadharmam anupālayac pitṛpaitāmahaṃ mārgam anuyāhi narādhipaa adhītya vidhivad vedān agnayaḥ suhutās tvayāc iṣṭaṃ ca bahubhir yajñair na te mṛtyubhayād bhayama durlabhaṃ mānuṣair mandair mahābhāgyam avāpya tuc bhujavīryārjitāṃl lokān divyān prāpsyasy anuttamāna kuravaḥ pāṇḍavāś caiva vṛṣṇayo nye ca mānavāḥc ahaṃ ca saha putreṇa adhruvā iti cintyatāma paryāyeṇa vayaṃ sarve kālena balinā hatāḥc paralokaṃ gamiṣyāmaḥ svaiḥ svaiḥ karmabhir anvitāḥa tapas taptvā tu yāṃl lokān prāpnuvanti tapasvinaḥc kṣatradharmāśritāḥ śūrāḥ kṣatriyāḥ prāpnuvanti tān saṃjaya uvācaa evam āśvāsito rājan bhāradvājena saindhavaḥc apānudad bhayaṃ pārthād yuddhāya ca mano dadhed tataḥ praharṣaḥ sainyānāṃ tavāpy āsīd viśāṃ pated vāditrāṇāṃ dhvaniś cograḥ siṃhanādaravaiḥ saha saṃjaya uvācaa pratijñāte tu pārthena sindhurājavadhe tadāc vāsudevo mahābāhur dhanaṃjayam abhāṣataa bhrātṝṇāṃ matam ājñāya tvayā vācā pratiśrutamc saindhavaṃ śvo smi hanteti tat sāhasatamaṃ kṛtama asaṃmantrya mayā sārdham atibhāro yam udyataḥc kathaṃ nu sarvalokasya nāvahāsyā bhavemahia dhārtarāṣṭrasya śibire mayā praṇihitāś carāḥc ta ime śīghram āgamya pravṛttiṃ vedayanti naḥa tvayā vai saṃpratijñāte sindhurājavadhe tadāb saṃśrute sindhurājasya vadhe gāṇḍīvadhanvanāc siṃhanādaḥ savāditraḥ sumahān iha taiḥ śrutaḥa tena śabdena vitrastā dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ sasaindhavāḥc nākasmāt siṃhanādo yam iti matvā vyavasthitāḥa sumahāñ śabdasaṃpātaḥ kauravāṇāṃ mahābhujac āsīn nāgāśvapattīnāṃ rathaghoṣaś ca bhairavaḥa abhimanyuvadhaṃ śrutvā dhruvam ārto dhanaṃjayaḥc rātrau niryāsyati krodhād iti matvā vyavasthitāḥa tair yatadbhir iyaṃ satyā śrutā satyavatas tavac pratijñā sindhurājasya vadhe rājīvalocanaa tato vimanasaḥ sarve trastāḥ kṣudramṛgā ivac āsan suyodhanāmātyāḥ sa ca rājā jayadrathaḥa athotthāya sahāmātyair dīnaḥ śibiram ātmanaḥb bhṛśaṃ vimanaso bhūtvā śibirāṇi svakāni tec āyāt sauvīrasindhūnām īśvaro bhṛśaduḥkhitaḥa sa mantrakāle saṃmantrya sarvā naiḥśreyasīḥ kriyāḥc suyodhanam idaṃ vākyam abravīd rājasaṃsadia mām asau putrahanteti śvo bhiyātā dhanaṃjayaḥc pratijñāto hi senāyā madhye tena vadho mamad mama putratro hato nena haniṣye haṃ jayadrathamd iti vāco bahuvidhāḥ pārthena pratijñā kṛtāa tāṃ na devā na gandharvā nāsuroragarākṣasāḥc utsahante nyathā kartuṃ pratijñāṃ savyasācinaḥa te māṃ rakṣata saṃgrāme mā vo mūrdhni dhanaṃjayaḥc padaṃ kṛtvāpnuyāl lakṣyaṃ tasmād atra vidhīyatāma atha rakṣā na me saṃkhye kriyate kurunandanac anujānīhi māṃ rājan gamiṣyāmi gṛhān pratia evam uktas tv avākśīrṣo vimanāḥ sa suyodhanaḥc śrutvābhiśaptavantaṃ tvāṃ dhyānam evānvapadyataa tam ārtam abhisaṃprekṣya rājā kila sa saindhavaḥc mṛdu cātmahitaṃ caiva sāpekṣam idam uktavāna nāhaṃ paśyāmi bhavatāṃ tathāvīryaṃ dhanurdharamc yo rjunasyāstram astreṇa pratihanyān mahāhavea vāsudevasahāyasya gāṇḍīvaṃ dhunvato dhanuḥc ko rjunasyāgratas tiṣṭhet sākṣād api śatakratuḥd arjunasyāgrato yoddhuṃ bibhiyād api devarāṭa maheśvaro pi pārthena śrūyate yodhitaḥ purāc padātinā mahātejā girau himavati prabhuḥa dānavānāṃ sahasrāṇi hiraṇyapuravāsināmc jaghān ekarathenaiva devarājapracoditaḥa samāyukto hi kaunteyo vāsudevena dhīmatāc sāmarān api lokāṃs trīn nihanyād iti me matiḥd yathā dāśarathiṃ rāmaṃ sahāyaṃ prāpya durdharamd vālinaṃ ghātayām āsa sugrīvo sau tathātra māma so ham icchāmy anujñātuṃ rakṣituṃ vā mahātmanāc droṇena sahaputreṇa vīreṇa yadi manyasea sa rājñā svayam ācāryo bhṛśam ākrandito rjunac saṃvidhānaṃ ca vihitaṃ rathāś ca kila sajjitāḥa karṇo bhūriśravā drauṇir vṛṣasenaś ca durjayaḥc kṛpaś ca madrarājaś ca ṣaḍ ete sya purogamāḥa śakaṭaḥ padmapaś cārdho vyūho droṇena kalpitaḥc padmakarṇikamadhyasthaḥ sūcīpāśe jayadrathaḥe sthāsyate rakṣito vīraiḥ sindhurāḍ yuddhadurmadaiḥa dhanuṣy astre ca vīrye ca prāṇe caiva tathorasic aviṣahyatamā hy ete niścitāḥ pārtha ṣaḍ rathāḥe etān ajitvā sagaṇān naiva prāpyo jayadrathaḥa teṣām ekaikaśo vīryaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ tvam anucintayac sahitā hi naravyāghrā na śakyā jetum añjasāa bhūyaś ca cintayiṣyāmi nītim ātmahitāya vaic mantrajñaiḥ sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ suhṛdbhiḥ kāryasiddhaye arjuna uvācaa ṣaḍ rathān dhārtarāṣṭrasya manyase yān balādhikānc teṣāṃ vīryaṃ mamārdhena na tulyam iti lakṣayea astram astreṇa sarveṣām eteṣāṃ madhusūdanac mayā drakṣyasi nirbhinnaṃ jayadrathavadhaiṣiṇād paśyatas te nihantāsmi yadi te vajradhāriṇaḥa droṇasya miṣataḥ so haṃ sagaṇasya vilapyataḥc mūrdhānaṃ sindhurājasya pātayiṣyāmi bhūtalea yadi sādhyāś ca rudrāś ca vasavaś ca sahāśvinaḥc marutaś ca sahendreṇa viśvedevās tathāsurāḥa pitaraḥ sahagandharvāḥ suparṇāḥ sāgarādrayaḥc dyaur viyat pṛthivī ceyaṃ diśaś ca sadigīśvarāḥa grāmyāraṇyāni bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi cac trātāraḥ sindhurājasya bhavanti madhusūdanaa tathāpi bāṇair nihataṃ śvo draṣṭāsi raṇe mayāc satyena te śape kṛṣṇa tathaivāyudham ālabhea yaś ca goptā maheṣvāsas tasya pāpasya durmateḥc tam eva prathamaṃ droṇam abhiyāsyāmi keśavaa tasmin dyūtam idaṃ baddhaṃ manyate sma suyodhanaḥc tasmāt tasyaiva senāgraṃ bhittvā yāsyāmi saindhavama draṣṭāsi śvo maheṣvāsān nārācais tigmatejanaiḥc śṛṅgāṇīva girer vajrair dāryamāṇān mayā yudhid mayā nipātitān saṃkhye vajrair iva girivrajāna naranāgāśvadehebhyo visraviṣyati śoṇitamc patadbhyaḥ patitebhyaś ca vibhinnebhyaḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥa gāṇḍīvapreṣitā bāṇā manonilasamā javec nṛnāgāśvān videhāsūn kartāraś ca sahasraśaḥa yamāt kuberād varuṇād rudrād indrāc ca yan mayāc upāttam astraṃ ghoraṃ vai tad draṣṭāro narā yudhia brāhmeṇāstreṇa cāstrāṇi hanyamānāni saṃyugec mayā draṣṭāsi sarveṣāṃ saindhavasyābhirakṣiṇāma śaravegasamutkṛttai rājñāṃ keśava mūrdhabhiḥc āstīryamāṇāṃ pṛthivīṃ draṣṭāsi śvo mayā yudhid mayā draṣṭāsi vistīrṇāṃ kīryamāṇāṃ ca medinīma kravyādāṃs tarpayiṣyāmi drāvayiṣyāmi śātravānc suhṛdo nandayiṣyāmi pātayiṣyāmi saindhavama bahv āgaskṛt kusaṃbandhī pāpadeśasamudbhavaḥc mayā saindhavako rājā hataḥ svāñ śocayiṣyatia sarvakṣīrānnabhoktāraḥ pāpācārā raṇājirec mayā sarājakā bāṇair nunnā naṃkṣyanti saindhavāḥa tathā prabhāte kartāsmi yathā kṛṣṇa suyodhanaḥc nānyaṃ dhanurdharaṃ loke maṃsyate matsamaṃ yudhia gāṇḍīvaṃ ca dhanur divyaṃ yoddhā cāhaṃ nararṣabhac tvaṃ ca yantā hṛṣīkeśa kiṃ nu syād ajitaṃ mayād tava prasādād bhagavan kim ivāsti raṇe mamad aviṣahyaṃ hṛṣīkeśa kiṃ jānan māṃ vigarhasea yathā hi lakṣma candre vai samudre ca yathā jalamc evam etāṃ pratijñāṃ me satyāṃ viddhi janārdanad yathā rāmeṇa caikena sādhito daśakaṃdharaḥd vibhunā sādhayiṣyāmi tathā taṃ saindhavaṃ ripuma māvamaṃsthā mamāstrāṇi māvamaṃsthā dhanur dṛḍhamc māvamaṃsthā balaṃ bāhvor māvamaṃsthā dhanaṃjayama yathā hi yātvā saṃgrāme na jīye vijayāmi cac tena satyena saṃgrāme hataṃ viddhi jayadrathama dhruvaṃ vai brāhmaṇe satyaṃ dhruvā sādhuṣu saṃnatiḥc śrīr dhruvā cāpi dakṣeṣu dhruvo nārāyaṇe jayaḥd tvaṃ ca mādhava sarvaṃ tat tathā pratividhāsyasid yathā ripūṇāṃ miṣatāṃ pramathiṣyāmi saindhavam saṃjaya uvācaa evam uktvā hṛṣīkeśaṃ svayam ātmānam ātmanāc saṃdideśārjuno nardan vāsaviḥ keśavaṃ prabhuma yathā prabhātāṃ rajanīṃ kalpitaḥ syād ratho mamac tathā kāryaṃ tvayā kṛṣṇa kāryaṃ hi mahad udyatam saṃjaya uvācaa tāṃ niśāṃ duḥkhaśokārtau śvasantāv iva coragauc nidrāṃ naivopalebhāte vāsudevadhanaṃjayaud vāsudevārjunau vīrau na svapnam upalebhatuḥa naranārāyaṇau kruddhau jñātvā devāḥ savāsavāḥc vyathitāś cintayām āsuḥ kiṃ svid etad bhaviṣyatia vavuś ca dāruṇā vātā rūkṣā gorābhiśaṃsinaḥc sakabandhas tathāditye parighaḥ samadṛśyataa śuṣkāśanyaś ca niṣpetuḥ sanirghātāḥ savidyutaḥc cacāla cāpi pṛthivī saśailavanakānanāa cukṣubhuś ca mahārāja sāgarā makarālayāḥc pratisrotaḥ pravṛttāś ca tathā gantuṃ samudragāḥa rathāśvanaranāgānāṃ pravṛttam adharottaramc kravyādānāṃ pramodārthaṃ yamarāṣṭravivṛddhayea vāhanāni śakṛnmūtre mumucū ruruduś ca hac tān dṛṣṭvā dāruṇān sarvān utpātāṃl lomaharṣaṇānd dīnāś ca pārthivāḥ sarve nāśaṃsur jayam ātmanaḥa sarve te vyathitāḥ sainyās tvadīyā bharatarṣabhac śrutvā mahābalasyogrāṃ pratijñāṃ savyasācinaḥa atha kṛṣṇaṃ mahābāhur abravīt pākaśāsaniḥc āśvāsaya subhadrāṃ tvaṃ bhaginīṃ snuṣayā sahaa snuṣā śvaśvrānaghāyaste viśoke kuru mādhavac sāmnā satyena yuktena vacasāśvāsaya prabhoa tato rjunagṛhaṃ gatvā vāsudevaḥ sudurmanāḥc bhaginīṃ putraśokārtām āśvāsayata duḥkhitāma mā śokaṃ kuru vārṣṇeyi kumāraṃ prati sasnuṣāc sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ bhīru niṣṭhaiṣā kālanirmitāa kule jatasya vīrasya kṣatriyasya viśeṣataḥc sadṛśaṃ maraṇaṃ hy etat tava putrasya mā śucaḥa diṣṭyā mahāratho vīraḥ pitus tulyaparākramaḥc kṣātreṇa vidhinā prāpto vīrābhilaṣitāṃ gatima jitvā subahuśaḥ śatrūn preṣayitvā ca mṛtyavec gataḥ puṇyakṛtāṃ lokān sarvakāmaduho kṣayāna tapasā brahmacaryeṇa śrutena prajñayāpi cac santo yāṃ gatim icchanti prāptas tāṃ tava putrakaḥa vīrasūr vīrapatnī tvaṃ vīraśvaśurabāndhavāc mā śucas tanayaṃ bhadre gataḥ sa paramāṃ gatimd svādhyāyayuktaṃ brāhmaṇī yācitāraṃd gaurvoḍhāraṃ tv āśugantāram aśvād dāsaṃ śūdrā karmakaraṃ tu vaiśyād śūraṃ sūte tvadvidhā rājaputrīa prāpsyate cāpy asau kṣudraḥ saindhavo bālaghātakaḥc asyāvalepasya phalaṃ sasuhṛdgaṇabāndhavaḥa vyuṣṭāyāṃ tu varārohe rajanyāṃ pāpakarmakṛtc na hi mokṣyati pārthāt sa praviṣṭo py amarāvatīma śvaḥ śiraḥ śroṣyase tasya saindhavasya raṇe hṛtamc samantapañcakād bāhyaṃ viśokā bhava mā rudaḥa kṣatradharmaṃ puraskṛtya gataḥ śūraḥ satāṃ gatimc yāṃ vayaṃ prāpnuyāmeha ye cānye śastrajīvinaḥa vyūḍhorasko mahābāhur anivartī varapraṇutc gatas tava varārohe putraḥ svargaṃ jvaraṃ jahia anu jātaś ca pitaraṃ mātṛpakṣaṃ ca vīryavānc sahasraśo ripūn hatvā hataḥ śūro mahārathaḥa āśvāsaya snuṣāṃ rājñi mā śucaḥ kṣatriye bhṛṣamc śvaḥ priyaṃ sumahac chrutvā viśokā bhava nandinia yat pārthena pratijñātaṃ tat tathā na tad anyathāc cikīrṣitaṃ hi te bhartur na bhavej jātu niṣphalama yadi ca manujapannagāḥ piśācārajanicarāḥ patagāḥ surāsurāś cac raṇagatam abhiyānti sindhurājaṃna sa bhavitā saha tair api prabhāte saṃjaya uvācaa etac chrutvā vacas tasya keśavasya mahātmanaḥc subhadrā putraśokārtā vilalāpa suduḥkhitāa hā putra mama mandāyāḥ kathaṃ saṃyugam etya hac nidhanaṃ prāptavāṃs tāta pitṛtulyaparākramaḥa katham indīvaraśyāmaṃ sudaṃṣṭraṃ cārulocanamc mukhaṃ te dṛśyate vatsa guṇṭhitaṃ raṇareṇunāa nūnaṃ śūraṃ nipatitaṃ tvāṃ paśyanty anivartinamc suśirogrīvabāhvaṃsaṃ vyūḍhoraskaṃ nirūdarama cārūpacitasarvāṅgaṃ svakṣaṃ śastrakṣatācitamc bhūtāni tvā nirīkṣante nūnaṃ candram ivoditama śayanīyaṃ purā yasya spardhyāstaraṇasaṃvṛtamc bhūmāv adya kathaṃ śeṣe vipraviddhaḥ sukhocitaḥa yo nvāsyata purā vīro varastrībhir mahābhujaḥc katham anvāsyate so dya śivābhiḥ patito mṛdhea yo stūyata purā hṛṣṭaiḥ sūtamāgadhabandibhiḥc so dya kravyādgaṇair ghorair vinadadbhir upāsyatea pāṇḍaveṣu ca nātheṣu vṛṣṇivīreṣu cābhibhoc pāñcāleṣu ca vīreṣu hataḥ kenāsy anāthavatd yatra tvaṃ keśave nāthe satyanātho yathā hataḥa atṛptadarśanā putra darśanasya tavānaghac mandabhāgyā gamiṣyāmi vyaktam adya yamakṣayama viśālākṣaṃ sukeśāntaṃ cāruvākyaṃ sugandhi cac tava putra kadā bhūyo mukhaṃ drakṣyāmi nirvraṇamd ehy ehi tṛṣito vatsa stanau pūrṇau pibāśu med aṅkam āruhya mandāyā hy atṛptāyāś ca darśanea dhig balaṃ bhīmasenasya dhik pārthasya dhanuṣmatāmc dhig vīryaṃ vṛṣṇivīrāṇāṃ pāñcālānāṃ ca dhig balama dhik kekayāṃs tathā cedīn matsyāṃś caivātha sṛñjayānc ye tvā raṇe gataṃ vīraṃ na jānanti nipātitama adya paśyāmi pṛthivīṃ śūnyām iva hatatviṣamc abhimanyum apaśyantī śokavyākulalocanād sākṣān maghavataḥ pautraṃ putraṃ gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥd svasrīyaṃ vāsudevasya taṃ gṛdhrāḥ paryupāsatea svasrīyaṃ vāsudevasya putraṃ gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥc kathaṃ tvā virathaṃ vīraṃ drakṣyāmy anyair nipātitama hā vīra dṛṣṭo naṣṭaś ca dhanaṃ svapna ivāsi mec aho hy anityaṃ mānuṣyaṃ jalabudbudacañcalama imāṃ te taruṇīṃ bhāryāṃ tvadādhibhir abhiplutāmb uttarām uttarāṃ jātyā suśīlāṃ priyabhāṣiṇīmb śanakaiḥ parirabhyaināṃ snuṣāṃ mama yaśasvinīmb sukumārīṃ viśālākṣīṃ pūrṇacandranibhānanāmb bālapallavatanvaṅgīṃ mattamātaṅgagāminīmb bimbādharoṣṭhīm abalām abhimanyo praharṣayab tvayā vinā kathaṃ putra jīrṇāṃ patitamānasāmc kathaṃ saṃdhārayiṣyāmi vivatsām iva dhenukāma aho hy akāle prasthānaṃ kṛtavān asi putrakac vihāya phalakāle māṃ sugṛddhāṃ tava darśanea nūnaṃ gatiḥ kṛtāntasya prājñair api sudurvidāc yatra tvaṃ keśave nāthe saṃgrāme nāthavad dhataḥa yajvanāṃ dānaśīlānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ kṛtātmanāmc caritabrahmacaryāṇāṃ puṇyatīrthāvagāhināma kṛtajñānāṃ vadānyānāṃ guruśuśrūṣiṇām apic sahasradakṣiṇānāṃ ca yā gatis tām avāpnuhia yā gatir yudhyamānānāṃ śūrāṇām anivartināmc hatvārīn nihatānāṃ ca saṃgrāme tāṃ gatiṃ vrajaa gosahasrapradātṝṇāṃ kratudānāṃ ca yā gatiḥc naiveśikaṃ cābhimataṃ dadatāṃ yā gatiḥ śubhād brāhmaṇebhyaḥ śaraṇyebhyo nidhiṃ nidadhatāṃ ca yād yā cāpi nyastadaṇḍānāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ vraja putrakaa brahmacaryeṇa yāṃ yānti munayaḥ saṃśitavratāc ekapatnyaś ca yāṃ yānti tāṃ gatiṃ vraja putrakaa rājñāṃ sucaritair yā ca gatir bhavati śāśvatīc caturāśramiṇāṃ puṇyaiḥ pāvitānāṃ surakṣitaiḥa dīnānukampināṃ yā ca satataṃ saṃvibhāgināmc paiśunyāc ca nivṛttānāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ vraja putrakaa vratināṃ dharmaśīlānāṃ guruśuśrūṣiṇām apic amoghātithināṃ yā ca tāṃ gatiṃ vraja putrakad kṛcchreṣu yā dhārayatām ātmānaṃ vyasaneṣu cad gatiḥ śokāgnidagdhānāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ vraja putrakad pitur mātuś ca śuśrūṣāṃ kalpayantīha ye sadād svadāraniratānāṃ ca yā gatis tām avāpnuhia ṛtukāle svakāṃ patnīṃ gacchatāṃ yā manasvināmc na cānyadārasevīnāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ vraja putrakaa sāmnā ye sarvabhūtāni gacchanti gatamatsarāḥc nāruṃtudānāṃ kṣamiṇāṃ yā gatis tām avāpnuhia madhumāṃsanivṛttānāṃ madād dambhāt tathānṛtātc paropatāpatyaktānāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ vraja putrakaa hrīmantaḥ sarvaśāstrajñā jñānatṛptā jitendriyāḥc yāṃ gatiṃ sādhavo yānti tāṃ gatiṃ vraja putrakaa evaṃ vilapatīṃ dīnāṃ subhadrāṃ śokakarśitāmc abhyapadyata pāñcālī vairāṭīsahitā tadāa tāḥ prakāmaṃ ruditvā ca vilapya ca suduḥkhitāḥb draupadī śokasaṃtaptā ruditvā ca vilapya cac unmattavat tadā rājan visaṃjñā nyapatan kṣitaua sopacāras tu kṛṣṇas tāṃ duḥkhitāṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitaḥc siktvāmbhasā samāśvāsya tat tad uktvā hitaṃ vacaḥa visaṃjñakalpāṃ rudatīm apaviddhāṃ pravepatīmc bhaginīṃ puṇḍarīkākṣa idaṃ vacanam abravīta subhadre mā śucaḥ putraṃ pāñcālyāśvāsayottarāmc gato bhimanyuḥ prathitāṃ gatiṃ kṣatriyapuṃgavaḥa ye cānye pi kule santi puruṣā no varānanec sarve te vai gatiṃ yāntu abhimanyor yaśasvinaḥa kuryāma tad vayaṃ karma kriyāsuḥ suhṛdaś ca naḥc kṛtavān yādṛg adyaikas tava putro mahārathaḥa evam āśvāsya bhaginīṃ draupadīm api cottarāmc pārthasyaiva mahābāhuḥ pārśvam āgād ariṃdamaḥa tato bhyanujñāya nṛpān kṛṣṇo bandhūṃs tathābhibhūḥc viveśāntaḥpuraṃ rājaṃs te nye jagmur yathālayam saṃjaya uvācaa tato rjunasya bhavanaṃ praviśyāpratimaṃ vibhuḥc spṛṣṭvāmbhaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ sthaṇḍile śubhalakṣaṇee saṃtastāra śubhāṃ śayyāṃ darbhair vaiḍūryasaṃnibhaiḥa tato mālyena vidhival lājair gandhaiḥ sumaṅgalaiḥc alaṃcakāra tāṃ śayyāṃ parivāryāyudhottamaiḥa tataḥ spṛṣṭodakaṃ pārthaṃ vinītāḥ paricārakāḥc darśayāṃ naityakaṃ cakrur naiśaṃ traiyambakaṃ balima tataḥ prītamanāḥ pārtho gandhair mālyaiś ca mādhavamc alaṃkṛtyopahāraṃ taṃ naiśam asmai nyavedayata smayamānas tu govindaḥ phalgunaṃ pratyabhāṣatac supyatāṃ pārtha bhadraṃ te kalyāṇāya vrajāmy ahama sthāpayitvā tato dvāḥsthān goptṝṃś cāttāyudhān narānc dārukānugataḥ śrīmān viveśa śibiraṃ svakame śiśye ca śayane śubhre bahukṛtyaṃ vicintayanf pārthāya sarvaṃ bhagavāñ śokaduḥkhāpahaṃ vidhimf vyadadhāt puṇḍarīkākṣas tejodyutivivardhanamf yogam āsthāya yuktātmā sarveṣām īśvareśvaraḥf śreyaskāmaḥ pṛthuyaśā viṣṇur jiṣṇupriyaṃkaraḥa na pāṇḍavānāṃ śibire kaś cit suṣvāpa tāṃ niśāmc prajāgaraḥ sarvajanam āviveśa viśāṃ patea putraśokābhibhūtena pratijñāto mahātmanāc sahasā sindhurājasya vadho gāṇḍīvadhanvanāa tat kathaṃ nu mahābāhur vāsaviḥ paravīrahāc pratijñāṃ saphalāṃ kuryād iti te samacintayana kaṣṭaṃ hīdaṃ vyavasitaṃ pāṇḍavena mahātmanāb sa ca rājā mahāvīryaḥ pārayatv arjunaḥ satāmc putraśokābhitaptena pratijñā mahatī kṛtāa bhrātaraś cāpi vikrāntā bahulāni balāni cac dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putreṇa sarvaṃ tasmai niveditama sa hatvā saindhavaṃ saṃkhye punar etu dhanaṃjayaḥc jitvā ripugaṇāṃś caiva pārayatv arjuno vratamd sa jitvārigaṇān saṃkhe vārayitvā mahāvratamd yady asti sukṛtaṃ kiṃ cid asmākaṃ hantu saindhavamd jitvā sarvān ripūn pārthas trātuṃ no smān mahābhayātd evam āśaṃsamānās te ke cit tasthur upaśrutimd śrutvā ceṣṭaṃ sumanaso vyaktam āśaṃsire jayamd bhavitā nu kathaṃ kṛtyam idam ity apare bruvana ahatvā sindhurājaṃ hi dhūmaketuṃ pravekṣyatic na hy etad anṛtaṃ kartum arhaḥ pārtho dhanaṃjayaḥd mahad dhi sāhasaṃ pārthaḥ kṛtavāñ śokamohitaḥa dharmaputraḥ kathaṃ rājā bhaviṣyati mṛte rjunec tasmin hi vijayaḥ kṛtsnaḥ pāṇḍavena samāhitaḥd arjune hi jayas teṣām āyatto jīvitāni caa yadi naḥ sukṛtaṃ kiṃ cid yadi dattaṃ hutaṃ yadic phalena tasya sarvasya savyasācī jayatv arīna evaṃ kathayatāṃ teṣāṃ jayam āśaṃsatāṃ prabhoc kṛcchreṇa mahatā rājan rajanī vyatyavartataa tasyāṃ rajanyāṃ madhye tu pratibuddho janārdanaḥc smṛtvā pratijñāṃ pārthasya dārukaṃ pratyabhāṣataa arjunena pratijñātam ārtena hatabandhunāc jayadrathaṃ haniṣyāmi śvobhūta iti dārukaa tat tu duryodhanaḥ śrutvā mantribhir mantrayiṣyatic yathā jayadrathaṃ pārtho na hanyād iti saṃyugea akṣauhiṇyo hi tāḥ sarvā rakṣiṣyanti jayadrathamc droṇaś ca saha putreṇa sarvāstravidhipāragaḥa eko vīraḥ sahasrākṣo daityadānavamarditāc so pi taṃ notsahetājau hantuṃ droṇena rakṣitama so haṃ śvas tat kariṣyāmi yathā kuntīsuto rjunaḥc aprāpte staṃ dinakare haniṣyati jayadrathama na hi dārā na mitrāṇi jñātayo na ca bāndhavāḥc kaś cin nānyaḥ priyataraḥ kuntīputrān mamārjunāta anarjunam imaṃ lokaṃ muhūrtam api dārukac udīkṣituṃ na śakto haṃ bhavitā na ca tat tathāa ahaṃ dhvajinyaḥ śatrūṇāṃ sahayāḥ sarathadvipāḥc arjunārthe haniṣyāmi sakarṇāḥ sasuyodhanāḥa śvo nirīkṣantu me vīryaṃ trayo lokā mahāhavec dhanaṃjayārthaṃ samare parākrāntasya dārukaa śvo narendrasahasrāṇi rājaputraśatāni cac sāśvadviparathāny ājau vidraviṣyanti dārukaa śvas tāṃ cakrapramathitāṃ drakṣyase nṛpavāhinīmc mayā kruddhena samare pāṇḍavārthe nipātitāmd adya jñāsyanti tridaśāḥ sāsurāḥ sacarācarāḥd vāsudevasya tāṃ prītiṃ pāṇḍaveṣv anapāyinīma śvaḥ sadevāḥ sagandharvāḥ piśācoragarākṣasāḥc jñāsyanti lokāḥ sarve māṃ suhṛdaṃ savyasācinaḥa yas taṃ dveṣṭi sa māṃ dveṣṭi yas tam anu sa mām anuc iti saṃkalpyatāṃ buddhyā śarīrārdhaṃ mamārjunaḥa yathā tvam aprabhātāyām asyāṃ niśi rathottamamc kalpayitvā yathāśāstram ādāya vratasaṃyataḥa gadāṃ kaumodakīṃ divyāṃ śaktiṃ cakraṃ dhanuḥ śarānc āropya vai rathe sūta sarvopakaraṇāni caa sthānaṃ hi kalpayitvā ca rathopasthe dhvajasya mec vainateyasya vīrasya samare rathaśobhinaḥa chatraṃ jāmbūnadair jālair arkajvalanasaṃnibhaiḥc viśvakarmakṛtair divyair aśvān api ca bhūṣitāna balāhakaṃ meghapuṣpaṃ sainyaṃ sugrīvam eva cac yuktvā vājivarān yattaḥ kavacī tiṣṭha dārukaa pāñcajanyasya nirghoṣam ārṣabheṇaiva pūritamc śrutvā tu bhairavaṃ nādam upayāyā javena māma ekāhnāham amarṣaṃ ca sarvaduḥkhāni caiva hac bhrātuḥ pitṛṣvaseyasya vyapaneṣyāmi dārukaa sarvopāyair yatiṣyāmi yathā bībhatsur āhavec paśyatāṃ dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ haniṣyati jayadrathama yasya yasya ca bībhatsur vadhe yatnaṃ kariṣyatic āśaṃse sārathe tatra bhavitāsya dhruvo jayaḥ dāruka uvācaa jaya eva dhruvas tasya kuta eva parājayaḥc yasya tvaṃ puruṣavyāghra garuḍadhvajaḥa pratyutthānaṃ tu kṛṣṇasya sarvāvasthaṃ dhanaṃjayaḥc nālopayata dharmātmā bhaktyā premṇā ca sarvadāa pratyutthāya ca govindaṃ sa tasmāy āsanaṃ dadauc na cāsane svayaṃ buddhiṃ bībhatsur vyadadhāt tadāa tataḥ kṛṣṇo mahātejā jānan pārthasya niścayamc kuntīputram idaṃ vākyam āsīnaḥ sthitam abravīta mā viṣāde manaḥ pārtha kṛthāḥ kālo hi durjayaḥc kālaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni niyacchati pare vidhaua kimarthaṃ ca viṣādas te tad brūhi vadatāṃ varac na śocitavyaṃ viduṣā śokaḥ kāryavināśanaḥd yat tu kāryaṃ bhavet kāryaṃ karmaṇā tat samācarad hīnaceṣṭasya yaḥ śokaḥ sa hi śatrur dhanaṃjayaa śocan nandayate śatrūn karśayaty api bāndhavānc kśīyate ca naras tasmān na tvaṃ śocitum arhasia ity ukto vāsudevena bībhatsur aparājitaḥc ābabhāṣe tadā vidvān idaṃ vacanam arthavata mayā pratijñā mahatī jayadrathavadhe kṛtāc śvo smi hantā durātmānaṃ putraghnam iti keśavaa matpratijñāvighātārthaṃ dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ kilācyutac pṛṣṭhataḥ saindhavaḥ kāryaḥ sarvair gupto mahārathaiḥa daśa caikā ca tāḥ kṛṣṇa akṣauhiṇyaḥ sudurjayāḥb hatāvaśeṣās tatremā daśa mādhava saṃkhyayāb tābhiḥ parivṛtaḥ saṃkhye sarvaiś caiva mahārathaiḥb kathaṃ śakyeta sa draṣṭuṃ durātmā kṛṣṇa saindhavaḥb pratijñāpāraṇaṃ caiva na bhaviṣyati keśavac pratijñāyāṃ ca hīnāyāṃ kathaṃ jīveta madvidhaḥa duḥkhopāyasya me vīra vikāṅkṣā parivartatec drutaṃ ca yāti savitā tata etad bravīmy ahama śokasthānaṃ tu tac chrutvā pārthasya dvijaketanaḥc saṃspṛśyāmbhas tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ prāṅmukhaḥ samavasthitaḥa idaṃ vākyaṃ mahātejā babhāṣe puṣkarekṣaṇaḥc hitārthaṃ pāṇḍuputrasya saindhavasya vadhe vṛtaḥa pārtha pāśupataṃ nāma paramāstraṃ dhanaṃjayac tatas tasya prasādāt tvaṃ bhaktaḥ prāpsyasi tan mahata tataḥ kṛṣṇavacaḥ śrutvā saṃspṛśyāmbho dhanaṃjayaḥc bhūmāv āsīna ekāgro jagāma manasā bhavama tataḥ praṇihite brāhme muhūrte prekṣamāṇo bahūn bhāvāñ jagāmādbhutadarśanāna udīcyāṃ diśi dharmātmā so paśyac chvetaparvatamc kuberasya vihāre ca nalinīṃ padmabhūṣitāma saricchreṣṭhāṃ ca tāṃ gaṅgāṃ vīkṣamāṇo bahūdakāmc
