śaṃkarama tataḥ pārthasya vijñāya varārthe vacanaṃ prabhuḥc vāsudevārjunau devaḥ smayamāno bhyabhāṣatad svāgataṃ vāṃ naraśreṣṭha vijñātaṃ manasepsitamd yena kāmena saṃprāptau bhavadbhyāṃ taṃ dadāmy ahama saro mṛtamayaṃ divyam abhyāśe śatrusūdanauc tatra me tad dhanur divyaṃ śaraś ca nihitaḥ purāa yena devārayaḥ sarve mayā yudhi nipātitāḥc tata ānīyatāṃ kṛṣṇau saśaraṃ dhanur uttamama tathety uktvā tu tau vīrau taṃ śarvaṃ pārṣadaiḥ sahac prasthitau tat saro divyaṃ divyāścaryaśatair vṛtama nirdiṣṭaṃ yad vṛṣāṅkena puṇyaṃ sarvārthasādhakamc taj jagmatur asaṃbhrāntau naranārāyaṇāv ṛṣīa tatas tu tat saro gatvā sūryamaṇḍalasaṃnibhamc nāgam antarjale ghoraṃ dadṛśāte rjunācyutaua dvitīyaṃ cāparaṃ nāgaṃ sahasraśirasaṃ varamc vamantaṃ vipulāṃ jvālāṃ dadṛśāte gnivarcasama tataḥ kṛṣṇaś ca pārthaś ca saṃspṛśyāpaḥ kṛtāñjalīc tau nāgāv upatasthāte namasyantau vṛṣadhvajama gṛṇantau vedaviduṣau tad brahma śatarudriyamc aprameyaṃ praṇamantau gatvā sarvātmanā bhavama tatas tau rudramāhātmyād dhitvā rūpaṃ mahoragauc dhanur bāṇaś ca śatrughnaṃ tad dvaṃdvaṃ samapadyataa tato jagṛhatuḥ prītau dhanur bāṇaṃ ca suprabhamc ājahratur mahātmānau dadatuś ca mahātmanea tataḥ pārśvād vṛṣāṅkasya brahmacārī nyavartatac piṅgākṣas tapasaḥ kṣetraṃ balavān nīlalohitaḥa sa tad gṛhya dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ tasthau sthānaṃ samāhitaḥc vyakarṣac cāpi vidhivat saśaraṃ dhanur uttamama tasya maurvīṃ ca muṣṭiṃ ca sthānaṃ cālakṣya pāṇḍavaḥc śrutvā mantraṃ bhavaproktaṃ jagrāhācintyavikramaḥa sarasy eva ca taṃ bāṇaṃ mumocātibalaḥ prabhuḥc cakāra ca punar vīras tasmin sarasi tad dhanuḥa tataḥ prītaṃ bhavaṃ jñātvā smṛtimān arjunas tadāc varam āraṇyakaṃ dattaṃ darśanaṃ śaṃkarasya cae manasā cintayām āsa tan me saṃpadyatām itia tasya tan matam ājñāya prītaḥ prādād varaṃ bhavaḥc tac ca pāśupataṃ ghoraṃ pratijñāyāś ca pāraṇamd tataḥ pāśupataṃ divyam avāpya punar īśvarāta saṃhṛṣṭaromā durdharṣaḥ kṛtaṃ kāryam amanyatab tato rjunahṛṣīkeśau punaḥ punar ariṃdamauc vavandatuś ca saṃhṛṣṭau śirobhyāṃ tau maheśvarama anujñātau kṣaṇe tasmin bhavenārjunakeśavauc prāptau svaśibiraṃ vīrau mudā paramayā yutaud tathā bhavenānumatau mahāsuranighātinaue indrāviṣṇū yathā prītau jambhasya vadhakāṅkṣiṇau saṃjaya uvācaa tayoḥ saṃvadator eva kṛṣṇadārukayos tadāc sātyagād rajanī rājann atha rājānvabudhyataa paṭhanti pāṇisvanikā māgadhā madhuparkikāḥc vaitālikāś ca sūtāś ca tuṣṭuvuḥ puruṣarṣabhama nartakāś cāpy anṛtyanta jagur gītāni gāyakāḥc kuruvaṃśastavārthāni madhuraṃ raktakaṇṭhinaḥa mṛdaṅgā jharjharā bheryaḥ paṇavānakagomukhāḥc āḍambarāś ca śaṅkhāś ca dundubhyaś ca mahāsvanāḥa evam etāni sarvāṇi tathānyāny api bhāratac vādayanti sma saṃhṛṣṭāḥ kuśalāḥ sādhuśikṣitāḥa sa meghasamanirghoṣo mahāñ śabdo spṛśad divamc pārthivapravaraṃ suptaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram abodhayata pratibuddhaḥ sukhaṃ supto mahārhe śayanottamec utthāyāvaśyakāryārthaṃ yayau snānagṛhaṃ tataḥa tataḥ śuklāmbarāḥ snātās taruṇāṣṭottaraṃ śatamc snāpakāḥ kāñcanaiḥ kumbhaiḥ pūrṇaiḥ samupatasthirea bhadrāsane sūpaviṣṭaḥ paridhāyāmbaraṃ laghuc sasnau candanasaṃyuktaiḥ pānīyair abhimantritaiḥa utsāditaḥ kaṣāyeṇa balavadbhiḥ suśikṣitaiḥc āplutaḥ sādhivāsena jalena ca sugandhinād rājahaṃsanibhaṃ prāpya uṣṇīṣaṃ śithilārpitamd jalakṣayanimittaṃ vai veṣṭayām āsa mūrdhania hariṇā candanenāṅgam anulipya mahābhujaḥc sragvī cākliṣṭavasanaḥ prāṅmukhaḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitaḥd kṛtvendriyāṇām aikāgryaṃ manasaś ca mahāmanāḥa jajāpa japyaṃ kaunteyaḥ satāṃ mārgam anuṣṭhitaḥc tato gniśaraṇaṃ dīptaṃ praviveśa vinītavata samiddhaṃ sa pavitrābhir agnim āhutibhis tathāc mantrapūtābhir arcitvā niścakrāma gṛhāt tataḥa dvitīyāṃ puruṣavyāghraḥ kakṣyāṃ niṣkramya pārthivaḥc tatra vedavido viprān apaśyad brāhmaṇarṣabhāna dāntān vedavratasnātān snātān avabhṛtheṣu cac sahasrānucarān saurān aṣṭau daśaśatāni caa akṣataiḥ sumanobhiś ca vācayitvā mahābhujaḥc tān dvijān madhusarpirbhyāṃ phalaiḥ śreṣṭhaiḥ sumaṅgalaiḥa prādāt kāñcanam ekaikaṃ niṣkaṃ viprāya pāṇḍavaḥc alaṃkṛtaṃ cāśvaśataṃ vāsāṃsīṣṭāś ca dakṣiṇāḥa tathā gāḥ kapilā dogdhrīḥ sarṣabhāḥ pāṇḍunandanaḥc hemaśṛṅgī rūpyakhurā dattvā cakre pradakṣiṇama svastikān vardhamānāṃś ca nandyāvartāṃś ca kāñcanānc mālyaṃ ca jalakumbhāṃś ca jvalitaṃ ca hutāśanama pūrṇāny akṣatapātrāṇi rucakān rocanāṃs tathāc svalaṃkṛtāḥ śubhāḥ kanyā dadhisarpirmadhūdakama maṅgalyān pakṣiṇaś caiva yac cānyad api pūjitamc dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvā ca kaunteyo bāhyāṃ kakṣyām agāt tataḥa tatas tasya mahābāhos tiṣṭhataḥ paricārakāḥc sauvarṇaṃ sarvatobhadraṃ muktāvaiḍūryamaṇḍitama parārdhyāstaraṇāstīrṇaṃ sottaracchadam ṛddhimatc viśvakarmakṛtaṃ divyam upajahrur varāsanama tatra tasyopaviṣṭasya bhūṣaṇāni mahātmanaḥc upajahrur mahārhāṇi preṣyāḥ śubhrāṇi sarvaśaḥd śubhāni sarvapuṣpāṇi muktāhārāṃś ca puṣkalāna yuktābharaṇaveṣasya kaunteyasya mahātmanaḥc rūpam āsīn mahārāja dviṣatāṃ śokavardhanama pāṇḍaraiś candraraśmyābhair hemadaṇḍaiś ca cāmaraiḥc dodhūyamānaḥ śuśubhe vidyudbhir iva toyadaḥa saṃstūyamānaḥ sūtaiś ca vandyamānaś ca bandibhiḥc upagīyamāno gandharvair āste sma kurunandanaḥa tato muhūrtād āsīt tu bandināṃ nisvano mahānc nemighoṣaś ca rathināṃ khuraghoṣaś ca vājināma hrādena gajaghaṇṭānāṃ śaṅkhānāṃ ninadena cac narāṇāṃ padaśabdaiś ca kampatīva sma medinīa tataḥ śuddhāntam āsādya jānubhyāṃ bhūtale sthitaḥc śirasā vandanīyaṃ tam abhivandya jagatpatima kuṇḍalī baddhanistriṃśaḥ saṃnaddhakavaco yuvāc abhipraṇamya śirasā dvāḥstho dharmātmajāya vaie nyavedayad dhṛṣīkeśam upayātaṃ mahātmanef śaṅkhacakragadāpāṇiḥ pītavāsāś caturbhujaḥf tavājñādarśanākāṅkṣī dvāri tiṣṭhati keśavaḥa so bravīt puruṣavyāghraḥ svāgatenaiva mādhavamb praveśyatāṃ samīpaṃ me kimarthaṃ pravilambasec arghyaṃ caivāsanaṃ cāsmai dīyatāṃ paramārcitama tataḥ praveśya vārṣṇeyam upaveśya varāsanec satkṛtya satkṛtas tena paryapṛcchad yudhiṣṭhiraḥ saṃjaya uvāca tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā pratinandya janārdanam uvāca paramaprītaḥ kaunteyo devakīsutam yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa sukhena rajanī vyuṣṭā kaccit te madhusūdanac kaccij jñānāni sarvāṇi prasannāni tavācyuta saṃjaya uvācaa vāsudevo pi tad yuktaṃ paryapṛcchad yudhiṣṭhiramb darśanād eva te saumya na kiṃ cid aśubhaṃ mamac tataḥ kṣattā prakṛtayo nyavedayad upasthitāḥa anujñātaś ca rājñā sa prāveśayata taṃ janamc virāṭaṃ bhīmasenaṃ ca dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca sātyakimd cedipaṃ dhṛṣṭaketuṃ ca drupadaṃ ca mahārathama śikhaṇḍinaṃ yamau caiva cekitānaṃ ca kekayānb kekayān sṛñjayān matsyān pāñcālāṃś cāpi rājakānc yuyutsuṃ caiva kauravyaṃ pāñcālyaṃ cottamaujasamd yudhāmanyuṃ subāhuṃ ca draupadeyāṃś ca sarvaśaḥa ete cānye ca bahavaḥ kṣatriyāḥ kṣatriyarṣabhamc upatasthur mahātmānaṃ viviśuś cāsaneṣu ted etāṃś ca suhṛdaś cānyān darśayām āsa pāṇḍavamd anujñātāś ca pārthena āsīnā āsaneṣu ted sthiteṣv adhiparārdhyeṣu yathārhaṃ vaṃdya pārthivama ekasminn āsane vīrāv upaviṣṭau mahābalauc kṛṣṇaś ca yuyudhānaś ca mahātmānau mahādyutīa tato yudhiṣṭhiras teṣāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ madhusūdanamc abravīt puṇḍarīkākṣam ābhāṣya madhuraṃ vacaḥa ekaṃ tvāṃ vayam āśritya sahasrākṣam ivāmarāḥc prārthayāmo jayaṃ yuddhe śāśvatāni sukhāni caa tvaṃ hi rājyavināśaṃ ca dviṣadbhiś ca nirākriyāmc kleśāṃś ca vividhān kṛṣṇa sarvāṃs tān api vettha naḥa tvayi sarveśa sarveṣām asmākaṃ bhaktavatsalac sukham āyattam atyarthaṃ yātrā ca madhusūdanaa sa tathā kuru vārṣṇeya yathā tvayi mano mamac arjunasya yathā satyā pratijñā syāc cikīrṣitāa sa bhavāṃs tārayatv asmād duḥkhāmarṣamahārṇavātc pāraṃ titīrṣatām adya plavo no bhava mādhavaa na hi tat kurute saṃkhye kārtavīryasamas tv apic rathī yat kurute kṛṣṇa sārathir yatnam āsthitaḥd yathaiva sarvāsv āpatsu pāsi vṛṣṇīñ janārdanad tathaivāsmān mahābāho vṛjināt trātum arhasid tvam agādhe plave magnān pāṇḍavān kurusāgared samuddhara plavo bhūtvā śaṅkhacakragadādharad namaste devadeveśa sanātana viśātanad viṣṇo jiṣṇo hare kṛṣṇa vaikuṇṭhapuruṣottamad nāradas tvāṃ samācakhyau purāṇam ṛṣisattamamd varadaṃ śārṅgiṇaṃ devaṃ tat satyaṃ kuru mādhavad ity uktaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣo dharmarājena saṃsadid toyameghasvano vāgmī pratyuvāca yudhiṣṭhiram vāsudeva uvācaa sāmareṣv api lokeṣu sarveṣu na tathāvidhaḥc śarāsanadharaḥ kaś cid yathā pārtho dhanaṃjayaḥa vīryavān astrasaṃpannaḥ parākrānto mahābalaḥc yuddhaśauṇḍaḥ sadāmarṣī tejasā paramo nṛṇāma sa yuvā vṛṣabhaskandho dīrghabāhur mahābalaḥc siṃharṣabhagatiḥ śrīmān dviṣatas te haniṣyatia ahaṃ ca tat kariṣyāmi yathā kuntīsuto rjunaḥc dhārtarāṣṭrasya sainyāni dhakṣyaty agnir ivotthitaḥa adya taṃ pāpakarmāṇaṃ kṣudraṃ saubhadraghātinamc apunardarśanaṃ mārgam iṣubhiḥ kṣepsyate rjunaḥa tasyādya gṛdhrāḥ śyenāś ca vaḍagomāyavas tathāc bhakṣayiṣyanti māṃsāni ye cānye puruṣādakāḥa yady asya devā goptāraḥ sendrāḥ sarve tathāpy asauc rājadhānīṃ yamasyādya hataḥ prāpsyati saṃkulea nihatya saindhavaṃ jiṣṇur adya tvām upayāsyatic viśoko vijvaro rājan bhava bhūtipuraskṛtaḥ saṃjaya uvācaa tathā saṃbhāṣatāṃ teṣāṃ prādurāsīd dhanaṃjayaḥc didṛkṣur bharataśreṣṭhaṃ rājānaṃ sasuhṛdgaṇama taṃ praviṣṭaṃ śubhāṃ kakṣyām abhivādyāgrataḥ sthitamc samutthāyārjunaṃ premṇā sasvaje pāṇḍavarṣabhaḥa mūrdhni cainam upāghrāya pariṣvajya ca bāhunāc āśiṣaḥ paramāḥ procya smayamāno bhyabhāṣataa vyaktam arjuna saṃgrāme dhruvas te vijayo mahānc yādṛg rūpā hi te chāyā prasannaś ca janārdanaḥa tam abravīt tato jiṣṇur mahad āścaryam uttamamc dṛṣṭavān asmi bhadraṃ te keśavasya prasādajama tatas tat kathayām āsa yathādṛṣṭaṃ dhanaṃjayaḥc āśvāsanārthaṃ suhṛdāṃ tryambakena samāgamama tataḥ śirobhir avaniṃ spṛṣṭvā sarve ca vismitāḥc namaskṛtya vṛṣāṅkāya sādhu sādhv ity athābruvana anujñātās tataḥ sarve suhṛdo dharmasūnunāc tvaramāṇāḥ susaṃnaddhā hṛṣṭā yuddhāya niryayuḥa abhivādya tu rājānaṃ yuyudhānācyutārjunāḥc hṛṣṭā viniryayus te vai yudhiṣṭhiraniveśanāta rathenaikena durdharṣau yuyudhānajanārdanauc jagmatuḥ sahitau vīrāv arjunasya niveśanama tatra gatvā hṛṣīkeśaḥ kalpayām āsa sūtavatc rathaṃ rathavarasyājau vānararṣabhalakṣaṇama sa meghasamanirghoṣas taptakāñcanasaprabhaḥc babhau rathavaraḥ kḷptaḥ śiśur divasakṛd yathāa tataḥ puruṣaśārdūlaḥ sajjaḥ sajjaṃ puraḥsaraḥc kṛtāhnikāya pārthāya nyavedayata taṃ rathamd rathaṃ puruṣasiṃhasya sadhvajaṃ sapatākinama taṃ tu loke varaḥ puṃsāṃ kirīṭī hemavarmabhṛtc bāṇabāṇāsanī vāhaṃ pradakṣiṇam avartataa tato vidyāvayovṛddhaiḥ kriyāvadbhir jitendriyaiḥc stūyamāno jayāśībhir āruroha mahārathama jaitraiḥ sāṃgrāmikair mantraiḥ pūrvam eva rathottamamc abhimantritam arciṣmān udayaṃ bhāskaro yathāa sa rathe rathināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ kāñcane kāñcanāvṛtaḥc vibabhau vimalo rciṣmān merāv iva divākaraḥa anvārurohatuḥ pārthaṃ yuyudhānajanārdanauc śaryāter yajñam āyāntaṃ yathendraṃ devam aśvinaua atha jagrāha govindo raśmīn raśmivatāṃ varaḥc mātalir vāsavasyeva vṛtraṃ hantuṃ prayāsyataḥa sa tābhyāṃ sahitaḥ pārtho rathapravaram āsthitaḥc sahito budhaśukrābhyāṃ tamo nighnan yathā śaśīa saindhavasya vadhaprepsuḥ prayātaḥ śatrupūgahāc sahāmbupatimitrābhyāṃ yathendras tārakāmayed dhanur jaitraṃ tathā bāṇān dadhāno nirgato rjunaḥd hantuṃ laṃkāpatiṃ devo bhagavān iva rāghavaḥa tato vāditranirghoṣair maṅgalyaiś ca stavaiḥ śubhaiḥc prayāntam arjunaṃ sūtā māgadhāś caiva tuṣṭuvuḥa sajayāśīḥ sapuṇyāhaḥ sūtamāgadhanisvanaḥc yukto vāditraghoṣeṇa teṣāṃ ratikaro bhavata tam anuprayato vāyuḥ puṇyagandhavahaḥ śuciḥc vavau saṃharṣayan pārthaṃ dviṣataś cāpi śoṣayand tatas tasmin kṣaṇe rājan vividhāni śubhāni caa prādurāsan nimittāni vijayāya bahūni cac pāṇḍavānāṃ tvadīyānāṃ viparītāni māriṣaa dṛṣṭvārjuno nimittāni vijayāya pradakṣiṇamc yuyudhānaṃ maheṣvāsam idaṃ vacanam abravīta yuyudhānādya yuddhe me dṛśyate vijayo dhruvaḥc yathā hīmāni liṅgāni dṛśyante śinipuṃgavaa so haṃ tatra gamiṣyāmi yatra saindhavako nṛpaḥc yiyāsur yamalokāya mama vīryaṃ pratīkṣated gaccha tvaṃ rakṣa rājānaṃ tvaṃ hi tulyo mayā raṇea yathā paramakaṃ kṛtyaṃ saindhavasya vadhe mamac tathaiva sumahat kṛtyaṃ dharmarājasya rakṣaṇea sa tvam adya mahābāho rājānaṃ paripālayac yathaiva hi mayā guptas tvayā gupto bhavet tathād na hi paśyāmi taṃ loke yas tvāṃ yuddhe parājayetd vāsudevasamaṃ yuddhe svayam apy amareśvaraḥa tvayi cāhaṃ parāśvasya pradyumne vā mahārathec śaknuyāṃ saindhavaṃ hantum anapekṣo nararṣabhaa mayy apekṣā na kartavyā kathaṃ cid api sātvatac rājany eva parā guptiḥ kāryā sarvātmanā tvayāa na hi yatra mahābāhur vāsudevo vyavasthitaḥc kiṃ cid vyāpadyate tatra yatrāham api ca dhruvama evam uktas tu pārthena sātyakiḥ paravīrahāc tathety uktvāgamat tatra yatra rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa śvobhūte kim akārṣus te duḥkhaśokasamanvitāḥc abhimanyau hate tatra ke vāyudhyanta māmakāḥa jānantas tasya karmāṇi kuravaḥ savyasācinaḥc kathaṃ tat kilbiṣaṃ kṛtvā nirbhayā brūhi māmakāḥa putraśokābhisaṃtaptaṃ kruddhaṃ mṛtyum ivāntakamc āyāntaṃ puruṣavyāghraṃ kathaṃ dadṛśur āhavea kapirājadhvajaṃ saṃkhye vidhunvānaṃ mahad dhanuḥc dṛṣṭvā putraparidyūnaṃ kim akurvanta māmakāḥa kiṃ nu saṃjaya saṃgrāme vṛttaṃ duryodhanaṃ pratic paridevo mahān atra śruto me nābhinandanama babhūvur ye manogrāhyāḥ śabdāḥ śrutisukhāvahāḥc na śrūyante dya te sarve saindhavasya niveśaned bhūyāñ śabdān atīvānyāñ śabdaḥ saindhavaveśmanid paurāṇikānāṃ tūryāṇāṃ śaṅkhadundubhighoṣavāna stuvatāṃ nādya śrūyante putrāṇāṃ śibire mamac sūtamāgadhasaṃghānāṃ nartakānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥa śabdena nāditābhīkṣṇam abhavad yatra me śrutiḥc dīnānām adya taṃ śabdaṃ na śṛṇomi samīritama niveśane satyadhṛteḥ somadattasya saṃjayac āsīno haṃ purā tāta śabdam aśrauṣam uttamama tad adya hīnapuṇyo ham ārtasvaranināditamc niveśanaṃ hatotsāhaṃ putrāṇāṃ mama lakṣayea viviṃśater durmukhasya citrasenavikarṇayoḥc anyeṣāṃ ca sutānāṃ me na tathā śrūyate dhvaniḥa brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā yaṃ śiṣyāḥ paryupāsatec droṇaputraṃ maheṣvāsaṃ putrāṇāṃ me parāyaṇama vitaṇḍālāpasaṃlāpair hutayācitavanditaiḥc gītaiś ca vividhair iṣṭai ramate yo divāniśama upāsyamāno bahubhiḥ kurupāṇḍavasātvataiḥc sūta tasya gṛhe śabdho nādya drauṇer yathā purāa droṇaputraṃ maheṣvāsaṃ gāyanā nartakāś ca yec atyartham upatiṣṭhanti teṣāṃ na śrūyate dhvaniḥa vindānuvindayoḥ sāyaṃ śibire yo mahādhvaniḥc śrūyate so dya na tathā kekayānāṃ ca veśmasua nityapramuditānāṃ ca tālagītasvano mahānc nṛtyatāṃ śrūyate tāta gaṇānāṃ so dya na dhvaniḥa saptatantūn vitanvānā yam upāsanti yājakāḥc saumadattiṃ śrutanidhiṃ teṣāṃ na śrūyate dhvaniḥa jyāghoṣo brahmaghoṣaś ca tomarāsirathadhvaniḥc droṇasyāsīd avirato gṛhe tan na śṛṇomy ahama nānādeśasamutthānāṃ gītānāṃ yo bhavat svanaḥc vāditranāditānāṃ ca so dya na śrūyate mahāna yadā prabhṛty upaplavyāc chāntim icchañ janārdanaḥc āgataḥ sarvabhūtānām anukampārtham acyutaḥa tato ham abruvaṃ sūta mandaṃ duryodhanaṃ tadāc vāsudevena tīrthena putra saṃśāmya pāṇḍavaiḥa kālaprāptam ahaṃ manye mā tvaṃ duryodhanātigāḥb saṃśāmya bhrātṛbhis tais tu kṣatriyān abhipālayac śame ced yācamānaṃ tvaṃ pratyākhyāsyasi keśavame hitārtham abhijalpantaṃ na tathāsty aparājayaḥa pratyācaṣṭa sa dāśārham ṛṣabhaṃ sarvadhanvināmc anuneyāni jalpantam anayān nānvapadyatad karṇaduḥśāsanamate saubalasya ca durmateḥd pratyākhyāto mahābāhuḥ kulāntakaraṇena mea tato duḥśāsanasyaiva karṇasya ca mataṃ dvayoḥc anvavartata hitvā māṃ kṛṣṭaḥ kālena durmatiḥa na hy ahaṃ dyūtam icchāmi viduro na praśaṃsatic saindhavo necchate dyūtaṃ bhīṣmo na dyūtam icchatic   viduro droṇa eva vāc bāhlikaḥ somadatto vā bhīṣmo droṇāyanis tadāa śalyo bhūriśravāś caiva purumitro jayas tathāc aśvatthāmā kṛpo droṇo dyūtaṃ necchanti saṃjayad jayaḥ kṛpo vā dharmātmā ye cānye mama bāndhavāḥa eteṣāṃ matam ājñāya yadi varteta putrakaḥc sajñātimitraḥ sasuhṛc ciraṃ jīved anāmayaḥd etebhyaś ca madūrdhvaṃ ca abhokṣyad vasudhām imāma ślakṣṇā madhurasaṃbhāṣā jñātimadhye priyaṃvadāḥc kulīnāḥ saṃmatāḥ prājñāḥ sukhaṃ prāpsyanti pāṇḍavāḥa dharmāpekṣo naro nityaṃ sarvatra labhate sukhamc pretyabhāve ca kalyāṇaṃ prasādaṃ pratipadyatea arhanty ardhaṃ pṛthivyās te bhoktuṃ sāmarthyasādhanāḥc teṣām api samudrāntā pitṛpaitāmahī mahīd na ca tvābhibhaviṣyanti hitvā dharmaṃ pṛthātmajāḥa niyujyamānāḥ sthāsyanti pāṇḍavā dharmavartmanic santi no jñātayas tāta yeṣāṃ śroṣyanti pāṇḍavāḥa śalyasya somadattasya bhīṣmasya ca mahātmanaḥc droṇasyātha vikarṇasya bāhlikasya kṛpasya caa anyeṣāṃ caiva vṛddhānāṃ bharatānāṃ mahātmanāmc tvadarthaṃ bruvatāṃ tāta kariṣyanti vaco hitama kaṃ vā tvaṃ manyase teṣāṃ yas tvā brūyād ato nyathāc kṛṣṇo na dharmaṃ saṃjahyāt sarve te ca sa dhanaṃjayaḥa ācakṣva tad dhi naḥ sarvaṃ kuśalo hy asi saṃjayac yad upāyāt tu sāyāhne kṛtvā pārthasya kilbiṣame abhimanyau hate tāta katham āsīn mano hi vaḥa na jātu tasya karmāṇi yudhi tvaṃ purā dyūtāt kuntīputraṃ yudhiṣṭhiramc nivartayethāḥ putrāṃś ca na tvāṃ vyasanam āvrajeta yuddhakāle punaḥ prāpte tadaiva bhavatā yadic nivartitāḥ syuḥ saṃrabdhā na tvāṃ vyasanam āvrajeta duryodhanaṃ cāvidheyaṃ badhnīteti purā yadic kurūn acodayiṣyas tvaṃ na tvāṃ vyasanam āvrajeta tat te buddhivyabhīcāram upalapsyanti pāṇḍavāḥc pāñcālā vṛṣṇayaḥ sarve ye cānye pi mahājanāḥa sa kṛtvā pitṛkarma tvaṃ putraṃ saṃsthāpya satpatheb aprāptaḥ sa mahad dharmaṃ kāmam arthaṃ yaśas tathāc vartethā yadi dharmeṇa na tvāṃ vyasanam āvrajeta tvaṃ tu prājñatamo loke hitvā dharmaṃ sanātanamc duryodhanasya karṇasya śakuneś cānvagā matama tat te vilapitaṃ sarvaṃ mayā rājan niśāmitamc arthe niviśamānasya viṣamiśraṃ yathā madhua na tathā manyate kṛṣṇo rājānaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ purāc na bhīṣmaṃ naiva prāptas tvāṃ putrāṇāṃ rājyakāmukama pitṛpaitāmahaṃ rājyam apavṛttaṃ tadānaghac atha pārthair jitāṃ kṛtsnāṃ pṛthivīṃ pratyapadyathāḥa pāṇḍunāvarjitaṃ rājyaṃ kauravāṇāṃ yaśas tathāc tataś cābhyadhikaṃ svayama paścārdhe tasya padmas tu garbhavyūhaḥ sudurbhidaḥc sūcī padmasya madhyastho gūḍho vyūhaḥ punaḥ kṛtaḥa evam etaṃ mahāvyūhaṃ vyūhya droṇo vyavasthitaḥc sūcīmukhe maheṣvāsaḥ kṛtavarmā vyūḍhorasko mahābhujaḥc dhanur visphārayan droṇas tasthau kruddha ivāntakaḥd tasya sarvasya sainyasya netā goptā ca vīryavāna patākinaṃ śoṇahayaṃ vedīkṛṣṇājinadhvajamc droṇasya ratham ālokya prahṛṣṭāḥ bravīta adya gāṇḍīvadhanvānaṃ tapantaṃ yuddhadurmadamc aham āvārayiṣyāmi veleva makarālayama adya paśyantu saṃgrāme dhanaṃjayam amarṣaṇamc viṣaktaṃ mayi durdharṣam aśmakūṭam ivāśmanid tiṣṭhadhvaṃ pratyadṛśyata bhārataa tato ntaka iva kruddhaḥ savajra iva vāsavaḥc daṇḍapāṇir ivāsahyo mṛtyuḥ kālena coditaḥa śūlapāṇir ivākṣobhyo varuṇaḥ pāśavān ivac yugāntāgnir ivārciṣmān pradhakṣyan vai punaḥ prajāḥa krodhāmarṣabaloddhūto nivātakavacāntakaḥc jayo jetā sthitaḥ satye pārayiṣyan mahāvratama āmuktakavacaḥ khaḍgī jāmbūnadakirīṭabhṛtc śubhravarmāmbaradharaḥ svaṅgadī cārukuṇḍalīa rathapravaram āsthāya naro nārāyaṇānugaḥc vidhunvan gāṇḍivaṃ saṃkhye babhau sūrya ivoditaḥa so grānīkasya mahata iṣupāte dhanaṃjayaḥc vyavasthāpya rathaṃ sajjaṃ śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau pratāpavāna atha kṛṣṇo py asaṃbhrāntaḥ pārthena saha māriṣac prādhmāpayat pāñcajanyaṃ śaṅkhapravaram ojasāa tayoḥ śaṅkhapraṇādena tava sainye viśāṃ patec āsan saṃhṛṣṭaromāṇaḥ kampitā gatacetasaḥa yathā trasanti bhūtāni sarvāṇy aśaninisvanātc tathā śaṅkhapraṇādena vitresus tava sainikāḥa prasusruvuḥ śakṛnmūtraṃ vāhanāni ca sarvaśaḥc evaṃ savāhanaṃ sarvam āvignam abhavad balama vyaṣīdanta narā rājañ śaṅkhaśabdena māriṣac visaṃjñāś cābhavan ke cit ke cid rājan vitatrasuḥa tataḥ kapir mahānādaṃ saha bhūtair dhvajālayaiḥc akarod vyāditāsyaś ca bhīṣayaṃs tava sainikāna tataḥ śaṅkhāś ca bheryaś ca mṛdaṅgāś cānakaiḥ sahac punar evābhyahanyanta tava sainyapraharṣaṇāḥa nānāvāditrasaṃhrādaiḥ kṣveḍitāsphoṭitākulaiḥc siṃhanādaiḥ savāditraiḥ samāhūtair mahārathaiḥd durmarṣaṇabalaṃ pūrvam atha duḥśāsanānugamd tataḥ śakaṭasaṃsthaṃ ca ghoranādasamākulama tasmin sutumule śabde bhīrūṇāṃ bhayavardhanec atīva hṛṣṭo dāśārham abravīt pākaśāsaniḥa codayāśvān hṛṣīkeśa yatra durmarṣaṇaḥ sthitaḥc etad bhittvā gajānīkaṃ pravekṣyāmy arivāhinīma evam ukto mahābāhuḥ keśavaḥ savyasācināc acodayad dhayāṃs tatra yatra durmarṣaṇaḥ sthitaḥa sa saṃprahāras tumulaḥ saṃpravṛttaḥ sudāruṇaḥc ekasya ca bahūnāṃ ca rathanāganarakṣayaḥa tataḥ sāyakavarṣeṇa parjanya iva vṛṣṭimānc parān avākirat pārthaḥ parvatān iva nīradaḥa te cāpi rathinaḥ sarve tvaritāḥ kṛtahastavatc avākiran bāṇajālais tataḥ kṛṣṇadhanaṃjayaua tataḥ kruddho mahābāhur vāryamāṇaḥ parair yudhic śirāṃsi rathināṃ pārthaḥ kāyebhyo pāharac charaiḥa udbhrāntanayanair vaktraiḥ saṃdaṣṭoṣṭhapuṭaiḥ śubhaiḥc sakuṇḍalaśirastrāṇair vasudhā samakīryatad   amarṣād bhrukuṭīkṛtaiḥd tathaiva krodhadaṣṭoṣṭhair avākīryata medinīa puṇḍarīkavanānīva vidhvastāni samantataḥc vinikīrṇāni yodhānāṃ vadanāni cakāśirea tapanīyavicitrāṇi siktāni rudhireṇa cac adṛśyanta yathā rājan meghasaṃghāḥ savidyutaḥa śirasāṃ patatāṃ rājañ śabdo bhūt pṛthivītalec kālena paripakvānāṃ tālānāṃ patatām ivaa tataḥ kabandhaḥ kaś cit tu dhanur ālambya tiṣṭhatic kaś cit khaḍgaṃ viniṣkṛṣya bhujenodyamya tiṣṭhatid gṛhītvānyasya keśeṣu śiro nṛtyati cāparaḥa nājānanta śirāṃsy urvyāṃ patitāni nararṣabhāḥc amṛṣyamāṇāḥ kaunteyaṃ saṃgrāme jayagṛddhinaḥa hayānām uttamāṅgaiś ca hastihastaiś ca medinīc bāhubhiś ca śirobhiś ca vīrāṇāṃ samakīryataa ayaṃ pārthaḥ kutaḥ pārtha eṣa pārtha iti prabhob tiṣṭha pārthair hi māṃ pārtha kva yāsīti ca jalpatāmc tava sainyeṣu yodhānāṃ pārthabhūtam ivābhavata anyonyam api cājaghnur ātmānam api cāparec pārthabhūtam amanyanta jagat kālena mohitāḥa niṣṭanantaḥ sarudhirā visaṃjñā gāḍhavedanāḥc śayānā bahavo vīrāḥ kīrtayantaḥ suhṛjjanama sabhiṇḍipālāḥ saprāsāḥ saśaktyṛṣṭiparaśvadhāḥc saniryūhāḥ sanistriṃśāḥ saśarāsanatomarāḥa sabāṇavarmābharaṇāḥ sagadāḥ sāṅgadā raṇec mahābhujagasaṃkāśā bāhavaḥ parighopamāḥa udveṣṭanti viceṣṭanti saṃveṣṭanti ca sarvaśaḥc vegaṃ kurvanti saṃrabdhā nikṛttāḥ parameṣubhiḥa yo yaḥ sma samare pārthaṃ pratisaṃrabhate naraḥc tasya tasyāntako bāṇaḥ śarīram upasarpatia nṛtyato rathamārgeṣu dhanur vyāyacchatas tathāc na kaś cit tatra pārthasya dadarśāntaram aṇv apia yat tasya ghaṭamānasya kṣipraṃ vikṣipataḥ śarānc lāghavāt pāṇḍuputrasya vyasmayanta pare janāḥa hastinaṃ hastiyantāram aśvam āśvikam eva cac abhinat phalguno bāṇai rathinaṃ ca sasārathima āvartamānam āvṛttaṃ yudhyamānaṃ ca pāṇḍavaḥc pramukhe tiṣṭhamānaṃ ca na kaṃ cin na nihanti saḥa yathodayan vai gagane sūryo hanti mahat tamaḥc tathārjuno gajānīkam avadhīt kaṅkapatribhiḥa hastibhiḥ patitair bhinnais tava sainyam adṛśyatac antakāle yathā bhūmir vinikīrṇair mahīdharaiḥa yathā madhyaṃdine sūryo duṣprekṣyaḥ prāṇibhiḥ sadāc tathā dhanaṃjayaḥ kruddho duṣprekṣyo yudhi śatrubhiḥa tat tathā tava putrasya sainyaṃ yudhi paraṃtapac prabhagnaṃ drutam āvignam atīva śarapīḍitama māruteneva mahatā meghānīkaṃ vidhūyatāc prakālyamānaṃ tat sainyaṃ nāśakat prativīkṣituma pratodaiś cāpakoṭībhir huṃkāraiḥ sādhuvāhitaiḥc kaśāpārṣṇyabhighātaiś ca vāgbhir ugrābhir eva caa codayanto hayāṃs tūrṇaṃ palāyante sma tāvakāḥc sādino rathinaś caiva pattayaś cārjunārditāḥa pārṣṇyaṅguṣṭhāṅkuśair nāgāṃś codayantas tathāparec śaraiḥ saṃmohitāś cānye tam evābhimukhā yayaue tava yodhā hatotsāhā vibhrāntamanasas tadā dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa tasmin prabhagne sainyāgre vadhyamāne kirīṭināc ke nu tatra raṇe vīrāḥ pratyudīyur dhanaṃjayama āho svic chakaṭavyūhaṃ praviṣṭā moghaniścayāḥc droṇam āśritya tiṣṭhantaḥ prākāram akutobhayāḥ saṃjaya uvācaa tathārjunena saṃbhagne tasmiṃs tava bale tadāc hatavīre hatotsāhe palāyanakṛtakṣaṇea pākaśāsaninābhīkṣṇaṃ vadhyamāne śarottamaiḥc na tatra kaś cit saṃgrāme śaśākārjunam īkṣituma tatas tava suto rājan dṛṣṭvā sainyaṃ tathāgatamc duḥśāsano bhṛśaṃ kruddho yuddhāyārjunam abhyayāta sa kāñcanavicitreṇa kavacena samāvṛtaḥc jāmbūnadaśirastrāṇaḥ śūras tīvraparākramaḥa nāgānīkena mahatā grasann iva mahīm imāmc duḥśāsano mahārāja savyasācinam āvṛṇotd yuvarājo balaślāghī piṅgalaḥ priyadarśanaḥa hrādena gajaghaṇṭānāṃ śaṅkhānāṃ ninadena cac jyākṣepaninadaiś caiva virāveṇa ca dantināma bhūr diśaś cāntarikṣaṃ ca śabdenāsīt samāvṛtamc sa muhūrtaṃ pratibhayo dāruṇaḥ samapadyataa tān dṛṣṭvā patatas tūrṇam aṅkuśair abhicoditānc vyālambahastān saṃrabdhān sapakṣān iva parvatāna siṃhanādena mahatā narasiṃho dhanaṃjayaḥc gajānīkam amitrāṇām abhito vyadhamac charaiḥd tadācalaghanaprakhyaṃ patākāśatasaṃkulama mahormiṇam ivoddhūtaṃ śvasanena mahārṇavamb dhanaṃjayaśarodvignāḥ palāyanto babhur gajāḥc kirīṭī tad gajānīkaṃ prāviśan makaro yathāa kāṣṭhātīta ivādityaḥ pratapan yugasaṃkṣayec dadṛśe dikṣu sarvāsu pārthaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥa khuraśabdena cāśvānāṃ nemighoṣeṇa tena cac tena cotkruṣṭaśabdena jyāninādena tena cad nānāvāditraśabdena pāñcajanyasvanena cae devadattasya ghoṣeṇa gāṇḍīvaninadena caa mandavegatarā nāgā babhūvus te vicetasaḥc śarair āśīviṣasparśair nirbhinnāḥ savyasācināa te gajā viśikhais tīkṣṇair yudhi gāṇḍīvacoditaiḥa   tīrṇāḥ paṅkārṇaveṣv ivaa yugapac ca samāviṣṭairc anekaśatasāhasraiḥ sarvāṅgeṣu samarpitāḥd puṅkhāvaśiṣṭair bahubhiḥ śoṇitotpīḍavāhinaḥa ārāvaṃ paramaṃ kṛtvā vadhyamānāḥ kirīṭināc nipetur aniśaṃ bhūmau chinnapakṣā ivādrayaḥa apare dantaveṣṭeṣu kumbheṣu ca kaṭeṣu cac śaraiḥ samarpitā nāgāḥ krauñcavad vyanadan muhuḥa gajaskandhagatānāṃ ca puruṣāṇāṃ kirīṭināc ācchidyantottamāṅgāni bhallaiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥa sakuṇḍalānāṃ patatāṃ śirasāṃ dharaṇītalec padmānām iva saṃghātaiḥ pārthaś cakre nivedanama yantrabaddhā vikavacā vraṇārtā rudhirokṣitāḥc bhramatsu yudhi nāgeṣu manuṣyā vilalambirea ke cid ekena bāṇena sumuktena patatriṇāc dvau trayaś ca vinirbhinnā nipetur dharaṇītaled apare mandasaṃrabdhā mātaṅgāḥ parvatopamāḥd petuḥ pṛthivyāṃ nihatā vajrarugṇā ivācalāḥd atividdhāś ca nārācair vamanto rudhiraṃ mukhaiḥd sārohā nyapatan bhūmau drumavanta ivācalāḥd tato rjuno bhṛśaṃ kruddhaḥ pradahann iva tejasād vavarṣa śaravarṣāṇi yodhānām anivartināma maurvīṃ dhanur dhvajaṃ caiva yugānīṣās tathaiva cac rathināṃ kuṭṭayām āsa bhallaiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥa na saṃdadhan na cāpy asyan na vimuñcan na coddharanc maṇḍalenaiva dhanuṣā nṛtyan pārthaḥ sma dṛśyatea atividdhāś ca nārācair vamanto rudhiraṃ mukhaiḥc muhūrtān nipatanty anye vāraṇā vasudhātalea utthitāny agaṇeyāni kabandhāni samantataḥc adṛśyanta mahārāja tasmin paramasaṃkulea sacāpāḥ sāṅgulitrāṇāḥ sakhaḍgāḥ sāṅgadā raṇec adṛśyanta bhujāś chinnā hemābharaṇabhūṣitāḥa sūpaskarair adhiṣṭhānair īṣādaṇḍakabandhuraiḥc cakrair vimathitair akṣai bhagnaiś ca bahudhā yugaiḥa varmacāpaśaraiś caiva vyavakīrṇais tatas tataḥc sragbhir ābharaṇair vastraiḥ patitaiś ca mahādhvajaiḥa nihatair vāraṇair aśvaiḥ kṣatriyaiś ca nipātitaiḥc adṛśyata mahī tatra dāruṇapratidarśanāa evaṃ duḥśāsanabalaṃ vadhyamānaṃ kirīṭināc saṃprādravan mahārāja vyathitaṃ vai sanāyakamd evaṃ bale drute yāte rājaputraṃ mahārathamd vivyādha daśabhir bāṇais tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravītd jīvitena kathaṃ gantā duruktaṃ yāvad adya ted tad vākyasadṛśaṃ karma kuru tvaṃ yadi manyased evam uktvā tato rājan pārthaḥ pārthivamardanaḥd bhṛśaṃ kruddho mahārāja avidhyat tanayaṃ tavaa tato duḥśāsanas trastaḥ sahānīkaḥ śarārditaḥc droṇaṃ trātāram ākāṅkṣañ śakaṭavyūham abhyagāt saṃjaya uvācaa duḥśāsanabalaṃ hatvā savyasācī dhanaṃjayaḥc sindhurājaṃ parīpsan vai droṇānīkam upādravata sa tu droṇaṃ samāsādya vyūhasya pramukhe sthitamc kṛtāñjalir idaṃ vākyaṃ kṛṣṇasyānumate bravīta śivena dhyāhi māṃ brahman svasti caiva vadasva mec bhavatprasādād icchāmi praveṣṭuṃ durbhidāṃ camūma bhavān pitṛsamo mahyaṃ dharmarājasamo pi cac tathā kṛṣṇasamaś caiva satyam etad bravīmi tea aśvatthāmā yathā tāta rakṣaṇīyas tavānaghac tathāham api te rakṣyaḥ sadaiva dvijasattamaa tava prasādād icchāmi sindhurājānam āhavec nihantuṃ dvipadāṃ śreṣṭha pratijñāṃ rakṣa me vibhoa evam uktas tadācāryaḥ pratyuvāca smayann ivab yathā tvaṃ bhāṣase pārtha mamāpy evaṃ mataṃ vibhob kiṃ tu svāmyarthayuktais tu kāryaṃ yuddhaṃ manīṣibhiḥc mām ajitvā na bībhatso śakyo jetuṃ jayadrathaḥa etāvad uktvā taṃ droṇaḥ śaravrātair avākiratc sarathāśvadhvajaṃ tīkṣṇaiḥ prahasan vai sasārathima tato rjunaḥ śaravrātān droṇasyāvārya sāyakaiḥc droṇam abhyardayad bāṇair ghorarūpair mahattaraiḥa vivyādha ca raṇe droṇam anumānya viśāṃ patec kṣatradharmaṃ samāsthāya navabhiḥ sāyakaiḥ punaḥa tasyeṣūn iṣubhiś chittvā droṇo vivyādha tāv ubhauc viṣāgnijvalanaprakhyair iṣubhiḥ kṛṣṇapāṇḍavaua iyeṣa pāṇḍavas tasya bāṇaiś chettuṃ śarāsanamc tasya cintayatas tv evaṃ phalgunasya mahātmanaḥe droṇaḥ śarair asaṃbhrānto jyāṃ cicchedāśu vīryavāna vivyādha ca hayān asya dhvajaṃ sārathim eva cac arjunaṃ ca śarair vīraṃ smayamāno bhyavākirata etasminn antare pārthaḥ sajjaṃ kṛtvā mahad dhanuḥc viśeṣayiṣyann ācāryaṃ sarvāstraviduṣāṃ varame mumoca ṣaṭśatān bāṇān gṛhītvaikam iva drutama punaḥ sapta śatān anyān sahasraṃ cānivartināmc cikṣepāyutaśaś cānyāṃs te ghnan droṇasya tāṃ camūma taiḥ samyag astair balinā kṛtinā citrayodhināc manuṣyavājimātaṅgā viddhāḥ petur gatāsavaḥa vidrutāś ca raṇe petuḥ saṃchinnāyudhajīvitāḥc rathino rathamukhyebhyaḥ sahayāḥ śarapīḍitāḥa cūrṇitākṣiptadagdhānāṃ vajrānilahutāśanaiḥc tulyarūpā gajāḥ petur giryagrāmbudaveśmanāma petur aśvasahasrāṇi prahatāny arjuneṣubhiḥc haṃsā himavataḥ pṛṣṭhe vāriviprahatā ivaa rathāśvadvipapattyoghāḥ salilaughā ivādbhutāḥc yugāntādityaraśmyābhaiḥ pāṇḍavāstaśarair hatāḥa taṃ pāṇḍavādityaśarāṃśujālaṃkurupravīrān yudhi niṣṭapantamc sa droṇameghaḥ śaravarṣavegaiḥprācchādayan megha ivārkaraśmīna athātyarthavisṛṣṭena dviṣatām asubhojināc ājaghne vakṣasi droṇo nārācena dhanaṃjayama sa vihvalitasarvāṅgaḥ kṣitikampe yathācalaḥc dhairyam ālambya bībhatsur droṇaṃ vivyādha patribhiḥa droṇas tu pañcabhir bāṇair vāsudevam atāḍayatc arjunaṃ ca trisaptatyā dhvajaṃ cāsya tribhiḥ śaraiḥa viśeṣayiṣyañ śiṣyaṃ ca droṇo rājan parākramīc adṛśyam arjunaṃ cakre nimeṣāc charavṛṣṭibhiḥa prasaktān patato drākṣma bhāradvājasya sāyakānc maṇḍalīkṛtam evāsya dhanuś cādṛśyatādbhutama te bhyayuḥ samare rājan vāsudevadhanaṃjayauc droṇasṛṣṭāḥ subahavaḥ kaṅkapatraparicchadāḥd tatrādbhutam apaśyāma śilānām iva sarpaṇamd yad droṇaṃ tarasā pārtho vṛddhaṃ bālo pi nātaratd cintayām āsa vārṣṇeyo dṛṣṭvā droṇasya vikramamd nātivartiṣyate hy enaṃ velām iva mahārṇavaḥa tad dṛṣṭvā tādṛśaṃ yuddhaṃ droṇapāṇḍavayos tadāc vāsudevo mahābuddhiḥ kāryavattām acintayatd tataḥ pārthaṃ samudvignaṃ lakṣya cintayate cyutaḥd droṇasya cāpi vikrāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā madhunighātanaḥa tato bravīd vāsudevo dhanaṃjayam idaṃ vacaḥc pārtha pārtha mahābāho na naḥ kālātyayo bhaveta droṇam utsṛjya gacchāmaḥ kṛtyam etan mahattaramc pārthaś cāpy abravīt kṛṣṇaṃ yatheṣṭam iti keśavaa tataḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā droṇaṃ prāyān mahābhujaḥc parivṛttaś ca bībhatsur agacchad visṛjañ śarāna tato bravīt smayan droṇaḥ kvedaṃ pāṇḍava gamyatec nanu nāma raṇe śatrum ajitvā na nivartase arjuna uvācaa gurur bhavān na me śatruḥ śiṣyaḥ putrasamo smi tec na cāsti sa pumāṃl loke yas tvāṃ yudhi parājayet saṃjaya uvācaa evaṃ bruvāṇo bībhatsur jayadrathavadhotsukaḥc tvarāyukto mahābāhus tat sainyaṃ samupādravata taṃ cakrarakṣau pāñcālyau yudhāmanyūttamaujasauc anvayātāṃ mahātmānau viśantaṃ tāvakaṃ balama tato jayo mahārāja kṛtavarmā ca sāttvataḥc kāmbojaś ca śrutāyuś ca dhanaṃjayam avārayana teṣāṃ daśasahasrāṇi rathānām anuyāyināmc abhīṣāhāḥ śūrasenāḥ śibayo tha vasātayaḥa mācellakā lalitthāś ca kekayā madrakās tathāc nārāyaṇāś ca gopālāḥ kāmbojānāṃ ca ye gaṇāḥa karṇena vijitāḥ pūrvaṃ saṃgrāme śūrasaṃmatāḥc bhāradvājaṃ puraskṛtya tyaktātmāno rjunaṃ pratia putraśokābhisaṃtaptaṃ kruddhaṃ mṛtyum ivāntakamc tyajantaṃ tumule prāṇān saṃnaddhaṃ citrayodhinama gāhamānam anīkāni mātaṅgam iva yūthapamc maheṣvāsaṃ parākrāntaṃ naravyāghram avārayana tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇamc anyonyaṃ vai prārthayatāṃ yodhānām arjunasya caa jayadrathavadhaprepsum āyāntaṃ puruṣarṣabhamc nyavārayanta sahitāḥ kriyā vyādhim ivotthitam saṃjaya uvācaa saṃniruddhas tu taiḥ pārtho mahābalaparākramaḥc drutaṃ samanuyātaś ca droṇena rathināṃ varaḥa kirann iṣugaṇāṃs tikṣṇān svaraśmīn iva bhāskaraḥc tāpayām āsa tat sainyaṃ dehaṃ vyādhigaṇo yathāa aśvo viddho dhvajaś chinnaḥ sārohaḥ patito gajaḥc chatrāṇi cāpaviddhāni rathāś cakrair vinā kṛtāḥa vidrutāni ca sainyāni śarārtāni samantataḥc ity āsīt tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ na prājñāyata kiṃ canaa teṣām āyacchatāṃ saṃkhye parasparam ajihmagaiḥc arjuno dhvajinīṃ rājann abhīkṣṇaṃ samakampayata satyāṃ cikīrṣamāṇas tu pratijñāṃ satyasaṃgaraḥc abhyadravad rathaśreṣṭhaṃ śoṇāśvaṃ śvetavāhanaḥa taṃ droṇaḥ pañcaviṃśatyā marmabhidbhir ajihmagaiḥc antevāsinam ācāryo maheṣvāsaṃ samardayata taṃ tūrṇam iva bībhatsuḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥc abhyadhāvad iṣūn asyann iṣuvegavighātakāna tasyāśu kṣipato bhallān bhallaiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥc pratyavidhyad ameyātmā brahmāstraṃ samudīrayana tad adbhutam apaśyāma droṇasyācāryakaṃ yudhic yatamāno yuvā nainaṃ pratyavidhyad yad arjunaḥa kṣarann iva mahāmegho vāridhārāḥ sahasraśaḥc droṇameghaḥ pārthaśailaṃ vavarṣa śaravṛṣṭibhiḥa arjunaḥ śaravarṣaṃ tad brahmāstreṇaiva māriṣac pratijagrāha tejasvī bāṇair bāṇān viśātayand   śaravarṣeṇa vīryavānd avārayad jayadrathaḥc tathā vidhatsva bhadraṃ te tvaṃ hi naḥ paramā gatiḥa asau dhanaṃjayāgnir hi kopamārutacoditaḥc senākakṣaṃ dahati me vahniḥ kakṣam ivotthitaḥa atikrānte hi kaunteye bhittvā sainyaṃ paraṃtapac jayadrathasya goptāraḥ saṃśayaṃ paramaṃ gatāḥa sthirā buddhir narendrāṇām āsīd brahmavidāṃ varac nātikramiṣyati droṇaṃ jātu jīvan dhanaṃjayaḥa so sau pārtho vyatikrānto miṣatas te pravaraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ śīghrāś cāsya hayottamāḥc alpaṃ ca vivaraṃ kṛtvā tūrṇaṃ yāti dhanaṃjayaḥa kiṃ nu paśyasi bāṇaughān krośamātre kirīṭinaḥc paścād rathasya patitān kṣiptāñ śīghraṃ hi gacchataḥa na cāhaṃ śīghrayāne dya samartho vayasānvitaḥc senāmukhe ca pārthānām etad balam upasthitama yudhiṣṭhiraś ca me grāhyo miṣatāṃ sarvadhanvināmc evaṃ mayā pratijñātaṃ kṣatramadhye mahābhujaa dhanaṃjayena cotsṛṣṭo vartate pramukhe mamac tasmād vyūhamukhaṃ hitvā nāhaṃ yāsyāmi phalgunama tulyābhijanakarmāṇaṃ śatrum ekaṃ sahāyavānc gatvā yodhaya mā bhais tvaṃ tvaṃ hy asya jagataḥ patiḥa rājā śūraḥ kṛtī śakyo raṇe jetuṃ vajrahastaḥ puraṃdaraḥc nārjunaḥ samare śakyo jetuṃ parapuraṃjayaḥa yena bhojaś ca hārdikyo bhavāṃś ca tridaśopamaḥc astrapratāpena jitau śrutāyuś ca nibarhitaḥa sudakṣiṇaś ca nihataḥ sa ca rājā śrutāyudhaḥc śrutāyuś cācyutāyuś ca mlecchāś ca śataśo hatāḥa taṃ kathaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ yuddhe dahantam ahitān bahūnc pratiyotsyāmi durdharṣaṃ tan me śaṃsāstrakovidaa kṣamaṃ cen manyase yuddhaṃ mama tenādya śādhi māmc paravān asmi bhavati preṣyakṛd rakṣa me yaśaḥ droṇa uvācaa satyaṃ vadasi kauravya durādharṣo dhanaṃjayaḥc ahaṃ tu tat kariṣyāmi yathainaṃ prasahiṣyasia adbhutaṃ cādya paśyantu loke sarvadhanurdharāḥc viṣaktaṃ tvayi kaunteyaṃ vāsudevasya paśyataḥa eṣa te kavacaṃ rājaṃs tathā badhnāmi kāñcanamc yathā na bāṇā nāstrāṇi viṣahiṣyanti te raṇea yadi tvāṃ sāsurasurāḥ sayakṣoragarākṣasāḥc yodhayanti trayo lokāḥ sanarā nāsti te bhayama na kṛṣṇo na ca kaunteyo na cānyaḥ śastrabhṛd raṇec śarān arpayituṃ kaś cit kavace tava śakṣyatia sa tvaṃ kavacam āsthāya kruddham śastravighātibhiḥc vividhair vismayaṃ jagmus tayoḥ puruṣasiṃhayoḥa hastalāghavam astreṣu darśayantau mahābalauc anyonyaṃ samavidhyetāṃ śarais tau droṇasātyakīa tato droṇasya dāśārhaḥ śarāṃś ciccheda saṃyugec patribhiḥ sudṛḍhair āśu dhanuś caiva mahādyutea nimeṣāntaramātreṇa bhāradvājo paraṃ dhanuḥc sajyaṃ cakāra tac cāśu cicchedāsya sa sātyakiḥa tatas tvaran punar droṇo dhanurhasto vyatiṣṭhatac sajyaṃ sajyaṃ punaś cāsya ciccheda niśitaiḥ śaraiḥd cakāra tatra panthānaṃ yayau yena janārdanaḥd evam ekaśataṃ chinnaṃ dhanuṣāṃ dṛḍhadhanvinād na cāntaraṃ tayor dṛṣṭaṃ saṃdhāne chedane pi caa tato sya saṃyuge droṇo dṛṣṭvā karmātimānuṣamc yuyudhānasya rājendra manasedam acintayata etad astrabalaṃ rāme kārtavīrye dhanaṃjayec bhīṣme ca puruṣavyāghre yad idaṃ sātvatāṃ varea taṃ cāsya manasā droṇaḥ pūjayām āsa vikramamc lāghavaṃ vāsavasyeva saṃprekṣya dvijasattamaḥa tutoṣāstravidāṃ śreṣṭhas tathā devāḥ savāsavāḥb lāghavaṃ vṛṣṇivīrasya vāsavasyeva dṛśya saḥb tuṣṭuvur lāghavāt tasya devāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥb siddhacāraṇasaṃghāś ca sādhu sādhv iti cukruśuḥc na tām ālakṣayām āsur laghutāṃ śīghrakāriṇaḥa devāś ca yuyudhānasya gandharvāś ca viśāṃ patec siddhacāraṇasaṃghāś ca vidur droṇasya karma tata tato nyad dhanur ādāya droṇaḥ kṣatriyamardanaḥc astrair astravidāṃ śreṣṭho yodhayām āsa bhārataa tasyāstrāṇy astramāyābhiḥ pratihanya sa sātyakiḥc jaghāna niśitair bāṇais tad adbhutam ivābhavata tasyātimānuṣaṃ karma dṛṣṭvānyair asamaṃ raṇec yuktaṃ yogena yogajñās tāvakāḥ samapūjayana yad astram asyati droṇas tad evāsyati sātyakiḥc tam ācāryo py asaṃbhrānto yodhayac chatrutāpanaḥd ity āsīt tumulaḥ śabdo durdharṣasya rathaṃ pratia tataḥ kruddho mahārāja dhanurvedasya pāragaḥc vadhāya yuyudhānasya divyam astram udairayata tad āgneyaṃ mahāghoraṃ ripughnam upalakṣya saḥc astraṃ divyaṃ maheṣvāso vāruṇaṃ samudairayata hāhākāro mahān āsīd dṛṣṭvā divyāstradhāriṇauc na vicerus tadākāśe bhūtāny ākāśagāny apia astre te vāruṇāgneye tābhyāṃ bāṇasamāhitec na tāvad abhiṣajyete vyāvartad atha bhāskaraḥa tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā bhīmasenaś ca pāṇḍavaḥc nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca paryarakṣanta sātyakima dhṛṣṭadyumnamukhaiḥ sārdhaṃ virāṭaś ca sakekayaḥc matsyāḥ śālveyasenāś ca droṇam ājagmur añjasāa duḥśāsanaṃ puraskṛtya rājaputrāḥ sahasraśaḥc droṇam abhyupapadyanta sapatnaiḥ parivāritama tato yuddham abhūd rājaṃs tava teṣāṃ ca dhanvināmc rajasā saṃvṛte loke śarajālasamāvṛtea sarvam āvignam abhavan na prājñāyata kiṃ canac sainyena rajasā dhvaste nirmaryādam avartatad tenāntareṇa pārthas tu raṇe jitvā mahārathānd atikrāntas tadā yuddhaṃ kṛtvā paryavatasthivān saṃjaya uvāca vartamāne tathā yuddhe droṇasya saha pāṇḍubhiḥa parivartamāne tv āditye tatra sūryasya raśmibhiḥc rajasā kīryamāṇāś ca mandībhūtāś ca sainikāḥa tiṣṭhatāṃ yudhyamānānāṃ punar āvartatām apic bhajyatāṃ jayatāṃ caiva jagāma tad ahaḥ śanaiḥa tathā teṣu viṣakteṣu sainyeṣu jayagṛddhiṣuc arjuno vāsudevaś ca saindhavāyaiva jagmatuḥa rathamārgapramāṇaṃ tu kaunteyo niśitaiḥ śaraiḥc cakāra tatra panthānaṃ yayau yena janārdanaḥa yatra yatra ratho yāti pāṇḍavasya mahātmanaḥc tatra tatraiva dīryante senās tava viśāṃ patea rathaśikṣāṃ tu dāśārho darśayām āsa vīryavānc uttamādhamamadhyāni maṇḍalāni vidarśayana te tu nāmāṅkitāḥ pītāḥ kālajvalanasaṃnibhāḥc snāyunaddhāḥ suparvāṇaḥ pṛthavo dīrghagāminaḥa vaiṇavāyasmayaśarāḥ svāyatā vividhānanāḥc rudhiraṃ patagaiḥ sārdhaṃ prāṇināṃ papur āhavea rathasthitaḥ krośamātre yān asyaty arjunaḥ śarānc rathe krośam atikrānte tasya te ghnanti śātravāna tārkṣyamārutaraṃhobhir vājibhiḥ sādhuvāhibhiḥc tathāgacchad dhṛṣīkeśaḥ kṛtsnaṃ vismāpayañ jagata na tathā gacchati rathas tapanasya viśāṃ patec nendrasya na ca rudrasya nāpi vaiśravaṇasya caa nānyasya samare rājan gatapūrvas tathā rathaḥc yathā yayāv arjunasya manobhiprāyaśīghragaḥa praviśya tu raṇe rājan keśavaḥ paravīrahāc senāmadhye hayāṃs tūrṇaṃ codayām āsa bhārataa tatas tasya rathaughasya madhyaṃ prāpya hayottamāḥc kṛcchreṇa ratham ūhus taṃ kṣutpipāsāśramānvitāḥa kṣatāś ca bahubhiḥ śastrair yuddhaśauṇḍair anekaśaḥc maṇḍalāni vicitrāṇi vicerus te muhur muhuḥa hatānāṃ vājināgānāṃ rathānāṃ ca naraiḥ sahac upariṣṭād atikrāntāḥ śailābhānāṃ sahasraśaḥd śrameṇa mahatā yuktās te hayā vātaraṃhasaḥd mandavegagatā rājan saṃvṛttās tatra saṃyugea etasminn antare vīrāv āvantyau bhrātarau nṛpac sahasenau samārchetāṃ pāṇḍavaṃ klāntavāhanama tāv arjunaṃ catuḥṣaṣṭyā saptatyā ca janārdanamc śarāṇāṃ ca śatenāśvān avidhyetāṃ mudānvitaua tāv arjuno mahārāja navabhir nataparvabhiḥc ājaghāna raṇe kruddho marmajño marmabhedibhiḥa tatas tau tu śaraugheṇa bībhatsuṃ sahakeśavamc ācchādayetāṃ saṃrabdhau siṃhanādaṃ ca nedatuḥa tayos tu dhanuṣī citre bhallābhyāṃ śvetavāhanaḥc ciccheda samare tūrṇaṃ dhvajau ca kanakojjvalaua athānye dhanuṣī rājan pragṛhya samare tadāc pāṇḍavaṃ bhṛśasaṃkruddhāv ardayām āsatuḥ śaraiḥa tayos tu bhṛśasaṃkruddhaḥ śarābhyāṃ pāṇḍunandanaḥb tau tu śastrabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ śaraiḥ saṃtoṣya bhāratac ciccheda dhanuṣī tūrṇaṃ bhūya eva dhanaṃjayaḥa tathānyair viśikhais tūrṇaṃ hemapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥc jaghānāśvān sapadātāṃs tathobhau pārṣṇisārathīa jyeṣṭhasya ca śiraḥ kāyāt kṣurapreṇa nyakṛntatac sa papāta hataḥ pṛthvyāṃ vātarugṇa iva drumaḥd nihato rudhirāktāṅgaḥ kampayann iva medinīma vindaṃ tu nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā anuvindaḥ pratāpavānc hatāśvaṃ ratham utsṛjya gadāṃ gṛhya mahābalaḥa abhyadravata saṃgrāme bhrātur vadham anusmaranc gadayā gadināṃ śreṣṭho nṛtyann iva mahārathaḥa anuvindas tu gadayā lalāṭe madhusūdanamc spṛṣṭvā nākampayat kruddho mainākam iva parvatama tasyārjunaḥ śaraiḥ ṣaḍbhir grīvāṃ pādau bhujau śiraḥc nicakarta sa saṃchinnaḥ papātādricayo yathāa tatas tau nihatau dṛṣṭvā tayo rājan padānugāḥc abhyadravanta saṃkruddhāḥ kirantaḥ śataśaḥ śarāna tān arjunaḥ śarais tūrṇaṃ nihatya bharatarṣabhac vyarocata yathā vahnir dāvaṃ dagdhvā himātyayea tayoḥ senām atikramya kṛcchrān niryād dhanaṃjayaḥc vibabhau jaladān bhittvā divākara ivoditaḥa taṃ dṛṣṭvā kuravas trastāḥ prahṛṣṭāś cābhavan punaḥc abhyavarṣaṃs tadā pārthaṃ samantād bharatarṣabhaa śrāntaṃ cainaṃ samālakṣya jñātvā dūre ca saindhavamc siṃhanādena mahatā sarvataḥ paryavārayana tāṃs tu dṛṣṭvā susaṃrabdhān utsmayan puruṣarṣabhaḥc śanakair iva dāśārham arjuno vākyam abravīta śarārditāś ca glānāś ca hayā dūre ca saindhavaḥc kim ihānantaraṃ kāryaṃ jyāyiṣṭhaṃ tava rocatea brūhi kṛṣṇa yathātattvaṃ tvaṃ hi prājñatamaḥ sadāc bhavannetrā raṇe śatrūn vijeṣyantīha pāṇḍavāḥa mama tv anantaraṃ kṛtyaṃ yad vai tat saṃnibodha mec hayān vimucya hi sukhaṃ viśalyān kuru mādhavaa evam uktas tu pārthena keśavaḥ pratyuvāca tamc mamāpy etan mataṃ pārtha yad idaṃ te prabhāṣitam arjuna uvācaa aham āvārayiṣyāmi sarvasainyāni keśavac tvam apy atra yathānyāyaṃ kuru kāryam anantaram saṃjaya uvācaa so vatīrya rathopasthād asaṃbhrānto dhanaṃjayaḥc gāṇḍīvaṃ dhanur ādāya tasthau girir ivācalaḥa tam abhyadhāvan krośantaḥ kṣatriyā jayakāṅkṣiṇaḥc idaṃ chidram iti jñātvā dharaṇīsthaṃ dhanaṃjayama tam ekaṃ rathavaṃśena mahatā paryavārayanc vikarṣantaś ca cāpāni visṛjantaś ca sāyakāna astrāṇi ca vicitrāṇi kruddhās tatra vyadarśayanc chādayantaḥ śaraiḥ pārthaṃ meghā iva divākarama abhyadravanta vegena kṣatriyāḥ kṣatriyarṣabhamc rathasiṃhaṃ rathodārāḥ siṃhaṃ mattā iva dvipāḥa tatra pārthasya bhujayor mahad balam adṛśyatab tataḥ pārthas tv ajetavyo mahābāhubalāśrayaḥc yat kruddho bahulāḥ senāḥ sarvataḥ samavārayata astrair astrāṇi saṃvārya dviṣatāṃ sarvato vibhuḥc iṣubhir bahubhis tūrṇaṃ sarvān eva samāvṛṇota tatrāntarikṣe bāṇānāṃ pragāḍhānāṃ viśāṃ patec saṃgharṣeṇa mahārciṣmān pāvakaḥ samajāyataa tatra tatra maheṣvāsaiḥ śvasadbhiḥ śoṇitokṣitaiḥc hayair nāgaiś padātimatsyakalilaṃ śaṅkhadundubhinisvanama asaṃkhyeyam apāraṃ ca rajo bhīlam atīva cac uṣṇīṣakamaṭhacchannaṃ patākāphenamālinama rathasāgaram akṣobhyaṃ mātaṅgāṅgaśilācitamc velābhūtas tadā pārthaḥ patribhiḥ samavārayatd dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācad arjune dharaṇīṃ prāpte hayahaste ca keśaved saṃjaya uvācad etad antaram āsādya kathaṃ pārtho na nirjitaḥd sadyaḥ pārthiva pārthena niruddhāḥ sarvapārthivāḥd rathasthā dharaṇīsthena vākyam acchāndasaṃ yathād bhūmistho pi rathasthāṃs tān pārthaḥ sarvadhanurdharānd eko nivārayām āsa lobhaḥ sarvaguṇān ivaa tato janārdanaḥ saṃkhye priyaṃ puruṣasattamamc asaṃbhrānto mahābāhur arjunaṃ vākyam abravīta udapānam ihāśvānāṃ nālam asti raṇe rjunac parīpsante jalaṃ ceme peyaṃ na tv avagāhanama idam astīty asaṃbhrānto bruvann astreṇa medinīmc abhihatyārjunaś cakre vājipānaṃ saraḥ śubhamd haṃsakāraṇḍavākīrṇaṃ cakravākopaśobhitamd savistīrṇaṃ prasannāmbhaḥ praphullavarapaṅkajamd kūrmamatsyagaṇākīrṇam agādham ṛṣisevitamd bhagavan nāradamuner darśanārthaṃ kṛtaṃ kṣaṇātd evaṃ pārthas tataś cakre vājināṃ ca saraḥ śubhama śaravaṃśaṃ śarasthūṇaṃ śarācchādanam adbhutamc śaraveśmākarot pārthas tvaṣṭevādbhutakarmakṛta tataḥ prahasya govindaḥ sādhu sādhv ity athābravītc śaraveśmani pārthena kṛte tasmin mahāraṇe saṃjaya uvācaa salile janite tasmin kaunteyena mahātmanāc nivārite dviṣatsainye kṛte ca śaraveśmania vāsudevo rathāt tūrṇam avatīrya mahādyutiḥc mocayām āsa turagān vitunnān kaṅkapatribhiḥa adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ tad dṛṣṭvā siṃhanādo mahān abhūtc siddhacāraṇasaṃghānāṃ sainikānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥa padātinaṃ tu kaunteyaṃ yudhyamānaṃ nararṣabhāḥc nāśaknuvan vārayituṃ tad adbhutam ivābhavata āpatatsu rathaugheṣu prabhūtagajavājiṣuc nāsaṃbhramat tadā pārthas tad asya puruṣān atia vyasṛjanta śaraughāṃs te pāṇḍavaṃ prati pārthivāḥc na cāvyathata dharmātmā vāsaviḥ paravīrahāa sa tāni śarajālāni gadāḥ prāsāṃś ca vīryavānc āgatān agrasat pārthaḥ saritaḥ sāgaro yathāa astravegena mahatā pārtho bāhubalena cac sarveṣāṃ pārthivendrāṇām agrasat tāñ śarottamāna tat tu pārthasya vikrāntaṃ vāsudevasya cobhayoḥc apūjayan mahārāja kauravāḥ paramādbhutama kim adbhutataraṃ loke bhavitāpy atha vāpy abhūtc yad aśvān pārthagovindau mocayām āsatū raṇea bhayaṃ vipulam asmāsu tāv adhattāṃ narottamauc tejo vidadhatuś cograṃ visrabdhau raṇamūrdhanid saṃjayaḥd tatrādbhutataraṃ manye tat sainyaṃ tāvakaṃ prabhod dadhāraikau raṇe pārtho velodvṛttam ivārṇavamd pārthasya śarasaṃchanne sainye mahati bhāratad ākāśam iva saṃprāpya vicerus tatra pakṣiṇaḥd na cainaṃ yudhi tiṣṭhantaṃ tava sainyeṣu māriṣad abhyadravata saṃkruddhaḥ pumān kaś cit tu tāvakaḥd sarve vimanaso bhūtvā tava yaudhā viśāṃ pated saṃprekṣya tatra govindaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ ca dhanaṃjayama athotsmayan hṛṣīkeśaḥ strīmadhya iva bhāratac arjunena kṛte saṃkhye śaragarbhagṛhe tadāa upāvartayad avyagras tān aśvān puṣkarekṣaṇaḥc miṣatāṃ sarvasainyānāṃ tvadīyānāṃ viśāṃ pated upāvṛtyotthitān aśvān pāṇibhyāṃ puṣkarekṣaṇaḥd saṃmārjayad raṇe rājan paśyatāṃ sarvayodhināma teṣāṃ śramaṃ ca glāniṃ ca vepathuṃ vamathuṃ vraṇānc sarvaṃ vyapānudat kṛṣṇaḥ kuśalo hy aśvakarmaṇia śalyān uddhṛtya pāṇibhyāṃ parimṛjya ca tān hayānc upāvṛtya yathānyāyaṃ pāyayām āsa vāri saḥa sa tāṃl labdhodakān snātāñ jagdhānnān vigataklamānc yojayām āsa saṃhṛṣṭaḥ punar eva rathottamea sa taṃ rathavaraṃ śauriḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥc samāsthāya mahātejāḥ sārjunaḥ prayayau drutamd yojayitvā hayāṃs tatra vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇād raṇe cacāra govindas tṛṇīkṛtya mahārathāna rathaṃ rathavarasyājau yuktaṃ labdhodakair hayaiḥc dṛṣṭvā kurubalaśreṣṭhāḥ punar vimanaso bhavana viniḥśvasantas te rājan bhagnadaṃṣṭrā ivoragāḥc dhig aho dhig gataḥ pārthaḥ kṛṣṇaś cety abruvan pṛthakd tatsenāḥ sarvato hṛṣṭā lomaharṣaṇam adbhutamd tvaradhvam iti cākrandan naitad astīti cābruvana sarvakṣatrasya miṣato rathenaikena daṃśitauc bālakrīḍanakeneva kadarthīkṛtya no balama krośatāṃ yatamānānām asaṃsaktau paraṃtapauc darśayitvātmano vīryaṃ prayātau sarvarājasud yathā devāsure yuddhe tṛṇīkṛtya sadānavānd indrāviṣṇū purā rājañ kadarthīkṛtya no raṇea tatra ke cin mitho rājan samabhāṣanta bhūmipāḥc adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ saṃgrāme tad dṛṣṭvā mahad adbhutama sarvasainyāni rājā ca dhṛtarāṣṭro tyayaṃ gataḥc duryodhanāparādhena kṣatraṃ kṛtsnā ca medinīa vilayaṃ samanuprāptā tac ca rājā na budhyatec ity evaṃ kṣatriyās tatra bruvanty anye ca bhārataa sindhurājasya yat kṛtyaṃ gatasya yamasādanamc tat karotu vṛthādṛṣṭir dhārtarāṣṭro nupāyavita tataḥ śīghrataraṃ prāyāt pāṇḍavaḥ saindhavaṃ pratic nivartamāne tigmāṃśau hṛṣṭaiḥ pītodakair hayaiḥa taṃ prayāntaṃ mahābāhuṃ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varamc nāśaknuvan vārayituṃ yodhāḥ kruddham ivāntakama vidrāvya tu tataḥ sainyaṃ pāṇḍavaḥ śatrutāpanaḥc yathā mṛgagaṇān siṃhaḥ saindhavārthe vyaloḍayata gāhamānas tv anīkāni tūrṇam aśvān acodayatc balākavarṇān dāśārhaḥ pāñcajanyaṃ vyanādayatd rathavṛndānuśālināmd viśeṣitāḥ prayogāc ca sarvaśatrunibarhaṇāḥa kaunteyenāgrataḥ sṛṣṭā nyapatan pṛṣṭhataḥ śarāḥc tūrṇāt tūrṇataraṃ hy aśvās te vahan vātaraṃhasaḥa vātoddhūtapatākāntaṃ rathaṃ dhanaṃjayamc kṣatriyā bahavaś cānye jayadrathavadhaiṣiṇama apanīyatsu śalyeṣu dhiṣṭhitaṃ puruṣarṣabhamc duryodhanas tv agāt pārthaṃ tvaramāṇo mahāhave saṃjaya uvācaa sraṃsanta iva majjānas tāvakānāṃ bhayān nṛpac tau dṛṣṭvā samatikrāntau vāsudevadhanaṃjayaua sarve tu pratisaṃrabdhā hrīmantaḥ sattvacoditāḥc sthirībūtā mahātmānaḥ pratyagacchan dhanaṃjayama ye gatāḥ pāṇḍavaṃ yuddhe krodhāmarṣasamanvitāḥc te dyāpi na nivartante sindhavaḥ sāgarād ivaa asantas tu nyavartanta vedebhya iva nāstikāḥc narakaṃ bhajamānās te pratyapadyanta kilbiṣama tāv atītya rathānīkaṃ vimuktau puruṣarṣabhauc dadṛśāte yathā rāhor āsyān muktau prabhākaraua matsyāv iva mahājālaṃ vidārya vigatajvarauc tathā kṛṣṇāv adṛśyetāṃ senājālaṃ vidārya tata vimuktau śastrasaṃbādhād droṇānīkāt sudurbhidātc adṛśyetāṃ mahātmānau kālasūryāv ivoditaua astrasaṃbādhanirmuktau vimuktau śastrasaṃkaṭātc adṛśyetāṃ mahātmānau śatrusaṃbādhakāriṇaua vimuktau jvalanasparśān makarāsyāj jhaṣāv ivac vyakṣobhayetāṃ senāṃ tau samudraṃ makarāv ivaa tāvakās tava putrāś ca droṇānīkasthayos tayoḥc naitau tariṣyato droṇam iti cakrus tadā matima tau tu dṛṣṭvā vyatikrāntau droṇānīkaṃ mahādyutīc nāśaśaṃsur mahārāja sindhurājasya jīvitama āśā balavatī rājan putrāṇām abhavat tavac droṇahārdikyayoḥ kṛṣṇau na mokṣyete iti prabhoa tām āśāṃ viphalāṃ kṛtvā nistīrṇau tau paraṃtapauc droṇānīkaṃ mahārāja bhojānīkaṃ ca dustarama atha dṛṣṭvā vyatikrāntau jvalitāv iva pāvakauc nirāśāḥ sindhurājasya jīvitaṃ nāśaśaṃsirea mithaś ca samabhāṣetām abhītau bhayavardhanauc jayadrathavadhe vācas tās tāḥ kṛṣṇadhanaṃjayaua asau madhye kṛtaḥ ṣaḍbhir dhārtarāṣṭrair mahārathaiḥc cakṣurviṣayasaṃprāpto na nau mokṣyati saindhavaḥa yady asya samare goptā śakro devagaṇaiḥ sahac tathāpy enaṃ haniṣyāva iti kṛṣṇāv abhāṣatāma iti kṛṣṇau mahābāhū mithaḥ kathayatāṃ tadāc sindhurājam avekṣantau tat putrās tava śuśruvuḥa atītya marudhanveva prayāntau tṛṣitau gajauc pītvā vāri samāśvastau tathaivāstām ariṃdamaua vyāghrasiṃhagajākīrṇān atikramyeva parvatānc adṛśyetāṃ mahābāhū yathā mṛtyujarātigaua tathā hi mukhavarṇo yam anayor iti menirec tāvakā dṛśya muktau tau vikrośanti sma sarvataḥa droṇād āśīviṣākārāj jvalitād iva pāvakātc anyebhyaḥ pārthivebhyaś ca bhāsvantāv iva bhāskaraua tau muktau sāgaraprakhyād droṇānīkād ariṃdamauc adṛśyetāṃ mudā yuktau samuttīryārṇavaṃ yathāa śastraughān mahato muktau droṇahārdikyarakṣitānc rocamānāv adṛśyetām indrāgnyoḥ sadṛśau raṇea udbhinnarudhirau kṛṣṇau bhāradvājasya sāyakaiḥc śitaiś citau vyarocetāṃ karṇikārair ivācalaua droṇagrāhahradān muktau śaktyāśīviṣasaṃkaṭātc ayaḥśarogramakarāt kṣatriyapravarāmbhasaḥa jyāghoṣatalanirhrādād gadānistriṃśavidyutaḥc droṇāstrameghān nirmuktau sūryendū timirād ivaa bāhubhyām iva saṃtīrṇau sindhuṣaṣṭhāḥ samudragāḥc tapānte saritaḥ pūrṇā mahāgrāhasamākulāḥd mahāśailoccayāṃ ghorāṃ laṅghayitvā mahānadīmd nistīrṇāv adhvagau yadvat tadvat tau tāritau raṇea iti kṛṣṇau maheṣvāsau yaśasā lokaviśrutauc sarvabhūtāny amanyanta droṇāstrabalavismayāta jayadrathaṃ samīpastham avekṣantau jighāṃsayāc ruruṃ nipāne lipsantau vyāghravat tāv atiṣṭhatāma yathā hi mukhavarṇo yam anayor iti menirec tava yodhā mahārāja hatam eva jayadrathama lohitākṣau mahābāhū saṃyattau kṛṣṇapāṇḍavauc sindhurājam abhiprekṣya hṛṣṭau vyanadatāṃ muhuḥa śaurer abhīśuhastasya pārthasya ca dhanuṣmataḥc tayor āsīt pratibhrājaḥ sūryapāvakayor ivaa harṣa eva tayor āsīd droṇānīkapramuktayoḥc samīpe saindhavaṃ dṛṣṭvā śyenayor āmiṣaṃ yathāa tau tu saindhavam ālokya vartamānam ivāntikec sahasā petatuḥ kruddhau kṣipraṃ śyenāv ivāmiṣea tau tu dṛṣṭvā vyatikrāntau hṛṣīkeśadhanaṃjayauc sindhurājasya rakṣārthaṃ parākrāntaḥ sutas tavaa droṇenābaddhakavaco rājā duryodhanas tadāc yayāv ekarathenājau hayasaṃskāravit prabhoa kṛṣṇapārthau maheṣvāsau vyatikramyātha te sutaḥc agrataḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ pratīyāya narādhipaa tataḥ sarveṣu sainyeṣu vāditrāṇi prahṛṣṭavatc prāvādyan samatikrānte tava putre dhanaṃjayama siṃhanādaravāś cāsañ śaṅkhadundubhimiśritāḥc dṛṣṭvā duryodhanaṃ tatra kṛṣṇayoḥ pramukhe sthitama ye ca te sindhurājasya goptāraḥ pāvakopamāḥc te prahṛṣyanta samare dṛṣṭvā putraṃ tavābhibhoa dṛṣṭvā duryodhanaṃ kṛṣṇas tv atikrāntaṃ sahānugamc abravīd arjunaṃ rājan prāptakālam idaṃ vacaḥ vāsudeva uvācaa suyodhanam atikrāntam enaṃ paśya dhanaṃjayac āpadgatam imaṃ manye nāsty asya sadṛśo rathaḥa dūrapātī maheṣvāsaḥ kṛtāstro yuddhadurmadaḥc dṛḍhāstraś citrayodhī ca dhārtarāṣṭro mahābalaḥa atyantasukhasaṃvṛddho mānitaś ca mahārathaiḥc kṛtī ca satataṃ pārtha nityaṃ dveṣṭi ca pāṇḍavāna tena yuddham ahaṃ manye prāptakālaṃ tavānaghac atra vo dyūtam āyātaṃ vijayāyetarāya vāa atra krodhaviṣaṃ pārtha vimuñca cirasaṃbhṛtamc eṣa mūlam anarthānāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathaḥa so yaṃ prāptas tavākṣepaṃ paśya sāphalyam ātmanaḥc kathaṃ hi rājā rājyārthī tvayā gaccheta saṃyugama diṣṭyā tv idānīṃ saṃprāpta eṣa te bāṇagocaramc sa yathā jīvitaṃ jahyāt tathā kuru dhanaṃjayaa aiśvaryamadasaṃmūḍho naiṣa duḥkham upeyivānc na ca te saṃyuge vīryaṃ jānāti puruṣarṣabhaa tvāṃ hi lokās trayaḥ pārtha sasurāsuramānuṣāḥc notsahante raṇe jetuṃ kim utaikaḥ suyodhanaḥa sa diṣṭyā samanuprāptas tava pārtha rathāntikamc jahy enaṃ vai mahābāho yathā vṛtraṃ puraṃdaraḥa eṣa hy anarthe satataṃ parākrāntas tavānaghac nikṛtyā dharmarājaṃ ca dyūte vañcitavān ayama bahūni sunṛśaṃsāni kṛtāny etena mānadac yuṣmāsu pāpamatinā apāpeṣv eva nityadāa tam anāryaṃ sadā kṣudraṃ puruṣaṃ kāmacāriṇamc āryāṃ yuddhe matiṃ kṛtvā jahi pārthāvicārayana nikṛtyā rājyaharaṇaṃ vanavāsaṃ ca pāṇḍavac parikleśaṃ ca kṛṣṇāyā hṛdi kṛtvā parākramaa diṣṭyaiṣa tava bāṇānāṃ gocare parivartatec pratighātāya kāryasya diṣṭyā ca yatate grataḥa diṣṭyā jānāti saṃgrāme yoddhavyaṃ hi tvayā sahac diṣṭyā ca saphalāḥ pārtha sarve kāmā hi kāmitāḥa tasmāj jahi raṇe pārtha dhārtarāṣṭraṃ kulādhamamc yathendreṇa hataḥ pūrvaṃ jambho devāsure mṛdhea asmin hate tvayā sainyam anāthaṃ bhidyatām idamc vairasyāsyās tv avabhṛtho mūlaṃ chindhi durātmanām saṃjaya uvācaa taṃ tathety abravīt pārthaḥ kṛtyarūpam idaṃ mamac sarvam anyad anādṛtya gaccha yatra suyodhanaḥa yenaitad dīrghakālaṃ no bhuktaṃ rājyam akaṇṭakamc apy asya yudhi vikramya chindyāṃ mūrdhānam āhavea api tasyā anarhāyāḥ parikleśasya mādhavac kṛṣṇāyāḥ śaknuyāṃ gantuṃ padaṃ keśapradharṣaṇed apy ahaṃ tāni duḥkhāni pūrvavṛttāni mādhavad duryodhanaṃ raṇe hatvā pratimokṣye kathaṃ canaa ity evaṃ vādinau hṛṣṭau kṛṣṇau śvetān hayottamānc preṣayām āsatuḥ saṃkhye prepsantau taṃ narādhipama tayoḥ samīpaṃ saṃprāpya putras te bharatarṣabhac na cakāra bhayaṃ prāpte bhaye mahati māriṣaa tad asya kṣatriyās tatra sarva evābhyapūjayanc yad arjunahṛṣīkeśau pratyudyāto vicārayana tataḥ sarvasya sainyasya tāvakasya viśāṃ patec mahān nādo hy abhūt tatra dṛṣṭvā rājānam āhavea tasmiñ janasamunnāde pravṛtte bhairave satic kadarthīkṛtya te putraḥ pratyamitram avārayata āvāritas tu kaunteyas tava putreṇa dhanvināc saṃrambham agamad bhūyaḥ sa ca tasmin paraṃtapaḥa tau dṛṣṭvā pratisaṃrabdhau duryodhanadhanaṃjayauc abhyavaikṣanta rājāno bhīmarūpāḥ samantataḥa dṛṣṭvā tu pārthaṃ saṃrabdhaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca māriṣac prahasann iva putras te yoddhukāmaḥ samāhvayata tataḥ prahṛṣṭo dāśārhaḥ pāṇḍavaś ca dhanaṃjayaḥc vyākrośetāṃ mahānādaṃ dadhmatuś cāmbujottamaua tau hṛṣṭarūpau saṃprekṣya kauraveyāś ca sarvaśaḥc nirāśāḥ samapadyanta putrasya tava jīvitea śokam īyuḥ paraṃ caiva kuravaḥ sarva eva tec amanyanta ca putraṃ te vaiśvānaramukhe hutama tathā tu dṛṣṭvā yodhās te prahṛṣṭau kṛṣṇapāṇḍavauc hato rājā hato rājety ūcur evaṃ bhayārditāḥa janasya saṃninādaṃ tu śrutvā duryodhano bravītc vyetu vo bhīr ahaṃ kṛṣṇau preṣayiṣyāmi mṛtyavea ity uktvā sainikān sarvāñ jayāpekṣī narādhipaḥc pārtham ābhāṣya saṃrambhād idaṃ vacanam abravīta pārtha yac chikṣitaṃ te straṃ divyaṃ mānuṣam eva cac tad darśaya mayi kṣipraṃ yadi jāto si pāṇḍunāa yad balaṃ tava vīryaṃ ca keśavasya tathaiva cac tat kuruṣva mayi kṣipraṃ paśyāmas tava pauruṣama asmat parokṣaṃ karmāṇi pravadanti kṛtāni tec svāmisatkārayuktāni yāni tānīha darśaya saṃjaya uvācaa evam uktvārjunaṃ rājā tribhir marmātigaiḥ śaraiḥc pratyavidhyan mahāvegaiś caturbhiś caturo hayāna vāsudevaṃ ca daśabhiḥ pratyavidhyat stanāntarec pratodaṃ cāsya bhallena chittvā bhūmāv apātayata taṃ caturdaśabhiḥ pārthaś citrapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥc avidhyat tūrṇam avyagras te syābhraśyanta varmaṇaḥa teṣāṃ vaiphalyam ālokya punar nava ca pañca cac prāhiṇon niśitān bāṇāṃs te cābhraśyanta varmaṇaḥa aṣṭāviṃśat tu tān bāṇān astān viprekṣya niṣphalānb vaiphalyaṃ cāgatān bāṇāñ chinnān parapuraṃjayaḥc abravīt paravīraghnaḥ kṛṣṇo rjunam idaṃ vacaḥa adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ paśyāmi śilānām iva sarpaṇamc tvayā saṃpreṣitāḥ pārtha nārthaṃ kurvanti patriṇaḥa kaccid gāṇḍīvataḥ prāṇās tathaiva bharatarṣabhac muṣṭiś ca te yathāpūrvaṃ bhujayoś ca balaṃ tavaa na ced vidher ayaṃ kālaḥ prāptaḥ syād adya paścimaḥc tava caivāsya śatroś ca tan mamācakṣva pṛcchataḥa vismayo me mahān pārtha tava dṛṣṭvā śarān imānc vyarthān nipatataḥ saṃkhye duryodhanarathaṃ pratia vajrāśanisamā ghorāḥ parakāyāvabhedinaḥc śarāḥ kurvanti te nārthaṃ pārtha kādya viḍambanā arjuna uvācaa droṇenaiṣā matiḥ kṛṣṇa dhārtarāṣṭre niveśitāc ante vihitam astrāṇām etat kavacadhāraṇama asminn antarhitaṃ kṛṣṇa trailokyam api varmaṇic eko droṇo hi vedaitad ahaṃ tasmāc ca sattamāta na śakyam etat kavacaṃ bāṇair bhettuṃ kathaṃ canac api vajreṇa govinda svayaṃ maghavatā yudhia jānaṃs tvam api vai kṛṣṇa māṃ vimohayase kathamc yadvṛttaṃ triṣu lokeṣu yac ca keśava vartatea tathā bhaviṣyad yac caiva tat sarvaṃ viditaṃ tavac na tv evaṃ veda vai kaś cid yathā tvaṃ madhusūdanaa eṣa duryodhanaḥ kṛṣṇa droṇena vihitām imāmc tiṣṭhaty abhītavat saṃkhye bibhrat kavacadhāraṇāma yat tv atra vihitaṃ kāryaṃ naiṣa tad vetti mādhavac strīvad eṣa bibharty etāṃ yuktāṃ kavacadhāraṇāma paśya bāhvoś ca me vīryaṃ dhanuṣaś ca janārdanac parājayiṣye kauravyaṃ kavacenāpi rakṣitama idam aṅgirase prādād deveśo varma bhāsvaramb tasmād bṛhaspatiḥ prāpa tataḥ prāpa puraṃdaraḥc punar dadau surapatir mahyaṃ varma sasaṃgrahama daivaṃ yady asya varmaitad brahmaṇā vā svayaṃ kṛtamc naitad gopsyati durbuddhim adya bāṇahataṃ mayā saṃjaya uvācaa evam uktvārjuno bāṇān abhimantrya vyakarṣayatb mānavāstreṇa mānārhaḥ sūkṣmāvaraṇabhedināc vikṛṣyamāṇāṃs tenaivaṃ dhanurmadhyagatāñ śarāne tān asyāstreṇa ciccheda drauṇiḥ sarvāstraghātināa tān nikṛttān iṣūn dṛṣṭvā dūrato brahmavādināc nyavedayat keśavāya vismitaḥ śvetavāhanaḥa naitad astraṃ mayā śakyaṃ dviḥ prayoktuṃ janārdanac astraṃ mām eva hanyād dhi paśya tv adya balaṃ mamaa tato duryodhanaḥ kṛṣṇau navabhir nataparvabhiḥc avidhyata raṇe rājañ śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥe bhūya evābhyavarṣac ca samare kṛṣṇapāṇḍavaua śaravarṣeṇa mahatā tato hṛṣyanta tāvakāḥc cakrur vāditraninadān siṃhanādaravāṃs tathāa tataḥ kruddho raṇe pārthaḥ sṛkkaṇī parisaṃlihanc nāpaśyata tato syāṅgaṃ yan na syād varmarakṣitama tato sya niśitair bāṇaiḥ sumuktair antakopamaiḥc hayāṃś cakāra nirdehān ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathīa dhanur asyācchinac citraṃ hastāvāpaṃ ca vīryavānc rathaṃ ca śakalīkartuṃ savyasācī pracakramea duryodhanaṃ ca bāṇābhyāṃ tīkṣṇābhyāṃ virathīkṛtamb prayatnakārī kaunteyo nakhamāṃsāntareṣubhiḥb sa vedanābhir āvignaḥ palāyanaparāyaṇaḥc avidhyad dhastatalayor ubhayor arjunas tadāa taṃ kṛcchrām āpadaṃ prāptaṃ dṛṣṭvā paramadhanvinaḥc samāpetuḥ parīpsanto dhanaṃjayaśarārditama te rathair bahusāhasraiḥ kalpitaiḥ kuñjarair hayaiḥc padātyoghaiś ca saṃrabdhaiḥ parivavrur dhanaṃjayama atha nārjunagovindau ratho vāpi vyadṛśyatac astravarṣeṇa mahatā janaughaiś cāpi saṃvṛtaua tato rjuno stravīryeṇa nijaghne tāṃ varūthinīmc tatra vyaṅgīkṛtāḥ petuḥ śataśo tha rathadvipāḥa te hatā hanyamānāś ca nyagṛhṇaṃs taṃ rathottamamc sa rathastambhitas tasthau krośamātraṃ samantataḥa tato rjunaṃ vṛṣṇivīras tvarito vākyam abravītc dhanur visphārayātyartham ahaṃ dhmāsyāmi cāmbujama tato visphārya balavad gāṇḍīvaṃ jaghnivān ripūnc mahatā śaravarṣeṇa talaśabdena cārjunaḥa pāñcajanyaṃ ca balavad dadhmau tāreṇa keśavaḥc rajasā dhvastapakṣmāntaḥ prasvinnavadano bhṛśamd tenācyutoṣṭhayugapūritamārutenad śaṅkhāntarodaravivṛddhaviniḥsṛtenad nādena sāsuraviyat suralokapālamd udvignam īśvarajagat sphuṭatīva sarvama tasya śaṅkhasya nādena dhanuṣo nisvanena cac niḥsattvāś ca sasattvāś ca kṣitau petus tadā janāḥa tair vimukto ratho reje vāyvīrita ivāmbudaḥc jayadrathasya goptāras tataḥ kṣubdhāḥ sahānugāḥa te dṛṣṭvā sahasā pārthaṃ goptāraḥ saindhavasya tuc cakrur nādān bahuvidhān kampayanto vasuṃdharāma bāṇaśabdaravāṃś cogrān vimiśrāñ śaṅkhanisvanaiḥc prāduścakrur mahātmānaḥ siṃhanādaravān apia taṃ śrutvā ninadaṃ ghoraṃ tāvakānāṃ samutthitamc pradadhmatus tadā śaṅkhau vāsudevadhanaṃjayaua tena śabdena mahatā pūriteyaṃ vasuṃdharāc saśailā sārṇavadvīpā sapātālā viśāṃ patea sa śabdo bharataśreṣṭha vyāpya sarvā diśo daśac pratisasvāna tatraiva kurupāṇḍavayor balea tāvakā rathinas tatra dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇadhanaṃjayauc saṃrambhaṃ paramaṃ prāptās tvaramāṇā mahārathāḥa atha kṛṣṇau mahābhāgau tāvakā dṛśya daṃśitauc abhyadravanta saṃkruddhās tad adbhutam ivābhavat saṃjaya uvācaa tāvakās tu samīkṣyaiva vṛṣṇyandhakakurūttamauc prāg atvarañ jighāṃsantas tathaiva vijayaḥ parāna suvarṇacitrair vaiyāghraiḥ svanavadbhir mahārathaiḥc dīpayanto diśaḥ sarvā jvaladbhir iva pāvakaiḥa rukmapṛṣṭhaiś ca duṣprekṣyaiḥ kārmukaiḥ pṛthivīpatec kūjadbhir atulān nādān roṣitair uragair ivaa bhūriśravāḥ śalaḥ karṇo vṛṣaseno jayadrathaḥc kṛpaś ca madrarājaś ca drauṇiś ca rathināṃ varaḥa te pibanta ivākāśam aśvair aṣṭau mahārathāḥc vyarājayan daśa diśo vaiyāghrair hemacandrakaiḥa te daṃśitāḥ susaṃrabdhā rathair meghaughanisvanaiḥc samāvṛṇvan diśaḥ sarvāḥ pārthaṃ ca viśikhaiḥ śitaiḥa kaulūtakā hayāś citrā vahantas tān mahārathānc vyaśobhanta tadā śīghrā dīpayanto diśo daśaa ājāneyair mahāvegair nānādeśasamutthitaiḥc pārvatīyair nadījaiś ca saindhavaiś ca hayottamaiḥa kuruyodhavarā rājaṃs tava putraṃ parīpsavaḥc dhanaṃjayarathaṃ śīghraṃ sarvataḥ samupādravana te pragṛhya mahāśaṅkhān dadhmuḥ puruṣasattamāḥc pūrayanto divaṃ rājan pṛthivīṃ ca sasāgarāma tathaiva dadhmatuḥ śaṅkhau vāsudevadhanaṃjayauc pravarau sarvabhūtānāṃ sarvaśaṅkhavarau bhuvie devadattaṃ ca kaunteyaḥ pāñcajanyaṃ ca keśavaḥa śabdas tu devadattasya dhanaṃjayasamīritaḥc pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣaṃ ca diśaś caiva samāvṛṇota tathaiva pāñcajanyo pi vāsudevasamīritaḥc sarvaśabdān atikramya pūrayām āsa rodasīa tasmiṃs tathā vartamāne dāruṇe nādasaṃkulec bhīrūṇāṃ trāsajanane śūrāṇāṃ harṣavardhanea pravāditāsu bherīṣu jharjhareṣv ānakeṣu cac mṛdaṅgeṣu ca rājendra vādyamāneṣv anekaśaḥa mahārathasamākhyātā duryodhanahitaiṣiṇaḥc amṛṣyamāṇās taṃ śabdaṃ kruddhāḥ paramadhanvinaḥe nānādeśyā mahīpālāḥ svasainyaparirakṣiṇaḥa amarṣitā mahāśaṅkhān dadhmur vīrā mahārathāḥc kṛte pratikariṣyantaḥ keśavasyārjunasya caa babhūva tava tat sainyaṃ śaṅkhaśabdasamīritamc udvignarathanāgāśvam asvastham iva cābhibhoa tat prayuktam ivākāśaṃ śūraiḥ śaṅkhanināditamc babhūva bhṛśam udvignaṃ nirghātair iva nāditama sa śabdaḥ sumahān rājan diśaḥ sarvā vyanādayatc trāsayām āsa tat sainyaṃ yugānta iva saṃbhṛtaḥa tato duryodhano ṣṭau ca rājānas te mahārathāḥc jayadrathasya rakṣārthaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ paryavārayana tato drauṇis trisaptatyā vāsudevam atāḍayatc arjunaṃ ca tribhir bhallair dhvajam aśvāṃś ca pañcabhiḥa tam arjunaḥ pṛṣatkānāṃ śataiḥ ṣaḍbhir atāḍayatc atyartham iva saṃkruddhaḥ pratividdhe janārdanea karṇaṃ dvādaśabhir viddhvā vṛṣasenaṃ tribhis tathāc śalyasya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ muṣṭau ciccheda vīryavāna gṛhītvā dhanur anyat tu śalyo vivyādha pāṇḍavamc bhūriśravās tribhir bāṇair hemapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥa karṇo dvātriṃśatā caiva vṛṣasenaś ca pañcabhiḥc jayadrathas trisaptatyā kṛpaś ca daśabhiḥ śaraiḥe madrarājaś ca daśabhir vivyadhuḥ phalgunaṃ raṇea tataḥ śarāṇāṃ ṣaṣṭyā tu drauṇiḥ pārtham avākiratc vāsudevaṃ ca saptatyā punaḥ pārthaṃ ca pañcabhiḥa prahasaṃs tu naravyāghraḥ śvetāśvaḥ kṛṣṇasārathiḥc pratyavidhyat sa tān sarvān darśayan pāṇilāghavama karṇaṃ dvādaśabhir viddhvā vṛṣasenaṃ tribhiḥ śaraiḥc śalyasya samare cāpaṃ muṣṭideśe nyakṛntataa saumadattiṃ tribhir viddhvā śalyaṃ ca daśabhiḥ śaraiḥc śitair agniśikhākārair drauṇiṃ vivyādha cāṣṭabhiḥa gautamaṃ pañcaviṃśatyā śaindhavaṃ ca śatena hac punar drauṇiṃ ca saptatyā śarāṇāṃ so bhyatāḍayata bhūriśravās tu saṃkruddhaḥ pratodaṃ cicchide hareḥc arjunaṃ ca trisaptatyā bāṇānām ājaghāna haa tataḥ śaraśatais tīkṣṇais tān arīñ śvetavāhanaḥc pratyaṣedhad drutaṃ kruddho mahāvāto ghanān iva dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa dhvajān bahuvidhākārān bhrājamānān atiśriyāc pārthānāṃ māmakānāṃ ca tān mamācakṣva saṃjaya saṃjaya uvācaa dhvajān bahuvidhākārāñ śṛṇu teṣāṃ mahātmanāmc rūpato varṇataś caiva nāmataś ca nibodha mea teṣāṃ tu rathamuhyānāṃ ratheṣu vividhā dhvajāḥc pratyadṛśyanta rājendra jvalitā iva pāvakāḥa kāñcanāḥ kāñcanāpīḍāḥ kāñcanasragalaṃkṛtāḥc kāñcanānīva śṛṅgāṇi kāñcanasya mahāgireḥd anekavarṇā vividhā dhvajāḥ paramaśobhinaḥa te dhvajāḥ saṃvṛtās teṣāṃ patākābhiḥ samantataḥc nānāvarṇavirāgābhir vibabhuḥ sarvato vṛtāḥa patākāś ca tatas tās tu śvasanena samīritāḥc nṛtyamānāḥ vyadṛśyanta raṅgamadhye vilāsikāḥa indrāyudhasavarṇābhāḥ patākā bharatarṣabhac dodhūyamānā rathināṃ śobhayanti mahārathāna siṃhalāṅgūlam ugrāsyaṃ dhajaṃ vānaralakṣaṇamc dhanaṃjayasya saṃgrāme pratyapaśyāma bhairavama sa vānaravaro rājan patākābhir alaṃkṛtaḥc trāsayām āsa tat sainyaṃ dhvajo gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥa tathaiva siṃhalāṅgūlaṃ droṇaputrasya bhāratac dhvajāgraṃ samapaśyāma bālasūryasamaprabhama kāñcanaṃ pavanoddhūtaṃ śakradhvajasamaprabhamc nandanaṃ kauravendrāṇāṃ drauṇer lakṣaṇam ucchritama hastikakṣyā punar haimī babhūvādhirather dhvajec āhave khaṃ mahārāja dadṛśe pūrayann ivaa patākī kāñcanasragvī dhvajaḥ karṇasya saṃyugec nṛtyatīva rathopasthe śvasanena samīritaḥa ācāryasya ca pāṇḍūnāṃ brāhmaṇasya yaśasvinaḥc govṛṣo gautamasyāsīt kṛpasya supariṣkṛtaḥa sa tena bhrājate rājan govṛṣeṇa mahārathaḥc tripuraghnaratho yadvad govṛṣeṇa virājatea mayūro vṛṣasenasya kāñcano maṇiratnavānc vyāhariṣyann ivātiṣṭhat senāgram api śobhayana tena tasya ratho bhāti mayūreṇa mahātmanaḥc yathā skandasya rājendra mayūreṇa virājatāa madrarājasya śalyasya dhvajāgre gniśikhām ivac sauvarṇīṃ pratipaśyāma sītām apratimāṃ śubhāma sā sītā bhrājate tasya ratham āsthāya māriṣac sarvabījavirūḍheva yathā sītā śriyā vṛtāa varāhaḥ sindhurājasya rājato bhivirājatec dhvajāgre lohitārkābho hemajālapariṣkṛtaḥa śuśubhe ketunā tena rājatena jayadrathaḥc yathā devāsure yuddhe purā pūṣā sma śobhatea saumadatteḥ punar yūpo yajñaśīlasya dhīmataḥc dhvajaḥ sūrya ivābhāti somaś cātra pradṛśyatea sa yūpaḥ kāñcano rājan saumadatter virājatec rājasūye makhaśreṣṭhe yathā yūpaḥ samucchritaḥa śalasya tu mahārāja rājato dvirado mahānc ketuḥ kāñcanacitrāṅgair mayūrair upaśobhitaḥa sa ketuḥ śobhayām āsa sainyaṃ te bharatarṣabhac yathā śveto mahānāgo devarājacamūṃ tathāa nāgo maṇimayo rājño dhvajaḥ kanakasaṃvṛtaḥc kiṅkiṇīśatasaṃhrādo bhrājaṃś citre rathottamea vyabhrājata bhṛśaṃ rājan putras tava viśāṃ patec dhvajena mahatā saṃkhye kurūṇām ṛṣabhas tadāa navaite tava vāhinyām ucchritāḥ paramadhvajāḥc vyadīpayaṃs te pṛtanāṃ yugāntādityasaṃnibhāḥa daśamas tv arjunasyāsīd eka eva mahākapiḥc adīpyatārjuno yena himavān iva vahnināa tataś citrāṇi śubhrāṇi sumahānti mahārathāḥc kārmukāṇy ādadus tūrṇam arjunārthe paraṃtapāḥa tathaiva dhanur āyacchat pārthaḥ śatruvināśanaḥc gāṇḍīvaṃ divyakarmā tad rājan durmantrite tavaa tavāparādhād dhi narā nihatā bahudhā yudhic nānādigbhyaḥ samāhūtāḥ sahayāḥ sarathadvipāḥa teṣām āsīd vyatikṣepo garjatām itaretaramc duryodhanamukhānāṃ ca pāṇḍūnām ṛṣabhasya caa tatrādbhutaṃ paraṃ cakre kaunteyaḥ kṛṣṇasārathiḥc yad eko bahubhiḥ sārdhaṃ samāgacchad abhītavata aśobhata mahābāhur gāṇḍīvaṃ vikṣipan dhanuḥc jigīṣus tān naravyāghrāñ jighāṃsuś ca jayadrathama tatrārjuno mahārāja śarair muktaiḥ sahasraśaḥc adṛśyān akarod yodhāṃs tāvakāñ śatrutāpanaḥa tatas te pi naravyāghrāḥ pārthaṃ sarve mahārathāḥc adṛśyaṃ samare cakruḥ sāyakaughaiḥ samantataḥa saṃvṛte narasiṃhais taiḥ kurūṇām ṛṣabhe rjunec mahān āsīt samuddhūtas tasya sainyasya nisvanaḥ dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa arjune saindhavaṃ prāpte bhāradvājena saṃvṛtāḥc pāñcālāḥ kurubhiḥ sārdhaṃ kim akurvata saṃjaya saṃjaya uvācaa aparāhṇe mahārāja saṃgrāme lomaharṣaṇec pāñcālānāṃ kurūṇāṃ ca droṇe dyūtam avartataa pāñcālā hi jighāṃsanto droṇaṃ saṃhṛṣṭacetasaḥc abhyavarṣanta garjantaḥ śaravarṣāṇi māriṣaa tataḥ sutumulas teṣāṃ saṃgrāmo vartatādbhutaḥc pāñcālānāṃ kurūṇāṃ ca ghoro devāsuropamaḥa sarve droṇarathaṃ prāpya pāñcālāḥ paṇḍavaiḥ sahac tad anīkaṃ bibhitsanto mahāstrāṇi vyadarśayana droṇasya rathaparyantaṃ rathino ratham āsthitāḥc kampayanto bhyavartanta vegam āsthāya madhyamama tam abhyagād bṛhatkṣatraḥ kekayānāṃ mahārathaḥc pravapan niśitān bāṇān mahendrāśanisaṃnibhāna taṃ tu pratyudiyāc chīghraṃ kṣemadhūrtir mahāyaśāḥc vimuñcan niśitān bāṇāñ śataśo tha sahasraśaḥa dhṛṣṭaketuś ca cedīnām ṛṣabho tibaloditaḥc tvarito bhyadravad droṇaṃ mahendra iva śambarama tam āpatantaṃ sahasā vyāditāsyam ivāntakamc vīradhanvā maheṣvāsas tvaramāṇaḥ samabhyayāta yudhiṣṭhiraṃ mahārāja jigīṣuṃ samavasthitamc sahānīkaṃ tato droṇo nyavārayata vīryavāna nakulaṃ kuśalaṃ yuddhe parākrāntaṃ parākramīc abhyagacchat samāyāntaṃ vikarṇas te sutaḥ prabhoa sahadevaṃ tathāyāntaṃ durmukhaḥ śatrukarśanaḥc śarair anekasāhasraiḥ samavākirad āśugaiḥa sātyakiṃ tu naravyāghraṃ vyāghradattas tv avārayatc śaraiḥ suniśitais tīkṣṇaiḥ kampayan vai muhur muhuḥa draupadeyān naravyāghrān muñcataḥ sāyakottamānc saṃrabdhān rathināṃ śreṣṭhān saumadattir avārayata bhīmasenaṃ tathā kruddhaṃ bhīmarūpo bhayānakamc pratyavārayad āyāntam ārṣyaśṛṅgir mahārathaḥa tayoḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ nararākṣasayor mṛdhec yādṛg eva purā vṛttaṃ rāmarāvaṇayor nṛpaa tato yudhiṣṭhiro droṇaṃ navatyā nataparvaṇāmc ājaghne bharataśreṣṭha sarvamarmasu bhārataa taṃ droṇaḥ pañcaviṃśatyā nijaghāna stanāntarec roṣito bharataśreṣṭha kaunteyena yaśasvināa bhūya eva tu viṃśatyā sāyakānāṃ samācinotb adṛśyaṃ samare cakre rājānaṃ sāyakottamaiḥc sāśvasūtadhvajaṃ droṇaḥ paśyatāṃ sarvadhanvināma tāñ śarān droṇamuktāṃs tu śaravarṣeṇa pāṇḍavaḥc avārayata dharmātmā darśayan pāṇilāghavama tato droṇo bhṛśaṃ kruddho dharmarājasya saṃyugec ciccheda sahasā dhanvī dhanus tasya mahātmanaḥa athainaṃ chinnadhanvānaṃ tvaramāṇo mahārathaḥc śarair anekasāhasraiḥ purayām āsa sarvataḥa adṛśyaṃ dṛśya rājānaṃ bhāradvājasya sāyakaiḥc sarvabhūtāny amanyanta hatam eva yudhiṣṭhirama ke cic cainam amanyanta tathā vai vimukhīkṛtamc hṛto rājeti rājendra brāhmaṇena yaśasvināa sa kṛcchraṃ paramaṃ prāpto dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥc tyaktvā tat kārmukaṃ chinnaṃ bhāradvājena saṃyugee ādade nyad dhanur divyaṃ bhāraghnaṃ vegavattarama tatas tān sāyakān sarvān droṇamuktān sahasraśaḥc ciccheda samare vīras tad adbhutam ivābhavata chittvā ca tāñ śarān rājā krodhasaṃraktalocanaḥc śaktiṃ jagrāha samare girīṇām api dāraṇīme svarṇadaṇḍāṃ mahāghorām aṣṭaghaṇṭāṃ bhayāvahāma samutkṣipya ca tāṃ hṛṣṭo nanāda balavad balīc nādena sarvabhūtāni trāsayann iva bhārataa śaktiṃ samudyatāṃ dṛṣṭvā dharmarājena saṃyugec svasti droṇāya sahasā sarvabhūtāny athābruvana sā rājabhujanirmuktā nirmuktoragasaṃnibhāc prajvālayantī gaganaṃ diśaś ca vidiśas tathāe droṇāntikam anuprāptā dīptāsyā pannagī yathāe   kālarātrīva bhāratae kanyevoragarājasyaa tām āpatantīṃ sahasā prekṣya droṇo viśāṃ patec prāduścakre tato brāhmam astram astravidāṃ varaḥa tad astraṃ bhasmasāt kṛtvā tāṃ śaktiṃ ghoradarśanāmc jagāma syandanaṃ tūrṇaṃ pāṇḍavasya yaśasvinaḥa tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā droṇāstraṃ tat samudyatamc aśāmayan mahāprājño brahmāstreṇaiva bhārataa vivyādha ca raṇe droṇaṃ pañcabhir nataparvabhiḥc kṣurapreṇa ca tīkṣṇena cicchedāsya mahad dhanuḥa tad apāsya dhanuś chinnaṃ droṇaḥ kṣatriyamardanaḥc gadāṃ cikṣepa sahasā dharmaputrāya māriṣaa tām āpatantīṃ sahasā gadāṃ dṛṣṭvā yudhiṣṭhiraḥc gadām evāgrahīt kruddhaś cikṣepa ca paraṃtapaḥa te gade sahasā mukte samāsādya parasparamc saṃgharṣāt pāvakaṃ muktvā sameyātāṃ mahītalea tato droṇo bhṛśaṃ kruddho dharmarājasya māriṣac caturbhir niśitais tīkṣṇair hayāñ jaghne śarottamaiḥa dhanuś caikena bāṇena cicchedendradhvajopamamc ketum ekena ciccheda pāṇḍavaṃ cārdayat tribhiḥa hatāśvāt tu rathāt tūrṇam avaplutya yudhiṣṭhiraḥc tasthāv ūrdhvabhujo rājā vyāyudho bharatarṣabhaa virathaṃ taṃ samālokya vyāyudhaṃ ca viśeṣataḥc droṇo vyamohayac chatrūn sarvasainyāni cābhibhoa muñcann iṣugaṇāṃs tīkṣṇāṃl laghuhasto dṛḍhavrataḥc abhidudrāva rājānaṃ siṃho mṛgam ivolbaṇaḥa tam abhidrutam ālokya droṇenāmitraghātināc hā heti sahasā śabdaḥ pāṇḍūnāṃ samajāyataa hṛto rājā hṛto rājā bhāradvājena māriṣac ity āsīt sumahāñ śabdaḥ pāṇḍusainyasya sarvataḥa tatas tvaritam āruhya sahadevarathaṃ nṛpaḥc apāyāj javanair aśvaiḥ kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ saṃjaya uvācaa bṛhatkṣatram athāyāntaṃ kekayaṃ dṛḍhavikramamc kṣemadhūrtir mahārāja vivyādhorasi mārgaṇaiḥa bṛhatkṣatras tu taṃ rājā navatyā nataparvaṇāmc ājaghne tvarito yuddhe droṇānīkabibhitsayāa kṣemadhūrtis tu saṃkruddhaḥ kekayasya mahātmanaḥc dhanuś ciccheda bhallena pītena niśitena caa athainaṃ chinnadhanvānaṃ śareṇa nataparvaṇāc vivyādha hṛdaye tūrṇaṃ pravaraṃ sarvadhanvināma athānyad dhanur ādāya bṛhatkṣatro hasann ivac vyaśvasūtadhvajaṃ cakre kṣemadhūrtiṃ mahārathama tato pareṇa bhallena pītena niśitena cac jahāra nṛpateḥ kāyāc chiro jvalitakuṇḍalama tac chinnaṃ sahasā tasya śiraḥ kuñcitamūrdhajamc sakirīṭaṃ mahīṃ prāpya babhau jyotir ivāmbarāta taṃ nihatya raṇe hṛṣṭo bṛhatkṣatro mahārathaḥc sahasābhyapatat sainyaṃ tāvakaṃ pārthakāraṇāta dhṛṣṭaketum athāyāntaṃ droṇahetoḥ parākramīc vīradhanvā maheṣvāso vārayām āsa bhārataa tau parasparam āsādya śaradaṃṣṭrau tarasvinauc śarair anekasāhasrair anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥa tāv ubhau naraśārdūlau yuyudhāte parasparamc mahāvane tīvramadau vāraṇāv iva yūthapaua girigahvaram āsādya śārdūlāv iva roṣitauc yuyudhāte mahāvīryau parasparajighāṃsayād tāv ubhau naraśārdūlau pīḍayantau parasparama tad yuddham āsīt tumulaṃ prekṣaṇīyaṃ viśāṃ patec siddhacāraṇasaṃghānāṃ vismayādbhutadarśanama vīradhanvā tataḥ kruddho dhṛṣṭaketoḥ śarāsanamc dvidhā ciccheda bhallena prahasann iva bhārataa tad utsṛjya dhanuś chinnaṃ cedirājo mahārathaḥc śaktiṃ jagrāha vipulāṃ rukmadaṇḍām ayasmayīma tāṃ tu śaktiṃ mahāvīryāṃ dorbhyām āyamya bhāratac cikṣepa sahasā yatto vīradhanvarathaṃ pratia sa tayā vīraghātinyā śaktyā tv abhihato bhṛśamc nirbhinnahṛdayas tūrṇaṃ nipapāta rathān mahīma tasmin vinihate śūre trigartānāṃ mahārathec balaṃ te bhajyata vibho pāṇḍaveyaiḥ samantataḥd sahadevas tataḥ kruddho durmukhena samāgataḥa sahadeve tataḥ ṣaṣṭiṃ sāyakān durmukho kṣipatc nanāda ca mahānādaṃ tarjayan pāṇḍavaṃ raṇea madreyas tu tataḥ kruddho durmukhaṃ daśabhiḥ śaraiḥc bhrātā bhrātaram āyāntaṃ vivyādha prahasann ivaa taṃ raṇe rabhasaṃ dṛṣṭvā sahadevaṃ mahābalamc durmukho navabhir bāṇais tāḍayām āsa bhārataa durmukhasya tu bhallena chittvā ketuṃ mahābalaḥc jaghāna caturo vāhāṃś caturbhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥa athāpareṇa bhallena pītena niśitena cac ciccheda sāratheḥ kāyāc chiro jvalitakuṇḍalama kṣurapreṇa ca tīkṣṇena kauravyasya mahad dhanuḥc sahadevo raṇe chittvā taṃ ca vivyādha pañcabhiḥa hatāśvaṃ tu rathaṃ tyaktvā durmukho vimanās tadāc āruroha rathaṃ rājan niramitrasya bhārataa sahadevas tataḥ kruddho niramitraṃ mahāhavec jaghāna pṛtanāmadhye bhallena paravīrahāa sa papāta rathopasthān niramitro janeśvaraḥc trigartarājasya suto vyathayaṃs tava vāhinīma taṃ tu hatvā mahābāhuḥ sahadevo vyarocatac yathā dāśarathī rāmaḥ kharaṃ hatvā mahābalama hāhākāro mahān āsīt trigartānāṃ janeśvarac rājaputraṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā niramitraṃ mahābalama nakulas te sutaṃ rājan vikarṇaṃ pṛthulocanamc muhūrtāj jitavān saṃkhye tad adbhutam ivābhavata sātyakiṃ vyāghradattas tu śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥc cakre dṛśyaṃ sāśvasūtaṃ sadhvajaṃ pṛtanāntared sāśvasūtadhvajaṃ cakre adṛśyaṃ pṛtanāntarea tān nivārya śarāñ śūraḥ śaineyaḥ kṛtahastavatc sāśvasūtadhvajaṃ bāṇair vyāghradattam apātayata kumāre nihate tasmin magadhasya sute prabhoc māgadhāḥ sarvato yattā yuyudhānam upādravana visṛjantaḥ śarāṃś caiva tomarāṃś ca sahasraśaḥc bhiṇḍipālāṃs tathā prāsān mudgarān musalān apia ayodhayan raṇe śūrāḥ sātvataṃ yuddhadurmadamc tāṃs tu sarvān sa balavān sātyaktir yuddhadurmadaḥe nātikṛcchrād dhasann eva vijigye puruṣarṣabhaa māgadhān dravato dṛṣṭvā hataśeṣān samantataḥc balaṃ te bhajyata vibho yuyudhānaśarārditama nāśayitvā raṇe sainyaṃ tvadīyaṃ mādhavottamaḥc vidhunvāno dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ vyabhrājata mahāyaśāḥd yathā daityacamūṃ hatvā śakro rājan vyarocataa bhajyamānaṃ balaṃ rājan sātvatena mahātmanāc nābhyavartata yuddhāya trāsitaṃ dīrghabāhunāa tato droṇo bhṛśaṃ kruddhaḥ sahasodvṛtya cakṣuṣīc sātyakiṃ satyakarmāṇaṃ svayam evābhidudruve saṃjaya uvācaa
