mahārathamc sātyakiḥ pañcaviṃśatyā kṣudrakāṇāṃ samārpayata droṇo pi yudhi vikrānto yuyudhānaṃ samāhitaḥc avidhyat pañcabhis tūrṇaṃ hemapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥa te varma bhittvā sudṛḍhaṃ dviṣatpiśitabhojanāḥc abhyagur dharaṇīṃ rājañ śvasanta iva pannagāḥa dīrghabāhur abhikruddhas tottrārdita iva dvipaḥc droṇaṃ pañcāśatāvidhyan nārācair agnisaṃnibhaiḥa bhāradvājo raṇe viddho yuyudhānena satvaramc sātyakiṃ bahubhir bāṇair yatamānam avidhyataa tataḥ kruddho maheṣvāso bhūya eva mahābalaḥc sātvataṃ pīḍayām āsa śatena nataparvaṇāa sa vadhyamānaḥ samare bhāradvājena sātyakiḥc nābhyapadyata kartavyaṃ kiṃ cid eva viśāṃ patea viṣaṇṇavadanaś cāpi yuyudhāno bhavan nṛpac bhāradvājaṃ raṇe dṛṣṭvā visṛjantaṃ śitāñ śarāna taṃ tu saṃprekṣya te putrāḥ sainikāś ca viśāṃ patec prahṛṣṭamanaso bhūtvā siṃhavad vyanadan muhuḥa taṃ śrutvā ninadaṃ ghoraṃ pīḍyamānaṃ ca mādhavamc yudhiṣṭhiro bravīd rājan sarvasainyāni bhārataa eṣa vṛṣṇivaro vīraḥ sātyakiḥ satyakarmakṛtc grasyate yudhi vīreṇa bhānumān iva rāhuṇāe abhidravata gacchadhvaṃ sātyakir yatra yudhyatea dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pāñcālyam idam āha janādhipab droṇaṃ vāraya sukṣipraṃ satyakaṃ mā vadhīd dvijaḥc abhidrava drutaṃ droṇaṃ kiṃ nu tiṣṭhasi pārṣatae na paśyasi bhayaṃ ghoraṃ droṇān naḥ samupasthitama asau droṇo maheṣvāso yuyudhānena saṃyugec krīḍate sūtrabaddhena pakṣiṇā bālako yathāa tatraiva sarve gacchantu bhīmasenamukhā rathāḥc tvayaiva sahitā yattā yuyudhānarathaṃ pratia pṛṣṭhato nugamiṣyāmi tvām ahaṃ sahasainikaḥc sātyakiṃ mokṣayasvādya yamadaṃṣṭrāntaraṃ gatama evam uktvā tato rājā sarvasainyena pāṇḍavaḥc abhyadravad raṇe droṇaṃ yuyudhānasya kāraṇāta tatrārāvo mahān āsīd droṇam ekaṃ yuyutsatāmc pāṇḍavānāṃ ca bhadraṃ te sṛñjayānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥa te sametya naravyāghrā bhāradvājaṃ mahārathamc abhyavarṣañ śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ kaṅkabarhiṇavājitaiḥa smayann eva tu tān vīrān droṇaḥ pratyagrahīt svayamc atithīn āgatān yadvat salilenāsanena caa tarpitās te śarais tasya bhāradvājasya dhanvinaḥc ātitheyagṛhaṃ prāpya nṛpate tithayo yathāa bhāradvājaṃ ca te sarve na śekuḥ prativīkṣitumc madhyaṃdinam anuprāptaṃ sahasrāṃśum iva prabhoa tāṃs tu sarvān maheṣvāsān droṇaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥc atāpayac charavrātair gabhastibhir ivāṃśumāna vadhyamānā raṇe rājan pāṇḍavāḥ sṛñjayās tathāc trātāraṃ nādhyagacchanta paṅkamagnā iva dvipāḥa droṇasya ca vyadṛśyanta visarpanto mahāśarāḥc gabhastaya ivārkasya pratapantaḥ samantataḥa tasmin droṇena nihatāḥ pāñcālāḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥc mahārathasamākhyātā dhṛṣṭadyumnasya saṃmatāḥa pāṇḍūnāṃ sarvasainyeṣu pāñcālānāṃ tathaiva cab pāñcāleṣv atha śūreṣu kekayeṣu ca mānavāḥc droṇaṃ sma dadṛśuḥ śūraṃ vinighnantaṃ varān varāna kekayānāṃ śataṃ hatvā vidrāvya ca samantataḥc droṇas tasthau mahārāja vyāditāsya ivāntakaḥa pāñcālān sṛñjayān matsyān kekayān pāṇḍavān apic droṇo jayan mahābāhuḥ śataśo tha sahasraśaḥa teṣāṃ samabhavac chabdo vadhyatāṃ droṇasāyakaiḥc vanaukasām ivāraṇye dahyatāṃ dhūmaketunāa tatra devāḥ sagandharvāḥ pitaraś cābruvan nṛpac ete dravanti pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavāś ca sasainikāḥa taṃ tathā samare droṇaṃ nighnantaṃ somakān raṇec na cāpy abhiyayuḥ ke cid apare naiva vivyadhuḥa vartamāne tathā raudre tasmin vīravarakṣayec aśṛṇot sahasā pārthaḥ pāñcajanyasya nisvanama pūrito vāsudevena śaṅkharāṭ svanate bhṛśamc yudhyamāneṣu vīreṣu saindhavasyābhirakṣiṣue nadatsu dhārtarāṣṭreṣu vijayasya rathaṃ pratia gāṇḍīvasya ca nirghoṣe vipranaṣṭe samantataḥc kaśmalābhihato rājā cintayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥa na nūnaṃ svasti pārthasya yathā nadati śaṅkharāṭc kauravāś ca yathā hṛṣṭā vinadanti muhur muhuḥd saṃjaya uvācad vyaktam adya vinaśyante sarvalokamahārathāḥd śrutvā tu ninadaṃ ghoraṃ pāñcajanyasya māriṣaa evaṃ saṃcintayitvā tu vyākulenāntarātmanāc ajātaśatruḥ kaunteyaḥ sātvataṃ pratyabhāṣataa bāṣpagadgadayā vācā muhyamāno muhur muhuḥc kṛtyasyānantarāpekṣī śaineyaṃ śinipuṃgavama yaḥ sa dharmaḥ purā dṛṣṭaḥ sadbhiḥ śaineya śāśvataḥc sāṃparāye suhṛtkṛtye tasya kālo yam āgataḥa sarveṣv api ca yodheṣu cintayañ śinipuṃgavac tvattaḥ suhṛttamaṃ kaṃ cin nābhijānāmi sātyakea yo hi prītamanā nityaṃ yaś ca nityam anuvrataḥc sa kārye sāṃparāye tu niyojya iti me matiḥa yathā ca keśavo nityaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ parāyaṇamc tathā tvam api vārṣṇeya kṛṣṇatulyaparākramaḥa so haṃ bhāraṃ samādhāsye tvayi taṃ voḍhum arhasic abhiprāyaṃ ca me nityaṃ na vṛthā kartum arhasia sa tvaṃ bhrātur vayasyasya guror api ca saṃyugec kuru kṛcchre sahāyārtham arjunasya nararṣabhaa tvaṃ hi satyavrataḥ śūro mitrāṇām abhayaṃkaraḥc loke vikhyāyase vīra karmabhiḥ satyavāg itia yo hi śaineya mitrārthe yudhyamānas tyajet tanumc pṛthivīṃ vā dvijātibhyo yo dadyāt samam eva tata śrutāś ca bahavo smābhī rājāno ye divaṃ gatāḥc dattvemāṃ pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ brāhmaṇebhyo yathāvidhid dīyamānā hi bahubhir dāsyate ca muhur mahīd nanu kaś cid raṇe prāṇān mitrārthe tyaktavān ihaa evaṃ tvām api dharmātman prayāce haṃ kṛtāñjaliḥc pṛthivīdānatulyaṃ syād adhikaṃ vā phalaṃ vibhoa eka eva sadā kṛṣṇo mitrāṇām abhayaṃkaraḥc raṇe saṃtyajati prāṇān dvitīyas tvaṃ ca sātyakea vikrāntasya ca vīrasya yuddhe prārthayato yaśaḥc śūra eva sahāyaḥ syān netaraḥ prākṛto janaḥa īdṛśe tu parāmarde vartamānasya mādhavac tvad anyo hi raṇe goptā vijayasya na vidyatea ślāghann eva hi karmāṇi śataśas tava pāṇḍavaḥc mama saṃjanayan harṣaṃ punaḥ punar akīrtayata laghvastraś citrayodhī ca tathā laghuparākramaḥc prājñaḥ sarvāstravic chūro muhyate na ca saṃyugea mahāskandho mahorasko mahābāhur mahādhanuḥc mahābalo mahāvīryaḥ sa mahātmā mahārathaḥa śiṣyo mama sakhā caiva priyo syāhaṃ priyaś ca mec yuyudhānaḥ sahāyo me pramathiṣyati kauravāna asmadarthaṃ ca rājendra saṃnahyed yadi keśavaḥc rāmo vāpy aniruddho vā pradyumno vā mahārathaḥa gado vā sāraṇo vāpi sāmbo vā saha vṛṣṇibhiḥc sahāyārthaṃ mahārāja saṃgrāmottamamūrdhania tathāpy ahaṃ naravyāghraṃ śaineyaṃ satyavikramamc sāhāyye viniyokṣyāmi nāsti me nyo hi tatsamaḥa iti dvaitavane tāta mām uvāca dhanaṃjayaḥc parokṣaṃ tvadguṇāṃs tathyān kathayann āryasaṃsadia tasya tvam evaṃ saṃkalpaṃ na vṛthā kartum arhasic dhanaṃjayasya vārṣṇeya mama bhīmasya cobhayoḥa yac cāpi tīrthāni carann agacchaṃ dvārakāṃ pratic tatrāham api te bhaktim arjunaṃ prati dṛṣṭavāna na tat sauhṛdam anyeṣu mayā śaineya lakṣitamc yathā tvam asmān bhajase vartamānān upaplavea so bhijātyā ca bhaktyā ca sakhyasyācāryakasya cac sauhṛdasya ca vīryasya kulīnatvasya mādhavaa satyasya ca mahābāho anukampārtham eva cac anurūpaṃ maheṣvāsa karma tvaṃ kartum arhasia soyodhano hi sahasā gato droṇena daṃśitaḥc pūrvam eva tu yātās te kauravāṇāṃ mahārathāḥa sumahān ninadaś caiva śrūyate vijayaṃ pratic sa śaineya javenātra gantum arhasi mādhavaa bhīmaseno vayaṃ caiva saṃyattāḥ sahasainikāḥc droṇam āvārayiṣyāmo yadi tvāṃ prati yāsyatia paśya śaineya sainyāni dravamāṇāni saṃyugec mahāntaṃ ca raṇe śabdaṃ dīryamāṇāṃ ca bhāratīma mahāmārutavegena samudram iva parvasuc dhārtarāṣṭrabalaṃ tāta vikṣiptaṃ savyasācināa rathair viparidhāvadbhir manuṣyaiś ca hayaiś ca hac sainyaṃ rajaḥsamuddhūtam etat saṃparivartatea saṃvṛtaḥ sindhusauvīrair nakharaprāsayodhibhiḥc atyantāpacitaiḥ śūraiḥ phalgunaḥ paravīrahāa naitad balam asaṃvārya śakyo hantuṃ jayadrathaḥc ete hi saindhavasyārthe sarve saṃtyaktajīvitāḥa śaraśaktidhvajavanaṃ hayanāgasamākulamc paśyaitad dhārtarāṣṭrāṇām anīkaṃ sudurāsadama śṛṇu dundubhinirghoṣaṃ śaṅkhaśabdāṃś ca puṣkalānc siṃhanādaravāṃś caiva rathanemisvanāṃs tathāa nāgānāṃ śṛṇu śabdaṃ ca pattīnāṃ ca sahasraśaḥc sādināṃ dravatāṃ caiva śṛṇu kampayatāṃ mahīma purastāt saindhavānīkaṃ droṇānīkasya pṛṣṭhataḥc bahutvād dhi naravyāghra devendram api pīḍayeta aparyante bale magno jahyād api ca jīvitamc tasmiṃś ca nihate yuddhe kathaṃ jīveta mādṛśaḥe sarvathāham anuprāptaḥ sukṛcchraṃ bata jīvitama śyāmo yuvā guḍākeśo darśanīyaś ca pāṇḍavaḥc laghvastraś citrayodhī ca praviṣṭas tāta bhāratīma sūryodaye mahābāhur divasaś cātivartatec tanna jānāmi vārṣṇeya yadi jīvati vā na vāe kurūṇāṃ cāpi tat sainyaṃ sāgarapratimaṃ mahata eka eva ca bībhatsuḥ praviṣṭas tāta bhāratīmc aviṣahyāṃ mahābāhuḥ surair api mahāmṛdhea na ca me vartate buddhir adya yuddhe kathaṃ canac droṇo pi rabhaso yuddhe mama pīḍayate balame pratyakṣaṃ te mahābāho yathāsau carati dvijaḥa yugapac ca sametānāṃ kāryāṇāṃ tvaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥc mahārthaṃ laghusaṃyuktaṃ kartum arhasi mādhavaa tasya me sarvakāryeṣu kāryam etan mataṃ sadāc arjunasya paritrāṇaṃ kartavyam iti saṃyugea nāhaṃ śocāmi dāśārhaṃ goptāraṃ jagataḥ prabhumc sa hi śakto raṇe tāta trīṃl lokān api saṃgatāna vijetuṃ puruṣavyāghra satyam etad bravīmi tec kiṃ punar dhārtarāṣṭrasya balam etat sudurbalama arjunas tv eva vārṣṇeya pīḍito bahubhir yudhic prajahyāt samare prāṇāṃs tasmād vindāmi kaśmalama tasya tvaṃ padavīṃ gaccha gaccheyus tvādṛśā yathāc tādṛśasyedṛśe kāle mādṛśenābhicoditaḥd tvādṛśās tādṛśaṃ gacches tādṛśaṃ gaccha satyakad suhṛdo vai suhṛtkṛtye param āsthāya vikramamd suhṛdaḥ padam anvicchan na vyatheta kathaṃ canaa raṇe vṛṣṇipravīrāṇāṃ dvāv evātirathau smṛtauc pradyumnaś ca mahābāhus tvaṃ ca sātvata viśrutaḥa astre nārāyaṇasamaḥ saṃkarṣaṇasamo balec vīratāyāṃ naravyāghra dhanaṃjayasamo hy asia bhīṣmadroṇāv atikramya sarvayuddhaviśāradamc tvām adya puruṣavyāghraṃ loke santaḥ pracakṣated sadevāsuragandharvān sakiṃnaramahoragānd yodhayet sa jagat sarvaṃ vijayeta ripūn bahūnd iti bruvanti lokeṣu janās tava guṇās tathād samāgameṣu jalpanti pṛthag eva ca sarvadāa nāsādhyaṃ vidyate loke sātyaker iti mādhavac tat tvāṃ yad abhivakṣyāmi tat kuruṣva mahābalaa saṃbhāvanā hi lokasya tava pārthasya cobhayoḥc nānyathā tāṃ mahābāho saṃprakartum ihārhasia parityajya priyān prāṇān raṇe vicara vīravatc na hi śaineya dāśārhā raṇe rakṣanti jīvitama ayuddham anavasthānaṃ saṃgrāme ca palāyanamc bhīrūṇām asatāṃ mārgo naiṣa dāśārhasevitaḥa tavārjuno gurus tāta dharmātmā śinipuṃgavac vāsudevo guruś cāpi tava pārthasya dhīmataḥa kāraṇadvayam etad dhi jānānas tvāham abruvamc māvamaṃsthā vaco mahyaṃ gurus tava guror hy ahama vāsudevamataṃ caitan mama caivārjunasya cac satyam etan mayoktaṃ te yāhi yatra dhanaṃjayaḥa etad vacanam ājñāya mama satyaparākramac praviśaitad balaṃ tāta dhārtarāṣṭrasya durmateḥa praviśya ca yathānyāyaṃ saṃgamya ca mahārathaiḥc yathārham ātmanaḥ karma raṇe sātvata darśaya saṃjaya uvācaa prītiyuktaṃ ca hṛdyaṃ ca madhurākṣaram eva cac kālayuktaṃ ca citraṃ ca svatayā cābhibhāṣitama dharmarājasya tad vākyaṃ niśamya śinipuṃgavaḥc sātyakir bharataśreṣṭha pratyuvāca yudhiṣṭhirama śrutaṃ te gadato vākyaṃ sarvam etan mayācyutac nyāyayuktaṃ ca citraṃ ca phalgunārthe yaśaskarama evaṃvidhe tathā kāle madṛśaṃ prekṣya saṃmatamc vaktum arhasi rājendra yathā pārthaṃ tathaiva māma na me dhanaṃjayasyārthe prāṇā rakṣyāḥ kathaṃ canac tvatprayuktaḥ punar ahaṃ kiṃ na kuryāṃ mahāhavea lokatrayaṃ yodhayeyaṃ sadevāsuramānuṣamc tvatprayukto narendreha kim utaitat sudurbalama suyodhanabalaṃ tv adya yodhayiṣye samantataḥc vijeṣye ca raṇe rājan satyam etad bravīmi tea kuśaly ahaṃ kuśalinaṃ samāsādya dhanaṃjayamc hate jayadrathe rājan punar eṣyāmi te ntikama avaśyaṃ tu mayā sarvaṃ vijñāpyas tvaṃ narādhipac vāsudevasya yad vākyaṃ phalgunasya ca dhīmataḥa dṛḍhaṃ tv abhiparīto ham arjunena punaḥ punaḥc madhye sarvasya sainyasya vāsudevasya śṛṇvataḥa adya mādhava rājānam apramatto nupālayac āryāṃ yuddhe matiṃ kṛtvā yāvad dhanmi jayadrathama tvayi vāhaṃ mahābāho pradyumne vā mahārathec nṛpaṃ nikṣipya gaccheyaṃ nirapekṣo jayadrathamd sa evaṃ vai vinikṣipto nikṣepaḥ savyasācinād bhāradvājabhayaṃ te dya manyate vai dhanaṃjayaḥa jānīṣe hi raṇe droṇaṃ rabhasaṃ śreṣṭhasaṃmatamc pratijñā cāpi te nityaṃ śrutā droṇasya mādhavaa grahaṇaṃ dharmarājasya bhāradvājo nugṛdhyatic śaktaś cāpi raṇe droṇo nigṛhītuṃ yudhiṣṭhirama evaṃ tvayi samādhāya dharmarājaṃ narottamamc aham adya gamiṣyāmi saindhavasya vadhāya hid sa tvam adya raṇe yatto rakṣa mādhava pāṇḍavamd rakṣaṇe dharmarājasya dhruvo hi vijayo mamaa jayadratham ahaṃ hatvā dhruvam eṣyāmi mādhavac dharmarājaṃ yathā droṇo nigṛhṇīyād raṇe balāta nigṛhīte naraśreṣṭhe bhāradvājena mādhavac saindhavasya vadho na syān mamāprītis tathā bhaveta evaṃ gate naraśreṣṭha pāṇḍave satyavādinic asmākaṃ gamanaṃ vyaktaṃ vanaṃ prati bhavet punaḥa so yaṃ mama jayo vyaktaṃ vyartha eva bhaviṣyatic yadi droṇo raṇe kruddho nigṛhṇīyād yudhiṣṭhirama sa tvam adya mahābāho priyārthaṃ mama mādhavac jayārthaṃ ca yaśorthaṃ ca rakṣa rājānam āhavea sa bhavān mayi nikṣepo nikṣiptaḥ savyasācināc bhāradvājād bhayaṃ nityaṃ paśyamānena te prabhoa tasyāpi ca mahābāho nityaṃ paśyati saṃyugec nānyaṃ hi pratiyoddhāraṃ raukmiṇeyād ṛte prabhoe māṃ vāpi manyate yuddhe bhāradvājasya dhīmataḥf bhīmo vāpi mahārāja prabhañjanasamo balea so haṃ saṃbhāvanāṃ caitām ācāryavacanaṃ ca tatc pṛṣṭhato notsahe kartuṃ tvāṃ vā tyaktuṃ mahīpatea ācāryo laghuhastatvād abhedyakavacāvṛtaḥc upalabhya raṇe krīḍed yathā śakuninā śiśuḥa yadi kārṣṇir dhanuṣpāṇir iha syān makaradhvajaḥc tasmai tvāṃ visṛjeyaṃ vai sa tvāṃ rakṣed yathārjunaḥa kuru tvam ātmano guptiṃ kas te goptā gate mayic yaḥ pratīyād raṇe droṇaṃ yāvad gacchāmi pāṇḍavama mā ca te bhayam adyāstu rājann arjunasaṃbhavamc na sa jātu mahābāhur bhāram udyamya sīdatia ye ca sauvīrakā yodhās tathā saindhavapauravāḥc udīcyā dākṣiṇātyāś ca ye cānye pi mahārathāḥa ye ca karṇamukhā rājan rathodārāḥ prakīrtitāḥc ete rjunasya kruddhasya kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīma udyuktā pṛthivī sarvā sasurāsuramānuṣāc sarākṣasagaṇā rājan sakiṃnaramahoragāa jaṅgamāḥ sthāvaraiḥ sārdhaṃ nālaṃ pārthasya saṃyugec evaṃ jñātvā mahārāja vyetu te bhīr dhanaṃjayea yatra vīrau maheṣvāsau kṛṣṇau satyaparākramauc na tatra karmaṇo vyāpat kathaṃ cid api vidyatea daivaṃ kṛtāstratāṃ yogam amarṣam api cāhavec kṛtajñatāṃ dayāṃ caiva bhrātus tvam anucintayaa mayi cāpy apayāte vai gacchamāne rjunaṃ pratic droṇe citrāstratāṃ saṃkhye rājaṃs tvam anucintayaa ācāryo hi bhṛśaṃ rājan nigrahe tava gṛdhyatic pratijñām ātmano rakṣan satyāṃ kartuṃ ca bhārataa kuruṣvādyātmano guptiṃ kas te goptā gate mayic yasyāhaṃ pratyayāt pārtha gaccheyaṃ phalgunaṃ pratid pratyayo na hi me pārtha yāvad gacchāmi pāṇḍavama na hy ahaṃ tvā mahārāja anikṣipya mahāhavec kva cid yāsyāmi kauravya satyam etad bravīmi ted na paśyāmi rathaṃ kaṃ cid yas te goptā bhaved ihad śaktaṃ yaṃ manyase rājan goptāraṃ prati pāṇḍavaa etad vicārya bahuśo buddhyā buddhimatāṃ varac dṛṣṭvā śreyaḥ paraṃ buddhyā tato rājan praśādhi mām yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa evam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi mādhavac na tu me śudhyate bhāvaḥ śvetāśvaṃ prati māriṣaa kariṣye paramaṃ yatnam ātmano rakṣaṇaṃ pratic gaccha tvaṃ samanujñāto yatra yāto dhanaṃjayaḥa ātmasaṃrakṣaṇaṃ saṃkhye gamanaṃ cārjunaṃ pratic vicāryaitad dvayaṃ buddhyā gamanaṃ tatra rocayea sa tvam ātiṣṭha yānāya yatra yāto dhanaṃjayaḥb pṛṣṭhataḥ puruṣavyāghra bhīmas tvānugamiṣyatic mamāpi rakṣaṇaṃ bhīmaḥ kariṣyati mahābalaḥa pārṣataś ca sasodaryaḥ pārthivāś ca mahābalāḥc draupadeyāś ca māṃ tāta rakṣiṣyanti na saṃśayaḥa kekayā bhrātaraḥ pañca rākṣasaś ca ghaṭotkacaḥc virāṭo drupadaś caiva śikhaṇḍī ca mahārathaḥa dhṛṣṭaketuś ca balavān kuntibhojaś ca māriṣac nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca pāñcālāḥ sṛñjayās tathāe ete samāhitās tāta rakṣiṣyanti na saṃśayaḥa na droṇaḥ saha sainyena kṛtavarmā ca saṃyugec samāsādayituṃ śakto na ca māṃ dharṣayiṣyatia dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca samare droṇaṃ kruddhaṃ paraṃtapaḥc vārayiṣyati vikramya veleva makarālayama yatra sthāsyati saṃgrāme pārṣataḥ paravīrahāc na droṇasainyaṃ balavat krāmet tatra kathaṃ canaa eṣa droṇavināśāya samutpanno hutāśanātc kavacī sa śarī khaḍgī dhanvī ca varabhūṣaṇaḥd eṣa droṇaṃ raṇe kruddhaṃ vārayeta sa vai prabhod pāñcālaḥ sahitaḥ sarvaiḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca dhanvibhiḥa viśrabdho gaccha śaineya mā kārṣīr mayi saṃbhramamc dhṛṣṭadyumno raṇe kruddho droṇam āvārayiṣyati saṃjaya uvācaa dharmarājasya tad vākyaṃ niśamya śinipuṃgavaḥc pārthāc ca bhayam āśaṅkan parityāgān mahīpateḥa apavādaṃ hy ātmanaś ca lokād rakṣan viśeṣataḥc na māṃ bhīta iti brūyur āyāntaṃ phalgunaṃ pratia niścitya bahudhaivaṃ sa sātyakir yuddhadurmadaḥb nātivyaktam ivābhāṣya dharmarājaṃ mahāyaśāḥb śokagadgadayā vācā śokopahatacetanaḥc dharmarājam idaṃ vākyam abravīt puruṣarṣabhad yathedānīm iti dhyātvā dharmarājam athābravīta kṛtāṃ cen manyase rakṣāṃ svasti te stu viśāṃ patec anuyāsyāmi bībhatsuṃ kariṣye vacanaṃ tavaa na hi me pāṇḍavāt kaś cit triṣu lokeṣu vidyatec yo vai priyataro rājan satyam etad bravīmi tea tasyāhaṃ padavīṃ yāsye saṃdeśāt tava mānadac tvatkṛte na ca me kiṃ cid akartavyaṃ kathaṃ canaa yathā hi me guror vākyaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ dvipadāṃ varac tathā tavāpi vacanaṃ viśiṣṭataram eva mea priye hi tava vartete bhrātarau kṛṣṇapāṇḍavauc tayoḥ priye sthitaṃ caiva viddhi māṃ rājapuṃgavaa tavājñāṃ śirasā gṛhya pāṇḍavārtham ahaṃ prabhoc bhittvedaṃ durbhidaṃ sainyaṃ prayāsye narasattamaa droṇānīkaṃ viśāmy eṣa kruddho jhaṣa ivārṇavamc tatra yāsyāmi yatrāsau rājan rājā jayadrathaḥa yatra senāṃ samāśritya bhītas tiṣṭhati pāṇḍavātc gupto rathavaraśreṣṭhair drauṇikarṇakṛpādibhiḥa itas triyojanaṃ manye tam adhvānaṃ viśāṃ patec yatra tiṣṭhati pārtho sau jayadrathavadhodyataḥa triyojanagatasyāpi tasya yāsyāmy ahaṃ padamc āsaindhavavadhād rājan sudṛḍhenāntarātmanāa anādiṣṭas tu guruṇā ko nu yudhyeta mānavaḥc ādiṣṭas tu tvayā rājan ko na yudhyeta mādṛśaḥe abhijānāmi taṃ deśaṃ yatra yāsyāmy ahaṃ prabhof yatra tiṣṭhati rājāsau saindhavo bālaghātakaḥf sāgarapratimaṃ sainyaṃ garjantam iva sāgarama huḍaśaktigadāprāsakhaḍgacarmarṣṭitomaramc iṣvastravarasaṃbādhaṃ kṣobhayiṣye balārṇavama yad etat kuñjarānīkaṃ sāhasram anupaśyasic kulam añjanakaṃ nāma yatraite vīryaśālinaḥa āsthitā bahubhir mlecchair yuddhaśauṇḍaiḥ prahāribhiḥc nāgā meghanibhā rājan kṣaranta iva toyadāḥa naite jātu nivarteran preṣitā hastisādibhiḥc anyatra hi vadhād eṣāṃ nāsti rājan parājayaḥa atha yān rathino rājan samantād anupaśyasic ete rukmarathā nāma rājaputrā mahārathāḥa ratheṣv astreṣu nipuṇā nāgeṣu ca viśāṃ patec dhanurvede gatāḥ pāraṃ muṣṭiyuddhe ca kovidāḥa gadāyuddhaviśeṣajñā niyuddhakuśalās tathāc khaḍgapraharaṇe yuktāḥ saṃpāte cāsicarmaṇoḥa śūrāś ca kṛtavidyāś ca spardhante ca parasparamc nityaṃ ca samare rājan vijigīṣanti mānavāna karṇena vijitā rājan duḥśāsanam anuvratāḥc etāṃs tu vāsudevo pi rathodārān praśaṃsatia satataṃ priyakāmāś ca karṇasyaite vaśe sthitāḥc tasyaiva vacanād rājan nivṛttāḥ śvetavāhanāta te na kṣatā na ca śrāntā dṛḍhāvaraṇakārmukāḥc madarthaṃ viṣṭhitā nūnaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrasya śāsanāta etān pramathya saṃgrāme priyārthaṃ tava kauravac prayāsyāmi tataḥ paścāt padavīṃ savyasācinaḥa yāṃs tv etān aparān rājan nāgān saptaśatāni cac prekṣase varmasaṃchannān kirātaiḥ samadhiṣṭhitāna kirātarājo yān prādād gṛhītaḥ savyasācināc svalaṃkṛtāṃs tathā preṣyān icchañ jīvitam ātmanaḥa āsann ete purā rājaṃs tava karmakarā dṛḍhamc tvām evādya yuyutsante paśya kālasya paryayama teṣām ete mahāmātrāḥ kirātā yuddhadurmadāḥc hastiśikṣāvidaś caiva sarve caivāgniyonayaḥa ete vinirjitāḥ sarve saṃgrāme savyasācināc madartham adya saṃyattā duryodhanavaśānugāḥa etān bhittvā śarai rājan kirātān yuddhadurmadānc saindhavasya vadhe yuktam anuyāsyāmi pāṇḍavama ye tv ete sumahānāgā añjanasya kulodbhavāḥc karkaśāś ca vinītāś ca prabhinnakaraṭāmukhāḥa jāmbūnadamayaiḥ sarvair varmabhiḥ suvibhūṣitāḥc labdhalakṣyā raṇe rājann airāvaṇasamā yudhia uttarāt parvatād ete tīkṣṇair dasyubhir āsthitāḥb āsthitā dasyubhis tīkṣṇaiḥ śūrair uttamapārvataiḥc karkaśaiḥ pravarair yodhaiḥ kārṣṇāyasatanucchadaiḥa santi goyonayaś cātra santi vānarayonayaḥc anekayonayaś cānye tathā mānuṣayonayaḥa anīkam asatām etad dhūmavarṇam udīryatec mlecchānāṃ pāpakartṝṇāṃ himavaddurgavāsināma etad duryodhano labdhvā samagraṃ nāgamaṇḍalamc kṛpaṃ ca saumadattiṃ ca droṇaṃ ca rathināṃ varama sindhurājaṃ tathā karṇam avamanyata pāṇḍavānb bhīṣmaṃ droṇaṃ kṛpaṃ karṇam āvantyāv atha saindhavamb drauṇiṃ ca saumadattiṃ ca pāṇḍavān atimanyatec kṛtārtham atha cātmānaṃ manyate kālacoditaḥa te ca sarve nusaṃprāptā mama nārācagocaramc na vimokṣyanti kaunteya yady api syur manojavāḥa tena saṃbhāvitā nityaṃ paravīryopajīvināc vināśam upayāsyanti maccharaughanipīḍitāḥa ye tv ete rathino rājan dṛśyante kāñcanadhvajāḥc ete durvāraṇā nāma kāmbojā yadi te śrutāḥa śūrāś ca kṛtavidyāś ca dhanurvede ca niṣṭhitāḥc saṃhatāś ca bhṛśaṃ hy ete anyonyasya hitaiṣiṇaḥa akṣauhiṇyaś ca saṃrabdhā dhārtarāṣṭrasya bhāratac yattā madarthaṃ tiṣṭhanti kuruvīrābhirakṣitāḥa apramattā mahārāja mām eva pratyupasthitāḥc tāṃs tv ahaṃ pramathiṣyāmi tṛṇānīva hutāśanaḥa tasmāt sarvān upāsaṅgān sarvopakaraṇāni cac rathe kurvantu me rājan yathāvad rathakalpakāḥa asmiṃs tu khalu saṃgrāme grāhyaṃ vividham āyudhamc yathopadiṣṭam ācāryaiḥ kāryaḥ pañcaguṇo rathaḥa kāmbojair hi sameṣyāmi kruddhair āśīviṣopamaiḥc nānāśastrasamāvāpair vividhāyudhayodhibhiḥa kirātaiś ca sameṣyāmi viṣakalpaiḥ prahāribhiḥc lālitaiḥ satataṃ rājñā duryodhanahitaiṣibhiḥa śakaiś cāpi sameṣyāmi śakratulyaparākramaiḥc agnikalpair durādharṣaiḥ pradīptair iva pāvakaiḥa tathānyair vividhair yodhaiḥ kālakalpair durāsadaiḥc sameṣyāmi raṇe rājan bahubhir yuddhadurmadaiḥd triyojanagatasyāhaṃ padavīṃ savyasācinaḥd yāsyāmi rathināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ pravaraṃ ca dhanuṣmatāmd sūryodayagatasyāhaṃ pāṇḍavasya gatiṃ carand apareṇa gate sūrye gamiṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥa tasmād vai vājino mukhyā viśrāntāḥ śubhalakṣaṇāḥc upāvṛttāś ca pītāś ca punar yujyantu me rathea tasya sarvān upāsaṅgān sarvopakaraṇāni cac rathe prāsthāpayad rājā śastrāṇi vividhāni caa tatas tān sarvato muktvā sadaśvāṃś caturo janāḥc rasavat pāyayām āsuḥ pānaṃ madasamīriṇama pītopavṛttān snātāṃś ca jagdhānnān samalaṃkṛtānc vinītaśalyāṃs turagāṃś caturo hemamālinaḥa tān yattān rukmavarṇābhān vinītāñ śīghragāminaḥc saṃhṛṣṭamanaso vyagrān vidhivat kalpite rathea mahādhvajena siṃhena hemakesaramālināc saṃvṛte ketanair hemair maṇividrumacitritaiḥe pāṇḍurābhraprakāśābhiḥ patākābhir alaṃkṛtea hemadaṇḍocchritacchatre bahuśastraparicchadec yojayām āsa vidhivad dhemabhāṇḍavibhūṣitāna dārukasyānujo bhrātā sūtas tasya priyaḥ sakhāc nyavedayad rathaṃ yuktaṃ vāsavasyeva mātaliḥa tataḥ snātaḥ śucir bhūtvā kṛtakautukamaṅgalaḥc snātakānāṃ sahasrasya svarṇaniṣkān adāpayate āśīrvādaiḥ pariṣvaktaḥ sātyakiḥ śrīmatāṃ varaḥa tataḥ sa madhuparkārhaḥ pītvā kailāvataṃ madhuc lohitākṣo babhau tatra madavihvalalocanaḥa ālabhya vīrakāṃsyaṃ ca harṣeṇa mahatānvitaḥc dviguṇīkṛtatejā hi prajvalann iva pāvakaḥe utsaṅge dhanur ādāya saśaraṃ rathināṃ varaḥa kṛtasvastyayano vipraiḥ kavacī samalaṃkṛtaḥc lājair gandhais tathā mālyaiḥ kanyābhiś cābhinanditaḥa yudhiṣṭhirasya caraṇāv abhivādya kṛtāñjaliḥc tena mūrdhany upāghrāta āruroha mahārathamd āśiṣo vipulāḥ śrutvā dharmarājamukhodgatāḥd harṣeṇa mahatā yuktas tv āruroha rathottamama tatas te vājino hṛṣṭāḥ supuṣṭā vātaraṃhasaḥc ajayyā jaitram ūhus taṃ vikurvantaḥ sma saindhavāḥd yathā śakrarathaṃ rājann ūhus te harayaḥ purād tathaiva bhīmaseno pi dharmarājena pūjitaḥd prāyāt sātyakinā sārdham abhivādya yudhiṣṭhiramd tau dṛṣṭvā pravivikṣantau tava senām ariṃdamaud saṃyattās tāvakāḥ sarve tasthur droṇapurogamāḥd saṃnaddham anugacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmaṃ sa sātyakiḥd abhinandyābravīd vīras tadā harṣakaraṃ vacaḥa atha harṣaparītāṅgaḥ sātyakir bhīmam abravītc tvaṃ bhīma rakṣa rājānam etat kāryatamaṃ hi tea ahaṃ bhittvā pravekṣyāmi kālapakvam idaṃ balamc āyatyāṃ ca tadātve ca śreyo rājño bhirakṣaṇama jānīṣe mama vīryaṃ tvaṃ tava cāham ariṃdamac tasmād bhīma nivartasva mama ced icchasi priyama tathoktaḥ sātyakiṃ prāha vraja tvaṃ kāryasiddhayec ahaṃ rājñaḥ kariṣyāmi rakṣāṃ puruṣasattamaa evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca bhīmasenaṃ sa mādhavaḥc gaccha gaccha drutaṃ pārtha dhruvo dya vijayo mamaa yan me snigdho nuraktaś ca tvam adya vaśagaḥ sthitaḥc nimittāni ca dhanyāni yathā bhīma vadanti mea nihate saindhave pāpe pāṇḍavena mahātmanāc pariṣvajiṣye rājānaṃ dharmātmānaṃ na saṃśayaḥd apramādaś ca te kāryo droṇaṃ prati mahārathama etāvad uktvā bhīmaṃ tu visṛjya ca mahāmanāḥc saṃpraikṣat tāvakaṃ sainyaṃ vyāghro mṛgagaṇān ivaa taṃ dṛṣṭvā pravivikṣantaṃ sainyaṃ tava janādhipac bhūya evābhavan mūḍhaṃ subhṛśaṃ cāpy akampataa tataḥ prayātaḥ sahasā sainyaṃ tava sa sātyakiḥc didṛkṣur arjunaṃ rājan dharmarājasya śāsanāt saṃjaya uvācaa prayāte tava sainyaṃ tu yuyudhāne yuyutsayāc dharmarājo mahārāja svenānīkena saṃvṛtaḥe prāyād droṇarathaprepsur yuyudhānasya pṛṣṭhataḥa tataḥ pāñcālarājasya putraḥ samaradurmadaḥb prayāte mādhave rājann idaṃ vacanam abravītc prākrośat pāṇḍavānīke vasudānaś ca pārthivaḥa āgacchata praharata drutaṃ viparidhāvatac yathā sukhena gaccheta sātyakir yuddhadurmadaḥa mahārathā hi bahavo yatiṣyanty asya nirjayeb senāpativacaḥ śrutvā pāṇḍaveyāḥ samantataḥb abhyudyayur mahārāja tava sainyaṃ samantataḥb jahi prahara gṛhṇīhi vidhya vidrāva cādravac iti bruvanto vegena samāpetur balaṃ tavaa vayaṃ pratijigīṣantas tatra tān samabhidrutāḥb bāṇaśabdaravān kṛtvā vimiśrāñ śaṅkhanisvanaiḥb yuyudhānarathaṃ dṛṣṭvā tāvakā abhidudruvuḥc tataḥ śabdo mahān āsīd yuyudhānarathaṃ pratia prakampyamānā mahatī tava putrasya vāhinīc sātvatena mahārāja śatadhābhivyadīryataa tasyāṃ vidīryamāṇāyāṃ śineḥ pautro mahārathaḥc sapta vīrān maheṣvāsān agrānīke vyapothayatd athānyān api rājendra nānājanapadeśvarānd śarair analasaṃkāśair ninye vīrān yamakṣayamd śatam ekena vivyādha śatenaikaṃ ca patriṇāmd dvipārohān dvipāṃś caiva hayārohān hayāṃs tathād rathinaḥ sāśvasūtāṃś ca jaghāneśaḥ paśūn ivad taṃ tathādbhutakarmāṇaṃ śarasaṃpātavarṣiṇamd na ke canābhyadhāvan vai sātyakiṃ tava sainikāḥa te bhītā mṛdyamānāś ca pramṛṣṭā dīrghabāhunāc āyodhanaṃ jahur vīrā dṛṣṭvā tam atimānuṣamd tam ekaṃ bahudhā paśyan mohitās tasya tejasād saṃgrāmakovidaṃ vīraṃ vicarantam abhītavata rathair vimathitākṣaiś ca bhagnanīḍaiś ca māriṣac cakrair vimathitaiś chinnair dhvajaiś ca vinipātitaiḥa anukarṣaiḥ patākābhiḥ śirastrāṇaiḥ sakāñcanaiḥc bāhubhiś candanādigdhaiḥ sāṅgadaiś ca viśāṃ patea hastihastopamaiś cāpi bhujagābhogasaṃnibhaiḥc ūrubhiḥ pṛthivī channā manujānāṃ narottamaa śaśāṅkasaṃnikāśaiś ca vadanaiś cārukuṇḍalaiḥc patitair vṛṣabhākṣāṇāṃ babhau bhārata medinīa gajaiś ca bahudhā chinnaiḥ śayānaiḥ parvatopamaiḥc rarājātibhṛśaṃ bhūmir vikīrṇair iva parvataiḥa tapanīyamayair yoktrair muktājālavibhūṣitaiḥc uraśchadair vicitraiś ca vyaśobhanta turaṃgamāḥe gatasattvā mahīṃ prāpya pramṛṣṭā dīrghabāhunāa nānāvidhāni sainyāni tava hatvā tu sātvataḥc praviṣṭas tāvakaṃ sainyaṃ drāvayitvā camūṃ bhṛśama tatas tenaiva mārgeṇa yena yāto dhanaṃjayaḥc iyeṣa sātyakir gantuṃ tato droṇena vāritaḥa bharadvājaṃ samāsādya yuyudhānas tu māriṣac nābhyavartata saṃkruddho velām iva jalāśayaḥa nivārya tu raṇe droṇo yuyudhānaṃ mahārathamc vivyādha niśitair bāṇaiḥ pañcabhir marmabhedibhiḥa sātyakis tu raṇe droṇaṃ rājan vivyādha saptabhiḥc hemapuṅkhaiḥ śilādhautaiḥ kaṅkabarhiṇavājitaiḥa taṃ ṣaḍbhiḥ sāyakair droṇaḥ sāśvayantāram ārdayatc sa taṃ na mamṛṣe droṇaṃ yuyudhāno mahārathaḥa siṃhanādaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā droṇaṃ vivyādha sātyakiḥc daśabhiḥ sāyakaiś cānyaiḥ ṣaḍbhir aṣṭābhir eva caa yuyudhānaḥ punar droṇaṃ vivyādha daśabhiḥ śaraiḥc ekena sārathiṃ cāsya caturbhiś caturo hayāne dhvajam ekena bāṇena vivyādha yudhi māriṣaa taṃ droṇaḥ sāśvayantāraṃ sarathadhvajam āśugaiḥc tvaran prācchādayad bāṇaiḥ śalabhānām iva vrajaiḥa tathaiva yuyudhāno pi droṇaṃ bahubhir āśugaiḥc prācchādayad asaṃbhrāntas tato droṇa uvāca had droṇas tu paramakruddhaḥ sātyakiṃ paravīrahād avākirac chitair bāṇair vāsudevaparākramamd taṃ tathā śarajālena pracchādya mahatā punaḥd droṇaḥ prahasya śaineyam idaṃ vacanam abravīta tavācāryo raṇaṃ hitvā gataḥ kāpuruṣo yathāc yudhyamānaṃ hi māṃ hitvā pradakṣiṇam avartataa tvaṃ hi me yudhyato nādya jīvan mokṣyasi mādhavac yadi māṃ tvaṃ raṇe hitvā na yāsy ācāryavad drutam sātyakir uvācaa dhanaṃjayasya padavīṃ dharmarājasya śāsanātc gacchāmi svasti te brahman na me kālātyayo bhavetd ācāryānugato mārgaḥ śiṣyair anvāsyate sadād tasmād evaṃ vrajāmy āśu yathā me sa gurur gataḥ saṃjaya uvācaa etāvad uktvā śaineya ācāryaṃ parivarjayanc prayātaḥ sahasā rājan sārathiṃ cedam abravīta droṇaḥ kariṣyate yatnaṃ sarvathā mama vāraṇec yatto yāhi raṇe sūta śṛṇu cedaṃ vacaḥ parama etad ālokyate sainyam āvantyānāṃ mahāprabhamb abhedyam aribhir vīraiḥ sumahadbhir mahad balamc asyānantaratas tv etad dākṣiṇātyaṃ mahābalama tadanantaram etac ca bāhlikānāṃ balaṃ mahatc bāhlikābhyāśato yuktaṃ karṇasyāpi mahad balama anyonyena hi sainyāni bhinnāny etāni sārathec anyonyaṃ samupāśritya na tyakṣyanti raṇājiramd deśasākalyam āsādya dṛśyate sumahad balama etad antaram āsādya codayāśvān prahṛṣṭavatc madhyamaṃ javam āsthāya vaha mām atra sārathea bāhlikā yatra dṛśyante nānāpraharaṇodyatāḥc dākṣiṇātyāś ca bahavaḥ sūtaputrapurogamāḥa hastyaśvarathasaṃbādhaṃ yac cānīkaṃ vilokyatec nānādeśasamutthaiś ca padātibhir adhiṣṭhitamd tataḥ śakyo mahāvyūho bhettuṃ sma sahasā raṇed taṃ deśaṃ tvaritā yāmo mṛdanto yudhi śātravānd tatraite saṃprahṛṣṭatvān nāsmān prati yuyutsavaḥd ayudhyamāno bahubhir ekaṃ prāpya sudurbalamd balaṃ pramathya gacchāmi miṣatāṃ sarvadhanvināma etāvad uktvā yantāraṃ brahmāṇaṃ parivarjayanc sa vyatīyāya yatrograṃ karṇasya sumahad balamd yatraite paramakruddhā dākṣiṇātyā mahārathāḥd saṃjaya uvācad etān vijitya saṃgrāme tato yāmo dhanaṃjayamd yuyudhānavacaḥ śrutvā yuyudhānasya sārathiḥd yathoktam agamad rājan varjayan droṇam āhavea taṃ droṇo nuyayau kruddho vikiran viśikhān bahūnc yuyudhānaṃ mahābāhuṃ gacchantam anivartinamd sa ca sainyaṃ mahad bhittvā dākṣiṇātyabalaṃ ca tata karṇasya sainyaṃ sumahad abhihatya śitaiḥ śaraiḥb prayayau tvarito bhittvā karṇasya ca mahad balamc prāviśad bhāratīṃ senām aparyantāṃ sa sātyakiḥd satyako hi tataḥ sainyaṃ drāvayan sa samantataḥa praviṣṭe yuyudhāne tu sainikeṣu druteṣu cab vidrute tu bale tasmin bhagne bhārata bhāratec amarṣī kṛtavarmā tu sātyakiṃ paryavārayata tam āpatantaṃ viśikhaiḥ ṣaḍbhir āhatya sātyakiḥc caturbhiś caturo syāśvān ājaghānāśu vīryavāna tataḥ punaḥ ṣoḍaśabhir nataparvabhir āśugaiḥc sātyakiḥ kṛtavarmāṇaṃ pratyavidhyat stanāntarea sa tudyamāno viśikhair bahubhis tigmatejanaiḥc sātvatena mahārāja kṛtavarmā na cakṣamea sa vatsadantaṃ saṃdhāya jihmagānalasaṃnibhamc ākṛṣya rājann ākarṇād vivyādhorasi sātyakima sa tasya dehāvaraṇaṃ bhittvā dehaṃ ca sāyakaḥc sapatrapuṅkhaḥ pṛthivīṃ viveśa rudhirokṣitaḥa athāsya bahubhir bāṇair acchinat paramāstravitc samārgaṇaguṇaṃ rājan kṛtavarmā śarāsanama vivyādha ca raṇe rājan sātyakiṃ satyavikramamc daśabhir viśikhais tīkṣṇair abhikruddhaḥ stanāntarea tataḥ praśīrṇe dhanuṣi śaktyā śaktimatāṃ varaḥc abhyahan dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ sātyakiḥ kṛtavarmaṇaḥa tato nyat sudṛḍhaṃ vīro dhanur ādāya sātyakiḥc vyasṛjad viśikhāṃs tūrṇaṃ śataśo tha sahasraśaḥd te śarāḥ sātvatenāstāḥ kṛtavarmāṇam āhaved chādayāṃ cakrire vṛkṣaṃ śalabhā iva ghoṣiṇaḥa sarathaṃ kṛtavarmāṇaṃ samantāt paryavākiratc chādayitvā raṇe tyarthaṃ hārdikyaṃ tu sa sātyakiḥa athāsya bhallena śiraḥ sāratheḥ samakṛntatac sa papāta hataḥ sūto hārdikyasya mahārathāte tatas te yantari hate prādravaṃs turagā bhṛśama atha bhojas tv asaṃbhrānto nigṛhya turagān svayamc tasthau śaradhanuṣpāṇis tat sainyāny abhyapūjayana sa muhūrtam ivāśvasya sadaśvān samacodayatc vyapetabhīr amitrāṇām āvahat sumahad bhayame sātyakiś cābhyagāt tasmāt sa tu bhīmam upādravata yuyudhāno pi rājendra droṇānīkād viniḥsṛtaḥc prayayau tvaritas tūrṇaṃ kāmbojānāṃ mahācamūma sa tatra bahubhiḥ śūraiḥ saṃniruddho mahārathaiḥc na cacāla tadā rājan sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥa saṃdhāya ca camūṃ droṇo bhoje bhāraṃ niveśya cac anvadhāvad raṇe yatto yuyudhānaṃ yuyutsayāa tathā tam anudhāvantaṃ yuyudhānasya pṛṣṭhataḥc nyavārayanta saṃkruddhāḥ pāṇḍusainye bṛhattamāḥa samāsādya tu hārdikyaṃ rathānāṃ pravaraṃ rathamc pāñcālā vigatotsāhā bhīmasenapurogamāḥe vikramya vāritā rājan vīreṇa kṛtavarmaṇāa yatamānāṃs tu tān sarvān īṣad vigatacetasaḥc abhitas tāñ śaraugheṇa klāntavāhān avārayata nigṛhītās tu bhojena bhojānīkepsavo raṇec atiṣṭhann āryavad vīrāḥ prārthayanto mahad yaśaḥd hārdikyaṃ samare yattā na śekuḥ prativīkṣitum dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ sainyam evaṃ pravicitaṃ varamc vyūḍham evaṃ yathānyāyam evaṃ bahu ca saṃjayaa nityaṃ pūjitam asmābhir abhikāmaṃ ca naḥ sadāc prauḍham atyadbhutākāraṃ purastād dṛḍhavikramama nātivṛddham abālaṃ ca na kṛśaṃ nātipīvaramc laghuvṛttāyataprāṇaṃ sāragātram anāmayama āttasaṃnāhasaṃpannaṃ bahuśastraparicchadamc śastragrahaṇavidyāsu bahvīṣu pariniṣṭhitama ārohe paryavaskande saraṇe sāntaraplutec samyakpraharaṇe yāne vyapayāne ca kovidama nāgeṣv aśveṣu bahuśo ratheṣu ca parīkṣitamb carmanistriṃśayuddhe ca niyuddhe ca viśāradamc parīkṣya ca yathānyāyaṃ sacivaiś cāparair mukhyair bahubhir mukhyakarmabhiḥc lokapālopamais tāta pālitaṃ narasattamaiḥa bahubhiḥ pārthivair guptam asmatpriyacikīrṣubhiḥc asmān abhisṛtaiḥ kāmāt sabalaiḥ sapadānugaiḥa mahodadhim ivāpūrṇam āpagābhiḥ samantataḥc apakṣaiḥ pakṣisaṃkāśai rathair aśvaiś ca saṃvṛtamd prabhinnakaraṭaiś caiva dviradair āvṛtaṃ mahatd yad ahanyata me sainyaṃ kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥa savyasācinic sātvate ca rathodāre mama sainyasya saṃjayaa tau tatra samatikrāntau dṛṣṭvābhītau tarasvinauc sindhurājaṃ ca saṃprekṣya gāṇḍīvasyeṣugocarea kiṃ tadā kuravaḥ kṛtyaṃ vidadhuḥ kālacoditāḥc dāruṇaikāyane kāle kathaṃ vā pratipedirea grastān hi kauravān manye mṛtyunā tāta saṃgatānc vikramo hi raṇe teṣāṃ na tathā dṛśyate dya vaia akṣatau saṃyuge tatra praviṣṭau kṛṣṇapāṇḍavauc na ca vārayitā kaś cit tayor astīha saṃjayaa bhṛtāś ca bahavo yodhāḥ parīkṣyaiva mahārathāḥc vetanena yathāyogyaṃ priyavādena cāparea akāraṇabhṛtas tāta mama sainye na vidyatec karmaṇā hy anurūpeṇa labhyate bhaktavetanama na ca yodho bhavat kaś cin mama sainye tu saṃjayac alpadānabhṛtas tāta na kupyabhṛtako naraḥa pūjitā hi yathāśaktyā dānamānāsanair mayāc tathā putraiś ca me tāta jñātibhiś ca sabāndhavaiḥa te ca prāpyaiva saṃgrāme nirjitāḥ savyasācināc śaineyena parāmṛṣṭāḥ kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥa rakṣyate yaś ca saṃgrāme ye ca saṃjaya rakṣiṇaḥc ekaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ panthā rakṣyasya saha rakṣibhiḥa arjunaṃ samare dṛṣṭvā saindhavasyāgrataḥ sthitamc putro mama bhṛśaṃ mūḍhaḥ kiṃ kāryaṃ pratyapadyataa sātyakiṃ ca raṇe dṛṣṭvā praviśantam abhītavatc kiṃ nu duryodhanaḥ kṛtyaṃ prāptakālam putrakāḥa dṛṣṭvā senāṃ vyatikrāntāṃ sātvatenārjunena cac palāyamānāṃś ca kurūn manye śocanti putrakāḥa vidrutān rathino dṛṣṭvā nirutsāhān dviṣajjayec palāyane kṛtotsāhān manye śocanti putrakāḥa śūnyān kṛtān rathopasthān sātvatenārjunena cac hatāṃś ca yodhān saṃdṛśya manye śocanti putrakāḥa vyaśvanāgarathān dṛṣṭvā tatra vīrān sahasraśaḥc dhāvamānān raṇe vyagrān manye śocanti putrakāḥa vivīrāṃś ca kṛtān aśvān virathāṃś ca kṛtān narānc tatra sātyakipārthābhyāṃ manye śocanti putrakāḥd mahānāgān vidravato dṛṣṭvārjunaśarāhatānd patitān patataś cānyān manye śocanti putrakāḥd hayaughān nihatān dṛṣṭvā aparājitauc kṣaṇena dṛṣṭvā tau vīrau manye śocanti putrakāḥa saṃmūḍho smi bhṛśaṃ tāta śrutvā kṛṣṇadhanaṃjayauc praviṣṭau māmakaṃ sainyaṃ sātvatena sahācyutaua tasmin praviṣṭe pṛtanāṃ śinīnāṃ pravare rathec bhojānīkaṃ vyatikrānte katham āsan hi kauravāḥa tathā droṇena samare nigṛhīteṣu pāṇḍuṣuc kathaṃ yuddham abhūt tatra tan mamācakṣva saṃjayaa droṇo hi balavāñ śūraḥ kṛtāstro dṛḍhavikramaḥc pāñcālās taṃ maheṣvāsaṃ pratyayudhyan kathaṃ raṇea baddhavairās tathā droṇe dharmarājajayaiṣiṇaḥc bhāradvājas tathā teṣu kṛtavairo mahārathaḥa arjunaś cāpi yac cakre sindhurājavadhaṃ pratic tan me sarvaṃ samācakṣva kuśalo hy asi saṃjaya saṃjaya uvācaa ātmāparādhāt saṃbhūtaṃ vyasanaṃ bharatarṣabhac prāpya prākṛtavad vīra na tvaṃ śocitum arhasid purā yad ucyase prājñaiḥ suhṛdbhir vidurādibhiḥd māhārṣīḥ pāṇḍavān rājann iti tan na tvayā śrutamd suhṛdāṃ hitakāmānāṃ vākyaṃ yo na śṛṇoti had sa mahad vyasanaṃ prāpya śocate vai yathā bhavānd yācito si purā rājan dāśārheṇa śamaṃ pratid na ca taṃ labdhavān kāmaṃ tvattaḥ kṛṣṇo mahāyaśāḥa tava nirguṇatāṃ jñātvā pakṣapātaṃ suteṣu cac dvaidhībhāvaṃ tathā dharme pāṇḍaveṣu ca matsaramd tava jihmam abhiprāyaṃ viditvā pāṇḍavān pratie ārtapralāpāṃś ca bahūn manujādhipasattamaa sarvalokasya tattvajñaḥ sarvalokaguruḥ prabhuḥc vāsudevas tato yuddhaṃ kurūṇām akaron mahata ātmāparādhāt sumahān prāptas te vipulaḥ kṣayaḥb naivaṃ duryodhane doṣaṃ kartum arhasi mānadac na hi te sukṛtaṃ kiṃ cid ādau madhye ca bhāratae dṛśyate pṛṣṭhataś caiva tvanmūlo hi parājayaḥf ārtapralāpān iha yān idānīṃ kuruṣe nṛpaf naitad vṛddhasya te sādhu gatāsor iva maṇḍalama tasmād adya sthiro bhūtvā jñātvā lokasya nirṇayamc śṛṇu yuddhaṃ yathā vṛttaṃ ghoraṃ devāsuropamama praviṣṭe tava sainyaṃ tu śaineye satyavikramec bhīmasenamukhāḥ pārthāḥ pratīyur vāhinīṃ tavaa āgacchatas tān sahasā kruddharūpān sahānugānc dadhāraiko raṇe pāṇḍūn kṛtavarmā mahārathaḥa yathodvṛttaṃ dhārayate velā vai salilārṇavamb udvṛttaṃ sāgaraṃ yadvad velā vārayate sadāc pāṇḍusainyaṃ tathā saṃkhye hārdikyaḥ samavārayata tatrādbhutam amanyanta hārdikyasya parākramamc yad enaṃ sahitāḥ pārthā nāticakramur āhavea tato bhīmas tribhir viddhvā kṛtavarmāṇam āyasaiḥc śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau mahābāhur harṣayan sarvapāṇḍavāna sahadevas tu viṃśatyā dharmarājaś ca pañcabhiḥc śatena nakulaś cāpi hārdikyaṃ samavidhyataa draupadeyās trisaptatyā saptabhiś ca ghaṭotkacaḥc dhṛṣṭadyumnas tribhiś cāpi kṛtavarmāṇam ārdayate virāṭo drupadaś caiva yājñaseniś ca pañcabhiḥa śikhaṇḍī cāpi hārdikyaṃ viddhvā pañcabhir āśugaiḥc punar vivyādha viṃśatyā sāyakānāṃ hasann ivaa kṛtavarmā tato rājan sarvatas tān mahārathānc ekaikaṃ pañcabhir viddhvā bhīmaṃ vivyādha saptabhiḥe dhanur dhvajaṃ ca saṃyatto rathād bhūmāv apātayata athainaṃ chinnadhanvānaṃ tvaramāṇo mahārathaḥc ājaghānorasi kruddhaḥ saptatyā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥa sa gāḍhaviddho balavān hārdikyasya śarottamaiḥc cacāla rathamadhyasthaḥ kṣitikampe yathācalaḥa bhīmasenaṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā dharmarājapurogamāḥc visṛjantaḥ śarān ghorān kṛtavarmāṇam ārdayana taṃ tathā koṣṭhakīkṛtya rathavaṃśena māriṣac vivyadhuḥ sāyakair hṛṣṭā rakṣārthaṃ māruter mṛdhea pratilabhya tataḥ saṃjñāṃ bhīmaseno mahābalaḥc śaktiṃ jagrāha samare hemadaṇḍām ayasmayīme cikṣepa ca rathāt tūrṇaṃ kṛtavarmarathaṃ pratia sā bhīmabhujanirmuktā nirmuktoragasaṃnibhāc kṛtavarmāṇam abhitaḥ prajajvāla sudāruṇāa tām āpatantīṃ sahasā yugāntāgnisamaprabhāmc dvābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ hārdikyo nicakarta dvidhā tadāa sā chinnā patitā bhūmau śaktiḥ kanakabhūṣaṇāc dyotayantī diśo rājan maholkeva divaś cyutāe śaktiṃ vinihatāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmaś cukrodha vai bhṛśama tato nyad dhanur ādāya mahārathānc te pi taṃ pratyavidhyanta saptabhiḥ saptabhiḥ śaraiḥa śikhaṇḍinas tataḥ kruddhaḥ kṣurapreṇa mahārathaḥc dhanuś ciccheda samare prahasann iva bhārataa śikhaṇḍī tu tataḥ kruddhaś chinne dhanuṣi satvaramc asiṃ jagrāha samare śatacandraṃ ca bhāsvarama bhrāmayitvā mahācarma cāmīkaravibhūṣitamc tam asiṃ preṣayām āsa kṛtavarmarathaṃ pratid   nistriṃśaṃ ca mahāprabhamd kṛtavarmāṇam uddiśya preṣayat tam asiṃ drutama sa tasya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ chittvā saṃkhye mahān asiḥc abhyagād dharaṇīṃ rājaṃś cyutaṃ jyotir ivāmbarāta etasminn eva kāle tu tvaramāṇā mahārathāḥc vivyadhuḥ sāyakair gāḍhaṃ kṛtavarmāṇam āhavea athānyad dhanur ādāya tyaktvā tac ca mahad dhanuḥc viśīrṇaṃ bharataśreṣṭha hārdikyaḥ paravīrahāa vivyādha pāṇḍavān yuddhe tribhis tribhir ajihmagaiḥc śikhaṇḍinaṃ ca vivyādha tribhiḥ pañcabhir eva cad punar anyena bāṇena dhanur asyācchinad drutamd śikhaṇḍinaṃ tribhir bāṇaividdhvā ciccheda kārmukama dhanur anyat samādāya śikhaṇḍī tu mahāyaśāḥc avārayat kūrmanakhair āśugair hṛdikātmajama tataḥ kruddho raṇe rājan hṛdikasyātmasaṃbhavaḥc abhidudrāva vegena yājñaseniṃ mahārathama bhīṣmasya samare rājan mṛtyor hetuṃ mahātmanaḥc vidarśayan balaṃ śūraḥ śārdūla iva kuñjarama tau diśāgajasaṃkāśau jvalitāv iva pāvakauc samāsedatur anyonyaṃ śarasaṃghair ariṃdamaua vidhunvānau dhanuḥśreṣṭhe saṃdadhānau ca sāyakānc visṛjantau ca śataśo gabhastīn iva bhāskaraua tāpayantau śarais tīkṣṇair anyonyaṃ tau mahārathauc yugāntapratimau vīrau rejatur bhāskarāv ivaa kṛtavarmā tu rabhasaṃ yājñaseniṃ mahārathamc viddhveṣūṇāṃ trisaptatyā punar vivyādha saptabhiḥa sa gāḍhaviddho vyathito rathopastha upāviśatc visṛjan saśaraṃ cāpaṃ mūrchayābhipariplutaḥa taṃ viṣaṇṇaṃ rathe dṛṣṭvā tāvakā bharatarṣabhac hārdikyaṃ pūjayām āsur vāsāṃsy ādudhuvuś ca haa śikhaṇḍinaṃ tathā jñātvā hārdikyaśarapīḍitamc apovāha raṇād yantā tvaramāṇo mahārathama sāditaṃ tu rathopasthe dṛṣṭvā pārthāḥ śikhaṇḍinamc parivavrū rathais tūrṇaṃ kṛtavarmāṇam āhavea tatrādbhutaṃ paraṃ cakre kṛtavarmā mahārathaḥc yad ekaḥ samare pārthān vārayām āsa sānugāna pārthāñ jitvājayac cedīn pāñcālān sṛñjayān apic kekayāṃś ca mahāvīryān kṛtavarmā mahārathaḥa te vadhyamānāḥ samare hārdikyena sma pāṇḍavāḥc itaś cetaś ca dhāvanto naiva cakrur dhṛtiṃ raṇea jitvā pāṇḍusutān yuddhe bhīmasenapurogamānc hārdikyaḥ samare tiṣṭhad vidhūma iva pāvakaḥa te drāvyamāṇāḥ samare hārdikyena mahārathāḥc vimukhāḥ samapadyanta śaravṛṣṭibhir arditāḥd lajjayāvanatā bhūtvā na kiṃ cit pravadanti te saṃjaya uvācaa śṛṇuṣvaikamanā rājan yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasic drāvyamāṇe bale tasmin hārdikyena mahātmanāa lajjayāvanate cāpi prahṛṣṭaiś caiva tāvakaiḥc dvīpo ya āsīt pāṇḍūnām agādhe gādham icchatāma śrutvā tu ninadaṃ bhīmaṃ tāvakānāṃ mahāhavec śaineyas tvarito rājan kṛtavarmāṇam abhyayātd uvāca sārathiṃ tatra krodhāmarṣasamanvitaḥd hārdikyābhimukhaṃ sūta kuru me ratham uttamamd kurute kadanaṃ paśya pāṇḍusainye hy amarṣitaḥd enaṃ jitvā punaḥ sūta yāsyāmi vijayaṃ pratid evam ukte tu vacane sūtas tasya mahāmated nimeṣāntaramātreṇa kṛtavarmāṇam abhyayāta kṛtavarmā tu hārdikyaḥ śaineyaṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥc avākirat susaṃkruddhas tato krudhyata sātyakiḥa tataḥ suniśitaṃ bhallaṃ śaineyaḥ kṛtavarmaṇec preṣayām āsa samare śarāṃś ca caturo parāna te tasya jaghnire vāhān bhallenāsyācchinad dhanuḥc pṛṣṭharakṣaṃ tathā sūtam avidhyan niśitaiḥ śaraiḥa tatas taṃ virathaṃ kṛtvā sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥc senām asyārdayām āsa śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥa sābhajyatātha pṛtanā śaineyaśarapīḍitāb palāyanakṛtotsāhā bhramantī tatra tatra hac tataḥ prāyād vai tvaritaḥ sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥa śṛṇu rājan yad akarot tava sainyeṣu vīryavānc atītya sa mahārāja droṇānīkamahārṇavama parājitya ca saṃhṛṣṭaḥ kṛtavarmāṇam āhavec yantāram abravīc chūraḥ śanair yāhīty asaṃbhramama dṛṣṭvā tu tava tat sainyaṃ rathāśvadvipasaṃkulamc padātijanasaṃpūrṇam abravīt sārathiṃ punaḥa yad etan meghasaṃkāśaṃ droṇānīkasya savyataḥc sumahat kuñjarānīkaṃ yasya rukmaratho mukhama ete hi bahavaḥ sūta durnivāryāś ca saṃyugec duryodhanasamādiṣṭā madarthe tyaktajīvitāḥe rājaputrā maheṣvāsāḥ sarve vikrāntayodhinaḥf na cājitvā raṇe hy etāñ śakyaḥ prāptuṃ jayadrathaḥf nāpi pārtho mayā sūta śakyaḥ prāptuṃ kathaṃ canaf ete tiṣṭhanti sahitāḥ sarve vidyāsu niṣṭhitāḥa trigartānāṃ rathodārāḥ suvarṇavikṛtadhvajāḥc mām evābhimukhā vīrā yotsyamānā vyavasthitāḥa atra māṃ prāpaya kṣipram aśvāṃś codaya sārathec trigartaiḥ saha yotsyāmi bhāradvājasya paśyataḥa tataḥ prāyāc chanaiḥ sūtaḥ sātvatasya mate sthitaḥc rathenādityavarṇena bhāsvareṇa patākināa tam ūhuḥ sārather vaśyā valgamānā hayottamāḥc vāyuvegasamāḥ saṃkhye kundendurajataprabhāḥd mārutasya gatau tulyāś candrakundanibhāḥ śubhāḥa āpatantaṃ rathaṃ taṃ tu śaṅkhavarṇair hayottamaiḥc parivavrus tataḥ śūrā gajānīkena sarvataḥe kiranto vividhāṃs tīkṣṇān sāyakāṃl laghuvedhinaḥa sātvato pi śitair bāṇair gajānīkam ayodhayatc parvatān iva varṣeṇa tapānte jalado mahāna vajrāśanisamasparśair vadhyamānāḥ śarair gajāḥc prādravan raṇam utsṛjya śinivīryasamīritaiḥa śīrṇadantā virudhirā bhinnamastakapiṇḍakāḥc viśīrṇakarṇāsyakarā viniyantṛpatākinaḥa saṃbhinnavarmaghaṇṭāś ca saṃnikṛttamahādhvajāḥc hatārohā diśo rājan bhejire bhraṣṭakambalāḥa ruvanto vividhān rāvāñ jaladopamanisvanāḥc nārācair vatsadantaiś ca sātvatena vidāritāḥc   bhallair añjalikais tathāc kṣuraprair ardhacandraiś cad kṣaranto sṛk tathā mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ ca pradudruvuḥd babhramuś caskhaluś cānye petur mamlus tathāpared evaṃ tat kuñjarānīkaṃ yuyudhānena pātitamd śarair agnyarkasaṃkāśaiḥ pradudrāva samantataḥa tasmin drute gajānīke jalasaṃdho mahārathaḥc yattaḥ saṃprāpayan nāgaṃ rajatāśvarathaṃ pratia rukmavarṇakaraḥ śūras tapanīyāṅgadaḥ śuciḥc kuṇḍalī mukuṭī śaṅkhī raktacandanarūṣitaḥd raktacandanadigdhāṅgaḥ sāṅgadaḥ sahakuṇḍalaḥa śirasā dhārayan dīptāṃ tapanīyamayīṃ srajamc urasā dhārayan niṣkaṃ kaṇṭhasūtraṃ ca bhāsvarama cāpaṃ ca rukmavikṛtaṃ vidhunvan gajamūrdhanic aśobhata mahārāja savidyud iva toyadaḥa tam āpatantaṃ sahasā māgadhasya gajottamamc sātyakir vārayām āsa velevodvṛttam arṇavama nāgaṃ nivāritaṃ dṛṣṭvā śaineyasya śarottamaiḥc akrudhyata raṇe rājañ jalasaṃdho mahābalaḥd saṃprāpayad raṇe rājan nāgarājaṃ mahābalama tataḥ kruddho maheṣvāso mārgaṇair bhārasādhanaiḥb sa vāryamāṇo bāṇaughaiḥ śaineyenātha vīryavānc avidhyata śineḥ pautraṃ jalasaṃdho mahorasid avidhyan niśitair bāṇaiḥ satyakaḥ prahasann ivaa tato pareṇa bhallena pītena niśitena cac asyato vṛṣṇivīrasya nicakarta śarāsanama sātyakiṃ chinnadhanvānaṃ prahasann iva bhāratac avidhyan māgadho vīraḥ pañcabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥa sa viddho bahubhir bāṇair jalasaṃdhena vīryavānc nākampata mahābāhus tad adbhutam ivābhavata acintayan vai sa śarān nātyarthaṃ saṃbhramād balīc dhanur anyat samādāya tiṣṭha tiṣṭhety uvāca haa etāvad uktvā śaineyo jalasaṃdhaṃ mahorasic vivyādha ṣaṣṭyā subhṛśaṃ śarāṇāṃ prahasann ivaa kṣurapreṇa ca pītena muṣṭideśe mahad dhanuḥc jalasaṃdhasya ciccheda vivyādha ca tribhiḥ śaraiḥa jalasaṃdhas tu tat tyaktvā saśaraṃ vai śarāsanamc tomaraṃ vyasṛjat tūrṇaṃ sātyakiṃ prati māriṣaa sa nirbhidya bhujaṃ savyaṃ mādhavasya mahāraṇec abhyagād dharaṇīṃ ghoraḥ śvasann iva mahoragaḥa nirbhinne tu bhuje savye sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥc triṃśadbhir viśikhais tīkṣṇair jalasaṃdham atāḍayata pragṛhya tu tataḥ khaḍgaṃ jalasaṃdho mahābalaḥc ārṣabhaṃ carma ca mahac chatacandram alaṃkṛtame tata āvidhya taṃ khaḍgaṃ sātvatāyotsasarja haa śaineyasya dhanuś chittvā sa khaḍgo nyapatan mahīmc alātacakravac caiva vyarocata mahīṃ gataḥd agnicakram ivāviddhaṃ yathā syān nabhasaś cyutamd bhrājati sma tataḥ khaḍgaḥ saṃprāptaḥ pṛthivītalama athānyad dhanur ādāya sarvakāyāvadāraṇamb jalasaṃdham abhiprekṣya utsmayitvā ca mādhavaḥc śālaskandhapratīkāśam indrāśanisamasvaname visphārya vivyadhe kruddho jalasaṃdhaṃ śareṇa haa tataḥ sābharaṇau bāhū kṣurābhyāṃ mādhavottamaḥc sāṅgadau jalasaṃdhasya ciccheda prahasann ivaa tau bāhū parighaprakhyau petatur gajasattamātc vasuṃdharadharād bhraṣṭau pañcaśīrṣāv ivoragaua tataḥ sudaṃṣṭraṃ suhanu cārukuṇḍalam unnasamc kṣureṇāsya tṛtīyena śiraś ciccheda sātyakiḥa tat pātitaśirobāhukabandhaṃ bhīmadarśanamc dviradaṃ jalasaṃdhasya rudhireṇābhyaṣiñcataa jalasaṃdhaṃ nihatyājau tvaramāṇas tu sātvataḥc naiṣādiṃ pātayām āsa gajaskandhād viśāṃ pated kabandhaṃ dviradaṃ caiva śaravarṣair avākirata rudhireṇāvasiktāṅgo jalasaṃdhasya kuñjaraḥc vilambamānam avahat saṃśliṣṭaṃ param āsanama śarārditaḥ sātvatena mardamānaḥ svavāhinīmc ghoram ārtasvaraṃ kṛtvā vidudrāva mahāgajaḥa hāhākāro mahān āsīt tava sainyasya māriṣac jalasaṃdhaṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā vṛṣṇīnām ṛṣabheṇa haa vimukhāś cābhyadhāvanta tava yodhāḥ samantataḥc palāyane kṛtotsāhā nirutsāhā dviṣajjayea etasminn antare rājan droṇaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥb saṃnyasya bhāraṃ sumahat kṛtavarmaṇi bhāratab sa hi pārthān raṇe yattān dadhāraiko mahābalaḥc abhyayāj javanair aśvair yuyudhānaṃ mahārathamd jalasaṃdhaṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā putras te kurupuṃgavaḥd sahodarais tu saṃyuktaḥ sātyakiṃ samupādravatd tataḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ kurūṇāṃ satyakasya caa tam udīrṇaṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā śaineyaṃ kurupuṃgavāḥc droṇenaiva saha kruddhāḥ sātyakiṃ paryavārayana tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ kurūṇāṃ sātvatasya cac droṇasya ca raṇe rājan ghoraṃ devāsuropamam saṃjaya uvāca sātvatasya raṇe karma yoddhuṃ dṛṣṭvā mahārathāḥ amṛṣyamāṇāḥ saṃyattāḥ śaineyaṃ samupādravana te kirantaḥ śaravrātān sarve yattāḥ prahāriṇaḥc tvaramāṇā mahārāja yuyudhānam ayodhayana taṃ droṇaḥ saptasaptatyā jaghāna niśitaiḥ śaraiḥc durmarṣaṇo dvādaśabhir duḥsaho daśabhiḥ śaraiḥa vikarṇaś cāpi niśitais triṃśadbhiḥ kaṅkapatribhiḥc vivyādha savye pārśve tu stanābhyām antare tathāa durmukho daśabhir bāṇais tathā duḥśāsano ṣṭabhiḥc citrasenaś ca śaineyaṃ dvābhyāṃ vivyādha māriṣaa duryodhanaś ca mahatā śaravarṣeṇa mādhavamc apīḍayad raṇe rājañ śūrāś cānye mahārathāḥa sarvataḥ pratividdhas tu tava putrair mahārathaiḥb sa tudyamānaś ca tathā sarvataḥ kurupuṃgavaiḥc tān pratyavidhyac chaineyaḥ pṛthak pṛthag ajihmagaiḥd sātyakiḥ puṇḍarīkākṣo hy astreṣu pariniṣṭhitaḥa bhāradvājaṃ tribhir bāṇair duḥsahaṃ navabhis tathāc vikarṇaṃ pañcaviṃśatyā citrasenaṃ ca saptabhiḥd daśabhiś citrasenaṃ ca vikarṇaṃ pañcaviṃśatyāa durmarṣaṇaṃ dvādaśabhiś caturbhiś ca viviṃśatimc satyavrataṃ ca navabhir vijayaṃ daśabhiḥ śaraiḥd duryodhanaṃ tribhir viddhvā supuṃkhais tigmatejasaiḥa tato rukmāṅgadaṃ cāpaṃ vidhunvāno mahārathaḥc abhyayāt sātyakis tūrṇaṃ putraṃ tava mahārathama rājānaṃ sarvalokasya sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varamc śarair abhyāhanad gāḍhaṃ tato yuddham abhūt tayoḥd tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ kurumādhavavīrayoḥa vimuñcantau śarāṃs tīkṣṇān saṃdadhānau ca sāyakānc adṛśyaṃ samare nyonyaṃ cakratus tau mahārathaua sātyakiḥ kururājena nirviddho bahv aśobhatac asravad rudhiraṃ bhūri svarasaṃ candano yathāa sātvatena ca bāṇaughair nirviddhas tanayas tavac śātakumbhamayāpīḍo babhau yūpa ivocchritaḥa mādhavas tu raṇe rājan kururājasya dhanvinaḥc dhanuś ciccheda sahasā kṣurapreṇa hasann ivae athainaṃ chinnadhanvānaṃ śarair bahubhir ācinota nirbhinnaś ca śarais tena dviṣatā kṣiprakāriṇāc nāmṛṣyata raṇe rājā śatror vijayalakṣaṇama athānyad dhanur ādāya hemapṛṣṭhaṃ durāsadamc vivyādha sātyakiṃ tūrṇaṃ sāyakānāṃ śatena haa so tividdho balavatā putreṇa tava dhanvināc amarṣavaśam āpannas tava putram apīḍayata pīḍitaṃ nṛpatiṃ dṛṣṭvā tava putrā mahārathāḥc sātvataṃ śaravarṣeṇa chādayām āsur añjasāa sa chādyamāno bahubhis tava putrair mahārathaiḥc ekaikaṃ pañcabhir viddhvā punar vivyādha saptabhiḥa duryodhanaṃ ca tvarito vivyādhāṣṭabhir āśugaiḥc prahasaṃś cāsya ciccheda kārmukaṃ ripubhīṣaṇama nāgaṃ maṇimayaṃ caiva śarair dhvajam apātayatc hatvā tu caturo vāhāṃś caturbhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥe sārathiṃ pātayām āsa kṣurapreṇa mahāyaśāḥa etasminn antare caiva kururājaṃ mahārathamc avākirac charair hṛṣṭo bahubhir marmabhedibhiḥa sa vadhyamānaḥ samare śaineyasya śarottamaiḥc prādravat sahasā rājan putro duryodhanas tavae āplutaś ca tato yānaṃ citrasenasya dhanvinaḥa hāhābhūtaṃ jagac cāsīd dṛṣṭvā rājānam āhavec grasyamānaṃ sātyakinā khe somam iva rāhuṇāa taṃ tu śabdaṃ mahac chrutvā kṛtavarmā mahārathaḥc abhyayāt sahasā tatra yatrāste mādhavaḥ prabhuḥa vidhunvāno dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ codayaṃś caiva vājinaḥc bhartsayan sārathiṃ cograṃ yāhi yāhīti satvaraḥa tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya vyāditāsyam ivāntakamc yuyudhāno mahārāja yantāram idam abravīta kṛtavarmā rathenaiṣa drutam āpatate śarīc pratyudyāhi rathenainaṃ pravaraṃ sarvadhanvināmd prayāhi satvaraṃ sūta rathena rathasattamamd nihaniṣyāmi taṃ saṃkhe vṛṣṇivīram ariṃdamama tataḥ prajavitāśvena vidhivat kalpitena cac āsasāda raṇe bhojaṃ pratimānaṃ dhanuṣmatāma tataḥ paramasaṃkruddhau jvalantāv iva pāvakauc sameyātāṃ naravyāghrau vyāghrāv iva tarasvinaua kṛtavarmā tu śaineyaṃ ṣaḍviṃśatyā samārpayatc niśitaiḥ sāyakais tīkṣṇair yantāraṃ cāsya saptabhiḥa caturaś ca hayodārāṃś caturbhiḥ parameṣubhiḥc avidhyat sādhudāntān vai saindhavān sātvatasya haa rukmadhvajo rukmapṛṣṭhaṃ mahad visphārya kārmukamc rukmāṅgadī rukmavarmā rukmapuṅkhān avākirata tato śītiṃ śineḥ pautraḥ sāyakān kṛtavarmaṇec prāhiṇot tvarayā yukto draṣṭukāmo dhanaṃjayama so tividdho balavatā śatruṇā śatrutāpanaḥc samakampata durdharṣaḥ kṣitikampe yathācalaḥd acalaḥ sa purā bhūtvā samakampata māriṣaa triṣaṣṭyā caturo syāśvān saptabhiḥ sārathiṃ śaraiḥc vivyādha niśitais tūrṇaṃ sātyakiḥ kṛtavarmaṇaḥd hatāśvasūte tu rathe sthitāya śinipuṃgavaḥa suvarṇapuṅkhaṃ viśikhaṃ samādhāya sa sātyakiḥc vyasṛjat taṃ mahājvālaṃ saṃkruddham iva pannagamd praiṣayat sātyako bāṇaṃ hārdikyasya nararṣabhaḥa so viśat kṛtavarmāṇaṃ yamadaṇḍopamaḥ śaraḥc jāmbūnadavicitraṃ ca varma nirbhidya bhānumatd sahemavikṛtaṃ varma nirbhidya kṛtavarmaṇaḥe abhyagād dharaṇīm ugro rudhireṇa samukṣitaḥa saṃjātarudhiraś cājau sātvateṣubhir arditaḥc pracalan dhanur utsṛjya nyapatat syandanottamea sa siṃhadaṃṣṭro jānubhyām āpanno mitavikramaḥc śarārditaḥ sātyakinā rathopasthe nararṣabhaḥa sahasrabāhoḥ sadṛśam akṣobhyam iva sāgaramc nivārya kṛtavarmāṇaṃ sātyakiḥ prayayau tataḥd na hi tasya raṇe pārthaḥ kathaṃ cid api bhāratad didṛkṣuḥ sa hi vegena prāyād yatra dhanaṃjayaḥd svaśaktyā kṣatriyais tatra niruddho balavattaraḥd yuyudhe sātvato rājan didṛkṣuḥ pāṇḍunandanama khaḍgaśaktidhanuḥkīrṇāṃ gajāśvarathasaṃkulāmc pravartitograrudhirāṃ śataśaḥ kṣatriyarṣabhaiḥa prekṣatāṃ sarvasainyānāṃ madhyena śinipuṃgavaḥc abhyagād vāhinīṃ bhittvā vṛtrahevāsurīṃ camūma samāśvāsya ca hārdikyo gṛhya cānyan mahad dhanuḥc tasthau tatraiva balavān vārayan yudhi pāṇḍavān saṃjaya uvācaa kālyamāneṣu sainyeṣu
