vyāghra ivājighraṃs tava sainyam abhīṣayata sa rathena caran mārgān dhanur abhrāmayad bhṛśamc rukmapṛṣṭhaṃ mahāvegaṃ rukmacandrakasaṃkulama rukmāṅgadaśirastrāṇo rukmavarmasamāvṛtaḥc rukmadhvajavaraḥ śūro meruśṛṅga ivābabhaua sadhanurmaṇḍalaḥ saṃkhye tejobhāsvararaśmivānc śaradīvoditaḥ sūryo nṛsūryo virarāja haa vṛṣabhaskandhavikrānto vṛṣabhākṣo nararṣabhaḥc tāvakānāṃ babhau madhye gavāṃ madhye yathā vṛṣaḥa mattadviradasaṃkāśaṃ mattadviradagāminamc prabhinnam iva mātaṅgaṃ yūthamadhye vyavasthitame vyāghrā iva jighāṃsantas tvadīyābhyadravan raṇef sātyakiṃ samare rājan parivavrus tavātmajāḥa droṇānīkam atikrāntaṃ bhojānīkaṃ ca dustaramc jalasaṃdhārṇavaṃ tīrtvā kāmbojānāṃ ca vāhinīma hārdikyamakarān muktaṃ tīrṇaṃ vai sainyasāgaramc parivavruḥ susaṃkruddhās tvadīyāḥ sātyakiṃ rathāḥa duryodhanaś citraseno duḥśāsanaviviṃśatīc śakunir duḥsahaś caiva yuvā durmarṣaṇaḥ krathaḥa anye ca bahavaḥ śūrāḥ śastravanto durāsadāḥc pṛṣṭhataḥ sātyakiṃ yāntam anvadhāvann amarṣitāḥa atha śabdo mahān āsīt tava sainyasya māriṣac mārutoddhūtavegasya sāgarasyeva parvaṇia tān abhidravataḥ sarvān samīkṣya śinipuṃgavaḥc śanair yāhīti yantāram abravīt prahasann ivaa idam eti samuddhūtaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrasya yad balamc mām evābhimukhaṃ tūrṇaṃ gajāśvarathapattimata nādayan vai diśaḥ sarvā rathaghoṣeṇa sārathec pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣaṃ ca kampayan sāgarān apia etad balārṇavaṃ tāta vārayiṣye mahāraṇec paurṇamāsyām ivoddhūtaṃ veleva salilāśayama paśya me sūta vikrāntam indrasyeva mahāmṛdheb tūṇīcarmāsimad ghoraṃ gajāśvarathasaṃkulamb udvṛttaḥ sāgaro yadvad velām āśrayate tathāb mām āsādya hi tiṣṭhanti yaudhāḥ śatasahasraśaḥc eṣa sainyāni śatrūṇāṃ vidhamāmi śitaiḥ śaraiḥa nihatān āhave paśya padātyaśvarathadvipānc maccharair agnisaṃkāśair videhāsūn sahasraśaḥa ity evaṃ bruvatas tasya sātyaker amitaujasaḥc samīpaṃ sainikās te tu śīghram īyur yuyutsavaḥe jahy ādravasva tiṣṭheti paśya paśyeti vādinaḥa tān evaṃ bruvato vīrān sātyakir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥc jaghāna triśatān aśvān kuñjarāṃś ca catuḥśatānd laghvastraḥ citrayodhī ca prahasañ śinipuṃgavaḥa sa saṃprahāras tumulas tasya teṣāṃ ca dhanvināmc devāsuraraṇaprakhyaḥ prāvartata janakṣayaḥd prāvartata mahārāja devāsuraraṇopamaḥa meghajālanibhaṃ sainyaṃ tava putrasya māriṣac pratyagṛhṇāc chineḥ pautraḥ śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥa pracchādyamānaḥ samare śarajālaiḥ sa vīryavānb sa śarair analasparśair ākarṇād abhicoditaiḥc asaṃbhramaṃ mahārāja tāvakān avadhīd bahūna āścaryaṃ tatra rājendra sumahad dṛṣṭavān ahamc na moghaḥ sāyakaḥ kaś cit sātyaker abhavat prabhod nāsīn moghaḥ śaraḥ kaś cid āsan sarve tanucchidaḥa rathanāgāśvakalilaḥ padātyūrmisamākulaḥc śaineyavelām āsādya sthitaḥ sainyamahārṇavaḥa saṃbhrāntanaranāgāśvam āvartata muhur muhuḥc tat sainyam iṣubhis tena vadhyamānaṃ samantataḥd rathinaḥ pattināgāś ca sādinaś ca śarā hatāḥe babhrāma tatra tatraiva gāvaḥ śītārditā ivaa padātinaṃ rathaṃ nāgaṃ sādinaṃ turagaṃ tathāc aviddhaṃ tatra nādrākṣaṃ yuyudhānasya sāyakaiḥa na tādṛk kadanaṃ rājan kṛtavāṃs tatra phalgunaḥc yādṛk kṣayam anīkānām akarot sātyakir nṛpae atyarjunaṃ śineḥ pautro yudhyate bharatarṣabhaf vītabhīr lāghavopetaḥ kṛtitvaṃ saṃpradarśayana tato duryodhano rājā sātvatasya tribhiḥ śaraiḥc vivyādha sūtaṃ niśitaiś caturbhiś caturo hayāna sātyakiṃ ca tribhir viddhvā punar vivyādha so ṣṭabhiḥc duḥśāsanaḥ ṣoḍaśabhir vivyādha śinipuṃgavama śakuniḥ pañcaviṃśatyā citrasenaś ca pañcabhiḥc duḥsahaḥ pañcadaśabhir vivyādhorasi sātyakima utsmayan vṛṣṇiśārdūlas tathā bāṇaiḥ samāhataḥc tān avidhyan mahārāja sarvān eva tribhis tribhiḥa gāḍhaviddhān arīn kṛtvā mārgaṇaiḥ so titejanaiḥc śaineyaḥ śyenavat saṃkhye vyacaral laghuvikramaḥd śyenavad vyacarat saṃkhye śaineyo laghu suṣṭhu caa saubalasya dhanuś chittvā hastāvāpaṃ nikṛtya cac duryodhanaṃ tribhir bāṇair abhyavidhyat stanāntarea citrasenaṃ śatenaiva daśabhir duḥsahaṃ tathāc duḥśāsanaṃ ca viṃśatyā vivyādha śinipuṃgavaḥa athānyad dhanur ādāya syālas tava viśāṃ patec aṣṭabhiḥ sātyakiṃ viddhvā punar vivyādha pañcabhiḥa duḥśāsanaś ca daśabhir duḥsahaś ca tribhiḥ śaraiḥc durmukhaś ca dvādaśabhī rājan vivyādha sātyakima duryodhanas trisaptatyā viddhvā bhārata mādhavamc tato sya niśitair bāṇais tribhir vivyādha sārathima tān sarvān sahitāñ śūrān yatamānān mahārathānc pañcabhiḥ pañcabhir bāṇaiḥ punar vivyādha sātyakiḥa tataḥ sa rathināṃ śreṣṭhas tava putrasya sārathimc ājaghānāśu bhallena sa hato nyapatad bhuvia pātite sārathau tasmiṃs tava putrarathaḥ prabhoc vātāyamānais tair aśvair apānīyata saṃgarāta tatas tava sutā rājan sainikāś ca viśāṃ patec rājño ratham abhiprekṣya vidrutāḥ śataśo bhavana vidrutaṃ tatra tat sainyaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhārata sātyakiḥc avākirac charais tīkṣṇai rukmapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥa vidrāvya sarvasainyāni tāvakāni samantataḥc prayayau sātyakī rājañ śvetāśvasya rathaṃ pratid taṃ prayāntaṃ mahābāhuṃ tāvakāḥ prekṣya māriṣad dṛṣṭaṃ cādṛṣṭavat kṛtvā kriyām anyāṃ prayojayana taṃ śarān ādadānaṃ ca rakṣamāṇaṃ ca sārathimc ātmānaṃ mocayantaṃ ca tāvakāḥ samapūjayan dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa saṃpramṛdya mahat sainyaṃ yāntaṃ śaineyam arjunamc nirhrīkā mama te putrāḥ kim akurvata saṃjayaa kathaṃ caiṣāṃ tathā yuddhe dhṛtir āsīn mumūrṣatāmc śaineyacaritaṃ dṛṣṭvā sadṛśaṃ savyasācinaḥa kiṃ nu vakṣyanti te kṣātraṃ sainyamadhye parājitāḥc kathaṃ ca sātyakir yuddhe vyatikrānto mahāyaśāḥa kathaṃ ca mama putrāṇāṃ jīvatāṃ tatra saṃjayac śaineyo bhiyayau yuddhe tan mamācakṣva tattvataḥa atyadbhutam idaṃ tāta tvatsakāśāc chṛṇomy ahamc ekasya bahubhir yuddhaṃ śatrubhir vai mahārathaiḥa viparītam ahaṃ manye mandabhāgyān sutān pratic yatrāvadhyanta samare sātvatena mahātmanāa ekasya hi na paryāptaṃ matsainyaṃ tasya saṃjayac kruddhasya yuyudhānasya sarve tiṣṭhantu pāṇḍavāḥa nirjitya samare droṇaṃ kṛtinaṃ yuddhadurmadamc yathā paśugaṇān siṃhas tadvad dhantā sutān mamaa kṛtavarmādibhiḥ śūrair yattair bahubhir āhavec yuyudhāno na śakito hantuṃ yaḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥd na śakyaḥ samare jetuṃ nihaniṣyati me sutāna naitad īdṛśakaṃ yuddhaṃ kṛtavāṃs tatra phalgunaḥc yādṛśaṃ kṛtavān yuddhaṃ śiner naptā mahāyaśāḥ saṃjaya uvācaa tava durmantrite rājan duryodhanakṛtena cac śṛṇuṣvāvahito bhūtvā yat te vakṣyāmi bhāratad śṛṇuṣva rājan saṃgrāmaṃ naravājigajakṣayamd duryodhanāpanītena tava durmantritena caa te punaḥ saṃnyavartanta kṛtvā saṃśaptakān mithaḥc parāṃ yuddhe matiṃ kṛtvā putrasya tava śāsanāta trīṇi sādisahasrāṇi duryodhanapurogamāḥc śakāḥ kāmbojabāhlīkā yavanāḥ pāradās tathāa kuṇindās taṅgaṇāmbaṣṭhāḥ paiśācāś ca samandarāḥc abhyadravanta śaineyaṃ śalabhāḥ pāvakaṃ yathāa yuktāś ca pārvatīyānāṃ rathāḥ pāṣāṇayodhināmc śūrāḥ pañcaśatā rājañ śaineyaṃ samupādravana tato rathasahasreṇa mahārathaśatena cac dviradānāṃ sahasreṇa dvisāhasraiś ca vājibhiḥd niyutaiś ca padātyaughair vividhāyudhapāṇibhiḥa śaravarṣāṇi muñcanto vividhāni mahārathāḥc abhyadravanta śaineyam asaṃkhyeyāś ca pattayaḥa tāṃś ca saṃcodayan sarvān ghnatainam iti bhāratac duḥśāsano mahārāja sātyaktiṃ paryavārayata tatrādbhutam apaśyāma śaineyacaritaṃ mahatc yad eko bahubhiḥ sārdham asaṃbhrāntam ayudhyataa avadhīc ca rathānīkaṃ dviradānāṃ ca tad balamc sādinaś caiva tān sarvān dasyūn api ca sarvaśaḥd saṃprādravan mahat sainyaṃ bhagnaṃ ca bahudhā śaraiḥa tatra cakrair vimathitair bhagnaiś ca paramāyudhaiḥc akṣaiś ca bahudhā bhagnair īṣādaṇḍakabandhuraiḥa kūbarair mathitaiś cāpi dhvajaiś cāpi nipātitaiḥc varmabhiś cāmaraiś caiva vyavakīrṇā vasuṃdharāa sragbhir ābharaṇair vastrair anukarṣaiś ca māriṣac saṃchannā vasudhā tatra dyaur grahair iva bhārataa girirūpadharāś cāpi patitāḥ kuñjarottamāḥb mlecchāsthitair mahārāja bhinnāñjanacayopamaiḥb mṛgair mandaiś ca bhadraiś ca mṛgamandais tathāparaiḥb bhadrair mandamanobhiś ca mṛgabhadrais tathaiva cab mandair mandamadaiś caiva tathā mandamṛgair apib tatra tatra dharākīrṇā śayānaiḥ parvatopamaiḥc añjanasya kule jātā vāmanasya ca bhāratae supratīkakule jātā mahāpadmakule tathāa airāvaṇakule caiva tathānyeṣu kuleṣu cac jātā dantivarā rājañ śerate bahavo hatāḥd kumudasya tathā nāgā airāvatakulodbhavāḥd nihatāḥ satyakenājau nārācair agnisaṃnibhaiḥa vanāyujān pārvatīyān kāmbojāraṭṭabāhlikānc tathā hayavarān rājan nijaghne tatra sātyakiḥa nānādeśasamutthāṃś ca nānājātyāṃś ca pattinaḥc nijaghne tatra śaineyaḥ śataśo tha sahasraśaḥa teṣu prakālyamāneṣu dasyūn duḥśāsano bravītc nivartadhvam adharmajñā yudhyadhvaṃ kiṃ sṛtena vaḥa tāṃś cāpi sarvān saṃprekṣya putro duḥśāsanas tavac pāṣāṇayodhinaḥ śūrān pārvatīyān acodayata aśmayuddheṣu kuśalā naitaj jānāti sātyakiḥc aśmayuddham ajānantaṃ ghnatainaṃ yuddhakāmukama tathaiva kuravaḥ sarve nāśmayuddhaviśāradāḥc abhidravata mā bhaiṣṭa na vaḥ prāpsyati sātyakiḥd te pārvatīyā rājānaḥ sarve pāṣāṇapāṇayaḥd abhyadravanta śaineyaṃ rājānam iva mantriṇaḥa tato gajaśiśuprakhyair upalaiḥ śailavāsinaḥc udyatair yuyudhānasya sthitā maraṇakāṅkṣiṇaḥa kṣepaṇīyais tathāpy anye sātvatasya vadhaiṣiṇaḥc coditās tava putreṇa rurudhuḥ sarvatodiśamd śaineyam abhyadhāvaṃs te grāvabhir dṛḍhahastavatd mlecchāḥ pipāsavaḥ prājñā rājānam iva mantriṇaḥa teṣām āpatatām eva śilāyuddhaṃ cikīrṣatāmc sātyakiḥ pratisaṃdhāya triṃśataṃ prāhiṇoc charāna tām aśmavṛṣṭiṃ tumulāṃ pārvatīyaiḥ samīritāmc bibhedoragasaṃkāśair nārācaiḥ śinipuṃgavaḥa tair aśmacūrṇair dīpyadbhiḥ khadyotānām iva vrajaiḥc prāyaḥ sainyāny avadhyanta hāhābhūtāni māriṣaa tataḥ pañcaśatāḥ śūrāḥ samudyatamahāśilāḥc nikṛttabāhavo rājan nipetur dharaṇītaled punar daśaśatāś cānye śatasāhasriṇas tathād sopalair bāhubhiś chinnaiḥ petur aprāpya sātyakimd sātvatasya ca bhallena niṣpiṣṭais tais tathādribhiḥd nipatan nihatā mlecchās tatra tatra gatāsavaḥd te hanyamānāḥ samare sātvatena mahātmanād aśmavṛṣṭiṃ mahāghorāṃ pātayanti sma sātvatea pāṣāṇayodhinaḥ śūrān yatamānān avasthitānc avadhīd bahusāhasrāṃs tad adbhutam ivābhavata tataḥ punar bastamukhair aśmavṛṣṭiṃ samantataḥc ayohastaiḥ śūlahastair daradaiḥ khaśataṅgaṇaiḥa ambaṣṭhaiś ca kuṇindaiś ca kṣiptāṃ kṣiptāṃ sa sātyakiḥc nārācaiḥ prativivyādha prekṣamāṇo mahābalaḥa adrīṇāṃ bhidyamānānām antarikṣe śitaiḥ śaraiḥc śabdena prādravan rājan gajāśvarathapattayaḥa aśmacūrṇaiḥ samākīrṇā manuṣyāś ca vayāṃsi cac nāśaknuvann avasthātuṃ bhramarair iva daṃśitāḥa hataśiṣṭā virudhirā bhinnamastakapiṇḍikāḥb vibhinnaśiraso rājan dantaiś chinnaiś ca dantinaḥb nirdhūtaiś ca karair nāgā vyaṅgāś ca śataśaḥ kṛtāḥb hatvā pañcaśatān yodhān sa kṣaṇenaiva māriṣab vyacarat pṛtanāmadhye śaineyaḥ kṛtahastavatc kuñjarāḥ saṃnyavartanta yuyudhānarathaṃ prathid aśmanāṃ bhidyamānānāṃ sāyakaiḥ śrūyate dhvaniḥd padmapatreṣu dhārāṇāṃ patantīnām iva dhvaniḥa tataḥ śabdaḥ samabhavat tava sainyasya māriṣac mādhavenārdyamānasya sāgarasyeva dāruṇaḥa taṃ śabdaṃ tumulaṃ śrutvā droṇo yantāram abravītc eṣa sūta raṇe kruddhaḥ sātvatānāṃ mahārathaḥa dārayan bahudhā sainyaṃ raṇe carati kālavatc yatraiṣa śabdas tumulas tatra sūta rathaṃ nayaa pāṣāṇayodhibhir nūnaṃ yuyudhānaḥ samāgataḥc tathā hi rathinaḥ sarve hriyante vidrutair hayaiḥa viśastrakavacā rugṇās tatra tatra patanti cac na śaknuvanti yantāraḥ saṃyantuṃ tumule hayāna ity evaṃ bruvato rājan bhāradvājasya dhīmataḥc pratyuvāca tato yantā droṇaṃ śastrabhṛtāṃ varama āyuṣman dravate sainyaṃ kauraveyaṃ samantataḥb āyuṣman vidravaty eva kurūṇāṃ sainyam āturamc paśya yodhān raṇe bhinnān dhāvamānāṃs tatas tataḥa ete ca sahitāḥ śūrāḥ pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ sahac tvām eva hi jighāṃsantaḥ prādravanti samantataḥa atra kāryaṃ samādhatsva prāptakālam ariṃdamac sthāne vā gamane vāpi dūraṃ yātaś ca sātyakiḥa tathaivaṃ vadatas tasya bhāradvājasya māriṣac pratyadṛśyata śaineyo nighnan bahuvidhān rathāna te vadhyamānāḥ samare yuyudhānena tāvakāḥc yuyudhānarathaṃ tyaktvā droṇānīkāya dudruvuḥa yais tu duḥśāsanaḥ sārdhaṃ rathaiḥ pūrvaṃ nyavartatac te bhītās tv abhyadhāvanta sarve droṇarathaṃ prati saṃjaya uvācaa duḥśāsanarathaṃ dṛṣṭvā samīpe paryavasthitamc bhāradvājas tato vākyaṃ duḥśāsanam athābravīta duḥśāsana rathāḥ sarve kasmād ete pravidrutāḥc kaccit kṣemaṃ tu nṛpateḥ kaccij jīvati saindhavaḥa rājaputro bhavān atra rājabhrātā mahārathaḥc kimarthaṃ dravase yuddhe yauvarājyam avāpya hid dāsī jitāsi dyūte tvaṃ yathākāmacarī bhavad vāsasāṃ vāhikā rājño bhrātur jyeṣṭhasya me bhavad na santi patayaḥ sarve te dya ṣaṇḍhatilaiḥ samāḥd duḥśāsanaivam uktvā tvaṃ pūrvaṃ kasmāt palāyasea svayaṃ vairaṃ mahat kṛtvā pāñcālaiḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ sahac ekaṃ sātyakim āsādya kathaṃ bhīto si saṃyugea na jānīṣe purā tvaṃ tu gṛhṇann akṣān durodarec śarā hy ete bhaviṣyanti dāruṇāśīviṣopamāḥa apriyāṇāṃ ca vacanaṃ pāṇḍaveṣu viśeṣataḥc draupadyāś ca parikleśas tvanmūlo hy abhavat purāa kva te mānaś ca darpaś ca kva ca tad vīra garjitamc āśīviṣasamān pārthān kopayitvā kva yāsyasia śocyeyaṃ bhāratī senā rājā caiva suyodhanaḥc yasya tvaṃ karkaśo bhrātā palāyanaparāyaṇaḥa nanu nāma tvayā vīra dīryamāṇā bhayārditāc svabāhubalam āsthāya rakṣitavyā hy anīkinīe sa tvam adya raṇaṃ tyaktvā bhīto harṣayase parāna vidrute tvayi sainyasya nāyake śatrusūdanac ko nyaḥ sthāsyati saṃgrāme bhīto bhīte vyapāśrayea ekena sātvatenādya yudhyamānasya cānaghac palāyane tava matiḥ saṃgrāmād dhi pravartatea yadā gāṇḍīvadhanvānaṃ bhīmasenaṃ ca kauravac yamau ca yudhi draṣṭāsi tadā tvaṃ kiṃ kariṣyasia yudhi phalgunabāṇānāṃ sūryāgnisamatejasāmc na tulyāḥ sātyakiśarā yeṣāṃ bhītaḥ palāyased tvarito vīra gaccha tvaṃ gāndhāry udaram āviśad pṛthivyāṃ dhāvamānasya na saṃpaśyāmi te śamama yadi tāvat kṛtā buddhiḥ palāyanaparāyaṇāc pṛthivī dharmarājasya śamenaiva pradīyatāma yāvat phalgunanārācā nirmuktoragasaṃnibhāḥc nāviśanti śarīraṃ te tāvat saṃśāmya pāṇḍavaiḥa yāvat te pṛthivīṃ pārthā hatvā bhrātṛśataṃ raṇec nākṣipanti mahātmānas tāvat saṃśāmya pāṇḍavaiḥa yāvan na krudhyate rājā dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥc kṛṣṇaś ca samaraślāghī tāvat saṃśāmya pāṇḍavaiḥa yāvad bhīmo mahābāhur vigāhya mahatīṃ camūmc sodarāṃs te na mṛdnāti tāvat saṃśāmya pāṇḍavaiḥd mayā śamavatā cokto rakṣa śeṣaṃ suyodhanad saṃśāmya vīra pārthais tvaṃ rakṣa sarvān mahīkṣitaḥa pūrvam uktaś ca te bhrātā bhīṣmeṇa sa suyodhanaḥc ajeyāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ saṃkhye saumya saṃśāmya pāṇḍavaiḥe na ca tat kṛtavān mandas tava bhrātā suyodhanaḥf tavāpi śoṇitaṃ bhīmaḥ pāsyatīti mayā śrutamf tac cāpy avitathaṃ tasya tat tathaiva bhaviṣyatif kiṃ bhīmasya na jānāsi vikramaṃ tvaṃ subāliśaf yena te vairam ārabdhaṃ saṃyuge prapalāyatāa sa yuddhe dhṛtim āsthāya yatto yudhyasva pāṇḍavaiḥc gaccha tūrṇaṃ rathenaiva tatra tiṣṭhati sātyakiḥa tvayā hīnaṃ balaṃ hy etad vidraviṣyati bhāratac ātmārthaṃ yodhaya raṇe sātyakiṃ satyavikramama evam uktas tava suto nābravīt kiṃ cid apy asauc śrutaṃ cāśrutavat kṛtvā prāyād yena sa sātyakiḥa sainyena mahatā yukto mlecchānām anivartināmc āsādya ca raṇe yatto yuyudhānam ayodhayata droṇo pi rathināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pāñcālān pāṇḍavāṃs tathāc abhyadravata saṃkruddho javam āsthāya madhyamama praviśya ca raṇe droṇaḥ pāñcālānāṃ varūthinīmc drāvayām āsa yodhān vai śataśo tha sahasraśaḥa tato droṇo mahārāja nāma viśrāvya saṃyugec pāṇḍupāñcālamatsyānāṃ pracakre kadanaṃ mahata taṃ jayantam anīkāni bhāradvājaṃ tatas tataḥc pāñcālaputro dyutimān vīraketuḥ samabhyayāta sa droṇaṃ pañcabhir viddhvā śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥc dhvajam ekena vivyādha sārathiṃ cāsya saptabhiḥd nanāda balavān nādaṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīta tatrādbhutaṃ mahārāja dṛṣṭavān asmi saṃyugec yad droṇo rabhasaṃ yuddhe pāñcālyaṃ nābhyavartataa saṃniruddhaṃ raṇe droṇaṃ pāñcālā vīkṣya māriṣac āvavruḥ sarvato rājan dharmaputrajayaiṣiṇaḥa te śarair agnisaṃkāśais tomaraiś ca mahādhanaiḥc śastraiś ca vividhai rājan droṇam ekam avākirana nihatya tān bāṇagaṇān droṇo rājan samantataḥc mahājaladharān vyomni mātariśvā vivān ivad yathā vāyur mahābhrāṇi vivānnityaṃ viyaty utaa tataḥ śaraṃ mahāghoraṃ sūryapāvakasaṃnibhamc saṃdadhe paravīraghno vīraketurathaṃ pratia sa bhittvā tu śaro rājan pāñcālyaṃ kulanandanamc abhyagād dharaṇīṃ tūrṇaṃ lohitārdro jvalann ivaa tato patad rathāt tūrṇaṃ pāñcālyaḥ kulanandanaḥc parvatāgrād iva mahāṃś campako vāyupīḍitaḥa tasmin hate maheṣvāse rājaputre mahābalec pāñcālās tvaritā droṇaṃ samantāt paryavārayana citraketuḥ sudhanvā ca citravarmā ca bhāratac tathā citrarathaś caiva bhrātṛvyasanakarṣitāḥa abhyadravanta sahitā bhāradvājaṃ yuyutsavaḥc muñcantaḥ śaravarṣāṇi tapānte jaladā ivad adṛśyaṃ samare cakrur bhāradvājaṃ sudhanvinaḥa sa vadhyamāno bahudhā rājaputrair mahārathaiḥb krodham āhārayat teṣām abhāvāya dvijarṣabhaḥb tataḥ śaramayaṃ jālaṃ droṇas teṣām avāsṛjatb te hanyamānā droṇasya śarair ākarṇacoditaiḥb kartavyaṃ nābhyajānan vai kumārā rājasattamab tān vimūḍhān raṇe droṇaḥ prahasann iva bhāratac vyaśvasūtarathāṃś cakre kumārān kupito raṇea tathāparaiḥ suniśitair bhallais teṣāṃ mahāyaśāḥc puṣpāṇīva vicinvan hi sottamāṅgāny apātayatd nyakṛntac cottamāṅgāni yathā tālavanāni haa te rathebhyo hatāḥ petuḥ kṣitau rājan suvarcasaḥc devāsure purā yuddhe yathā daiteyadānavāḥa tān nihatya raṇe rājan bhāradvājaḥ pratāpavānc kārmukaṃ bhrāmayām āsa hemapṛṣṭhaṃ durāsadamd bhrāmayan bahudhā cāpaṃ haṃsapṛṣṭhaṃ durānanamd tad asya bhrājate rājan meghamadhye taḍid yathāa pāñcālān nihatān dṛṣṭvā devakalpān mahārathānc dhṛṣṭadyumno bhṛśaṃ kruddho netrābhyāṃ pātayañ jalame abhyavartata saṃgrāme kruddho droṇarathaṃ pratia tato hā heti sahasā nādaḥ samabhavan nṛpac pāñcālyena raṇe dṛṣṭvā droṇam āvāritaṃ śaraiḥa saṃchādyamāno bahudhā pārṣatena mahātmanāc na vivyathe tato droṇaḥ smayann evānvayudhyataa tato droṇaṃ mahārāja pāñcālyaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥc ājaghānorasi kruddho navatyā nataparvaṇāma sa gāḍhaviddho balinā bhāradvājo mahāyaśāḥc niṣasāda rathopasthe kaśmalaṃ ca jagāma haa taṃ vai tathāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ parākramīc samutsṛjya dhanus tūrṇam asiṃ jagrāha vīryavāna avaplutya rathāc cāpi tvaritaḥ sa mahārathaḥc āruroha rathaṃ tūrṇaṃ bhāradvājasya māriṣae hartum aicchac chiraḥ kāyāt krodhasaṃraktalocanaḥa pratyāśvastas tato droṇo dhanur gṛhya mahābalaḥb āsannam āgataṃ dṛṣṭvā dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ jighāṃsayāc śarair vaitastikai rājan nityam āsannayodhibhiḥe yodhayām āsa samare dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ mahārathama te hi vaitastikā nāma śarā āsannayodhinaḥc droṇasya viditā rājan dhṛṣṭadyumnam avākṣipana sa vadhyamāno bahubhiḥ sāyakais tair mahābalaḥc avaplutya rathāt tūrṇaṃ bhagnavegaḥ parākramīd kṛtasaṃkalpabhūyiṣṭaḥ prādravat svarathaṃ pratia āruhya svarathaṃ vīraḥ pragṛhya ca mahad dhanuḥc vivyādha samare droṇaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumno mahārathaḥd droṇaś cāpi mahārāja śarair vivyādha pārṣatamd tad adbhutam abhūd yuddhaṃ droṇapāñcālayos tadād trailokyakāṅkṣiṇor āsīc chakraprahrādayor ivad maṇḍalāni vicitrāṇi yamakānītarāṇi cad carantau yuddhamārgajñau tatakṣatur atheṣubhiḥd mohayantau manāṃsy ājau yodhānāṃ droṇapārṣataud sṛjantau śaravarṣāṇi varṣāsv iva balāhakaud chādayantau mahātmānau śarair vyoma diśo mahīma tad adbhutaṃ tayor yuddhaṃ bhūtasaṃghā hy apūjayanc kṣatriyāś ca mahārāja ye cānye tatra sainikāḥd kṣatriyā abruvan rājan vainateyo yam ity utaa avaśyaṃ samare droṇo dhṛṣṭadyumnena saṃgataḥc vaśam eṣyati no rājñaḥ pāñcālā iti cukruśuḥa droṇas tu tvarito yuddhe dhṛṣṭadyumnasya sāratheḥc śiraḥ pracyāvayām āsa phalaṃ pakvaṃ taror ivae tatas te pradrutā vāhā rājaṃs tasya mahātmanaḥa teṣu pradravamāṇeṣu pāñcālān sṛñjayāṃs tathāc vyadrāvayad raṇe droṇas tatra tatra parākramīa vijitya pāṇḍupāñcālān bhāradvājaḥ pratāpavānc svaṃ vyūhaṃ punar āsthāya sthiro bhavad ariṃdamaḥe na cainaṃ pāṇḍavā yuddhe jetum utsahire prabho saṃjaya uvācaa tato duḥśāsano rājañ śaineyaṃ samupādravatb rathavrātena mahatā nānādeśodbhavena cab sarvato bharataśreṣṭha visṛjan sāyakān bahūnb parjanya iva ghoṣeṇa nādayan vai diśo daśab tam āpatantam ālokya sātyakiḥ kauravaṃ raṇeb abhidrutya mahābāhuś chādayām āsa sāyakaiḥb te chādyamānā bāṇaughair duḥśāsanapurogamāḥb prādravan samare bhītās tava putrasya paśyataḥb teṣu dravatsu rājendra putro duḥśāsanas tavab tasthau vyapetabhī rājan sātyakiṃ cārdayac charaiḥb caturbhir vājinas tasya sārathiṃ ca tribhiḥ śaraiḥb sātyakiṃ ca śatenājau viddhvā nādaṃ mumoca saḥb tataḥ kruddho mahārāja mādhavas tasya saṃyugeb rathaṃ sūtaṃ dhvajaṃ taṃ ca cakre dṛśyam ajihmagaiḥc kirañ śarasahasrāṇi parjanya iva vṛṣṭimāna sa viddhvā sātyakiṃ ṣaṣṭyā tathā ṣoḍaśabhiḥ śaraiḥc nākampayat sthitaṃ yuddhe mainākam iva parvatama sa tu duḥśāsanaṃ vīraḥ sāyakair āvṛṇod bhṛśamc maśakaṃ samanuprāptam ūrṇanābhir ivorṇayād tvaran samāvṛṇod bāṇair duḥśāsanam amitrajita dṛṣṭvā duḥśāsanaṃ rājā tathā śaraśatācitamc trigartāṃś codayām āsa yuyudhānarathaṃ pratia te gacchan yuyudhānasya samīpaṃ krūrakāriṇaḥc trigartānāṃ trisāhasrā rathā yuddhaviśāradāḥa te tu taṃ rathavaṃśena mahatā paryavārayanc sthirāṃ kṛtvā matiṃ yuddhe bhūtvā saṃśaptakā mithaḥa teṣāṃ prayatatāṃ yuddhe śaravarṣāṇi muñcatāmc yodhān pañcaśatān mukhyān agrānīke vyapothayata te patanta hatās tūrṇaṃ śinipravarasāyakaiḥc mahāmārutavegena rugṇā iva mahādrumāḥa rathaiś ca bahudhā chinnair dhvajaiś caiva viśāṃ patec hayaiś ca kanakāpīḍaiḥ patitais tatra medinīa śaineyaśarasaṃkṛttaiḥ śoṇitaughapariplutaiḥc aśobhata mahārāja kiṃśukair iva puṣpitaiḥa te vadhyamānāḥ samare yuyudhānena tāvakāḥc trātāraṃ nādhyagacchanta paṅkamagnā iva dvipāḥa tatas te paryavartanta sarve droṇarathaṃ pratic bhayāt patagarājasya gartānīva mahoragāḥa hatvā pañcaśatān yodhāñ śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥb tatas tān hatavidhvastān kṛtvā yodhān sahasraśaḥc prāyāt sa śanakair vīro dhanaṃjayarathaṃ pratia taṃ prayāntaṃ naraśreṣṭhaṃ putro duḥśāsanas tavac vivyādha navabhis tūrṇaṃ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥa sa tu taṃ prativivyādha pañcabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥc rukmapuṅkhair maheṣvāso gārdhrapatrair ajihmagaiḥa sātyakiṃ tu mahārāja prahasann iva bhāratac duḥśāsanas tribhir viddhvā punar vivyādha pañcabhiḥa śaineyas tava putraṃ tu viddhvā pañcabhir āśugaiḥc dhanuś cāsya raṇe chittvā vismayann arjunaṃ yayaua tato duḥśāsanaḥ kruddho vṛṣṇivīrāya gacchatec sarvapāraśavīṃ śaktiṃ visasarja jighāṃsayāa tāṃ tu śaktiṃ tadā ghorāṃ tava putrasya sātyakiḥc ciccheda śatadhā rājan niśitaiḥ kaṅkapatribhiḥa athānyad dhanur ādāya putras tava janeśvarac sātyakiṃ daśabhir viddhvā siṃhanādaṃ nanāda haa sātyakis tu raṇe kruddho mohayitvā sutaṃ tavac śarair agniśikhākārair ājaghāna stanāntared tribhir eva mahābhāgaḥ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥd tato sya vāhān niśitaiś caturbhir ahanac charaiḥd sārathiṃ cāsya saṃkruddho rathi      e sarvāyasais tīkṣṇavaktrair aṣṭābhir vivyadhe punaḥa duḥśāsanas tu viṃśatyā sātyakiṃ pratyavidhyatab preṣayām āsa vīrāya gṛddhrapakṣāñ śilāśitānc sātvato pi mahārāja taṃ vivyādha stanāntaree tribhir eva mahāvegaiḥ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥa tato sya vāhān niśitaiḥ śarair jaghne mahārathaḥc sārathiṃ ca susaṃkruddhaḥ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥa dhanur ekena bhallena hastāvāpaṃ ca pañcabhiḥc dhvajaṃ ca rathaśaktiṃ ca bhallābhyāṃ paramāstravite ciccheda viśikhais tīkṣṇais tathobhau pārṣṇisārathīf nimeṣamātreṇa śarair ubhau ca prāṣṭhisārathīa sa chinnadhanvā viratho hatāśvo hatasārathiḥc trigartasenāpatinā svarathenāpavāhitaḥa tam abhidrutya śaineyo muhūrtam iva bhāratab taṃ prāptam api neyeṣa hantuṃ duḥśāsanaṃ raṇec na jaghāna mahābāhur bhīmasenavacaḥ smarana bhīmasenena hi vadhaḥ sutānāṃ tava bhāratac pratijñātaḥ sabhāmadhye sarveṣām eva saṃyugea tathā duḥśāsanaṃ jitvā sātyakiḥ saṃyuge prabhoc jagāma tvarito rājan yena yāto dhanaṃjayaḥ dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa kiṃ tasyāṃ mama senāyāṃ nāsan ke cin mahārathāḥc ye tathā sātyakiṃ yāntaṃ naivāghnan nāpy avārayand yat kṛtaṃ vṛṣṇivīreṇa karma śaṃsasi me raṇed naitad utsahate kartuṃ karma śakro pi saṃjayad aśraddheyam acintyaṃ ca karma tasya mahātmanaḥd vṛṣṇyandhakapravīrasya śrutvā me vyathitaṃ manaḥa eko hi samare karma kṛtavān satyavikramaḥc śakratulyabalo yuddhe mahendro dānaveṣv ivaa atha vā śūnyam āsīt tad yena yātaḥ sa sātyakiḥc eko vai bahulāḥ senāḥ pramṛdnan puruṣarṣabhaḥd na santi tasmāt putrā me yathā saṃjaya bhāṣasea kathaṃ ca yudhyamānānām apakrānto mahātmanāmc eko bahūnāṃ śaineyas tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya saṃjaya uvācaa rājan senāsamudyogo rathanāgāśvapattimānc tumulas tava sainyānāṃ yugāntasadṛśo bhavata āhṇikeṣu samūheṣu tava sainyasya mānadac nāsti loke samaḥ kaś cit samūha iti me matiḥa tatra devāḥ sma bhāṣante cāraṇāś ca samāgatāḥc etad antāḥ samūhā vai bhaviṣyanti mahītalea na caiva tādṛśaḥ kaś cid vyūha āsīd viśāṃ patec yādṛg jayadrathavadhe droṇena vihito bhavatd uddhṛtā pṛthivī nūnaṃ yuddhahetoḥ samāgataiḥd iti tatra janāḥ smāhur dṛṣṭvā tāṃ janasaṃsadama caṇḍavātābhipannānāṃ samudrāṇām iva svanaḥc raṇe bhavad balaughānām anyonyam abhidhāvatāma pārthivānāṃ sametānāṃ bahūny āsan narottamac tvadbale pāṇḍavānāṃ ca sahasrāṇi śatāni cad tāvakānāṃ tadā hy āsan prayutāny arbudāni cad tathaiva rājan pāṇḍūnāṃ sahasrāṇi sahasraśaḥa saṃrabdhānāṃ pravīrāṇāṃ samare dṛḍhakarmaṇāmc tatrāsīt sumahāñ śabdas tumulo lomaharṣaṇaḥd pāṇḍavānāṃ kurūṇāṃ ca garjatām itaretaramd kṣveḍāḥ kilakilāśabdās tatrāsan vai sahasraśaḥd bherīśabdāś ca tumulā bāṇaśabdāś ca bhāratad anyonyaṃ nighnatāṃ caiva narāṇāṃ śuśruve svanaḥa athākrandad bhīmaseno dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca māriṣac nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca dharmarājaś ca pāṇḍavaḥa āgacchata praharata balavat paridhāvatac praviṣṭāv arisenāṃ hi vīrau mādhavapāṇḍavaua yathā sukhena gacchetāṃ jayadrathavadhaṃ pratic tathā prakuruta kṣipram iti sainyāny acodayate tayor abhāve kuravaḥ kṛtārthāḥ syur vayaṃ jitāḥf yatra yātau mahātmānau tūrṇaṃ parapuraṃjayaua te yūyaṃ sahitā bhūtvā tūrṇam eva balārṇavamc kṣobhayadhvaṃ mahāvegāḥ pavanāḥ sāgaraṃ yathāa bhīmasenena te rājan pāñcālyena ca coditāḥc ājaghnuḥ kauravān saṃkhye tyaktvāsūn ātmanaḥ priyāna icchanto nidhanaṃ yuddhe śastrair uttamatejasaḥc svargārthaṃ mitrakāryārthaṃ nābhyarakṣanta jīvitama tathaiva tāvakā rājan prārthayanto mahad yaśaḥc āryāṃ yuddhe matiṃ kṛtvā yuddhāyaivopatasthirea tasmiṃs tu tumule yuddhe vartamāne mahābhayec hatvā sarvāṇi sainyāni prāyāt sātyakir arjunama kavacānāṃ prabhās tatra sūryaraśmivicitritāḥc dṛṣṭīḥ saṃkhye sainikānāṃ pratijaghnuḥ samantataḥd dhvajaśastrapratihatā lokān samavadīpayana tathā prayatamāneṣu pāṇḍaveyeṣu nirbhayaḥc duryodhano mahārāja vyagāhata mahad balama sa saṃnipātas tumulas teṣāṃ tasya ca bhāratac abhavat sarvasainyānām abhāvakaraṇo mahān dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa tathā gateṣu sainyeṣu tathā kṛcchragataḥ svayamc kaccid duryodhanaḥ sūta nākārṣīt pṛṣṭhato raṇama ekasya ca bahūnāṃ ca saṃnipāto mahāhavec viśeṣato nṛpatinā viṣamaḥ pratibhāti mea so tyantasukhasaṃvṛddho lakṣmyā lokasya ceśvaraḥc eko bahūn samāsādya kaccin nāsīt parāṅmukhaḥ saṃjaya uvācaa rājan saṃgrāmam āścaryaṃ tava putrasya bhāratac ekasya ca bahūnāṃ ca śṛṇuṣva gadato dbhutama duryodhanena sahasā pāṇḍavī pṛtanā raṇec nalinī dviradeneva samantād vipraloḍitāa tathā senāṃ kṛtāṃ dṛṣṭvā tava putreṇa kauravac bhīmasenapurogās taṃ pāñcālāḥ samupādravana sa bhīmasenaṃ daśabhir mādrīputrau tribhis tribhiḥb tribhis tribhir yamau vīrau dharmarājaṃ ca saptabhiḥc virāṭadrupadau ṣaḍbhiḥ śatena ca śikhaṇḍinama dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca viṃśatyā dharmaputraṃ ca saptabhiḥc kekayān daśabhir viddhvā draupadeyāṃs tribhis tribhiḥa śataśaś cāparān yodhān sadvipāṃś ca rathān raṇec śarair avacakartograiḥ kruddho ntaka iva prajāḥa na saṃdadhan vimuñcan vā maṇḍalīkṛtakārmukaḥc adṛśyata ripūn nighnañ śikṣayāstrabalena caa tasya tān nighnataḥ śatrūn hemapṛṣṭhaṃ mahad dhanuḥc bhallābhyāṃ pāṇḍavo jyeṣṭhas tridhā ciccheda māriṣad ajastraṃ maṇḍalībhūtaṃ dadṛśuḥ samare janāḥd tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā bhallābhyām acchinad dhanuḥd tava putrasya kauravya yatamānasya saṃyugea vivyādha cainaṃ bahubhiḥ samyag astaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥc varmāṇy āśu samāsādya te bhagnāḥ kṣitim āviśana tataḥ pramuditāḥ pārthāḥ parivavrur yudhiṣṭhiramc yathā vṛtravadhe devā mudā śakraṃ maharṣibhiḥa atha duryodhano rājā dṛḍham ādāya kārmukamb tato nyad dhanur ādāya tava putraḥ pratāpavānc tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti rājānaṃ bruvan pāṇḍavam abhyayāta taṃ tathā vādinaṃ rājaṃs tava putraṃ mahārathamc pratyudyayuḥ pramuditāḥ pāñcālā jayagṛddhinaḥa tān droṇaḥ pratijagrāha parīpsan yudhi pāṇḍavamc caṇḍavātoddhutān meghān sajalān acalo yathād tathā tava mahat sainyaṃ tad vyarocata tāpayand saṃprahṛṣṭas tu sahasā tava sainyārṇavaṃ pratid loḷayan sarvato gatvā samudraṃ makaro yathāa tatra rājan mahān āsīt saṃgrāmo bhūrivardhanaḥb pāṇḍavānāṃ mahābāho tāvakānāṃ ca saṃyugeb tataḥ śabdo mahān āsīt punar yena dhanaṃjayaḥb atīva sarvaśabdebhyo lomaharṣakaraḥ prabhob arjunasya mahābāho tāvakānāṃ ca dhanvināmb madhye bhāratasainyasya mādhavasya mahāraṇeb droṇasyāpi paraiḥ sārdhaṃ vyūhadvāre mahāraṇeb evam eṣa kṣayo vṛttaḥ pṛthivyāṃ pṛthivīpateb kruddhe rjune tathā droṇe sātvate ca mahāratheb tatra sma kadanaṃ ghoraṃ vartate pāṇḍupūrvajac rudrasyākrīḍasaṃkāśaḥ saṃhāraḥ sarvadehinām saṃjaya uvācaa aparāhṇe mahārāja saṃgrāmaḥ samapadyatac parjanyasamanirghoṣaḥ punar droṇasya somakaiḥa śoṇāśvaṃ ratham āsthāya naravīraḥ samāhitaḥc samare bhyadravat pāṇḍūñ javam āsthāya madhyamama tava priyahite yukto maheṣvāso mahābalaḥc citrapuṅkhaiḥ śitair bāṇaiḥ kalaśottamasaṃbhavaḥd jaghāna somakān rājan sṛñjayān kekayān apia varān varān hi yodhānāṃ vicinvann iva bhāratac akrīḍata raṇe rājan bhāradvājaḥ pratāpavāna tam abhyayād bṛhatkṣatraḥ kekayānāṃ mahārathaḥb bhrātṝṇāṃ pañcamo jyeṣṭhaḥ spardhamāno mahārathaḥc bhrātṝṇāṃ vīrapañcānāṃ jyeṣṭhaḥ samarakarkaśaḥa vimuñcan viśikhāṃs tīkṣṇān ācāryaṃ chādayan bhṛśamc mahāmegho yathā varṣaṃ vimuñcan gandhamādanea tasya droṇo mahārāja svarṇapuṅkhāñ śilāśitānc preṣayām āsa saṃkruddhaḥ sāyakān daśa sapta caa tāṃs tu droṇadhanurmuktān ghorān āśīviṣopamānc ekaikaṃ daśabhir bāṇair yudhi ciccheda hṛṣṭavata tasya tal lāghavaṃ dṛṣṭvā prahasan dvijasattamaḥc preṣayām āsa viśikhān aṣṭau saṃnataparvaṇaḥd preṣayat sa śarān aṣṭau sahasraṃ ca punaḥ punaḥa tān dṛṣṭvā patataḥ śīghraṃ droṇacāpacyutāñ śarānc avārayac charair eva tāvadbhir niśitair dṛḍhaiḥa tato bhavan mahārāja tava sainyasya vismayaḥc bṛhatkṣatreṇa tat karma kṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā suduṣkarama tato droṇo mahārāja kekayaṃ vai viśeṣayanc prāduścakre raṇe divyaṃ brāhmam astraṃ mahātapāḥa tad asya rājan kaikeyaḥ pratyavārayad acyutaḥc brāhmeṇaiva mahābāhur āhave samudīritamd brāhmeṇāstreṇa tan muktaṃ brāhmam astraṃ viśāṃ patea pratihanya tad astraṃ tu bhāradvājasya saṃyugeb kaikeyo straṃ samālokya muktaṃ droṇena saṃyugeb brahmāstreṇaiva rājendra brāhmam astram aśātayatb tato stre nihate brāhme bṛhatkṣatraś ca bhāratac vivyādha brāhmaṇaṃ ṣaṣṭyā svarṇapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥa taṃ droṇo dvipadāṃ śreṣṭho nārācena samarpayatc sa tasya kavacaṃ bhittvā prāviśad dharaṇītalama kṛṣṇasarpo yathā mukto valmīkaṃ nṛpasattamac tathābhyagān mahīṃ bāṇo bhittvā kaikeyam āhavea so tividdho mahārāja droṇenāstravidā bhṛśamc krodhena mahatāviṣṭo vyāvṛtya nayane śubhea droṇaṃ vivyādha saptatyā svarṇapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥc sārathiṃ cāsya bhallena bāhvor urasi cārpayata droṇas tu bahudhā viddho bṛhatkṣatreṇa māriṣac asṛjad viśikhāṃs tīkṣṇān kekayasya rathaṃ pratia vyākulīkṛtya taṃ droṇo bṛhatkṣatraṃ mahārathamb aśvāṃś caturbhir nyavadhīc caturo sya patatribhiḥb sārathiṃ cāsya bāṇena rathanīḍād apāharatb dvābhyāṃ dhvajaṃ ca chattraṃ ca chittvā bhūmāv apātayatc vyasṛjat sāyakaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ kekayaṃ prati bhāratad vyasṛjat sarvato bāṇān kekayasya vimohanātf tam avidhyat pṛṣatkena droṇo rājan stanāntaref bhrātṝṇāṃ pañcamo jyeṣṭho mahābalaparākramaḥa sa gāḍhaviddhas tenāśu mahārāja stanāntarec rathāt puruṣaśārdūlaḥ saṃbhinnahṛdayo patatc tataḥ sādhuvisṛṣṭena nārācena dvijarṣabhaḥc hṛdy avidhyad bṛhatkṣatraṃa bṛhatkṣatre hate rājan kekayānāṃ mahārathec śaiśupāliḥ susaṃkruddho yantāram idam abravīta sārathe yāhi yatraiṣa droṇas tiṣṭhati daṃśitaḥc vinighnan kekayān sarvān pāñcālānāṃ ca vāhinīma tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā sārathī rathināṃ varamc droṇāya prāpayām āsa kāmbojair javanair hayaiḥa dhṛṣṭaketuś ca cedīnām ṛṣabho tibaloditaḥc sahasā prāpatad droṇaṃ pataṃga iva pāvakama so bhyavidhyat tato droṇaṃ ṣaṣṭyā sāśvarathadhvajamc punaś cānyaiḥ śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ suptaṃ dṛḍhaiḥa tasya droṇo hayān hatvā sārathiṃ ca mahābalaḥb sāratheś ca śiraḥ kāyāc cakarta prahasann ivac athainaṃ pañcaviṃśatyā sāyakānāṃ samārpayata viratho vidhanuṣkaś ca cedirājo pi saṃyugec gadāṃ samare tava putrā mahārathāḥc bhīmaṃ bhīmabalaṃ yuddhe yodhayaṃs tu jayaiṣiṇaḥa tato duḥśāsanaḥ kruddho rathaśaktiṃ samākṣipatc sarvapāraśavīṃ tīkṣṇāṃ jighāṃsuḥ pāṇḍunandanama āpatantīṃ mahāśaktiṃ aśvān acodayatc bhīmasenasya kauravya tad adbhutam ivābhavata tataḥ svaratham āsthāya bhīmaseno mahābalaḥc abhyavartata vegena tava putrasya vāhinīma sa mṛdnan kṣatriyān ājau vāto vṛkṣān ivoddhataḥc agacchad dārayan senāṃ sindhuvego nagān ivaa bhojānīkaṃ samāsādya hārdikyenābhirakṣitamc pramathya bahudhā rājan bhīmasenaḥ samabhyayāta saṃtrāsayann anīkāni talaśabdena māriṣac ajayat sarvasainyāni prayayau tadāa bhīmaseno mahārāja draṣṭukāmo dhanaṃjayamc atītya samare yodhāṃs tāvakān pāṇḍunandanaḥa so paśyad arjunaṃ tatra yudhyamānaṃ nararṣabhamc saindhavasya vadhārthaṃ hi parākrāntaṃ parākramīa arjunaṃ tatra dṛṣṭvātha cukrośa mahato ravānb prāvṛṭkāle mahārāja nardann iva balāhakaḥc taṃ tu tasya mahānādaṃ pārthaḥ śuśrāva nardataḥd vāsudevaś ca kauravya bhīmasenasya saṃyugea tataḥ pārtho mahānādaṃ muñcan vai mādhavaś ca hac abhyayātāṃ mahārāja nardantau govṛṣāv ivaa vāsudevārjunau śrutvā ninādaṃ tasya śuṣmiṇaḥc punaḥ punaḥ praṇadatāṃ didṛkṣantau vṛkodarama bhīmasenaravaṃ śrutvā phalgunasya ca dhanvinaḥc aprīyata mahārāja dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥa viśokaś cābhavad rājā śrutvā taṃ ninadaṃ mahatc dhanaṃjayasya ca raṇe jayam āśāstavān vibhuḥa tathā tu nardamāne vai bhīmasene raṇotkaṭec smitaṃ kṛtvā mahābāhur dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥa hṛdgataṃ manasā prāha dhyātvā dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥc dattā bhīma tvayā saṃvit kṛtaṃ guruvacas tathāa na hi teṣāṃ jayo yuddhe yeṣāṃ dveṣṭāsi pāṇḍavac diṣṭyā jīvati saṃgrāme savyasācī dhanaṃjayaḥa diṣṭyā ca kuśalī vīraḥ sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥc diṣṭyā śṛṇomi garjantau vāsudevadhanaṃjayaua yena śakraṃ raṇe jitvā tarpito havyavāhanaḥc sa hantā dviṣatāṃ saṃkhye diṣṭyā jīvati phalgunaḥa yasya bāhubalaṃ sarve vayam āśritya jīvitāḥc sa hantā ripusainyānāṃ diṣṭyā jīvati phalgunaḥa nivātakavacā yena devair api sudurjayāḥc nirjitā rathinaikena diṣṭyā pārthaḥ sa jīvatia kauravān sahitān sarvān gograhārthe samāgatānc yo jayan matsyanagare diṣṭyā pārthaḥ sa jīvatia kālakeyasahasrāṇi caturdaśa mahāraṇeb kālakeyān maheṣvāsān sahasrāṇi caturdaśac yo vadhīd bhujavīryeṇa diṣṭyā pārthaḥ sa jīvatia gandharvarājaṃ balinaṃ duryodhanakṛtena vaic jitavān yo stravīryeṇa diṣṭyā pārthaḥ sa jīvatia kirīṭamālī balavāñ śvetāśvaḥ kṛṣṇasārathiḥc mama priyaś ca satataṃ diṣṭyā jīvati phalgunaḥa putraśokābhisaṃtaptaś cikīrṣuḥ karma duṣkaramc jayadrathavadhānveṣī pratijñāṃ kṛtavān hi yaḥe kaccit sa saindhavaṃ saṃkhye haniṣyati dhanaṃjayaḥa kaccit tīrṇapratijñaṃ hi vāsudevena rakṣitamc anastamita āditye sameṣyāmy aham arjunama kaccit saindhavako rājā duryodhanahite rataḥc nandayiṣyaty amitrāṇi phalgunena nipātitaḥa kaccid duryodhano rājā phalgunena nipātitamc dṛṣṭvā saindhavakaṃ saṃkhye śamam asmāsu dhāsyatia dṛṣṭvā vinihatān bhrātṝn bhīmasenena saṃyugec kaccid duryodhano mandaḥ śamam asmāsu dhāsyatia dṛṣṭvā cānyān bahūn yodhān pātitān dharaṇītalec kaccid duryodhano mandaḥ paścāttāpaṃ kariṣyatia kaccid bhīṣmeṇa no vairam ekenaiva praśāmyatic śeṣasya rakṣaṇārthaṃ ca saṃdhāsyati suyodhanaḥa evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ tasya cintayānasya pārthivac kṛpayābhiparītasya ghoraṃ yuddham avartata dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa tathā tu nardamānaṃ taṃ bhīmasenaṃ mahābalamc meghastanitanirghoṣaṃ ke vīrāḥ paryavārayana na hi paśyāmy ahaṃ taṃ vai triṣu lokeṣu saṃjayac kruddhasya bhimasenasya yas tiṣṭhed agrato raṇea gadām udyacchamānasya kālasyeva mahāmṛdhec na hi paśyāmy ahaṃ tāta yas tiṣṭheta raṇājirea rathaṃ rathena yo hanyāt kuñjaraṃ kuñjareṇa cab aśvam aśvena samare manujair manujāṃs tathāc kas tasya samare sthātā sākṣād api śatakratuḥa kruddhasya bhīmasenasya mama putrāñ jighāṃsataḥc duryodhanahite yuktāḥ samatiṣṭhanta ke grataḥa bhīmasenadavāgnes tu mama putratṛṇolapamc pradhakṣyato raṇamukhe ke vīrāḥ pramukhe sthitāḥa kālyamānān hi me putrān bhīmenāvekṣya saṃyugec kāleneva prajāḥ sarvāḥ ke bhīmaṃ paryavārayand na me rjunād bhayaṃ tādṛk kṛṣṇān nāpi ca sātvatātd hutabhug janmano naiva yādṛg bhīmād bhayaṃ mamaa bhīmavahneḥ pradīptasya mama putrān didhakṣataḥc ke śūrāḥ paryavartanta tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya saṃjaya uvācaa tathā tu nardamānaṃ taṃ bhīmasenaṃ mahārathamc tumulenaiva śabdena karṇo py abhyapatad balīd karṇo py abhyapatad dhīmāṃs tumulena raveṇa caa vyākṣipan balavac cāpam atimātram amarṣaṇaḥc karṇas tu yuddham ākāṅkṣan darśayiṣyan balaṃ balīd rurodha mārgaṃ bhīmasya vātasyeva mahīruhaḥd bhīmo pi dṛṣṭvā sāvegaṃ puro vaikartanaṃ sthitamd cukopa balavad vīraś cikṣepāsya śilāśitānd tān pratyagṛhṇāt karṇo pi pratīpaṃ preṣayac charānd tatas tu sarvayodhānāṃ yatatāṃ prekṣatāṃ tadāa prāvepann iva gātrāṇi karṇabhīmasamāgamec rathināṃ sādināṃ caiva tayoḥ śrutvā talasvanama bhīmasenasya ninadaṃ ghoraṃ śrutvā raṇājirec khaṃ ca bhūmiṃ ca saṃbaddhāṃ menire kṣatriyarṣabhāḥa punar ghoreṇa nādena pāṇḍavasya mahātmanaḥc samare sarvayodhānāṃ dhanūṃṣy abhyapatan kṣitaud keṣāṃ cid alpasattvānāṃ taṃ śrutvā ninadaṃ yudhid śastrāṇi nyapatan dorbhyaḥ keṣāṃ cic cāsavo dravana vitrastāni ca sarvāṇi śakṛnmūtraṃ prasusruvuḥc vāhanāni mahārāja babhūvur vimanāṃsi cad taṃ śrutvā ninadaṃ ghoraṃ śakṛn mūtraṃ saśoṇitamd prasusruvur vāhanāni stabdhāni ca tato bhavana prādurāsan nimittāni ghorāṇi ca bahūni cab gṛdhrakaṅkabaḍaiś cāsīd antarikṣaṃ samāvṛtamc tasmiṃs tu tumule rājan bhīmakarṇasamāgamea tataḥ karṇas tu viṃśatyā śarāṇāṃ bhīmam ārdayatc vivyādha cāsya tvaritaḥ sūtaṃ pañcabhir āśugaiḥa prahasya bhīmasenas tu karṇaṃ pratyarpayad raṇec sāyakānāṃ catuḥṣaṣṭyā kṣiprakārī mahābalaḥa tasya karṇo maheṣvāsaḥ sāyakāṃś caturo kṣipatc asaṃprāptāṃs tu tān bhīmaḥ sāyakair nataparvabhiḥe ciccheda bahudhā rājan darśayan pāṇilāghavama taṃ karṇaś chādayām āsa śaravrātair anekaśaḥc saṃchādyamānaḥ karṇena bahudhā pāṇḍunandanaḥa ciccheda cāpaṃ karṇasya muṣṭideśe mahārathaḥc vivyādha cainaṃ bahubhiḥ sāyakair nataparvabhiḥa athānyad dhanur ādāya sajyaṃ kṛtvā ca sūtajaḥc vivyādha samare bhīmaṃ bhīmakarmā mahārathaḥa tasya bhīmo bhṛśaṃ kruddhas trīñ śarān nataparvaṇaḥc nicakhānorasi tadā sūtaputrasya vegitaḥa taiḥ karṇo bhrājata śarair uromadhyagatais tadāc mahīdhara ivodagras triśṛṅgo bharatarṣabhad madhyaṃdinam anuprāptas tritejā iva bhāskaraḥa susrāva cāsya rudhiraṃ viddhasya parameṣubhiḥc dhātuprasyandinaḥ śailād yathā gairikarājayaḥa kiṃ cid vicalitaḥ karṇaḥ suprahārābhipīḍitaḥc sasāyakaṃ dhanuḥ kṛtvā bhīmaṃ vivyādha māriṣae cikṣepa ca punar bāṇāñ śataśo tha sahasraśaḥa sa chādyamānaḥ sahasā karṇena dṛḍhadhanvināc dhanurjyām acchinat tūrṇam utsmayan pāṇḍunandanaḥa sārathiṃ cāsya bhallena prāhiṇod yamasādanamc vāhāṃś ca caturaḥ saṃkhye vyasūṃś cakre mahārathaḥa hatāśvāt tu rathāt karṇaḥ samāplutya viśāṃ patec syandanaṃ vṛṣasenasya samārohan mahārathaḥa nirjitya tu raṇe karṇaṃ bhīmasenaḥ pratāpavānc nanāda sumahānādaṃ parjanyaninadopamama tasya taṃ ninadaṃ śrutvā prahṛṣṭo bhūd yudhiṣṭhiraḥc karṇaṃ ca nirjitaṃ matvā bhīmasenena bhārataa samantāc chaṅkhaninadaṃ pāṇḍusenākarot tadāb cakre yudhiṣṭhiraḥ saṃkhye harṣanādaiś ca saṃkulāmc śatrusenādhvaniṃ śrutvā tāvakā hy api nānadane gāṇḍīvaṃ prākṣipat pārthaḥ kṛṣṇo py abjam avādayata tam antardhāya ninadaṃ dhvanir bhīmasya nardataḥc aśrūyata mahārāja sarvasainyeṣu bhāratad śuśruve bhīmasenasya tad adbhutam ivābhavata tato vyāyacchatām astraiḥ pṛthak pṛthag ariṃdamauc mṛdupūrvaṃ ca rādheyo dṛḍhapūrvaṃ ca pāṇḍavaḥd tato vyāyacchamānasya bhīmasenasya saṃyuged tat sainyaṃ kaluṣībhūtaṃ na prājñāyata kiṃ canad bhīmo pi ca mahārāja vaikartanam upādravatd āsure tu mahāsainye tārakaṃ pāvakir yathād tayor evaṃ mahad yuddham abhavad bhīmakarṇayoḥd taṃ bhīmaseno mahatā śaravarṣeṇa vārayand vivyādha sārathiṃ cāsya hayāṃś ca caturaḥ śaraiḥd dhvajaṃ cāsya patākāṃ ca bhallaiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥd rathaṃ ca cakrarakṣau ca bhīmaś ciccheda māriṣad karṇo pi rathināṃ śreṣṭho bhīmasenena kampitaḥd khaḍgacarmadharo rājan bhīmam abhyadravad balīd bhīmaś ciccheda khaḍgaṃ ca carmaṇā saha māriṣad dṛṣṭvā karṇaṃ ca pārthena bādhitaṃ bahubhiḥ śaraiḥd duryodhano mahārāja duḥśalaṃ pratyabhāṣatad karṇaṃ kṛcchragataṃ paśya śīghraṃ yānaṃ prayaccha had evam uktas tato rājā duḥśalaḥ samupādravatd duḥśalasya rathaṃ karṇaś cāruroha mahārathaḥd tau pārthaḥ sahasā gatvā vivyādha daśabhiḥ śaraiḥd punaś ca karṇaṃ viddhvāpi duḥśalasya śiro haratd duḥśalaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmasenena māriṣad tasyaiva dhanur ādāya karṇo vivyādha pāṇḍavamd anyonyaṃ samare vīrau yuyudhāte mahābalaud śatrughnau śatrumadhye tu balavajrabhṛtāv ivad bhīmo viddhvā hayāṃś caiva sārathiṃ ca punaḥ punaḥd karṇam abhyadravat pārthaḥ prahasaṃś ca mahābalaḥd tato vyāyacchamānasya bhīmasenasya saṃyuged tat sainyaṃ śakalībhūtaṃ na prājñāyata kiṃ cana saṃjaya uvācaa tasmin vilulite sainye saindhavāyārjune gatec sātvate bhīmasene ca putras te droṇam abhyayāte tvarann ekarathenaiva bahukṛtyaṃ vicintayana sa rathas tava putrasya tvarayā parayā yutaḥc tūrṇam abhyapatad droṇaṃ manomārutavegavānd iha dṛṣṭa ito naṣṭaḥ sarathaḥ prādravan nṛpaḥd muhūrtād iva putras te droṇam āsādya māriṣaa uvāca cainaṃ putras te saṃrambhād raktalocanaḥb sasaṃrambham idaṃ vākyam abravīt kurunandanaḥc arjuno bhīmasenaś ca sātyakiś cāparājitaḥa vijitya sarvasainyāni sumahānti mahārathāḥb atikramya ca hatvā ca sainyāni sumahānti cac saṃprāptāḥ sindhurājasya samīpam arikarśanāḥe vyāyacchanti ca tatrāpi sarva evāparājitāḥa yadi tāvad raṇe pārtho vyatikrānto mahārathaḥc kathaṃ sātyakibhīmābhyāṃ vyatikrānto si mānadaa āścaryabhūtaṃ loke smin samudrasyeva śoṣaṇamc nirjayaṃ tava viprāgrya sātvatenārjunena caa tathaiva bhīmasenena lokaḥ saṃvadate bhṛśamc kathaṃ droṇo jitaḥ saṃkhye dhanurvedasya pāragaḥd ity evaṃ bruvate yodhā aśraddheyam idaṃ tavaa nāśa eva tu me nūnaṃ mandabhāgyasya saṃyugec yatra tvāṃ puruṣavyāghram atikrāntās trayo rathāḥa evaṃ gate tu kṛtye smin brūhi yat te vivakṣitamc yad gataṃ gatam eveha śeṣaṃ cintaya mānadaa yat kṛtyaṃ sindhurājasya prāptakālam anantaramc tad bravītu bhavān kṣipraṃ sādhu tat saṃvidhīyatām droṇa uvācaa cintyaṃ bahu mahārāja kṛtyaṃ yat tatra me śṛṇuc trayo hi samatikrāntāḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathāḥe yāvad eva bhayaṃ paścāt tāvad eṣāṃ puraḥsarama tad garīyastaraṃ manye yatra kṛṣṇadhanaṃjayauc sā purastāc ca paścāc ca gṛhītā bhāratī camūḥa tatra kṛtyam ahaṃ manye saindhavasyābhirakṣaṇamc sa no rakṣyatamas tāta kruddhād bhīto dhanaṃjayāta gatau hi saindhavaṃ vīrau yuyudhānavṛkodarauc saṃprāptaṃ tad idaṃ dyūtaṃ yat tac chakunibuddhijama na sabhāyāṃ jayo vṛtto nāpi tatra parājayaḥc iha no glahamānānām adya tāta jayājayaua yān sma tān glahate ghorāñ śakuniḥ kurusaṃsadic akṣān saṃmanyamānaḥ sa prā kśarās te durāsadāḥd na te kṣā niśitā ghorāḥ śarā yuṣmat tanucchadaḥa yatra te bahavas tāta kuravaḥ paryavasthitāḥc senāṃ durodaraṃ viddhi śarān akṣān viśāṃ patea glahaṃ ca saindhavaṃ rājann atra dyūtasya niścayaḥc saindhave hi mahādyūtaṃ samāsaktaṃ paraiḥ sahad atra te dhruvam āyatto jayo vājaya eva vāa atra sarve mahārāja tyaktvā jīvitam ātmanaḥc saindhavasya raṇe rakṣāṃ vidhivat kartum arhathae tatra no glahamānānāṃ dhruvau tāta jayājayaua yatra te parameṣvāsā yattā rakṣanti saindhavamc tatra yāhi svayaṃ śīghraṃ tāṃś ca rakṣasva rakṣiṇaḥa ihaiva tv aham āsiṣye preṣayiṣyāmi cāparānc nirotsyāmi ca pāñcālān sahitān pāṇḍusṛñjayaiḥa tato duryodhanaḥ prāyāt tūrṇam ācāryaśāsanātc udyamyātmānam ugrāya karmaṇe sapadānugaḥa cakrarakṣau tu pāñcālyau yudhāmanyūttamaujasauc bāhyena senām abhyetya jagmatuḥ savyasācinama tau hi pūrvaṃ mahārāja vāritau kṛtavarmaṇāc praviṣṭe tv arjune rājaṃs tava sainyaṃ yuyutsayād pārśvena senām āyāntau kururājo dadarśa had pārśve bhittvā camūṃ vīrau praviṣṭau tava vāhinīma tābhyāṃ duryodhanaḥ sārdham agacchad yuddham uttamamc tvaritas tvaramāṇābhyāṃ bhrātṛbhyāṃ bhārato balīa tāv abhidravatām enam ubhāv udyatakārmukauc mahārathasamākhyātau kṣatriyapravarau yudhid tam avidhyad yudhāmanyus triṃśatā kaṅkapatribhiḥd viṃśatyā sārathiṃ cāsya caturbhiś caturo hayānd duryodhano yudhāmanyor dhvajam ekeṣuṇācchinatd iṣudhīkārmukaṃ cāsya samakṛntad rathottamed sārathiṃ cāsya bhallena rathanīḍād apāharatd tato vidhyac charais tīkṣṇaiś caturbhiś caturo hayānd yudhāmanyuś ca pāñcālya uttamaujās tathaiva cad bhittvā pārśvena sainyaṃ tu praviṣṭau phalgunaṃ pratid tau samāsādayad vīraḥ śaraiḥ kāyāsthibhedibhiḥd saptabhiś ca yudhāmanyuṃ ṣaḍbhiś caivottamaujasamd tau taṃ suniśitair bāṇair avidhyetāṃ mahārathaud uttamaujās tu bhallena cāpaṃ ciccheda vīryavānd athānyat sumahātejā dhanur gṛhya mahābalaḥd chādayām āsa saṃkruddhaḥ pāñcālau kurunandanaḥa yudhāmanyus tu saṃkruddhaḥ śarāṃs triṃśatam āyasānc vyasṛjat tava putrasya tvaramāṇaḥ stanāntared tathottamaujāḥ saṃkruddhaḥ śarair hemavibhūṣitaiḥd avidhyat sārathiṃ cāsya prāhiṇod yamasādanama duryodhano pi rājendra pāñcālyasyottamaujasaḥc jaghāna caturaś cāśvān ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathīa uttamaujā hatāśvas tu hatasūtaś ca saṃyugec āruroha rathaṃ bhrātur yudhāmanyor abhitvarand yudhāmanyurathaṃ śīghram āruroha paraṃtapaḥa sa rathaṃ prāpya taṃ bhrātur duryodhanahayāñ śaraiḥc bahubhis tāḍayām āsa te hatāḥ prāpatan bhuvia hayeṣu patiteṣv asya ciccheda parameṣuṇāc yudhāmanyur dhanuḥ śīghraṃ śarāvāpaṃ ca saṃyugea hatāśvasūtāt sa rathād avaplutya mahārathaḥc gadām ādāya te putraḥ pāñcālyāv abhyadhāvataa tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya kruddhaṃ parapuraṃjayamc avaplutau rathopasthād yudhāmanyūttamaujasaua tataḥ sa hemacitraṃ taṃ syandanapravaraṃ gadīc gadayā pothayām āsa sāśvasūtadhvajaṃ raṇed etad īdṛśakaṃ kārṣīt putras tava janādhipad gadayā gadināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sarvalokamahārathaḥa hatvā cainaṃ sa putras te hatāśvo hatasārathiḥc madrarājarathaṃ tūrṇam āruroha paraṃtapaḥa pāñcālānāṃ tu mukhyau tau rājaputrau mahābalauc ratham anyaṃ samāruhya dhanaṃjayam abhīyatuḥ saṃjaya uvāca vartamāne mahārāja saṃgrāme lomaharṣaṇe vyākuleṣu ca sainyeṣu pīḍyamāneṣu sarvaśaḥ rādheyo bhīmam ānarcchad yuddhāya bharatarṣabha yathā nāgo vane nāgaṃ matto mattam abhidravat dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa yau tau karṇaś ca bhīmaś ca saṃprayuddhau mahābalauc arjunasya rathopānte kīdṛśaḥ so bhavad raṇaḥa pūrvaṃ hi nirjitaḥ karṇo bhīmasenena saṃyugec kathaṃ bhūyas tu rādheyo bhīmam āgān mahārathaḥa bhīmo vā sūtatanayaṃ pratyudyātaḥ kathaṃ raṇec mahārathasamākhyātaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pravaraṃ rathama bhīṣmadroṇāv atikramya dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥc nānyato bhayam ādatta vinā karṇaṃ dhanurdharama bhayān na śete satataṃ cintayan vai mahārathamb bhayād yasya mahābāhor na śete bahulāḥ samāḥb cintayan nityaśo vīryaṃ rādheyasya mahātmanaḥc taṃ kathaṃ sūtaputraṃ hi bhīmo yudhyata saṃyugea brahmaṇyaṃ vīryasaṃpannaṃ samareṣv anivartinamc kathaṃ karṇaṃ yudhāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ bhīmo yudhyata saṃyugea yau tau samīyatur vīrāv arjunasya rathaṃ pratic kathaṃ nu tāv ayudhyetāṃ sūtaputravṛkodaraua bhrātṛtvaṃ darśitaṃ pūrvaṃ ghṛṇī cāpi sa sūtajaḥc kathaṃ bhīmena yuyudhe kuntyā vākyam anusmarana bhīmo vā sūtaputreṇa smaran vairaṃ purā kṛtamc so yudhyata kathaṃ vīraḥ karṇena saha saṃyugea āśāste ca sadā sūta putro duryodhano mamac karṇo jeṣyati saṃgrāme sahitān pāṇḍavān itia jayāśā yatra mandasya putrasya mama saṃyugec sa kathaṃ bhīmakarmāṇaṃ bhīmasenam ayudhyataa yaṃ samāśritya putrair me kṛtaṃ vairaṃ mahārathaiḥc taṃ sūtatanayaṃ tāta kathaṃ bhīmo hy ayodhayata anekān viprakārāṃś ca sūtaputrasamudbhavānc smaramāṇaḥ kathaṃ bhīmo yuyudhe sūtasūnunāa yo jayat pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ rathenaikena vīryavānc taṃ sūtatanayaṃ yuddhe kathaṃ bhīmo hy ayodhayata yo jātaḥ kuṇḍalābhyāṃ ca kavacena sahaiva cac taṃ sūtaputraṃ samare bhīmaḥ katham ayodhayatd astrahetoḥ purā tāta bhārgavaṃ samapūjayatd tasya prasādād brahmāstraṃ labdhavāṃś ca bhṛgūttamāta yathā tayor yuddham abhūd yaś cāsīd vijayī tayoḥc tan mamācakṣva tattvena kuśalo hy asi saṃjaya saṃjaya uvācaa bhīmasenas tu rādheyam utsṛjya rathināṃ varamc iyeṣa gantuṃ yatrāstāṃ vīrau kṛṣṇadhanaṃjayaua taṃ prayāntam abhidrutya rādheyaḥ kaṅkapatribhiḥc abhyavarṣan mahārāja megho vṛṣṭyeva parvatama phullatā paṅkajeneva vaktreṇābhyutsmayan balīc ājuhāva raṇe yāntaṃ bhīmam ādhirathis tadād karṇa uvācad bhīmāhitais tava raṇe svapne pi na vibhāvitamd tad darśayasi kasmān me pṛṣṭhaṃ pārthadidṛkṣayād kuntyāḥ putrasya sadṛśaṃ nedaṃ pāṇḍavanandanad tena mām abhitaḥ sthitvā śaravarṣair avākiraa bhīmasenas tadāhvānaṃ karṇān nāmarṣayad yudhic ardhamaṇḍalam āvṛtya sūtaputram ayodhayata avakragāmibhir bāṇair abhyavarṣan mahāyasaiḥc dvairathe daṃśitaṃ yattaṃ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varama vidhitsuḥ kalahasyāntaṃ jighāṃsuḥ karṇam akṣiṇotc taṃ ca hatvetarān sarvān hantukāmo mahābalaḥa tasmai prāsṛjad ugrāṇi vividhāni paraṃtapaḥc amarṣī pāṇḍavaḥ kruddhaḥ śaravarṣāṇi māriṣaa tasya tānīṣuvarṣāṇi mattadviradagāminaḥc sūtaputro stramāyābhir agrasat sumahāyaśāḥa sa yathāvan mahārāja vidyayā vai supūjitaḥc ācāryavan maheṣvāsaḥ karṇaḥ paryacarad raṇea saṃrambheṇa tu yudhyantaṃ bhīmasenaṃ smayann ivac abhyapadyata rādheyas tam amarṣī vṛkodarama tan nāmṛṣyata kaunteyaḥ karṇasya smitam āhavec yudhyamāneṣu vīreṣu paśyatsu ca samantataḥa taṃ bhīmasenaḥ saṃprāptaṃ vatsadantaiḥ stanāntarec vivyādha balavān kruddhas tottrair iva mahādvipama sūtaṃ tu sūtaputrasya supuṅkhair niśitaiḥ śaraiḥc sumuktaiś citravarmāṇaṃ nirbibheda trisaptabhiḥa karṇo jāmbūnadair jālaiḥ saṃchannān vātaraṃhasaḥc vivyādha turagān vīraḥ pañcabhiḥ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥa tato bāṇamayaṃ jālaṃ bhīmasenarathaṃ pratic karṇena vihitaṃ rājan nimeṣārdhād adṛśyataa sarathaḥ sadhvajas tatra sasūtaḥ pāṇḍavas tadāc prācchādyata mahārāja karṇacāpacyutaiḥ śaraiḥa tasya karṇaś catuḥṣaṣṭyā vyadhamat kavacaṃ dṛḍhamc kruddhaś cāpy ahanat pārśve nārācair marmabhedibhiḥa tato cintya mahāvegān karṇakārmukaniḥsṛtānc samāśliṣyad asaṃbhrāntaḥ sūtaputraṃ vṛkodaraḥa sa karṇacāpaprabhavān iṣūn āśīviṣopamānc bibhrad bhīmo mahārāja na jagāma vyathāṃ raṇed sa karṇacāpaṃ ciccheda bhīmaseno mahābalaḥd trāsayitvā mahārāja gām amitavikramaḥa tato dvātriṃśatā bhallair niśitais tigmatejanaiḥc vivyādha samare karṇaṃ bhīmasenaḥ pratāpavāna ayatnenaiva taṃ karṇaḥ śarair upa samākiratc bhīmasenaṃ mahābāhuṃ saindhavasya vadhaiṣiṇama mṛdupūrvaṃ ca rādheyo bhīmam ājāv ayodhayatc krodhapūrvaṃ tathā bhīmaḥ pūrvavairam anusmarana taṃ bhīmaseno nāmṛṣyad avamānam amarṣaṇaḥc sa tasmai vyasṛjat tūrṇaṃ śaravarṣam amitrajita te śarāḥ preṣitā rājan bhīmasenena saṃyugec nipetuḥ sarvato bhīmāḥ kūjanta iva pakṣiṇaḥa hemapuṅkhā mahārāja bhīmasenadhanuścyutāḥc abhyadravaṃs te rādheyaṃ vṛkāḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathāa karṇas tu rathināṃ śreṣṭhaś chādyamānaḥ samantataḥc rājan vyasṛjad ugrāṇi śaravarṣāṇi saṃyugea tasya tān aśaniprakhyān iṣūn samaraśobhinaḥc ciccheda bahubhir bhallair asaṃprāptān vṛkodaraḥa punaś ca śaravarṣeṇa chādayām āsa bhāratac karṇo vaikartano yuddhe bhīmasenaṃ mahārathamd punar bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ vyasṛjat pāṇḍavaṃ pratid tathā karṇena samare pīḍyamānaḥ samantataḥa tatra bhārata bhīmaṃ tu dṛṣṭavantaḥ sma sāyakaiḥc samācitatanuṃ saṃkhye śvāvidhaṃ śalalair ivaa hemapuṅkhāñ śilādhautān karṇacāpacyutāñ śarānc dadhāra samare vīraḥ svaraśmīn iva bhāskaraḥa rudhirokṣitasarvāṅgo bhīmaseno vyarocatac tapanīyanibhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ palāśa iva kānaned samṛddhakusumāpīḍo vasante śokavat taruḥa tat tu bhīmo mahārāja karṇasya caritaṃ raṇec nāmṛṣyata maheṣvāsaḥ krodhād udvṛtya cakṣuṣīa sa karṇaṃ pañcaviṃśatyā nārācānāṃ samārpayatc mahīdharam iva śvetaṃ gūḍhapādair viṣolbaṇaiḥd viviśuś ca yathaivogrā valmīkaṃ bhujagottamāḥd saptabhir niśitais tūrṇaṃ śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥa taṃ vivyādha punar bhīmaḥ ṣaḍbhir aṣṭābhir eva cac marmasv amaravikrāntaḥ sūtaputraṃ mahāraṇed marmaṇy anaparādhī saṃdidhitsuḥ kalahaṃ tadāa tataḥ karṇasya saṃkruddho bhīmasenaḥ pratāpavānc ciccheda kārmukaṃ tūrṇaṃ sarvopakaraṇāni cad tathāpi samare tūrṇaṃ vivyādhorasi pāṇḍavaḥd pāṇḍavas tu punar viddhvā saptabhiḥ sāyakottamaiḥd anyaiś ca bahu saṃrājañ śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥa jaghāna caturaś cāśvān sūtaṃ ca tvaritaḥ śaraiḥc nārācair arkaraśmyābhaiḥ karṇaṃ vivyādha corasia te jagmur dharaṇīṃ sarve karṇaṃ nirbhidya māriṣac yathā hi jaladaṃ bhittvā rājan sūryasya raśmayaḥd samāśvastas tu karṇo vai punar yuddham arocayatd bhīmaseno dṛḍhaṃ kopāt punar vivyādha patriṇāa sa vaikalyaṃ mahat prāpya chinnadhanvā śarārditaḥc tathā puruṣamānī sa pratyapāyād rathāntaramc   lajjām utsṛjya bhāratac bhīmasenabhayāt karṇaḥd apacakrāma samare yuddhāya bharatarṣabha dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa yasmiñ jayāśā satataṃ putrāṇāṃ mama saṃjayac taṃ dṛṣṭvā vimukhaṃ saṃkhye kiṃ nu duryodhano bravītd kathaṃ ca yuyudhe bhīmo vīryaślāghī mahābalaḥe karṇo vā samare tāta kim akārṣīd ataḥ param saṃjaya uvāca tavāparādhād rājendra punar yuddham avartataa bhīmasenaṃ raṇe dṛṣṭvā jvalantam iva pāvakamb svayaṃ śiṣyo bhūtapater bhārgavasya dhanurdharaḥb tasya tulyo stramāyābhis tad viśiṣṭo tha vā vṛṣaḥb śiṣyaḥ śiṣyaguṇair yuktaḥ kālāntakayamopamaḥb sa bhīmasenena jitaḥ pāṇḍuputreṇa bhāratab śiṣyatvaṃ prāptavān karṇas tasya tulyo stramāyayāb tad viśiṣṭo pi vā karṇaḥ śiṣyaḥ śiṣyaguṇair yutaḥb kālāntakayamo yadvad bhīmasenena nirjitaḥb kuntīputreṇa bhīmena nirjitaḥ sa tu līlayāc ratham anyaṃ samāsthāya vidhivat kalpitaṃ punaḥe abhyayāt pāṇḍavaṃ karṇo vātoddhūta ivārṇavaḥa locanaiḥa krodharaktekṣaṇau kruddhau niḥśvasantau mahārathauc yuddhe nyonyaṃ samāsādya tatakṣatur ariṃdamaua vyāghrāv iva susaṃrabdhau śyenāv iva ca śīghragauc śarabhāv iva saṃkruddhau yuyudhāte dagdhum aicchaś ca yat kuntīṃ saputrāṃ tvam anāgasamc kṛṣṇāyāś ca parikleśaṃ sabhāmadhye durātmabhiḥd keśapakṣagrahaṃ caiva duḥśāsanakṛtaṃ tathād paruṣāṇi ca vākyāni karṇenoktāni bhārataa patim anyaṃ parīpsasva na santi patayas tavac narakaṃ patitāḥ pārthāḥ sarve ṣaṇḍhatilopamāḥa samakṣaṃ tava kauravya yad ūcuḥ kuravas tadāc dāsībhogena kṛṣṇāṃ ca bhoktukāmāḥ sutās tavaa yac cāpi tān pravrajataḥ kṛṣṇājinanivāsinaḥc paruṣāṇy uktavān karṇaḥ sabhāyāṃ saṃnidhau tavad putras tava viśeṣeṇa kāladyūtena noditaḥa tṛṇīkṛtya ca yat pārthāṃs tava putro vavalga hac viṣamasthān samastho hi saṃrambhād gatacetasaḥa bālyāt prabhṛti cārighnas tāni duḥkhāni cintayanc niravidyata dharmātmā jīvitena vṛkodaraḥd evaṃ bahuvidhān ghorān smaran dīptāgnisaṃnibhaḥa tato visphārya sumahad dhemapṛṣṭhaṃ durāsadamc śarānc vyadhamad bhīmasenasya śarajālāni patribhiḥa mahāratho mahābāhur mahāvegair mahābalaḥc vivyādhādhirathir bhīmaṃ navabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥa sa tottrair iva mātaṅgo vāryamāṇaḥ patatribhiḥc abhyadhāvad asaṃbhrāntaḥ sūtaputraṃ vṛkodaraḥa tam āpatantaṃ vegena rabhasaṃ pāṇḍavarṣabhamc karṇaḥ pratyudyayau yoddhuṃ matto mattam iva dvipama tataḥ pradhmāpya jalajaṃ bherīśatanināditamc vyomni balāhakāḥa saṃrabdhau krodhatāmrākṣau prekṣya karṇavṛkodarauc saṃtrastāḥ samakampanta tvadīyānāṃ mahārathāḥa yamarāṣṭropamaṃ ghoram āsīd āyodhanaṃ tayoḥc durdarśaṃ bharataśreṣṭha pretarājapuraṃ yathāa samājam iva tac citraṃ prekṣamāṇā mahārathāḥc nālakṣayañ jayaṃ vyaktam ekaikasya nivāraṇea tayoḥ praikṣanta saṃmardaṃ saṃnikṛṣṭamahāstrayoḥc tava durmantrite rājan saputrasya viśāṃ patea virathaṃ karṇaṃ tava putrasya paśyataḥd sa tathā virathaḥ karṇo bhīmasenena nirjitaḥd anyaṃ rathaṃ samāsthāya punar vivyādha mārutimd mahāgajau yathā dṛptau viṣāṇāgraiḥ parasparamd tatakṣatus tathā vārayed yo raṇe karṇaḥ sayakṣāsuramānavāna sa kathaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ yuddhe bhrājamānam iva śriyāc nātarat saṃyuge tāta tan mamācakṣva saṃjayaa kathaṃ ca yuddhaṃ bhūyo bhūt tayoḥ prāṇadurodarec atra manye viprakārāṃś ca sarvaśaḥc hṛdi kṛtvā mahābāhur bhīmo yudhyata sūtajama tasmān me saṃjaya brūhi karṇabhīmau yathā raṇec ayudhyetāṃ yudhi śreṣṭhau parasparavadhaiṣiṇau saṃjaya uvāca hanta te kathayiṣyāmi tayoḥ prāṇadadurodaram paśyatāṃ sarvasainyānāṃ keśavārjunayor apia śṛṇu rājan yathā vṛttaḥ saṃgrāmaḥ karṇabhīmayoḥc parasparavadhaprepsvor vane kuñjarayor ivaa rājan vaikartano bhīmaṃ kruddhaḥ kruddham ariṃdamamc parākrāntaṃ parākramya vivyādha triṃśatā śaraiḥa mahāvegaiḥ prasannāgraiḥ śātakumbhapariṣkṛtaiḥc āhanad bharataśreṣṭha bhīmaṃ vaikartanaḥ śaraiḥa tasyāsyato dhanur bhīmaś cakarta hemapṛṣṭhaṃ durāsadamc vikṛṣya ca mahātejā vyasṛjat sāyakān navaa tān pāṇḍuputraś ciccheda navabhir nataparvabhiḥb suvarṇavikṛtair bāṇaiḥ suvarṇavikṛtāñ śarānc vasuṣeṇena nirmuktān nava rājan mahāśarāne chittvā bhīmo mahārāja nādaṃ siṃha ivānadata tau vṛṣāv iva nardantau balinau vāśitāntarec śārdūlāv iva cānyonyam atyarthaṃ ca hy agarjatāma anyonyaṃ prajihīrṣantāv anyonyasyāntaraiṣiṇauc anyonyam abhivīkṣantau goṣṭheṣv iva maharṣabhaua mahāgajāv ivāsādya viṣāṇāgraiḥ parasparamc śaraiḥ pūrṇāyatotsṛṣṭair anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥa nirdahantau mahārāja śaravṛṣṭyā parasparamc anyonyam abhivīkṣantau kopād vivṛtalocanaua prahasantau tathānyonyaṃ bhartsayantau muhur muhuḥc śaṅkhaśabdaṃ ca kurvāṇau yuyudhāte parasparama tasya bhīmaḥ punaś cāpaṃ muṣṭau ciccheda māriṣac śaṅkhavarṇāś ca tān aśvān bāṇair ninye yamakṣayamd sārathiṃ ca tathāpy asya rathanīḍād apātayatd tato vaikartanaḥ karṇaś cintāṃ prāpa duratyayāmd sa chādyamānaḥ samare hatāśvo hatasārathiḥd mohitaḥ śarajālena kartavyaṃ nābhyapadyataa tathā kṛcchragataṃ dṛṣṭvā karṇaṃ duryodhano nṛpaḥc vepamāna iva krodhād vyādideśātha durjayama gaccha durjaya rādheyaṃ purā grasati pāṇḍavaḥc jahi tūbarakaṃ kṣipraṃ karṇasya balam ādadhata evam uktas tathety uktvā tava putras tavātmajamc abhyadravad bhīmasenaṃ vyāsaktaṃ vikirañ śarāna sa bhīmaṃ navabhir bāṇair aśvān aṣṭabhir ardayatc ṣaḍbhiḥ sūtaṃ tribhiḥ ketuṃ punas taṃ cāpi saptabhiḥa bhīmaseno pi saṃkruddhaḥ sāśvayantāram āśugaiḥc durjayaṃ bhinnamarmāṇam anayad yamasādanama svalaṃkṛtaṃ kṣitau kṣuṇṇaṃ ceṣṭamānaṃ yathoragamc rudann ārtas tava sutaṃ karṇaś cakre pradakṣiṇama sa tu taṃ virathaṃ kṛtvā smayann atyantavairiṇamc samācinod bāṇagaṇaiḥ śataghnīm iva śaṅkubhiḥa tathāpy atirathaḥ karṇo bhidyamānaḥ sma sāyakaiḥc na jahau samare bhīmaṃ kruddharūpaṃ paraṃtapaḥ saṃjaya uvācaa sa tathā virathaḥ karṇaḥ punar bhīmena nirjitaḥc ratham anyaṃ samāsthāya sadyo vivyādha pāṇḍavama mahāgajāv ivāsādya viṣāṇāgraiḥ parasparamc śaraiḥ pūrṇāyatotsṛṣṭair anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥa atha karṇaḥ śaravrātair bhīmaṃ balavad ardayatc nanāda balavan nādaṃ punar vivyādha corasia taṃ bhīmo daśabhir bāṇaiḥ pratyavidhyad ajihmagaiḥc punar vivyādha viṃśatyā śarāṇāṃ nataparvaṇāma karṇas tu navabhir bhīmaṃ viddhvā rājan stanāntarec dhvajam ekena vivyādha sāyakena śitena haa sāyakānāṃ tataḥ pārthas triṣaṣṭyā pratyavidhyatac tottrair iva mahānāgaṃ kaśābhir iva vājinama so tividdho mahārāja pāṇḍavena yaśasvināc sṛkviṇī lelihan vīraḥ krodhasaṃraktalocanaḥd ciccheda kārmukaṃ tūrṇaṃ pāṇḍavasya mahātmanaḥa tataḥ śaraṃ mahārāja sarvakāyāvadāraṇamc prāhiṇod bhīmasenāya balāyendra ivāśanima sa nirbhidya raṇe pārthaṃ sūtaputradhanuścyutaḥc agacchad dārayan bhūmiṃ citrapuṅkhaḥ śilīmukhaḥd tato bhīmo mahābāhuḥ krodhasaṃraktalocanaḥa sarvaśaikyāṃ catuṣkiṣkuṃ gurvīṃ rukmāṅgadāṃ gadāmc prāhiṇot sūtaputrāya ṣaḍasrām avicārayana tayā jaghānādhiratheḥ sadaśvān sādhuvāhinaḥc gadayā bhārataḥ kruddho vajreṇendra ivāsurāna tato bhīmo mahābāhuḥ kṣurābhyāṃ bharatarṣabhac dhvajam ādhiratheś chittvā sūtam abhyahanat tadād mahābalān mahāvegān sadaśvān gadayā hatānd sūtaṃ ca nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā ketuṃ ca vinipātitama hatāśvasūtam utsṛjya rathaṃ sa patitadhvajamc visphārayan dhanuḥ karṇas tasthau bhārata durmanāḥa tatrādbhutam apaśyāma rādheyasya parākramamc viratho rathināṃ śreṣṭho vārayām āsa yad ripuma virathaṃ taṃ rathaśreṣṭhaṃ dṛṣṭvādhirathim āhavec duryodhanas tato rājann abhyabhāṣata durmukhama eṣa durmukha rādheyo bhīmena virathīkṛtaḥc taṃ rathena naraśreṣṭhaṃ saṃpādaya mahārathama duryodhanavacaḥ śrutvā tato bhārata durmukhaḥc tvaramāṇo byayāt karṇaṃ bhīmaṃ cāvārayac charaiḥa durmukhaṃ prekṣya saṃgrāme sūtaputrapadānugamc vāyuputraḥ prahṛṣṭo bhūt sṛkkiṇī parilelihana tataḥ karṇaṃ mahārāja vārayitvā śilīmukhaiḥc durmukhāya rathaṃ śīghraṃ preṣayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥa tasmin kṣaṇe mahārāja navabhir nataparvabhiḥc supuṅkhair durmukhaṃ bhīmaḥ śarair ninye yamakṣayama tatas tam evādhirathiḥ syandanaṃ durmukhe hatec āsthitaḥ prababhau rājan dīpyamāna ivāṃśumāna śayānaṃ bhinnamarmāṇaṃ durmukhaṃ śoṇitokṣitamc dṛṣṭvā karṇo śrupūrṇākṣo muhūrtaṃ nābhyavartataa taṃ gatāsum atikramya kṛtvā karṇaḥ pradakṣiṇamc dīrgham uṣṇaṃ śvasan vīro na kiṃ cit pratyapadyataa tasmiṃs tu vivare rājan nārācān gārdhravāsasaḥc prāhiṇot sūtaputrāya bhīmasenaś caturdaśaa te tasya kavacaṃ bhittvā svarṇapuṅkhā mahaujasaḥc hemacitrā mahārāja dyotayanto diśo daśaa apiban sūtaputrasya śoṇitaṃ raktabhojanāḥc kruddhā iva manuṣyendra bhujagāḥ kālacoditāḥa prasarpamāṇā medinyāṃ te vyarocanta mārgaṇāḥb te medinīṃ prasarpantaḥ śobhante rudhirokṣitāḥc ardhapraviṣṭāḥ saṃrabdhā bilānīva mahoragāḥa taṃ pratyavidhyad rādheyo jāmbūnadavibhūṣitaiḥc caturdaśabhir aty ugrair nārācair avicārayana te bhīmasenasya bhujaṃ savyaṃ nirbhidya patriṇaḥc prāviśan medinīṃ bhīmāḥ krauñcaṃ patrarathā ivaa te vyarocanta nārācāḥ praviśanto vasuṃdharāmc gacchaty astaṃ dinakare dīpyamānā ivāṃśavaḥa sa nirbhinno raṇe bhīmo nārācair marmabhedibhiḥc susrāva rudhiraṃ bhūri parvataḥ salilaṃ yathāa sa bhīmas tribhir āyastaḥ sūtaputraṃ patatribhiḥc suparṇavegair vivyādha sārathiṃ cāsya saptabhiḥa sa vihvalo mahārāja karṇo bhīmabalārditaḥc prādravaj javanair aśvai raṇaṃ hitvā mahāyaśāḥd tathā puruṣamānī san pratyapāyād raṇājirāta bhīmasenas tu visphārya cāpaṃ hemapariṣkṛtamc āhave tiratho tiṣṭhaj jvalann iva hutāśanaḥ dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa daivam eva paraṃ manye dhik pauruṣam anarthakamc yatrādhirathir āyasto nātarat pāṇḍavaṃ raṇea karṇaḥ pārthān sagovindāñ jetum utsahate raṇec na ca karṇasamaṃ yodhaṃ loke paśyāmi kaṃ canae iti duryodhanasyāham aśrauṣaṃ jalpato muhuḥa karṇo hi balavāñ śūro dṛḍhadhanvā jitaklamaḥc iti mām abravīt sūta mando duryodhanaḥ purāa vasuṣeṇasahāyaṃ māṃ nālaṃ devāpi saṃyugec kim u pāṇḍusutā rājan gatasattvā vicetasaḥa tatra taṃ nirjitaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhujaṃgam iva nirviṣamc yuddhāt karṇam apakrāntaṃ kiṃ svid duryodhano bravīta aho durmukham evaikaṃ yuddhānām aviśāradamc prāveśayad dhutavahaṃ pataṃgam iva mohitaḥd ko hi prāveśayen nūnaṃ muktvā taṃ mama putrakamd pataṃgam iva saṃdīptaṃ bhīmāgniṃ samaveśayata aśvatthāmā madrarājaḥ kṛpaḥ karṇaś ca saṃgatāḥc na śaktāḥ pramukhe sthātuṃ nūnaṃ bhīmasya saṃjayaa te pi cāsya mahāghoraṃ balaṃ nāgāyutopamamc jānanto vyavasāyaṃ ca krūraṃ mārutatejasaḥa kimarthaṃ krūrakarmāṇaṃ yamakālāntakopamamc balasaṃrambhavīryajñāḥ kopayiṣyanti saṃyugea karṇas tv eko mahābāhuḥ svabāhubalam āśritaḥc bhīmasenam anādṛtya raṇe yudhyata sūtajaḥa yo jayat samare karṇaṃ puraṃdara ivāsuramc na sa pāṇḍusuto jetuṃ śakyaḥ kena cid āhavea droṇaṃ yaḥ saṃpramathyaikaḥ praviṣṭo mama vāhinīmc bhīmo dhanaṃjayānveṣī kas tam archej jijīviṣuḥa ko hi saṃjaya bhīmasya sthātum utsahate grataḥc udyatāśanivajrasya mahendrasyeva dānavaḥa pretarājapuraṃ prāpya nivartetāpi mānavaḥc na bhīmasenaṃ saṃprāpya nivarteta kadā canaa pataṃgā iva vahniṃ te prāviśann alpacetasaḥc ye bhīmasenaṃ saṃkruddham abhyadhāvan vimohitāḥa yat tat sabhāyāṃ bhīmena mama putravadhāśrayamc śaptaṃ saṃrambhiṇogreṇa kurūṇāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ tadāa tan nūnam abhisaṃcintya dṛṣṭvā karṇaṃ ca nirjitamc duḥśāsanaḥ saha bhrātrā bhayād bhīmād upāramata yaś ca saṃjaya durbuddhir abravīt samitau muhuḥc karṇo duḥśāsano haṃ ca jeṣyāmo yudhi pāṇḍavāna sa nūnaṃ virathaṃ dṛṣṭvā karṇaṃ bhīmena nirjitamb sa nūnaṃ nirjitaṃ karṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmena saṃyugec pratyākhyānāc ca kṛṣṇasya bhṛśaṃ tapyati saṃjayaa dṛṣṭvā bhrātṝn hatān yuddhe bhīmasenena daṃśitānc ātmāparādhāt sumahan nūnaṃ tapyati putrakaḥa ko hi jīvitam anvicchan pratīpaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ vrajetc bhīmaṃ bhīmāyudhaṃ kruddhaṃ sākṣāt kālam iva sthitama vaḍavāmukhamadhyastho mucyetāpi hi mānavaḥc na bhīmamukhasaṃprāpto mucyeteti matir mamaa na pāṇḍavā na pāñcālā na ca keśavasātyakīc jānanti yudhi saṃrabdhā jīvitaṃ parirakṣitumd aho mama sutānāṃ hi vipannaṃ sūta jīvitam saṃjaya uvācaa yat saṃśocasi kauravya vartamāne janakṣayec tvam asya jagato mūlaṃ vināśasya na saṃśayaḥa svayaṃ vairaṃ mahat kṛtvā putrāṇāṃ vacane sthitaḥc ucyamāno na gṛhṇīṣe martyaḥ pathyam ivauṣadhama svayaṃ pītvā mahārāja kālakūṭaṃ sudurjaramc tasyedānīṃ phalaṃ kṛtsnam avāpnuhi narottamad prāpyedānīṃ phalaṃ tasya yathā pītvā viṣaṃ tathād sukṛtasya supṛṣṭasya sujātasya mahāmṛdhea yat tu kutsayase yodhān yudhyamānān yathābalamc atra te varṇayiṣyāmi yathā yuddham avartataa dṛṣṭvā karṇaṃ tu putrās te bhīmasenaparājitamc nāmṛṣyanta maheṣvāsāḥ sodaryāḥ pañca māriṣaa durmarṣaṇo duḥsahaś ca durmado durdharo jayaḥc pāṇḍavaṃ citrasaṃnāhās taṃ pratīpam upādravana te samantān mahābāhuṃ parivārya vṛkodaramc diśaḥ śaraiḥ samāvṛṇvañ śalabhānām iva vrajaiḥa āgacchatas tān sahasā kumārān devarūpiṇaḥc pratijagrāha samare bhīmaseno hasann ivaa tava dṛṣṭvā tu tanayān bhīmasenasamīpagānc abhyavartata rādheyo bhīmasenaṃ mahābalama visṛjan viśikhān rājan svarṇapuṅkhāñ śilāśitānc taṃ tu bhīmo bhyayāt tūrṇaṃ vāryamāṇaḥ sutais tavaa kuravas tu tataḥ karṇaṃ parivārya samantataḥc avākiran bhīmasenaṃ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥa tān bāṇaiḥ pañcaviṃśatyā sāśvān rājan nararṣabhānb bhīmasenas tato bāṇaiḥ pañca rājan sutāṃs tavac sasūtān bhīmadhanuṣo bhīmo ninye yamakṣayama prāpatan syandanebhyas te sārdhaṃ sūtair gatāsavaḥc citrapuṣpadharā bhagnā vāteneva mahādrumāḥa tatrādbhutam apaśyāma bhīmasenasya vikramamc saṃvāryādhirathiṃ bāṇair yaj jaghāna tavātmajāna sa vāryamāṇo bhīmena śitair bāṇaiḥ samantataḥc sūtaputro mahārāja bhīmasenam avaikṣataa taṃ bhīmasenaḥ saṃrambhāt krodhasaṃraktalocanaḥc visphārya sumahac cāpaṃ muhuḥ karṇam avaikṣata saṃjaya uvācaa tavātmajāṃs tu patitān dṛṣṭvā karṇaḥ pratāpavānc krodhena mahatāviṣṭo nirviṇṇo bhūt sa jīvitāta āgaskṛtam ivātmānaṃ mene cādhirathis tadāb yat pratyakṣaṃ tava sutā bhīmena nihatā raṇec bhīmasenaṃ tataḥ kruddhaḥ samādravata saṃbhramātd nicakhāna sa saṃbhrāntaḥ pūrvavairam anusmarana sa bhīmaṃ pañcabhir viddhvā rādheyaḥ prahasann ivac punar vivyādha saptatyā svarṇapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥa avahāsaṃ tu taṃ pārtho nāmṛṣyata vṛkodaraḥc tato vivyādha rādheyaṃ śatena nataparvaṇāma punaś ca viśikhais tīkṣṇair viddhvā pañcabhir āśugaiḥb raṇe bhūyo pi rādheyaṃ viddhvā pañcabhir āyasaiḥc dhanuś ciccheda bhallena sūtaputrasya māriṣaa athānyad dhanur ādāya karṇo bhārata durmanāḥc iṣubhiś chādayām āsa bhīmasenaṃ samantataḥa tasya bhīmo hayān hatvā vinihatya ca sārathimc prajahāsa mahāhāsaṃ kṛte pratikṛtaṃ punaḥa iṣubhiḥ kārmukaṃ cāsya cakarta puruṣarṣabhaḥc tat papāta mahārāja svarṇapṛṣṭhaṃ mahāsvanamd papātātha mahac cāpaṃ hemapṛṣṭhaṃ durāsadama avārohad rathāt tasmād atha karṇo mahārathaḥc gadāṃ gṛhītvā samare bhīmasenāya cākṣipata tām āpatantīṃ sahasā gadāṃ dṛṣṭvā vṛkodaraḥc śarair avārayad rājan sarvasainyasya paśyataḥa tato bāṇasahasrāṇi preṣayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥc sūtaputravadhākāṅkṣī tvaramāṇaḥ parākramīa tān iṣūn iṣubhiḥ karṇo vārayitvā mahāmṛdhec kavacaṃ bhīmasenasya pātayām āsa sāyakaiḥa athainaṃ pañcaviṃśatyā kṣudrakāṇāṃ samārpayatc paśyatāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ tad adbhutam ivābhavata tato bhīmo mahārāja navabhir nataparvaṇāmc raṇe preṣayata kruddhaḥ sūtaputrasya māriṣaa te tasya kavacaṃ bhittvā tathā bāhuṃ ca dakṣiṇamc abhyagur dharaṇīṃ tīkṣṇā valmīkam iva pannagāḥd sa chādyamāno bāṇaughair bhīmasenadhanuścyutaiḥd punar evābhavat karṇo bhīmasenāt parāṅmukhaḥa rādheyaṃ tu raṇe dṛṣṭvā padātinam avasthitamc bhīmasenena saṃrabdhaṃ rājā duryodhano bravīte tvaradhvaṃ sarvato yattā rādheyasya rathaṃ pratia tatas tava sutā rājañ śrutvā bhrātur vaco drutamc abhyayuḥ pāṇḍavaṃ yuddhe visṛjantaḥ śitāñ śarāna citropacitraś citrākṣaś cārucitraḥ śarāsanaḥc citrāyudhaś citravarmā samare citrayodhinaḥa āgacchatas tān sahasā bhīmo rājan mahārathaḥb tān āpatata evāśu bhīmaseno mahārathaḥc sāśvasūtadhvajān yattān pātayām āsa saṃyugee te hatā nyapatan bhūmau vātanunnā iva drumāḥa dṛṣṭvā vinihatān putrāṃs tava rājan mahārathānc aśrupūrṇamukhaḥ karṇaḥ kaśmalaṃ samapadyataa ratham anyaṃ samāsthāya vidhivat kalpitaṃ punaḥc abhyayāt pāṇḍavaṃ yuddhe tvaramāṇaḥ parākramīa tāv anyonyaṃ śarair viddhvā svarṇapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥc vyabhrājetāṃ mahārāja puṣpitāv iva kiṃśukaua ṣaṭtriṃśadbhis tato bhallair niśitais tigmatejanaiḥc vyadhamat kavacaṃ kruddhaḥ sūtaputrasya pāṇḍavaḥd sūtaputro pi kaunteyaṃ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥd pañcāśatā mahābāhur vivyādha bharatarṣabhaa raktacandanadigdhāṅgau śaraiḥ kṛtamahāvraṇauc śoṇitāktau vyarājetāṃ kālasūryāv ivoditaua tau śoṇitokṣitair gātraiḥ śaraiś chinnatanucchadauc vivarmāṇau vyarājetāṃ nirmuktāv iva pannagaud krodhāgnitejasā dīptau saṃrambhād raktalocanaud vyabhrājetāṃ mahārāja vidhūmāv iva pāvakaua vyāghrāv iva naravyāghrau daṃṣṭrābhir itaretaramc śaradaṃṣṭrā vidhunvānau tatakṣatur ariṃdamaud śaradhārāsṛjau vīrau meghāv iva vavarṣatuḥa vāraṇāv iva saṃsaktau raṅgamadhye virejatuḥc tudantau viśikhais tīkṣṇair mattavāraṇavikramaua pracchādayantau samare śarajālaiḥ parasparamc rathābhyāṃ nādayantau ca diśaḥ sarvā viceratuḥa tau rathābhyāṃ mahārāja maṇḍalāvartanādiṣuc vyarocetāṃ mahātmānau vṛtravajradharāv ivad vāraṇāv iva cānyonyaṃ viṣāṇābhyām ariṃdamaud nirbhindantau svagātrāṇi sāyakaiś cāru rejatuḥd nādayantau pravalgantau vikrīḍantau parasparamd maṇḍalāni vikurvāṇau rathābhyāṃ rathasattamaud vṛṣabhāv iva nardantau balinau vāsitāntared siṃhāv iva parākrāntau narasiṃhau
