bhīmaṃ sāyakavṛṣṭibhiḥa tatra bhārata bhīmasya balavīryaparākramamc vyavasāyaṃ ca putrās te praikṣanta kurubhiḥ sahaa tāṃ samudram ivoddhūtāṃ śaravṛṣṭiṃ samutthitāmc acintayitvā bhīmas tu kruddhaḥ karṇam upādravata rukmapṛṣṭhaṃ mahac cāpaṃ bhīmasyāsīd viśāṃ patec ākarṣān maṇḍalībhūtaṃ śakracāpam ivāparame tasmāc charāḥ prādurāsan pūrayanta ivāmbarama suvarṇapuṅkhair bhīmena sāyakair nataparvabhiḥc gagane racitā mālā kāñcanīva vyarājataa tato vyomni viṣaktāni śarajālāni bhāgaśaḥc āhatāni vyaśīryanta bhīmasenasya patribhiḥa karṇasya śarajālaughair bhīmasenasya cobhayoḥc agnisphuliṅgasaṃsparśair añjogatibhir āhavee tais taiḥ kanakapuṅkhānāṃ dyaur āsīt saṃvṛtā vrajaiḥf na sma sūryas tadābhāti na sma vāti samīraṇaḥf śarajālāvṛte vyomni na cājñāyata kiṃ canaa sa bhīmaṃ chādayan bāṇaiḥ sūtaputraḥ pṛthagvidhaiḥc upārohad anādṛtya tasya vīryaṃ mahātmanaḥa tayor visṛjatos tatra śarajālāni māriṣac vāyubhūtāny adṛśyanta saṃsaktānītaretaramd anyonyaśarasaṃsparśāt tayor manujasiṃhayoḥd ākāśe bharataśreṣṭha pāvakaḥ samajāyataa tasmai karṇaḥ śitān bāṇān karmāraparimārjitānc suvarṇavikṛtān kruddhaḥ prāhiṇod vadhakāṅkṣayāa tān antarikṣe viśikhais tridhaikaikam aśātayatc viśeṣayan sūtaputraṃ bhīmas tiṣṭheti cābravīta punaś cāsṛjad ugrāṇi śaravarṣāṇi pāṇḍavaḥc amarṣī balavān kruddho didhakṣann iva pāvakaḥd tataś caṭacaṭāśabdo godhāghātād abhūt tayoḥd talaśabdaś ca sumahān siṃhanādaś ca bhairavaḥd rathanemininādaś ca jyāśabdaś caiva dāruṇaḥd yodhā vyupāraman yuddhād didṛkṣantaḥ parākramamd karṇapāṇḍavayo rājan parasparavadhaiṣiṇoḥd devarṣisiddhagandharvāḥ sādhu sādhv ity apūjayand mumucuḥ puṣpavarṣaṃ ca vidyādharagaṇās tathād tato bhīmo mahābāhuḥ saṃrambhī dṛḍhavikramaḥd astrair astrāṇi saṃvārya śarair vivyādha sūtajamd karṇo pi bhīmasenasya nivāryeṣūn mahābalaḥd prāhiṇon nava nārācān āśīviṣasamān raṇed tāvadbhir atha tān bhīmo vyomni ciccheda patribhiḥd nārācān sūtaputrasya tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravītd tato bhīmo mahābāhuḥ śaraṃ kruddhāntakopamamd mumocādhirather vīro yamadaṇḍam ivāparamd tam āpatantaṃ ciccheda rādheyaḥ prahasann ivad tribhiḥ śaraiḥ śaraṃ rājan pāṇḍavasya pratāpavānd punaś cāsṛjad ugrāṇi śaravarṣāṇi pāṇḍavaḥa tasya tāny ādade karṇaḥ sarvāṇy astrāṇy abhītavatc yudhyataḥ pāṇḍuputrasya sūtaputro stramāyayāa tasyeṣudhī dhanurjyāṃ ca bāṇaiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥc raśmīn yoktrāṇi cāśvānāṃ karṇo vaikartano cchinata athāsyāśvān punar hatvā tribhir vivyādha sārathimc so vaplutya drutaṃ sūto yuyudhānarathaṃ yayaua utsmayann iva bhīmasya kruddhaḥ kālānalaprabhaḥc dhvajaṃ ciccheda rādheyaḥ patākāś ca nyapātayata sa vidhanvā mahārāja rathaśaktiṃ parāmṛśatc tām avāsṛjad āvidhya kruddhaḥ karṇarathaṃ pratia tām ādhirathir āyastaḥ śaktiṃ hemapariṣkṛtāmc āpatantīṃ maholkābhāṃ ciccheda daśabhiḥ śaraiḥa sāpatad daśadhā rājan nikṛttā karṇasāyakaiḥc asyataḥ sūtaputrasya mitrārthe citrayodhinaḥa sa carmādatta kaunteyo jātarūpapariṣkṛtamc khaḍgaṃ cānyataraprepsur mṛtyor agre jayasya vāe tad asya sahasā karṇo vyadhamat prahasann ivaf śarair bahubhir atyugraiḥ prahasann iva bhārataa sa vicarmā mahārāja virathaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥc asiṃ prāsṛjad āvidhya tvaran karṇarathaṃ pratia sa dhanuḥ sūtaputrasya chittvā jyāṃ ca susaṃśitaḥc apatad bhuvi nistriṃśaś cyutaḥ sarpa ivāmbarāta tataḥ prahasyādhirathir anyad ādatta kārmukamc śatrughnaṃ samare kruddho dṛḍhajyaṃ vegavattaramd vyāyacchat sa śarān karṇaḥ kuntīputrajighāṃsayād sahasraśo mahārāja rukmapuṅkhān sutejanāna sa bhīmasenaḥ kupito balavān satyavikramaḥb sa vadhyamāno balavān karṇacāpacyutaiḥ śaraiḥc vihāyasaṃ prākramad vai karṇasya vyathayan manaḥa tasya tac caritaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃgrāme vijayaiṣiṇaḥc layam āsthāya rādheyo bhīmasenam avañcayata tam adṛṣṭvā rathopasthe nilīnaṃ vyathitendriyamc dhvajam asya samāsādya tasthau sa dharaṇītalea tad asya kuravaḥ sarve cāraṇāś cābhyapūjayanc yad iyeṣa rathāt karṇaṃ hantuṃ tārkṣya ivoragama sa chinnadhanvā virathaḥ svadharmam anupālayanc svarathaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā yuddhāyaiva vyavasthitaḥa tad vihatyāsya rādheyas tata enaṃ samabhyayātc saṃrabdhaḥ pāṇḍavaṃ saṃkhye yuddhāya samupasthitama tau sametau mahāraṅge spardhamānau mahābalauc jīmūtāv iva gharmānte garjamānau nabhastalea tayor āsīt saṃprahāraḥ kruddhayor narasiṃhayoḥc amṛṣyamāṇayoḥ saṃkhye devadānavayor ivaa kṣīṇaśastras tu kaunteyaḥ karṇena samabhidrutaḥb śarair bhīmam atikramya karṇo bhṛśam apīḍayatb vidhanvā virathaś caiva vicarmā nirasis tataḥb amṛṣyamāṇaś ca bhṛśaṃ śāntaḥ karṇāstrapīḍitaḥc dṛṣṭvārjunahatān nāgān patitān parvatopamāne rathamārgavighātārthaṃ vyāyudhaḥ praviveśa haa hastināṃ vrajam āsādya rathadurgaṃ praviśya cac pāṇḍavo jīvitākāṅkṣī rādheyaṃ nābhyahārayata vyavasthānam athākāṅkṣan dhanaṃjayaśarair hatamc udyamya kuñjaraṃ pārthas tasthau parapuraṃjayaḥd mahauṣadhisamāyuktaṃ hanūmān iva parvatama tam asya viśikhaiḥ karṇo vyadhamat kuñjaraṃ punaḥb rathāyutāni cikṣepa hayānām ayutāni cab narāyutāni ca tathā karṇāyāmitatejaseb śaktyṛṣṭiprāsaparighakampanākuṭamudgarānb cikṣepa karṇāya balī gṛhītvā medinītalātb tān kṣiptān bhīmabalavad vāyunā samudīrayanb raṇāṅgaṇābhyāsagataś cicchedāśu vṛṣas tadāb mahāgraha ivāviṣṭo nirviṣaṇṇo vṛkodaraḥb abhyadhāvata rādheyaṃ mūrtimān anilaḥ svayamc hastyaṅgāny atha karṇāya prāhiṇot pāṇḍavo nadana cakrāṇy aśvāṃs tathā vāhān yad yat paśyati bhūtalec tat tad ādāya cikṣepa kruddhaḥ karṇāya pāṇḍavaḥa tad asya sarvaṃ ciccheda kṣiptaṃ kṣiptaṃ śitaiḥ śaraiḥb bhīmo pi muṣṭim udyamya vajragarbhaṃ sudāruṇamb hantum aicchat sūtaputraṃ saṃsmarann arjunaṃ kṣaṇātb śakto pi nāvadhīt karṇaṃ samarthaḥ pāṇḍunandanaḥb rakṣamāṇaḥ pratijñāṃ tāṃ yā kṛtā savyasācināb tam evaṃ vyākulaṃ bhīmaṃ bhūyo bhūyaḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥb mūrcchayābhiparītāṅgam akarot sūtanandanaḥc vyāyudhaṃ nāvadhīc cainaṃ karṇaḥ kuntyā vacaḥ smarana dhanuṣo greṇa taṃ karṇas tv abhidrutya parāmṛśatb dhanuṣā spṛṣṭamātreṇa kruddhaḥ sarpa iva śvasanb ācchidya sa dhanus tasya karṇaṃ mūrdhany atāḍayatb tāḍito bhīmasenena krodhād āraktalocanaḥc utsmayann iva rādheyo bhīmasenam uvāca haa punaḥ punas tūbaraka mūḍha audariketi cac akṛtāstraka mā yotsīr bāla saṃgrāmakātaraa yatra bhojyaṃ bahuvidhaṃ bhakṣyaṃ peyaṃ ca pāṇḍavac tatra tvaṃ durmate yogyo na yuddheṣu kathaṃ canaa munir bhūtvātha vā bhīma phalān yad dhi sudurmatec vanāya vraja kaunteya na tvaṃ yuddhaviśāradaḥa phalamūlāśane yuktas tvaṃ tathātithibhojanec na tvāṃ śastrasamudyoge yogyaṃ manye vṛkodarad sūdaṃ tvām aham ājāne mātsyapreṣyakakārakama puṣpamūlaphalāhāro vrateṣu niyameṣu cac ucitas tvaṃ vane bhīma na tvaṃ yuddhaviśāradaḥa kva yuddhaṃ kva munitvaṃ ca vanaṃ gaccha vṛkodarac na tvaṃ yuddhocitas tāta vanavāsaratir bhavaa sūdān bhṛtyajanān dāsāṃs tvaṃ gṛhe tvarayan bhṛśamc yogyas tāḍayituṃ krodhād bhojanārthaṃ vṛkodarad saṃjayaḥd evaṃ taṃ virathaṃ dṛṣṭvā smṛtvā karṇo bravīd vacaḥa kaumāre yāni cāpy āsann apriyāṇi viśāṃ patec pūrvavṛttāni cāpy enaṃ rūkṣāṇy aśrāvayad bhṛśamd bhīmasena uvācad rādheya śṛṇu me vākyaṃ sūryaputra balādhikad loke tvatsadṛśo yodho na vidyeta kathaṃ canad yuṣmābhir yady ahaṃ mārgyas tadā kiṃ bahujalpitaiḥd atha tvayā na mārgyo haṃ tadā gacchāmi muñca māmd evaṃ taṃ virathīkṛtya uccaiḥ saṃtarjya pāṇḍavamd mudā paramayā yukto darśayan kṛṣṇapāṇḍavaua athainaṃ tatra saṃlīnam aspṛśad dhanuṣā punaḥc prahasaṃś ca punar vākyaṃ bhīmam āha vṛṣas tadāa yoddhavyam āviśānyatra na yoddhavyaṃ tu mādṛśaiḥc mādṛśair yudhyamānānām etac cānyac ca vidyatea gaccha vā yatra tau kṛṣṇau tau tvā rakṣiṣyato raṇec gṛhaṃ vā gaccha kaunteya kiṃ te yuddhena bālakad bhīma śabdārthasadbhāvī purāṇas tvaṃ hi me mataḥd mārutir mārutasutaḥ śastreṣv astreṣu cottamaḥd yajñaśāstrārthavidyāsu dharmapravacaneṣu cad nipuṇo si sadā bhīma na tvaṃ yuddhaviśāradad tam utsmayan kaṇṭhadeśe pāṇinā saṃspṛśan vṛṣaḥd chattravajrāṅkuśāṅkena mātur vākyam anusmarand karṇasya vacanaṃ śrutvā bhīmaseno tidāruṇamd uvāca karṇaṃ prahasan sarveṣāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ vacaḥd jitas tvam asakṛd duṣṭa katthase tvaṃ vṛthātmanād jayājayau mahendrasya loke dṛṣṭau purātanaiḥd mallayuddhaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ kuru duṣkulasaṃbhavad mahābalo mahābhogī kīcako nihato yathād tathā tvāṃ ghātayiṣyāmi paśyatsu sarvarājasud bhīmasya matam ājñāya karṇo buddhimatāṃ varaḥd virarāma raṇāt tasmāt paśyatāṃ sarvadhanvināmd bhīmo pi rathināṃ śreṣṭho dhanadāc chāpam āptavānd gataḥ padmāpahāreṇa praṇāmaṃ nākarot purād anena kāraṇenaiva karṇād bhayam avāptavānd karṇenāpi tadotsṛṣṭo mātur vacanakāriṇāa evaṃ taṃ virathaṃ kṛtvā karṇo rājan vyakatthatac pramukhe vṛṣṇisiṃhasya pārthasya ca mahātmanaḥd taṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu bhīmas tu kāṅkṣan bhīmaparākramaḥd na cākārṣīd drutaṃ smṛtvā hy arjunasya mahābalamd tasya kārmukam ārujya babhañjāśu parākramīd tato dṛṣṭvā mahārāja vāsudevo mahādyutiḥd saṃjayaḥd arjunārjuna paśyemaṃ bhīmaṃ karṇena bādhitamd evam uktas tadā pārthaḥ keśavena mahātmanād bhīmasenaṃ tathābhūtaṃ krodhasaṃraktalocanaḥd amarṣavaśam āpanno nirdahann iva cakṣuṣād karṇena virathīkṛtya tarjyamānaṃ vṛkodaramd dṛṣṭvārjuno bhṛśaṃ kruddhaḥ krodhasaṃraktalocanaḥa tato rājañ śilādhautāñ śarāñ śākhāmṛgadhvajaḥc prāhiṇot sūtaputrāya keśavena pracoditaḥa tataḥ pārthabhujotsṛṣṭāḥ śarāḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇāḥc gāṇḍīvaprabhavāḥ karṇaṃ haṃsāḥ krauñcam ivāviśana sa bhujaṃgair ivāyastair gāṇḍīvapreṣitaiḥ śaraiḥc bhīmasenād apāsedhat sūtaputraṃ dhanaṃjayaḥa sa chinnadhanvā bhīmena dhanaṃjayaśarāhataḥc karṇo bhīmād apāyāsīd rathena mahatā drutama bhīmo pi sātyaker vāhaṃ samāruhya nararṣabhaḥc anvayād bhrātaraṃ saṃkhye pāṇḍavaṃ savyasācinamd so vaplutya drutaṃ sūto yuyudhānarathaṃ yayaua tataḥ karṇaṃ samuddiśya tvaramāṇo dhanaṃjayaḥc nārācaṃ krodhatāmrākṣaḥ praiṣīn mṛtyum ivāntakaḥa sa garutmān ivākāśe prārthayan bhujagottamamc nārāco bhyapatat karṇaṃ tūrṇaṃ gāṇḍīvacoditaḥa tam antarikṣe nārācaṃ drauṇiś ciccheda patriṇāc dhanaṃjayabhayāt karṇam ujjihīrṣur mahārathaḥa tato drauṇiṃ catuḥṣaṣṭyā vivyādha kupito rjunaḥb taṃ parīpsan mahārāja satyajit pārtham abhyayātb śareṇaikena vivyātha taṃ rājānaṃ mahābalaḥb karṇe pārthena vikṣiptaṃ nārācaṃ drauṇir acchinatc śilīmukhair mahārāja mā gās tiṣṭheti cābravīta sa tu mattagajākīrṇam anīkaṃ rathasaṃkulamc tūrṇam abhyāviśad drauṇir dhanaṃjayaśarārditaḥa tataḥ suvarṇapṛṣṭhānāṃ dhanuṣāṃ kūjatāṃ raṇec śabdaṃ gāṇḍīvaghoṣeṇa kaunteyo bhyabhavad balīa dhanaṃjayas tathā yāntaṃ pṛṣṭhato drauṇim abhyayātc nātidīrgham ivādhvānaṃ śaraiḥ saṃtrāsayan balama vidārya dehān nārācair naravāraṇavājināmc kaṅkabarhiṇavāsobhir balaṃ vyadhamad arjunaḥa tad balaṃ bharataśreṣṭha savājidvipamānavamc pākaśāsanir āyastaḥ pārthaḥ saṃnijaghāna ha dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca dātavyam adya manye haṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ svakaṃ punaḥ na vigraho hi balinā śreyase syād yathātathā pādayoḥ praṇatenāpi bhuktvāpy ucchiṣṭam apy areḥ ato nyad vāpi kṛtvaiva jīvyaṃ loke nareṇa vai jīvataiva paro lokaḥ sādhyate caiva sarvathā ajīvatas tathaivāsīn na sukhaṃ na parā gatiḥ vināśe sarvathotpanne na bālo budhyate kriyām mithyābhimānadagdho hi na budhyeta kṛtākṛtea ahany ahani me dīptaṃ yaśaḥ patati saṃjayac hatā me bahavo yodhā manye kālasya paryayama dhanaṃjayas tu saṃkruddhaḥ praviṣṭo māmakaṃ balamc rakṣitaṃ droṇakarṇābhyām apraveśyaṃ surair apia tābhyām ūrjitavīryābhyām āpyāyitaparākramaḥc sahitaḥ kṛṣṇabhīmābhyāṃ śinīnām ṛṣabheṇa caa tadā prabhṛti mā śoko dahaty agnir ivāśayamc grastān hi pratipaśyāmi bhūmipālān sasaindhavāna apriyaṃ sumahat kṛtvā sindhurājaḥ kirīṭinaḥc cakṣurviṣayam āpannaḥ kathaṃ mucyeta jīvitaḥa anumānāc ca paśyāmi nāsti saṃjaya saindhavaḥb kruddhasya devarājasya śakrasyeva mahādyuteḥc yuddhaṃ tu tad yathā vṛttaṃ tan mamācakṣva pṛcchataḥa yac ca vikṣobhya mahatīṃ senāṃ saṃloḍya cāsakṛtc ekaḥ praviṣṭaḥ saṃkruddho nalinīm iva kuñjaraḥa tasya vṛṣṇipravīrasya brūhi yuddhaṃ yathātathamc dhanaṃjayārthe yat tasya kuśalo hy asi saṃjaya saṃjaya uvācaa tathā tu vaikartanapīḍitaṃ taṃbhīmaṃ prayāntaṃ puruṣapravīramc samīkṣya rājan naravīramadhyeśinipravīro nuyayau rathenaa nadan yathā vajradharas tapāntejvalan yathā jaladānte ca sūryaḥc nighnann amitrān dhanuṣā dṛḍhenasaṃkampayaṃs tava putrasya senāma taṃ yāntam aśvai rajataprakāśairāyodhane naravīraṃ carantamc nāśaknuvan vārayituṃ tvadīyāḥsarve rathā bhārata mādhavāgryama amarṣapūrṇas tv anivṛttayodhīśarāsanī kāñcanavarmadhārīc alambusaḥ sātyakiṃ mādhavāgryamavārayad rājavaro bhipatyaa tayor abhūd bhārata saṃprahārastathāgato naiva babhūva kaś citc praikṣanta evāhavaśobhinau tauyodhās tvadīyāś ca pare ca sarvea avidhyad enaṃ daśabhiḥ pṛṣatkairalambuso rājavaraḥ prasahyac anāgatān eva tu tān pṛṣatkāṃściccheda bāṇaiḥ śinipuṃgavo pia punaḥ sa bāṇais tribhir agnikalpairākarṇapūrṇair niśitaiḥ supuṅkhaiḥc vivyādha dehāvaraṇaṃ vidāryate sātyaker āviviśuḥ śarīrama taiḥ kāyam asyāgnyanilaprabhāvairvidārya bāṇair aparair jvaladbhiḥc ājaghnivāṃs tān rajataprakāśānaśvāṃś caturbhiś caturaḥ prasahyaa tathā tu tenābhihatas tarasvīnaptā śineś cakradharaprabhāvaḥc alambusasyottamavegavadbhirhayāṃś caturbhir nijaghāna bāṇaiḥa athāsya sūtasya śiro nikṛtyabhallena kālānalasaṃnibhenac sakuṇḍalaṃ pūrṇaśaśiprakāśaṃbhrājiṣṇu vaktraṃ nicakarta dehāta nihatya taṃ pārthivaputrapautraṃsaṃkhye madhūnām ṛṣabhaḥ pramāthīc tato nvayād arjunam eva vīraḥsainyāni rājaṃs tava saṃnivāryaa anvāgataṃ vṛṣṇivaraṃ samīkṣyatathārimadhye parivartamānamc ghnantaṃ kurūṇām iṣubhir balānipunaḥ punar vāyur ivābhrapūgāna tato vahan saindhavāḥ sādhu dāntāgokṣīrakundenduhimaprakāśāḥc suvarṇajālāvatatāḥ sadaśvāyato yataḥ kāmayate nṛsiṃhaḥa athātmajās te sahitābhipeturanye ca yodhās tvaritās tvadīyāḥc kṛtvā mukhaṃ bhārata yodhamukhyaṃduḥśāsanaṃ tvatsutam ājamīḍhaa te sarvataḥ saṃparivārya saṃkhyeśaineyam ājaghnur anīkasāhāḥc sa cāpi tān pravaraḥ sātvatānāṃnyavārayad bāṇajālena vīraḥa nivārya tāṃs tūrṇam amitraghātīnaptā śineḥ patribhir agnikalpaiḥc duḥśāsanasyāpi jaghāna vāhānudyamya bāṇāsanam ājamīḍhad tato rjuno harṣam avāpa saṃkhyed kṛṣṇaś ca dṛṣṭvā puruṣapravīram saṃjaya uvācaa tam udyataṃ mahābāhuṃ duḥśāsanarathaṃ pratic tvaritaṃ tvaraṇīyeṣu dhanaṃjayahitaiṣiṇama trigartānāṃ maheṣvāsāḥ suvarṇavikṛtadhvajāḥc senāsamudram āviṣṭam ānartaṃ paryavārayana athainaṃ rathavaṃśena sarvataḥ saṃnivārya tec avākirañ śaravrātaiḥ kruddhāḥ paramadhanvinaḥa ajayad rājaputrāṃs tān yatamānān mahāraṇec ekaḥ pañcāśataṃ śatrūn sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥa saṃprāpya bhāratīmadhyaṃ talaghoṣasamākulamc asiśaktigadāpūrṇam aplavaṃ salilaṃ yathād athainam anuvṛttās tu trigartāḥ sahitāḥ punaḥd tīvreṇa rathavaṃśena mahatā paryavārayand vikarṣanto timātrāṇi cāpāni bharatarṣabhaa tatrādbhutam apaśyāma śaineyacaritaṃ raṇec pratīcyāṃ diśi taṃ dṛṣṭvā prācyāṃ paśyāma lāghavāta udīcīṃ dakṣiṇāṃ prācīṃ pratīcīṃ prasṛtas tathāb nṛtyann iva jale śrānto yadā sthalam upeyivānb punar madhyagato vīra āhave yuddhadurmadaḥb ekaḥ paryacarad raṅge bahudhā sa mahārathaḥc nṛtyann ivācarac chūro yathā rathaśataṃ tathāa tad dṛṣṭvā caritaṃ tasya siṃhavikrāntagāminaḥc trigartāḥ saṃnyavartanta saṃtaptāḥ svajanaṃ pratid tāṃ ca senām atikramya trigartānāṃ nararṣabhaḥd ajayac chūrasenāṃś ca yatamānān mahāraṇed ekas tato mahābāhuḥ sahasrāñ śatrutāpanaḥd saṃnaddhānāṃ padātīnām avadhīt puruṣarṣabhaḥa tam anye śūrasenānāṃ śūrāḥ saṃkhye nyavārayanc niyacchantaḥ śaravrātair mattaṃ dvipam ivāṅkuśaiḥa tān nyavārayad āyastān muhūrtam iva sātyakiḥc tataḥ kaliṅgair yuyudhe so cintyabalavikramaḥa tāṃ ca senām atikramya kaliṅgānāṃ duratyayāmc atha pārthaṃ mahābāhur dhanaṃjayam upāsadatd tair vārito mahārāja satyakaḥ pratyavārayatd jaghāna subahūn yaudhāñ śataśo tha sahasraśaḥd te hatā nipatanti sma pramṛṣṭā dīrghabāhunād tataḥ prāyād asaṃbhrānto dadarśa ca dhanaṃjayama tarann iva jale śrānto yathā sthalam upeyivānc taṃ dṛṣṭvā puruṣavyāghraṃ yuyudhānaḥ samāśvasata tam āyāntam abhiprekṣya keśavo rjunam abravītc asāv āyāti śaineyas tava pārtha padānugaḥa eṣa śiṣyaḥ sakhā caiva tava satyaparākramaḥc sarvān yodhāṃs tṛṇīkṛtya vijigye puruṣarṣabhaḥa eṣa kauravayodhānāṃ kṛtvā ghoram upadravamc tava prāṇaiḥ priyataraḥ kirīṭinn eti sātyakiḥa eṣa droṇaṃ tathā bhojaṃ kṛtavarmāṇam eva cac kadarthīkṛtya viśikhaiḥ phalgunābhyeti sātyakiḥa dharmarājapriyānveṣī hatvā yodhān varān varānc śūraś caiva kṛtāstraś ca phalgunābhyeti sātyakiḥa kṛtvā suduṣkaraṃ karma sainyamadhye mahābalaḥc tava darśanam anvicchan pāṇḍavābhyeti sātyakiḥa bahūn ekarathenājau yodhayitvā mahārathānc ācāryapramukhān pārtha āyāty eṣa hi sātyakiḥa svabāhubalam āśritya vidārya ca varūthinīmc preṣito dharmaputreṇa parthaiṣo bhyeti sātyakiḥd priyaśiṣyaś ca te pārtha tvayā tulyaparākramaḥd vidārya kauravīṃ senām eṣa āyāti satyakaḥa yasya nāsti samo yodhaḥ kauraveṣu kathaṃ canac so yam āyāti kaunteya sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥa kurusainyād vimukto vai siṃho madhyād gavām ivac nihatya bahulāḥ senāḥ pārthaiṣo bhyeti sātyakiḥa eṣa rājasahasrāṇāṃ vaktraiḥ paṅkajasaṃnibhaiḥc āstīrya vasudhāṃ pārtha kṣipram āyāti sātyakiḥa eṣa duryodhanaṃ jitvā bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaṃ raṇec nihatya jalasaṃdhaṃ ca kṣipram āyāti sātyakiḥa rudhiraughavatīṃ kṛtvā nadīṃ śoṇitakardamāmb rudhirasya nadīṃ kṛtvā rathebhanaravājināmc tṛṇavan nyasya kauravyān eṣa āyāti sātyakiḥd iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā keśavasyārjunas tadāa tato prahṛṣṭaḥ kaunteyaḥ keśavaṃ vākyam abravītc na me priyaṃ mahābāho yan mām abhyeti sātyakiḥa na hi jānāmi vṛttāntaṃ dharmarājasya keśavac sātvatena vihīnaḥ sa yadi jīvati vā na vāa etena hi mahābāho rakṣitavyaḥ sa pārthivaḥc tam eṣa katham utsṛjya mama kṛṣṇa padānugaḥa rājā droṇāya cotsṛṣṭaḥ saindhavaś cānipātitaḥc pratyudyātaś ca śaineyam eṣa bhūriśravā raṇea so yaṃ gurutaro bhāraḥ saindhavān me samāhitaḥc jñātavyaś ca hi me rājā rakṣitavyaś ca sātyakiḥa jayadrathaś ca hantavyo lambate ca divākaraḥc śrāntaś caiṣa mahābāhur alpaprāṇaś ca sāṃpratama pariśrāntā hayāś cāsya hayayantā ca mādhavac na ca bhūriśravāḥ śrāntaḥ sasahāyaś ca keśavad bhūriśravāḥ kṛtāstraś ca rakṣyo mādhava satyakaḥa apīdānīṃ bhaved asya kṣemam asmin samāgamec kaccin na sāgaraṃ tīrtvā sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥe goṣpadaṃ prāpya sīdeta mahaujāḥ śinipuṃgavaḥa api kauravamukhyena kṛtāstreṇa mahātmanāc sametya bhūriśravasā svastimān sātyakir bhaveta vyatikramam imaṃ manye dharmarājasya keśavac ācāryād bhayam utsṛjya yaḥ preṣayati sātyakima grahaṇaṃ dharmarājasya khagaḥ śyena ivāmiṣamc nityam āśaṃsate droṇaḥ kaccit syāt kuśalī nṛpaḥd āmiṣārthī yathā śyeno nityaṃ tiṣṭhati brāhmaṇaḥd grahaṇe dharmaputrasya kaś cit kṣemī bhaven nṛpaḥ saṃjaya uvācaa tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya sātvataṃ yuddhadurmadamc krodhād bhūriśravā rājan sahasā samupādravata tam abravīn mahābāhuḥ kauravyaḥ śinipuṃgavamc adya prāpto si diṣṭyā me cakṣurviṣayam ity utaa cirābhilaṣitaṃ kāmam adya prāpsyāmi saṃyugec na hi me mokṣyase jīvan yadi notsṛjase raṇama adya tvāṃ samare hatvā nityaṃ śūrābhimāninamc nandayiṣyāmi dāśārha kururājaṃ suyodhanama adya madbāṇanirdagdhaṃ patitaṃ dharaṇītalec drakṣyatas tvāṃ raṇe vīrau sahitau keśavārjunaua adya dharmasuto rājā śrutvā tvāṃ nihataṃ mayāc savrīḍo bhavitā sadyo yenāsīha praveśitaḥa adya me vikramaṃ pārtho vijñāsyati dhanaṃjayaḥc tvayi bhūmau vinihate śayāne rudhirokṣitea cirābhilaṣito hy adya tvayā saha samāgamaḥc purā devāsure yuddhe śakrasya balinā yathāa adya yuddhaṃ mahāghoraṃ tava dāsyāmi sātvatac tato jñāsyasi tattvena madvīryabalapauruṣama adya saṃyamanīṃ yātā mayā tvaṃ nihato raṇec yathā rāmānujenājau rāvaṇir lakṣmaṇena vaia adya kṛṣṇaś ca pārthaś ca dharmarājaś ca mādhavac hate tvayi nirutsāhā raṇaṃ tyakṣyanty asaṃśayama adya te pacitiṃ kṛtvā śitair mādhava sāyakaiḥc tatstriyo nandayiṣyāmi ye tvayā nihatā raṇea cakṣurviṣayasaṃprāpto na tvaṃ mādhava mokṣyasec siṃhasya viṣayaṃ prāpto yathā kṣudramṛgas tathāa yuyudhānas tu taṃ rājan pratyuvāca hasann ivac kauraveya na saṃtrāso vidyate mama saṃyuged nāhaṃ bhīṣayituṃ śakyo vāṅmātreṇa tu kevalama sa māṃ nihanyāt saṃgrāme yo māṃ kuryān nirāyudhamc samās tu śāśvatīr hanyād yo māṃ hanyād dhi saṃyugea kiṃ mṛṣoktena bahunā karmaṇā tu samācarac śāradasyeva meghasya garjitaṃ niṣphalaṃ hi tea śrutvaitad garjitaṃ vīra hāsyaṃ hi mama jāyatec cirakālepsitaṃ loke yuddham adyāstu kauravaa tvarate me matis tāta tvayi yuddhābhikāṅkṣiṇic nāhatvā saṃnivartiṣye tvām adya puruṣādhamaa anyonyaṃ tau tadā vāgbhis takṣantau narapuṃgavauc jighāṃsū paramakruddhāv abhijaghnatur āhavea sametau tau naravyāghrau śuṣmiṇau spardhinau raṇec dviradāv iva saṃkruddhau vāśitārthe madotkaṭaua bhūriśravāḥ sātyakiś ca vavarṣatur ariṃdamauc śaravarṣāṇi bhīmāni meghāv iva parasparamc tāv ubhau śaravarṣābhyām anyonyam abhivarṣatāmc bhūriśravāḥ sātyakiś caa saumadattis tu śaineyaṃ pracchādyeṣubhir āśugaiḥc jighāṃsur bharataśreṣṭha vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥa daśabhiḥ sātyakiṃ viddhvā saumadattir athāparānc mumoca niśitān bāṇāñ jighāṃsuḥ śinipuṃgavamc daśabhiḥ satyako vidhyat saumadattim athāśugaiḥc saumadattiḥ śarān asyaña tān asya viśikhāṃs tīkṣṇān antarikṣe viśāṃ patec aprāptān astramāyābhir agrasat sātyakiḥ prabhoa tau pṛthak śaravarṣābhyām avarṣetāṃ parasparamc uttamābhijanau vīrau kuruvṛṣṇiyaśaskaraua tau nakhair iva śārdūlau dantair iva mahādvipauc rathaśaktibhir anyonyaṃ viśikhaiś cāpy akṛntatāma nirbhidantau hi gātrāṇi vikṣarantau ca śoṇitamc vyaṣṭambhayetām anyonyaṃ prāṇadyūtābhidevinaua evam uttamakarmāṇau kuruvṛṣṇiyaśaskarauc parasparam ayudhyetāṃ vāraṇāv iva yūthapaua tāv adīrgheṇa kālena brahmalokapuraskṛtauc jigīṣantau paraṃ sthānam anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥa sātyakiḥ saumadattiś ca śaravṛṣṭyā parasparamc hṛṣṭavad dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ paśyatām abhyavarṣatāmd vṛṣṭiṃ tām abhivarṣantau śarāṇāṃ mahatīṃ tadāa saṃpraikṣanta janās tatra yudhyamānau yudhāṃ patīc yūthapau vāśitāhetoḥ prayuddhāv iva kuñjaraud bhūyo bhūyaḥ śarai rājaṃs takṣantau krodhamūrcchitaud ayudhyetāṃ mahāraṅge vane kesariṇāv ivad marmajñāv iva saṃkruddhau jighāṃsantau jagarjatuḥd vimardantāv athānyonyaṃ balavajradharāv ivad athānyonyaṃ patākāś ca rathopakaraṇāni cad saṃcicchedatur āyastau bāṇaiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥd punaś ca śaravarṣābhyām anyonyam abhivarṣatāmd ubhau ca jaghnatus tūrṇam itaretarasārathīa anyonyasya hayān hatvā dhanuṣī vinikṛtya cac virathāv asiyuddhāya sameyātāṃ mahāraṇea ārṣabhe carmaṇī citre pragṛhya vipule śubhec vikośau cāpy asī kṛtvā samare tau viceratuḥa carantau vividhān mārgān maṇḍalāni ca bhāgaśaḥc muhur ājaghnatuḥ kruddhāv anyonyam arimardanaua sakhaḍgau citravarmāṇau saniṣkāṅgadabhūṣaṇaub bhrāntam udbhrāntam lāghavaṃ sauṣṭhavaṃ tathāc raṇe raṇotkaṭau rājann anyonyaṃ paryakarṣatāma muhūrtam iva rājendra parikṛṣya parasparamc paśyatāṃ sarvasainyānāṃ vīrāv āśvasatāṃ punaḥa asibhyāṃ carmaṇī śubhre vipule ca śarāvarec nikṛtya puruṣavyāghrau bāhuyuddhaṃ pracakratuḥa vyūḍhoraskau dīrghabhujau niyuddhakuśalāv ubhauc bāhubhiḥ samasajjetām āyasaiḥ parighair ivaa tayor āsan bhujāghātā nigrahapragrahau tathāc śikṣābalasamudbhūtāḥ sarvayodhapraharṣaṇāḥa tayor nṛvarayo rājan samare yudhyamānayoḥc bhīmo bhavan mahāśabdo vajraparvatayor ivaa dvipāv iva viṣāṇāgraiḥ śṛṅgair iva maharṣabhaub bhujayoktrāvabandhaiś ca śirobhyāṃ cāvaghātanaiḥb pādāvakarṣasaṃdānais tomarāṃkuśalāsanaiḥb pādodaravibandhaiś ca bhūmāv udbhramaṇais tathāb gatapratyāgatākṣepaiḥ pātanotthānasaṃplutaiḥc yuyudhāte mahātmānau kurusātvatapuṃgavaud dvātriṃśat karaṇāni syur yāni yuddhāni bhāratad tāny adarśayatāṃ tatra yudhyamānau mahābalaua kṣīṇāyudhe sātvate yudhyamānetato bravīd arjunaṃ vāsudevaḥc paśyasvainaṃ virathaṃ yudhyamānaṃraṇe ketuṃ sarvadhanurdharāṇāmd saṃjaya uvācad sindhurājavadhe saktaṃ pārthaṃ kṛṣṇo bravīt punaḥd sīdantaṃ sātyakiṃ paśya pārthainaṃ parirakṣa caa praviṣṭo bhāratīṃ senāṃ tava pāṇḍava pṛṣṭhataḥc yodhitaś ca mahāvīryaiḥ sarvair bhārata bhārataiḥd dhārtarāṣṭrāś ca ye mukhyā ye ca mukhyā mahārathāḥd nihatā vṛṣṇivīreṇa śataśo tha sahasraśaḥa pariśrānto yudhāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ saṃprāpto bhūridakṣiṇamc yuddhakāṅkṣiṇam āyāntaṃ naitat samam ivārjunaa tato bhūriśravāḥ kruddhaḥ sātyakiṃ yuddhadurmadamc udyamya nyahanad rājan matto mattam iva dvipamd tato jaladanirghoṣaḥ samīpe nṛpasattamaa rathasthayor dvayor yuddhe kruddhayor yodhamukhyayoḥc keśavārjunayo rājan samare prekṣamāṇayoḥa atha kṛṣṇo mahābāhur arjunaṃ pratyabhāṣatab bahubhir yas tu senābhir durjayaḥ samare naghac paśya vṛṣṇyandhakavyāghraṃ saumadattivaśaṃ gatama pariśrāntaṃ gataṃ bhūmau kṛtvā karma suduṣkaramc tavāntevāsinaṃ śūraṃ pālayārjuna sātyakima na vaśaṃ yajñaśīlasya gacched eṣa varārihanc tvatkṛte puruṣavyāghra tad āśu kriyatāṃ vibhoa athābravīd dhṛṣṭamanā vāsudevaṃ dhanaṃjayaḥc paśya vṛṣṇipravīreṇa krīḍantaṃ kurupuṃgavame mahādvipeneva vane mattena hariyūthapamf saṃjaya uvācaf ity evaṃ vikarṣan bhūridakṣiṇaḥc vyarocata kuruśreṣṭhaḥ sātvatapravaraṃ yudhid arjuna uvācad mām eva ca mahābāho pariyānti mahārathāḥd yathāśakti yatante māṃ yodhayanto janārdanad dhruvaṃ ca yodhayāmy etāñ chidrānveṣaṇatatparānd rakṣāmi sātyakiṃ caiva saumadattiṃ vaśaṃ gatamd aprāpto na mayā kṛṣṇa hantuṃ bhūriśravā raṇed anyena tu samāsaktaṃ mano notsahate mamad avaśyaṃ ca mayā kṛṣṇa vṛṣṇivīrasya rakṣaṇamd madarthaṃ yudhyamānasya kāryaṃ prāṇair api prabhod adharmo vāstu dharmo vā mama mādhava mādhavaḥd saṃjaya uvācad pareṇa nihato mā sma prāṇān hāsīn mahārathaḥd evam uktvārjunaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ parān āśu śitaiḥ śaraiḥd chādayām āsa saṃkruddhaḥ pare cāpi dhanaṃjayamd evaṃ sma yudhyate vīraḥ sātyakiṃ ca muhur muhuḥd prekṣate sma naravyāghro bhūriśravasam eva caa atha kośād viniṣkṛṣya khaḍgaṃ bhūriśravā raṇec mūrdhajeṣu nijagrāha padā corasy atāḍayatd ākramya cāpy athodyamya sa sāsiṃ subhujo bhujamd śuśubhe sa bhujas tasya tapanīyavibhūṣitaḥd madhye rathasamūhasya indradhvaja ivocchritaḥd tato sya chettum ārabdhaḥ śiraḥ kāyāt sakuṃḍalamd tāvat kṣaṇāt sātvato pi śiraḥ saṃbhramayaṃs tvarand yathā rathāṃgaṃ kaulālo daṇḍaviddhaṃ tu bhāratad sahaiva bhūriśravaso bāhunā keśadhāriṇād grastaṃ tam atibhīmena pañcāsyeneva bhoginād hāhākṛtam abhūt sarvaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahad balamd tāvakāś ca mudā yuktāḥ siṃhanādaṃ vicukruśuḥd nimīlitākṣās tv abhavañ janāḥ saṃgrāmabhīravaḥd tathā bhūriśravogras te sātvate naṣṭavikramea tathā tu parikṛṣyantaṃ dṛṣṭvā sātvatam āhavec vāsudevas tato rājan bhūyo rjunam abhāṣataa paśya vṛṣṇyandhakavyāghraṃ saumadattivaśaṃ gatamc tava śiṣyaṃ mahābāho dhanuṣy anavaraṃ tvayāa asatyo vikramaḥ pārtha yatra bhūriśravā raṇec viśeṣayati vārṣṇeyaṃ sātyakiṃ satyavikramamd bahubhir mahārathair eṣa parākrāntair yuyutsubhiḥd yuddhvā bhṛśaṃ pariśrāntaḥ kṣīṇāyudhaparicchadaḥa evam ukto mahābāhur vāsudevena pāṇḍavaḥc manasā pūjayām āsa bhūriśravasam āhavea vikarṣan sātvataśreṣṭhaṃ krīḍamāna ivāhavec saṃharṣayati māṃ bhūyaḥ kurūṇāṃ kīrtivardhanaḥa pravaraṃ vṛṣṇivīrāṇāṃ yan na hanyād dhi sātyakimc mahādvipam ivāraṇye mṛgendra iva karṣatia evaṃ tu manasā rājan pārthaḥ saṃpūjya kauravamb ayudhyatāribhir vīras taṃ sma saṃprekṣate muhuḥc vāsudevaṃ mahābāhur arjunaḥ pratyabhāṣataa saindhavāsaktadṛṣṭitvān nainaṃ paśyāmi mādhavac eṣa tv asukaraṃ karma yādavārthe karomy ahamd mama śiṣyo mamārthāya yudhyate mama śatrubhiḥd taṃ kṛṣṇa mokṣayiṣyāmi dāvāt siṃhaśiśuṃ yathāa ity uktvā vacanaṃ kurvan vāsudevasya pāṇḍavaḥb tataḥ kṣurapraṃ niśitaṃ gāṇḍīve samayojayatb pārthabāhuvisṛṣṭaḥ sa maholkeva nabhaścyutāc sakhaḍgaṃ yajñaśīlasya patriṇā bāhum acchinat saṃjaya uvācaa sa bāhur apatad bhūmau sakhaḍgaḥ saśubhāṅgadaḥb yantramukto mahendrasya dhvajo vṛttotsavo yathāc ādadhaj jīvalokasya duḥkham uttamam uttamaḥa prahariṣyan hṛto bāhur adṛśyena kirīṭināc vegenābhyapatad bhūmau pañcāsya iva pannagaḥa sa moghaṃ kṛtam ātmānaṃ dṛṣṭvā pārthena kauravaḥc utsṛjya sātyakiṃ krodhād garhayām āsa pāṇḍavamd sa vibāhur mahārāja ekapakṣa ivāṇḍajaḥd ekacakro ratho yadvad dharaṇīm āsthito nṛpaḥd uvāca pāṇḍavaṃ caiva sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥa nṛśaṃsaṃ bata kaunteya karmedaṃ kṛtavān asic apaśyato viṣaktasya yan me bāhum acicchidaḥc   vyāsaktasya ca sātvatec anāgaso nyamanasoa kiṃ nu vakṣyasi rājānaṃ dharmaputraṃ yudhiṣṭhiramc kiṃ kurvāṇo mayā saṃkhye hato bhūriśravā itia idam indreṇa te sākṣād upadiṣṭaṃ mahātmanāc astraṃ rudreṇa vā pārtha droṇenātha kṛpeṇa vāa nanu nāma svadharmajñas tvaṃ loke bhyadhikaḥ paraiḥc ayudhyamānasya kathaṃ raṇe prahṛtavān asia na pramattāya bhītāya virathāya prayācatec vyasane vartamānāya praharanti manasvinaḥa idaṃ tu nīcācaritam asatpuruṣasevitamc katham ācaritaṃ pārtha tvayā karma suduṣkarama āryeṇa sukaraṃ hy āhur āryakarma dhanaṃjayac anāryakarma tv āryeṇa suduṣkarataraṃ bhuvia yeṣu yeṣu naraḥ pārtha yatra yatra ca vartatec āśu tacchīlatām eti tad idaṃ tvayi dṛśyatea kathaṃ hi rājavaṃśyas tvaṃ kauraveyo viśeṣataḥc kṣatradharmād apakrāntaḥ suvṛttaś caritavrataḥd alpas tavāparādho tra na tvāṃ tāta vigarhayed vārṣṇeyāpasadaṃ prāpya kṣudraṃ kṛtam idaṃ tvayāa idaṃ tu yad atikṣudraṃ vārṣṇeyārthe kṛtaṃ tvayāc vāsudevamataṃ nūnaṃ naitat tvayy upapadyatea ko hi nāma pramattāya pareṇa saha yudhyatec īdṛśaṃ vyasanaṃ dadyād yo na kṛṣṇasakho bhaveta vrātyāḥ saṃśliṣṭakarmāṇaḥ prakṛtyaiva vigarhitāḥc vṛṣṇyandhakāḥ kathaṃ pārtha pramāṇaṃ bhavatā kṛtāḥd saṃjaya uvācad evam ukto raṇe pārtho bhūriśravasam abravītd vyaktam eva hi jīrṇaḥ san buddhiṃ rañjayase nṛpad anarthakam idaṃ sarvaṃ yat tvayā vyāhṛtaṃ prabhod hṛṣīkeśena saṃbandhaṃ garhase māṃ ca mūḍhavatd raṇānām asi dharmajñaḥ sarvaśāstrārthapāragaḥd na cādharmam ahaṃ kuryāṃ jānaṃś caiva hi muhyased yudhyante kṣatriyāḥ śatrūn svaiḥ svaiḥ parivṛtā nṛpad bhrātṛbhiḥ pitṛbhiḥ putrais tathā saṃbandhibāndhavaiḥd vayasyair atha mitraiś ca svabāhubalam āśritāḥd ahaṃ hi sātyakiṃ śiṣyaṃ sukhasaṃbandhim eva cad madarthe yudhyamānaṃ ca tyaktvā prāṇān sudustyajānd mama bāhuṃ raṇe rājan dakṣiṇaṃ yuddhadurmadamd nikṛtyamānaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā kathaṃ śatruvaśaṃ gatamd tvayā nikṛṣyamāṇaṃ ca dṛṣṭavān asmi niṣkriyamd na cātmā rakṣitavyo hi eko raṇagatena hid yo yasya yudhyate rthāya sa saṃrakṣyo narādhipad tai rakṣyamāṇaḥ sa nṛpo rakṣitavyo mahāmṛdhed yady ahaṃ sātyakiṃ dṛṣṭvā tūṣṇīm āsiṣya āhaved tatas tena viyogaś ca prāpyaṃ narakam eva cad rakṣitaś ca mayā yasmāt tasmāl labdho mayā sa cad yaśaś caiva svapakṣebhyaḥ phalaṃ mitrasya rakṣaṇātd yac ca māṃ garhase rājann anyena saha saṃgatamd kas tena saṃgamaṃ necchet tatra te buddhivibhramaḥd kavacaṃ dhunvatas tubhyaṃ rathaṃ cārohataḥ svayamd dhanurjyāṃ karṣataś caiva yudhyataḥ saha śatrubhiḥd evaṃ rathagajākīrṇe hayapattisamākuled siṃhanādoddhatarave gambhīre sainyasāgared svaiś cāpi samupetasya vikrāntasya tathā raṇed satyakena kathaṃ yogyaḥ saṃgrāmas te bhaviṣyatid bahubhiḥ saha saṃgamya nirjitya ca mahārathānd śrāntaś ca śrāntavāhaś ca kṣīṇasarvāyudhas tvayād īdṛśaṃ sātyakiṃ saṃkhye nirjitya ca mahārathamd adhikaṃ tvaṃ vijānīṣe tathāpy anyamanā bhavānd yad icchasi śiraś cāsya asinā hartum āhaved tathā kṛcchragataṃ dṛṣṭvā sātyakiṃ kaḥ kṣamiṣyatid tvaṃ tu garhaya cātmānam ātmānaṃ yo na rakṣasid kathaṃ kariṣyase vīra yo vā tvāṃ saṃśrayej janaḥd āttaśastrasya hi raṇe vṛṣṇīputraṃ jighāṃsataḥd chinnavān yad ahaṃ bāhuṃ naital lokavigarhitamd nyastaśastrasya hi punar vikalasya vivarmaṇaḥd abhimanyor vadhaṃ tāta dhārmikaḥ ko nu pūjayeta evam uktvā mahābāhur yūpaketur mahāyaśāḥb dhanaṃjayena vīreṇa viniḥśvasya muhur muhuḥc yuyudhānaṃ parityajya raṇe prāyam upāviśata śarān āstīrya savyena pāṇinā puṇyalakṣaṇaḥc yiyāsur brahmalokāya prāṇān prāṇeṣv athājuhota sūrye cakṣuḥ samādhāya prasannaṃ salile manaḥc dhyāyan mahopaniṣadaṃ yogayukto bhavan muniḥa tataḥ sa sarvasenāyāṃ janaḥ kṛṣṇadhanaṃjayauc garhayām āsa taṃ cāpi śaśaṃsa puruṣarṣabhamd garhayām āsur apy etau śaśaṃsur bhūridakṣiṇama nindyamānau tathā kṛṣṇau nocatuḥ kiṃ cid apriyamc praśasyamānaś ca tathā nāhṛṣyad yūpaketanaḥa tāṃs tathā vādino rājan putrāṃs tava dhanaṃjayaḥc amṛṣyamāṇo manasā teṣāṃ tasya ca bhāṣitama asaṃkruddhamanā vācā smārayann iva bhāratac uvāca pāṇḍutanayaḥ sākṣepam iva phalgunaḥa mama sarve pi rājāno jānanty etan mahāvratamc na śakyo māmako hantuṃ yo me syād bāṇagocarea yūpaketo samīkṣya tvaṃ na māṃ garhitum arhasic na hi dharmam avijñāya yuktaṃ garhayituṃ parama āttaśastrasya hi raṇe vṛṣṇivīraṃ jighāṃsataḥc yad ahaṃ bāhum acchaitsaṃ na sa dharmo vigarhitaḥd acchinaṃ yad ahaṃ bāhuṃ tatra garhyaṃ kim asti caa nyastaśastrasya bālasya virathasya vivarmaṇaḥc abhimanyor vadhaṃ tāta dhārmikaḥ ko na pūjayetd nābhimanyor vadhaṃ yūyaṃ garhayadhvaṃ kutas tadād duryodhanasya kṣudrasya na pramāṇe ca tiṣṭhataḥd saumadatter ayaṃ sādhu sarvasāhāyyakāriṇaḥd asmadīyā mayā rakṣyāḥ prāṇabādha upasthited ye me pratyakṣato vīrā hanyerann iti me matiḥd satyakaś ca vaśaṃ nītaḥ kauraveṇa mahātmanād saṃjaya uvācad tato mayaitac caritaṃ pratijñārakṣaṇaṃ pratid punaś ca kṛpayāviṣṭo bahu tat tad vicintayand uvāca cainaṃ kauravyam arjunaḥ śokapīḍitaḥd dhig astu kṣatradharmaṃ tu yatra tvaṃ puruṣeśvaraḥd avasthām īdṛśīṃ prāptaḥ śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇapradaḥd nātibhāraḥ kṛtāntasya vidyate kurunandanad yatra tvaṃ puruṣavyāghraḥ prāptaḥ pāpām imāṃ tu vṛṣṇipravīrāṇāṃ sametyāntaṃ vrajen nṛpad śiner duhitṛsaṃbhūta eṣa vīraḥ sa sātyakiḥa etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yatra te saṃśayo vibhoc kururāja naraśreṣṭha tava hy apanayo mahān dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa codayāśvān bhṛśaṃ kṛṣṇa yato rājā jayadrathaḥb pratijñāṃ saphalāṃ cāpi kartum arhasi me naghab śrūyate puṇḍarīkākṣa triṣu dharmeṣu vartatec astam eti mahābāho tvaramāṇo divākaraḥa etad dhi puruṣavyāghra mahad abhyudyataṃ mayāc kāryaṃ saṃrakṣyate caiṣa kurusenāmahārathaiḥa nāstam eti yathā sūryo yathā satyaṃ bhaved vacaḥc codayāśvāṃs tathā kṛṣṇa yathā hanyāṃ jayadrathamd saṃjaya uvācad jayadrathavadhe prāpte tāv ubhau kurupāṇḍavaud sasmitau samudekṣetāṃ prauḍhā bālā vadhūr ivaa tataḥ kṛṣṇo mahābāhū rajatapratimān hayānc hayajñaś codayām āsa jayadratharathaṃ pratia taṃ prayāntam amogheṣum utpatadbhir ivāśugaiḥc tvaramāṇā mahārāja senāmukhyāḥ samāvrajana duryodhanaś ca karṇaś ca vṛṣaseno tha madrarāṭc aśvatthāmā kṛpaś caiva svayam eva ca saindhavaḥa samāsādya tu bībhatsuḥ saindhavaṃ pramukhe sthitamc netrābhyāṃ krodhadīptābhyāṃ saṃpraikṣan nirdahann ivaa tato duryodhano rājā rādheyaṃ tvarito bravītb amānuṣāṇi karmāṇi kurvantau puruṣarṣabhaub satyakaṃ bhīmasenaṃ ca yattau tau darśayann ivac arjunaṃ vīkṣya saṃyāntaṃ jayadratharathaṃ pratid uvāca rājan putras te karṇaṃ rājā suyodhanaḥa ayaṃ sa vaikartana yuddhakālovidarśayasvātmabalaṃ mahātmanc yathā na vadhyeta raṇe rjunenajayadrathaḥ karṇa tathā kuruṣvaa alpāvaśiṣṭaṃ divasaṃ nṛvīravighātayasvādya ripuṃ śaraughaiḥc dinakṣayaṃ prāpya narapravīradhruvaṃ hi naḥ karṇa jayo bhaviṣyatia saindhave rakṣyamāṇe tu sūryasyāstamayaṃ pratic mithyāpratijñaḥ kaunteyaḥ pravekṣyati hutāśanama anarjunāyāṃ ca bhuvi muhūrtam api mānadac jīvituṃ notsaheran vai bhrātaro sya sahānugāḥa vinaṣṭaiḥ pāṇḍaveyaiś ca saśailavanakānanāmc vasuṃdharām imāṃ karṇa bhokṣyāmo hatakaṇṭakāma daivenopahataḥ pārtho viparītaś ca mānadac kāryākāryam ajānan vai pratijñāṃ kṛtavān raṇea nūnam ātmavināśāya pāṇḍavena kirīṭināc pratijñeyaṃ kṛtā karṇa jayadrathavadhaṃ pratia kathaṃ jīvati durdharṣe tvayi rādheya phalgunaḥc anastaṃgata āditye hanyāt saindhavakaṃ nṛpama rakṣitaṃ madrarājena kṛpeṇa ca mahātmanāc jayadrathaṃ raṇamukhe kathaṃ hanyād dhanaṃjayaḥa drauṇinā rakṣyamāṇaṃ ca mayā duḥśāsanena cac kathaṃ prāpsyati bībhatsuḥ saindhavaṃ kālacoditaḥa yudhyante bahavaḥ śūrā lambate ca divākaraḥc śaṅke jayadrathaṃ pārtho naiva prāpsyati mānadaa sa tvaṃ karṇa mayā sārdhaṃ śūraiś cānyair mahārathaiḥb drauṇinā tvaṃ hi sahito madreśena kṛpeṇa cac yudhyasva yatnam āsthāya paraṃ pārthena saṃyugea evam uktas tu rādheyas tava putreṇa māriṣac duryodhanam idaṃ vākyaṃ pratyuvāca kurūttamama dṛḍhalakṣyeṇa śūreṇa bhīmasenena dhanvināc bhṛśam udvejitaḥ saṃkhye śarajālair anekaśaḥa sthātavyam iti tiṣṭhāmi raṇe saṃprati mānadac naivāṅgam iṅgati kiṃ cin me saṃtaptasya raṇeṣubhiḥa yotsyāmi tu tathā rājañ śaktyāhaṃ parayā raṇeb tad yathā prayatiṣye haṃ paraṃ śaktyā suyodhanac yathā pāṇḍavamukhyo sau na haniṣyati saindhavama na hi me yudhyamānasya sāyakāṃś cāsyataḥ śitānc saindhavaṃ prāpsyate vīraḥ savyasācī dhanaṃjayaḥa yat tu śaktimatā kāryaṃ satataṃ hitakāriṇāc tat kariṣyāmi kauravya jayo daive pratiṣṭhitaḥd saindhavārthe paraṃ yatnaṃ kariṣyāmy adya saṃyuged tvatpriyārthaṃ mahārāja jayo daive pratiṣṭhitaḥa adya yotsye rjunam ahaṃ pauruṣaṃ svaṃ vyapāśritaḥc tvadarthaṃ puruṣavyāghra jayo daive pratiṣṭhitaḥa adya yuddhaṃ kuruśreṣṭha mama pārthasya cobhayoḥc paśyantu sarvabhūtāni dāruṇaṃ lomaharṣaṇama karṇakauravayor evaṃ raṇe saṃbhāṣamāṇayoḥc arjuno niśitair bāṇair jaghāna tava vāhinīma ciccheda tīkṣṇāgramukhaiḥ śūrāṇām anivartināmc bhujān parighasaṃkāśān hastihastopamān raṇea śirāṃsi ca mahābāhuś ciccheda niśitaiḥ śaraiḥc hastihastān hayagrīvā rathākṣāṃś ca samantataḥa śoṇitāktān hayārohān gṛhītaprāsatomarānc kṣuraiś ciccheda bībhatsur dvidhaikaikaṃ tridhaiva caa hayavāraṇamukhyāś ca prāpatanta sahasraśaḥc dhvajāś chatrāṇi cāpāni cāmarāṇi śirāṃsi caa kakṣam agnim ivoddhūtaḥ pradahaṃs tava vāhinīmc acireṇa mahīṃ pārthaś cakāra rudhirottarāma hatabhūyiṣṭhayodhaṃ tat kṛtvā tava balaṃ balīc āsasāda durādharṣaḥ saindhavaṃ satyavikramaḥa bībhatsur bhīmasenena sātvatena ca rakṣitaḥc sa babhau bharataśreṣṭha jvalann iva hutāśanaḥa taṃ tathāvasthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā tvadīyā vīryasaṃmatāḥc nāmṛṣyanta maheṣvāsāḥ phalgunaṃ puruṣarṣabhāḥa duryodhanaś ca karṇaś ca vṛṣaseno tha madrarāṭc aśvatthāmā kṛpaś caiva svayam eva ca saindhavaḥa saṃrabdhāḥ saindhavasyārthe samāvṛṇvan kirīṭinamc nṛtyantaṃ rathamārgeṣu dhanurjyātalanisvanaiḥa saṃgrāmakovidaṃ pārthaṃ sarve yuddhaviśāradāḥc abhītāḥ paryavartanta vyāditāsyam ivāntakama saindhavaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā jighāṃsanto rjunācyutauc sūryāstamayam icchanto lohitāyati bhāskarea te bhujair bhogibhogābhair dhanūṃṣy āyamya sāyakānc mumucuḥ sūryaraśmyābhāñ śataśaḥ phalgunaṃ pratia tān astān asyamānāṃś ca kirīṭī yuddhadurmadaḥc dvidhā tridhāṣṭadhaikaikaṃ chittvā vivyādha tān raṇea siṃhalāṅgūlaketus tu darśayañ śaktim ātmanaḥc śāradvatīsuto rājann arjunaṃ pratyavārayata sa viddhvā daśabhiḥ pārthaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca saptabhiḥc atiṣṭhad rathamārgeṣu saindhavaṃ paripālayana athainaṃ kauravaśreṣṭhāḥ sarva eva mahārathāḥc mahatā rathavaṃśena sarvataḥ paryavārayana visphārayantaś cāpāni visṛjantaś ca sāyakānc saindhavaṃ paryarakṣanta śāsanāt tanayasya tea tatra pārthasya śūrasya bāhvor balam adṛśyatac iṣūṇām akṣayatvaṃ ca dhanuṣo gāṇḍivasya caa astrair astrāṇi saṃvārya drauṇeḥ śāradvatasya cac ekaikaṃ navabhir bāṇaiḥ sarvān eva samarpayata taṃ drauṇiḥ pañcaviṃśatyā vṛṣasenaś ca saptabhiḥc duryodhanaś ca viṃśatyā karṇaśalyau tribhis tribhiḥa ta enam abhigarjanto vidhyantaś ca punaḥ punaḥc vidhunvantaś ca cāpāni sarvataḥ paryavārayana śliṣṭaṃ tu sarvataś cakrū rathamaṇḍalam āśu tec sūryāstamayam icchantas tvaramāṇā mahārathāḥa ta enam abhinardanto vidhunvānā dhanūṃṣi cac siṣicur mārgaṇair ghorair giriṃ meghā ivāmbubhiḥa te mahāstrāṇi divyāni tatra rājan vyadarśayanc dhanaṃjayasya gātreṣu śūrāḥ parighabāhavaḥd nivārya tāñ śaravrātair divyāny astrāṇi darśayana hatabhūyiṣṭhayodhaṃ tat kṛtvā tava balaṃ balīc āsasāda durādharṣaḥ saindhavaṃ satyavikramaḥa taṃ karṇaḥ saṃyuge rājan pratyavārayad āśugaiḥc miṣato bhīmasenasya sātvatasya ca bhārataa taṃ pārtho daśabhir bāṇaiḥ pratyavidhyad raṇājirec sūtaputraṃ mahābāhuḥ sarvasainyasya paśyataḥa sātvataś ca tribhir bāṇaiḥ karṇaṃ vivyādha māriṣac bhīmasenas tribhiś caiva punaḥ pārthaś ca saptabhiḥa tān karṇaḥ prativivyādha ṣaṣṭyā ṣaṣṭyā mahārathaḥc tad yuddham abhavad rājan karṇasya bahubhiḥ sahaa tatrādbhutam apaśyāma sūtaputrasya māriṣac yad ekaḥ samare kruddhas trīn rathān paryavārayata phalgunas tu mahābāhuḥ karṇaṃ vaikartanaṃ raṇec sāyakānāṃ śatenaiva sarvamarmasv atāḍayata rudhirokṣitasarvāṅgaḥ sūtaputraḥ pratāpavānc śaraiḥ pañcāśatā vīraḥ phalgunaṃ pratyavidhyatae tasya tal lāghavaṃ dṛṣṭvā nāmṛṣyata raṇe rjunaḥa tataḥ pārtho dhanuś chittvā vivyādhainaṃ stanāntarec sāyakair navabhir vīras tvaramāṇo dhanaṃjayaḥa vadhārthaṃ cāsya samare sāyakaṃ sūryavarcasamc cikṣepa tvarayā yuktas tvarākāle dhanaṃjayaḥa tam āpatantaṃ vegena drauṇiś ciccheda sāyakamc ardhacandreṇa tīkṣṇena sa chinnaḥ prāpatad bhuvia athānyad dhanur ādāya sūtaputraḥ pratāpavānb sāyakair bahusāhasraiś chādayām āsa pāṇḍavamb tāṃ śastravṛṣṭim atulāṃ karṇacāpasamutthitāmb vyadhamat sāyakaiḥ pārthaḥ śalabhān iva mārutaḥb chādayām āsa ca tadā sāyakair arjuno raṇeb paśyatāṃ sarvayodhānāṃ darśayan pāṇilāghavamb   narasiṃho mahārathaḥb vavarṣa sāyakais tīkṣṇairc karṇo pi dviṣatāṃ hantā chādayām āsa phalguname sāyakair bahusāhasraiḥ kṛtapratikṛtepsayāa tau vṛṣāv iva nardantau narasiṃhau mahārathauc sāyakaughapraticchannaṃ cakratuḥ kham ajihmagaiḥe adṛśyau ca śaraughais tau nighnatām itaretarama pārtho ham asmi tiṣṭha tvaṃ karṇo haṃ tiṣṭha phalgunac ity evaṃ tarjayantau tau vākśalyais tudatāṃ tathāa yudhyetāṃ samare vīrau citraṃ laghu ca suṣṭhu cac prekṣaṇīyau cābhavatāṃ sarvayodhasamāgamea praśasyamānau samare siddhacāraṇavātikaiḥc ayudhyetāṃ mahārāja parasparavadhaiṣiṇaua tato duryodhano rājaṃs tāvakān abhyabhāṣatac yattā rakṣata rādheyaṃ nāhatvā samare rjuname nivartiṣyati rādheya iti mām uktavān vṛṣaḥa etasminn antare rājan dṛṣṭvā karṇasya vikramamc ākarṇamuktair iṣubhiḥ karṇasya caturo hayāne anayan mṛtyulokāya caturbhiḥ sāyakottamaiḥa sārathiṃ cāsya bhallena rathanīḍād apāharatc chādayām āsa ca śarais tava putrasya paśyataḥa sa chādyamānaḥ samare hatāśvo hatasārathiḥc mohitaḥ śarajālena kartavyaṃ nābhyapadyataa taṃ tathā virathaṃ dṛṣṭvā ratham āropya svaṃ tadāc aśvatthāmā mahārāja bhūyo rjunam ayodhayata madrarājas tu kaunteyam avidhyat triṃśatā śaraiḥb āvavre rjunamārgaṃ ca śarajālena bhāratac śāradvatas tu viṃśatyā vāsudevaṃ samārpayate dhanaṃjayaṃ dvādaśabhir ājaghāna śilīmukhaiḥa caturbhiḥ sindhurājaś ca vṛṣasenaś ca saptabhiḥc pṛthak pṛthaṅ mahārāja kṛṣṇapārthāv avidhyatāma tathaiva tān pratyavidhyat kuntīputro dhanaṃjayaḥc droṇaputraṃ catuḥṣaṣṭyā madrarājaṃ śatena caa saindhavaṃ daśabhir bhallair vṛṣasenaṃ tribhiḥ śaraiḥc śāradvataṃ ca viṃśatyā viddhvā pārthaḥ samunnadata te pratijñāpratīghātam icchantaḥ savyasācinaḥc sahitās tāvakās tūrṇam abhipetur dhanaṃjayama athārjunaḥ sarvatodhāram astraṃprāduścakre trāsayan dhārtarāṣṭrānc taṃ pratyudīyuḥ kuravaḥ pāṇḍusūnuṃrathair mahārhaiḥ śaravarṣāṇy avarṣana tatas tu tasmiṃs tumule samutthitesudāruṇe bhārata mohanīyec nāmuhyata prāpya sa rājaputraḥkirīṭamālī visṛjan pṛṣatkāna rājyaprepsuḥ savyasācī kurūṇāṃsmaran kleśān dvādaśavarṣavṛttānc gāṇḍīvamuktair iṣubhir mahātmāsarvā diśo vyāvṛṇod aprameyaiḥa pradīptolkam abhavac cāntarikṣaṃdeheṣu bhūrīṇy apatan vayāṃsic yat piṅgalajyena kirīṭamālīkruddho ripūn ājagavena hantia kirīṭamālī mahatā mahāyaśāḥśarāsanenāsya śarān anīkajitc hayapravekottamanāgadhūrgatānkurupravīrān iṣubhir nyapātayata gadāś ca gurvīḥ parighān ayasmayānasīṃś ca śaktīś ca raṇe narādhipāḥc mahānti śastrāṇi ca bhīmadarśanāḥpragṛhya pārthaṃ sahasābhidudruvuḥd tato yugāntābhrasamasvanaṃ mahand mahendracāpapratimaṃ sa gāṇḍivamd cakarṣa dorbhyāṃ vihasan bhṛśaṃ yayaud dahaṃs tvadīyān yamarāṣṭravardhanaḥa sa tān udīrṇān sarathāśvavāraṇānpadātisaṃghāṃś ca mahādhanurdharaḥc vipannasarvāyudhajīvitān raṇecakāra vīro yamarāṣṭravardhanān saṃjaya uvāca śrutvā ninādaṃ dhanuṣaś ca tasya vispaṣṭam utkṛṣṭam ivāntakasya śakrāśanisphoṭasamaṃ sughoraṃ vikṛṣyamāṇasya dhanaṃjayena trāsodvignaṃ bhayodbhrāntaṃ tvadīyaṃ tad balaṃ nṛpa yugāntavātasaṃkṣubdhaṃ caladvīcitaraṅgitam pralīnamīnamakaraṃ sāgarāmbha ivābhavata sa raṇe vyacarat pārthaḥ prekṣaṇīyo dhanaṃjayaḥc yugapad dikṣu sarvāsu citrāṇy astrāṇi darśayand ādadānaṃ mahārāja saṃdadhānaṃ ca pāṇḍavamd utkarṣantaṃ vikarṣantaṃ nābhyapaśyāma lāghavātd tataḥ kruddho mahābāhur aindram astraṃ durāsadamd prāduś cakre mahārāja trāsayan sarvabhāratānd tataḥ śarāḥ prādur āsan divyāstrapratimantritāḥd pradīptāś ca śikhimukhāḥ śataśo tha sahasraśaḥd ākarṇapūrṇanirmuktair agnyarkāṃśunibhaiḥ śaraiḥd nabho bhavat tad duṣprekṣyam ulkābhir iva saṃvṛtamd tataḥ śastrāndhakāraṃ tat kauravaiḥ samudīritamd aśakyaṃ manasāpy anyaiḥ pāṇḍavaḥ saṃbhramann ivad nāśayām āsa vikramya śarair divyāstramantritaiḥd naiśaṃ tamo ṃśubhiḥ kṣipraṃ dinādāv iva bhāskaraḥd tatas tu tāvakaṃ sainyaṃ dīptaiḥ śaragabhastibhiḥd ākṣipat palvalāmbūni nidāghārka iva prabhuḥd tato divyāstraviduṣā prahitāḥ sāyakāṃśavaḥd samāplavan dviṣatsainyaṃ lokaṃ bhānor ivāṃśavaḥd tathāpare samutsṛṣṭā viśikhās tigmatejasaḥd hṛdayāny āśu vīrāṇāṃ viviśuḥ priyabandhuvatd ya enam īyuḥ samare tvadyodhāḥ śūramāninaḥd śalabhā iva te dīptā agniṃ prāpya yayuḥ kṣayamd evaṃ sa mṛdnañ śatrūṇāṃ jīvitāni yaśāṃsi cad pārthaś cacāra saṃgrāme mṛtyur vigrahavān ivad sakirīṭāni vastrāṇi sāṅgadān vipulān bhujānd sakuṇḍalayugān karṇān keṣāṃ cid aharac charaiḥd satomarān gajasthānāṃ saprāsān hayasādināmd sacarmaṇaḥ padātīnāṃ rathināṃ ca sadhanvanaḥd sapratodān niyantṝṇāṃ bāhūṃś ciccheda pāṇḍavaḥd pradīptograśarārciṣmān babhau tatra dhanaṃjayaḥd savisphuliṅgāgraśikho jvalann iva hutāśanaḥd taṃ devarājapratimaṃ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varamd yugapad dikṣu sarvāsu rathasthaṃ puruṣarṣabhamd darśayantaṃ mahāstrāṇi prekṣaṇīyaṃ dhanaṃjayamd nṛtyantaṃ rathamārgeṣu dhanurjyātalanādinamd nirīkṣituṃ na śekus te yatnavanto pi pārthivāḥd madhyaṃdinagataṃ sūryaṃ pratapantam ivāmbared dīptograsaṃbhṛtaśaraḥ kirīṭī virarāja had varṣāsv ivodīrṇajalaḥ sendradhanvāmbudo mahānd mahāstrasaṃplave tasmiñ jiṣṇunā saṃpravartited sudustare mahāghore mamajjur yodhapuṃgavāḥd utkṛttavadanair dehaiḥ śarīraiḥ kṛttabāhubhiḥd bhujaiś ca pāṇinirmuktaiḥ pāṇibhir vyaṅgulīkṛtaiḥd kṛttāgrahastaiḥ karibhiḥ kṛttadantair madotkaṭaiḥd hayaiś chinnakhuragrīvai rathaiś ca śakalīkṛtaiḥd nikṛttāntraiḥ kṛttapādais tathānyaiḥ kṛttasaṃdhibhiḥd niśceṣṭair visphuradbhiś ca kūjadbhiś ca sahasraśaḥd mṛtyor āghātalalitaṃ tat pārthāyodhanaṃ mahatd apaśyāma mahīpāla bhīrūṇāṃ bhayavardhanamd ākrīḍam iva rudrasya purābhyardayataḥ paśūnd gajānāṃ kṣuranirmuktaiḥ karaiḥ sabhujageva bhūḥd kva cid babhau dṛṣṭvā vinihataṃ sindhurājaṃ jayadrathamb tato vinihate rājan sindhurāje kirīṭināb tamas tad vāsudevena saṃhṛtaṃ bharatarṣabhab paścāj jñātaṃ mahīpāla tava putraiḥ sahānugaiḥb vāsudevaprayukteyaṃ sarvathā samare yasya goptā nityaṃ janārdanaḥb kathaṃ tasya jayo na syād iti bhūtāni menireb etadarthaṃ śiras tasya cyāvayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥb syamantapañcakād bāhyaṃ śarair eva yathākramamb kṛtvā tac ca mahat karma nihatya ca jayadrathamb astraṃ pāśupataṃ pārthaḥ saṃhartum upacakrameb saṃharaty api kaunteye tad astraṃ tatra bhāratab vavau śītaḥ sugandhaś ca pavano hlādayann ivab saṃhāraṃ ca pramokṣaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā tatra divaukasaḥb vismayaṃ paramaṃ jagmuḥ praśaśaṃsuś ca pāṇḍavamb evam astreṇa tān vīro yodhayitvā dhanaṃjayaḥb jayadrathaśiraḥ paścāc cyāvayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥb tac chiraś cyāvamānaṃ tu dadṛśus tāvakā yudhib śalyakarṇakṛpā rājan mohitāḥ savyasācināb śirasi cyāvite tasya śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥb paścāt kāyo patad bhūmiṃ śocayan sarvapārthivānb dṛṣṭvā tu nihataṃ saṃkhe sindhurājaṃ mahārathamc putrāṇāṃ tava netrebhyo duḥkhād bahv apataj jalamd duḥkhād aśrūṇi mumucur nirāśāś cābhavañ jayed tato jayadrathe rājan hate pārthena keśavaḥd dadhmau śaṅkhaṃ mahābāhur arjunaś ca paraṃtapaḥd tasmiṃs tu nihate vīre saindhave lokaviśruted praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe kṛṣṇaḥ pārthaś ca bhārataa bhīmaseno pi saṃgrāme bodhayann iva pāṇḍavamc siṃhanādena mahatā pūrayām āsa rodasīd bhīmaś ca vṛṣṇisiṃhaś ca yudhāmanyuś ca bhāratad uttamaujāś ca vikrāntaḥ śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ pṛthak pṛthaka taṃ śrutvā tu mahānādaṃ dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥc saindhavaṃ nihataṃ mene phalgunena mahātmanāa tato vāditraghoṣeṇa svān yodhān abhiharṣayanc abhyavartata saṃgrāme bhāradvājaṃ yuyutsayād udapadyata sainyasya pāṇḍūnāṃ hṛṣṭacetasāma tataḥ pravavṛte rājann astaṃ gacchati bhāskarec droṇasya somakaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmo lomaharṣaṇaḥa te tu sarvaprayatnena bhāradvājaṃ jighāṃsavaḥc saindhave nihate rājann ayudhyanta mahārathāḥa pāṇḍavās tu jayaṃ labdhvā saindhavaṃ vinihatya cac ayodhayaṃs tato droṇaṃ jayonmattās tatas tataḥa arjuno pi raṇe yodhāṃs tāvakān rathasattamānc ayodhayan mahārāja hatvā saindhavakaṃ nṛpama sa devaśatrūn iva devarājaḥkirīṭamālī vyadhamat samantātc yathā tamāṃsy abhyuditas tamoghnaḥpūrvāṃ pratijñāṃ samavāpya vīraḥd vaiśaṃpāyana uvācad etat sucaritaṃ rājan yaḥ śṛṇotīha bhaktitaḥd apamṛtyuṃ jayaty āśu labhate sarvasaṃpadaḥ dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa tasmin vinihate vīre saindhave savyasācināc māmakā yad akurvanta tan mamācakṣva saṃjayad paśyatāṃ sarvayodhānāṃ māmakānāṃ mahāraṇed ahanyata kathaṃ yuddhe saindhavaḥ savyasācinād kathaṃ drauṇikṛpair guptaḥ karṇena ca mahāraṇed phalgunāgnimukhaṃ ghoraṃ praviṣṭaḥ sādhu saindhavaḥd tasmin hate maheṣvāse mandātmā sa suyodhanaḥd bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ sūta kim akārṣīd anantaram saṃjaya uvācaa saindhavaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā raṇe pārthena māriṣac amarṣavaśam āpannaḥ kṛpaḥ śāradvatas tadāa mahatā śaravarṣeṇa pāṇḍavaṃ samavākiratc drauṇiś cābhyadravat pārthaṃ ratham āsthāya phalgunama tāv enaṃ rathināṃ śreṣṭhau rathābhyāṃ rathasattamamc ubhāv ubhayatas tīkṣṇair viśikhair abhyavarṣatāma sa tathā śaravarṣābhyāṃ sumahadbhyāṃ mahābhujaḥc pīḍyamānaḥ parām ārtim agamad rathināṃ varaḥa so jighāṃsur guruṃ saṃkhye guros tanayam eva cac cakārācāryakaṃ tatra kuntīputro dhanaṃjayaḥa astrair astrāṇi saṃvārya drauṇeḥ śāradvatasya cac mandavegān iṣūṃs tābhyām ajighāṃsur avāsṛjata te nātibhṛśam abhyaghnan viśikhā jayacoditāḥc bahutvāt tu parām ārtiṃ śarāṇāṃ tāv agacchatāma atha śāradvato rājan kaunteyaśarapīḍitaḥc avāsīdad rathopasthe mūrcchām abhijagāma haa vihvalaṃ tam abhijñāya bhartāraṃ śarapīḍitamc hato yam iti ca jñātvā sārathis tam apāvahata tasmin sanne mahārāja kṛpe śāradvate yudhic aśvatthāmāpy apāyāsīt pāṇḍaveyād rathāntarama dṛṣṭvā śāradvataṃ pārtho mūrchitaṃ śarapīḍitamc ratha eva maheṣvāsaḥ kṛpaṇaṃ paryadevayatd aśrupūrṇamukho dīno vacanaṃ cedam abravīta paśyann idaṃ mahāprājñaḥ kṣattā rājānam uktavānc kulāntakaraṇe pāpe jātamātre suyodhanea nīyatāṃ paralokāya sādhv ayaṃ kulapāṃsanaḥc asmād dhi kurumukhyānāṃ mahad utpatsyate bhayama tad idaṃ samanuprāptaṃ vacanaṃ satyavādinaḥc tatkṛte hy adya paśyāmi śaratalpagataṃ kṛpama dhig astu kṣātram ācāraṃ dhig astu balapauruṣamc ko hi brāhmaṇam ācāryam abhidruhyeta mādṛśaḥa ṛṣiputro mamācāryo droṇasya dayitaḥ sakhāc eṣa śete rathopasthe madbāṇair abhipīḍitaḥa akāmayānena mayā viśikhair ardito bhṛśamc avāsīdad rathopasthe prāṇān pīḍayatīva mea śarārditena hi mayā prekṣaṇīyo mahādyutiḥb putraśokābhibhūtena śarair abhyarditena cac pratyasto bahubhir bāṇair daśadharmagatena vaia śocayaty eṣa nipatan bhūyaḥ putravadhād dhi māmc kṛpaṇaṃ svarathe sannaṃ paśya kṛṣṇa yathā gatama upākṛtya tu vai vidyām ācāryebhyo nararṣabhāḥc prayacchantīha ye kāmān devatvam upayānti tea ye tu vidyām upādāya gurubhyaḥ puruṣādhamāḥc ghnanti tān eva durvṛttās te vai nirayagāminaḥa tad idaṃ narakāyādya kṛtaṃ karma mayā dhruvamc ācāryaṃ śaravarṣeṇa rathe sādayatā kṛpama yat tat pūrvam upākurvann astraṃ mām abravīt kṛpaḥc na kathaṃ cana kauravya prahartavyaṃ gurāv itia tad idaṃ vacanaṃ sādhor ācāryasya mahātmanaḥc nānuṣṭhitaṃ tam evājau viśikhair abhivarṣatāa namas tasmai supūjyāya gautamāyāpalāyinec dhig astu mama vārṣṇeya yo hy asmai praharāmy ahama tathā vilapamāne tu savyasācini taṃ pratib tataḥ kirīṭinā rājan vihvale gautame kṛteb yathāgnir indhaneddho vai krodhendhanasamīritaḥc saindhavaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā rādheyaḥ samupādravatd saindhavasya mukhaṃ tyaktvā karṇaḥ sātvatam abhyayātd tam āpatantaṃ rādheyam arjunasya rathaṃ pratid pāñcālyau sātyakiś caiva sahasā samupādravana upāyāntaṃ tu rādheyaṃ dṛṣṭvā pārtho mahārathaḥc prahasan devakīputram idaṃ vacanam abravīta eṣa prayāty ādhirathiḥ sātyakeḥ syandanaṃ pratic na mṛṣyati hataṃ nūnaṃ bhūriśravasam āhavea yatra yāty eṣa tatra tvaṃ codayāśvāñ janārdanac mā somadatteḥ padavīṃ gamayet sātyakiṃ vṛṣaḥa evam ukto mahābāhuḥ keśavaḥ savyasācināc pratyuvāca mahātejāḥ kālayuktam idaṃ vacaḥa alam eṣa mahābāhuḥ karṇāyaiko hi pāṇḍavac kiṃ punar draupadeyābhyāṃ sahitaḥ sātvatarṣabhaḥa na ca tāvat kṣamaḥ pārtha karṇena tava saṃgaraḥc prajvalantī maholkeva tiṣṭhaty asya hi vāsavīe tvadarthaṃ pūjyamānaiṣā rakṣyate paravīrahanf na karṇaṃ prākṛtaṃ manye tena yuddhaṃ na rocayef karṇo hi balavān ekaḥ śakto smāñ jetum ojasāf na karṇaṃ hi vayaṃ śaktā jetuṃ sabalavāhanāḥf karṇasyaiṣa mahādoṣo yaj jīyeta pade padef pramādāc ca ghṛṇitvāc ca tena śakyatamo mataḥa ataḥ karṇaḥ prayātv atra sātvatasya yathā tathāc ahaṃ jñāsyāmi kauravya kālam asya durātmanaḥd yatrainaṃ viśikhais tīkṣṇaiḥ pātayiṣyati bhūtaled tadā gantāsi pārtha tvaṃ tena yoddhuṃ durātmanā dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa yo sau karṇena vīreṇa vārṣṇeyasya samāgamaḥb akāṅkṣitaś ca karṇena sa bhavatv atitejasaḥc hate tu bhūriśravasi saindhave ca nipātited saumadattiṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā tad yuddham abhavat kathama sātyakiś cāpi virathaḥ kaṃ samārūḍhavān rathamc cakrarakṣau ca pāñcālyau tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya saṃjaya uvācaa hanta te varṇayiṣyāmi yathāvṛttaṃ mahāraṇec śuśrūṣasva sthiro bhūtvā durācaritam ātmanaḥd paśyatāṃ sarvasainyānāṃ keśavārjunayor apia pūrvam eva hi kṛṣṇasya manogatam idaṃ prabhoc vijetavyo yathā vīraḥ sātyakir yūpaketunāa atītānāgataṃ rājan sa hi vetti janārdanaḥc ataḥ sūtaṃ samāhūya dārukaṃ saṃdideśa hae ratho me yujyatāṃ kālyam iti rājan mahābalaḥf dārukaḥ kṛṣṇasaṃdiṣṭaṃ rātrāv uktaṃ hṛdā vahana na hi devā na gandharvā na yakṣoragarākṣasāḥc mānavā vā vijetāraḥ kṛṣṇayoḥ santi ke canad ubhayoḥ senayoś caiva ye yaudhāḥ santi ke canaa pitāmahapurogāś ca devāḥ siddhāś ca taṃ viduḥc tayoḥ prabhāvam atulaṃ śṛṇu yuddhaṃ ca tad yathāa sātyakiṃ virathaṃ dṛṣṭvā karṇaṃ cābhyudyatāyudhamc dadhmau śaṅkhaṃ mahāvegam ārṣabheṇātha mādhavaḥa dāruko vetya saṃdeśaṃ śrutvā śaṅkhasya ca svanamc ratham anvānayat tasmai suparṇocchritaketanama sa keśavasyānumate rathaṃ dārukasaṃyutamc āruroha śineḥ pautro jvalanādityasaṃnibhama kāmagaiḥ sainyasugrīvameghapuṣpabalāhakaiḥc hayodagrair mahāvegair hemabhāṇḍavibhūṣitaiḥa yuktaṃ samāruhya ca taṃ vimānapratimaṃ rathamc abhyadravata rādheyaṃ pravapan sāyakān bahūna cakrarakṣāv api tadā yudhāmanyūttamaujasauc dhanaṃjayarathaṃ hitvā rādheyaṃ pratyudīyayuḥa rādheyo pi mahārāja śaravarṣaṃ samutsṛjanc abhyadravat susaṃkruddho raṇe śaineyam acyutama naiva daivaṃ na gāndharvaṃ nāsuroragarākṣasamc tādṛśaṃ bhuvi vā yuddhaṃ divi vā śrutam ity utaa upāramata tat sainyaṃ sarathāśvanaradvipamc tayor dṛṣṭvā mahārāja karma saṃmūḍhacetanama sarve ca samapaśyanta tad yuddham atimānuṣamc tayor nṛvarayo rājan sārathyaṃ dārukasya caa gatapratyāgatāvṛttair maṇḍalaiḥ saṃnivartanaiḥc sārathes tu rathasthasya kāśyapeyasya vismitāḥa nabhastalagatāś caiva devagandharvadānavāḥc atīvāvahitā draṣṭuṃ karṇaśaineyayo raṇama mitrārthe tau parākrāntau spardhinau śuṣmiṇau raṇec karṇaś cāmarasaṃkāśo yuyudhānaś ca sātyakiḥd karṇas tv amitavikrāntas tava priyahite rataḥa anyonyaṃ tau mahārāja śaravarṣair avarṣatāmc pramamātha śineḥ pautraṃ karṇaḥ sāyakavṛṣṭibhiḥa amṛṣyamāṇo nidhanaṃ kauravyajalasaṃdhayoḥb jalasaṃdhaṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā bhūriśravasam eva cac karṇaḥ śokasamāviṣṭo mahoraga iva śvasana sa śaineyaṃ raṇe kruddhaḥ pradahann iva cakṣuṣāc abhyadravata vegena punaḥ punar ariṃdamaḥd abhyardayan mahābāhuḥ sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥa taṃ tu saṃprekṣya saṃkruddhaṃ sātyakiḥ pratyavidhyatab śarair eva prajagrāha satyako vṛṣṇipuṃgavaḥb tatrāścaryaṃ tadā rājann akaroc chininandanaḥb karṇaṃ ca prativivyādha śarāṃs tatprahitāñ śitānb tatas tau spardhayā vīrāv ubhau yuddhaviśāradaub atakṣatām athānyonyaṃ ubhau vijayakāṅkṣiṇauc mahatā śaravarṣeṇa gajaḥ pratigajaṃ yathāa tau sametya naravyāghrau vyāghrāv iva tarasvinaub bāṇasaṃkulayuddhaiś ca spardhinau yuddhadurmadauc anyonyaṃ saṃtatakṣāte raṇe nupamavikramaua tataḥ karṇaṃ śineḥ pautraḥ sarvapāraśavaiḥ śaraiḥc bibheda sarvagātreṣu punaḥ punar ariṃdamaḥa sārathiṃ cāsya bhallena rathanīḍād apāharatc aśvāṃś ca caturaḥ śvetān nijaghne niśitaiḥ śaraiḥa chittvā dhvajaṃ śatenaiva śatadhā puruṣarṣabhaḥb dhvajaṃ ciccheda chattraṃ ca rathaṃ ca śatadhākarotc cakāra virathaṃ karṇaṃ tava putrasya paśyataḥa tato vimanaso rājaṃs tāvakāḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥc vṛṣasenaḥ karṇasutaḥ śalyo madrādhipas tathād kṛpaś ca madrarājaś ca vṛṣasenaś ca saṃyugea droṇaputraś ca śaineyaṃ sarvataḥ paryavārayanc tataḥ paryākulaṃ sarvaṃ na prājñāyata kiṃ canaa tathā sātyakinā vīre virathe sūtaje kṛteb tadā puruṣavīreṇa satyakena tathākṛtec hāhākāras tato rājan sarvasainyeṣu cābhavata karṇo pi vihvalo rājan sātvatenārditaḥ śaraiḥc duryodhanarathaṃ rājann āruroha viniḥśvasana mānayaṃs tava putrasya bālyāt prabhṛti sauhṛdamc kṛtāṃ rājyapradānena pratijñāṃ paripālayana tathā tu virathe karṇe putrān vai tava pārthivac duḥśāsanamukhāñ śūrān nāvadhīt sātyakir vaśīa rakṣan pratijñāṃ ca punar bhīmasenakṛtāṃ purāc virathān vihvalāṃś cakre na tu prāṇair vyayojayata bhīmasenena tu vadhaḥ putrāṇāṃ te pratiśrutaḥc punardyūte ca pārthena vadhaḥ karṇasya śaṃśrutaḥa vadhe tv akurvan yatnaṃ te tasya karṇamukhās tadāb vadhe yatnam athākārṣīt karṇas tava sutaiḥ sahac nāśaknuvaṃś ca taṃ hantuṃ sātyakiṃ pravarā rathāḥd satyakas tu sutāṃs te vai vyadhamal līlayā śaraiḥa drauṇiś ca kṛtavarmā ca tathaivānye mahārathāḥc nirjitā dhanuṣaikena śataśaḥ kṣatriyarṣabhāḥe kāṅkṣatā paralokaṃ ca dharmarājasya ca priyama kṛṣṇayoḥ sadṛśo vīrye sātyakiḥ śatrukarśanaḥb jitavān sarvasainyāni tāvakāni hasann ivac kṛṣṇo vāpi bhavel loke pārtho vāpi dhanurdharaḥe śaineyo vā naravyāghraś caturtho nopalabhyate dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa ajayyaṃ ratham āsthāya vāsudevasya sātyakiḥc virathaṃ kṛtavān karṇaṃ vāsudevasamo yuvād cakāra virathaṃ karṇaṃ tava sainyasya paśyataḥd pārthena sadṛśo yuddhe vāsudevasamo yuvād sarvakṣatriyavīrāṇāṃ kalpanāvidhikalpitama āyasaiḥ kāñcanaiś cāpi paṭṭair naddhaṃ sakūbaramc tārāsahasrakhacitaṃ siṃhadhvajapatākinama aśvair vātajavair yuktaṃ hemabhāṇḍaparicchadaiḥc pāṇḍurair indusaṃkāśaiḥ sarvaśabdātigair dṛḍhaiḥa citrakāñcanasaṃnāhair vājimukhyair viśāṃ patec ghaṇṭājālākularavaṃ śaktitomaravidyutama vṛtaṃ sāṃgrāmikair dravyair bahuśastraparicchadamc rathaṃ saṃpādayām āsa vegavattaraiḥa hemakakṣyādhvajopetaṃ kḷptayantrapatākinamc agryaṃ rathaṃ suyantāraṃ bahuśastraparicchadama upājahrus tam āsthāya karṇo py abhyadravad ripūnc etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasia bhūyaś cāpi nibodha tvaṃ tavāpanayajaṃ kṣayamc ekatriṃśat tava sutā bhīmasenena pātitāḥa durmukhaṃ pramukhe kṛtvā satataṃ citrayodhinamc śataśo nihatāḥ śūrāḥ sātvatenārjunena caa bhīṣmaṃ vai bhīmārjunau tatra sātyakiś cākarot tadā saṃjaya uvācaa viratho bhīmaseno vai karṇavākśalyapīḍitaḥc amarṣavaśam āpannaḥ phalgunaṃ vākyam abravīta punaḥ punas tūbaraka mūḍha audariketi cac akṛtāstraka mā yodhīr bāla saṃgrāmakātaraa iti mām abravīt karṇaḥ paśyatas te dhanaṃjayac evaṃ vaktā ca me vadhyas tena cokto smi bhārataa etad vrataṃ mahābāho tvayā saha kṛtaṃ mayāc yathaitan mama kaunteya tathā tava na saṃśayaḥa tadvadhāya naraśreṣṭha smaraitad vacanaṃ mamac yathā bhavati tat satyaṃ tathā kuru dhanaṃjayaa tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya bhīmasyāmitavikramaḥb vacanaṃ bhīmasenasya śrutvā tv amaravikramaḥc tato rjuno bravīt karṇaṃ kiṃ cid abhyetya saṃyugea karṇa karṇa vṛthādṛṣṭe sūtaputrātmasaṃstutac adharmabuddhe śṛṇu me yat tvā vakṣyāmi sāṃpratama dvividhaṃ karma śūrāṇāṃ palāyanaparāyaṇamd bhūyas tvam api saṃgamya sakṛd eva yadṛcchayād virathaṃ hatavān vīraṃ pāṇḍavaṃ sūtadāyadad kulasya sadṛśaṃ cāpi rādheya kṛtavān asid tvam idānīṃ naraśreṣṭha prastutaṃ nāvabudhyased naikāntasiddhiḥ saṃgrāme vāsavasyāpi vidyatea mumūrṣur yuyudhānena viratho si visarjitaḥb madvadhyas tvam iti jñātvā jitvā jīvan visarjitaḥc yadṛcchayā bhīmasenaṃ virathaṃ kṛtavān asid sa tvayā bhīmasenasya jayaḥ prāpto yadṛcchayāa adharmas tv eṣa rādheya yat tvaṃ bhīmam avocathāḥc yuddhadharmaṃ vijānan vai yudhyantam apalāyinamd kathaṃ cid virathaṃ kṛtvā yat tvaṃ rūkṣam abhāṣathāḥd adharmas tv eṣa sumahān anāryacaritaṃ ca tatd nāriṃ jitvātikatthante na ca jalpanti durvacaḥd na ca kaṃ cana nindanti santaḥ śūrā nararṣabhāḥd tvaṃ tu prākṛtavijñānas tat tad vadasi sūtajad bahvabaddham akarṇyaṃ ca cāpalād aparīkṣitame pūrayantaṃ yathāśakti śūrakarmāhave tathāf yudhyamānaṃ parākrāntaṃ śūram āryavrate ratamf yad avoco priyaṃ bhīmaṃ naitat satyaṃ vacas tavaa paśyatāṃ sarvasainyānāṃ
