teṣāṃ saṃgrāme ripusūdanac yātā mṛtyuvaśaṃ te vai yeṣāṃ kruddho si pāṇḍavaa rājyaṃ prāṇāḥ priyāḥ putrāḥ saukhyāni vividhāni cac acirāt tasya naśyanti yeṣāṃ kruddho si mānadaa vinaṣṭān kauravān manye saputrapaśubāndhavānb śrībhagavān uvācab evam etan mahābāho vinaṣṭāḥ kauravā mṛdhec rājadharmapare nityaṃ tvayi kruddhe yudhiṣṭhiraa tato bhīmo mahābāhuḥ sātyakiś ca mahārathaḥc abhivādya guruṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ mārgaṇaiḥ kṣatavikṣataue sthitāv āstāṃ maheṣvāsau pāñcālyaiḥ parivāritaua tau dṛṣṭva muditau vīrau prāñjalī cāgrataḥ sthitauc abhyanandata kaunteyas tāv ubhau bhīmasātyakīa diṣṭyā paśyāmi vāṃ vīrau vimuktau sainyasāgarātc droṇagrāhād durādharṣād dhārdikyamakarālayāte diṣṭyā ca nirjitāḥ saṃkhye pṛthivyāṃ sarvapārthivāḥa yuvāṃ vijayinau cāpi diṣṭyā paśyāmi saṃyugec diṣṭyā droṇo jitaḥ saṃkhye hārdikyaś ca mahābalaḥd diṣṭyā vikarṇibhiḥ karṇo raṇe nītaḥ parābhavamd vimukhaś ca kṛtaḥ śalyo yuvābhyāṃ puruṣarṣabhaud diṣṭyā yuvāṃ kuśalinau saṃgrāmāt punar āgataud paśyāmi rathināṃ śreṣṭhāv ubhau yuddhaviśāradaud mama vākyakarau vīrau mama gauravayantritaua sainyārṇavaṃ samuttīrṇau diṣṭyā paśyāmi cānaghauc samaraślāghinau vīrau samareṣv apalāyinaue mama prāṇasamau caiva diṣṭyā paśyāmi vām ahama ity uktvā pāṇḍavo rājā yuyudhānavṛkodarauc sasvaje puruṣavyāghrau harṣād bāṣpaṃ mumoca haa tataḥ pramuditaṃ sarvaṃ balam āsīd viśāṃ patec pāṇḍavānāṃ jayaṃ dṛṣṭvā yuddhāya ca mano dadhe saṃjaya uvācaa saindhave nihate rājan putras tava suyodhanaḥc aśruklinnamukho dīno nirutsāho dviṣajjayed durmanā niḥśvasann uṣṇo bhagnadaṃṣṭra ivoragaḥd āgaskṛt sarvalokasya putras te rtiṃ parām agātd dṛṣṭvā tat kadanaṃ ghoraṃ svabalasya kṛtaṃ mahatd jiṣṇunā bhīmasenena sātvatena ca saṃyuged sa vivarṇaḥ kṛśo dīno bāṣpaviplutalocanaḥe amanyatārjunasamo yodho bhuvi na vidyatea na droṇo na ca rādheyo nāśvatthāmā kṛpo na cac kruddhasya pramukhe sthātuṃ paryāptā iti māriṣaa nirjitya hi raṇe pārthaḥ sarvān mama mahārathānc avadhīt saindhavaṃ saṃkhye nainaṃ kaś cid avārayata sarvathā hatam evaitat kauravāṇāṃ mahad balamc na hy asya vidyate trātā sākṣād api puraṃdaraḥa yam upāśritya saṃgrāme kṛtaḥ śastrasamudyamaḥc sa karṇo nirjitaḥ saṃkhye hataś caiva jayadrathaḥa paruṣāṇi sabhāmadhye proktavān yaḥ sma pāṇḍavānb vadho yena pratijñātaḥ saṃyuge savyasācinaḥc sa karṇo nirjitaḥ saṃkhye saindhavaś ca nipātitaḥa yasya vīryaṃ samāśritya śamaṃ yācantam acyutamc tṛṇavat tam ahaṃ manye sa karṇo nirjito yudhia evaṃ klāntamanā rājann upāyād droṇam īkṣitumc āgaskṛt sarvalokasya putras te bharatarṣabhaa tatas tat sarvam ācakhyau kurūṇāṃ vaiśasaṃ mahatc parān vijayataś cāpi dhārtarāṣṭrān nimajjataḥ duryodhana uvācaa paśya mūrdhāvasiktānām ācārya kadanaṃ kṛtamc kṛtvā pramukhataḥ śūraṃ bhīṣmaṃ mama pitāmahama taṃ nihatya pralubdho yaṃ śikhaṇḍī pūrṇamānasaḥc pāñcālaiḥ sahitaḥ sarvaiḥ senāgram abhikarṣatia aparaś cāpi durdharṣaḥ śiṣyas te savyasācināc akṣauhiṇīḥ sapta hatvā hato rājā jayadrathaḥa asmadvijayakāmānāṃ suhṛdām upakāriṇāmc gantāsmi katham ānṛṇyaṃ gatānāṃ yamasādanama ye madarthaṃ parīpsanti vasudhāṃ vasudhādhipāḥc te hitvā vasudhaiśvaryaṃ vasudhām adhiśeratea so haṃ kāpuruṣaḥ kṛtvā mitrāṇāṃ kṣayam īdṛśamc nāśvamedhasahasreṇa pātum ātmānam utsahea mama lubdhasya pāpasya tathā dharmāpacāyinaḥc vyāyacchanto jigīṣantaḥ prāptā vaivasvatakṣayama kathaṃ patitavṛttasya pṛthivī suhṛdāṃ druhaḥc vivaraṃ nāśakad dātuṃ mama pārthivasaṃsadia so haṃ rudhirasiktāṅgaṃ rājñāṃ madhye pitāmahamc śayānaṃ nāśakaṃ trātuṃ bhīṣmam āyodhane hatama taṃ mām anāryapuruṣaṃ mitradruham adhārmikamc kiṃ sa vakṣyati durdharṣaḥ sametya paralokajita jalasaṃdhaṃ maheṣvāsaṃ paśya sātyakinā hatamc madartham udyataṃ śūraṃ prāṇāṃs tyaktvā mahārathama kāmbojaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā tathālambusam eva cac anyān bahūṃś ca suhṛdo jīvitārtho dya ko mamaa vyāyacchanto hatāḥ śūrā madarthe ye parāṅmukhāḥc yatamānāḥ paraṃ śaktyā vijetum ahitān mamaa teṣāṃ gatvāham ānṛṇyam adya śaktyā paraṃtapac tarpayiṣyāmi tān eva jalena yamunām anua satyaṃ te pratijānāmi sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varac iṣṭāpūrtena ca śape vīryeṇa ca sutair apia nihatya tān raṇe sarvān pāñcālān pāṇḍavaiḥ sahac śāntiṃ labdhāsmi teṣāṃ vā raṇe gantā salokatāma na hīdānīṃ sahāyā me parīpsanty anupaskṛtāḥc śreyo hi pāṇḍūn manyante na tathāsmān mahābhujaa svayaṃ hi mṛtyur vihitaḥ satyasaṃdhena saṃyugec bhavān upekṣāṃ kurute suśiṣyatvād dhanaṃjayea ato vinihatāḥ sarve ye smajjayacikīrṣavaḥc karṇam eva tu paśyāmi saṃpraty asmajjayaiṣiṇama yo hi mitram avijñāya yāthātathyena mandadhīḥc mitrārthe yojayaty enaṃ tasya so rtho vasīdatia tādṛgrūpam idaṃ kāryaṃ kṛtaṃ mama suhṛdbruvaiḥc mohāl lubdhasya pāpasya jihmācārais tatas tataḥa hato jayadrathaś caiva saumadattiś ca vīryavānc abhīṣāhāḥ śūrasenāḥ śibayo tha vasātayaḥa so ham adya gamiṣyāmi yatra te puruṣarṣabhāḥc hatā madarthaṃ saṃgrāme yudhyamānāḥ kirīṭināa na hi me jīvitenārthas tān ṛte puruṣarṣabhānc ācāryaḥ pāṇḍuputrāṇām anujānātu no bhavān dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa sindhurāje hate tāta samare savyasācināc tathaiva bhūriśravasi kim āsīd vo manas tadāa duryodhanena ca droṇas tathoktaḥ kurusaṃsadic kim uktavān paraṃ tasmāt tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya saṃjaya uvācaa niṣṭānako mahān āsīt sainyānāṃ tava bhāratac saindhavaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā bhūriśravasam eva caa mantritaṃ tava putrasya te sarvam avamenireb avamenire ca te sarve tava putrasya mantritamc yena mantreṇa nihatāḥ śataśaḥ kṣatriyarṣabhāḥa droṇas tu tad vacaḥ śrutvā putrasya tava durmanāḥc muhūrtam iva tu dhyātvā bhṛśam ārto bhyabhāṣataa duryodhana kim evaṃ māṃ vākśarair abhikṛntasic ajayyaṃ samare nityaṃ bruvāṇaṃ savyasācinama etenaivārjunaṃ jñātum alaṃ kaurava saṃyugec yac chikhaṇḍy avadhīd bhīṣmaṃ pālyamānaḥ kirīṭināa avadhyaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃyuge devamānuṣaiḥc tadaivājñāsiṣam ahaṃ neyam astīti bhāratīa yaṃ puṃsāṃ triṣu lokeṣu sarvaśūram amaṃsmahic tasmin vinihate śūre kiṃ śeṣaṃ paryupāsmahea yān sma tān glahate tātaḥ śakuniḥ kurusaṃsadic akṣān na te kṣā niśitā bāṇās te śatrutāpanāḥd akṣāṃs tu manyase bāṇāñ śobhamānāñ śitāñ śarāna ta ete ghnanti nas tāta viśikhā jayacoditāḥc yāṃs tadā khyāpyamānāṃs tvaṃ vidureṇa na budhyasea tās tā vilapataś cāpi vidurasya mahātmanaḥc dhīrasya vāco nāśrauṣīḥ kṣemāya vadataḥ śivāḥa tad idaṃ vartate ghoram āgataṃ vaiśasaṃ mahatc tasyāvamānād vākyasya duryodhana kṛte tavad yo vamanya vacaḥ pathyaṃ suhṛdām āptakāriṇāmd svamataṃ kurute mūḍhaḥ sa śocyo nacirād ivad neha vai paralokāya pāpam iccheta pārthivāḥa yac ca naḥ prekṣamāṇānāṃ kṛṣṇām ānāyayaḥ sabhāmc anarhatīṃ kule jātāṃ sarvadharmānucāriṇīma tasyādharmasya gāndhāre phalaṃ prāptam idaṃ tvayāc no cet pāpaṃ pare loke tvam arcchethās tato dhikama yac ca tān pāṇḍavān dyūte viṣameṇa vijitya hac prāvrājayas tadāraṇye rauravājinavāsasaḥa putrāṇām iva caiteṣāṃ dharmam ācaratāṃ sadāc druhyet ko nu naro loke mad anyo brāhmaṇabruvaḥd garbhādhānādiyuktaś ca tathopanayanena cad na karma kṛtavātaṃ nādhīte sa bhaved brāhmaṇabruvaḥa pāṇḍavānām ayaṃ kopas tvayā śakuninā sahac āhṛto dhṛtarāṣṭrasya saṃmate kurusaṃsadia duḥśāsanena saṃyuktaḥ karṇena parivardhitaḥc kṣattur vākyam anādṛtya tvayābhyastaḥ punaḥ punaḥd tad dhi naḥ krodhavṛkṣaś ca kṛtamūlo mahātmanāmd tasya puṣpaphale rājann upabhuṃkṣva mahābalaa yat tat sarve parābhūya paryavārayatārjunimc sindhurājānam āśritya sa vo madhye kathaṃ hataḥa kathaṃ tvayi ca karṇe ca kṛpe śalye ca jīvatic aśvatthāmni ca kauravya nidhanaṃ saindhavo gamata yad vas tat sarvarājānas tejas tigmam upāsatec sindhurājaṃ paritrātuṃ sa vo madhye kathaṃ hataḥa mayy eva hi viśeṣeṇa tathā duryodhana tvayic āśaṃsata paritrāṇam arjunāt sa mahīpatiḥa tatas tasmin paritrāṇam alabdhavati phalgunātc na kiṃ cid anupaśyāmi jīvitatrāṇam ātmanaḥa majjantam iva cātmānaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnasya kilbiṣec paśyāmy ahatvā pāñcālān saha tena śikhaṇḍināa tan mā kim abhitapyantaṃ vākśarair abhikṛntasic aśaktaḥ sindhurājasya bhūtvā trāṇāya bhārataa sauvarṇaṃ satyasaṃdhasya dhvajam akliṣṭakarmaṇaḥc apaśyan yudhi bhīṣmasya katham āśaṃsase jayama madhye mahārathānāṃ ca yatrāhanyata saindhavaḥc hato bhūriśravāś caiva kiṃ śeṣaṃ tatra manyasea kṛpa eva ca durdharṣo yadi jīvati pārthivac yo nāgāt sindhurājasya vartma taṃ pūjayāmy ahama yac cāpaśyaṃ hataṃ bhīṣmaṃ paśyatas te nujasya vaic duḥśāsanasya kauravya kurvāṇaṃ karma duṣkarame avadhyakalpaṃ saṃgrāme devair api savāsavaiḥa na te vasuṃdharāstīti tad ahaṃ cintaye nṛpac imāni pāṇḍavānāṃ ca sṛñjayānāṃ ca bhāratae anīkāny ādravante māṃ sahitāny adya māriṣaa nāhatvā sarvapāñcālān kavacasya vimokṣaṇamc kartāsmi samare karma dhārtarāṣṭra hitaṃ tavaa rājan brūyāḥ sutaṃ me tvam aśvatthāmānam āhavec na somakāḥ pramoktavyā jīvitaṃ parirakṣatāa yac ca pitrānuśiṣṭo si tad vacaḥ paripālayac ānṛśaṃsye dame satye ārjave ca sthiro bhavaa dharmārthakāmakuśalo dharmārthāv apy apīḍayanc dharmapradhānaḥ kāryāṇi kuryāś ceti punaḥ punaḥa cakṣurmanobhyāṃ saṃtoṣyā viprāḥ sevyāś ca śaktitaḥc na caiṣāṃ vipriyaṃ kāryaṃ te hi vahniśikhopamāḥa eṣa tv aham anīkāni praviśāmy arisūdanac raṇāya mahate rājaṃs tvayā vākśalyapīḍitaḥa tvaṃ ca duryodhana balaṃ yadi śaknoṣi dhārayac rātrāv api hi yotsyante saṃrabdhāḥ kurusṛñjayāḥa evam uktvā tataḥ prāyād droṇaḥ pāṇḍavasṛñjayānc muṣṇan kṣatriyatejāṃsi nakṣatrāṇām ivāṃśumānd dīrgham uṣṇaṃ viniḥśvasya kṣatriyāntakaro balī saṃjaya uvācaa tato duryodhano rājā droṇenaivaṃ pracoditaḥc amarṣavaśam āpanno yuddhāyaiva mano dadhea abravīc ca tadā karṇaṃ putro duryodhanas tavac paśya kṛṣṇasahāyena pāṇḍavena kirīṭināe ācāryavihitaṃ vyūhaṃ bhinnaṃ devaiḥ sudurbhidama tava vyāyacchamānasya droṇasya ca mahātmanaḥc miṣatāṃ yodhamukhyānāṃ saindhavo vinipātitaḥa paśya rādheya rājānaḥ pṛthivyāṃ pravarā yudhic pārthenaikena nihatāḥ siṃhenevetarā mṛgāḥa mama vyāyacchamānasya samare śatrusūdanac alpāvaśeṣaṃ sainyaṃ me kṛtaṃ śakrātmajena haa kathaṃ hy anicchamānasya droṇasya yudhi phalgunaḥc bhindyāt sudurbhidaṃ vyūhaṃ yatamāno pi saṃyuged pratijñāyā gataḥ pāraṃ hṛtvā saindhavam arjunaḥd paśya rādheya pṛthvīśān pṛthivyāṃ pātitān bahūnd pārthena nihatān saṃkhye mahendropamavikramānd anicchataḥ kathaṃ vīra droṇasya yudhi pāṇḍavaḥa priyo hi phalguno nityam ācāryasya mahātmanaḥc tato sya dattavān dvāraṃ nayuddhenārimardanaa abhayaṃ saindhavasyājau dattvā droṇaḥ paraṃtapaḥc prādāt kirīṭine dvāraṃ paśya nirguṇatāṃ mamaa yady adāsyam anujñāṃ vai pūrvam eva gṛhān pratic sindhurājasya samare nābhaviṣyaj janakṣayaḥa jayadratho jīvitārthī gacchamāno gṛhān pratic mayānāryeṇa saṃruddho droṇāt prāpyābhayaṃ raṇed trāsyāmi saindhavaṃ yuddhe nainaṃ prāpsyati phalgunaḥd mama sainyavināśāya ruddho vipreṇa saindhavaḥd tasya me mandabhāgasya yatamānasya saṃyuged hatāni sarvasainyāni hato rājā jayadrathaḥd paśya yodhavarān karṇa śataśo tha sahasraśaḥd pārthanāmāṅkitair bāṇaiḥ sarve nītā yamakṣayamd katham ekarathenājau bahūnāṃ naḥ prapaśyatāmd vipannaḥ saindhavo rājā yodhāś caiva sahasraśaḥa adya me bhrātaraḥ kṣīṇāś citrasenādayo yudhic bhīmasenaṃ samāsādya paśyatāṃ no durātmanām karṇa uvācaa ācāryaṃ mā vigarhasva śaktyā yudhyaty asau dvijaḥb yathābalaṃ yathotsāhaṃ tyaktvā jīvitam ātmanaḥb yady enaṃ samatikramya praviṣṭaḥ śvetavāhanaḥb nātra sūkṣmo pi doṣaḥ syād ācāryasya kathaṃ canab kṛtī dakṣo yuvā śūraḥ kṛtāstro laghuvikramaḥb divyāstrayuktam āsthāya rathaṃ vānaralakṣaṇamb kṛṣṇena ca gṛhītāśvam abhedyakavacāvṛtaḥb gāṇḍīvam ajaraṃ divyaṃ dhanur ādāya vīryavānb pravarṣan niśitān bāṇān bāhudraviṇadarpitaḥb yad arjuno bhyayād droṇam upapannaṃ hi tasya tatb ācāryaḥ sthaviro rājañ śīghrayāne tathākṣamaḥb bāhuvyāyāmaceṣṭāyām aśaktas tu narādhipab tenainam abhyatikrāntaḥ śvetāśvaḥ kṛṣṇasārathiḥb tasmād doṣaṃ na paśyāmi droṇasyānena hetunāc ajayyān pāṇḍavān manye droṇenāstravidā mṛdhea tathā hy enam atikramya praviṣṭaḥ śvetavāhanaḥc daivadṛṣṭo nyathābhāvo na manye vidyate kva cita tato no yudhyamānānāṃ paraṃ śaktyā suyodhanac saindhavo nihato rājan daivam atra paraṃ smṛtama paraṃ yatnaṃ kurvatāṃ ca tvayā sārdhaṃ raṇājirec hatvāsmākaṃ pauruṣaṃ hi daivaṃ paścāt karoti naḥe satataṃ ceṣṭamānānāṃ nikṛtyā vikrameṇa caf na sidhyati mahārāja daivam atra paraṃ smṛtamf nihatya yatnaṃ cāsmākaṃ daivaṃ yāti svakāryatāmf nūnam etena mārgeṇa gantavyo janasaṃkṣayaḥf tato vyāyacchamānānāṃ daivaṃ paścāt karoti naḥa daivopasṛṣṭaḥ puruṣo yat karma kurute kva citc kṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ sma tat tasya daivena vinihanyatea yat kartavyaṃ manuṣyeṇa vyavasāyavatā satāc tat kāryam aviśaṅkena siddhir daive pratiṣṭhitāa nikṛtyā nikṛtāḥ pārthā viṣayogaiś ca bhāratac dagdhā jatugṛhe cāpi dyūtena ca parājitāḥa rājanītiṃ vyapāśritya prahitāś caiva kānanamc yatnena ca kṛtaṃ yat te daivena vinipātitama yudhyasva yatnam āsthāya mṛtyuṃ kṛtvā nivartanamc yatatas tava teṣāṃ ca daivaṃ mārgeṇa yāsyatia na teṣāṃ matipūrvaṃ hi sukṛtaṃ dṛśyate kva citc duṣkṛtaṃ tava vā vīra buddhyā hīnaṃ kurūdvahaa daivaṃ pramāṇaṃ sarvasya sukṛtasyetarasya vāc ananyakarma daivaṃ hi jāgarti svapatām apid tena yukto hi puruṣaḥ kāryākāryaṃ niyujyatea bahūni tava sainyāni yodhāś ca bahavas tathāc na tathā pāṇḍuputrāṇām evaṃ yuddham avartataa tair alpair bahavo yūyaṃ kṣayaṃ nītāḥ prahāriṇaḥc śaṅke daivasya tat karma pauruṣaṃ yena nāśitam saṃjaya uvācaa evaṃ saṃbhāṣamāṇānāṃ bahu tat taj janādhipac pāṇḍavānām anīkāni samadṛśyanta saṃyugea tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ vyatiṣaktarathadvipamc tāvakānāṃ paraiḥ sārdhaṃ rājan durmantrite tava saṃjaya uvācaa tad udīrṇagajāśvaughaṃ balaṃ tava janādhipac pāṇḍusenām abhidrutya yodhayām āsa sarvataḥa pāñcālāḥ kuravaś caiva yodhayantaḥ parasparamc yamarāṣṭrāya mahate paralokāya dīkṣitāḥa śūrāḥ śūraiḥ samāgamya śaratomaraśaktibhiḥc vivyadhuḥ samare tūrṇaṃ ninyuś caiva yamakṣayama rathināṃ rathibhiḥ sārdhaṃ rudhirasrāvi dāruṇamc prāvartata mahad yuddhaṃ nighnatām itaretarama vāraṇāś ca mahārāja samāsādya parasparamc viṣāṇair dārayām āsuḥ saṃkruddhāś ca madotkaṭāḥa hayārohān hayārohāḥ prāsaśaktiparaśvadhaiḥc bibhidus tumule yuddhe prārthayanto mahad yaśaḥa pattayaś ca mahābāho śataśaḥ śastrapāṇayaḥc anyonyam ārdayan rājan nityayattāḥ parākramea gotrāṇāṃ nāmadheyānāṃ kulānāṃ caiva māriṣac śravaṇād dhi vijānīmaḥ pāñcālān kurubhiḥ sahaa anyonyaṃ samare yodhāḥ śaraśaktiparaśvadhaiḥc preṣayan paralokāya vicaranto hy abhītavata śarair daśa diśo rājaṃs teṣāṃ muktaiḥ sahasraśaḥc na bhrājanta yathāpūrvaṃ bhāskare staṃ gate pi caa tathā prayudhyamāneṣu pāṇḍaveyeṣu nirbhayaḥc duryodhano mahārāja vyavagāhata tad balama saindhavasya vadhenaiva bhṛśaṃ duḥkhasamanvitaḥc martavyam iti saṃcintya prāviśat tu dviṣadbalama nādayan rathaghoṣeṇa kampayann iva medinīmc abhyavartata putras te pāṇḍavānām anīkinīma sa saṃnipātas tumulas tasya teṣāṃ ca bhāratac abhavat sarvasainyānām abhāvakaraṇo mahānd dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācad tathā hateṣu sainyeṣu tathā kṛcchragataḥ svayamd kaccid duryodhanaḥ sūta nākārṣīt pṛṣṭhato raṇamd ekasya ca bahūnāṃ ca saṃnipāto mahān abhūtd viśeṣato hi nṛpater viṣamaṃ pratibhāti med so tyantasukhasaṃvṛddho rakṣyo lokasya ceśvaraḥd eko bahūn samāsādya kaccin nāsīt parāṅmukhaḥd droṇaḥ karṇaḥ kṛpaś caiva kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥd nāvārayan kathaṃ yuddhe rājānaṃ rājakāṅkṣiṇaḥd sarvopāyair hi yuddheṣu rakṣitavyo mahīpatiḥd eṣā nītiḥ parā yuddhe dṛṣṭā tatra maharṣibhiḥd praviṣṭe vai mama sute pareṣāṃ vai mahad balamd saṃjaya uvācad māmakā rathināṃ śreṣṭhāḥ kim akurvata saṃjayad rājan saṃgrāmam āścaryaṃ putrasya tava bhāratad ekasya ca bahūnāṃ ca śṛṇu me bruvato dbhutamd droṇena vāryamāṇo sau karṇena ca kṛpeṇa cad prāviśat pāṇḍavīṃ senāṃ makaraḥ sāgaraṃ yathād kirann iṣusahasrāṇi tatra tatra tadā tadād pāñcālān pāṇḍavāṃś caiva vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥd yathodyamya tataḥ sūryo raśmibhir nāśayet tamaḥd tathā putras tava balaṃ nāśayat tan mahābalaḥa madhyaṃdinagataṃ sūryaṃ pratapantaṃ gabhastibhiḥc tathā tava sutaṃ madhye pratapantaṃ śarormibhiḥa na śekur bhārataṃ yuddhe pāṇḍavāḥ samavekṣitumc palāyane kṛtotsāhā nirutsāhā dviṣajjayea paryadhāvanta pāñcālā vadhyamānā mahātmanāc rukmapuṅkhaiḥ prasannāgrais tava putreṇa dhanvināe ardyamānāḥ śarais tūrṇaṃ nyapatan pāṇḍusainikāḥf vyadravaṃś ca bhayād yodhā dṛṣṭvā taṃ paramāhavef vyāttānanam iva prāptam antakaṃ prāṇahāriṇama na tādṛśaṃ raṇe karma kṛtavantas tu tāvakāḥc yādṛśaṃ kṛtavān rājā putras tava viśāṃ patea putreṇa tava sā senā pāṇḍavī mathitā raṇec nalinī dviradeneva samantāt phullapaṅkajāa kṣīṇatoyānilārkābhyāṃ hatatviḍ iva padminīc babhūva pāṇḍavī senā tava putrasya tejasāa pāṇḍusenāṃ hatāṃ dṛṣṭvā tava putreṇa bhāratac bhīmasenapurogās tu pāñcālāḥ samupādravana sa bhīmasenaṃ daśabhir mādrīputrau tribhis tribhiḥc virāṭadrupadau ṣaḍbhiḥ śatena ca śikhaṇḍinama dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca saptatyā dharmaputraṃ ca saptabhiḥc kekayāṃś caiva cedīṃś ca bahubhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥa sātvataṃ pañcabhir viddhvā draupadeyāṃs tribhis tribhiḥc ghaṭotkacaṃ ca samare viddhvā siṃha ivānadata śataśaś cāparān yodhān sadvipāśvarathān raṇec śarair avacakartograiḥ kruddho ntaka iva prajāḥd sā tena pāṇḍavī senā vadhyamānā śilīmukhaiḥd tava putreṇa saṃgrāme vidudrāva narādhipad taṃ tapantam ivādityaṃ kururājaṃ mahāhaved nāśakan vīkṣituṃ rājan pāṇḍuputrasya sainikāḥd tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā kupito rājasattamad abhyadhāvat kurupatiṃ tava putraṃ jigīṣayād tāv ubhau yudhi kauravyau samīyatur ariṃdamaud svārthahetoḥ parākrāntau duryodhanayudhiṣṭhiraud tato duryodhanaḥ kruddhaḥ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥd vivyādha daśabhis tūrṇaṃ dhvajaṃ ciccheda ceṣuṇād indrasenaṃ tribhiś caiva lalāṭe jaghnivān nṛpad sārathiṃ dayitaṃ rājñaḥ pāṇḍavasya mahātmanaḥd dhanuś ca punar anyena cakartāsya mahārathaḥd caturbhiś caturaś caiva bāṇair vivyādha vājinaḥd tato yudhiṣṭhiraḥ kruddho nimeṣād iva kārmukamd anyad ādāya vegena kauravaṃ pratyavārayata tasya tān nighnataḥ śatrūn rukmapṛṣṭhaṃ mahad dhanuḥc bhallābhyāṃ pāṇḍavo jyeṣṭhas tridhā ciccheda māriṣaa vivyādha cainaṃ daśabhiḥ samyagastaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥc marmāṇi bhittvā te sarve saṃbhagnāḥ kṣitim āviśana tataḥ pramuditā yodhāḥ parivavrur yudhiṣṭhiramc vṛtrahatyai yathā devāḥ parivavruḥ puraṃdaramd vṛtreṇa saha yudhyantaṃ yadvad devā śatakratuma tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā tava putrasya māriṣac śaraṃ paramadurvāraṃ preṣayām āsa saṃyuged sa śaraṃ sūryaraśmyābham atyugram anivāraṇamd hā hato sīti rājānam uktvāmuñcad yudhiṣṭhiraḥd sa tenākarṇamuktena viddho bāṇena kauravaḥe sa tena bhṛśasaṃviddho niṣasāda rathottamef niṣasāda rathopasthe bhṛśaṃ saṃmūḍhacetanaḥa tataḥ pāñcālasainyānāṃ bhṛśam āsīd ravo mahānc hato rājeti rājendra muditānāṃ samantataḥa bāṇaśabdaravaś cograḥ śuśruve tatra māriṣac atha droṇo drutaṃ tatra pratyadṛśyata saṃyugea hṛṣṭo duryodhanaś cāpi dṛḍham ādāya kārmukamc tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti rājānaṃ bruvan pāṇḍavam abhyayātd tam evaṃvādinaṃ vīraṃ dhārtarāṣṭraṃ mahārathama pratyudyayus taṃ tvaritāḥ pāñcālā rājagṛddhinaḥc tān droṇaḥ pratijagrāha parīpsan kurusattamame caṇḍavātoddhatān meghān nighnan raśmimuco yathāa tato rājan mahān āsīt saṃgrāmo bhūrivardhanaḥc tāvakānāṃ pareṣāṃ ca sametānāṃ yuyutsayā dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa yat tadā prāviśat pāṇḍūn ācāryaḥ kupito vaśīc uktvā duryodhanaṃ samyaṅ mama śāstrātigaṃ sutama praviśya vicarantaṃ ca raṇe śūram avasthitamc kathaṃ droṇaṃ maheṣvāsaṃ pāṇḍavāḥ paryavārayana ke rakṣan dakṣiṇaṃ cakram ācāryasya mahātmanaḥc ke cottaram arakṣanta nighnataḥ śātravān raṇed ke cāsya pṛṣṭhato nvāsan vīrā vīrasya yodhinaḥd ke purastād avartanta rathinas tasya śatravaḥd manye tān aspṛśac chītam ativelam anārtavamd manye te samavepanta gāvo vai śiśire yathād yat prāviśan maheṣvāsaḥ pāñcālān aparājitaḥa nṛtyan sa rathamārgeṣu sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥb nirdahan sarvasainyāni pāñcālānāṃ ratharṣabhaḥc dhūmaketur iva kruddhaḥ kathaṃ mṛtyum upeyivān saṃjaya uvācaa sāyāhne saindhavaṃ hatvā rājñā pārthaḥ sametya cac sātyakiś ca maheṣvāso droṇam evābhyadhāvatāma tathā yudhiṣṭhiras tūrṇaṃ bhīmasenaś ca pāṇḍavaḥc pṛthak camūbhyāṃ saṃsaktau droṇam evābhyadhāvatāma tathaiva nakulo dhīmān sahadevaś ca durjayaḥc dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ śatānīko virāṭaś ca sakekayaḥe matsyāḥ śālveyasenāś ca droṇam eva yayur yudhia drupadaś ca tathā rājā pāñcālair abhirakṣitaḥc dhṛṣṭadyumnapitā rājan droṇam evābhyavartataa draupadeyā maheṣvāsā rākṣasaś ca ghaṭotkacaḥc sasenās te bhyavartanta droṇam eva mahādyutima prabhadrakāś ca pāñcālāḥ ṣaṭsahasrāḥ prahāriṇaḥc droṇam evābhyavartanta puraskṛtya śikhaṇḍinama tathetare naravyāghrāḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathāḥc sahitāḥ saṃnyavartanta droṇam eva dvijarṣabhama teṣu śūreṣu yuddhāya gateṣu bharatarṣabhac babhūva rajanī ghorā bhīrūṇāṃ bhayavardhinīa yodhānām aśivā raudrā rājann antakagāminīc kuñjarāśvamanuṣyāṇāṃ prāṇāntakaraṇī tadāa tasyāṃ rajanyāṃ ghorāyāṃ nadantyaḥ sarvataḥ śivāḥc nyavedayan bhayaṃ ghoraṃ sajvālakavalair mukhaiḥa ulūkāś cāpy adṛśyanta śaṃsanto vipulaṃ bhayamc viśeṣataḥ kauravāṇāṃ dhvajinyām atidāruṇama tataḥ sainyeṣu rājendra śabdaḥ samabhavan mahānc bherīśabdena mahatā mṛdaṅgānāṃ svanena caa gajānāṃ garjitaiś cāpi turaṅgāṇāṃ ca heṣitaiḥc khuraśabdanipātaiś ca tumulaḥ sarvato bhavata tataḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ saṃdhyāyām atidāruṇamc droṇasya ca mahārāja sṛñjayānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥa tamasā cāvṛte loke na prājñāyata kiṃ canac sainyena rajasā caiva samantād utthitena haa narasyāśvasya nāgasya samasajjata śoṇitamc nāpaśyāma rajo bhaumaṃ kaśmalenābhisaṃvṛtāḥa rātrau vaṃśavanasyeva dahyamānasya parvateb mṛdaṅgānakanirhrādair jharjharaiḥ paṭahais tathāb phetkārair hreṣitaiḥ śabdaiḥ sarvam evākulaṃ babhauc ghoraś caṭacaṭāśabdaḥ śastrāṇāṃ patatām abhūta naiva sve na pare rājan prājñāyanta tamovṛtec unmattam iva tat sarvaṃ babhūva rajanīmukhea bhaumaṃ rajo tha rājendra śoṇitena praśāmitamc śātakaumbhaiś ca kavacair bhūṣaṇaiś ca tamo bhyagāta tataḥ sā bhāratī senā maṇihemavibhūṣitāc dyaur ivāsīt sanakṣatrā rajanyāṃ bharatarṣabhaa gomāyubaḍasaṃghuṣṭā śaktidhvajasamākulāc dāruṇābhirutā ghorā kṣveḍitotkruṣṭanāditāa tato bhavan mahāśabdas tumulo lomaharṣaṇaḥc samāvṛṇvan diśaḥ sarvā mahendrāśaninisvanaḥa sā niśīthe mahārāja senādṛśyata bhāratīc aṅgadaiḥ kuṇḍalair niṣkaiḥ śastraiś caivāvabhāsitāa tatra nāgā rathāś caiva jāmbūnadavibhūṣitāḥc niśāyāṃ pratyadṛśyanta meghā iva savidyutaḥa ṛṣṭiśaktigadābāṇamusalaprāsapaṭṭiśāḥc saṃpatanto vyadṛśyanta bhrājamānā ivāgnayaḥa duryodhanapurovātāṃ rathanāgabalāhakāmc vāditraghoṣastanitāṃ cāpavidyuddhvajair vṛtāma droṇapāṇḍavaparjanyāṃ khaḍgaśaktigadāśanimc śaradhārāstrapavanāṃ bhṛśaṃ śītoṣṇasaṃkulāma ghorāṃ vismāpanīm ugrāṃ jīvitacchidam aplavāmc tāṃ prāviśann atibhayāṃ senāṃ yuddhacikīrṣavaḥa tasmin rātrimukhe ghore mahāśabdanināditec bhīrūṇāṃ trāsajanane śūrāṇāṃ harṣavardhanea rātriyuddhe tadā ghore vartamāne sudāruṇec droṇam abhyadravan kruddhāḥ sahitāḥ pāṇḍusṛñjayāḥa ye ye pramukhato rājan nyavartanta mahātmanaḥc tān sarvān vimukhāṃś cakre kāṃś cin ninye yamakṣayamd tāni nāgasahasrāṇi rathānām ayutāni cad padātihayasaṃghānāṃ prayutāny arbudāni cad droṇenaikena nārācair nirbhinnāni niśāmukhe dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa tasmin praviṣṭe durdharṣe sṛñjayān amitaujasic amṛṣyamāṇe saṃrabdhe kā vo bhūd vai matis tadāa duryodhanaṃ tathā putram uktvā śāstrātigaṃ mamac yat prāviśad ameyātmā kiṃ pārthaḥ pratyapadyataa nihate saindhave vīre bhūriśravasi caiva hic yad abhyagān mahātejāḥ pāñcālān aparājitaḥa kim amanyata durdharṣaḥ praviṣṭe śatrutāpanec duryodhanaś ca kiṃ kṛtyaṃ prāptakālam amanyataa ke ca taṃ varadaṃ vīram anvayur dvijasattamamc ke cāsya pṛṣṭhato gacchan vīrāḥ śūrasya yudhyataḥe ke purastād ayudhyanta nighnataḥ śātravān raṇea manye haṃ pāṇḍavān sarvān bhāradvājaśarārditānc śiśire kampamānā vai kṛśā gāva ivābhibhoa praviśya sa maheṣvāsaḥ pāñcālān arimardanaḥc kathaṃ nu puruṣavyāghraḥ pañcatvam upajagmivāna sarveṣu sainyeṣu ca saṃgateṣurātrau sameteṣu mahāratheṣuc saṃloḍyamāneṣu pṛthagvidheṣuke vas tadānīṃ matimanta āsana hatāṃś caiva viṣaktāṃś ca parābhūtāṃś ca śaṃsasic rathino virathāṃś caiva kṛtān yuddheṣu māmakānd teṣāṃ saṃloḍyamānānāṃ pāṇḍavair hatacetasāmd andhe tamasi kiṃ jyotir abhavat kā matis tadād prahṛṣṭāṃś cāpy udagrāṃś ca nityaṃ śaṃsasi pāṇḍavānd aprahṛṣṭān vimanaso vitrastāṃś caiva māmakāna katham eṣāṃ tadā tatra pārthānām apalāyināmc prakāśam abhavad rātrau kathaṃ kuruṣu saṃjaya saṃjaya uvācaa rātriyuddhe tadā rājan vartamāne sudāruṇec droṇam abhyadravan rātrau pāṇḍavāḥ sahasainikāḥa tato droṇaḥ kekayāṃś ca dhṛṣṭadyumnasya cātmajānc preṣayan mṛtyulokāya sarvān iṣubhir āśugaiḥa tasya pramukhato rājan ye vartanta mahārathāḥc tān sarvān preṣayām āsa paralokāya bhārataa pramathnantaṃ tadā vīraṃ bhāradvājaṃ mahārathamc abhyavartata saṃkruddhaḥ śibī rājan pratāpavāna tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathamc vivyādha daśabhir droṇaḥ sarvapāraśavaiḥ śaraiḥa taṃ śibiḥ prativivyādha triṃśatā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥc sārathiṃ cāsya bhallena smayamāno nyapātayata tasya droṇo hayān hatvā sārathiṃ ca mahātmanaḥc athāsya saśirastrāṇaṃ śiraḥ kāyād apāharatd tato sya sārathiṃ kṣipram anyaṃ duryodhano diśatd sa tena saṃgṛhītāśvaḥ punar abhyadravad ripūna kaliṅgānāṃ ca sainyena kaliṅgasya suto raṇec pūrvaṃ pitṛvadhāt kruddho bhīmasenam upādravata sa bhīmaṃ pañcabhir viddhvā punar vivyādha saptabhiḥc viśokaṃ tribhir ājaghne dhvajam ekena patriṇāa kaliṅgānāṃ tu taṃ śūraṃ kruddhaṃ kruddho vṛkodaraḥc rathād ratham abhidrutya muṣṭinābhijaghāna haa tasya muṣṭihatasyājau pāṇḍavena balīyasāc sarvāṇy asthīni sahasā prāpatan vai pṛthak pṛthakd tasmiṃs tathā hate tena siṃhanādo mahān abhūtd pāñcālānāṃ mahārāja sādhu sādhv iti pāṇḍavama taṃ karṇo bhrātaraś cāsya nāmṛṣyanta mahārathāḥc te bhīmasenaṃ nārācair jaghnur āśīviṣopamaiḥa tataḥ śatrurathaṃ tyaktvā bhīmo dhruvarathaṃ gataḥc dhruvaṃ cāsyantam aniśaṃ muṣṭinā samapothayatd   bhīmaḥ svaṃ ratham āgamatd punaś cotpatya vegena tasyānujam apātayatd yathā kācamaṇir nyasto muṣṭinaikena līlayād sa hataḥ sahasā cūrṇo raktam evopapadyatad tathā cūrṇam abhūt tatra karṇabhrātā drumas tathāe sa tathā pāṇḍuputreṇa balinā nihato patata taṃ nihatya mahārāja bhīmaseno mahābalaḥc jayarātarathaṃ prāpya muhuḥ siṃha ivānadata jayarātam athākṣipya nadan savyena pāṇināb sūtaṃ cāsya mahābāhur gṛhya rājaṃs tathaiva cac talena nāśayām āsa karṇasyaivāgrataḥ sthitamd pādayor gṛhya tau vīrau bhīmaḥ karṇasya paśyataḥd bhūmāv āvidhya jaghne sa tau ca prāṇair vyayujyatāma karṇas tu pāṇḍave śaktiṃ kāñcanīṃ samavāsṛjatc tatas tām eva jagrāha prahasan pāṇḍunandanaḥa karṇāyaiva ca durdharṣaś cikṣepājau vṛkodaraḥc tām antarikṣe ciccheda śakunis tailapāyinād etat kṛtvā mahat karma raṇe dbhutaparākramaḥd punaḥ svaratham āsthāya dudrāva tava vāhinīmd tam āyāntaṃ jighāṃsantaṃ bhīmaṃ kruddham ivāntakamd nyavārayan mahābāhuṃ tava putrā viśāṃ patea tatas tava sutā rājan bhīmasya ratham āvrajanc mahatā śaravarṣeṇa chādayanto vṛkodarama durmadasya tato bhīmaḥ prahasann iva saṃyugec sārathiṃ ca hayāṃś caiva śarair ninye yamakṣayame durmadas tu tato yānaṃ duṣkarṇasyāvapupluvea tāv ekaratham ārūḍhau bhrātarau paratāpanauc saṃgrāmaśiraso madhye bhīmaṃ dvāv abhyadhāvatāme yathāmbupatimitrau hi tārakaṃ daityasattamama tatas tu durmadaś caiva duṣkarṇaś ca tavātmajauc ratham ekaṃ samāruhya bhīmaṃ bāṇair avidhyatāma tataḥ karṇasya miṣato drauṇer duryodhanasya cac kṛpasya somadattasya bāhlīkasya ca pāṇḍavaḥa durmadasya ca vīrasya duṣkarṇasya ca taṃ rathamb āruroha mahābāhur miṣatāṃ sarvadhanvināmc pādaprahāreṇa dharāṃ prāveśayad ariṃdamaḥa tataḥ sutau te balinau śūrau duṣkarṇadurmadauc muṣṭināhatya saṃkruddho mamarda caraṇena caa tato hāhākṛte sainye dṛṣṭvā bhīmaṃ nṛpābruvanc rudro yaṃ bhīmarūpeṇa dhārtarāṣṭreṣu gṛdhyatia evam uktvāpalāyanta sarve bhārata pārthivāḥc visaṃjñāvāhayan vāhān na ca dvau saha dhāvataḥa tato bale bhṛśalulite niśāmukhesupūjito nṛpavṛṣabhair vṛkodaraḥc mahābalaḥ kamalavibuddhalocanoyudhiṣṭhiraṃ nṛpatim apūjayad balīa tato yamau drupadavirāṭakekayāyudhiṣṭhiraś cāpi parāṃ mudaṃ yayuḥc vṛkodaraṃ bhṛśam abhipūjayaṃś ca teyathāndhake pratinihate haraṃ surāḥa tataḥ sutās tava varuṇātmajopamāruṣānvitāḥ saha guruṇā mahātmanāc vṛkodaraṃ sarathapadātikuñjarāyuyutsavo bhṛśam abhiparyavārayand tato yamau drupadasutāḥ sasainikād yudhiṣṭhiradrupadavirāṭasātvatāḥd ghaṭotkaco jayavijayau drumau vṛkaḥd sasṛṃjayās tava tanayān avārayana tato bhavat timiraghanair ivāvṛtaṃmahābhaye bhayadam atīva dāruṇamc niśāmukhe baḍavṛkagṛdhramodanaṃmahātmanāṃ nṛpavarayuddham adbhutam saṃjaya uvācaa prāyopaviṣṭe tu hate putre sātyakinā tataḥc somadatto bhṛśaṃ kruddhaḥ sātyakiṃ vākyam abravīta kṣatradharmaḥ purā dṛṣṭo yas tu devair mahātmabhiḥc taṃ tvaṃ sātvata saṃtyajya dasyudharme kathaṃ rataḥa parāṅmukhāya dīnāya nyastaśastrāya yācatec kṣatradharmarataḥ prājñaḥ kathaṃ nu prahared raṇea dvāv eva kila vṛṣṇīnāṃ tatra khyātau mahārathauc pradyumnaś ca mahābāhus tvaṃ caiva yudhi sātvataa kathaṃ prāyopaviṣṭāya pārthena chinnabāhavec nṛśaṃsaṃ patanīyaṃ ca tādṛśaṃ kṛtavān asid karmaṇas tasya durvṛtta phalaṃ prāpnuhi saṃyuged adya chetsyāmi te mūḍha śiro vikramya patriṇāa śape sātvata putrābhyām iṣṭena sukṛtena cac anatītām imāṃ rātriṃ yadi tvāṃ vīramāninama arakṣyamāṇaṃ pārthena jiṣṇunā sasutānujamc na hanyāṃ niraye ghore pateyaṃ vṛṣṇipāṃsanaa evam uktvā susaṃkruddhaḥ somadatto mahābalaḥc dadhmau śaṅkhaṃ ca tāreṇa siṃhanādaṃ nanāda caa tataḥ kamalapatrākṣaḥ siṃhadaṃṣṭro mahābalaḥc sātvato bhṛśasaṃkruddhaḥ somadattam athābravītd kauraveya na me trāsaḥ kathaṃ cid api vidyated tvayā sārdham athānyaiś ca yudhyato hṛdi kaś canad yadi sarveṇa sainyena gupto māṃ yodhayiṣyasid tathāpi na vyathā kā cit tvayi syān mama kauravad yuddhasāreṇa vākyena satām avamatena cad nāhaṃ bhīṣayituṃ śakyaḥ kṣatravṛtte sthitas tvayād yadi te sti yuyutsādya mayā saha narādhipad nirdayo niśitair bāṇaiḥ prahara praharāmi tea hato bhūriśravā vīras tava putro mahārathaḥc śalaś caiva tathā rājan bhrātṛvyasanakarśitaḥa tvāṃ cāpy adya vadhiṣyāmi saputrapaśubāndhavamc tiṣṭhedānīṃ raṇe yattaḥ kauravo si viśeṣataḥa yasmin dānaṃ damaḥ śaucam ahiṃsā hrīr dhṛtiḥ kṣamāc anapāyīni sarvāṇi nityaṃ rājñi yudhiṣṭhirea mṛdaṅgaketos tasya tvaṃ tejasā nihataḥ purāc sakarṇasaubalaḥ saṃkhye vināśaṃ samupeṣyasia śape haṃ kṛṣṇacaraṇair iṣṭāpūrtena caiva hac yadi tvāṃ sasutaṃ pāpaṃ na hanyāṃ yudhi roṣitaḥe apayāsyasi cet tyaktvā tato mukto bhaviṣyasia evam ābhāṣya cānyonyaṃ krodhasaṃraktalocanauc pravṛttau śarasaṃpātaṃ kartuṃ puruṣasattamaua tato gajasahasreṇa rathānām ayutena cac duryodhanaḥ somadattaṃ parivārya vyavasthitaḥa śakuniś ca susaṃkruddhaḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥc putrapautraiḥ parivṛto bhrātṛbhiś cendravikramaiḥe syālas tava mahābāhur vajrasaṃhanano yuvāa sāgraṃ śatasahasraṃ tu hayānāṃ tasya dhīmataḥc somadattaṃ maheṣvāsaṃ samantāt paryarakṣataa rakṣyamāṇaś ca balibhiś chādayām āsa sātyakimc taṃ chādyamānaṃ viśikhair dṛṣṭvā saṃnataparvabhiḥe dhṛṣṭadyumno bhyayāt kruddhaḥ pragṛhya mahatīṃ camūmf abhyarakṣan mahābāhuḥ sātvataṃ satyavikramama caṇḍavātābhisṛṣṭānām udadhīnām iva svanaḥc āsīd rājan balaughānām anyonyam abhinighnatāma vivyādha somadattas tu sātvataṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥc sātyakir daśabhiś cainam avadhīt kurupuṃgavama so tividdho balavatā samare dṛḍhadhanvanāc rathopasthaṃ samāsādya mumoha gatacetanaḥa taṃ vimūḍhaṃ samālakṣya sārathis tvarayānvitaḥc apovāha raṇād vīraṃ somadattaṃ mahārathama taṃ visaṃjñaṃ samālokya yuyudhānaśarārditamb abhyadhāvat tato droṇo yaduvīrajighāṃsayāb tam āyāntam abhiprekṣya yudhiṣṭhirapurogamāḥb parivavrur mahātmānaṃ parīpsanto yadūdvahamb tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ droṇasya saha pāṇḍavaiḥb baler iva suraiḥ pūrvaṃ trailokyajayakāṅkṣayāb tataḥ sāyakajālena pāṇḍavānīkam āvṛṇotb bhāradvājo mahātejā vivyādha ca yudhiṣṭhiramb sātyakiṃ daśabhir bāṇair viṃśatyā pārṣataṃ śaraiḥb bhīmasenaṃ ca navabhir nakulaṃ pañcabhis tathāb sahadevaṃ tathāṣṭābhiḥ śatena ca śikhaṇḍinamb draupadeyān mahābāhuḥ pañcabhiḥ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥb virāṭaṃ matsyam aṣṭābhir drupadaṃ daśabhiḥ śaraiḥb yudhāmanyuṃ tribhiḥ ṣaḍbhir uttamaujasam āhaveb anyāṃś ca sainikān viddhvā yudhiṣṭhiram upādravatb te vadhyamānā droṇena pāṇḍuputrasya sainikāḥb prādravan vai bhayād rājan sārtanādā diśo daśab kālyamānaṃ tu tat sainyaṃ dṛṣṭvā droṇena phalgunaḥb kiṃ cid āgatasaṃrambho guruṃ pārtho bhyayād drutamb dṛṣṭvā droṇas tu bībhatsum abhidhāvantam āhaveb saṃnyavartata tat sainyaṃ punar yaudhiṣṭhiraṃ nṛpab tato yuddham abhūd bhūyo bhāradvājasya pāṇḍavaiḥb droṇas tava sutai rājan sarvataḥ parivāritaḥb vyadhamat pāṇḍusainyāni tūlarāśim ivānalaḥb taṃ jvalantam ivādityaṃ dīptānalasamadyutimb rājann aniśam atyantaṃ dṛṣṭvā droṇaṃ śarārciṣamb maṇḍalīkṛtadhanvānaṃ tapantam iva bhāskaramb dahantam ahitān sainye nainaṃ kaś cid avārayatb yo yo hi pramukhe tasya tasthau droṇasya pūruṣaḥb tasya tasya śiraś chittvā yayau droṇaśaraḥ kṣitimb evaṃ sā pāṇḍavī senā vadhyamānā mahātmanāb pradudrāva punar bhītā paśyataḥ savyasācinaḥb saṃprabhagnaṃ balaṃ dṛṣṭvā droṇena niśi bhāratab govindam abravīj jiṣṇur gaccha droṇarathaṃ pratib tato rajatagokṣīrakundendusadṛśaprabhānb codayām āsa dāśārho hayān droṇarathaṃ pratib bhīmaseno pi taṃ dṛṣṭvā yāntaṃ droṇāya phalgunamb svasārathim uvācedaṃ droṇānīkāya māṃ vahab so pi tasya vacaḥ śrutvā viśoko vāhayad dhayānb pṛṣṭhataḥ satyasandhasya jiṣṇor bharatasattamab tau dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau yattau droṇānīkam abhidrutaub pāñcālāḥ sṛñjayā matsyāś cedikārūṣakośalāḥb anvagacchan mahārāja kekayāś ca mahārathāḥb tato rājann abhūd ghoraḥ saṃgrāmo lomaharṣaṇaḥb bībhatsur dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvam uttaraṃ ca vṛkodaraḥb mahadbhyāṃ rathavṛndābhyāṃ balaṃ jagṛhatus tavab tau dṛṣṭvā puruṣavyāghrau bhīmasenadhanaṃjayaub dhṛṣṭadyumno bhyayād rājan sātyakiś ca mahābalaḥb caṇḍavātābhipannānām udadhīnām iva svanaḥb āsīd rājan balaughānāṃ tadānyonyam abhighnatāmb saumadattivadhāt kruddho dṛṣṭvā sātyakim āhavec drauṇir abhyadravat kruddhaḥ sātvataṃ raṇamūrdhania tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya śaineyasya rathaṃ pratic bhaimaseniḥ susaṃkruddhaḥ pratyamitram avārayata kārṣṇāyasamayaṃ ghoram ṛkṣacarmāvṛtaṃ mahatb mahāntaṃ ratham āsthāya triṃśan natvāntarāntaramb vikṣiptayantrasaṃnāhaṃ mahāmeghaughanisvanamc yuktaṃ gajanibhair vāhair na hayair nāpi vā gajaiḥa vikṣiptam aṣṭacakreṇa vivṛtākṣeṇa kūjatāc dhvajenocchritatuṇḍena gṛdhrarājena rājatāa lohitārdrapatākaṃ tam antramālāvibhūṣitamc aṣṭacakrasamāyuktam āsthāya vipulaṃ rathama śūlamudgaradhāriṇyā śailapādapahastayāc rakṣasāṃ ghorarūpāṇām akṣauhiṇyā samāvṛtaḥa tam udyatamahācāpaṃ niśāmya vyathitā nṛpāḥc yugāntakālasamaye daṇḍahastam ivāntakamd tatas taṃ giriśṛṅgābhaṃ bhīmarūpaṃ bhayāvahamd daṃṣṭrākarālogramukhaṃ śaṅkukarṇaṃ mahāhanumd ūrdhvakeśaṃ virūpākṣaṃ dīptāsyaṃ nimnitodaramd mahābhrābhagaladvāraṃ kirīṭacchannamūrdhajamd trāsanaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ vyāttānanam ivāntakamd vīkṣya dīptam ivāyāntaṃ ripuvikṣobhakāriṇamd tam udyatamahācāpaṃ rākṣasendraṃ ghaṭotkacama bhayārditā pracukṣobha putrasya tava vāhinīc vāyunā kṣobhitāvartā gaṅgevordhvataraṅgiṇīa ghaṭotkacaprayuktena siṃhanādena bhīṣitāḥc prasusruvur gajā mūtraṃ vivyathuś ca narā bhṛśama tato śmavṛṣṭir atyartham āsīt tatra samantataḥc saṃdhyākālādhikabalaiḥ pramuktā rākṣasaiḥ kṣitaua āyasāni ca cakrāṇi bhuśuṇḍyaḥ prāsatomarāḥc patanty aviralāḥ śūlāḥ śataghnyaḥ paṭṭiśās tathāa tad ugram atiraudraṃ ca dṛṣṭvā yuddhaṃ narādhipāḥc tanayās tava karṇaś ca vyathitāḥ prādravan diśaḥa tatraiko strabalaślāghī drauṇir mānī na vivyathec vyadhamac ca śarair māyāṃ ghaṭotkacavinirmitāma nihatāyāṃ tu māyāyām amarṣī sa ghaṭotkacaḥc visasarja śarān ghorāṃs te śvatthāmānam āviśana bhujagā iva vegena valmīkaṃ krodhamūrchitāḥc te śarā rudhirābhyaktā bhittvā śāradvatīsutame viviśur dharaṇīṃ śīghrā rukmapuṅkhāḥ śilāśitāḥa aśvatthāmā tu saṃkruddho laghuhastaḥ pratāpavānc ghaṭotkacam abhikruddhaṃ bibheda daśabhiḥ śaraiḥd tato ghaṭotkacaḥ kruddhaś cakraṃ cikṣepa satvarama ghaṭotkaco tividdhas tu droṇaputreṇa marmasuc cakraṃ śatasahasrāram agṛhṇād vyathito bhṛśama kṣurāntaṃ bālasūryābhaṃ maṇivajravibhūṣitamc aśvatthāmnas tu cikṣepa bhaimasenir jighāṃsayāa vegena mahatā gacchad vikṣiptaṃ drauṇinā śaraiḥc abhāgyasyeva saṃkalpas tan moghaṃ nyapatad bhuvia ghaṭotkacas tatas tūrṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā cakraṃ nipātitamc drauṇiṃ prācchādayad bāṇaiḥ svarbhānur iva bhāskarama ghaṭotkacasutaḥ śrīmān bhinnāñjanacayopamaḥc rurodha drauṇim āyāntaṃ prabhañjanam ivādrirāṭa pautreṇa bhīmasenasya śaraiḥ so ñjanaparvaṇāc babhau meghena dhārābhir girir merur ivārditaḥa aśvatthāmā tv asaṃbhrānto rudropendrendravikramaḥc dhvajam ekena bāṇena cicchedāñjanaparvaṇaḥa dvābhyāṃ tu rathayantāraṃ tribhiś cāsya triveṇukamc dhanur ekena ciccheda caturbhiś caturo hayāna virathasyodyataṃ hastād dhemabindubhir ācitamc viśikhena sutīkṣṇena khaḍgam asya dvidhākarota gadā hemāṅgadā rājaṃs tūrṇaṃ haiḍimbasūnunāc bhrāmyotkṣiptā śaraiḥ sāpi drauṇinābhyāhatāpatata tato ntarikṣam utpatya kālamegha ivonnadanc vavarṣāñjanaparvā sa drumavarṣaṃ nabhastalāta tato māyādharaṃ drauṇir ghaṭotkacasutaṃ divic mārgaṇair abhivivyādha ghanaṃ sūrya ivāṃśubhiḥa so vatīrya punas tasthau rathe hemapariṣkṛtec mahīdhara ivātyuccaḥ śrīmān añjanaparvataḥa tam ayasmayavarmāṇaṃ drauṇir bhīmātmajātmajamc jaghānāñjanaparvāṇaṃ maheśvara ivāndhakama atha dṛṣṭvā hataṃ putram aśvatthāmnā mahābalamc drauṇeḥ sakāśam abhyetya roṣāt pracalitāṅgadaḥa prāha vākyam asaṃbhrānto vīraṃ śāradvatīsutamc dahantaṃ pāṇḍavānīkaṃ vanam agnim ivoddhatama tiṣṭha tiṣṭha na me jīvan droṇaputra gamiṣyasic tvām adya nihaniṣyāmi krauñcam agnisuto yathā aśvatthāmovācaa gaccha vatsa sahānyais tvaṃ yudhyasvāmaravikramac na hi putreṇa haiḍimbe pitā nyāyyaṃ prabādhituma kāmaṃ khalu na me roṣo haiḍimbe vidyate tvayic kiṃ tu roṣānvito jantur hanyād ātmānam apy uta saṃjaya uvācaa śrutvaitat krodhatāmrākṣaḥ putraśokasamanvitaḥc aśvatthāmānam āyasto bhaimasenir abhāṣataa kim ahaṃ kātaro drauṇe pṛthagjana ivāhaveb yan māṃ bhīṣayase vāgbhir asad etad vacas tavac bhīmāt khalv aham utpannaḥ kurūṇāṃ vipule kulea pāṇḍavānām ahaṃ putraḥ samareṣv anivartināmc rakṣasām adhirājo haṃ daśagrīvasamo balea tiṣṭha tiṣṭha na me jīvan droṇaputra gamiṣyasic yuddhaśraddhām ahaṃ te dya vineṣyāmi raṇājirea ity uktvā roṣatāmrākṣo rākṣasaḥ sumahābalaḥc drauṇim abhyadravat kruddho gajendram iva kesarīa rathākṣamātrair iṣubhir abhyavarṣad ghaṭotkacaḥc rathinām ṛṣabhaṃ drauṇiṃ dhārābhir iva toyadaḥa śaravṛṣṭiṃ śarair drauṇir aprāptāṃ tāṃ vyaśātayatc tato ntarikṣe bāṇānāṃ saṃgrāmo nya ivābhavata athāstrasaṃgharṣakṛtair visphuliṅgaiḥ samābabhauc vibhāvarīmukhe vyoma khadyotair iva citritama niśāmya nihatāṃ māyāṃ drauṇinā raṇamānināc ghaṭotkacas tato māyāṃ sasarjāntarhitaḥ punaḥa so bhavad girir atyuccaḥ śikharais tarusaṃkaṭaiḥc śūlaprāsāsimusalajalaprasravaṇo mahāna tam añjanacayaprakhyaṃ drauṇir dṛṣṭvā mahīdharamc prapatadbhiś ca bahubhiḥ śastrasaṃghair na cukṣubhea tataḥ smayann iva drauṇir vajram astram udīrayatc sa tenāstreṇa śailendraḥ kṣiptaḥ kṣipram anaśyataa tataḥ sa toyado bhūtvā nīlaḥ sendrāyudho divic aśmavṛṣṭibhir atyugro drauṇim ācchādayad raṇea atha saṃdhāya vāyavyam astram astravidāṃ varaḥc vyadhamad droṇatanayo nīlameghaṃ samutthitama sa mārgaṇagaṇair drauṇir diśaḥ pracchādya sarvataḥc śataṃ rathasahasrāṇāṃ jaghāna dvipadāṃ varaḥa sa dṛṣṭvā punar āyāntaṃ rathenāyatakārmukamc ghaṭotkacam asaṃbhrāntaṃ rākṣasair bahubhir vṛtama siṃhaśārdūlasadṛśair mattadviradavikramaiḥc gajasthaiś ca rathasthaiś ca vājipṛṣṭhagatair apia vivṛtāsyaśirogrīvair haiḍimbānucaraiḥ sahac paulastyair yātudhānaiś ca tāmasaiś cogravikramaiḥa nānāśastradharair vīrair nānākavacabhūṣaṇaiḥc mahābalair bhīmaravaiḥ saṃrambhodvṛttalocanaiḥa upasthitais tato yuddhe rākṣasair yuddhadurmadaiḥc viṣaṇṇam abhisaṃprekṣya putraṃ te drauṇir abravīta tiṣṭha duryodhanādya tvaṃ na kāryaḥ saṃbhramas tvayāc sahaibhir bhrātṛbhir vīraiḥ pārthivaiś cendravikramaiḥa nihaniṣyāmy amitrāṃs te na tavāsti parājayaḥc satyaṃ te pratijānāmi paryāśvāsaya vāhinīm duryodhana uvācaa na tv etad adbhutaṃ manye yat te mahad idaṃ manaḥc asmāsu ca parā bhaktis tava gautaminandana saṃjaya uvācaa aśvatthāmānam uktvaivaṃ tataḥ saubalam abravītc vṛtaḥ śatasahasreṇa rathānāṃ raṇaśobhināma ṣaṣṭyā gajasahasraiś ca prayāhi tvaṃ dhanaṃjayamc karṇaś ca vṛṣasenaś ca kṛpo nīlas tathaiva caa udīcyāḥ kṛtavarmā ca purumitraḥ śrutārpaṇaḥc duḥśāsano nikumbhaś ca kuṇḍabhedī urukramaḥa puraṃjayo dṛḍharathaḥ patākī hemapaṅkajaḥc śalyāruṇīndrasenāś ca saṃjayo vijayo jayaḥa kamalākṣaḥ puruḥ krāthī jayavarmā sudarśanaḥc ete tvām anuyāsyanti pattīnām ayutāni ṣaṭa jahi bhīmaṃ yamau cobhau dharmarājaṃ ca mātulac asurān iva devendro jayāśā me tvayi sthitāa dāritān drauṇinā bāṇair bhṛśaṃ vikṣatavigrahānc jahi mātula kaunteyān asurān iva pāvakiḥa evam ukto yayau śīghraṃ putreṇa tava saubalaḥc piprīṣus te sutān rājan didhakṣuś caiva pāṇḍavāna atha pravavṛte yuddhaṃ drauṇirākṣasayor mṛdhec vibhāvaryāṃ sutumulaṃ śakraprahrādayor ivaa tato ghaṭotkaco bāṇair daśabhir gautamīsutamc jaghānorasi saṃkruddho viṣāgnipratimair dṛḍhaiḥa sa tair abhyāhato gāḍhaṃ śarair bhīmasuteritaiḥc cacāla rathamadhyastho vātoddhūta iva drumaḥa bhūyaś cāñjalikenāsya mārgaṇena mahāprabhamc drauṇihastasthitaṃ cāpaṃ cicchedāśu ghaṭotkacaḥa tato nyad drauṇir ādāya dhanur bhārasahaṃ mahatc vavarṣa viśikhāṃs tīkṣṇān vāridhārā ivāmbudaḥa tataḥ śāradvatīputraḥ preṣayām āsa bhāratac suvarṇapuṅkhāñ śatrughnān khacarān khacarān pratia tadbāṇair arditaṃ yūthaṃ rakṣasāṃ pīnavakṣasāmc siṃhair iva babhau mattaṃ gajānām ākulaṃ kulama vidhamya rākṣasān bāṇaiḥ sāśvasūtarathān vibhuḥc dadāha bhagavān vahnir bhūtānīva yugakṣayea sa dagdhvākṣauhiṇīṃ bāṇair nairṛtān ruruce bhṛśamc pureva tripuraṃ dagdhvā divi devo maheśvaraḥa yugānte sarvabhūtāni dagdhveva vasur ulbaṇaḥc rarāja jayatāṃ śreṣṭho droṇaputras tavāhitāndA tato ghaṭotkacaḥ kruddho rakṣasāṃ bhīmakarmaṇāmdA drauṇiṃ hateti mahatīṃ codayām āsa tāṃ camūmdA ghaṭotkacasya tām ājñāṃ pratigṛhyātha rākṣasāḥdA śataghnīḥ parighān aśanīḥ śūlapaṭṭiśāndA khaḍgān gadā bhindipālān muśalāni paraśvadhāndA prāsānīṃs tomarāṃś ca kaṇapān kampanāñ śitāndA hulān bhuśuṇḍyaśmaguḍān sthūṇāḥ kārṣṇāyasīs tathādA mudgarāṃś ca nijaghne rākṣasān drauṇir divyāstrapratimantritaiḥdA tad bāṇair arditaṃ yūthaṃ rakṣasāṃ pīnavakṣasāmdA siṃhair iva babhau mattaṃ gajānām ākulaṃ kulamdA te rākṣasāḥ susaṃkruddhā droṇaputreṇa tāḍitāḥdA kruddhāḥ sma prādravan drauṇiṃ jighāṃsanto mahābalāḥdA tatrādbhutam imaṃ drauṇir darśayām āsa vikramamdA aśakyaṃ kartum anyena sarvabhūteṣu bhāratadA yad eko rākṣasīṃ senāṃ kṣaṇād drauṇir mahāstravitdA dadāha jvalitair bāṇai rākṣasendrasya paśyataḥdA sa dahan rākṣasānīkaṃ rarāja drauṇir āhavedA yugānte sarvabhūtāni saṃvartaka ivānalaḥdA taṃ dahantam anīkāni śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥa teṣu rājasahasreṣu pāṇḍaveyeṣu bhāratac nainaṃ nirīkṣituṃ kaś cic chaknoti drauṇim āhavee ṛte ghaṭotkacād vīrād rākṣasendrān mahābalāta sa punar bharataśreṣṭha krodhād raktāntalocanaḥc talaṃ talena saṃhatya saṃdaśya daśanacchadame svasūtam abravīt kruddho droṇaputrāya māṃ vahaa sa yayau ghorarūpeṇa tena jaitrapatākināc dvairathaṃ droṇaputreṇa punar apy arisūdanaḥd sa vinadya mahānādaṃ siṃhavad bhīmavikramaḥa sa cikṣepa tataḥ kruddho droṇaputrāya rākṣasaḥc aṣṭacakrāṃ mahāraudrām aśanīṃ rudranirmitāma tām avaplutya jagrāha drauṇir nyasya rathe dhanuḥc cikṣepa caināṃ tasyaiva syandanāt so vapupluvea sāśvasūtadhvajaṃ vāhaṃ bhasma kṛtvā mahāprabhāc viveśa vasudhāṃ bhittvā sāśanir bhṛśadāruṇāa drauṇes tat karma dṛṣṭvā tu sarvabhūtāny apūjayanc yad avaplutya jagrāha ghorāṃ śaṃkaranirmitāma dhṛṣṭadyumnarathaṃ gatvā bhaimasenis tato nṛpab dhanur ghoraṃ samādāya mahad indrāyudhopamamc mumoca niśitān bāṇān punar drauṇer mahorasia dhṛṣṭadyumno py asaṃbhrānto mumocāśīviṣopamānc suvarṇapuṅkhān viśikhān droṇaputrasya vakṣasia tato mumoca nārācān drauṇis tābhyāṃ sahasraśaḥc tāv apy agniśikhāprakhyair jaghnatus tasya mārgaṇāna atitīvram abhūd yuddhaṃ tayoḥ puruṣasiṃhayoḥc yodhānāṃ prītijananaṃ drauṇeś ca bharatarṣabhaa tato rathasahasreṇa dviradānāṃ śatais tribhiḥc ṣaḍbhir vājisahasraiś ca bhīmas taṃ deśam āvrajata tato bhīmātmajaṃ rakṣo dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca sānugamc ayodhayata dharmātmā drauṇir akliṣṭakarmakṛta tatrādbhutatamaṃ drauṇir darśayām āsa vikramamc aśakyaṃ kartum anyena sarvabhūteṣu bhārataa nimeṣāntaramātreṇa sāśvasūtarathadvipāmc akṣauhiṇīṃ rākṣasānāṃ śitair bāṇair atisaṃkruddhaḥ savṛkodarapārṣatānc sa nārācagaṇaiḥ pārthān drauṇir viddhvā mahābalaḥa jaghāna surathaṃ nāma drupadasya sutaṃ vibhuḥc punaḥ śrutaṃjayaṃ nāma surathasyānujaṃ raṇea balānīkaṃ jayānīkaṃ jayāśvaṃ cābhijaghnivānb punaḥ śareṇa tīkṣṇena drauṇiḥ siṃha ivonnadanc śrutāhvayaṃ ca rājendra drauṇir ninye yamakṣayama tribhiś cānyaiḥ śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ supuṅkhai rukmamālinamc śatruṃjayaṃ ca balinaṃ śakralokaṃ nināya haa jaghāna sa pṛṣadhraṃ ca candradevaṃ ca māninamc kuntibhojasutāṃś cājau daśabhir daśa jaghnivāna aśvatthāmā susaṃkruddhaḥ saṃdhāyogram ajihmagamc mumocākarṇapūrṇena dhanuṣā śaram uttamame yamadaṇḍopamaṃ ghoram uddiśyāśu ghaṭotkacama sa bhittvā hṛdayaṃ tasya rākṣasasya mahāśaraḥc viveśa vasudhāṃ śīghraṃ sapuṅkhaḥ pṛthivīpatea taṃ hataṃ patitaṃ jñātvā dhṛṣṭadyumno mahārathaḥc drauṇeḥ sakāśād rājendra apaninye rathāntarama tathā parāṅmukharathaṃ sainyaṃ yaudhiṣṭhiraṃ nṛpac parājitya raṇe vīro droṇaputro nanāda hae pūjitaḥ sarvabhūtaiś ca tava putraiś ca bhārataa atha śaraśatabhinnakṛttadehairhatapatitaiḥ kṣaṇadācaraiḥ samantātc nidhanam upagatair mahī kṛtābhūdgiriśikharair iva durgamātiraudrāa taṃ siddhagandharvapiśācasaṃghānāgāḥ suparṇāḥ pitaro vayāṃsic rakṣogaṇā bhūtagaṇāś ca drauṇimapūjayann apsarasaḥ surāś ca saṃjaya uvācaa drupadasyātmajān dṛṣṭvā kuntibhojasutāṃs tathāc droṇaputreṇa nihatān rākṣasāṃś ca sahasraśaḥa yudhiṣṭhiro bhīmaseno dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥc yuyudhānaś ca saṃyattā yuddhāyaiva mano dadhuḥa somadattaḥ punaḥ kurddho dṛṣṭvā sātyakim āhavec mahatā śaravarṣeṇa chādayām āsa sarvataḥa tataḥ samabhavad yuddham atīva bhayavardhanamc tvadīyānāṃ pareṣāṃ ca ghoraṃ vijayakāṅkṣiṇāmd taṃ dṛṣṭvā samupāyāntaṃ rukmapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥa daśabhiḥ sātvatasyārthe bhīmo vivyādha kauravamc somadatto pi taṃ vīraṃ śatena pratyavidhyataa sātvatas tv abhisaṃkruddhaḥ putrādhibhir abhiplutamc vṛddham ṛddhaṃ guṇaiḥ sarvair yayātim iva nāhuṣama vivyādha daśabhis tīkṣṇaiḥ śarair vajranipātibhiḥc śaktyā cainam athāhatya punar vivyādha saptabhiḥa tatas tu sātyaker arthe bhīmaseno navaṃ dṛḍhamc mumoca parighaṃ ghoraṃ somadattasya mūrdhania sātyakiś cāgnisaṃkāśaṃ mumoca śaram uttamamc somadattorasi kruddhaḥ supatraṃ niśitaṃ yudhia yugapat petatur atha ghorau parighamārgaṇauc śarīre somadattasya sa papāta mahārathaḥa vyāmohite tu tanaye bāhlīkaḥ samupādravatc visṛjañ śaravarṣāṇi kālavarṣīva toyadaḥa bhīmo tha sātvatasyārthe bāhlīkaṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥc pīḍayan vai mahātmānaṃ vivyādha raṇamūrdhania prātipīyas tu saṃkruddhaḥ śaktiṃ bhīmasya vakṣasic nicakhāna mahābāhuḥ puraṃdara ivāśanima sa tayābhihato bhīmaś cakampe ca mumoha cac prāpya cetaś ca balavān gadām asmai sasarja haa sā pāṇḍavena prahitā bāhlīkasya śiro haratc sa papāta hataḥ pṛthvyāṃ vajrāhata ivādrirāṭa tasmin vinihate vīre bāhlīke puruṣarṣabhec putrās te bhyardayan bhīmaṃ daśa dāśaratheḥ samāḥd nāgadatto dṛḍharatho vīrabāhur ayobhujaḥd dṛḍhaḥ suhasto virajāḥ pramāthī cograyāyy apid tān dṛṣṭvā cukrudhe bhīmo jagṛhe bhārasādhanānd ekam ekaṃ samuddiśya pātayām āsa marmasud te viddhā vyasavaḥ petuḥ syandanebhyo hataujasaḥd caṇḍavātaprabhagnā vā parvatāgrān mahīruhāḥa nārācair daśabhir bhīmas tān nihatya tavātmajānc karṇasya dayitaṃ putraṃ vṛṣasenam avākirata tato vṛṣaratho nāma bhrātā karṇasya viśrutaḥc jaghāna bhīmaṃ nārācais tam apy abhyavadhīd balīa tataḥ sapta rathān vīraḥ syālānāṃ tava bhāratac nihatya bhīmo nārācaiḥ śatacandram apothayata amarṣayanto nihataṃ śatacandraṃ mahārathamc śakuner bhrātaro vīrā gajākṣaḥ śarabho vibhuḥd subhago bhānudattaś ca śūrāḥ pañca mahārathāḥe abhidrutya śarais tīkṣṇair bhīmasenam atāḍayana sa tudyamāno nārācair vṛṣṭivegair ivarṣabhaḥc jaghāna pañcabhir bāṇaiḥ pañcaivātibalo rathāne tān dṛṣṭvā nihatān vīrān vicelur nṛpasattamāḥa tato yudhiṣṭhiraḥ kruddhas tavānīkam aśātayatc miṣataḥ kumbhayoneś ca putrāṇāṃ ca tavānaghaa ambaṣṭhān mālavāñ śūrāṃs trigartān saśibīn apic prāhiṇon mṛtyulokāya gaṇān yuddhe yudhiṣṭhiraḥa abhīṣāhāñ śūrasenān bāhlīkān savasātikānc nikṛtya pṛthivīṃ rājā cakre śoṇitakardamāma yaudheyāraṭṭarājanyamadrakāṇāṃ gaṇān yudhic prāhiṇon mṛtyulokāya śūrān bāṇair yudhiṣṭhiraḥa hatāharata gṛhṇīta vidhyata vyavakṛntatac ity āsīt tumulaḥ śabdo yudhiṣṭhirarathaṃ pratia sainyāni drāvayantaṃ taṃ droṇo dṛṣṭvā yudhiṣṭhiramc coditas tava putreṇa sāyakair abhyavākirata droṇas tu paramakruddho vāyavyāstreṇa pārthivamc vivyādha so sya tad divyam astram astreṇa jaghnivāna tasmin vinihate cāstre bhāradvājo yudhiṣṭhirec vāruṇaṃ yāmyam āgneyaṃ tvāṣṭraṃ sāvitram eva cae cikṣepa paramakruddho jighāṃsuḥ pāṇḍunandanama kṣiptāni kṣipyamāṇāni tāni cāstrāṇi dharmajaḥc jaghānāstrair mahābāhuḥ kumbhayoner avitrasana satyāṃ cikīrṣamāṇas tu pratijñāṃ kumbhasaṃbhavaḥc prāduścakre stram aindraṃ vai prājāpatyaṃ ca bhāratae jighāṃsur dharmatanayaṃ tava putrahite rataḥa patiḥ kurūṇāṃ gajasiṃhagāmīviśālavakṣāḥ pṛthulohitākṣaḥc prāduścakārāstram ahīnatejāmāhendram anyat sa jaghāna te strea vihanyamāneṣv astreṣu droṇaḥ krodhasamanvitaḥc yudhiṣṭhiravadhaprepsur brāhmam astram udairayata tato nājñāsiṣaṃ kiṃ cid ghoreṇa tamasāvṛtec sarvabhūtāni ca paraṃ trāsaṃ jagmur mahīpatea brahmāstram udyataṃ dṛṣṭvā kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥc brahmāstreṇaiva rājendra tad astraṃ pratyavārayata tataḥ sainikamukhyās te praśaśaṃsur nararṣabhauc droṇapārthau maheṣvāsau sarvayuddhaviśāradaua tataḥ pramucya kaunteyaṃ droṇo drupadavāhinīmc vyadhamad roṣatāmrākṣo vāyavyāstreṇa bhāratad vāyavyāstreṇa vyadhamad roṣaparyākulekṣaṇaḥa te hanyamānā droṇena pāñcālāḥ prādravan bhayātc paśyato bhīmasenasya pārthasya ca mahātmanaḥa tataḥ kirīṭī bhīmaś ca sahasā saṃnyavartatāmc mahadbhyāṃ rathavaṃśābhyāṃ parigṛhya balaṃ tavaa bībhatsur dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvam uttaraṃ tu vṛkodaraḥc bhāradvājaṃ śaraughābhyāṃ mahadbhyām abhyavarṣatāma tau tadā sṛñjayāś caiva pāñcālāś ca mahaujasaḥc anvagacchan mahārāja matsyāś ca saha sātvataiḥa tataḥ sā bhāratī senā vadhyamānā kirīṭināb tamasā nidrayā caiva punar eva vyadīryatac droṇena vāryamāṇās te svayaṃ tava sutena cae nāśakyanta mahārāja yodhā vārayituṃ tadā saṃjaya uvācaa udīryamāṇaṃ tad dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavānāṃ mahad balamc aviṣahyaṃ ca manvānaḥ karṇaṃ duryodhano bravīta ayaṃ sa kālaḥ saṃprāpto mitrāṇāṃ mitravatsalac trāyasva samare karṇa sarvān yodhān mahābalaa pāñcālair matsyakaikeyaiḥ pāṇḍavaiś ca mahārathaiḥc vṛtān samantāt saṃkruddhair niḥśvasadbhir ivoragaiḥa ete nadanti saṃhṛṣṭāḥ pāṇḍavā jitakāśinaḥc śakropamāś ca bahavaḥ pāñcālānāṃ rathavrajāḥ karṇa uvācaa paritrātum iha prāpto yadi pārthaṃ puraṃdaraḥc tam apy āśu parājitya tato hantāsmi pāṇḍavama satyaṃ te pratijānāmi samāśvasihi bhāratac hantāsmi pāṇḍutanayān pāñcālāṃś ca samāgatāna jayaṃ te pratijānāmi vāsavasyeva pāvakiḥc priyaṃ tava mayā kāryam iti jīvāmi pārthivaa sarveṣām eva pārthānāṃ phalguno balavattaraḥc tasyāmoghāṃ vimokṣyāmi śaktiṃ śakravinirmitāma tasmin hate maheṣvāse bhrātaras tasya mānadac tava vaśyā bhaviṣyanti vanaṃ yāsyanti vā punaḥa mayi jīvati kauravya viṣādaṃ mā kṛthāḥ kva citc ahaṃ jeṣyāmi samare sahitān sarvapāṇḍavāna pāñcālān kekayāṃś caiva vṛṣṇīṃś cāpi samāgatānc bāṇaughaiḥ śakalīkṛtya tava dāsyāmi medinīm saṃjaya uvācaa evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ karṇaṃ tu kṛpaḥ śāradvato bravītc smayann iva mahābāhuḥ sūtaputram idaṃ vacaḥa śobhanaṃ śobhanaṃ karṇa sanāthaḥ kurupuṃgavaḥc tvayā nāthena rādheya vacasā yadi sidhyatia bahuśaḥ katthase karṇa kauravyasya samīpataḥc na tu te vikramaḥ kaś cid dṛśyate balam eva vāa samāgamaḥ pāṇḍusutair dṛṣṭas te bahuśo yudhic sarvatra nirjitaś cāsi pāṇḍavaiḥ sūtanandanaa hriyamāṇe tadā karṇa gandharvair dhṛtarāṣṭrajec tadāyudhyanta sainyāni tvam ekas tu palāyathāḥa virāṭanagare cāpi sametāḥ sarvakauravāḥc pārthena nirjitā yuddhe tvaṃ ca karṇa sahānujaḥa ekasyāpy asamarthas tvaṃ phalgunasya raṇājirec katham utsahase jetuṃ sakṛṣṇān sarvapāṇḍavāna abruvan karṇa yudhyasva bahu katthasi sūtajac anuktvā vikramed yas tu tad vai satpuruṣavratama garjitvā sūtaputra tvaṃ śāradābhram ivājalamc niṣphalo dṛśyase karṇa tac ca rājā na budhyatea tāvad garjasi rādheya yāvat pārthaṃ na paśyasic purā pārthaṃ hi te dṛṣṭvā durlabhaṃ garjitaṃ bhaveta tvam anāsādya tān bāṇān phalgunasya vigarjasic pārthasāyakaviddhasya durlabhaṃ garjitaṃ bhaveta bāhubhiḥ kṣatriyāḥ śūrā vāgbhiḥ śūrā dvijātayaḥc dhanuṣā phalgunaḥ śūraḥ karṇaḥ śūro manorathaiḥd toṣito yena rudro pi kaḥ pārthaṃ pratighātayeta evaṃ paruṣitas tena tadā śāradvatena saḥc karṇaḥ praharatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ kṛpaṃ vākyam athābravīta śūrā garjanti satataṃ prāvṛṣīva balāhakāḥc phalaṃ cāśu prayacchanti bījam uptam ṛtāv ivaa doṣam atra na paśyāmi śūrāṇāṃ raṇamūrdhanic tat tad vikatthamānānāṃ bhāraṃ codvahatāṃ mṛdhea yaṃ bhāraṃ puruṣo voḍhuṃ manasā hi vyavasyatic daivam asya dhruvaṃ tatra sāhāyyāyopapadyatea vyavasāyadvitīyo haṃ manasā bhāram udvahanc garjāmi yady ahaṃ vipra tava kiṃ tatra naśyatia vṛthā śūrā na garjanti sajalā iva toyadāḥc sāmarthyam ātmano jñātvā tato garjanti paṇḍitāḥa so ham adya raṇe yattaḥ sahitau kṛṣṇapāṇḍavauc utsahe tarasā jetuṃ tato garjāmi gautamaa paśya tvaṃ garjitasyāsya phalaṃ me vipra sānugaḥc hatvā pāṇḍusutān ājau sahakṛṣṇān sasātvatāne duryodhanāya dāsyāmi pṛthivīṃ hatakaṇṭakām kṛpa uvāca kiṃ no bahupralāpena phalam āpnuhi sūtajaa manorathapralāpo me na grāhyas tava sūtajac yadā kṣipasi vai kṛṣṇau dharmarājaṃ ca pāṇḍavama dhruvas tatra jayaḥ karṇa yatra yuddhaviśāradauc devagandharvayakṣāṇāṃ manuṣyoragarakṣasāme daṃśitānām api raṇe ajeyau kṛṣṇapāṇḍavaua brahmaṇyaḥ satyavāg dānto gurudaivatapūjakaḥc nityaṃ dharmarataś caiva kṛtāstraś ca viśeṣataḥe dhṛtimāṃś ca kṛtajñaś ca dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥa bhrātaraś cāsya balinaḥ sarvāstreṣu kṛtaśramāḥc guruvṛttiratāḥ prājñā dharmanityā yaśasvinaḥa saṃbandhinaś cendravīryāḥ svanuraktāḥ prahāriṇaḥc dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca daurmukhir janamejayaḥa candraseno bhadrasenaḥ kīrtidharmā dhruvo dharaḥc vasucandro dāmacandraḥ siṃhacandraḥ suvedhanaḥa drupadasya tathā putrā drupadaś ca mahāstravitc yeṣām arthāya saṃyatto matsyarājaḥ sahānugaḥa śatānīkaḥ sudaśanaḥ śrutānīkaḥ śrutadhvajaḥc balānīko jayānīko jayāśvo rathavāhanaḥc   jayānīko jayapriyaḥc vijayo labdhalakṣaś caa candrodayaḥ kāmaratho virāṭabhrātaraḥ śubhāḥc yamau ca draupadeyāś ca rākṣasaś ca ghaṭotkacaḥe yeṣām arthāya yudhyante na teṣāṃ vidyate kṣayaḥa kāmaṃ khalu jagat sarvaṃ sadevāsuramānavamc sayakṣarākṣasagaṇaṃ sabhūtabhujagadvipame niḥśeṣam astravīryeṇa kuryātāṃ bhīmaphalgunaua yudhiṣṭhiraś ca pṛthivīṃ nirdahed ghoracakṣuṣāc aprameyabalaḥ śaurir yeṣām arthe ca daṃśitaḥe kathaṃ tān saṃyuge karṇa jetum utsahase parāna mahān apanayas tv eṣa tava nityaṃ hi sūtajac yas tvam utsahase yoddhuṃ samare śauriṇā saha saṃjaya uvācaa evam uktas tu rādheyaḥ prahasan bharatarṣabhac abravīc ca tadā karṇo guruṃ śāradvataṃ kṛpama satyam uktaṃ tvayā brahman pāṇḍavān prati yad vacaḥc ete cānye ca bahavo guṇāḥ pāṇḍusuteṣu vaia ajayyāś ca raṇe pārthā devair api savāsavaiḥc sadaityayakṣagandharvapiśācoragarākṣasaiḥe tathāpi pārthāñ jeṣyāmi śaktyā vāsavadattayāa mamāpy amoghā datteyaṃ śaktiḥ śakreṇa vai dvijac etayā nihaniṣyāmi savyasācinam āhavea hate tu pāṇḍave kṛṣṇo bhrātaraś cāsya sodarāḥc anarjunā na śakṣyanti mahīṃ bhoktuṃ kathaṃ canad anarjunāyāṃ ca bhuvi vinaśyeyur na saṃśayaḥa teṣu naṣṭeṣu sarveṣu pṛthivīyaṃ sasāgarāc ayatnāt kauraveyasya vaśe sthāsyati gautamaa sunītair iha sarvārthāḥ sidhyante nātra saṃśayaḥc etam artham ahaṃ jñātvā tato garjāmi gautamaa tvaṃ tu vṛddhaś ca vipraś ca aśaktaś cāpi saṃyugec kṛtasnehaś ca pārtheṣu mohān mām avamanyasea yady evaṃ vakṣyase bhūyo mām apriyam iha dvijac tatas te khaḍgam udyamya jihvāṃ chetsyāmi durmatea yac cāpi pāṇḍavān vipra stotum icchasi saṃyugec bhīṣayan sarvasainyāni kauraveyāṇi durmatee atrāpi śṛṇu me vākyaṃ yathāvad gadato dvijaa duryodhanaś ca droṇaś ca śakunir durmukho jayaḥc duḥśāsano vṛṣaseno madrarājas tvam eva cae somadattaś ca bhūriś ca tathā drauṇir viviṃśatiḥa tiṣṭheyur daṃśitā yatra sarve yuddhaviśāradāḥc jayed etān raṇe ko nu śakratulyabalo py ariḥa śūrāś ca hi kṛtāstrāś ca balinaḥ svargalipsavaḥc dharmajñā yuddhakuśalā hanyur yuddhe surān apia ete sthāsyanti saṃgrāme pāṇḍavānāṃ vadhārthinaḥc jayam ākāṅkṣamāṇā hi kauraveyasya daṃśitāḥa daivāyattam ahaṃ manye jayaṃ subalinām apic yatra bhīṣmo mahābāhuḥ śete śaraśatācitaḥa vikarṇaś citrasenaś ca bāhlīko tha jayadrathaḥc bhūriśravā jayaś caiva jalasaṃdhaḥ sudakṣiṇaḥa śalaś ca rathināṃ śreṣṭho bhagadattaś ca vīryavānc ete cānye ca rājāno devair api sudurjayāḥa nihatāḥ samare śūrāḥ pāṇḍavair balavattarāḥc kim anyad daivasaṃyogān manyase puruṣādhamaa yāṃś ca tān stauṣi satataṃ duryodhanaripūn dvijac teṣām api hatāḥ śūrāḥ śataśo tha sahasraśaḥa kṣīyante sarvasainyāni kurūṇāṃ pāṇḍavaiḥ sahac prabhāvaṃ nātra paśyāmi pāṇḍavānāṃ kathaṃ canaa yāṃs tān balavato nityaṃ manyase tvaṃ dvijādhamac yatiṣye haṃ yathāśakti yoddhuṃ taiḥ saha saṃyugee duryodhanahitārthāya jayo daive pratiṣṭhitaḥ saṃjaya uvācaa tathā paruṣitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sūtaputreṇa mātulamc khaḍgam udyamya vegena drauṇir abhyapatad drutamd tataḥ paramasaṃkruddhaḥ siṃho mattam iva dvipamd prekṣataḥ kururājasya samakṣaṃ cedam abravīt aśvatthāmovāca yad arjunaguṇāṃs tathyān kīrtayānaṃ narādhama śūradveṣāt sudurbuddhe tvaṃ bhartsayasi mātulam vikatthamānaḥ śauryeṇa sarvalokadhanurbhṛtam darpotsekagṛhīto dya na kaṃ cid gaṇayan mṛdhe kva te vīryaṃ kva cāstrāṇi yat tvāṃ nirjitya saṃyuge gāṇḍīvadhanvā hatavān prekṣatas te jayadratham yena sākṣān mahādevo yodhitaḥ samare purā tam icchasi vṛthā jetuṃ sūtādhama manorathaiḥ yaṃ hi kṛṣṇena sahitaṃ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varam jetuṃ na śaktāḥ sahitāḥ sendrā api surāsurāḥ lokaikavīram ajitam arjunaṃ sūta saṃyuge kiṃ punas tvaṃ sudurbuddhe sahaibhir vasudhādhipaiḥa karṇa paśya sudurbuddhe tiṣṭhedānīṃ narādhamac eṣa te dya śiraḥ kāyād uddharāmi sudurmate saṃjaya uvācaa tam utpatantaṃ vegena rājā duryodhanaḥ svayamc nyavārayan mahārāja kṛpaś ca dvipadāṃ varaḥ karṇa uvācaa śūro yaṃ samaraślāghī durmatiś ca dvijādhamaḥc āsādayatu madvīryaṃ muñcemaṃ kurusattama aśvatthāmovācaa tavaitat kṣamyate smābhiḥ sūtātmaja sudurmatec darpam utsiktam etat te phalguno nāśayiṣyati duryodhana uvācaa aśvatthāman prasīdasva kṣantum arhasi mānadac kopaḥ khalu na kartavyaḥ sūtaputre kathaṃ canaa tvayi karṇe kṛpe droṇe madrarāje tha saubalec mahat kāryaṃ samāyattaṃ prasīda dvijasattamaa ete hy abhimukhāḥ sarve rādheyena yuyutsavaḥc āyānti pāṇḍavā brahmann āhvayantaḥ samantataḥ saṃjaya uvāca prasādyamānas tu tato rājñā drauṇir mahāmanāḥ prasasāda mahārāja krodhamanyusamanvitaḥ tataḥ kṛpa uvācedam ācāryaḥ sumahāmanāḥ saumyasvabhāvād rājendra kṣipram āgatamārdavaḥ tatas te pāṇḍavā rājan pāñcālāś ca yaśasvinaḥ ājagmuḥ sahitās tatra tarjayantaḥ punaḥ punaḥ duryodhanavacaḥ śrutvā aśvatthāmā mahābalaḥ prasādam agamad rājan sūtaputrasya mānadaa karṇo pi rathināṃ śreṣṭhaś cāpam udyamya vīryavānc kauravāgryaiḥ parivṛtaḥ śakro devagaṇair ivae paryatiṣṭhata tejasvī svabāhubalam āśritaḥa tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ karṇasya saha pāṇḍavaiḥc saṃrabdhasya mahārāja siṃhanādavināditama tatas te pāṇḍavā rājan pāñcālāś ca yaśasvinaḥc dṛṣṭvā karṇaṃ mahābāhum uccaiḥ śabdam athānadana ayaṃ karṇaḥ kutaḥ karṇas tiṣṭha karṇa mahāraṇec yudhyasva sahito smābhir durātman puruṣādhamaa anye tu dṛṣṭvā rādheyaṃ krodharaktekṣaṇābruvanc hanyatām ayam utsiktaḥ sūtaputro lpacetanaḥa sarvaiḥ pārthivaśārdūlair nānenārtho sti jīvatāc atyantavairī pārthānāṃ satataṃ pāpapūruṣaḥa eṣa mūlaṃ hy anarthānāṃ duryodhanamate sthitaḥc hatainam iti jalpantaḥ kṣatriyāḥ samupādravana mahatā śaravarṣeṇa chādayanto mahārathāḥc vadhārthaṃ sūtaputrasya pāṇḍaveyena coditāḥa tāṃs tu sarvāṃs tathā dṛṣṭvā dhāvamānān mahārathānc na vivyathe sūtaputro na ca trāsam agacchataa dṛṣṭvā nagarakalpaṃ tam uddhūtaṃ sainyasāgaramc piprīṣus tava putrāṇāṃ saṃgrāmeṣv aparājitaḥa sāyakaughena balavān kṣiprakārī mahābalaḥc vārayām āsa tat sainyaṃ samantād bharatarṣabhaa tatas tu śaravarṣeṇa pārthivās tam avārayanc dhanūṃṣi te vidhunvānāḥ śataśo tha sahasraśaḥe ayodhayanta rādheyaṃ śakraṃ daityagaṇā ivaa śaravarṣaṃ tu tat karṇaḥ pārthivaiḥ samudīritamc śaravarṣeṇa mahatā samantād vyakirat prabhoa tad yuddham abhavat teṣāṃ kṛtapratikṛtaiṣiṇāmc yathā devāsure yuddhe śakrasya saha dānavaiḥa tatrādbhutam apaśyāma sūtaputrasya lāghavamc yad enaṃ samare yattā nāpnuvanta pare yudhia nivārya ca śaraughāṃs tān pārthivānāṃ mahārathaḥc yugeṣv īṣāsu chatreṣu dhvajeṣu ca hayeṣu cae ātmanāmāṅkitān bāṇān rādheyaḥ prāhiṇoc chitāna tatas te vyākulībhūtā rājānaḥ karṇapīḍitāḥc babhramus tatra tatraiva gāvaḥ śītārditā ivaa hayānāṃ vadhyamānānāṃ gajānāṃ rathināṃ tathāc tatra tatrābhyavekṣāmaḥ saṃghān karṇena pātitāna śirobhiḥ patitai rājan bāhubhiś ca samantataḥc āstīrṇā vasudhā sarvā śūrāṇām anivartināma hataiś ca hanyamānaiś ca niṣṭanadbhiś ca sarvaśaḥc babhūvāyodhanaṃ raudraṃ vaivasvatapuropamama tato duryodhano rājā dṛṣṭvā karṇasya vikramamc aśvatthāmānam āsādya tadā vākyam uvāca haa yudhyate sau raṇe karṇo daṃśitaḥ sarvapārthivaiḥc paśyaitāṃ dravatīṃ senāṃ karṇasāyakapīḍitāme kārttikeyena vidhvastām āsurīṃ pṛtanām ivaa dṛṣṭvaitāṃ nirjitāṃ senāṃ raṇe karṇena dhīmatāc abhiyāty eṣa bībhatsuḥ sūtaputrajighāṃsayāa tad yathā paśyamānānāṃ sūtaputraṃ mahārathamc na hanyāt pāṇḍavaḥ saṃkhye tathā nītir vidhīyatāma tato drauṇiḥ kṛpaḥ śalyo hārdikyaś ca mahārathaḥc pratyudyayus tadā pārthaṃ sūtaputraparīpsayād bībhatsur api rājendra pāñcālair abhisaṃvṛtaḥa āyāntaṃ dṛśya kaunteyaṃ vṛtraṃ devacamūm ivac pratyudyayau tadā karṇo yathā śakraḥ pratāpavān dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa saṃrabdhaṃ phalgunaṃ dṛṣṭvā kālāntakayamopamamc karṇo vaikartanaḥ sūta pratyapadyat kim uttarama sa hy aspardhata pārthena nityam eva mahārathaḥc āśaṃsate ca bībhatsuṃ yuddhe jetuṃ sudāruṇea sa tu taṃ sahasā prāptaṃ nityam atyantavairiṇamc karṇo vaikartanaḥ sūta kim uttaram apadyata saṃjaya uvācaa āyāntaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ dṛṣṭvā gajaḥ pratigajaṃ yathāc asaṃbhrāntataraḥ karṇaḥ partyudīyād dhanaṃjayama tam āpatantaṃ vegena vaikartanam ajihmagaiḥc vārayām āsa tejasvī pāṇḍavaḥ śatrutāpanaḥa taṃ karṇaḥ śarajālena chādayām āsa māriṣac vivyādha ca susaṃkruddhaḥ śarais tribhir ajihmagaiḥd gāṇḍīvadhanuṣo maurvīṃ chittvācyutam atāḍayata tasya tal lāghavaṃ pārtho nāmṛṣyata mahābalaḥb tūrṇaṃ jyāṃ ca samāropya gāṇḍīve ca navāṃ dṛḍhāmc tasmai bāṇāñ śilādhautān prasannāgrān ajihmagāna prāhiṇot sūtaputrāya triṃśataṃ śatrutāpanaḥc vivyādha cainaṃ saṃrabdho bāṇenaikena vīryavāna savye bhujāgre balavān nārācena hasann ivac tasya viddhasya vegena karāc cāpaṃ papāta haa punar ādāya tac cāpaṃ nimeṣārdhān mahābalaḥc chādayām āsa bāṇaughaiḥ phalgunaṃ kṛtahastavata śaravṛṣṭiṃ tu tāṃ muktāṃ sūtaputreṇa bhāratac vyadhamac charavarṣeṇa smayann iva dhanaṃjayaḥa tau parasparam āsādya śaravarṣeṇa pārthivac chādayetāṃ maheṣvāsau kṛtapratikṛtaiṣiṇaua tad adbhutam abhūd yuddhaṃ karṇapāṇḍavayor mṛdhec kruddhayor vāśitāhetor vanyayor gajayor ivaa tataḥ pārtho maheṣvāso dṛṣṭvā karṇasya vikramamc muṣṭideśe dhanus tasya ciccheda tvarayānvitaḥa aśvāṃś ca caturo bhallair anayad yamasādanamc sāratheś ca śiraḥ kāyād aharac chatrutāpanaḥa athainaṃ chinnadhanvānaṃ hatāśvaṃ hatasārathimc vivyādha sāyakaiḥ pārthaś caturbhiḥ pāṇḍunandanaḥa hatāśvāt tu rathāt tūrṇam avaplutya nararṣabhaḥc āruroha rathaṃ tūrṇaṃ kṛpasya śarapīḍitaḥd sa nunno rjunabāṇaughair ācitaḥ śalyako yathād jīvitārtham abhiprepsuḥ kṛpasya ratham āruhata rādheyaṃ nirjitaṃ dṛṣṭvā tāvakā bharatarṣabhac dhanaṃjayaśarair nunnāḥ prādravanta diśo daśaa dravatas tān samālokya rājā duryodhano nṛpac nivartayām āsa tadā vākyaṃ cedam uvāca haa alaṃ drutena vaḥ śūrās tiṣṭhadhvaṃ kṣatriyarṣabhāḥc eṣa pārthavadhāyāhaṃ svayaṃ gacchāmi saṃyugee ahaṃ pārthān haniṣyāmi sapāñcālān sasomakāna adya me yudhyamānasya saha gāṇḍīvadhanvanāc drakṣyanti vikramaṃ pārthāḥ kālasyeva yugakṣayea adya madbāṇajālāni vimuktāni sahasraśaḥc drakṣyanti samare yodhāḥ śalabhānām ivāyatīḥa adya bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ sṛjato mama dhanvinaḥc jīmūtasyeva gharmānte drakṣyanti yudhi sainikāḥa jeṣyāmy adya raṇe pārthaṃ sāyakair nataparvabhiḥc tiṣṭhadhvaṃ samare śūrā bhayaṃ tyajata phalgunāta na hi madvīryam āsādya phalgunaḥ prasahiṣyatic yathā velāṃ samāsādya sāgaro makarālayaḥa ity uktvā prayayau rājā sainyena mahatā vṛtaḥc phalgunaṃ prati durdharṣaḥ krodhasaṃraktalocanaḥa taṃ prayāntaṃ mahābāhuṃ dṛṣṭvā śāradvatas tadāc aśvatthāmānam āsādya vākyam etad uvāca haa eṣa rājā mahābāhur amarṣī krodhamūrchitaḥc pataṃgavṛttim āsthāya phalgunaṃ yoddhum icchatia yāvan naḥ paśyamānānāṃ prāṇān pārthena saṃgataḥc na jahyāt puruṣavyāghras tāvad vāraya kauravama yāvat phalgunabāṇānāṃ gocaraṃ nādhigacchatic kauravaḥ pārthivo vīras tāvad vāraya taṃ drutama yāvat pārthaśarair ghorair nirmuktoragasaṃnibhaiḥc na bhasmīkriyate rājā tāvad yuddhān nivāryatāma ayuktam iva paśyāmi tiṣṭhatsv asmāsu mānadac svayaṃ yuddhāya yad rājā pārthaṃ yāty asahāyavāna durlabhaṃ jīvitaṃ manye kauravyasya kirīṭināc yudhyamānasya pārthena śārdūleneva hastinaḥa mātulenaivam uktas tu drauṇiḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥc duryodhanam idaṃ vākyaṃ tvaritaṃ samabhāṣataa mayi jīvati gāndhāre na yuddhaṃ gantum arhasic mām anādṛtya kauravya tava nityaṃ hitaiṣiṇama na hi te saṃbhramaḥ kāryaḥ pārthasya vijayaṃ pratic aham āvārayiṣyāmi pārthaṃ tiṣṭha suyodhana duryodhana uvācaa ācāryaḥ pāṇḍuputrān vai putravat parirakṣatic tvam apy upekṣāṃ kuruṣe teṣu nityaṃ dvijottamaa mama vā mandabhāgyatvān mandas te vikramo yudhic dharmarājapriyārthaṃ vā draupadyā vā na vidma tata dhig astu mama lubdhasya yatkṛte sarvabāndhavāḥc sukhārhāḥ paramaṃ duḥkhaṃ prāpnuvanty aparājitāḥa ko hi śastrabhṛtāṃ mukhyo maheśvarasamo yudhic śatrūn na kṣapayec chakto yo na syād gautamīsutaḥa aśvatthāman prasīdasva nāśayaitān mamāhitānc tavāstragocare śaktāḥ sthātuṃ devāpi nānaghaa pāñcālān somakāṃś caiva jahi drauṇe sahānugānc vayaṃ śeṣān haniṣyāmas tvayaiva parirakṣitāḥa ete hi somakā vipra pāñcālāś ca yaśasvinaḥc mama sainyeṣu saṃrabdhā vicaranti davāgnivata tān vāraya mahābāho kekayāṃś ca narottamac purā kurvanti niḥśeṣaṃ rakṣyamāṇāḥ kirīṭinād aśvatthāmaṃs tvarāyukto yāhi śīghram ariṃdamaa ādau vā yadi vā paścāt tavedaṃ karma māriṣac tvam utpanno mahābāho pāñcālānāṃ vadhaṃ pratia kariṣyasi jagat sarvam apāñcālaṃ kilācyutac evaṃ siddhābruvan vāco bhaviṣyati ca tat tathād tasmāt tvaṃ puruṣavyāghra pāñcālāñ jahi sānugāna na te stragocare śaktāḥ sthātuṃ devāḥ savāsavāḥc kim u pārthāḥ sapāñcālāḥ satyam etad vaco mamad na tvāṃ samarthāḥ saṃgrāme pāṇḍavāḥ saha somakaiḥd balād yodhayituṃ vīra satyam etad bravīmi ted gaccha gaccha mahābāho na naḥ kālātyayo bhavetd iyaṃ hi dravate senā pārthasāyakapīḍitād śakto hy asi mahābāho divyena svena tejasād nigrahe pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ pāñcālānāṃ ca mānada saṃjaya uvācaa duryodhanenaivam ukto drauṇir āhavadurmadaḥb cakārārivadhe yatnam indro daityavadhe yathāc pratyuvāca mahābāho yathā vadasi kauravac   tava putram idaṃ vacaḥc satyam etan mahābāhoa priyā hi pāṇḍavā nityaṃ mama cāpi pituś ca mec tathaivāvāṃ priyau teṣāṃ na tu yuddhe kurūdvahae śaktitas tāta yudhyāmas tyaktvā prāṇān abhītavata ahaṃ karṇaś ca śalyaś ca kṛpo hārdikya eva cac nimeṣāt pāṇḍavīṃ senāṃ kṣapayema nṛpottamaa te cāpi kauravīṃ senāṃ nimeṣārdhāt kurūdvahac kṣapayeyur mahābāho na syāma yadi saṃyugea yudhyatāṃ pāṇḍavāñ śaktyā teṣāṃ cāsmān yuyutsatāmc tejas tu teja āsādya praśamaṃ yāti bhārataa aśakyā tarasā jetuṃ pāṇḍavānām anīkinīc jīvatsu pāṇḍuputreṣu tad dhi satyaṃ bravīmi tea ātmārthaṃ yudhyamānās te samarthāḥ pāṇḍunandanāḥc kimarthaṃ tava sainyāni na haniṣyanti bhārataa tvaṃ hi lubdhatamo rājan nikṛtijñaś ca kauravac sarvātiśaṅkī mānī ca tato smān atiśaṅkased manye tvaṃ kutsito rājan pāpātmā pāpapūruṣaḥd anyān api sa naḥ kṣudra śaṅkase pāpabhāvitaḥa ahaṃ tu yatnam āsthāya tvadarthe tyaktajīvitaḥc eṣa gacchāmi saṃgrāmaṃ tvatkṛte kurunandanaa yotsye haṃ śatrubhiḥ sārdhaṃ jeṣyāmi ca varān varānc pāñcālaiḥ saha yotsyāmi somakaiḥ kekayais tathāe pāṇḍaveyaiś ca saṃgrāme tvatpriyārtham ariṃdamaa adya madbāṇanirdagdhāḥ pāñcālāḥ somakās tathāc siṃhenevārditā gāvo vidraviṣyanti sarvataḥa adya dharmasuto rājā dṛṣṭvā mama parākramamc aśvatthāmamayaṃ lokaṃ maṃsyate saha somakaiḥa āgamiṣyati nirvedaṃ dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥc dṛṣṭvā vinihatān saṃkhye pāñcālān somakaiḥ sahaa ye māṃ yuddhe bhiyotsyanti tān haniṣyāmi bhāratac na hi te vīra mucyeran madbāhvantaram āgatāḥa evam uktvā mahābāhuḥ putraṃ duryodhanaṃ tavac abhyavartata yuddhāya drāvayan sarvadhanvinaḥe cikīrṣus tava putrāṇāṃ priyaṃ prāṇabhṛtāṃ varaḥa tato bravīt sakaikeyān pāñcālān gautamīsutaḥc praharadhvam itaḥ sarve mama gātre mahārathāḥe sthirībhūtāś ca yudhyadhvaṃ darśayanto stralāghavama evam uktās tu te sarve śastravṛṣṭim apātayanc drauṇiṃ prati mahārāja jalaṃ jaladharā ivaa tān nihatya śarān drauṇir daśa vīrān apothayatc pramukhe pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnasya cābhibhoa te hanyamānāḥ samare pāñcālāḥ sṛñjayās tathāc parityajya raṇe drauṇiṃ vyadravanta diśo daśaa tān dṛṣṭvā dravataḥ śūrān pāñcālān sahasomakānc dhṛṣṭadyumno mahārāja drauṇim abhyadravad yudhia tataḥ kāñcanacitrāṇāṃ sajalāmbudanādināmc vṛtaḥ śatena śūrāṇāṃ rathānām anivartināma putraḥ pāñcālarājasya dhṛṣṭadyumno mahārathaḥc drauṇim ity abravīd vākyaṃ dṛṣṭvā yodhān nipātitāna ācāryaputra durbuddhe kim anyair nihatais tavac samāgaccha mayā sārdhaṃ yadi śūro si saṃyugee ahaṃ tvāṃ nihaniṣyāmi tiṣṭhedānīṃ mamāgrataḥa tatas tam ācāryasutaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ pratāpavānc marmabhidbhiḥ śarais tīkṣṇair jaghāna bharatarṣabhaa te tu paṅktīkṛtā drauṇiṃ śarā viviśur āśugāḥc rukmapuṅkhāḥ prasannāgrāḥ sarvakāyāvadāraṇāḥe madhvarthina ivoddāmā bhramarāḥ puṣpitaṃ drumama so tividdho bhṛśaṃ kruddhaḥ padākrānta ivoragaḥc mānī drauṇir asaṃbhrānto bāṇapāṇir abhāṣataa dhṛṣṭadyumna sthiro bhūtvā muhūrtaṃ pratipālayac yāvat tvāṃ niśitair bāṇaiḥ preṣayāmi yamakṣayama drauṇir evam athābhāṣya pārṣataṃ paravīrahāc chādayām āsa bāṇaughaiḥ samantāl laghuhastavata sa chādyamānaḥ samare drauṇinā yuddhadurmadaḥc drauṇiṃ pāñcālatanayo vāgbhir ātarjayat tadāa na jānīṣe pratijñāṃ me viprotpattiṃ tathaiva cac droṇaṃ hatvā kila mayā hantavyas tvaṃ sudurmatee tatas tvāhaṃ na hanmy adya droṇe jīvati saṃyugea imāṃ tu rajanīṃ prāptām aprabhātāṃ sudurmatec nihatya pitaraṃ te dya tatas tvām api saṃyugee neṣyāmi mṛtyulokāyety evaṃ me manasi sthitama yas te pārtheṣu vidveṣo yā bhaktiḥ kauraveṣu cac tāṃ darśaya sthiro bhūtvā na me jīvan vimokṣyasea yo hi brāhmaṇyam utsṛjya kṣatradharmarato dvijaḥc sa vadhyaḥ sarvalokasya yathā tvaṃ puruṣādhamaa ity uktaḥ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ pārṣatena dvijottamaḥc krodham āhārayat tīvraṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīta nirdahann iva cakṣurbhyāṃ pārṣataṃ so bhyavaikṣatac chādayām āsa ca śarair niḥśvasan pannago yathāa sa chādyamānaḥ samare drauṇinā rājasattamac sarvapāñcālasenābhiḥ saṃvṛto rathasattamaḥa nākampata mahābāhuḥ svadhairyaṃ samupāśritaḥc sāyakāṃś caiva vividhān aśvatthāmni mumoca haa tau punaḥ saṃnyavartetāṃ prāṇadyūtapare raṇec nivārayantau bāṇaughaiḥ parasparam amarṣiṇaue utsṛjantau maheṣvāsau śaravṛṣṭīḥ samantataḥa drauṇipārṣatayor yuddhaṃ ghorarūpaṃ bhayānakamc dṛṣṭvā saṃpūjayām āsuḥ siddhacāraṇavātikāḥa śaraughaiḥ pūrayantau tāv ākāśaṃ pradiśas tathāc alakṣyau samayudhyetāṃ mahat kṛtvā śarais tamaḥa nṛtyamānāv iva raṇe maṇḍalīkṛtakārmukauc parasparavadhe yattau parasparajayaiṣiṇaua ayudhyetāṃ mahābāhū citraṃ laghu ca suṣṭhu cac saṃpūjyamānau samare yodhamukhyaiḥ sahasraśaḥa tau prayuddhau raṇe dṛṣṭvā vane vanyau gajāv ivac ubhayoḥ senayor harṣas tumulaḥ samapadyataa siṃhanādaravāś cāsan dadhmuḥ śaṅkhāṃś ca māriṣac vāditrāṇy abhyavādyanta śataśo tha sahasraśaḥa tasmiṃs tu tumule yuddhe bhīrūṇāṃ bhayavardhanec muhūrtam iva tad yuddhaṃ samarūpaṃ tadābhavata tato drauṇir mahārāja pārṣatasya mahātmanaḥc dhvajaṃ dhanus tathā chatram ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathīe sūtam aśvāṃś ca caturo nihatyābhyadravad raṇea pāñcālāṃś caiva tān sarvān bāṇaiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥc vyadrāvayad ameyātmā śataśo tha sahasraśaḥa tataḥ pravivyathe senā pāṇḍavī bharatarṣabhac dṛṣṭvā drauṇer mahat karma vāsavasyeva saṃyugea śatena ca śataṃ hatvā pāñcālānāṃ mahārathaḥc tribhiś ca niśitair bāṇair hatvā trīn vai mahārathāna drauṇir drupadaputrasya phalgunasya ca paśyataḥc nāśayām āsa pāñcālān bhūyiṣṭhaṃ ye vyavasthitāḥa te vadhyamānāḥ pāñcālāḥ samare saha sṛñjayaiḥc agacchan drauṇim utsṛjya viprakīrṇarathadhvajāḥa sa jitvā samare śatrūn droṇaputro mahārathaḥc nanāda sumahānādaṃ tapānte jalado yathāa sa nihatya bahūñ śūrān aśvatthāmā vyarocatac yugānte sarvabhūtāni bhasma kṛtveva pāvakaḥa saṃpūjyamāno yudhi kauraveyairvijitya saṃkhye rigaṇān sahasraśaḥc vyarocata droṇasutaḥ pratāpavānyathā surendro rigaṇān nihatya saṃjaya uvācaa tato yudhiṣṭhiraś caiva bhīmasenaś ca pāṇḍavaḥc droṇaputraṃ mahārāja samantāt paryavārayana tato duryodhano rājā bhāradvājena saṃvṛtaḥc abhyayāt pāṇḍavān saṃkhye tato yuddham avartatae ghorarūpaṃ mahārāja bhīrūṇāṃ bhayavardhanama ambaṣṭhān mālavān vaṅgāñ śibīṃs traigartakān apic prāhiṇon mṛtyulokāya gaṇān kruddho yudhiṣṭhiraḥa abhīṣāhāñ śūrasenān kṣatriyān yuddhadurmadānc nikṛtya pṛthivīṃ cakre bhīmaḥ śoṇitakardamāma yaudheyāraṭṭarājanyān madrakāṃś ca gaṇān yudhic prāhiṇon mṛtyulokāya kirīṭī niśitaiḥ śaraiḥa pragāḍham añjogatibhir nārācair abhipīḍitāḥc nipetur dviradā bhūmau dviśṛṅgā iva parvatāḥa nikṛttair hastihastaiś ca luṭhamānais tatas tataḥc rarāja vasudhā kīrṇā visarpadbhir ivoragaiḥa kṣiptaiḥ kanakacitraiś ca nṛpacchatraiḥ kṣitir babhauc dyaur ivādityacandrādyair grahaiḥ kīrṇā yugakṣayea hata praharatābhītā vidhyata vyavakṛntatac ity āsīt tumulaḥ śabdaḥ śoṇāśvasya rathaṃ pratia droṇas tu paramakruddho vāyavyāstreṇa saṃyugec vyadhamat tān yathā vāyur meghān iva duratyayaḥa te hanyamānā droṇena pāñcālāḥ prādravan bhayātc paśyato bhīmasenasya pārthasya ca mahātmanaḥa tataḥ kirīṭī bhīmaś ca sahasā saṃnyavartatāmc mahatā rathavaṃśena parigṛhya balaṃ tavaa bībhatsur dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvam uttaraṃ tu vṛkodaraḥc bhāradvājaṃ śaraughābhyāṃ mahadbhyām abhyavarṣatāma tau tadā sṛñjayāś caiva pāñcālāś ca mahārathāḥc anvagacchan mahārāja matsyāś ca saha somakaiḥa tathaiva tava putrasya rathodārāḥ prahāriṇaḥc mahatyā senayā sārdhaṃ jagmur droṇarathaṃ pratia tataḥ sā bharatī senā vadhyamānā kirīṭināc tamasā nidrayā caiva punar eva vyadīryataa droṇena vāryamāṇās te svayaṃ tava sutena cac na śakyante mahārāja yodhā vārayituṃ tadāa sā pāṇḍuputrasya śarair dāryamāṇā mahācamūḥc tamasā saṃvṛte loke vyadravat sarvatomukhīa utsṛjya śataśo vāhāṃs tatra ke cin narādhipāḥc prādravanta mahārāja bhayāviṣṭāḥ samantataḥ saṃjaya uvācaa somadattaṃ tu saṃprekṣya vidhunvānaṃ mahad dhanuḥc sātyakiḥ prāha yantāraṃ somadattāya māṃ vahaa na hy ahatvā raṇe śatruṃ bāhlīkaṃ kauravādhamamc nivartiṣye raṇāt sūta satyam etad vaco mamaa tataḥ saṃpreṣayad yantā saindhavāṃs tān mahājavānc turaṅgamāñ śaṅkhavarṇān sarvaśabdātigān raṇea te vahan yuyudhānaṃ tu manomārutaraṃhasaḥc yathendraṃ harayo rājan purā daityavadhodyatama tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya sātvataṃ rabhasaṃ raṇec somadatto mahābāhur asaṃbhrānto bhyavartataa vimuñcañ śaravarṣāṇi parjanya iva vṛṣṭimānc chādayām āsa śaineyaṃ jalado bhāskaraṃ yathāa asaṃbhrāntaś ca samare sātyakiḥ kurupuṃgavamc chādayām āsa bāṇaughaiḥ samantād bharatarṣabhaa somadattas tu taṃ ṣaṣṭyā vivyādhorasi mādhavamc sātyakiś cāpi taṃ rājann avidhyat sāyakaiḥ śitaiḥd sātyakiḥ prativivyādha somadattaṃ śitaiḥ śaraiḥa tāv anyonyaṃ śaraiḥ kṛttau vyarājetāṃ nararṣabhauc supuṣpau puṣpasamaye puṣpitāv iva kiṃśukaua rudhirokṣitasarvāṅgau kuruvṛṣṇiyaśaskarauc parasparam avekṣetāṃ dahantāv iva locanaiḥa rathamaṇḍalamārgeṣu carantāv arimardanauc ghorarūpau hi tāv āstāṃ vṛṣṭimantāv ivāmbudaua śarasaṃbhinnagātrau tau sarvataḥ śakalīkṛtauc śvāvidhāv iva rājendra vyadṛṣyetāṃ śarakṣataua suvarṇapuṅkhair iṣubhir ācitau tau vyarocatāmc khadyotair āvṛtau rājan prāvṛṣīva vanaspatīa saṃpradīpitasarvāṅgau sāyakais tau mahārathauc adṛśyetāṃ raṇe kruddhāv ulkābhir iva kuñjaraua tato yudhi mahārāja somadatto mahārathaḥc ardhacandreṇa ciccheda mādhavasya mahad dhanuḥa athainaṃ pañcaviṃśatyā sāyakānāṃ samārpayatc tvaramāṇas tvarākāle punaś ca daśabhiḥ śaraiḥa athānyad dhanur ādāya sātyakir vegavattaramc pañcabhiḥ sāyakais tūrṇaṃ somadattam avidhyataa tato pareṇa bhallena dhvajaṃ ciccheda kāñcanamc bāhlīkasya raṇe rājan sātyakiḥ prahasann ivaa somadattas tv asaṃbhrānto dṛṣṭvā ketuṃ nipātitamc śaineyaṃ pañcaviṃśatyā sāyakānāṃ samācinota sātvato pi raṇe kruddhaḥ somadattasya dhanvinaḥc dhanuś ciccheda samare kṣurapreṇa śitena haa athainaṃ rukmapuṅkhānāṃ śatena nataparvaṇāmc ācinod bahudhā rājan bhagnadaṃṣṭram iva dvipama athānyad dhanur ādāya somadatto mahārathaḥc sātyakiṃ chādayām āsa śaravṛṣṭyā mahābalaḥa somadattaṃ tu saṃkruddho raṇe vivyādha sātyakiḥc sātyakiṃ ceṣujālena somadatto apīḍayata daśabhiḥ sātvatasyārthe bhīmo han bāhlikātmajamc somadatto py asaṃbhrāntaḥ śaineyam avadhīc charaiḥa tatas tu sātvatasyārthe bhaimasenir navaṃ dṛḍhamc mumoca parighaṃ ghoraṃ somadattasya vakṣasia tam āpatantaṃ vegena parighaṃ ghoradarśanamc dvidhā ciccheda samare prahasann iva kauravaḥa sa papāta dvidhā chinna āyasaḥ parigho mahānc mahīdharasyeva mahac chikharaṃ vajradāritama tatas tu sātyakī rājan somadattasya saṃyugec dhanuś ciccheda bhallena hastāvāpaṃ ca pañcabhiḥa caturbhis tu śarais tūrṇaṃ caturas turagottamānc samīpaṃ preṣayām āsa pretarājasya bhārataa sāratheś ca śiraḥ kāyād bhallena nataparvaṇāc jahāra rathaśārdūlaḥ prahasañ śinipuṃgavaḥa tataḥ śaraṃ mahāghoraṃ jvalantam iva pāvakamc mumoca sātvato rājan svarṇapuṅkhaṃ śilāśitama sa vimukto balavatā śaineyena śarottamaḥc ghoras tasyorasi vibho nipapātāśu bhārataa so tividdho balavatā sātvatena mahārathaḥc somadatto mahābāhur nipapāta mamāra caa taṃ dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ tatra somadattaṃ mahārathāḥb pāṇḍavāś ca mahārāja saha madraiḥ prabhadrakaiḥc mahatā śaravarṣeṇa yuyudhānam upādravana chādyamānaṃ śarair dṛṣṭvā yuyudhānaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraḥc mahatyā senayā sārdhaṃ droṇānīkam upādravata tato yudhiṣṭhiraḥ kruddhas tāvakānāṃ mahābalamc śarair vidrāvayām āsa bhāradvājasya paśyataḥa sainyāni drāvayantaṃ tu droṇo dṛṣṭvā yudhiṣṭhiramc abhidudrāva vegena krodhasaṃraktalocanaḥa tataḥ suniśitair bāṇaiḥ pārthaṃ vivyādha saptabhiḥb yudhiṣṭhiro pi saṃkruddhaḥ prativivyādha pañcabhiḥc so tividdho mahābāhuḥ sṛkkiṇī parisaṃlihane yudhiṣṭhirasya ciccheda dhvajaṃ kārmukam eva caa sa chinnadhanvā tvaritas tvarākāle nṛpottamaḥc anyad ādatta vegena kārmukaṃ samare dṛḍhama tataḥ śarasahasreṇa droṇaṃ vivyādha pārthivaḥc sāśvasūtadhvajarathaṃ tad adbhutam ivābhavata tato muhūrtaṃ vyathitaḥ śaraghātaprapīḍitaḥc niṣasāda rathopasthe droṇo bharatasattamaa pratilabhya tataḥ saṃjñāṃ muhūrtād dvijasattamaḥc krodhena mahatāviṣṭo vāyavyāstram avāsṛjata asaṃbhrāntas tataḥ pārtho dhanur ākṛṣya vīryavānc tad astram astreṇa raṇe stambhayām āsa bhāratad ciccheda ca dhanur dīrghaṃ brāhmaṇasya ca pāṇḍavaḥd athānyad dhanur ādāya droṇaḥ kṣatriyamardanaḥd tad apy asya śitair bhallaiś ciccheda kurupuṃgavaḥa tato bravīd vāsudevaḥ kuntīputraṃ yudhiṣṭhiramc yudhiṣṭhira mahābāho yat tvā vakṣyāmi tac chṛṇua upāramasva yuddhāya droṇād bharatasattamac gṛdhyate hi sadā droṇo grahaṇe tava saṃyugea nānurūpam ahaṃ manye yuddham asya tvayā sahac yo sya sṛṣṭo vināśāya sa enaṃ śvo haniṣyatia parivarjya guruṃ yāhi yatra rājā suyodhanaḥb rājā rājñā hi yoddhavyo nārājñā yuddham iṣyateb tatra tvaṃ vraja kaunteya hastyaśvarathasaṃvṛtaḥb yāvan mātreṇa ca mayā sahāyena dhanaṃjayaḥc bhīmaś ca rathaśārdūlo yudhyate kauravaiḥ sahaa vāsudevavacaḥ śrutvā dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥc muhūrtaṃ cintayitvā tu tato dāruṇam āhavama prāyād drutam amitraghno yatra bhīmo vyavasthitaḥc vinighnaṃs tāvakān yodhān vyāditāsya ivāntakaḥa rathaghoṣeṇa mahatā nādayan vasudhātalamc parjanya iva gharmānte nādayan vai diśo daśaa bhīmasya nighnataḥ śatrūn pārṣṇiṃ jagrāha pāṇḍavaḥb mahatā rathavaṃśena davāgnir iva cotthitaḥb bhīmāntikam upāyāte rājarāje yudhiṣṭhireb nivṛtte kauravān hantuṃ viṣṇuvākyapraṇoditec droṇo pi pāṇḍupāñcālān vyadhamad rajanīmukhed nādayaṃs talaghoṣeṇa tava sainyāni māriṣa saṃjaya uvācaa vartamāne tathā yuddhe ghorarūpe bhayāvahec tamasā saṃvṛte loke rajasā ca mahīpatee nāpaśyanta raṇe yodhāḥ parasparam avasthitāḥa anumānena saṃjñābhir yuddhaṃ tad vavṛte mahatc naranāgāśvamathanaṃ paramaṃ lomaharṣaṇama droṇakarṇakṛpā vīrā bhīmapārṣatasātyakāḥc anyonyaṃ kṣobhayām āsuḥ sainyāni nṛpasattamaa vadhyamānāni sainyāni samantāt tair mahārathaiḥc tamasā rajasā caiva samantād vipradudruvuḥa te sarvato vidravanto yodhā vitrastacetasaḥc ahanyanta mahārāja dhāvamānāś ca saṃyugea mahārathasahasrāṇi jaghnur anyonyam āhavec andhe tamasi mūḍhāni putrasya tava mantritea tataḥ sarvāṇi sainyāni senāgopāś ca bhāratac vyamuhyanta raṇe tatra tamasā saṃvṛte sati dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa teṣāṃ saṃloḍyamānānāṃ pāṇḍavair nihataujasāmc andhe tamasi magnānām āsīt kā vo matis tadāa kathaṃ prakāśas teṣāṃ vā mama sainyeṣu vā punaḥc babhūva loke tamasā tathā saṃjaya saṃvṛte saṃjaya uvācaa tataḥ sarvāṇi sainyāni hataśiṣṭāni yāni vaic senāgoptṝn athādiśya punar vyūham akalpayata droṇaḥ purastāj jaghane tu śalyastathā drauṇiḥ pārśvataḥ saubalaś cac svayaṃ tu sarvāṇi balāni rājanrājābhyayād gopayan vai niśāyāma uvāca sarvāṃś ca padātisaṃghānduryodhanaḥ pārthiva sāntvapūrvamc utsṛjya sarve paramāyudhānigṛhṇīta hastair jvalitān pradīpāna te coditāḥ pārthivasattamenatataḥ prahṛṣṭā jagṛhuḥ pradīpānb devarṣigandharvasurarṣisaṅghāb vidyādharāś cāpsarasāṃ gaṇāś cab nāgāḥ sayakṣoragakinnarāś cab hṛṣṭā divisthā jagṛhuḥ pradīpānb digdaivatebhyaś ca samāpatantob dṛśyanta dīpāḥ sasugandhitailāḥb viśeṣato nāradaparvatābhyāṃb saṃbodhyamānāḥ kurupāṇḍavārthamc sā bhūya eva dhvajinī vibhaktāvyarocatāgniprabhayā niśāyāma mahādhanair ābharaṇaiś ca divyaiḥśastraiḥ pradīptair
