abhisaṃpatadbhiḥb rathe rathe pañca vidīpakās tub pradīpakās tatra gaje trayaś cab pratyaśvam ekaś ca mahāpradīpaḥb kṛtās tu taiḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ kauraveyaiḥc kṣaṇena sarve vihitāḥ pradīpāvyadīpayaṃś ca dhvajinīṃ tadāśua sarvās tu senā vyatisevyamānāḥpadātibhiḥ pāvakatailahastaiḥc prakāśyamānā dadṛśur niśāyāṃyathāntarikṣe jaladās taḍidbhiḥa prakāśitāyāṃ tu tathā dhvajinyāṃdroṇo gnikalpaḥ pratapan samantātc rarāja rājendra suvarṇavarmāmadhyaṃ gataḥ sūrya ivāṃśumālīa jāmbūnadeṣv ābharaṇeṣu caivaniṣkeṣu śuddheṣu śarāvareṣuc pīteṣu śastreṣu ca pāvakasyapratiprabhās tatra tato babhūvuḥa gadāś ca śaikyāḥ parighāś ca śubhrāratheṣu śaktyaś ca vivartamānāḥc pratiprabhā raśmibhir ājamīḍhapunaḥ punaḥ saṃjanayanti dīptāḥa chatrāṇi bālavyajanānuṣaṅgādīptā maholkāś ca tathaiva rājanc vyāghūrṇamānāś ca suvarṇamālāvyāyacchatāṃ tatra tadā virejuḥa śastraprabhābhiś ca virājamānaṃdīpaprabhābhiś ca tadā balaṃ tatc prakāśitaṃ cābharaṇaprabhābhirbhṛśaṃ prakāśaṃ nṛpate babhūvaa pītāni śastrāṇy asṛgukṣitānivīrāvadhūtāni tanudruhāṇic dīptāṃ prabhāṃ prājanayanta tatratapātyaye vidyud ivāntarikṣea prakampitānām abhighātavegairabhighnatāṃ cāpatatāṃ javenac vaktrāṇy aśobhanta tadā narāṇāṃvāyvīritānīva mahāmbujānia mahāvane dāva iva pradīpteyathā prabhā bhāskarasyāpi naśyetc tathā tavāsīd dhvajinī pradīptāmahābhaye bhārata bhīmarūpāa tat saṃpradīptaṃ balam asmadīyaṃniśāmya pārthās tvaritās tathaivac sarveṣu sainyeṣu padātisaṃghānacodayaṃs te tha cakruḥ pradīpāna gaje gaje sapta kṛtāḥ pradīpārathe rathe caiva daśa pradīpāḥc dvāv aśvapṛṣṭhe paripārśvato nyedhvajeṣu cānye jaghaneṣu cānyea senāsu sarvāsu ca pārśvato nyepaścāt purastāc ca samantataś cac madhye tathānye jvalitāgnihastāḥsenādvaye pi sma narā viceruḥa sarveṣu sainyeṣu padātisaṃghāvyāmiśritā hastirathāśvavṛndaiḥc madhye tathānye jvalitāgnihastāvyadīpayan pāṇḍusutasya senāmd vyadīpayaṃs te dhvajinīṃ pradīptāṃd tathā balaṃ pāṇḍaveyābhiguptama tena pradīptena tathā pradīptaṃbalaṃ tad āsīd balavad balenac bhāḥ kurvatā bhānumatā graheṇadivākareṇāgnir ivābhitaptaḥa tayoḥ prabhāḥ pṛthivīm antarikṣaṃsarvā vyatikramya diśaś ca vṛddhāḥc tena prakāśena bhṛśaṃ prakāśaṃbabhūva teṣāṃ tava caiva sainyama tena prakāśena divaṃgamenasaṃbodhitā devagaṇāś ca rājanc gandharvayakṣāsurasiddhasaṃghāḥsamāgamann apsarasaś ca sarvāḥa tad devagandharvasamākulaṃ cayakṣāsurendrāpsarasāṃ gaṇaiś cac hataiś ca vīrair divam āruhadbhirāyodhanaṃ divyakalpaṃ babhūvaa rathāśvanāgākuladīpadīptaṃsaṃrabdhayodhāhatavidrutāśvamc mahad balaṃ vyūḍharathāśvanāgaṃsurāsuravyūhasamaṃ babhūvaa tac chaktisaṃghākulacaṇḍavātaṃmahārathābhraṃ rathavājighoṣamc śastraughavarṣaṃ rudhirāmbudhāraṃniśi pravṛttaṃ naradevayuddhama tasmin mahāgnipratimo mahātmāsaṃtāpayan pāṇḍavān vipramukhyaḥc gabhastibhir madhyagato yathārkovarṣātyaye tadvad abhūn narendra saṃjaya uvācaa prakāśite tathā loke rajasā ca tamovṛtec samājagmur atho vīrāḥ parasparavadhaiṣiṇaḥa te sametya raṇe rājañ śastraprāsāsidhāriṇaḥc parasparam udaikṣanta parasparakṛtāgasaḥa pradīpānāṃ sahasraiś ca dīpyamānaiḥ samantataḥb ratnācitaiḥ svarṇadaṇḍair gandhatailāvasecitaiḥb devagandharvadīpādyaiḥ prabhābhir adhikojjvalaiḥc virarāja tadā bhūmir dyaur grahair iva bhārataa ulkāśataiḥ prajvalitai raṇabhūmir vyarājatac dahyamāneva lokānām abhāve vai vasuṃdharāa prādīpyanta diśaḥ sarvāḥ pradīpais taiḥ samantataḥc varṣāpradoṣe khadyotair vṛtā vṛkṣā ivābabhuḥa asajjanta tato vīrā vīreṣv eva pṛthak pṛthakc nāgā nāgaiḥ samājagmus turagāḥ saha vājibhiḥa rathā rathavarair eva samājagmur mudānvitāḥc tasmin rātrimukhe ghore putrasya tava śāsanātd caturaṅgasya sainyasya saṃpātaś ca mahān abhūta tato rjuno mahārāja kauravāṇām anīkinīmc vyadhamat tvarayā yuktaḥ kṣapayan sarvapārthivān dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa tasmin praviṣṭe saṃrabdhe mama putrasya vāhinīmc amṛṣyamāṇe durdharṣe kiṃ va āsīn manas tadāa kim amanyanta sainyāni praviṣṭe śatrutāpanec duryodhanaś ca kiṃ kṛtyaṃ prāptakālam amanyataa ke cainaṃ samare vīraṃ pratyudyayur ariṃdamamb droṇaṃ ca ke vyarakṣanta praviṣṭe śvetavāhanec ke rakṣan dakṣiṇaṃ cakraṃ ke ca droṇasya savyataḥa ke pṛṣṭhato sya hy abhavan vīrā vīrasya yudhyataḥc ke purastād agacchanta nighnataḥ śātravān raṇea yat prāviśan maheṣvāsaḥ pāñcālān aparājitaḥc nṛtyann iva naravyāghro rathamārgeṣu vīryavāna dadāha ca śarair droṇaḥ pāñcālānāṃ rathavrajānc dhūmaketur iva kruddhaḥ sa kathaṃ mṛtyum īyivāna avyagrān eva hi parān kathayasy aparājitānb hṛṣṭānudīrṇān saṃgrāme na tu saṃjaya māmakānc hatāṃś caiva viṣaṇṇāṃś ca viprakīrṇāṃś ca śaṃsasie rathino virathāṃś caiva kṛtān yuddheṣu māmakān saṃjaya uvācaa droṇasya matam ājñāya yoddhukāmasya tāṃ niśāmc duryodhano mahārāja vaśyān bhrātṝn abhāṣataa vikarṇaṃ citrasenaṃ ca mahābāhuṃ ca kauravamc durdharṣaṃ dīrghabāhuṃ ca ye ca teṣāṃ padānugāḥa droṇaṃ yattāḥ parākrāntāḥ sarve rakṣata pṛṣṭhataḥc hārdikyo dakṣiṇaṃ cakraṃ śalyaś caivottaraṃ tathāa trigartānāṃ ca ye śūrā hataśiṣṭā mahārathāḥc tāṃś caiva sarvān putras te samacodayad agrataḥa ācāryo hi susaṃyatto bhṛśaṃ yattāś ca pāṇḍavāḥc taṃ rakṣata susaṃyattā nighnantaṃ śātravān raṇea droṇo hi balavān yuddhe kṣiprahastaḥ parākramīc nirjayet tridaśān yuddhe kim u pārthān sasomakāna te yūyaṃ sahitāḥ sarve bhṛśaṃ yattā mahārathāḥc droṇaṃ rakṣata pāñcālyād dhṛṣṭadyumnān mahārathāta pāṇḍaveyeṣu sainyeṣu yodhaṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ na tamc yo jayeta raṇe droṇaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnād ṛte nṛpāḥa tasya sarvātmanā manye bhāradvājasya rakṣaṇamc sa guptaḥ somakān hanyāt sṛñjayāṃś ca sarājakāna sṛñjayeṣv atha sarveṣu nihateṣu camūmukhec dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ raṇe drauṇir nāśayiṣyaty asaṃśayama tathārjunaṃ raṇe karṇo vijeṣyati mahārathaḥc bhīmasenam ahaṃ cāpi yuddhe jeṣyāmi daṃśitaḥd śeṣāṃś ca pāṇḍavān yodhāḥ prasabhaṃ hīnatejasaḥa so yaṃ mama jayo vyaktaṃ dīrghakālaṃ bhaviṣyatic tasmād rakṣata saṃgrāme droṇam eva mahārathāḥa ity uktvā bharataśreṣṭha putro duryodhanas tavac vyādideśa tataḥ sainyaṃ tasmiṃs tamasi dāruṇea tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ rātrau tad bharatarṣabhac ubhayoḥ senayor ghoraṃ vijayaṃ prati kāṅkṣiṇoḥa arjunaḥ kauravaṃ sainyam arjunaṃ cāpi kauravāḥc nānāśastrasamāvāpair anyonyaṃ paryapīḍayana drauṇiḥ pāñcālarājānaṃ bhāradvājaś ca sṛñjayānc chādayām āsatuḥ saṃkhye śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥa pāṇḍupāñcālasenānāṃ kauravāṇāṃ ca māriṣac āsīn niṣṭānako ghoro nighnatām itaretarama naivāsmābhir na pūrvair no dṛṣṭaṃ pūrvaṃ tathāvidhamc yuddhaṃ yādṛśam evāsīt tāṃ rātriṃ sumahābhayam saṃjaya uvācaa vartamāne tathā raudre rātriyuddhe viśāṃ pateb manuṣyanaranāgānām abhāvāya narādhipab yudhiṣṭhiro bravīd rājā svān yodhān manujādhipac sarvabhūtakṣayakare dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥa abravīt pāṇḍavāṃś caiva pāñcālāṃś ca sasomakānc abhyadravata gacchadhvaṃ droṇam eva jighāṃsayāa rājñas te vacanād rājan pāñcālāḥ somakās tathāc droṇam evābhyavartanta nadanto bhairavān ravāna tān vayaṃ pratigarjantaḥ pratyudyātās tv amarṣitāḥc yathāśakti yathotsāhaṃ yathāsattvaṃ ca saṃyugea kṛtavarmā ca hārdikyo yudhiṣṭhiram upādravatc droṇaṃ prati jighāṃsantaṃ matto mattam iva dvipamd dhṛṣṭadyumno mahārāja droṇam evānvapadyataa śaineyaṃ śaravarṣāṇi vikirantaṃ samantataḥc abhyayāt kauravo rājan bhūriḥ saṃgrāmamūrdhania sahadevam athāyāntaṃ droṇaprepsuṃ mahārathamc karṇo vaikartano rājan vārayām āsa pāṇḍavama bhīmasenam athāyāntaṃ vyāditāsyam ivāntakamc svayaṃ duryodhano yuddhe pratīpaṃ mṛtyum āvrajata nakulaṃ ca yudhāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sarvayuddhaviśāradamc śakuniḥ saubalo rājan vārayām āsa satvaraḥa śikhaṇḍinam athāyāntaṃ rathena rathināṃ varamc kṛpo śāradvato rājan vārayām āsa saṃyugea prativindhyam athāyāntaṃ mayūrasadṛśair hayaiḥc duḥśāsano mahārāja yatto yattam avārayata bhaimasenim athāyāntaṃ māyāśataviśāradamc aśvatthāmā pitur mānaṃ kurvāṇaḥ pratyaṣedhayata drupadaṃ vṛṣasenas tu sasainyaṃ sapadānugamc vārayām āsa samare droṇaprepsuṃ mahārathama virāṭaṃ drutam āyāntaṃ droṇasya nidhanaṃ pratic madrarājaḥ susaṃkruddho vārayām āsa bhārataa śatānīkam athāyāntaṃ nākuliṃ rabhasaṃ raṇec citraseno rurodhāśu śarair droṇavadhepsayāa arjunaṃ ca yudhāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ prādravantaṃ mahārathamc alambuso mahārāja rākṣasendro nyavārayata tathā droṇaṃ maheṣvāsaṃ nighnantaṃ śātravān raṇec dhṛṣṭadyumno tha pāñcālyo hṛṣṭarūpam avārayata tathānyān pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ samāyātān mahārathānc tāvakā rathino rājan vārayām āsur ojasāa gajārohā gajais tūrṇaṃ saṃnipatya mahāmṛdhec yodhayantaḥ sma dṛśyante śataśo tha sahasraśaḥa niśīthe turagā rājann ādravantaḥ parasparamc samadṛśyanta vegena pakṣavanta ivādrayaḥa sādinaḥ sādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ prāsaśaktyṛṣṭipāṇayaḥc samāgacchan mahārāja vinadantaḥ pṛthak pṛthaka narās tu bahavas tatra samājagmuḥ parasparamc gadābhir musalaiś caiva nānāśastraiś ca saṃghaśaḥa kṛtavarmā tu hārdikyo dharmaputraṃ yudhiṣṭhiramc vārayām āsa saṃkruddho velevodvṛttam arṇavama yudhiṣṭhiras tu hārdikyaṃ viddhvā pañcabhir āśugaiḥc punar vivyādha viṃśatyā tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīta kṛtavarmā tu saṃkruddho dharmaputrasya māriṣac dhanuś ciccheda bhallena taṃ ca vivyādha saptabhiḥa athānyad dhanur ādāya dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥc hārdikyaṃ daśabhir bāṇair bāhvor urasi cārpayata mādhavas tu raṇe viddho dharmaputreṇa māriṣac prākampata ca roṣeṇa saptabhiś cārdayac charaiḥa tasya pārtho dhanuś chittvā hastāvāpaṃ nikṛtya cac prāhiṇon niśitān bāṇān pañca rājañ śilāśitāna te tasya kavacaṃ bhittvā hemacitraṃ mahādhanamc prāviśan dharaṇīm ugrā valmīkam iva pannagāḥa akṣṇor nimeṣamātreṇa so nyad ādāya kārmukamc vivyādha pāṇḍavaṃ ṣaṣṭyā sūtaṃ ca navabhiḥ śaraiḥa tasya śaktim ameyātmā pāṇḍavo bhujagopamāmc cikṣepa bharataśreṣṭha rathe nyasya mahad dhanuḥa sā hemacitrā mahatī pāṇḍavena praveritāc nirbhidya dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ prāviśad dharaṇītalama etasminn eva kāle tu gṛhya pārthaḥ punar dhanuḥc hārdikyaṃ chādayām āsa śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥa tatas tu samare śūro vṛṣṇīnāṃ pravaro rathīc vyaśvasūtarathaṃ cakre nimeṣārdhād yudhiṣṭhirama tatas tu pāṇḍavo jyeṣṭhaḥ khaḍgacarma samādadec tad asya niśitair bāṇair vyadhaman mādhavo raṇea tomaraṃ tu tato gṛhya svarṇadaṇḍaṃ durāsadamc preṣayat samare tūrṇaṃ hārdikyasya yudhiṣṭhiraḥa tam āpatantaṃ sahasā dharmarājabhujacyutamc dvidhā ciccheda hārdikyaḥ kṛtahastaḥ smayann ivaa tataḥ śaraśatenājau dharmaputram avākiratc kavacaṃ cāsya saṃkruddhaḥ śarais tīkṣṇair adārayata hārdikyaśarasaṃchinnaṃ kavacaṃ tan mahātmanaḥc vyaśīryata raṇe rājaṃs tārājālam ivāmbarāta sa chinnadhanvā virathaḥ śīrṇavarmā śarārditaḥc apāyāsīd raṇāt tūrṇaṃ dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥa kṛtavarmā tu nirjitya dharmaputraṃ yudhiṣṭhiramc punar droṇasya jugupe cakram eva mahābalaḥ saṃjaya uvācaa bhūris tu samare rājañ śaineyaṃ rathināṃ varamc āpatantam apāsedhat prapānād iva kuñjarama athainaṃ sātyakiḥ kruddhaḥ pañcabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥc vivyādha hṛdaye tūrṇaṃ prāsravat tasya śoṇitama tathaiva kauravo yuddhe śaineyaṃ yuddhadurmadamc daśabhir viśikhais tīkṣṇair avidhyata bhujāntarea tāv anyonyaṃ mahārāja tatakṣāte śarair bhṛśamc krodhasaṃraktanayanau krodhād visphārya kārmukea tayor āsīn mahārāja śastravṛṣṭiḥ sudāruṇāc kruddhayoḥ sāyakamucor yamāntakanikāśayoḥa tāv anyonyaṃ śarai rājan pracchādya samare sthitauc muhūrtaṃ caiva tad yuddhaṃ samarūpam ivābhavata tataḥ kruddho mahārāja śaineyaḥ prahasann ivac dhanuś ciccheda samare kauravyasya mahātmanaḥa athainaṃ chinnadhanvānaṃ navabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥc vivyādha hṛdaye tūrṇaṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīta so tividdho balavatā śatruṇā śatrutāpanaḥc dhanur anyat samādāya sātvataṃ pratyavidhyataa sa viddhvā sātvataṃ bāṇais tribhir eva viśāṃ patec dhanuś ciccheda bhallena sutīkṣṇena hasann ivaa chinnadhanvā mahārāja sātyakiḥ krodhamūrchitaḥc prajahāra mahāvegāṃ śaktiṃ tasya mahorasia sa tu śaktyā vibhinnāṅgo nipapāta rathottamātc lohitāṅga ivākāśād dīptaraśmir yadṛcchayāa taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā hataṃ śūram aśvatthāmā mahārathaḥc abhyadhāvata vegena śaineyaṃ prati saṃyuged tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābhāṣya śaineyaṃ sa narādhipae abhyavarṣac charaugheṇa meruṃ vṛṣṭyā yathāmbudaḥa tam āpatantaṃ saṃrabdhaṃ śaineyasya rathaṃ pratic ghaṭotkaco bravīd rājan nādaṃ muktvā mahārathaḥa tiṣṭha tiṣṭha na me jīvan droṇaputra gamiṣyasic eṣa tvādya haniṣyāmi mahiṣaṃ skandarāḍ ivae yuddhaśraddhām ahaṃ te dya vineṣyāmi raṇājirea ity uktvā roṣatāmrākṣo rākṣasaḥ paravīrahāc drauṇim abhyadravat kruddho gajendram iva kesarīa rathākṣamātrair iṣubhir abhyavarṣad ghaṭotkacaḥc rathinām ṛṣabhaṃ drauṇiṃ dhārābhir iva toyadaḥa śaravṛṣṭiṃ tu tāṃ prāptāṃ śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥc śātayām āsa samare tarasā drauṇir utsmayana tataḥ śaraśatais tīkṣṇair marmabhedibhir āśugaiḥc samācinod rākṣasendraṃ ghaṭotkacam ariṃdamaa sa śarair ācitas tena rākṣaso raṇamūrdhanic vyakāśata mahārāja śvāvic chalalito yathāa tataḥ krodhasamāviṣṭo bhaimaseniḥ pratāpavānc śarair avacakartograir drauṇiṃ vajrāśanisvanaiḥa kṣuraprair ardhacandraiś ca nārācaiḥ saśilīmukhaiḥc varāhakarṇair nālīkais tīkṣṇaiś cāpi vikarṇibhiḥa tāṃ śastravṛṣṭim atulāṃ vajrāśanisamasvanāmc patantīm upari kruddho drauṇir avyathitendriyaḥa suduḥsahāṃ śarair ghorair divyāstrapratimantritaiḥc vyadhamat sa mahātejā mahābhrāṇīva mārutaḥa tato ntarikṣe bāṇānāṃ saṃgrāmo nya ivābhavatc ghorarūpo mahārāja yodhānāṃ harṣavardhanaḥa tato strasaṃgharṣakṛtair visphuliṅgaiḥ samantataḥc babhau niśāmukhe vyoma khadyotair iva saṃvṛtama sa mārgaṇagaṇair drauṇir diśaḥ pracchādya sarvataḥc priyārthaṃ tava putrāṇāṃ rākṣasaṃ samavākirata tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ drauṇirākṣasayor mṛdhec vigāḍhe rajanīmadhye śakraprahrādayor ivaa tato ghaṭotkaco bāṇair daśabhir drauṇim āhavec jaghānorasi saṃkruddhaḥ kālajvalanasaṃnibhaiḥa sa tair abhyāyatair viddho rākṣasena mahābalaḥc cacāla samare drauṇir vātanunna iva drumaḥe sa moham anusaṃprāpto dhvajayaṣṭiṃ samāśritaḥa tato hāhākṛtaṃ sainyaṃ tava sarvaṃ janādhipac hataṃ sma menire sarve tāvakās taṃ viśāṃ patea taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā tathāvastham aśvatthāmānam āhavec pāñcālāḥ sṛñjayāś caiva siṃhanādaṃ pracakrirea pratilabhya tataḥ saṃjñām aśvatthāmā mahābalaḥc dhanuḥ prapīḍya vāmena kareṇāmitrakarśanaḥa mumocākarṇapūrṇena dhanuṣā śaram uttamamc yamadaṇḍopamaṃ ghoram uddiśyāśu ghaṭotkacama sa bhittvā hṛdayaṃ tasya rākṣasasya śarottamaḥc viveśa vasudhām ugraḥ supuṅkhaḥ pṛthivīpatea so tividdho mahārāja rathopastha upāviśatc rākṣasendraḥ subalavān drauṇinā raṇamānināa dṛṣṭvā vimūḍhaṃ haiḍimbaṃ sārathis taṃ raṇājirātc drauṇeḥ sakāśāt saṃbhrāntas tv apaninye tvarānvitaḥa tathā tu samare viddhvā rākṣasendraṃ ghaṭotkacamc nanāda sumahānādaṃ droṇaputro mahābalaḥa pūjitas tava putraiś ca sarvayodhaiś ca bhāratac vapuṣā pratijajvāla madhyāhna iva bhāskaraḥa bhīmasenaṃ tu yudhyantaṃ bhāradvājarathaṃ pratic svayaṃ duryodhano rājā pratyavidhyac chitaiḥ śaraiḥa taṃ bhīmaseno navabhiḥ śarair vivyādha māriṣac duryodhano pi viṃśatyā śarāṇāṃ pratyavidhyataa tau sāyakair avacchannāv adṛśyetāṃ raṇājirec meghajālasamācchannau nabhasīvendubhāskaraua atha duryodhano rājā bhīmaṃ vivyādha patribhiḥc pañcabhir bharataśreṣṭha tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīta tasya bhīmo dhanuś chittvā dhvajaṃ ca navabhiḥ śaraiḥc vivyādha kauravaśreṣṭhaṃ navatyā nataparvaṇāma tato duryodhanaḥ kruddho bhīmasenasya māriṣaa   dhanur anyan mahattarama gṛhītvā bharataśreṣṭhoc cikṣepa sa śarān rājan paśyatāṃ sarvadhanvināma tān nihatya śarān bhīmo duryodhanadhanuścyutānc kauravaṃ pañcaviṃśatyā kṣudrakāṇāṃ samārpayata duryodhanas tu saṃkruddho bhīmasenasya māriṣac kṣurapreṇa dhanuś chittvā daśabhiḥ pratyavidhyataa athānyad dhanur ādāya bhīmaseno mahābalaḥc vivyādha nṛpatiṃ tūrṇaṃ saptabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥa tad apy asya dhanuḥ kṣipraṃ ciccheda laghuhastavatc dvitīyaṃ ca tṛtīyaṃ ca caturthaṃ pañcamaṃ tathāa āttam āttaṃ mahārāja bhīmasya dhanur ācchinatc tava putro mahārāja jitakāśī madotkaṭaḥa sa tadā chidyamāneṣu kārmukeṣu punaḥ punaḥc śaktiṃ cikṣepa samare sarvapāraśavīṃ śubhāmd mṛtyor iva svasāraṃ hi dīptāṃ ketuśikhām ivad sīmantam iva kurvantīṃ nabhaso gnisamaprabhāma aprāptām eva tāṃ śaktiṃ tridhā ciccheda kauravaḥc paśyataḥ sarvalokasya bhīmasya ca mahātmanaḥa tato bhīmo mahārāja gadāṃ gurvīṃ mahāprabhāmc cikṣepāvidhya vegena duryodhanarathaṃ pratia tataḥ sā sahasā vāhāṃs tava putrasya saṃyugec sārathiṃ ca gadā gurvī mamarda bharatarṣabhaa putras tu tava rājendra rathād dhemapariṣkṛtātc āplutaḥ sahasā yānaṃ nandakasya mahātmanaḥa tato bhīmo hataṃ matvā tava putraṃ mahārathamc siṃhanādaṃ mahac cakre tarjayann iva kauravāna tāvakāḥ sainikāś cāpi menire nihataṃ nṛpamc tato vicukruśuḥ sarve hā heti ca samantataḥa teṣāṃ tu ninadaṃ śrutvā trastānāṃ sarvayodhināmc bhīmasenasya nādaṃ ca śrutvā rājan mahātmanaḥa tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā hataṃ matvā suyodhanamc abhyavartata vegena yatra pārtho vṛkodaraḥa pāñcālāḥ kekayā matsyāḥ sṛñjayāś ca viśāṃ patec sarvodyogenābhijagmur droṇam eva yuyutsayāa tatrāsīt sumahad yuddhaṃ droṇasyātha paraiḥ sahac ghore tamasi magnānāṃ nighnatām itaretaram saṃjaya uvācaa sahadevam athāyāntaṃ droṇaprepsuṃ viśāṃ patec karṇo vaikartano yuddhe vārayām āsa bhārataa sahadevas tu rādheyaṃ viddhvā navabhir āśugaiḥc punar vivyādha daśabhir niśitair nataparvabhiḥa taṃ karṇaḥ prativivyādha śatena nataparvaṇāmc sajyaṃ cāsya dhanuḥ śīghraṃ ciccheda laghuhastavata tato nyad dhanur ādāya mādrīputraḥ pratāpavānc karṇaṃ vivyādha viṃśatyā tad adbhutam ivābhavata tasya karṇo hayān hatvā śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥc sārathiṃ cāsya bhallena drutaṃ ninye yamakṣayama virathaḥ sahadevas tu khaḍgaṃ carma samādadec tad apy asya śaraiḥ karṇo vyadhamat prahasann ivaa tato gurvīṃ mahāghorāṃ hemacitrāṃ mahāgadāmc preṣayām āsa samare vaikartanarathaṃ pratia tām āpatantīṃ sahasā sahadevapraveritāmc vyaṣṭambhayac charaiḥ karṇo bhūmau cainām apātayata gadāṃ vinihatāṃ dṛṣṭvā sahadevas tvarānvitaḥc śaktiṃ cikṣepa karṇāya tām apy asyācchinac charaiḥa sasaṃbhramas tatas tūrṇam avaplutya rathottamātc sahadevo mahārāja dṛṣṭvā karṇaṃ vyavasthitame rathacakraṃ tato gṛhya mumocādhirathiṃ pratia tam āpatantaṃ sahasā kālacakram ivodyatamc śarair anekasāhasrair acchinat sūtanandanaḥa tasmiṃs tu vitathe cakre kṛte tena mahātmanāb īṣādaṇḍakayoktrāṃś ca yugāni vividhāni cab hastyaṅgāni tathāśvāṃś ca mṛtāṃś ca puruṣān bahūnb cikṣepa karṇam uddiśya karṇas tān vyadhamac charaiḥb sa nirāyudham ātmānaṃ jñātvā mādravatīsutaḥc vāryamāṇaś ca viśikhaiḥ sahadevo raṇaṃ jahaua tam abhidrutya rādheyo muhūrtād bharatarṣabhac abravīt prahasan vākyaṃ sahadevaṃ viśāṃ patea mā yudhyasva raṇe vīra viśiṣṭai rathibhiḥ sahac sadṛśair yudhya mādreya vaco me mā viśaṅkithāḥa athainaṃ dhanuṣo greṇa tudan bhūyo bravīd vacaḥc eṣo rjuno raṇe yatto yudhyate kurubhiḥ sahae tatra gacchasva mādreya gṛhaṃ vā yadi manyasea evam uktvā tu taṃ karṇo rathena rathināṃ varaḥc prāyāt pāñcālapāṇḍūnāṃ sainyāni prahasann ivaa vadhaprāptaṃ tu mādreyaṃ nāvadhīt samare rihāc kuntyāḥ smṛtvā vaco rājan satyasaṃdho mahārathaḥa sahadevas tato rājan vimanāḥ śarapīḍitaḥc karṇavākśalyataptaś ca jīvitān niravidyataa āruroha rathaṃ cāpi pāñcālyasya mahātmanaḥc janamejayasya samare tvarāyukto mahārathaḥa virāṭaṃ sahasenaṃ tu droṇārthe drutam āgatamc madrarājaḥ śaraugheṇa chādayām āsa dhanvinama tayoḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ samare dṛḍhadhanvinoḥc yādṛśaṃ hy abhavad rājañ jambhavāsavayoḥ purāa madrarājo mahārāja virāṭaṃ vāhinīpatimc ājaghne tvaritaṃ tīkṣṇaiḥ śatena nataparvaṇāma prativivyādha taṃ rājā navabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥc punaś caiva trisaptatyā bhūyaś caiva śatena haa tasya madrādhipo hatvā caturo rathavājinaḥc sūtaṃ dhvajaṃ ca samare rathopasthād apātayata hatāśvāt tu rathāt tūrṇam avaplutya mahārathaḥc tasthau visphārayaṃś cāpaṃ vimuñcaṃś ca śitāñ śarāna śatānīkas tato dṛṣṭvā bhrātaraṃ hatavāhanamc rathenābhyapatat tūrṇaṃ sarvalokasya paśyataḥa śatānīkam athāyāntaṃ madrarājo mahāmṛdhec viśikhair bahubhir viddhvā tato ninye yamakṣayama tasmiṃs tu nihate vīre virāṭo rathasattamaḥc āruroha rathaṃ tūrṇaṃ tam eva dhvajamālinama tato visphārya nayane krodhād dviguṇavikramaḥc madrarājarathaṃ tūrṇaṃ chādayām āsa patribhiḥa tato madrādhipaḥ kruddhaḥ śatena nataparvaṇāmc ājaghānorasi dṛḍhaṃ virāṭaṃ vāhinīpatima so tividdho mahārāja rathopastha upāviśatc kaśmalaṃ cāviśat tīvraṃ virāṭo bharatarṣabhae sārathis tam apovāha samare śaravikṣatama tataḥ sā mahatī senā prādravan niśi bhāratac vadhyamānā śaraśataiḥ śalyenāhavaśobhināa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vidrutāṃ senāṃ vāsudevadhanaṃjayauc prāyātāṃ tatra rājendra yatra śalyo vyavasthitaḥa tau tu pratyudyayau rājan rākṣasendro hy alambusaḥc aṣṭacakrasamāyuktam āsthāya pravaraṃ rathama turaṃgamamukhair yuktaṃ piśācair ghoradarśanaiḥc lohitārdrapatākaṃ taṃ raktamālyavibhūṣitame kārṣṇāyasamayaṃ ghoram ṛkṣacarmāvṛtaṃ mahata raudreṇa citrapakṣeṇa vivṛtākṣeṇa kūjatāc dhvajenocchritatuṇḍena gṛdhrarājena rājatāa sa babhau rākṣaso rājan bhinnāñjanacayopamaḥc rurodhārjunam āyāntaṃ prabhañjanam ivādrirāṭe kiran bāṇagaṇān rājañ śataśo rjunamūrdhania atitīvram abhūd yuddhaṃ nararākṣasayor mṛdheb gṛdhrakākabalolūkakaṅkagomāyuharṣaṇamc draṣṭṝṇāṃ prītijananaṃ sarveṣāṃ bharatarṣabhad tau pragṛhya mahāvegau dhanuṣī bhīmanisvaned pracchādayetām anyonyaṃ tatakṣantau maheṣubhiḥd tatrāsīt suciraṃ kālaṃ yuddhaṃ samam ivābhavatd tataḥ pārtho maheṣvāso divyaṃ viṣphārayan dhanuḥd āpūrayan diśo bāṇair jyākṣepeṇa vinādayana tam arjunaḥ śatenaiva patriṇām abhyatāḍayatc navabhiś ca śitair bāṇaiś ciccheda dhvajam ucchritama sārathiṃ ca tribhir bāṇais tribhir eva triveṇukamc dhanur ekena ciccheda caturbhiś caturo hayāne virathasyodyataṃ khaḍgaṃ śareṇāsya dvidhācchinata athainaṃ niśitair bāṇaiś caturbhir bharatarṣabhac pārtho rdayad rākṣasendraṃ sa viddhaḥ prādravad bhayāta taṃ vijityārjunas tūrṇaṃ droṇāntikam upāyayauc kirañ śaragaṇān rājan naravāraṇavājiṣua vadhyamānā mahārāja pāṇḍavena yaśasvināc sainikā nyapatann urvyāṃ vātanunnā iva drumāḥa teṣu tūtsādyamāneṣu phalgunena mahātmanāc saṃprādravad balaṃ sarvaṃ putrāṇāṃ te viśāṃ pate saṃjaya uvācaa śatānīkaṃ śarais tūrṇaṃ nirdahantaṃ camūṃ tavac citrasenas tava suto vārayām āsa bhārataa nākuliś citrasenaṃ tu nārācenārdayad bhṛśamc sa ca taṃ prativivyādha daśabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥa citraseno mahārāja śatānīkaṃ punar yudhic navabhir niśitair bāṇair ājaghāna stanāntarea nākulis tasya viśikhair varma saṃnataparvabhiḥc gātrāt saṃcyāvayām āsa tad adbhutam ivābhavata so petavarmā putras te virarāja bhṛśaṃ nṛpac utsṛjya kāle rājendra nirmokam iva pannagaḥa tato sya niśitair bāṇair dhvajaṃ ciccheda nākuliḥc dhanuś caiva mahārāja yatamānasya saṃyugea sa chinnadhanvā samare vivarmā ca mahārathaḥc dhanur anyan mahārāja jagrāhārividāraṇama tatas tūrṇaṃ citraseno nākuliṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥc vivyādha samare kruddho bharatānāṃ mahārathaḥa śatānīko tha saṃkruddhaś citrasenasya māriṣac jaghāna caturo vāhān sārathiṃ ca narottamaḥa avaplutya rathāt tasmāc citraseno mahārathaḥc nākuliṃ pañcaviṃśatyā śarāṇām ārdayad balīa tasya tat kurvataḥ karma nakulasya suto raṇec ardhacandreṇa ciccheda cāpaṃ ratnavibhūṣitama sa chinnadhanvā viratho hatāśvo hatasārathiḥc āruroha rathaṃ tūrṇaṃ hārdikyasya mahātmanaḥa drupadaṃ tu sahānīkaṃ droṇaprepsuṃ mahārathamc vṛṣaseno bhyayāt tūrṇaṃ kirañ śaraśatais tadāa yajñasenas tu samare karṇaputraṃ mahārathamc ṣaṣṭyā śarāṇāṃ vivyādha bāhvor urasi cānaghaa vṛṣasenas tu saṃkruddho yajñasenaṃ rathe sthitamc bahubhiḥ sāyakais tīkṣṇair ājaghāna stanāntarea tāv ubhau śaranunnāṅgau śarakaṇṭakinau raṇec vyabhrājetāṃ mahārāja śvāvidhau śalalair ivaa rukmapuṅkhair ajihmāgraiḥ śaraiś chinnatanucchadauc rudhiraughapariklinnau vyabhrājetāṃ mahāmṛdhea tapanīyanibhau citrau kalpavṛkṣāv ivādbhutauc kiṃśukāv iva cotphullau vyakāśetāṃ raṇājirea vṛṣasenas tato rājan navabhir drupadaṃ śaraiḥc viddhvā vivyādha saptatyā punaś cānyais tribhiḥ śaraiḥd vṛṣasenaśarair nunno vyapayāsīn mahīpatiḥa tataḥ śarasahasrāṇi vimuñcan vibabhau tadāc karṇaputro mahārāja varṣamāṇa ivāmbudaḥd drupadas tu tataḥ kruddho vṛṣasenasya kārmukamd dvidhā ciccheda bhallena pītena niśitena cad so nyat kārmukam ādāya rukmabaddhaṃ navaṃ dṛḍhamd tūṇād ākṛṣya vimalaṃ bhallaṃ pītaṃ śitaṃ dṛḍhamd kārmuke yojayitvā taṃ drupadaṃ saṃnirīkṣya cad ākarṇapūrṇaṃ mumuce trāsayan sarvasomakānd hṛdayaṃ tasya bhittvā ca jagāma vasudhātalamd kaśmalaṃ prāviśad rājā vṛṣasenaśarāhataḥd sārathis tam apovāha smaran sārathiceṣṭitamd tasmin prabhagne rājendra pāñcālānāṃ mahārathea tatas tu drupadānīkaṃ śaraiś chinnatanucchadamc saṃprādravad raṇe rājan niśīthe bhairave satia pradīpair hi parityaktair jvaladbhis taiḥ samantataḥc vyarājata mahī rājan vītābhrā dyaur iva grahaiḥa tathāṅgadair nipatitair vyarājata vasuṃdharāc prāvṛṭkāle mahārāja vidyudbhir iva toyadaḥa tataḥ karṇasutatrastāḥ somakā vipradudruvuḥc yathendrabhayavitrastā dānavās tārakāmayea tenārdyamānāḥ samare dravamāṇāś ca somakāḥc vyarājanta mahārāja pradīpair avabhāsitāḥa tāṃs tu nirjitya samare karṇaputro vyarocatac madhyaṃdinam anuprāpto gharmāṃśur iva bhārataa teṣu rājasahasreṣu tāvakeṣu pareṣu cac eka eva jvalaṃs tasthau vṛṣasenaḥ pratāpavāna sa vijitya raṇe śūrān somakānāṃ mahārathānc jagāma tvaritas tatra yatra rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥa prativindhyam atha kruddhaṃ pradahantaṃ raṇe ripūnc duḥśāsanas tava sutaḥ pratyudgacchan mahārathaḥa tayoḥ samāgamo rājaṃś citrarūpo babhūva hac vyapetajalade vyomni budhabhārgavayor ivaa prativindhyaṃ tu samare kurvāṇaṃ karma duṣkaramb apūjayan mahārāja tava sainye mahārathāḥc duḥśāsanas tribhir bāṇair lalāṭe samavidhyataa so tividdho balavatā putreṇa tava dhanvināc virarāja mahābāhuḥ saśṛṅga iva parvataḥa duḥśāsanaṃ tu samare prativindhyo mahārathaḥc navabhiḥ sāyakair viddhvā punar vivyādha saptabhiḥa tatra bhārata putras te kṛtavān karma duṣkaramc prativindhyahayān ugraiḥ pātayām āsa yac charaiḥa sārathiṃ cāsya bhallena dhvajaṃ ca samapātayatc rathaṃ ca śataśo rājan vyadhamat tasya dhanvinaḥa patākāś ca sa tūṇīrān raśmīn yoktrāṇi cābhibhoc ciccheda tilaśaḥ kruddhaḥ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥa virathaḥ sa tu dharmātmā dhanuṣpāṇir avasthitaḥc ayodhayat tava sutaṃ kirañ śaraśatān bahūna kṣurapreṇa dhanus tasya ciccheda kṛtahastavatc athainaṃ daśabhir bhallaiś chinnadhanvānam ārdayata taṃ dṛṣṭvā virathaṃ tatra bhrātaro sya mahārathāḥc anvavartanta vegena mahatyā senayā sahaa āplutaḥ sa tato yānaṃ sutasomasya bhāsvaramc dhanur gṛhya mahārāja vivyādha tanayaṃ tavaa tatas tu tāvakāḥ sarve parivārya sutaṃ tavac abhyavartanta saṃgrāme mahatyā senayā vṛtāḥa tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tava teṣāṃ ca bhāratac niśīthe dāruṇe kāle yamarāṣṭravivardhanam saṃjaya uvācaa nakulaṃ rabhasaṃ yuddhe nighnantaṃ vāhinīṃ tavac abhyayāt saubalaḥ kruddhas tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīta kṛtavairau tu tau vīrāv anyonyavadhakāṅkṣiṇauc śaraiḥ pūrṇāyatotsṛṣṭair anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥa yathaiva saubalaḥ kṣipraṃ śaravarṣāṇi muñcatic tathaiva nakulo rājañ śikṣāṃ saṃdarśayan yudhia tāv ubhau samare śūrau śarakaṇṭakinau tadāc vyarājetāṃ mahārāja kaṇṭakair iva śālmalīa sujihmaṃ prekṣamāṇau ca rājan vivṛtalocanauc krodhasaṃraktanayanau nirdahantau parasparama syālas tu tava saṃkruddho mādrīputraṃ hasann ivac karṇinaikena vivyādha hṛdaye niśitena haa nakulas tu bhṛśaṃ viddhaḥ syālena tava dhanvināc niṣasāda rathopasthe kaśmalaṃ cainam āviśata atyantavairiṇaṃ dṛptaṃ dṛṣṭvā śatruṃ tathāgatamc nanāda śakunī rājaṃs tapānte jalado yathāa pratilabhya tataḥ saṃjñāṃ nakulaḥ pāṇḍunandanaḥc abhyayāt saubalaṃ bhūyo vyāttānana ivāntakaḥa saṃkruddhaḥ śakuniṃ ṣaṣṭyā vivyādha bharatarṣabhac punaś caiva śatenaiva nārācānāṃ stanāntarea tato sya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ muṣṭideśe sa cicchidec dhvajaṃ ca tvaritaṃ chittvā rathād bhūmāv apātayatd viśikhena ca tīkṣṇena pītena niśitena cad ūrū nirbhidya caikena nakulaḥ pāṇḍunandanaḥd śyenaṃ sapakṣaṃ vyādhena pātayām āsa taṃ tadāa so tividdho mahārāja rathopastha upāviśatb dhvajayaṣṭiṃ pariṣvajya kāminīṃ kāmuko yathāc taṃ visaṃjñaṃ nipatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā syālaṃ tavānaghae apovāha rathenāśu sārathir dhvajinīmukhāta tataḥ saṃcukruśuḥ pārthā ye ca teṣāṃ padānugāḥc nirjitya ca raṇe śatrūn nakulaḥ śatrutāpanaḥe abravīt sārathiṃ kruddho droṇānīkāya māṃ vahaa tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā mādrīputrasya dhīmataḥc prāyāt tena raṇe rājan yena droṇo nvayudhyataa śikhaṇḍinaṃ tu samare droṇaprepsuṃ viśāṃ patec kṛpaḥ śāradvato yattaḥ pratyudgacchat suvegitaḥa gautamaṃ drutam āyāntaṃ droṇāntikam ariṃdamamc vivyādha navabhir bhallaiḥ śikhaṇḍī prahasann ivaa tam ācāryo mahārāja viddhvā pañcabhir āśugaiḥc punar vivyādha viṃśatyā putrāṇāṃ priyakṛt tavaa mahad yuddhaṃ tayor āsīd ghorarūpaṃ viśāṃ patec yathā devāsure yuddhe śambarāmararājayoḥa śarajālāvṛtaṃ vyoma cakratus tau mahārathaub meghāv iva tapāpāye vīrau samaradurmadauc prakṛtyā ghorarūpaṃ tad āsīd ghorataraṃ punaḥa rātriś ca bharataśreṣṭha yodhānāṃ yuddhaśālināmc kālarātrinibhā hy āsīd ghorarūpā bhayāvahāa śikhaṇḍī tu mahārāja gautamasya mahad dhanuḥc ardhacandreṇa ciccheda sajyaṃ saviśikhaṃ tadāa tasya kruddhaḥ kṛpo rājañ śaktiṃ cikṣepa dāruṇāmc svarṇadaṇḍām akuṇṭhāgrāṃ karmāraparimārjitāma tām āpatantīṃ ciccheda śikhaṇḍī bahubhiḥ śaraiḥc sāpatan medinīṃ dīptā bhāsayantī mahāprabhāa athānyad dhanur ādāya gautamo rathināṃ varaḥc prācchādayac chitair bāṇair mahārāja śikhaṇḍinama sa chādyamānaḥ samare gautamena yaśasvināc vyaṣīdata rathopasthe śikhaṇḍī rathināṃ varaḥa sīdantaṃ cainam ālokya kṛpaḥ śāradvato yudhic ājaghne bahubhir bāṇair jighāṃsann iva bhārataa vimukhaṃ taṃ raṇe dṛṣṭvā yājñaseniṃ mahārathamc pāñcālāḥ somakāś caiva parivavruḥ samantataḥa tathaiva tava putrāś ca parivavrur dvijottamamc mahatyā senayā sārdhaṃ tato yuddham abhūt punaḥa rathānāṃ ca raṇe rājann anyonyam abhidhāvatāmc babhūva tumulaḥ śabdo meghānāṃ nadatām ivaa dravatāṃ sādināṃ caiva gajānāṃ ca viśāṃ patec anyonyam abhito rājan krūram āyodhanaṃ babhaua pattīnāṃ dravatāṃ caiva padaśabdena medinīc akampata mahārāja bhayatrasteva cāṅganāa rathā rathān samāsādya pradrutā vegavattaramc nyagṛhṇan bahavo rājañ śalabhān vāyasā ivaa tathā gajān prabhinnāṃś ca suprabhinnā mahāgajāḥc tasminn eva pade yattā nigṛhṇanti sma bhārataa sādī sādinam āsādya padātī ca padātinamc samāsādya raṇe nyonyaṃ saṃrabdhā nāticakramuḥa dhāvatāṃ dravatāṃ caiva punar āvartatām apic babhūva tatra sainyānāṃ śabdaḥ sutumulo niśia dīpyamānāḥ pradīpāś ca rathavāraṇavājiṣuc adṛśyanta mahārāja maholkā iva khāc cyutāḥa sā niśā bharataśreṣṭha pradīpair avabhāsitāc divasapratimā rājan babhūva raṇamūrdhania ādityena yathā vyāptaṃ tamo loke praṇaśyatic tathā naṣṭaṃ tamo ghoraṃ dīpair dīptair alaṃkṛtamd divaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ caiva diśaś ca pradiśas tathād rajasā tamasā vyāptā dyotitāḥ prabhayā punaḥa śastrāṇāṃ kavacānāṃ ca maṇīnāṃ ca mahātmanāmc antardadhuḥ prabhāḥ sarvā dīpais tair avabhāsitāḥa tasmin kolāhale yuddhe vartamāne niśāmukheb na ke cid vidurātmānam ayam asmīti bhāratac avadhīt samare putraṃ pitā bharatasattamaa putraś ca pitaraṃ mohāt sakhāyaṃ ca sakhā tathāc saṃbandhinaṃ ca saṃbandhī svasrīyaṃ cāpi mātulaḥa sve svān pare parāṃś cāpi nijaghnur itaretaramc nirmaryādam abhūd yuddhaṃ rātrau ghoraṃ bhayāvaham saṃjaya uvācaa tasmin sutumule yuddhe vartamāne bhayāvahec dhṛṣṭadyumno mahārāja droṇam evābhyavartataa saṃmṛjāno dhanuḥ śreṣṭhaṃ jyāṃ vikarṣan punaḥ punaḥc abhyavartata droṇasya rathaṃ rukmavibhūṣitama dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ tadāyāntaṃ droṇasyāntacikīrṣayāc parivavrur mahārāja pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ sahaa tathā parivṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā droṇam ācāryasattamamc putrās te sarvato yattā rarakṣur droṇam āhavea balārṇavau tatas tau tu sameyātāṃ niśāmukhec vātoddhūtau kṣubdhasattvau bhairavau sāgarāv ivaa tato droṇaṃ mahārāja pāñcālyaḥ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥc vivyādha hṛdaye tūrṇaṃ siṃhanādaṃ nanāda caa taṃ droṇaḥ pañcaviṃśatyā viddhvā bhārata saṃyugec cicchedānyena bhallena dhanur asya mahāprabhama dhṛṣṭadyumnas tu nirviddho droṇena bharatarṣabhac utsasarja dhanus tūrṇaṃ saṃdaśya daśanacchadama tataḥ kruddho mahārāja dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ pratāpavānc ādade nyad dhanuḥ śreṣṭhaṃ droṇasyāntacikīrṣayāa vikṛṣya ca dhanuś citram ākarṇāt paravīrahāc droṇasyāntakaraṃ ghoraṃ vyasṛjat sāyakaṃ tataḥa sa visṛṣṭo balavatā śaro ghoro mahāmṛdhec bhāsayām āsa tat sainyaṃ divākara ivoditaḥa taṃ dṛṣṭvā tu śaraṃ ghoraṃ devagandharvamānavāḥc svasty astu samare rājan droṇāyety abruvan vacaḥa taṃ tu sāyakam aprāptam ācāryasya rathaṃ pratic karṇo dvādaśadhā rājaṃś ciccheda kṛtahastavata sa chinno bahudhā rājan sūtaputreṇa māriṣac nipapāta śaras tūrṇaṃ nikṛttaḥ karṇasāyakaiḥa chittvā tu samare bāṇaṃ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥc dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ raṇe karṇo vivyādha daśabhiḥ śaraiḥa pañcabhir droṇaputras tu svayaṃ droṇaś ca saptabhiḥc śalyaś ca navabhir bāṇais tribhir duḥśāsanas tathāa duryodhanaś ca viṃśatyā śakuniś cāpi pañcabhiḥc pāñcālyaṃ tvaritāvidhyan sarva eva mahārathāḥa sa viddhaḥ saptabhir vīrair droṇatrāṇārtham āhavec sarvān asaṃbhramād rājan pratyavidhyat tribhis tribhiḥe droṇaṃ drauṇiṃ ca karṇaṃ ca vivyādha tava cātmajama te viddhvā dhanvinā tena dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ punar mṛdhec vivyadhuḥ pañcabhis tūrṇam ekaiko rathināṃ varaḥa drumasenas tu saṃkruddho rājan vivyādha patriṇāc tribhiś cānyaiḥ śarais tūrṇaṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīta sa tu taṃ prativivyādha tribhis tīkṣṇair ajihmagaiḥc svarṇapuṅkhaiḥ śilādhautaiḥ prāṇāntakaraṇair yudhia bhallenānyena tu punaḥ suvarṇojjvalakuṇḍalamc unmamātha śiraḥ kāyād drumasenasya vīryavāna tacchiro nyapatad bhūmau saṃdaṣṭauṣṭhapuṭaṃ raṇec mahāvātasamuddhūtaṃ pakvaṃ tālaphalaṃ yathād dyumatsenaṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ pratāpavānd karṇam abhyadravad rājan sāyakair bahubhiḥ śitaiḥa tāṃś ca viddhvā punar vīrān vīraḥ suniśitaiḥ śaraiḥc rādheyasyācchinad bhallaiḥ kārmukaṃ citrayodhinaḥa na tu tan mamṛṣe karṇo dhanuṣaś chedanaṃ tathāc nikartanam ivātyugro lāṅgūlasya yathā hariḥa so nyad dhanuḥ samādāya krodharaktekṣaṇaḥ śvasanc abhyavarṣac charaughais taṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ mahābalama dṛṣṭvā tu karṇaṃ saṃrabdhaṃ te vīrāḥ ṣaḍ ratharṣabhāḥc pāñcālyaputraṃ tvaritāḥ parivavrur jighāṃsayāa ṣaṇṇāṃ yodhapravīrāṇāṃ tāvakānāṃ puraskṛtamc mṛtyor āsyam anuprāptaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnam amaṃsmahia etasminn eva kāle tu dāśārho vikirañ śarānc dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ parākrāntaṃ sātyakiḥ pratyapadyataa tam āyāntaṃ maheṣvāsaṃ sātyakiṃ yuddhadurmadamc rādheyo daśabhir bāṇaiḥ pratyavidhyad ajihmagaiḥa taṃ sātyakir mahārāja vivyādha daśabhiḥ śaraiḥc paśyatāṃ sarvavīrāṇāṃ mā gās tiṣṭheti cābravīta sa sātyakes tu balinaḥ karṇasya ca mahātmanaḥc āsīt samāgamo ghoro balivāsavayor ivaa trāsayaṃs talaghoṣeṇa kṣatriyān kṣatriyarṣabhaḥc rājīvalocanaṃ karṇaṃ sātyakiḥ pratyavidhyataa kampayann iva ghoṣeṇa dhanuṣo vasudhāṃ balīc sūtaputro mahārāja sātyakiṃ pratyayodhayata vipāṭhakarṇinārācair vatsadantaiḥ kṣurair apic karṇaḥ śaraśataiś cāpi śaineyaṃ pratyavidhyataa tathaiva yuyudhāno pi vṛṣṇīnāṃ pravaro rathaḥc abhyavarṣac charaiḥ karṇaṃ tad yuddham abhavat samama tāvakāś ca mahārāja karṇaputraś ca daṃśitaḥc sātyakiṃ vivyadhus tūrṇaṃ samantān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥa astrair astrāṇi saṃvārya teṣāṃ karṇasya cābhibhoc avidhyat sātyakiḥ kruddho vṛṣasenaṃ stanāntarea tena bāṇena nirviddho vṛṣaseno viśāṃ patec nyapatat sa rathe mūḍho dhanur utsṛjya vīryavāna tataḥ karṇo hataṃ matvā vṛṣasenaṃ mahārathaḥc putraśokābhisaṃtaptaḥ sātyakiṃ pratyapīḍayata pīḍyamānas tu karṇena yuyudhāno mahārathaḥc vivyādha bahubhiḥ karṇaṃ tvaramāṇaḥ punaḥ punaḥa sa karṇaṃ daśabhir viddhvā vṛṣasenaṃ ca saptabhiḥc sahastāvāpadhanuṣī tayoś ciccheda sātvataḥa tāv anye dhanuṣī sajye kṛtvā śatrubhayaṃkarec yuyudhānam avidhyetāṃ samantān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥa vartamāne tu saṃgrāme tasmin vīravarakṣayec atīva śuśruve rājan gāṇḍīvasya mahāsvanaḥa śrutvā tu rathanirghoṣaṃ gāṇḍīvasya ca nisvanamc sūtaputro bravīd rājan duryodhanam idaṃ vacaḥa eṣa sarvāñ śibīn hatvā mukhyaśaś ca nararṣabhānc pauravāṃś ca maheṣvāsān gāṇḍīvaninado mahānc   vikṣipann uttamaṃ dhanuḥc pārthas tatraiva niyataṃa śrūyate rathaghoṣaś ca vāsavasyeva nardataḥc karoti pāṇḍavo vyaktaṃ karmaupayikam ātmanaḥa eṣā vidīryate rājan bahudhā bhāratī camūḥc viprakīrṇāny anīkāni nāvatiṣṭhanti karhi cita vāteneva samuddhūtam abhrajālaṃ vidīryatec savyasācinam āsādya bhinnā naur iva sāgarea dravatāṃ yodhamukhyānāṃ gāṇḍīvapreṣitaiḥ śaraiḥc viddhānāṃ śataśo rājañ śrūyate ninado mahāne niśīthe rājaśārdūla stanayitnor ivāmbarea hāhākāraravāṃś caiva siṃhanādāṃś ca puṣkalānc śṛṇu śabdān bahuvidhān arjunasya rathaṃ pratia ayaṃ madhye sthito smākaṃ sātyakiḥ sātvatādhamaḥc iha cel labhyate lakṣyaṃ kṛtsnāñ jeṣyāmahe parāna eṣa pāñcālarājasya putro droṇena saṃgataḥc sarvataḥ saṃvṛto yodhai rājan puruṣasattamaiḥa sātyakiṃ yadi hanyāmo dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pārṣatamc asaṃśayaṃ mahārāja dhruvo no vijayo bhaveta saubhadravad imau vīrau parivārya mahārathauc prayatāmo mahārāja nihantuṃ vṛṣṇipārṣataua savyasācī puro bhyeti droṇānīkāya bhāratac saṃsaktaṃ sātyakiṃ jñātvā bahubhiḥ kurupuṃgavaiḥa tatra gacchantu bahavaḥ pravarā rathasattamāḥc yāvat pārtho na jānāti sātyakiṃ bahubhir vṛtama te tvaradhvaṃ yathā śūrāḥ śarāṇāṃ mokṣaṇe bhṛśamc yathā tūrṇaṃ vrajaty eṣa paralokāya mādhavaḥd tathā kuru mahārāja sunītyā suprayuktayāa karṇasya matam ājñāya putras te prāha saubalamc yathendraḥ samare rājan prāha viṣṇuṃ yaśasvinama vṛtaḥ sahasrair daśabhir gajānām anivartināmc rathaiś ca daśasāhasrair vṛto yāhi dhanaṃjayama duḥśāsano durviṣahaḥ subāhur duṣpradharṣaṇaḥc ete tvām anuyāsyanti pattibhir bahubhir vṛtāḥa jahi kṛṣṇau mahābāho dharmarājaṃ ca mātulac nakulaṃ sahadevaṃ ca bhīmasenaṃ ca bhārataa devānām iva devendre jayāśā me tvayi sthitāc jahi mātula kaunteyān asurān iva pāvakiḥa evam ukto yayau pārthān putreṇa tava saubalaḥc mahatyā senayā sārdhaṃ tava putrais tathā vibhoa priyārthaṃ tava putrāṇāṃ didhakṣuḥ pāṇḍunandanānc tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tāvakānāṃ paraiḥ sahaa prayāte saubale rājan pāṇḍavānām anīkinīmc balena mahatā yuktaḥ sūtaputras tu sātvatama abhyayāt tvaritaṃ yuddhe kirañ śaraśatān bahūnc tathaiva pāṇḍavāḥ sarve sātyakiṃ paryavārayand bhāradvājas tato gatvā dhṛṣṭadyumnarathaṃ pratia mahad yuddhaṃ tadāsīt tu droṇasya niśi bhāratac dhṛṣṭadyumnena śūreṇa pāñcālaiś ca mahātmanaḥ saṃjaya uvācaa tatas te prādravan sarve tvaritā yuddhadurmadāḥc amṛṣyamāṇāḥ saṃrabdhā yuyudhānarathaṃ pratia te rathaiḥ kalpitai rājan hemarūpyavibhūṣitaiḥc sādibhiś ca gajaiś caiva parivavruḥ sma sātvatama athainaṃ koṣṭhakīkṛtya sarvatas te mahārathāḥc siṃhanādāṃs tadā cakrus tarjayantaḥ sma sātyakima te bhyavarṣañ śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ sātyakiṃ satyavikramamc tvaramāṇā mahāvīryā mādhavasya vadhaiṣiṇaḥa tān dṛṣṭvā patatas tūrṇaṃ śaineyaḥ paravīrahāc pratyagṛhṇān mahābāhuḥ pramuñcan viśikhān bahūna tatra vīro maheṣvāsaḥ sātyakir yuddhadurmadaḥc nicakarta śirāṃsy ugraiḥ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥa hastihastān hayagrīvān bāhūn api ca sāyudhānc kṣurapraiḥ pātayām āsa tāvakānāṃ sa mādhavaḥa patitaiś cāmaraiś caiva śvetacchatraiś ca bhāratac babhūva dharaṇī pūrṇā nakṣatrair dyaur iva prabhoa teṣāṃ tu yuyudhānena yudhyatāṃ yudhi bhāratac babhūva tumulaḥ śabdaḥ pretānām iva krandatāma tena śabdena mahatā pūritāsīd vasuṃdharāc rātriḥ samabhavac caiva tīvrarūpā bhayāvahāa dīryamāṇaṃ balaṃ dṛṣṭvā yuyudhānaśarāhatamc śrutvā ca vipulaṃ nādaṃ niśīthe lomaharṣaṇama sutas tavābravīd rājan sārathiṃ rathināṃ varaḥc yatraiṣa śabdas tatrāśvāṃś codayeti punaḥ punaḥa tena saṃcodyamānas tu tatas tāṃs turagottamānc sūtaḥ saṃcodayām āsa yuyudhānarathaṃ pratia tato duryodhanaḥ kruddho dṛḍhadhanvā jitaklamaḥc śīghrahastaś citrayodhī yuyudhānam upādravata tataḥ pūrṇāyatotsṛṣṭair māṃsaśoṇitabhojanaiḥc duryodhanaṃ dvādaśabhir mādhavaḥ pratyavidhyataa duryodhanas tena tathā pūrvam evārditaḥ śaraiḥc śaineyaṃ daśabhir bāṇaiḥ pratyavidhyad amarṣitaḥa tataḥ samabhavad yuddham ākulaṃ bharatarṣabhac pāñcālānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ bhāratānāṃ ca dāruṇama śaineyas tu raṇe kruddhas tava putraṃ mahārathamc sāyakānām aśītyā tu vivyādhorasi bhārataa tato sya vāhān samare śarair ninye yamakṣayamc sārathiṃ ca rathāt tūrṇaṃ pātayām āsa patriṇāa hatāśve tu rathe tiṣṭhan putras tava viśāṃ patec mumoca niśitān bāṇāñ śaineyasya rathaṃ pratia śarān pañcāśatas tāṃs tu śaineyaḥ kṛtahastavatc ciccheda samare rājan preṣitāṃs tanayena tea athāpareṇa bhallena muṣṭideśe mahad dhanuḥc ciccheda rabhaso yuddhe tava putrasya māriṣaa viratho vidhanuṣkaś ca sarvalokeśvaraḥ prabhuḥc āruroha rathaṃ tūrṇaṃ bhāsvaraṃ kṛtavarmaṇaḥa duryodhane parāvṛtte śaineyas tava vāhinīmc drāvayām āsa viśikhair niśāmadhye viśāṃ patea śakuniś cārjunaṃ rājan parivārya samantataḥc rathair anekasāhasrair gajaiś caiva sahasraśaḥe tathā hayasahasraiś ca tumulaṃ sarvato karota te mahāstrāṇi divyāni vikiranto rjunaṃ pratic arjunaṃ yodhayanti sma kṣatriyāḥ kālacoditāḥa tāny arjunaḥ sahasrāṇi rathavāraṇavājināmc pratyavārayad āyastaḥ prakurvan vipulaṃ kṣayama tatas tu samare śūraḥ śakuniḥ saubalas tadāc vivyādha niśitair bāṇair arjunaṃ prahasann ivad tato rjunam arighnaṃ taṃ vivyādha yudhi saubalaḥd roṣatāmrekṣaṇaḥ kruddho viṃśatyā sāyakair bhṛśama punaś caiva śatenāsya saṃrurodha mahārathamc tam arjunas tu viṃśatyā vivyādha yudhi bhārataa athetarān maheṣvāsāṃs tribhis tribhir avidhyatac saṃvārya tān bāṇagaṇair yudhi rājan dhanaṃjayaḥe avadhīt tāvakān yodhān vajrapāṇir ivāsurāna bhujaiś chinnair mahārāja śarīraiś ca sahasraśaḥc samāstīrṇā dharā tatra babhau puṣpair ivācitād śirobhiḥ sakirīṭaiś ca sunasaiś cārukuṇḍalaiḥd saṃdaṣṭauṣṭhapuṭaiḥ krodhāt tathaivoddhṛtalocanaiḥd niṣkacūḍāmaṇidharaiḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ priyaṃvadaiḥd paṅkajair iva vinyastaiḥ patitair vibabhau mahīd kṛtvā tat karma bībhatsur ugram ugraparākramaḥa sa viddhvā śakuniṃ bhūyaḥ pañcabhir nataparvabhiḥc ulūkaṃ tribhir ājaghne tribhir eva mahāyasaiḥd sa tu tena samāviddhaḥ krodhād dviguṇavikramaḥd śarair anekasāhasraiḥ so rjunaṃ pratyavidhyataa tam ulūkas tathā viddhvā vāsudevam atāḍayatc nanāda ca mahānādaṃ pūrayan vasudhātalama arjunas tu drutaṃ gatvā śakuner dhanur ācchinatc ninye ca caturo vāhān yamasya sadanaṃ pratia tato rathād avaplutya saubalo bharatarṣabhac ulūkasya rathaṃ tūrṇam āruroha viśāṃ patea tāv ekaratham ārūḍhau pitāputrau mahārathauc pārthaṃ siṣicatur bāṇair giriṃ meghāv ivotthitaua tau tu viddhvā mahārāja pāṇḍavo niśitaiḥ śaraiḥc vidrāvayaṃs tava camūṃ śataśo vyadhamac charaiḥa anilena yathābhrāṇi vicchinnāni samantataḥc vicchinnāni tathā rājan balāny āsan viśāṃ patea tad balaṃ bharataśreṣṭha vadhyamānaṃ tathā niśic pradudrāva diśaḥ sarvā vīkṣamāṇaṃ bhayārditama utsṛjya vāhān samare codayantas tathāparec saṃbhrāntāḥ paryadhāvanta tasmiṃs tamasi dāruṇea vijitya samare yodhāṃs tāvakān bharatarṣabhac dadhmatur muditau śaṅkhau vāsudevadhanaṃjayaua dhṛṣṭadyumno mahārāja droṇaṃ viddhvā tribhiḥ śaraiḥc ciccheda dhanuṣas tūrṇaṃ jyāṃ śareṇa śitena haa tan nidhāya dhanur nīḍe droṇaḥ kṣatriyamardanaḥc ādade nyad dhanuḥ śūro vegavat sāravattarama dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ tato droṇo viddhvā saptabhir āśugaiḥc sārathiṃ pañcabhir bāṇai rājan vivyādha saṃyugea taṃ nivārya śarais tūrṇaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumno mahārathaḥc vyadhamat kauravīṃ senāṃ śataśo tha sahasraśaḥa vadhyamāne bale tasmiṃs tava putrasya māriṣac prāvartata nadī ghorā śoṇitaughataraṅgiṇīa ubhayoḥ senayor madhye narāśvadvipavāhinīc yathā vaitaraṇī rājan yamarāṣṭrapuraṃ pratia drāvayitvā tu tat sainyaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ pratāpavānc atyarājata tejasvī śakro devagaṇeṣv ivaa atha dadhmur mahāśaṅkhān dhṛṣṭadyumnaśikhaṇḍinauc yamau ca yuyudhānaś ca pāṇḍavaś ca vṛkodaraḥd etasminn eva kāle tu sūtaputro mahārathaḥd cakāra kadanaṃ ghoraṃ pāṇḍusainyeṣu māriṣaa jitvā rathasahasrāṇi tāvakānāṃ mahārathāḥc siṃhanādaravāṃś cakruḥ pāṇḍavā jitakāśinaḥa paśyatas tava putrasya karṇasya ca madotkaṭāḥc tathā droṇasya śūrasya drauṇeś caiva viśāṃ pate saṃjaya uvācaa vidrutaṃ svabalaṃ dṛṣṭvā vadhyamānaṃ mahātmabhiḥc krodhena mahatāviṣṭaḥ putras tava viśāṃ patea abhyetya sahasā karṇaṃ droṇaṃ ca jayatāṃ varamc amarṣavaśam āpanno vākyajño vākyam abravītd tato duryodhano droṇaṃ karṇaṃ ca bharatarṣabhad codayām āsa tau tūrṇam amarṣavaśam īyatuḥa bhavadbhyām iha saṃgrāmo kruddhābhyāṃ saṃpravartitaḥc āhave nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā saindhavaṃ savyasācināa nihanyamānāṃ pāṇḍūnāṃ balena mama vāhinīmc bhūtvā tadvijaye śaktāv aśaktāv iva paśyataḥa yady ahaṃ bhavatos tyājyo na vācyo smi tadaiva hic āvāṃ pāṇḍusutān saṃkhye jeṣyāva iti mānadaua tadaivāhaṃ vacaḥ śrutvā bhavadbhyām anusaṃmatamc kṛtavān pāṇḍavaiḥ sārdhaṃ vairaṃ yodhavināśanama yadi nāhaṃ parityājyo bhavadbhyāṃ puruṣarṣabhauc yudhyetām anurūpeṇa vikrameṇa suvikramaud prastutaṃ hi mayā yuddham āśritya vipulaṃ balamd bhavadbhyāṃ pāṇḍavaiḥ sārdhaṃ tac ca sarvaṃ nirarthakama vākpratodena tau vīrau praṇunnau tanayena tec prāvartayetāṃ tau yuddhaṃ ghaṭṭitāv iva pannagaua tatas tau rathināṃ śreṣṭhau sarvalokadhanurdharauc śaineyapramukhān pārthān abhidudruvatū raṇea tathaiva sahitāḥ pārthāḥ svena sainyena saṃvṛtāḥc abhyavartanta tau vīrau nardamānau muhur muhuḥa atha droṇo maheṣvāso daśabhiḥ śinipuṃgavamc avidhyat tvaritaṃ kruddhaḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥa karṇaś ca daśabhir bāṇaiḥ putraś ca tava saptabhiḥc daśabhir vṛṣasenaś ca saubalaś cāpi saptabhiḥe ete kaurava saṃkrande śaineyaṃ paryavārayanf pāñcālān āgatān droṇaḥ preṣayad yamasādanamf etasminn eva kāle tu sūtaputro mahārathaḥf karṇo rājan maheṣvāso yuddhāya mahato mahatf manaḥ kṛtvābhyayād āśu dhṛṣṭadyumnarathaṃ pratia dṛṣṭvā ca samare droṇaṃ nighnantaṃ pāṇḍavīṃ camūmc vivyadhuḥ somakās tūrṇaṃ samantāc charavṛṣṭibhiḥa tato droṇo harat prāṇān kṣatriyāṇāṃ viśāṃ patec raśmibhir bhāskaro rājaṃs tamasām iva bhārataa droṇena vadhyamānānāṃ pāñcālānāṃ viśāṃ patec śuśruve tumulaḥ śabdaḥ krośatām itaretarama putrān anye pitṝn anye bhrātṝn anye ca mātulānc bhāgineyān vayasyāṃś ca tathā saṃbandhibāndhavāne utsṛjyotsṛjya gacchanti tvaritā jīvitepsavaḥa apare mohitā mohāt tam evābhimukhā yayuḥc pāṇḍavānāṃ raṇe yodhāḥ paralokaṃ tathāparea sā tathā pāṇḍavī senā vadhyamānā mahātmabhiḥc niśi saṃprādravad rājann utsṛjyolkāḥ sahasraśaḥa paśyato bhīmasenasya vijayasyācyutasya cac yamayor dharmaputrasya pārṣatasya ca paśyataḥa tamasā saṃvṛte loke na prājñāyata kiṃ canac kauravāṇāṃ prakāśena dṛśyante tu drutāḥ parea dravamāṇaṃ tu tat sainyaṃ droṇakarṇau mahārathauc jaghnatuḥ pṛṣṭhato rājan kirantau sāyakān bahūna pāñcāleṣu prabhagneṣu dīryamāṇeṣu sarvaśaḥc janārdano dīnamanāḥ pratyabhāṣata phalgunama droṇakarṇau maheṣvāsāv etau pārṣatasātyakīc pāñcālāṃś caiva sahitau jaghnatuḥ sāyakair bhṛśama etayoḥ śaravarṣeṇa prabhagnā no mahārathāḥc vāryamāṇāpi kaunteya pṛtanā nāvatiṣṭhated tāṃ tu vidravatīṃ dṛṣṭvā ūcatuḥ keśavārjunaud mā vidravata vitrastā bhayaṃ tyajata pāṇḍavāḥa etāv āvāṃ sarvasainyair vyūḍhaiḥ samyag udāyudhaiḥc droṇaṃ ca sūtaputraṃ ca prayatāvaḥ prabādhituma etau hi balinau śūrau kṛtāstrau jitakāśinauc upekṣitau balaṃ kruddhau nāśayetāṃ niśām imāmd tayoḥ saṃvadator evaṃ bhīmakarmā mahābalaḥe eṣa bhīmo bhiyāty ugraḥ punar āvartya vāhinīma vṛkodaraṃ tathāyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra janārdanaḥc punar evābravīd rājan harṣayann iva pāṇḍavama eṣa bhīmo raṇaślāghī vṛtaḥ somakapāṇḍavaiḥc ruṣito bhyeti vegena droṇakarṇau mahābalaua etena sahito yudhya pāñcālaiś ca mahārathaiḥc āśvāsanārthaṃ sarveṣāṃ sainyānāṃ pāṇḍunandanaa tatas tau puruṣavyāghrāv ubhau mādhavapāṇḍavauc droṇakarṇau samāsādya dhiṣṭhitau raṇamūrdhania tatas tat punar āvṛttaṃ yudhiṣṭhirabalaṃ mahatc tato droṇaś ca karṇaś ca parān mamṛdatur yudhia sa saṃprahāras tumulo niśi pratyabhavan mahānc yathā sāgarayo rājaṃś candrodayavivṛddhayoḥa tata utsṛjya pāṇibhyaḥ pradīpāṃs tava vāhinīc yuyudhe pāṇḍavaiḥ sārdham unmattavad ahaḥkṣayea rajasā tamasā caiva saṃvṛte bhṛśadāruṇec kevalaṃ nāmagotreṇa prāyudhyanta jayaiṣiṇaḥa aśrūyanta hi nāmāni śrāvyamāṇāni pārthivaiḥc praharadbhir mahārāja svayaṃvara ivāhavea niḥśabdam āsīt sahasā punaḥ śabdo mahān abhūtc kruddhānāṃ yudhyamānānāṃ jayatāṃ jīyatām apia yatra yatra sma dṛśyante pradīpāḥ kurusattamac tatra tatra sma te śūrā nipatanti pataṃgavata tathā saṃyudhyamānānāṃ vigāḍhābhūn mahāniśāc pāṇḍavānāṃ ca rājendra kauravāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ saṃjaya uvācaa tataḥ karṇo raṇe dṛṣṭvā pārṣataṃ paravīrahāc ājaghānorasi śarair daśabhir marmabhedibhiḥa prativivyādha taṃ tūrṇaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumno pi māriṣac pañcabhiḥ sāyakair hṛṣṭas tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīta tāv anyonyaṃ śaraiḥ saṃkhye saṃchādya sumahārathauc punaḥ pūrṇāyatotsṛṣṭair vivyadhāte parasparama tataḥ pāñcālamukhyasya dhṛṣṭadyumnasya saṃyugec sārathiṃ caturaś cāśvān karṇo vivyādha sāyakaiḥa kārmukapravaraṃ cāsya praciccheda śitaiḥ śaraiḥc sārathiṃ cāsya bhallena rathanīḍād apātayata dhṛṣṭadyumnas tu viratho hatāśvo hatasārathiḥb avaplutya rathāt tūrṇaṃ gadām ādāya vīryavānb sa vidhyamānaḥ karṇena śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥb gatvā karṇasamīpaṃ tu jaghāna caturo hayānb punar āvṛtya vegena pārṣataḥ paravīrahāb dhanaṃjayarathaṃ kṣipram āruhya rathināṃ varaḥb prayātu kāmaḥ karṇāya vārito dharmasūnunāb karṇas tu sumahātejāḥ siṃhanādavimiśritamb dhanuḥśabdaṃ mahac cakre dadhmau tāreṇa cāmbujamb dṛṣṭvā vinirjitaṃ yuddhe pārṣataṃ te mahārathāḥb amarṣavaśam āpannāḥ pāñcālāḥ saha somakaiḥb sutaputravadhārthāya śastrāṇy ādāya sarvaśaḥb prayayuḥ karṇam uddiśya mṛtyuṃ kṛtvā nivartanamc gṛhītvā parighaṃ ghoraṃ karṇasyāśvān apīpiṣata viddhaś ca bahubhis tena śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥc tato yudhiṣṭhirānīkaṃ padbhyām evānvavartatae āruroha rathaṃ cāpi sahadevasya māriṣaa karṇasyāpi rathe vāhān anyān sūto nyayojayatc śaṅkhavarṇān mahāvegān saindhavān sādhuvāhinaḥa labdhalakṣyas tu rādheyaḥ pāñcālānāṃ mahārathānc abhyapīḍayad āyastaḥ śarair megha ivācalāna sā pīḍyamānā karṇena pāñcālānāṃ mahācamūḥc saṃprādravat susaṃtrastā siṃhenevārditā mṛgīa patitās turagebhyaś ca gajebhyaś ca mahītalec rathebhyaś ca narās tūrṇam adṛśyanta tatas tataḥd etasminn eva kāle tu sūtaputro mahārathaḥd cakāra kadanaṃ ghoraṃ pāṇḍusainyeṣu bhārataa dhāvamānasya yodhasya kṣurapraiḥ sa mahāmṛdhec bāhū ciccheda vai karṇaḥ śiraś caiva sakuṇḍalama ūrū ciccheda cānyasya gajasthasya viśāṃ patec vājipṛṣṭhagatasyāpi bhūmiṣṭhasya ca māriṣaa nājñāsiṣur dhāvamānā bahavaś ca mahārathāḥc saṃchinnāny ātmagātrāṇi vāhanāni ca saṃyugea te vadhyamānāḥ samare pāñcālāḥ sṛñjayaiḥ sahac tṛṇapraspandanāc cāpi sūtaputraṃ sma menirea api svaṃ samare yodhaṃ dhāvamānaṃ vicetasaḥc karṇam evābhyamanyanta tato bhītā dravanti tea tāny anīkāni bhagnāni dravamāṇāni bhāratac abhyadravad drutaṃ karṇaḥ pṛṣṭhato vikirañ śarāna avekṣamāṇās te nyonyaṃ susaṃmūḍhā vicetasaḥc nāśaknuvann avasthātuṃ kālyamānā mahātmanāa karṇenābhyāhatā rājan pāñcālāḥ parameṣubhiḥc droṇena ca diśaḥ sarvā vīkṣamāṇāḥ pradudruvuḥa tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā svasainyaṃ prekṣya vidrutamc apayāne matiṃ kṛtvā phalgunaṃ vākyam abravīta paśya karṇaṃ maheṣvāsaṃ dhanuṣpāṇim avasthitamc niśīthe dāruṇe kāle tapantam iva bhāskarama karṇasāyakanunnānāṃ krośatām eṣa nisvanaḥc aniśaṃ śrūyate pārtha tvadbandhūnām anāthavata yathā visṛjataś cāsya saṃdadhānasya cāśugānc paśyāmi jayavikrāntaṃ kṣapayiṣyati no dhruvama yad atrānantaraṃ kāryaṃ prāptakālaṃ prapaśyasic karṇasya vadhasaṃyuktaṃ tat kuruṣva dhanaṃjayaa evam ukto mahābāhuḥ pārthaḥ kṛṣṇam athābravītc bhītaḥ kuntīsuto rājā rādheyasyātivikramāta evaṃ gate prāptakālaṃ karṇānīke punaḥ punaḥc bhavān vyavasyatāṃ kṣipraṃ dravate hi varūthinīa droṇasāyakanunnānāṃ bhagnānāṃ madhusūdanac karṇena trāsyamānānām avasthānaṃ na vidyatea paśyāmi ca tathā karṇaṃ vicarantam abhītavatc dravamāṇān rathodārān kirantaṃ viśikhaiḥ śitaiḥa naitad asyotsahe soḍhuṃ caritaṃ raṇamūrdhanic pratyakṣaṃ vṛṣṇiśārdūla pādasparśam ivoragaḥa sa bhavān atra yātvāśu yatra karṇo mahārathaḥc aham enaṃ vadhiṣyāmi māṃ vaiṣa madhusūdana vāsudeva uvācaa paśyāmi karṇaṃ kaunteya devarājam ivāhavec vicarantaṃ naravyāghram atimānuṣavikramama naitasyānyo sti samare pratyudyātā dhanaṃjayac ṛte tvāṃ puruṣavyāghra rākṣasād vā ghaṭotkacāta na tu tāvad ahaṃ manye prāptakālaṃ tavānaghac samāgamaṃ mahābāho sūtaputreṇa saṃyugea dīpyamānā maholkeva tiṣṭhaty asya hi vāsavīc tvadarthaṃ hi mahābāho raudrarūpaṃ bibharti cac   sūtaputreṇa saṃyugec rakṣyate śaktir eṣā hia ghaṭotkacas tu rādheyaṃ pratyudyātu mahābalaḥc sa hi bhīmena balinā jātaḥ suraparākramaḥa tasminn astrāṇi divyāni rākṣasāny āsurāṇi cac satataṃ cānurakto vo hitaiṣī ca ghaṭotkacaḥe vijeṣyati raṇe karṇam iti me nātra saṃśayaḥ saṃjaya uvācaa evam uktvā mahābāhuḥ pārthaṃ puṣkaralocanaḥc ājuhāvātha tad rakṣaḥ tac cāsīt prādur agrataḥa kavacī sa śarī khaḍgī sadhanvā ca viśāṃ patec abhivādya tataḥ kṛṣṇaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ ca dhanaṃjayame abravīt taṃ tadā hṛṣṭas tv ayam asmy anuśādhi māma tatas śaraughair abhisaṃvṛtama sa tu karṇasya tad divyam astram astreṇa śātayanc māyāyuddhena māyāvī sūtaputram ayodhayata so yodhayat tadā karṇaṃ māyayā lāghavena cac alakṣyamāṇo tha divi śarajāleṣu saṃpatana bhaimasenir mahāmāyo māyayā kurusattamac pracakāra mahāmāyāṃ mohayann iva bhārataa sa sma kṛtvā virūpāṇi vadanāny aśubhānanaḥc agrasat sūtaputrasya divyāny astrāṇi māyayāa punaś cāpi mahākāyaḥ saṃchinnaḥ śatadhā raṇec gatasattvo nirutsāhaḥ patitaḥ khād vyadṛśyatae hataṃ taṃ manyamānāḥ sma prāṇadan kurupuṃgavāḥa atha dehair navair anyair dikṣu sarvāsv adṛśyatac punaś cāpi mahākāyaḥ śataśīrṣaḥ śatodaraḥa vyadṛśyata mahābāhur maināka iva parvataḥc aṅguṣṭhamātro bhūtvā ca punar eva sa rākṣasaḥe sāgarormir ivoddhūtas tiryag ūrdhvam avartataa vasudhāṃ dārayitvā ca punar apsu nyamajjatac adṛśyata tadā tatra punar unmajjito nyataḥa so vatīrya punas tasthau rathe hemapariṣkṛtec kṣitiṃ dyāṃ ca diśaś caiva māyayāvṛtya daṃśitaḥa gatvā karṇarathābhyāśaṃ vicalat kuṇḍalānanaḥc prāha vākyam asaṃbhrāntaḥ sūtaputraṃ viśāṃ patea tiṣṭhedānīṃ na me jīvan sūtaputra gamiṣyasic yuddhaśraddhām ahaṃ te dya vineṣyāmi raṇājirea ity uktvā roṣatāmrākṣaṃ rakṣaḥ krūraparākramamc utpapātāntarikṣaṃ ca jahāsa ca suvisvarame karṇam abhyāhanac caiva gajendram iva kesarīa rathākṣamātrair iṣubhir abhyavarṣad ghaṭotkacaḥc rathinām ṛṣabhaṃ karṇaṃ dhārābhir iva toyadaḥe śaravṛṣṭiṃ ca tāṃ karṇo dūraprāptām aśātayata dṛṣṭvā ca vihatāṃ māyāṃ karṇena bharatarṣabhac ghaṭotkacas tato māyāṃ sasarjāntarhitaḥ punaḥa so bhavad girir ity uccaḥ śikharais tarusaṃkaṭaiḥc śūlaprāsāsimusalajalaprasravaṇo mahāna tam añjanacayaprakhyaṃ karṇo dṛṣṭvā mahīdharamc prapātair āyudhāny ugrāṇy udvahantaṃ na cukṣubhea smayann iva tataḥ karṇo divyam astram udīrayatc tataḥ so streṇa śailendro vikṣipto vai vyanaśyataa tataḥ sa toyado bhūtvā nīlaḥ sendrāyudho divic aśmavṛṣṭibhir atyugraḥ sūtaputram avākirata atha saṃdhāya vāyavyam astram astravidāṃ varaḥc vyadhamat kālameghaṃ taṃ karṇo vaikartano vṛṣāa sa mārgaṇagaṇaiḥ karṇo diśaḥ pracchādya sarvaśaḥc jaghānāstraṃ mahārāja ghaṭotkacasamīritama tataḥ prahasya samare bhaimasenir mahābalaḥc prāduścakre mahāmāyāṃ karṇaṃ prati mahārathama sa dṛṣṭvā punar āyāntaṃ rathena rathināṃ varamc ghaṭotkacam asaṃbhrāntaṃ rākṣasair bahubhir vṛtama siṃhaśārdūlasadṛśair mattadviradavikramaiḥc gajasthaiś ca rathasthaiś ca vājipṛṣṭhagatais tathāa nānāśastradharair ghorair nānākavacabhūṣaṇaiḥc vṛtaṃ ghaṭotkacaṃ krūrair marudbhir iva vāsavame dṛṣṭvā karṇo maheṣvāso yodhayām āsa rākṣasama ghaṭotkacas tataḥ karṇaṃ viddhvā pañcabhir āśugaiḥc nanāda bhairavaṃ nādaṃ bhīṣayan sarvapārthivāna bhūyaś cāñjalikenātha samārgaṇagaṇaṃ mahatc karṇahastasthitaṃ cāpaṃ cicchedāśu ghaṭotkacaḥa athānyad dhanur ādāya dṛḍhaṃ bhārasahaṃ mahatc vyakarṣata balāt karṇa indrāyudham ivocchritama tataḥ karṇo mahārāja preṣayām āsa sāyakānc suvarṇapuṅkhāñ śatrughnān khacarān rākṣasān pratia tad bāṇair arditaṃ yūthaṃ rakṣasāṃ pīnavakṣasāmc siṃhenevārditaṃ vanyaṃ gajānām ākulaṃ kulamd nihatya rākṣasān karṇaḥ punar haiḍimbam ardayatd tat tu dṛṣṭvā mahat karma rādheyasya mahātmanaḥd krodhenābhiprajajvāla bhaimasenir ghaṭotkacaḥa vidhamya rākṣasān bāṇaiḥ sāśvasūtagajān vibhuḥc dadāha bhagavān vahnir bhūtānīva yugakṣayed tataḥ karṇo mahārāja rākṣasān vyadhamac charaiḥd sa sma kṛtvā virūpāṇi vyāttāni vadanāni cad rādheyasyācchinad bāṇair astrāṇi vividhāni cad chādayām āsa ca śarair dhārābhir iva parvatamd gandharvanagarākāraṃ punar antaradhīyataa sa hatvā rākṣasīṃ senāṃ śuśubhe sūtanandanaḥc pureva tripuraṃ dagdhvā divi devo maheśvaraḥa teṣu rājasahasreṣu pāṇḍaveyeṣu māriṣac nainaṃ nirīkṣitum api kaś cic chaknoti pārthivaa ṛte ghaṭotkacād rājan rākṣasendrān mahābalātc bhīmavīryabalopetāt kruddhād vaivasvatād ivaa tasya kruddhasya netrābhyāṃ pāvakaḥ samajāyatac maholkābhyāṃ yathā rājan sārciṣaḥ snehabindavaḥa talaṃ talena saṃhatya saṃdaśya daśanacchadamc ratham āsthāya ca punar māyayā nirmitaṃ punaḥa yuktaṃ gajanibhair vāhaiḥ piśācavadanaiḥ kharaiḥc sa sūtam abravīt kruddhaḥ sūtaputrāya mā vahaa sa yayau ghorarūpeṇa rathena rathināṃ varaḥc dvairathaṃ sūtaputreṇa punar eva viśāṃ patea sa cikṣepa punaḥ kruddhaḥ sūtaputrāya rākṣasaḥc aṣṭacakrāṃ mahāghorām aśaniṃ rudranirmitāmd dviyojanasamutsedhāṃ yojanāyām avistarāmd āyasīṃ nicitāṃ śūlaiḥ kadambam iva kesaraiḥa tām avaplutya jagrāha karṇo nyasya rathe dhanuḥc cikṣepa caināṃ tasyaiva syandanāt so vapupluvea sāśvasūtadhvajaṃ yānaṃ bhasma kṛtvā mahāprabhāc viveśa vasudhāṃ bhittvā surās tatra visismiyuḥa karṇaṃ tu sarvabhūtāni pūjayām āsur añjasāc yad avaplutya jagrāha devasṛṣṭāṃ mahāśanima evaṃ kṛtvā raṇe karṇa āruroha rathaṃ punaḥc tato mumoca nārācān sūtaputraḥ paraṃtapaḥa aśakyaṃ kartum anyena sarvabhūteṣu mānadac yad akārṣīt tadā karṇaḥ saṃgrāme bhīmadarśanea sa hanyamāno nārācair dhārābhir iva parvataḥc gandharvanagarākāraḥ punar antaradhīyataa evaṃ sa vai mahāmāyo māyayā lāghavena cac astrāṇi tāni divyāni jaghāna ripusūdanaḥa nihanyamāneṣv astreṣu māyayā tena rakṣasāc asaṃbhrāntas tataḥ karṇas tad rakṣaḥ pratyayudhyataa tataḥ kruddho mahārāja bhaimasenir mahābalaḥc cakāra bahudhātmānaṃ bhīṣayāṇo narādhipāna tato digbhyaḥ samāpetuḥ siṃhavyāghratarakṣavaḥc agnijihvāś ca bhujagā vihagāś cāpy ayomukhāḥa sa kīryamāṇo niśitaiḥ karṇacāpacyutaiḥ śaraiḥc nagarādrivanaprakhyas tatraivāntaradhīyataa rākṣasāś ca piśācāś ca yātudhānāḥ śalāvṛkāḥb śālāvṛkāś ca bahavo vṛkāś ca vikṛtānanāḥc te karṇaṃ bhakṣayiṣyantaḥ sarvataḥ samupādravane athainaṃ vāgbhir ugrābhis trāsayāṃ cakrire tadāa udyatair bahubhir ghorair āyudhaiḥ śoṇitokṣitaiḥc teṣām anekair ekaikaṃ karṇo vivyādha cāśugaiḥa pratihatya tu tāṃ māyāṃ divyenāstreṇa rākṣasīmc ājaghāna hayān asya śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥa te bhagnā vikṛtāṅgāś ca chinnapṛṣṭhāś ca sāyakaiḥc vasudhām anvapadyanta paśyatas tasya rakṣasaḥa sa bhagnamāyo haiḍimbaḥ karṇaṃ vaikartanaṃ tataḥc eṣa te vidadhe mṛtyum ity uktvāntaradhīyata saṃjaya uvācaa tasmiṃs tathā vartamāne karṇarākṣasayor mṛdhec alāyudho rākṣasendro vīryavān abhyavartataa mahatyā senayā yuktaḥ suyodhanam upāgamatc rākṣasānāṃ virūpāṇāṃ sahasraiḥ parivāritaḥe nānārūpadharair vīraiḥ pūrvavairam anusmarana tasya jñātir hi vikrānto brāhmaṇādo bako hataḥc kirmīraś ca mahātejā hiḍimbaś ca sakhā tathāa sa dīrghakālādhyuṣitaṃ pūrvavairam anusmaranc vijñāyaitan niśāyuddhaṃ jighāṃsur bhīmam āhavea sa matta iva mātaṅgaḥ saṃkruddha iva coragaḥc duryodhanam idaṃ vākyam abravīd yuddhalālasaḥa viditaṃ te mahārāja yathā bhīmena rākṣasāḥc hiḍimbabakakirmīrā nihatā mama bāndhavāḥa parāmarśaś ca kanyāyā hiḍimbāyāḥ kṛtaḥ purāc kim anyad rākṣasān anyān asmāṃś ca paribhūya haa tam ahaṃ sagaṇaṃ rājan savājirathakuñjaramc haiḍimbaṃ ca sahāmātyaṃ hantum abhyāgataḥ svayama adya kuntīsutān sarvān vāsudevapurogamānc hatvā saṃbhakṣayiṣyāmi sarvair anucaraiḥ sahae nivāraya balaṃ sarvaṃ vayaṃ yotsyāma pāṇḍavānf tad ahaṃ sagaṇān rājan saṃyotsyāmi ca pāṇḍavāna tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā hṛṣṭo duryodhanas tadāc pratipūjyābravīd vākyaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ parivāritaḥa tvāṃ puraskṛtya sagaṇaṃ vayaṃ yotsyāmahe parānc na hi vairāntamanasaḥ sthāsyanti mama sainikāḥa evam astv iti rājānam uktvā rākṣasapuṃgavaḥc abhyayāt tvarito bhīmaṃ sahitaḥ puruṣāśanaiḥa dīpyamānena vapuṣā rathenādityavarcasāc tādṛśenaiva rājendra yādṛśena ghaṭotkacaḥa tasyāpy atulanirghoṣo bahutoraṇacitritaḥc ṛkṣacarmāvanaddhāṅgo nalvamātro mahārathaḥa tasyāpi turagāḥ śīghrā hastikāyāḥ kharasvanāḥc śataṃ yuktā mahākāyā māṃsaśoṇitabhojanāḥa tasyāpi rathanirghoṣo mahāmegharavopamaḥc tasyāpi sumahac cāpaṃ dṛḍhajyaṃ balavattarama tasyāpy akṣasamā bāṇā rukmapuṅkhāḥ śilāśitāḥc so pi vīro mahābāhur yathaiva sa ghaṭotkacaḥa tasyāpi gomāyubaḍābhiguptobabhūva ketur jvalanārkatulyaḥc sa cāpi rūpeṇa ghaṭotkacasyaśrīmattamo vyākuladīpitāsyaḥa dīptāṅgado dīptakirīṭamālībaddhasraguṣṇīṣanibaddhakhaḍgaḥc gadī bhuśuṇḍī musalī halī caśarāsanī vāraṇatulyavarṣmāa rathena tenānalavarcasā cavidrāvayan pāṇḍavavāhinīṃ tāmc rarāja saṃkhye parivartamānovidyunmālī megha ivāntarikṣea te cāpi sarve pravarā narendrāmahābalā varmiṇaś carmiṇaś cac harṣānvitā yuyudhus tatra rājansamantataḥ pāṇḍavayodhavīrāḥ saṃjaya uvācaa tam āgatam abhiprekṣya bhīmakarmāṇam āhavec harṣam āhārayāṃ cakruḥ kuravaḥ sarva eva tea tathaiva tava putrās te duryodhanapurogamāḥc aplavāḥ plavam āsādya tartukāmā ivārṇavama punarjātam ivātmānaṃ manvānāḥ pārthivās tadāc alāyudhaṃ rākṣasendraṃ svāgatenābhyapūjayana tasmiṃs tv amānuṣe yuddhe vartamāne bhayāvahec karṇarākṣasayor naktaṃ dāruṇapratidarśaned na drauṇir na kṛpo droṇo na śalyo na ca mādhavaḥd eka eva tu tenāsīd yoddhā karṇo raṇe vṛṣāa upapraikṣanta pāñcālāḥ smayamānāḥ sarājakāḥc tathaiva tāvakā rājan ghūrṇamānās tatas tataḥa cukruśur nedam astīti droṇadrauṇikṛpādayaḥc tat karma dṛṣṭvā saṃbhrāntā haiḍimbasya raṇājirea sarvam āvignam abhavad dhāhābhūtam acetanamc tava sainyaṃ mahārāja nirāśaṃ karṇajīvitea duryodhanas tu saṃprekṣya karṇam ārtiṃ parāṃ gatamc alāyudhaṃ rākṣasendram āhūyedam athābravīta eṣa vaikartanaḥ karṇo haiḍimbena samāgataḥc kurute karma sumahad yad asyaupayikaṃ mṛdhea paśyaitān pārthivāñ śūrān nihatān bhaimasenināc nānāśastrair abhihatān pādapān iva dantināa tavaiṣa bhāgaḥ samare rājamadhye mayā kṛtaḥc tavaivānumate vīra taṃ vikramya nibarhayaa purā vaikartanaṃ karṇam eṣa pāpo ghaṭotkacaḥc māyābalam upāśritya karśayaty arikarśanaḥa evam uktaḥ sa rājñā tu rākṣasas tīvravikramaḥc tathety uktvā mahābāhur ghaṭotkacam upādravata tataḥ karṇaṃ samutsṛjya bhaimasenir api prabhoc pratyamitram upāyāntaṃ mardayām āsa mārgaṇaiḥa tayoḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ kruddhayo rākṣasendrayoḥc mattayor vāśitāhetor dvipayor iva kānanea rakṣasā vipramuktas tu karṇo pi rathināṃ varaḥc abhyadravad bhīmasenaṃ rathenādityavarcasāa tam āyāntam anādṛtya dṛṣṭvā grastaṃ ghaṭotkacamc alāyudhena samare siṃheneva gavāṃ patima rathenādityavapuṣā bhīmaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥc kirañ śaraughān prayayāv alāyudharathaṃ pratia tam āyāntam abhiprekṣya sa tadālāyudhaḥ prabhoc ghaṭotkacaṃ samutsṛjya bhīmasenaṃ samāhvayata taṃ bhīmaḥ sahasābhyetya rākṣasāntakaraḥ prabhoc sagaṇaṃ rākṣasendraṃ taṃ śaravarṣair avākirata tathaivālāyudho rājañ śilādhautair ajihmagaiḥc abhyavarṣata kaunteyaṃ punaḥ punar ariṃdamaḥa tathā te rākṣasāḥ sarve bhīmasenam upādravanc nānāpraharaṇā bhīmās tvatsutānāṃ jayaiṣiṇaḥa sa tāḍyamāno balibhir bhīmaseno mahābalaḥc pañcabhiḥ pañcabhiḥ sarvāṃs tān avidhyac chitaiḥ śaraiḥa te vadhyamānā bhīmena rākṣasāḥ kharayonayaḥc vinedus tumulān nādān dudruvuś ca diśo daśaa tāṃs trāsyamānān bhīmena dṛṣṭvā rakṣo mahābalamc abhidudrāva vegena śaraiś cainam avākirata taṃ bhīmasenaḥ samare tīkṣṇāgrair akṣiṇoc charaiḥc alāyudhas tu tān astān bhīmena viśikhān raṇee ciccheda kāṃś cit samare tvarayā kāṃś cid agrahīta sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasendraṃ bhīmo bhīmaparākramaḥc gadāṃ cikṣepa vegena vajrapātopamāṃ tadāa tām āpatantīṃ vegena gadāṃ jvālākulāṃ tataḥc gadayā tāḍayām āsa sā gadā bhīmam āvrajata sa rākṣasendraṃ kaunteyaḥ śaravarṣair avākiratc tān apy asyākaron moghān rākṣaso niśitaiḥ śaraiḥa te cāpi rākṣasāḥ sarve sainikā bhīmarūpiṇaḥc śāsanād rākṣasendrasya nijaghnū rathakuñjarāna pāñcālāḥ sṛñjayāś caiva vājinaḥ paramadvipāḥc na śāntiṃ lebhire tatra rakṣasair bhṛśapīḍitāḥa taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā mahāghoraṃ vartamānaṃ mahāhavec abravīt puruṣaśreṣṭho dhanaṃjayam idaṃ vacaḥa paśya bhīmaṃ mahābāho rākṣasendravaśaṃ gatamc padavīm asya gaccha tvaṃ mā vicāraya pāṇḍavaa dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca yudhāmanyūttamaujasauc sahitā draupadeyāś ca karṇaṃ yāntu mahārathāḥa nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca yuyudhānaś ca vīryavānc itarān rākṣasān ghnantu śāsanāt tava pāṇḍavaa tvam apīmāṃ mahābāho camūṃ droṇapuraskṛtāmc vārayasva naravyāghra mahad dhi bhayam āgatama evam ukte tu kṛṣṇena yathoddiṣṭā mahārathāḥc jagmur vaikartanaṃ karṇaṃ rākṣasāṃś cetarān raṇea atha pūrṇāyatotsṛṣṭaiḥ śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥc dhanuś ciccheda bhīmasya rākṣasendraḥ pratāpavāna hayāṃś cāsya śitair bāṇaiḥ sārathiṃ ca mahābalaḥc jaghāna miṣataḥ saṃkhye bhīmasenasya bhārataa so vatīrya rathopasthād dhatāśvo hatasārathiḥc tasmai gurvīṃ gadāṃ ghorāṃ sa vinadyotsasarja haa tatas tāṃ bhīmanirghoṣām āpatantīṃ mahāgadāmc gadayā rākṣaso ghoro nijaghāna nanāda caa tad dṛṣṭvā rākṣasendrasya ghoraṃ karma bhayāvahamc bhīmasenaḥ prahṛṣṭātmā gadām āśu parāmṛśata tayoḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ nararakṣasoḥc gadānipātasaṃhrādair bhuvaṃ kampayator bhṛśama gadāvimuktau tau bhūyaḥ samāsādyetaretaramc muṣṭibhir vajrasaṃhrādair anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥa rathacakrair yugair akṣair adhiṣṭhānair upaskaraiḥc yathāsannam upādāya nijaghnatur amarṣaṇaua tau vikṣarantau rudhiraṃ samāsādyetaretaramc mattāv iva mahānāgāv akṛṣyetāṃ punaḥ punaḥa tam apaśyad dhṛṣīkeśaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ hite rataḥc sa bhīmasenarakṣārthaṃ haiḍimbaṃ pratyacodayat saṃjaya uvācaa saṃprekṣya samare bhīmaṃ rākṣasendram alāyudhamc jahi kṣipraṃ mahābāho paścāt karṇaṃ vadhiṣyasia sa vārṣṇeyavacaḥ śrutvā karṇam utsṛjya vīryavānc yuyudhe rākṣasendreṇa bakabhrātrā ghaṭotkacaḥe tayoḥ sutumulaṃ yuddhaṃ babhūva niśi rakṣasoḥf alāyudhasya caivograṃ haiḍimbasya ca bhārataa alāyudhasya yodhāṃs tu rākṣasān bhīmadarśanānc vegenāpatataḥ śūrān pragṛhītaśarāsanāna āttāyudhaḥ susaṃkruddho yuyudhāno mahārathaḥc nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca cicchidur niśitaiḥ śaraiḥa sarvāṃś ca samare rājan kirīṭī kṣatriyarṣabhānc paricikṣepa bībhatsuḥ sarvataḥ prakṣipañ śarāna karṇaś ca samare rājan vyadrāvayata pārthivānc
