haiḍimbasya vadhena vaia vimukhāni ca sainyāni hataṃ dṛṣṭvā ghaṭotkacamc vayaṃ ca bhṛśam āvignā haiḍimbasya nipātanāta naitat kāraṇam alpaṃ hi bhaviṣyati janārdanac tad adya śaṃsa me pṛṣṭaḥ satyaṃ satyavatāṃ varaa yady etan na rahasyaṃ te vaktum arhasy ariṃdamab vyasanasya sati sthāne na prahṛṣyanti mānavāḥb harṣasya saty api sthāne nolbaṇaṃ yānti paṇḍitāḥc dhairyasya vaikṛtaṃ brūhi tvam adya madhusūdanaa samudrasyeva saṃkṣobho meror iva visarpaṇamc tathaital lāghavaṃ manye tava karma janārdana vāsudeva uvācaa atiharṣam imaṃ prāptaṃ śṛṇu me tvaṃ dhanaṃjayac atīva manasaḥ sadyaḥ prasādakaram uttamama śaktiṃ ghaṭotkacenemāṃ vyaṃsayitvā mahādyutec karṇaṃ nihatam evājau viddhi sadyo dhanaṃjayaa śaktihastaṃ punaḥ karṇaṃ ko loke sti pumān ihac ya enam abhitas tiṣṭhet kārttikeyam ivāhavea diṣṭyāpanītakavaco diṣṭyāpahṛtakuṇḍalaḥc diṣṭyā ca vyaṃsitā śaktir amoghāsya ghaṭotkacea yadi hi syāt sakavacas tathaiva ca sakuṇḍalaḥc sāmarān api lokāṃs trīn ekaḥ karṇo jayed balīa vāsavo vā kubero vā varuṇo vā jaleśvaraḥc yamo vā notsahet karṇaṃ raṇe pratisamāsituma gāṇḍīvam āyamya bhavāṃś cakraṃ vāhaṃ sudarśanamc na śaktau svo raṇe jetuṃ tathāyuktaṃ nararṣabhama tvaddhitārthaṃ tu śakreṇa māyayā hṛtakuṇḍalaḥc vihīnakavacaś cāyaṃ kṛtaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥa utkṛtya kavacaṃ yasmāt kuṇḍale vimale ca tec prādāc chakrāya karṇo vai tena vaikartanaḥ smṛtaḥa āśīviṣa iva kruddhaḥ stambhito mantratejasāc tathādya bhāti karṇo me śāntajvāla ivānalaḥa yadā prabhṛti karṇāya śaktir dattā mahātmanāc vāsavena mahābāho prāptā yāsau ghaṭotkacea kuṇḍalābhyāṃ nimāyātha divyena kavacena cac tāṃ prāpyāmanyata vṛṣā satataṃ tvāṃ hataṃ raṇea evaṃ gate pi śakyo yaṃ hantuṃ nānyena kena citc ṛte tvā puruṣavyāghra śape satyena cānaghaa brahmaṇyaḥ satyavādī ca tapasvī niyatavrataḥc ripuṣv api dayāvāṃś ca tasmāt karṇo vṛṣā smṛtaḥa yuddhaśauṇḍo mahābāhur nityodyataśarāsanaḥc kesarīva vane mardan mattamātaṅgayūthapāne vimadān rathaśārdūlān kurute raṇamūrdhania madhyaṃgata ivādityo yo na śakyo nirīkṣitumc tvadīyaiḥ puruṣavyāghra yodhamukhyair mahātmabhiḥe śarajālasahasrāṃśuḥ śaradīva divākaraḥa tapānte toyado yadvac charadhārāḥ kṣaraty asauc divyāstrajaladaḥ karṇaḥ parjanya iva vṛṣṭimānd tridaśair api cāsyadbhiḥ śaravarṣaṃ samantataḥd aśakyas tad ayaṃ jetuṃ sravadbhir māṃsaśoṇitamd kavacena vihīnaś ca kuṇḍalābhyāṃ ca pāṇḍavad tenādityaṃ nirudhyed yaḥ śaravarṣaiś ca vṛṣṭimānd tapoyukto bhavat pūrvaṃ divyarūpaḥ pratāpavāne so dya mānuṣatāṃ prāpto vimuktaḥ śakradattayāa eko hi yogo sya bhaved vadhāyachidre hy enaṃ svapramattaḥ pramattamc kṛcchraprāptaṃ rathacakre nimagnehanyāḥ pūrvaṃ tvaṃ tu saṃjñāṃ vicāryad na hy udyatāstraṃ yudhi hanyād ajayyamd apy ekavīro balabhit savajraḥa jarāsaṃdhaś cedirājo mahātmāmahābalaś caikalavyo niṣādaḥc ekaikaśo nihatāḥ sarva evayogais tais tais tvaddhitārthaṃ mayaivaa athāpare nihatā rākṣasendrāhiḍimbakirmīrabakapradhānāḥc alāyudhaḥ parasainyāvamardīghaṭotkacaś cograkarmā tarasvī arjuna uvācaa katham asmaddhitārthaṃ te kaiś ca yogair janārdanac jarāsaṃdhaprabhṛtayo ghātitāḥ pṛthivīṣvarāḥ vāsudeva uvācaa jarāsaṃdhaś cedirājo naiṣādiś ca mahābalaḥc yadi syur na hatāḥ pūrvam idānīṃ syur bhayaṃkarāḥa suyodhanas tān avaśyaṃ vṛṇuyād rathasattamānc te smābhir nityasaṃduṣṭāḥ saṃśrayeyuś ca kauravāna te hi vīrā mahātmānaḥ kṛtāstrā dṛḍhayodhinaḥc dhārtarāṣṭrīṃ camūṃ kṛtsnāṃ rakṣeyur amarā ivaa sūtaputro jarāsaṃdhaś cedirājo niṣādajaḥc suyodhanaṃ samāśritya taperan pṛthivīm imāma yogair api hatā yais te tān me śṛṇu dhanaṃjayac ajayyā hi vinā yogair mṛdhe te daivatair apia ekaiko hi pṛthak teṣāṃ samastāṃ suravāhinīmc yodhayet samare pārtha lokapālābhirakṣitāma jarāsaṃdho hi ruṣito rauhiṇeyapradharṣitaḥc asmadvadhārthaṃ cikṣepa gadāṃ vai lohitāmukhīma sīmantam iva kurvāṇāṃ nabhasaḥ pāvakaprabhāmc vyadṛśyatāpatantī sā śakramuktā yathāśaniḥa tām āpatantīṃ dṛṣṭvaiva gadāṃ rohiṇinandanaḥc pratighātārtham astraṃ vai sthūṇākarṇam avāsṛjata astravegapratihatā sā gadā prāpatad bhuvic dārayantī dharāṃ devīṃ kampayantīva parvatāna tatra sma rākṣasī ghorā jarā nāmāśuvikramāc saṃdhayām āsa taṃ jātaṃ jarāsaṃdham ariṃdamama dvābhyāṃ jāto hi mātṛbhyām ardhadehaḥ pṛthak pṛthakc tayā sa saṃdhito yasmāj jarāsaṃdhas tataḥ smṛtaḥa sā tu bhūmigatā pārtha hatā sasutabāndhavāc gadayā tena cāstreṇa sthūṇākarṇena rākṣasīa vinābhūtaḥ sa gadayā jarāsaṃdho mahāmṛdhec nihato bhīmasenena paśyatas te dhanaṃjayaa yadi hi syād gadāpāṇir jarāsaṃdhaḥ pratāpavānc sendrā devā na taṃ hantuṃ raṇe śaktā narottamaa tvaddhitārthaṃ hi naiṣādir aṅguṣṭhena viyojitaḥc droṇenācāryakaṃ kṛtvā chadmanā satyavikramaḥa sa tu baddhāṅgulitrāṇo naiṣādir dṛḍhavikramaḥc asyann eko vanacaro babhau rāma ivāparaḥa ekalavyaṃ hi sāṅguṣṭham aśaktā devadānavāḥc sarākṣasoragāḥ pārtha vijetuṃ yudhi karhi cita kim u mānuṣamātreṇa śakyaḥ syāt prativīkṣitumc dṛḍhamuṣṭiḥ kṛtī nityam asyamāno divāniśama tvaddhitārthaṃ tu sa mayā hataḥ saṃgrāmamūrdhanic cedirājaś ca vikrāntaḥ pratyakṣaṃ nihatas tavaa sa cāpy aśakyaḥ saṃgrāme jetuṃ sarvaiḥ surāsuraiḥb yamendrasiddhagandharvān vasurudrān marudgaṇānb sa hi jātaś caturbāhur dhṛtajāmbūnadasrajaḥb ajeyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ jayed api divaukasaḥc vadhārthaṃ tasya jāto ham anyeṣāṃ ca suradviṣāma tvatsahāyo naravyāghra lokānāṃ hitakāmyayāc hiḍimbabakakirmīrā bhīmasenena pātitāḥe rāvaṇena samaprāṇā brahmayajñavināśanāḥa hatas tathaiva māyāvī haiḍimbenāpy alāyudhaḥc haiḍimbaś cāpy upāyena śaktyā karṇena ghātitaḥa yadi hy enaṃ nāhaniṣyat karṇaḥ śaktyā mahāmṛdhec mayā vadhyo bhaviṣyat sa bhaimasenir ghaṭotkacaḥa mayā na nihataḥ pūrvam eṣa yuṣmatpriyepsayāc eṣa hi brāhmaṇadveṣī yajñadveṣī ca rākṣasaḥa dharmasya loptā pāpātmā tasmād eṣa nipātitaḥc vyaṃsitā cāpy upāyena śakradattā mayānaghaa ye hi dharmasya loptāro vadhyās te mama pāṇḍavac dharmasaṃsthāpanārthaṃ hi pratijñaiṣā mamāvyayāa brahma satyaṃ damaḥ śaucaṃ dharmo hrīḥ śrīr dhṛtiḥ kṣamāc yatra tatra rame nityam ahaṃ satyena te śapea na viṣādas tvayā kāryaḥ karṇaṃ vaikartanaṃ pratic upadekṣyāmy upāyaṃ te yena taṃ prasahiṣyasia suyodhanaṃ cāpi raṇe haniṣyati vṛkodaraḥc tasya cāpi vadhopāyaṃ vakṣyāmi tava pāṇḍavaa vardhate tumulas tv eṣa śabdaḥ paracamūṃ pratic vidravanti ca sainyāni tvadīyāni diśo daśaa labdhalakṣyā hi kauravyā vidhamanti camūṃ tavac dahaty eṣa ca vaḥ sainyaṃ droṇaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa ekavīravadhe moghā śaktiḥ sūtātmaje yadāc kasmāt sarvān samutsṛjya sa tāṃ pārthe na muktavāna tasmin hate hatā hi syuḥ sarve pāṇḍavasṛñjayāḥc ekavīravadhe kasmān na yuddhe jayam ādadhata āhūto na nivarteyam iti tasya mahāvratamc svayam āhvayitavyaḥ sa sūtaputreṇa phalgunaḥa tato dvairatham ānīya phalgunaṃ śakradattayāc na jaghāna vṛṣā kasmāt tan mamācakṣva saṃjayaa nūnaṃ buddhivihīnaś cāpy asahāyaś ca me sutaḥc śatrubhir vyaṃsitopāyaḥ kathaṃ nu sa jayed arīna yā hy asya paramā śaktir jayasya ca parāyaṇamc sā śaktir vāsudevena vyaṃsitāsya ghaṭotkacea kuṇer yathā hastagataṃ hriyed bilvaṃ balīyasāc tathā śaktir amoghā sā moghībhūtā ghaṭotkacea yathā varāhasya śunaś ca yudhyatostayor abhāve śvapacasya lābhaḥc manye vidvan vāsudevasya tadvadyuddhe lābhaḥ karṇahaiḍimbayor vaia ghaṭotkaco yadi hanyād dhi karṇaṃparo lābhaḥ sa bhavet pāṇḍavānāmc vaikartano vā yadi taṃ nihanyāttathāpi kṛtyaṃ śaktināśāt kṛtaṃ syāta iti prājñaḥ prajñayaitad vicāryaghaṭotkacaṃ sūtaputreṇa yuddhec ayodhayad vāsudevo nṛsiṃhaḥpriyaṃ kurvan pāṇḍavānāṃ hitaṃ ca saṃjaya uvācaa etac cikīrṣitaṃ jñātvā karṇe madhunihā nṛpac niyojayām āsa tadā dvairathe rākṣaseśvarama ghaṭotkacaṃ mahāvīryaṃ mahābuddhir janārdanaḥc amoghāyā vighātārthaṃ rājan durmantrite tavaa tadaiva kṛtakāryā hi vayaṃ syāma kurūdvahac na rakṣed yadi kṛṣṇas taṃ pārthaṃ karṇān mahārathāta sāśvadhvajarathaḥ saṃkhye dhṛtarāṣṭra pated bhuvic vinā janārdanaṃ pārtho yogānām īśvaraṃ prabhuma tais tair upāyair bahubhī rakṣyamāṇaḥ sa pārthivac jayaty abhimukhaḥ śatrūn pārthaḥ kṛṣṇena pālitaḥa saviśeṣaṃ tv amoghāyāḥ kṛṣṇo rakṣata pāṇḍavamc hanyāt kṣiptā hi kaunteyaṃ śaktir vṛkṣam ivāśaniḥ dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa virodhī ca kumantrī ca prājñamānī mamātmajaḥc yasyaiṣa samatikrānto vadhopāyo jayaṃ pratid sa vā karṇo mahābuddhiḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥd na muktavān kathaṃ sūta tām amoghāṃ dhanaṃjayea tavāpi samatikrāntam etad gāvalgaṇe kathamc etam arthaṃ mahābuddhe yat tvayā nāvabodhitaḥ saṃjaya uvācaa duryodhanasya śakuner mama duḥśāsanasya cac rātrau rātrau bhavaty eṣā nityam eva samarthanāa śvaḥ sarvasainyān utsṛjya jahi karṇa dhanaṃjayamc preṣyavat pāṇḍupāñcālān upabhokṣyāmahe tataḥa atha vā nihate pārthe pāṇḍuṣv anyatamaṃ tataḥc sthāpayed yudhi vārṣṇeyas tasmāt kṛṣṇo nipātyatāma kṛṣṇo hi mūlaṃ pāṇḍūnāṃ pārthaḥ skandha ivodgataḥc śākhā ivetare pārthāḥ pāñcālāḥ patrasaṃjñitāḥa kṛṣṇāśrayāḥ kṛṣṇabalāḥ kṛṣṇanāthāś ca pāṇḍavāḥc kṛṣṇaḥ parāyaṇaṃ caiṣāṃ jyotiṣām iva candramāḥa tasmāt parṇāni śākhāś ca skandhaṃ cotsṛjya sūtajac kṛṣṇaṃ nikṛndhi pāṇḍūnāṃ mūlaṃ sarvatra sarvadāa hanyād yadi hi dāśārhaṃ karṇo yādavanandanamc kṛtsnā vasumatī rājan vaśe te syān na saṃśayaḥd sā tu buddhiḥ kṛtā rājan kṛṣṇaṃ prati nareśvarad viṣṇos tejaḥpramūḍhānāṃ yuddhakāle praṇaśyatia yadi hi sa nihataḥ śayīta bhūmauyadukulapāṇḍavanandano mahātmāc nanu tava vasudhā narendra sarvāsagirisamudravanā vaśaṃ vrajetaa sā tu buddhiḥ kṛtāpy evaṃ jāgrati tridaśeśvarec aprameye hṛṣīkeśe yuddhakāle vyamuhyataa arjunaṃ cāpi kaunteyaṃ sadā rakṣati keśavaḥc na hy enam aicchat pramukhe sauteḥ sthāpayituṃ raṇea anyāṃś cāsmai rathodārān upasthāpayad acyutaḥc amoghāṃ tāṃ kathaṃ śaktiṃ moghāṃ kuryām iti prabhod yaś caivaṃ rakṣate pārthaṃ karṇāt kṛṣṇo mahāmanāḥd ātmānaṃ sa kathaṃ rājan na rakṣet puruṣottamaḥd paricintya tu paśyāmaś cakrāyudham ariṃdamamd na so sti triṣu lokeṣu yo jayeta janārdanama tataḥ kṛṣṇaṃ mahābāhuḥ sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥc papraccha rathaśārdūla karṇaṃ prati mahārathama ayaṃ ca pratyayaḥ karṇe śaktyā cāmitavikramac kimarthaṃ sūtaputreṇa na muktā phalgune tu sā vāsudeva uvācaa duḥṣāsanaś ca karṇaś ca śakuniś ca sasaindhavaḥc satataṃ mantrayanti sma duryodhanapurogamāḥa karṇa karṇa maheṣvāsa raṇe mitaparākramac nānyasya śaktir eṣā te moktavyā jayatāṃ varaa ṛte mahārathāt pārthāt kuntīputrād dhanaṃjayātc sa hi teṣām atiyaśā devānām iva vāsavaḥa tasmin vinihate sarve pāṇḍavāḥ sṛñjayaiḥ sahac bhaviṣyanti gatātmānaḥ surā iva niragnayaḥd ṛte mahātmanaḥ pārthāt karṇena nihatā dhruvama tatheti ca pratijñātaṃ karṇena śinipuṃgavac hṛdi nityaṃ tu karṇasya vadho gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥa aham eva tu rādheyaṃ mohayāmi yudhāṃ varac yato nāvasṛjac chaktiṃ pāṇḍave śvetavāhanea phalgunasya hi tāṃ mṛtyum avagamya yuyutsataḥc na nidrā na ca me harṣo manaso sti yudhāṃ varaa ghaṭotkace vyaṃsitāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā tāṃ śinipuṃgavac mṛtyor āsyāntarān muktaṃ paśyāmy adya dhanaṃjayama na pitā na ca me mātā na yūyaṃ bhrātaras tathāc na ca prāṇās tathā rakṣyā yathā bībhatsur āhavea trailokyarājyād yat kiṃ cid bhaved anyat sudurlabhamc neccheyaṃ sātvatāhaṃ tad vinā pārthaṃ dhanaṃjayama ataḥ praharṣaḥ sumahān yuyudhānādya me bhavatc mṛtaṃ pratyāgatam iva dṛṣṭvā pārthaṃ dhanaṃjayama ataś ca prahito yuddhe mayā karṇāya rākṣasaḥc na hy anyaḥ samare rātrau śaktaḥ karṇaṃ prabādhitumd sātyakir uvācad dhruvas tasya jayo nityaṃ dīrgham āyuḥ pravartated yasya tvaṃ puruṣavyāghra śivāya satataṃ sthitaḥ saṃjaya uvācaa iti sātyakaye prāha tadā devakinandanaḥc dhanaṃjayahite yuktas tatpriye satataṃ rataḥ dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa karṇaduryodhanādīnāṃ śakuneḥ saubalasya cac apanītaṃ mahat tāta tava caiva viśeṣataḥa yad ājānīta tāṃ śaktim ekaghnīṃ satataṃ raṇec anivāryām asahyāṃ ca devair api savāsavaiḥa sā kimarthaṃ na karṇena pravṛtte samare purāc na devakīsute muktā phalgune vāpi saṃjaya saṃjaya uvācaa saṃgrāmād vinivṛttānāṃ sarveṣāṃ no viśāṃ patec rātrau kurukulaśreṣṭha mantro yaṃ samajāyataa prabhātamātre śvobhūte keśavāyārjunāya vāc śaktir eṣā vimoktavyā karṇa karṇeti nityaśaḥa tataḥ prabhātasamaye rājan karṇasya daivataiḥc anyeṣāṃ caiva yodhānāṃ sā buddhir naśyate punaḥa daivam eva paraṃ manye yat karṇo hastasaṃsthayāc na jaghāna raṇe pārthaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vā devakīsutama tasya hastasthitā śaktiḥ kālarātrir ivodyatāc daivopahatabuddhitvān na tāṃ karṇo vimuktavāna kṛṣṇe vā devakīputre mohito devamāyayāc pārthe vā śakrakalpe vai vadhārthaṃ vāsavīṃ prabho dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa daivenaiva hatā yūyaṃ svabuddhyā keśavasya cac gatā hi vāsavī hatvā tṛṇabhūtaṃ ghaṭotkacama karṇaś ca mama putrāś ca sarve cānye ca pārthivāḥc anena duṣpraṇītena gatā vaivasvatakṣayama bhūya eva tu me śaṃsa yathā yuddham avartatac kurūṇāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca haiḍimbe nihate tadāa ye ca te bhyadravan droṇaṃ vyūḍhānīkāḥ prahāriṇaḥc sṛñjayāḥ saha pāñcālais te py akurvan kathaṃ raṇama saumadatter vadhād droṇam āyastaṃ saindhavasya cac amarṣāj jīvitaṃ tyaktvā gāhamānaṃ varūthinīma jṛmbhamāṇam iva vyāghraṃ vyāttānanam ivāntakamc kathaṃ pratyudyayur droṇam asyantaṃ pāṇḍusṛñjayāḥa ācāryaṃ ye ca te rakṣan duryodhanapurogamāḥc drauṇikarṇakṛpās tāta te py akurvan kim āhavea bhāradvājaṃ jighāṃsantau savyasācivṛkodarauc samārchan māmakā yuddhe kathaṃ saṃjaya śaṃsa mea sindhurājavadheneme ghaṭotkacavadhena tec amarṣitāḥ susaṃkruddhā raṇaṃ cakruḥ kathaṃ niśi saṃjaya uvācaa hate ghaṭotkace rājan karṇena niśi rākṣasec praṇadatsu ca hṛṣṭeṣu tāvakeṣu yuyutsuṣua āpatatsu ca vegena vadhyamāne bale pi cac vigāḍhāyāṃ rajanyāṃ ca rājā dainyaṃ paraṃ gataḥa abravīc ca mahābāhur bhīmasenaṃ paraṃtapaḥc āvāraya mahābāho dhārtarāṣṭrasya vāhinīme haiḍimbasyābhighātena moho mām āviśan mahāna evaṃ bhīmaṃ samādiśya svarathe samupāviśatc aśrupūrṇamukho rājā niḥśvasaṃś ca punaḥ punaḥe kaśmalaṃ prāviśad ghoraṃ dṛṣṭvā karṇasya vikramama taṃ tathā vyathitaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇo vacanam abravītc mā vyathāṃ kuru kaunteya naitat tvayy upapadyatee vaiklavyaṃ bharataśreṣṭha yathā prākṛtapūruṣea uttiṣṭha rājan yudhyasva vaha gurvīṃ dhuraṃ vibhoc tvayi vaiklavyam āpanne saṃśayo vijaye bhaveta śrutvā kṛṣṇasya vacanaṃ dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥc vimṛjya netre pāṇibhyāṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vacanam abravīta viditā te mahābāho dharmāṇāṃ paramā gatiḥc brahmahatyāphalaṃ tasya yaḥ kṛtaṃ nāvabudhyatea asmākaṃ hi vanasthānāṃ haiḍimbena mahātmanāc bālenāpi satā tena kṛtaṃ sāhyaṃ janārdanaa astrahetor gataṃ jñātvā pāṇḍavaṃ śvetavāhanamb āgamya sa sahāyena kṛtā rakṣā mahātmanāb so dya karṇena nihataḥ paśyatāṃ pāpacetasāmb asya pāpasya mokṣaṃ hi kathaṃ yāsyāmi mādhavac asau kṛṣṇa maheṣvāsaḥ kāmyake mām upasthitaḥe uṣitaś ca sahāsmābhir yāvan nāsīd dhanaṃjayaḥa gandhamādanayātrāyāṃ durgebhyaś ca sma tāritāḥc pāñcālī ca pariśrāntā pṛṣṭhenoḍhā mahātmanād diśāṃ hi vijaye kṛṣṇa sahadevasya cājñayād laṅkāṃ tu gatvā paulastyaḥ karaṃ vai dāpito balāta ārambhāc caiva yuddhānāṃ yad eṣa kṛtavān prabhoc madarthaṃ duṣkaraṃ karma kṛtaṃ tena mahātmanāa svabhāvād yā ca me prītiḥ sahadeve janārdanac saiva me dviguṇā prītī rākṣasendre ghaṭotkacea bhaktaś ca me mahābāhuḥ priyo syāhaṃ priyaś ca mec yena vindāmi vārṣṇeya kaśmalaṃ śokatāpitaḥa paśya sainyāni vārṣṇeya drāvyamāṇāni kauravaiḥc droṇakarṇau ca saṃyattau paśya yuddhe mahārathaua niśīthe pāṇḍavaṃ sainyam ābhyāṃ paśya pramarditamc gajābhyām iva mattābhyāṃ yathā naḍavanaṃ mahata anādṛtya balaṃ bāhvor bhīmasenasya mādhavac citrāstratāṃ ca pārthasya vikramante sma kauravāḥa eṣa droṇaś ca karṇaś ca rājā caiva suyodhanaḥc nihatya rākṣasaṃ yuddhe hṛṣṭā nardanti saṃyugea katham asmāsu jīvatsu tvayi caiva janārdanac haiḍimbaḥ prāptavān mṛtyuṃ sūtaputreṇa saṃgataḥa kadarthīkṛtya naḥ sarvān paśyataḥ savyasācinaḥc nihato rākṣasaḥ kṛṣṇa bhaimasenir mahābalaḥa yadābhimanyur nihato dhārtarāṣṭrair durātmabhiḥc nāsīt tatra raṇe kṛṣṇa savyasācī mahārathaḥa niruddhāś ca vayaṃ sarve saindhavena durātmanāc nimittam abhavad droṇaḥ saputras tatra karmaṇia upadiṣṭo vadhopāyaḥ karṇasya guruṇā svayamc vyāyacchataś ca khaḍgena dvidhā khaḍgaṃ cakāra haa vyasane vartamānasya kṛtavarmā nṛśaṃsavatc aśvāñ jaghāna sahasā tathobhau pārṣṇisārathīe tathetare maheṣvāsāḥ saubhadraṃ yudhy apātayana alpe ca kāraṇe kṛṣṇa hato gāṇḍīvadhanvanāc saindhavo yādavaśreṣṭha tac ca nātipriyaṃ mamaa yadi śatruvadhe nyāyyo bhavet kartuṃ ca pāṇḍavaiḥc droṇakarṇau raṇe pūrvaṃ hantavyāv iti me matiḥa etau mūlaṃ hi duḥkhānām asmākaṃ puruṣarṣabhac etau raṇe samāsādya parāśvastaḥ suyodhanaḥa yatra vadhyo bhaved droṇaḥ sūtaputraś ca sānugaḥc tatrāvadhīn mahābāhuḥ saindhavaṃ dūravāsinama avaśyaṃ tu mayā kāryaḥ sūtaputrasya nigrahaḥc tato yāsyāmy ahaṃ vīra svayaṃ karṇajighāṃsayāe bhīmaseno mahābāhur droṇānīkena saṃgataḥa evam uktvā yayau tūrṇaṃ tvaramāṇo yudhiṣṭhiraḥc sa visphārya mahac cāpaṃ śaṅkhaṃ pradhmāpya bhairavama tato rathasahasreṇa gajānāṃ ca śatais tribhiḥc vājibhiḥ pañcasāhasrais trisāhasraiḥ prabhadrakaiḥe vṛtaḥ śikhaṇḍī tvarito rājānaṃ pṛṣṭhato nvayāta tato bherīḥ samājaghnuḥ śaṅkhān dadhmuś ca daṃśitāḥb śaṅkhaśabdaravāṃś caiva bāṇaśabdāṃś ca daṃsitāḥc pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavāś caiva yudhiṣṭhirapurogamāḥa tato bravīn mahābāhur vāsudevo dhanaṃjayamc eṣa prayāti tvarito krodhāviṣṭo yudhiṣṭhiraḥe jighāṃsuḥ sūtaputrasya tasyopekṣā na yujyatea evam uktvā hṛṣīkeśaḥ śīghram aśvān acodayatc dūraṃ ca yātaṃ rājānam anvagacchaj janārdanaḥa taṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasā yāntaṃ sūtaputrajighāṃsayāc śokopahatasaṃkalpaṃ dahyamānam ivāgnināe abhigamyābravīd vyāso dharmaputraṃ yudhiṣṭhirama karṇam āsādya saṃgrāme diṣṭyā jīvati phalgunaḥc savyasācivadhākāṅkṣī śaktiṃ rakṣitavān hi saḥa na cāgād dvairathaṃ jiṣṇur diṣṭyā taṃ bharatarṣabhac sṛjetāṃ spardhināv etau divyāny astrāṇi sarvaśaḥa vadhyamāneṣu cāstreṣu pīḍitaḥ sūtanandanaḥc vāsavīṃ samare śaktiṃ dhruvaṃ muñced yudhiṣṭhiraa tato bhavet te vyasanaṃ ghoraṃ bharatasattamac diṣṭyā rakṣo hataṃ yuddhe sūtaputreṇa mānadaa vāsavīṃ kāraṇaṃ kṛtvā kālenāpahato hy asauc tavaiva kāraṇād rakṣo nihataṃ tāta saṃyugea mā krudho bharataśreṣṭha mā ca śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥc prāṇinām iha sarveṣām eṣā niṣṭhā yudhiṣṭhiraa bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ sarvaiḥ pārthivaiś ca mahātmabhiḥc kauravān samare rājann abhiyudhyasva bhāratae pañcame divase caiva pṛthivī te bhaviṣyatia nityaṃ ca puruṣavyāghra dharmam eva vicintayac ānṛśaṃsyaṃ tapo dānaṃ kṣamāṃ satyaṃ ca pāṇḍavaa sevethāḥ paramaprīto yato dharmas tato jayaḥc ity uktvā pāṇḍavaṃ vyāsas tatraivāntaradhīyata saṃjaya uvāca vyāsenaivam athoktas tu dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ svayaṃ karṇavadhād vīro nivṛtto bharatarṣabhaa ghaṭotkace tu nihate sūtaputreṇa tāṃ niśāmc duḥkhāmarṣavaśaṃ prāpto dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥa dṛṣṭva bhīmena mahatīṃ vāryamāṇāṃ camūṃ tavac dhṛṣṭadyumnam uvācedaṃ kumbhayoniṃ nivārayaa tvaṃ hi droṇavināśāya samutpanno hutāśanātc saśaraḥ kavacī khaḍgī dhanvī ca paratāpanaḥe abhidrava raṇe hṛṣṭo na ca te bhīḥ kathaṃ canaa janamejayaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca daurmukhiś ca yaśodhanaḥc abhidravantu saṃhṛṣṭāḥ kumbhayoniṃ samantataḥa nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca draupadeyāḥ prabhadrakāḥc drupadaś ca virāṭaś ca putrabhrātṛsamanvitaua sātyakiḥ kekayāś caiva pāṇḍavaś ca dhanaṃjayaḥc abhidravantu vegena bhāradvājavadhepsayāa tathaiva rathinaḥ sarve hastyaśvaṃ yac ca kiṃ canac pādātāś ca raṇe droṇaṃ prāpayantu mahārathama tathājñaptās tu te sarve pāṇḍavena mahātmanāc abhyadravanta vegena kumbhayoniṃ yuyutsayāa āgacchatas tān sahasā sarvodyogena pāṇḍavānc pratijagrāha samare droṇaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥa tato duryodhano rājā sarvodyogena pāṇḍavānc abhyadravat susaṃkruddha icchan droṇasya jīvitama tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ śrāntavāhanasainikamc pāṇḍavānāṃ kurūṇāṃ ca garjatām itaretarama nidrāndhās te mahārāja pariśrāntāś ca saṃyugec nābhyapadyanta samare kāṃ cic ceṣṭāṃ mahārathāḥa triyāmā rajanī caiṣā ghorarūpā bhayānakāc sahasrayāmapratimā babhūva prāṇahāriṇīe vadhyatāṃ ca tathā teṣāṃ kṣatānāṃ ca viśeṣataḥa aho rātriḥ samājajñe nidrāndhānāṃ viśeṣataḥc sarve hy āsan nirutsāhāḥ kṣatriyā dīnacetasaḥe tava caiva pareṣāṃ ca gatāstrā vigateṣavaḥa te tathā pārayantaś ca hrīmantaś ca viśeṣataḥc svadharmam anupaśyanto na jahuḥ svām anīkinīma śastrāṇy anye samutsṛjya nidrāndhāḥ śerate janāḥc gajeṣv anye ratheṣv anye hayeṣv anye ca bhārataa nidrāndhā no bubudhire kāṃ cic ceṣṭāṃ narādhipāḥc te nyonyaṃ samare yodhāḥ preṣayanta yamakṣayama svapnāyamānās tv apare parān iti vicetasaḥc ātmānaṃ samare jaghnuḥ svān eva ca parān apia nānāvāco vimuñcanto nidrāndhās te mahāraṇeb asmākaṃ ca mahārāja parebhyo bahavo janāḥc yoddhavyam iti tiṣṭhanto nidrāsaṃsaktalocanāḥa saṃmardyānye raṇe ke cin nidrāndhāś ca parasparamc jaghnuḥ śūrā raṇe rājaṃs tasmiṃs tamasi dāruṇea hanyamānaṃ tathātmānaṃ parebhyo bahavo janāḥc nābhyajānanta samare nidrayā mohitā bhṛśama teṣām etādṛśīṃ ceṣṭāṃ vijñāya puruṣarṣabhaḥc uvāca vākyaṃ bībhatsur uccaiḥ saṃnādayan diśaḥa śrāntā bhavanto nidrāndhāḥ sarva eva savāhanāḥc tamasā cāvṛte sainye rajasā bahulena caa te yūyaṃ yadi manyadhvam upāramata sainikāḥc nimīlayata cātraiva raṇabhūmau muhūrtakama tato vinidrā viśrāntāś candramasy udite punaḥc saṃsādhayiṣyathānyonyaṃ svargāya kurupāṇḍavāḥa tad vacaḥ sarvadharmajñā dhārmikasya niśamya tec arocayanta sainyāni tathā cānyonyam abruvana cukruśuḥ karṇa karṇeti rājan duryodhaneti cac upāramata pāṇḍūnāṃ viratā hi varūthinīa tathā vikrośamānasya phalgunasya tatas tataḥc upāramata pāṇḍūnāṃ senā tava ca bhārataa tām asya vācaṃ devāś ca ṛṣayaś ca mahātmanaḥc sarvasainyāni cākṣudrāḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ pratyapūjayana tat saṃpūjya vaco krūraṃ sarvasainyāni bhāratac muhūrtam asvapan rājañ śrāntāni bharatarṣabhaa sā tu saṃprāpya viśrāmaṃ dhvajinī tava bhāratac sukham āptavatī vīram arjunaṃ pratyapūjayata tvayi vedās tathāstrāṇi tvayi buddhiparākramauc dharmas tvayi mahābāho dayā bhūteṣu cānaghaa yac cāśvastās tavecchāmaḥ śarma pārtha tad astu tec manasaś ca priyān arthān vīra kṣipram avāpnuhia iti te taṃ naravyāghraṃ praśaṃsanto mahārathāḥc nidrayā samavākṣiptās tūṣṇīm āsan viśāṃ patea aśvapṛṣṭheṣu cāpy anye rathanīḍeṣu cāparec gajaskandhagatāś cānye śerate cāpare kṣitaua sāyudhāḥ sagadāś caiva sakhaḍgāḥ saparaśvadhāḥc saprāsakavacāś cānye narāḥ suptāḥ pṛthak pṛthaka gajās te pannagābhogair hastair bhūreṇurūṣitaiḥc nidrāndhā vasudhāṃ cakrur ghrāṇaniḥśvāsaśītalāma gajāḥ śuśubhire tatra niḥśvasanto mahītalec viśīrṇā girayo yadvan niḥśvasadbhir mahoragaiḥa samāṃ ca viṣamāṃ cakruḥ khurāgrair vikṣatāṃ mahīmc hayāḥ kāñcanayoktrāś ca kesarālambibhir yugaiḥe suṣupus tatra rājendra yuktā vāheṣu sarvaśaḥf evaṃ hayāś ca nāgāś ca yodhāś ca bharatarṣabhaf yuddhād viramya suṣupuḥ śrameṇa mahatānvitāḥa tat tathā nidrayā bhagnam avācam asvapad balamc kuśalair iva vinyastaṃ paṭe citram ivādbhutama te kṣatriyāḥ kuṇḍalino yuvānaḥparasparaṃ sāyakavikṣatāṅgāḥc kumbheṣu līnāḥ suṣupur gajānāṃkuceṣu lagnā iva kāminīnāmd vīrā vāraṇakumbheṣu suṣupur yuddhakarśitāḥd rātrau ratipariśrāntāḥ kāminīnāṃ kuceṣv ivaa tataḥ kumudanāthena kāminīgaṇḍapāṇḍunāc netrānandena candreṇa māhendrī dig alaṃkṛtād daśaśatākṣakakubdariniḥsṛtaḥd kiraṇakesarabhāsurapiñjaraḥd timiravāraṇayūthavidāraṇaḥd samudiyād udayācalakesarīd haravṛṣottamagātrasamadyutiḥd smaraśarāsanapūrṇasamaprabhaḥd navavadhūsmitacārumanoharaḥd pravisṛtaḥ kumudākarabāndhavaḥd pramadayan vasudhāṃ hi sudhākaraḥa tato muhūrtād bhagavān purastāc chaśalakṣaṇaḥc aruṇaṃ darśayām āsa grasañ jyotiḥprabhaṃ prabhuḥa aruṇasya tu tasyānu jātarūpasamaprabhamc raśmijālaṃ mahac candro mandaṃ mandam avāsṛjata utsārayantaḥ prabhayā tamas te candraraśmayaḥc paryagacchañ śanaiḥ sarvā diśaḥ khaṃ ca kṣitiṃ tathāa tato muhūrtād bhuvanaṃ jyotirbhūtam ivābhavatc aprakhyam aprakāśaṃ ca jagāmāśu tamas tathāa pratiprakāśite loke divābhūte niśākarec vicerur na viceruś ca rājan naktaṃcarās tataḥa bodhyamānaṃ tu tat sainyaṃ rājaṃś candrasya raśmibhiḥc bubudhe śatapatrāṇāṃ vanaṃ mahad ivāmbhasia yathā candrodayoddhūtaḥ kṣubhitaḥ sāgaro bhavetc tathā candrodayoddhūtaḥ sa babhūva balārṇavaḥa tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ punar eva viśāṃ patec loke lokavināśāya paraṃ lokam abhīpsatām saṃjaya uvācaa tato duryodhano droṇam abhigamyedam abravītc amarṣavaśam āpanno janayan harṣatejasīa na marṣaṇīyāḥ saṃgrāme viśramantaḥ śramānvitāḥc sapatnā glānamanaso labdhalakṣyā viśeṣataḥa tat tu marṣitam asmābhir bhavataḥ priyakāmyayāc ta ete pariviśrāntāḥ pāṇḍavā balavattarāḥa sarvathā parihīnāḥ sma tejasā ca balena cac bhavatā pālyamānās te vivardhante punaḥ punaḥa divyāny astrāṇi sarvāṇi brahmāstrādīni yāny apic tāni sarvāṇi tiṣṭhanti bhavaty eva viśeṣataḥa na pāṇḍaveyā na vayaṃ nānye loke dhanurdharāḥc yudhyamānasya te tulyāḥ satyam etad bravīmi tea sasurāsuragandharvān imāṃl lokān dvijottamac sarvāstravid bhavān hanyād divyair astrair na saṃśayaḥa sa bhavān marṣayaty enāṃs tvatto bhītān viśeṣataḥc śiṣyatvaṃ vā puraskṛtya mama vā mandabhāgyatāma evam uddharṣito droṇaḥ kopitaś cātmajena tec samanyur abravīd rājan duryodhanam idaṃ vacaḥa sthaviraḥ san paraṃ śaktyā ghaṭe duryodhanāhavec ataḥ paraṃ mayā kāryaṃ kṣudraṃ vijayagṛddhināe anastravid ayaṃ sarvo hantavyo stravidā janaḥa yad bhavān manyate cāpi śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubhamc tad vai kartāsmi kauravya vacanāt tava nānyathāa nihatya sarvapāñcālān yuddhe kṛtvā parākramamc vimokṣye kavacaṃ rājan satyenāyudham ālabhea manyase yac ca kaunteyam arjunaṃ śrāntam āhavec tasya vīryaṃ mahābāho śṛṇu satyena kauravaa taṃ na devā na gandharvā na yakṣā na ca rākṣasāḥc utsahante raṇe soḍhuṃ kupitaṃ savyasācinama khāṇḍave yena bhagavān pratyudyātaḥ sureśvaraḥc sāyakair vāritaś cāpi varṣamāṇo mahātmanāa yakṣā nāgās tathā daityā ye cānye balagarvitāḥc nihatāḥ puruṣendreṇa tac cāpi viditaṃ tavaa gandharvā ghoṣayātrāyāṃ citrasenādayo jitāḥc yūyaṃ tair hriyamāṇāś ca mokṣitā dṛḍhadhanvanāa nivātakavacāś cāpi devānāṃ śatravas tathāc surair avadhyāḥ saṃgrāme tena vīreṇa nirjitāḥa dānavānāṃ sahasrāṇi hiraṇyapuravāsināmc vijigye puruṣavyāghraḥ sa śakyo mānuṣaiḥ kathama pratyakṣaṃ caiva te sarvaṃ yathā balam idaṃ tavac kṣapitaṃ pāṇḍuputreṇa ceṣṭatāṃ no viśāṃ patea taṃ tathābhipraśaṃsantam arjunaṃ kupitas tadāc droṇaṃ tava suto rājan punar evedam abravīta ahaṃ duḥśāsanaḥ karṇaḥ śakunir mātulaś ca mec haniṣyāmo rjunaṃ saṃkhye dvaidhīkṛtyādya bhāratīmd tiṣṭha sa tvaṃ mahābāho nityaṃ śiṣyaḥ priyas tavaa tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā bhāradvājo hasann ivac anvavartata rājānaṃ svasti te stv iti cābravīta ko hi gāṇḍīvadhanvānaṃ jvalantam iva tejasāc akṣayaṃ kṣapayet kaś cit kṣatriyaḥ kṣatriyarṣabhama taṃ na vittapatir nendro na yamo na jaleśvaraḥc nāsuroragarakṣāṃsi kṣapayeyuḥ sahāyudhama mūḍhās tv etāni bhāṣante yānīmāny āttha bhāratac yuddhe hy arjunam āsādya svastimān ko vrajed gṛhāna tvaṃ tu sarvātiśaṅkitvān niṣṭhuraḥ pāpaniścayaḥc śreyasas tvaddhite yuktāṃs tat tad vaktum ihecchasia gaccha tvam api kaunteyam ātmārthebhyo hi māciramc tvam apy āśaṃsase yoddhuṃ kulajaḥ kṣatriyo hy asia imān kiṃ pārthivān sarvān ghātayiṣyasy anāgasaḥc tvam asya mūlaṃ vairasya tasmād āsādayārjunama eṣa te mātulaḥ prājñaḥ kṣatradharmam anuvrataḥc dūrdyūtadevī gāndhāriḥ prayātv arjunam āhavea eṣo kṣakuśalo jihmo dyūtakṛt kitavaḥ śaṭhaḥc devitā nikṛtiprajño yudhi jeṣyati pāṇḍavāna tvayā kathitam atyantaṃ karṇena saha hṛṣṭavatc asakṛc chūnyavan mohād dhṛtarāṣṭrasya śṛṇvataḥa ahaṃ ca tāta karṇaś ca bhrātā duḥśāsanaś ca mec pāṇḍuputrān haniṣyāmaḥ sahitāḥ samare trayaḥa iti te katthamānasya śrutaṃ saṃsadi saṃsadic anutiṣṭha pratijñāṃ tāṃ satyavāg bhava taiḥ sahaa eṣa te pāṇḍavaḥ śatrur aviṣahyo grataḥ sthitaḥc kṣatradharmam avekṣasva ślāghyas tava vadho jayāta dattaṃ bhuktam adhītaṃ ca prāptam aiśvaryam īpsitamc kṛtakṛtyo nṛṇaś cāsi mā bhair yudhyasva pāṇḍavama ity uktvā samare droṇo nyavartata yataḥ parec dvaidhīkṛtya tataḥ senāṃ yuddhaṃ samabhavat tadā saṃjaya uvācaa tribhāgamātraśeṣāyāṃ rātryāṃ yuddham avartatac kurūṇāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca saṃhṛṣṭānāṃ viśāṃ patea atha candraprabhāṃ muṣṇann ādityasya puraḥsaraḥc aruṇo bhyudayāṃ cakre tāmrīkurvann ivāmbaramd prakāśam akarod vyoma jagat saṃrañjayann ivad prācyāṃ diśi sahasrāṃśor aruṇenāruṇīkṛtamd tāpanīyaṃ yathā cakraṃ bhrājate ravimaṇḍalamd tato rathāśvāṃś ca manuṣyayānānyd utsṛjya sarve kurupāṇḍuyodhāḥd divākarasyābhimukhaṃ japantaḥd saṃdhyāgatāḥ prāñjalayo babhūvuḥa tato dvaidhīkṛte sainye droṇaḥ somakapāṇḍavānc abhyadravat sapāñcālān duryodhanapurogamaḥa dvaidhībhūtān kurūn dṛṣṭvā mādhavo rjunam abravītc sapatnān savyataḥ kurmi savyasācinn imān kurūna sa mādhavam anujñāya kuruṣveti dhanaṃjayaḥc droṇakarṇau maheṣvāsau savyataḥ paryavartataa abhiprāyaṃ tu kṛṣṇasya jñātvā parapuraṃjayaḥc ājiśīrṣagataṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmasenaṃ samāsadat bhīma uvācaa arjunārjuna bībhatso śṛṇu me tattvato vacaḥc yadarthaṃ kṣatriyā sūte tasya kālo yam āgataḥa asmiṃś ced āgate kāle śreyo na pratipatsyasec asaṃbhāvitarūpaḥ sann ānṛśaṃsyaṃ kariṣyasia satyaśrīdharmayaśasāṃ vīryeṇānṛṇyam āpnuhic bhindhy anīkaṃ yudhāṃ śreṣṭha savyasācinn imān kuru saṃjaya uvācaa sa savyasācī bhīmena coditaḥ keśavena cac karṇadroṇāv atikramya samantāt paryavārayata tam ājiśīrṣam āyāntaṃ dahantaṃ kṣatriyarṣabhānc parākrāntaṃ parākramya yatantaḥ kṣatriyarṣabhāḥe nāśaknuvan vārayituṃ vardhamānam ivānalama atha duryodhanaḥ karṇaḥ śakuniś cāpi saubalaḥc abhyavarṣañ śaravrātaiḥ kuntīputraṃ dhanaṃjayama teṣām astrāṇi sarveṣām uttamāstravidāṃ varaḥc kadarthīkṛtya rājendra śaravarṣair avākirata astrair astrāṇi saṃvārya laghuhasto dhanaṃjayaḥc sarvān avidhyan niśitair daśabhir daśabhiḥ śaraiḥa uddhūtā rajaso vṛṣṭiḥ śaravṛṣṭis tathaiva cac tamaś ca ghoraṃ śabdaś ca tadā samabhavan mahāna na dyaur na bhūmir na diśaḥ prājñāyanta tathā gatec sainyena rajasā mūḍhaṃ sarvam andham ivābhavata naiva te na vayaṃ rājan prajñāsiṣma parasparamb śabdamātreṇa jānīmo vayaṃ te ca parasparamc uddeśena hi tena sma samayudhyanta pārthivāḥa virathā rathino rājan samāsādya parasparamc keṣeśu samasajjanta kavaceṣu bhujeṣu caa hatāśvā hatasūtāś ca niśceṣṭā rathinas tadāc jīvanta iva tatra sma vyadṛśyanta bhayārditāḥa hatān gajān samāśliṣya parvatān iva vājinaḥc gatasattvā vyadṛśyanta tathaiva saha sādibhiḥa tatas tv abhyavasṛtyaiva saṃgrāmād uttarāṃ diśamc atiṣṭhad āhave droṇo vidhūma iva pāvakaḥa tam ājiśīrṣād ekāntam apakrāntaṃ niśāmya tuc samakampanta sainyāni pāṇḍavānāṃ viśāṃ patea bhrājamānaṃ śriyā yuktaṃ jvalantam iva tejasāc droṇaṃ dṛṣṭvārayas tresuś celur mamluś ca māriṣaa āhvayantaṃ parānīkaṃ prabhinnam iva vāraṇamc nainaṃ śaśaṃsire jetuṃ dānavā vāsavaṃ yathāa ke cid āsan nirutsāhāḥ ke cit kruddhā manasvinaḥc vismitāś cābhavan ke cit ke cid āsann amarṣitāḥa hastair hastāgram apare pratyapiṃṣan narādhipāḥb vidhūyānye karān kruddhāḥ kareṣv eva nyapīḍayanc apare daśanair oṣṭhān adaśan krodhamūrchitāḥa vyākṣipann āyudhān anye mamṛduś cāpare bhujānc anye cānvapatan droṇaṃ tyaktātmāno mahaujasaḥa pāñcālās tu viśeṣeṇa droṇasāyakapīḍitāḥc samasajjanta rājendra samare bhṛśavedanāḥd dṛṣṭvā droṇaṃ mahārāja samakampatanta pāṇḍavāḥd tato yodhā pāṇḍavānāṃ mahātmand dṛṣṭvā droṇaṃ dīpyamānaṃ śaraughaiḥd tataḥ sarve sṛñjayāḥ pāṇḍavāś cad jighāsanto droṇam evābhijagmuḥa tato virāṭadrupadau droṇaṃ pratiyayū raṇec tathā carantaṃ saṃgrāme bhṛśaṃ samaradurjayama drupadasya tataḥ pautrās traya eva viśāṃ patec cedayaś ca maheṣvāsā droṇam evābhyayur yudhia teṣāṃ drupadapautrāṇāṃ trayāṇāṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥc tribhir droṇo harat prāṇāṃs te hatā nyapatan bhuvia tato droṇo jayad yuddhe cedikekayasṛñjayānc matsyāṃś caivājayat sarvān bhāradvājo mahārathaḥa tatas tu drupadaḥ krodhāc charavarṣam avākiratc droṇaṃ prati mahārāja virāṭaś caiva saṃyuged taṃ nihatyeṣuvarṣaṃ tu droṇaḥ kṣatriyamardanaḥd tau śaraiś chādayām āsa virāṭadrupadāv ubhaud droṇena chādyamānau tau kruddhau saṃgrāmamūrdhanid droṇaṃ śarair vivyadhatuḥ paramaṃ krodham āsthitaud tato droṇo mahārāja krodhāmarṣasamanvitaḥd bhallābhyāṃ bhṛśatīkṣṇābhyāṃ ciccheda dhanuṣī tayoḥd tato virāṭaḥ kupitaḥ samare tomarān daśad daśa cikṣepa ca śarān droṇasya vadhakāṅkṣayād śaktiṃ ca drupado ghorām āyasīṃ svarṇabhūṣitāmd cikṣepa bhujagendrābhāṃ kruddho droṇarathaṃ pratid tato bhallaiḥ suniśitaiś chittvā tāṃs tomarān daśad śaktiṃ kanakavaiḍūryāṃ droṇaś ciccheda sāyakaiḥd sa tābhyām ardito vṛddho vṛddhābhyāṃ krodhamūrchitaḥa tato droṇaḥ supītābhyāṃ bhallābhyām arimardanaḥc drupadaṃ ca virāṭaṃ ca praiṣīd vaivasvatakṣayama hate virāṭe drupade kekayeṣu tathaiva cac tathaiva cedimatsyeṣu pāñcāleṣu tathaiva cae hateṣu triṣu vīreṣu drupadasya ca naptṛṣuf pāñcālarājapautreṣu triṣu cādbhutakarmasuf pitṛputravadhāyas taś cikīrṣan karma duṣkarama droṇasya karma tad dṛṣṭvā kopaduḥkhasamanvitaḥc śaśāpa rathināṃ madhye dhṛṣṭadyumno mahāmanāḥa iṣṭāpūrtāt tathā kṣātrād brāhmaṇyāc ca sa naśyatuc droṇo yasyādya mucyeta yo vā droṇāt parāṅmukhaḥa iti teṣāṃ pratiśrutya madhye sarvadhanuṣmatāmc āyād droṇaṃ sahānīkaḥ pāñcālyaḥ paravīrahāe pāñcālās tv ekato droṇam abhyaghnan pāṇḍavānyataḥa duryodhanaś ca karṇaś ca śakuniś cāpi saubalaḥc sodaryāś ca yathā mukhyās te rakṣan droṇam āhavea rakṣyamāṇaṃ tathā droṇaṃ samare tair mahātmabhiḥc yatamānāpi pāñcālā na śekuḥ prativīkṣituma tatrākrudhyad bhīmaseno dhṛṣṭadyumnasya māriṣac sa enaṃ vāgbhir ugrābhis tatakṣa puruṣarṣabhaa drupadasya kule jātaḥ sarvāstreṣv astravittamaḥc kaḥ kṣatriyo manyamānaḥ prekṣetārim avasthitama pitṛputravadhaṃ prāpya pumān kaḥ parihāpayetc viśeṣatas tu śapathaṃ śapitvā rājasaṃsadia eṣa vaiśvānara iva samiddhaḥ svena tejasāc śaracāpendhano droṇaḥ kṣatraṃ dahati tejasāa purā karoti niḥśeṣāṃ pāṇḍavānām anīkinīmc sthitāḥ paśyata me karma droṇam eva vrajāmy ahama ity uktvā prāviśat kruddho droṇānīkaṃ vṛkodaraḥc dṛḍhaiḥ pūrṇāyatotsṛṣṭair drāvayaṃs tava vāhinīmd athodyamya gadāṃ bhīmaḥ kāladaṇḍam ivāntakaḥd droṇāya vyasṛjad rājan rathahayapapalvuve sicd sāśvasūtadhvajaṃ rājan droṇasyāpothayat tadād prāmṛdadnan svabahūn yodhān vāyuvṛkṣān ivaujasād anyaṃ tu ratham āsthāya droṇaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥd vyūhadvāraṃ samāsthāya yuddhāya samavasthitaḥa dhṛṣṭadyumno pi pāñcālyaḥ praviśya mahatīṃ camūmc āsasāda raṇe droṇaṃ tadāsīt tumulaṃ mahata naiva nas tādṛśaṃ yuddhaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ na ca śrutamc yathā sūryodaye rājan samutpiñjo bhavan mahāna saṃsaktāni vyadṛśyanta rathavṛndāni māriṣac hatāni ca vikīrṇāni śarīrāṇi śarīriṇāma ke cid anyatra gacchantaḥ pathi cānyair upadrutāḥc vimukhāḥ pṛṣṭhataś cānye tāḍyante pārśvato parea tathā saṃsaktayuddhaṃ tad abhavad bhṛśadāruṇamc atha saṃdhyāgataḥ sūryaḥ kṣaṇena samapadyata saṃjaya uvācaa te tathaiva mahārāja daṃśitā raṇamūrdhanic saṃdhyāgataṃ sahasrāṃśum ādityam upatasthirea udite tu sahasrāṃśau taptakāñcanasaprabhec prakāśiteṣu lokeṣu punar yuddham avartataa dvaṃdvāni yāni tatrāsan saṃsaktāni purodayātc tāny evābhyudite sūrye samasajjanta bhārataa rathair hayā hayair nāgāḥ pādātāś cāpi kuñjaraiḥc hayā hayaiḥ samājagmuḥ pādātāś ca padātibhiḥd narā rathai rathā nāgais tathaiva puruṣarṣabhae saṃsaktāś ca viyuktāś ca yodhāḥ saṃnyapatan raṇea te rātrau kṛtakarmāṇaḥ śrāntāḥ sūryasya tejasāc kṣutpipāsāparītāṅgā visaṃjñā bahavo bhavana śaṅkhabherīmṛdaṅgānāṃ kuñjarāṇāṃ ca garjatāmc visphāritavikṛṣṭānāṃ kārmukāṇāṃ ca kūjatāma śabdaḥ samabhavad rājan divispṛg bharatarṣabhac dravatāṃ ca padātīnāṃ śastrāṇāṃ vinipātyatāma hayānāṃ heṣatāṃ caiva rathānāṃ ca nivartatāmc krośatāṃ garjatāṃ caiva tadāsīt tumulaṃ mahata vivṛddhas tumulaḥ śabdo dyām agacchan mahāsvanaḥc nānāyudhanikṛttānāṃ ceṣṭatām āturaḥ svanaḥa bhūmāv aśrūyata mahāṃs tadāsīt kṛpaṇaṃ mahatc patatāṃ patitānāṃ ca pattyaśvarathahastināma teṣu sarveṣv anīkeṣu vyatiṣakteṣv anekaśaḥc sve svāñ jaghnuḥ pare svāṃś ca sve parāṃś ca parān parea vīrabāhuvisṛṣṭāś ca yodheṣu ca gajeṣu cac asayaḥ pratyadṛśyanta vāsasāṃ nejaneṣv ivaa udyatapratipiṣṭānāṃ khaḍgānāṃ vīrabāhubhiḥc sa eva śabdas tadrūpo vāsasāṃ nijyatām ivaa ardhāsibhis tathā khaḍgais tomaraiḥ saparaśvadhaiḥc nikṛṣṭayuddhaṃ saṃsaktaṃ mahad āsīt sudāruṇama gajāśvakāyaprabhavāṃ naradehapravāhinīmc śastramatsyasusaṃpūrṇāṃ māṃsaśoṇitakardamāma ārtanādasvanavatīṃ patākāvastraphenilāmc nadīṃ prāvartayan vīrāḥ paralokapravāhinīma śaraśaktyarditāḥ klāntā rātrimūḍhālpacetasaḥc viṣṭabhya sarvagātrāṇi vyatiṣṭhan gajavājinaḥe saṃśuṣkavadanā vīrāḥ śirobhiś cārukuṇḍalaiḥa yuddhopakaraṇaiś cānyais tatra tatra prakāśitaiḥc kravyādasaṃghair ākīrṇaṃ mṛtair ardhamṛtair apie nāsīd rathapathas tatra sarvam āyodhanaṃ pratia majjatsu cakreṣu rathān sattvam āsthāya vājinaḥc kathaṃ cid avahañ śrāntā vepamānāḥ śarārditāḥe kulasattvabalopetā vājino vāraṇopamāḥf babhramus tatra tatraiva rathān ādāya bhārataa vihvalaṃ tat samudbhrāntaṃ sabhayaṃ bhāratāturamc balam āsīt tadā sarvam ṛte droṇārjunāv ubhaua tāv evāstāṃ nilayanaṃ tāv ārtāyanam eva cac tāv evānye samāsādya jagmur vaivasvatakṣayama āvignam abhavat sarvaṃ kauravāṇāṃ mahad balamc pāñcālānāṃ ca saṃsaktaṃ na prājñāyata kiṃ canaa antakākrīḍasadṛśe bhīrūṇāṃ bhayavardhanec pṛthivyāṃ rājavaṃśānām utthite mahati kṣayea na tatra karṇaṃ na droṇaṃ nārjunaṃ na yudhiṣṭhiramc na bhīmasenaṃ na yamau na pāñcālyaṃ na sātyakima na ca duḥśāsanaṃ drauṇiṃ na duryodhanasaubalauc na kṛpaṃ madrarājaṃ vā kṛtavarmāṇam eva caa na cānyān naiva cātmānaṃ na kṣitiṃ na diśas tathāc paśyāma rājan saṃsaktān sainyena rajasāvṛtāna saṃbhrānte tumule ghore rajomeghe samutthitec dvitīyām iva saṃprāptām amanyanta niśāṃ tadāa na jñāyante kauraveyā na pāñcālā na pāṇḍavāḥc na diśo na divaṃ norvīṃ na samaṃ viṣamaṃ tathād aśobhanta yathā meghāḥ śāradāś calavidyutaḥa hastasaṃsparśam āpannān parān vāpy atha vā svakānc nyapātayaṃs tadā yuddhe narāḥ sma vijayaiṣiṇaḥa uddhūtatvāt tu rajasaḥ prasekāc choṇitasya cac praśaśāma rajo bhaumaṃ śīghratvād anilasya caa tatra nāgā hayā yodhā rathino tha padātayaḥc pārijātavanānīva vyarocan rudhirokṣitāḥa tato duryodhanaḥ karṇo droṇo duḥśāsanas tathāc pāṇḍavaiḥ samasajjanta caturbhiś caturo rathāḥa duryodhanaḥ saha bhrātrā yamābhyāṃ samasajjatac vṛkodareṇa rādheyo bhāradvājena cārjunaḥa tad ghoraṃ mahad āścaryaṃ sarve praikṣan samantataḥc ratharṣabhāṇām ugrāṇāṃ saṃnipātam amānuṣama rathamārgair vicitraiś ca vicitrarathasaṃkulamc apaśyan rathino yuddhaṃ vicitraṃ citrayodhināma yatamānāḥ parākrāntāḥ parasparajigīṣavaḥc jīmūtā iva gharmānte śaravarṣair avākirana te rathān sūryasaṃkāśān āsthitāḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥc aśobhanta yathā meghāḥ śāradāḥ samupasthitāḥd yodhās te tu mahārāja krodhāmarṣasamanvitāḥa spardhinas te maheṣvāsāḥ kṛtayatnā dhanurdharāḥc abhyagacchaṃs tathānyonyaṃ mattā gajavṛṣā ivaa na nūnaṃ dehabhedo sti kāle tasmin samāgatec yatra sarve na yugapad vyaśīryanta mahārathāḥa bāhubhiś caraṇaiś chinnaiḥ śirobhiś cārukuṇḍalaiḥc kārmukair viśikhaiḥ prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paraśupaṭṭiśaiḥa nālīkakṣuranārācair nakharaiḥ śaktitomaraiḥc anyaiś ca vividhākārair dhautaiḥ praharaṇottamaiḥa citraiś ca vividhākāraiḥ śarīrāvaraṇair apic vicitraiś ca rathair bhagnair hataiś ca gajavājibhiḥa śūnyaiś ca nagarākārair hatayodhadhvajai rathaiḥc amanuṣyair hayais trastaiḥ kṛṣyamāṇais tatas tataḥa vātāyamānair asakṛd dhatavīrair alaṃkṛtaiḥc vyajanaiḥ kaṅkaṭaiś caiva dhvajaiś ca vinipātitaiḥa chatrair ābharaṇair vastrair mālyaiś ca susugandhibhiḥc hāraiḥ kirīṭair mukuṭair uṣṇīṣaiḥ kiṅkiṇīgaṇaiḥa urasyair maṇibhir niṣkaiś cūḍāmaṇibhir eva cac āsīd āyodhanaṃ tatra nabhas tārāgaṇair ivaa tato duryodhanasyāsīn nakulena samāgamaḥc amarṣitena kruddhasya kruddhenāmarṣitasya caa apasavyaṃ cakārātha mādrīputras tavātmajamc kirañ śaraśatair hṛṣṭas tatra nādo mahān abhūta apasavyaṃ kṛtaḥ saṃkhye bhrātṛvyenātyamarṣiṇāc so marṣitas tam apy ājau praticakre pasavyataḥd putras tava mahārāja rājā duryodhano drutama tataḥ praticikīrṣantam apasavyaṃ tu te sutamc nyavārayata tejasvī nakulaś citramārgavita sarvato vinivāryainaṃ śarajālena pīḍayanc vimukhaṃ nakulaś cakre tat sainyāḥ samapūjayana tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti nakulo babhāṣe tanayaṃ tavac saṃsmṛtya sarvaduḥkhāni tava durmantritena ca saṃjaya uvācaa tato duḥśāsanaḥ kruddhaḥ sahadevam upādravatc rathavegena tīvreṇa kampayann iva medinīma tasyāpatata evāśu bhallenāmitrakarśanaḥc mādrīsutaḥ śiro yantuḥ saśirastrāṇam acchinata nainaṃ duḥśāsanaḥ sūtaṃ nāpi kaś cana sainikaḥc hṛtottamāṅgam āśutvāt sahadevena buddhavāna yadā tv asaṃgṛhītatvāt prayānty aśvā yathāsukhamc tato duḥśāsanaḥ sūtaṃ buddhavān gatacetasama sa hayān saṃnigṛhyājau svayaṃ hayaviśāradaḥc yuyudhe rathināṃ śreṣṭhaś citraṃ laghu ca suṣṭhu caa tad asyāpūjayan karma sve pare caiva saṃyugec hatasūtarathenājau vyacarad yad abhītavata sahadevas tu tān aśvāṃs tīkṣṇair bāṇair avākiratc pīḍyamānāḥ śaraiś cāśu prādravaṃs te tatas tataḥa sa raśmiṣu viṣaktatvād utsasarja śarāsanamc dhanuṣā karma kurvaṃs tu raśmīn sa punar utsṛjata chidreṣu teṣu taṃ bāṇair mādrīputro bhyavākiratc parīpsaṃs tvatsutaṃ karṇas tadantaram avāpatata vṛkodaras tataḥ karṇaṃ tribhir bhallaiḥ samāhitaiḥc ākarṇapūrṇair abhyaghnan bāhvor urasi cānadata saṃnyavartata taṃ karṇaḥ saṃghaṭṭita ivoragaḥb bhīmam āvārayām āsa vikiran niśitāñ śarānb karṇas tu niśitair bāṇair vivyadhe marmabhedibhiḥc tad abhūt tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ bhīmarādheyayos tadād purā devāsure yuddhe vṛtravāsavayor ivaa tau vṛṣāv iva saṃkruddhau vivṛttanayanāv ubhauc vegena mahatānyonyaṃ saṃrabdhāv abhipetatuḥa abhisaṃśliṣṭayos tatra tayor āhavaśauṇḍayoḥc abhinnaśarapātatvād gadāyuddham avartataa gadayā bhīmasenas tu karṇasya rathakūbaramc bibhedāśu tadā rājaṃs tad adbhutam ivābhavata tato bhīmasya rādheyo gadām ādāya vīryavānc avāsṛjad rathe tāṃ tu bibheda gadayā gadāma tato bhīmaḥ punar gurvīṃ cikṣepādhirather gadāmc tāṃ śarair daśabhiḥ karṇaḥ supuṅkhaiḥ susamāhitaiḥe pratyavidhyat punaś cānyaiḥ sā bhīmaṃ punar āvrajatf vyālīva mantrābhihatā karṇabāṇair abhidrutāa tasyāḥ pratinipātena bhīmasya vipulo dhvajaḥc papāta sārathiś cāsya mumoha gadayā hataḥa sa karṇe sāyakān aṣṭau vyasṛjat krodhamūrchitaḥc dhvaje śarāsane caiva śarāvāpe ca bhāratad tais tasya niśitaiḥ pītair bhīmaseno mahābalaḥd ciccheda paravīraghnaḥ prahasann iva bhāratad karṇo py anyad dhanur gṛhya hemapṛṣṭhaṃ durāsadama tataḥ punas tu rādheyo hayān asya ratheṣubhiḥc ṛṣyavarṇāñ jaghānāśu tathobhau pārṣṇisārathīa sa vipannaratho bhīmo nakulasyāpluto rathamc harir yathā gireḥ śṛṅgaṃ samākrāmad ariṃdamaḥa tathā droṇārjunau citram ayudhyetāṃ mahārathauc ācāryaśiṣyau rājendra kṛtapraharaṇau yudhia laghusaṃdhānayogābhyāṃ rathayoś ca raṇena cac mohayantau manuṣyāṇāṃ cakṣūṃṣi ca manāṃsi caa upāramanta te sarve yodhāsmākaṃ pare tathāc adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ paśyantas tad yuddhaṃ guruśiṣyayoḥa vicitrān pṛtanāmadhye rathamārgān udīryataḥc anyonyam apasavyaṃ ca kartuṃ vīrau tadaiṣatuḥe parākramaṃ tayor yodhā dadṛśus taṃ suvismitāḥa tayoḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ droṇapāṇḍavayor mahatc āmiṣārthaṃ mahārāja gagane śyenayor ivaa yad yac cakāra droṇas tu kuntīputrajigīṣayāc tat tat pratijaghānāśu prahasaṃs tasya pāṇḍavaḥd tāv anyonyaṃ prati mahān saṃrambhaḥ samajāyatad mṛdupūrvam abhūd yuddhaṃ divyāstraviduṣor dvayoḥa yadā droṇo na śaknoti pāṇḍavasya viśeṣaṇec tataḥ prāduścakārāstram astramārgaviśāradaḥa aindraṃ pāśupataṃ tvāṣṭraṃ vāyavyam atha vāruṇamc muktaṃ muktaṃ droṇacāpāt taj jaghāna dhanaṃjayaḥa astrāṇy astrair yadā tasya vidhivad dhanti pāṇḍavaḥc tato straiḥ paramair divyair droṇaḥ pārtham avākirata yad yad astraṃ sa pārthāya prayuṅkte vijigīṣayāc tasyāstrasya vighātārthaṃ tat tat sa kurute rjunaḥa sa vadhyamāneṣv astreṣu divyeṣv api yathāvidhic arjunenārjunaṃ droṇo manasaivābhyapūjayata mene cātmānam adhikaṃ pṛthivyām api bhāratac tena śiṣyeṇa sarvebhyaḥ śastravidbhyaḥ samantataḥa vāryamāṇas tu pārthena tathā madhye mahātmanāmc yatamāno rjunaṃ prītyā pratyavārayad utsmayana tato ntarikṣe devāś ca gandharvāś ca sahasraśaḥc ṛṣayaḥ siddhasaṃghāś ca vyatiṣṭhanta didṛkṣayāa tad apsarobhir ākīrṇaṃ yakṣarākṣasasaṃkulamc śrīmad ākāśam abhavad bhūyo meghākulaṃ yathāa tatra smāntarhitā vāco vyacaranta punaḥ punaḥc droṇasya stavasaṃyuktāḥ pārthasya ca mahātmanaḥe visṛjyamāneṣv astreṣu jvālayatsu diśo daśaf abruvaṃs tatra siddhāś ca ṛṣayaś ca samāgatāḥa naivedaṃ mānuṣaṃ yuddhaṃ nāsuraṃ na ca rākṣasamc na daivaṃ na ca gāndharvaṃ brāhmaṃ dhruvam idaṃ parame vicitram idam āścaryaṃ na no dṛṣṭaṃ na ca śrutama ati pāṇḍavam ācāryo droṇaṃ cāpy ati pāṇḍavaḥc nānayor antaraṃ draṣṭuṃ śakyam astreṇa kena cita yadi rudro dvidhākṛtya yudhyetātmānam ātmanāc tatra śakyopamā kartum anyatra tu na vidyatea jñānam ekastham ācārye jñānaṃ yogaś ca pāṇḍaveb droṇe sauṣṭhavam ācārye lāghavaṃ sauṣṭhavaṃ tathāb arjune dṛśyate vyaktaṃ nānyasmiṃs tad dhanurdhareb lakṣam ekastham ācārye lakṣaṃ vedhaś ca pāṇḍaveb śaighryam ekastham ācārye śaighryaṃ vedhaś ca pāṇḍaveb gatam ekastham ācārye gataṃ vedhaś ca pāṇḍavec śauryam ekastham ācārye balaṃ śauryaṃ ca pāṇḍavea nemau śakyau maheṣvāsau raṇe kṣepayituṃ paraiḥc icchamānau punar imau hanyetāṃ sāmaraṃ jagata ity abruvan mahārāja dṛṣṭvā tau puruṣarṣabhauc antarhitāni bhūtāni prakāśāni ca saṃghaśaḥd yadā droṇaṃ mahārāja viśeṣayati pāṇḍavaḥa tato droṇo brāhmam astraṃ prāduścakre mahāmatiḥb tad astraṃ saṃdhitaṃ rājan ghorarūpaṃ mahāhavec saṃtāpayan raṇe pārthaṃ bhūtāny antarhitāni caa tataś cacāla pṛthivī saparvatavanadrumāb saritaś ca pratisrotaḥ samūhur vai kṣaṇāntaramc vavau ca viṣamo vāyuḥ sāgarāś cāpi cukṣubhuḥa tatas trāso mahān āsīt kurupāṇḍavasenayoḥc sarveṣāṃ caiva bhūtānām udyate stre mahātmanāa tataḥ pārtho py asaṃbhrāntas tad astraṃ pratijaghnivānc brahmāstreṇaiva rājendra tataḥ sarvam aśīśamata yadā na gamyate pāraṃ tayor anyatarasya vāc tataḥ saṃkulayuddhena tad yuddhaṃ vyakulīkṛtama nājñāyata tataḥ kiṃ cit punar eva viśāṃ patec pravṛtte tumule yuddhe droṇapāṇḍavayor mṛdhed droṇas tyajya raṇe pārthaṃ pāñcālān anvadhāvatad arjuno pi raṇe droṇaṃ tyaktvā prādrāvayat kurūnd śaraughair atha tābhyāṃ tu chāyābhūtaṃ mahāmṛdhed tumulaṃ prababhau rājan sarvasya jagato bhayama śarajālaiḥ samākīrṇe meghajālair ivāmbarec na sma saṃpatate kaś cid antarikṣacaras tadā saṃjaya uvācaa tasmiṃs tathā vartamāne narāśvagajasaṃkṣayec duḥśāsano mahārāja dhṛṣṭadyumnam ayodhayata sa tu rukmarathāsakto duḥśāsanaśarārditaḥc amarṣāt tava putrasya śarair vāhān avākirata kṣaṇena sa rathas tasya sadhvajaḥ sahasārathiḥc nādṛśyata mahārāja pārṣatasya śaraiś citaḥa duḥśāsanas tu rājendra pāñcālyasya mahātmanaḥc nāśakat pramukhe sthātuṃ śarajālaprapīḍitaḥa sa tu duḥśāsanaṃ bāṇair vimukhīkṛtya pārṣataḥb dhṛṣṭadyumno pi rājendra bhagnaṃ dṛṣṭvā tavātmajamc kirañ śarasahasrāṇi droṇam evābhyayād raṇea pratyapadyata hārdikyaḥ kṛtavarmā tadantaramc sodaryāṇāṃ trayaś caiva ta enaṃ paryavārayana taṃ yamau pṛṣṭhato nvaitāṃ rakṣantau puruṣarṣabhauc droṇāyābhimukhaṃ yāntaṃ dīpyamānam ivānalama saṃprahāram akurvaṃs te sarve sapta mahārathāḥc amarṣitāḥ sattvavantaḥ kṛtvā maraṇam agrataḥa śuddhātmānaḥ śuddhavṛttā rājan svargapuraskṛtāḥc āryaṃ yuddham akurvanta parasparajigīṣavaḥa śuklābhijanakarmāṇo matimanto janādhipāḥc dharmayuddham ayudhyanta prekṣanto gatim uttamāma na tatrāsīd adharmiṣṭham aśastraṃ yuddham eva cac nātra karṇī na nālīko na lipto na ca vastakaḥa na sūcī kapiśo nātra na gavāsthir gajāsthikaḥb na cūlī baliśas tatra na yamī nāpi pāvakaḥc iṣur āsīn na saṃśliṣṭo na pūtir na ca jihmagaḥa ṛjūny eva viśuddhāni sarve śastrāṇy adhārayanc suyuddhena parāṃl lokān īpsantaḥ kīrtim eva caa tadāsīt tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ sarvadoṣavivarjitamc caturṇāṃ tava yodhānāṃ tais tribhiḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ sahaa dhṛṣṭadyumnas tu tān hitvā tava rājan ratharṣabhānc yamābhyāṃ vāritān dṛṣṭvā śīghrāstro droṇam abhyayāta nivāritās tu te vīrās tayoḥ puruṣasiṃhayoḥc samasajjanta catvāro vātāḥ parvatayor ivaa dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ yamau sārdhaṃ rathābhyāṃ rathapuṃgavauc samāsaktau tato droṇaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumno bhyavartataa dṛṣṭvā droṇāya pāñcālyaṃ vrajantaṃ yuddhadurmadamc yamābhyāṃ tāṃś ca saṃsaktāṃs tadantaram upādravatd tatas tava suto rājan sātvatena samāgataḥa duryodhano mahārāja kirañ śoṇitabhojanānc taṃ sātyakiḥ śīghrataraṃ punar evābhyavartataa tau parasparam āsādya samīpe kurumādhavauc hasamānau nṛśārdūlāv abhītau samagacchatāma bālye vṛttāni sarvāṇi prīyamāṇau vicintya tauc anyonyaṃ prekṣamāṇau ca hasamānau punaḥ punaḥa atha duryodhano rājā sātyakiṃ pratyabhāṣatac priyaṃ sakhāyaṃ satataṃ garhayan vṛttam ātmanaḥa dhik krodhaṃ dhik sakhe lobhaṃ dhiṅ mohaṃ dhig amarṣitamc dhig astu kṣātram ācāraṃ dhig astu balam aurasama yat tvaṃ mām abhisaṃdhatse tvāṃ cāhaṃ śinipuṃgavac tvaṃ hi prāṇaiḥ priyataro mamāhaṃ ca sadā tavaa smarāmi tāni sarvāṇi bālye vṛttāni yāni nauc tāni sarvāṇi jīrṇāni sāṃprataṃ nau raṇājiree kim anyat krodhalobhābhyāṃ yudhyāmi tvādya sātvataa taṃ tathāvādinaṃ rājan sātyakiḥ pratyabhāṣatac prahasan viśikhāṃs tīkṣṇān udyamya paramāstravita neyaṃ sabhā rājaputra na cācāryaniveśanamc yatra krīḍitam asmābhis tadā rājan samāgataiḥ duryodhana uvācaa kva sā krīḍā gatāsmākaṃ bālye vai śinipuṃgavac kva ca yuddham idaṃ bhūyaḥ kālo hi duratikramaḥa kiṃ nu no vidyate kṛtyaṃ dhanena dhanalipsayāc yatra yudhyāmahe sarve dhanalobhāt samāgatāḥ saṃjaya uvācaa taṃ tathāvādinaṃ tatra rājānaṃ mādhavo bravītc evaṃvṛttaṃ sadā kṣatraṃ yad dhantīha gurūn apia yadi te haṃ priyo rājañ jahi māṃ mā ciraṃ kṛthāḥc tvatkṛte sukṛtāṃl lokān gaccheyaṃ bharatarṣabhaa yā te śaktir balaṃ caiva tat kṣipraṃ mayi darśayac necchāmy etad ahaṃ draṣṭuṃ mitrāṇāṃ vyasanaṃ mahata ity evaṃ vyaktam ābhāṣya pratibhāṣya ca sātyakiḥc abhyayāt tūrṇam avyagro nirapekṣo viśāṃ patea tam āyāntam abhiprekṣya pratyagṛhṇāt tavātmajaḥc śaraiś cāvākirad rājañ śaineyaṃ tanayas tavaa tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ kurumādhavasiṃhayoḥc anyonyaṃ kruddhayor ghoraṃ yathā dviradasiṃhayoḥa tataḥ pūrṇāyatotsṛṣṭaiḥ sātvataṃ yuddhadurmadamc duryodhanaḥ pratyavidhyad daśabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥa taṃ sātyakiḥ pratyaviddhat tathaiva daśabhiḥ śaraiḥb duryodhanas tataḥ kruddho mādhavaṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥc pañcāśatā punaś cājau triṃśatā daśabhiś ca had sātyakiṃ tu tato rājan prahasaṃs tanayas tavad ākarṇamuktair niśitair vivyādha triṃśatā śaraiḥd tato sya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ kṣurapreṇa dvidhākarotd so nyat kārmukam ādāya laghuhastas tato dṛḍhamd sātyakir vyasṛjac cāpi śaraśreṇīṃ sutasya ted tām āpatantīṃ sahasā śaraśreṇīṃ jighāṃsayād ciccheda bahudhā rājaṃs tata uccukruśur janāḥd sātyakiṃ ca trisaptatyā pīḍayām āsa vegitaḥd svarṇapuṅkhaiḥ śilādhautair ākarṇāpūrṇaniḥsṛtaiḥa tasya saṃdadhataś ceṣūn saṃhiteṣuṃ ca kārmukamc acchinat sātyakis tūrṇaṃ śaraiś caivābhyavīvṛṣata sa gāḍhaviddho vyathitaḥ pratyapāyād rathāntaramc duryodhano mahārāja dāśārhaśarapīḍitaḥa samāśvasya tu putras te sātyakiṃ punar abhyayātc visṛjann iṣujālāni yuyudhānarathaṃ pratia tathaiva sātyakir bāṇān duryodhanarathaṃ pratic pratataṃ vyasṛjad rājaṃs tat saṃkulam avartataa tatreṣubhiḥ kṣipyamāṇaiḥ patadbhiś ca samantataḥc agner iva mahākakṣe śabdaḥ samabhavan mahānd tayoḥ śarasahasraiś ca saṃchannaṃ vasudhātalamd agamyarūpaṃ ca śarair ākāśaṃ samapadyataa tatrābhyadhikam ālakṣya mādhavaṃ rathasattamamc kṣipram abhyapatat karṇaḥ parīpsaṃs tanayaṃ tavaa na tu taṃ marṣayām āsa bhīmaseno mahābalaḥc abhyayāt tvaritaḥ karṇaṃ visṛjan sāyakān bahūna tasya karṇaḥ śitān bāṇān pratihanya hasann ivac dhanuḥ śarāṃś ca ciccheda sūtaṃ cābhyahanac charaiḥa bhīmasenas tu saṃkruddho gadām ādāya pāṇḍavaḥc dhvajaṃ dhanuś ca sūtaṃ ca saṃmamardāhave ripoḥd rathacakraṃ ca karṇasya babhañja sa mahābalaḥd bhagnacakre rathe tiṣṭhad akampaḥ śailarāḍ ivad ekacakraṃ rathaṃ tasya tam ūhuḥ suciraṃ hayāḥd ekacakram ivārkasya rathaṃ saptarṣayo malāḥa amṛṣyamāṇaḥ karṇas tu bhīmasenam ayudhyatac vividhair iṣujālaiś ca nānāśastraiś ca saṃyuged bhīmasenas tu saṃkruddhaḥ sūtaputram ayodhayata saṃkule vartamāne tu rājā dharmasuto bravītc pāñcālānāṃ naravyāghrān matsyānāṃ ca nararṣabhāna ye naḥ prāṇāḥ śiro ye no ye no yodhā mahābalāḥc ta ete dhārtarāṣṭreṣu viṣaktāḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥa kiṃ tiṣṭhata yathā mūḍhāḥ sarve vigatacetasaḥc tatra gacchata yatraite yudhyante māmakā rathāḥa kṣatradharmaṃ puraskṛtya sarva eva gatajvarāḥc jayanto vadhyamānā vā gatim iṣṭāṃ gamiṣyathaa jitvā ca bahubhir yajñair yakṣyadhvaṃ bhūridakṣiṇaiḥc hatā vā devasād bhūtvā lokān prāpsyatha puṣkalāna te rājñā coditā vīrā yotsyamānā mahārathāḥc caturdhā vahinīṃ kṛtvā tvaritā droṇam abhyayuḥa pāñcālās tv ekato droṇam abhyaghnan bahubhiḥ śaraiḥc bhīmasenapurogāś ca ekataḥ paryavārayana āsaṃs tu pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ trayo jihmā mahārathāḥc yamau ca bhīmasenaś ca prākrośanta dhanaṃjayama abhidravārjuna kṣipraṃ kurūn droṇād apānudac tata enaṃ haniṣyanti pāñcālā hatarakṣiṇama kauraveyāṃs tataḥ pārthaḥ sahasā samupādravatc pāñcālān eva tu droṇo dhṛṣṭadyumnapurogamānd sasṛjus tarasā vīrān pañcame hani bhārataa pāñcālānāṃ tato droṇo py akarot kadanaṃ mahatc yathā kruddho raṇe śakro dānavānāṃ kṣayaṃ purāa droṇāstreṇa mahārāja vadhyamānāḥ pare yudhic nātrasanta raṇe droṇāt sattvavanto mahārathāḥa vadhyamānā mahārāja pāñcālāḥ sṛñjayās tathāc droṇam evābhyayur yuddhe mohayanto mahārathama teṣāṃ tūtsādyamānānāṃ pāñcālānāṃ samantataḥc abhavad bhairavo nādo vadhyatāṃ śaraśaktibhiḥa vadhyamāneṣu saṃgrāme pāñcāleṣu mahātmanāc udīryamāṇe droṇāstre pāṇḍavān bhayam āviśata dṛṣṭvāśvanarasaṃghānāṃ vipulaṃ ca kṣayaṃ yudhib dṛṣṭvā ca naranāgāśvapattīnāṃ vipulaṃ kṣayamc pāṇḍaveyā mahārāja nāśaṃsur vijayaṃ tadāa kaccid droṇo na naḥ sarvān kṣapayet paramāstravitc samiddhaḥ śiśirāpāye dahan kakṣam ivānalaḥa na cainaṃ saṃyuge kaś cit samarthaḥ prativīkṣitumc na cainam arjuno jātu pratiyudhyeta dharmavita trastān kuntīsutān dṛṣṭvā droṇasāyakapīḍitānc matimāñ śreyase yuktaḥ keśavo rjunam abravīta naiṣa yuddhena saṃgrāme jetuṃ śakyaḥ kathaṃ canab sadhanur dhanvināṃ śreṣṭho devair api savāsavaiḥb nyastaśastras tu saṃgrāme śakyo hantuṃ bhaven nṛbhiḥc api vṛtrahaṇā yuddhe rathayūthapayūthapaḥa āsthīyatāṃ jaye yogo dharmam utsṛjya pāṇḍavac yathā vaḥ saṃyuge sarvān na hanyād rukmavāhanaḥa aśvatthāmni hate naiṣa yudhyed iti matir mamac taṃ hataṃ saṃyuge kaś cid asmai śaṃsatu mānavaḥa etan nārocayad rājan kuntīputro dhanaṃjayaḥc anye tv arocayan sarve kṛcchreṇa tu yudhiṣṭhiraḥa tato bhīmo mahābāhur anīke sve mahāgajamc jaghāna gadayā rājann aśvatthāmānam ity utad parapramathanaṃ ghoraṃ mālavasyendravarmaṇaḥa bhīmasenas tu savrīḍam upetya droṇam āhavec aśvatthāmā hata iti śabdam uccaiś cakāra haa aśvatthāmeti hi gajaḥ khyāto nāmnā hato bhavatc kṛtvā manasi taṃ bhīmo mithyā vyāhṛtavāṃs tadāa bhīmasenavacaḥ śrutvā droṇas tat param apriyamc manasā sannagātro bhūd yathā saikatam ambhasia śaṅkamānaḥ sa tan mithyā vīryajñaḥ svasutasya vaic hataḥ sa iti ca śrutvā naiva dhairyād akampataa sa labdhvā cetanāṃ droṇaḥ kṣaṇenaiva samāśvasatc anucintyātmanaḥ putram aviṣahyam arātibhiḥa sa pārṣatam abhidrutya jighāṃsur mṛtyum ātmanaḥc avākirat sahasreṇa tīkṣṇānāṃ kaṅkapatriṇāma taṃ vai viṃśatisāhasrāḥ pāñcālānāṃ nararṣabhāḥc tathā carantaṃ saṃgrāme sarvato vyakirañ śaraiḥd taiḥ śarair āvṛtaṃ droṇaṃ nāpaśyāma mahārathamd bhāskaraṃ jaladai ruddhaṃ varṣāsv iva viśāṃ pated vidhūya tān bāṇagaṇān pāñcālānāṃ mahārathaḥa tataḥ prāduṣkarod droṇo brāhmam astraṃ paraṃtapaḥc vadhāya teṣāṃ śūrāṇāṃ pāñcālānām amarṣitaḥa tato vyarocata droṇo vinighnan sarvasomakānc śirāṃsy apātayac cāpi pāñcālānāṃ mahāmṛdhee tathaiva parighākārān bāhūn kanakabhūṣaṇāna te vadhyamānāḥ samare bhāradvājena pārthivāḥc medinyām anvakīryanta vātanunnā iva drumāḥa kuñjarāṇāṃ ca patatāṃ hayaughānāṃ ca bhāratac agamyarūpā pṛthivī māṃsaśoṇitakardamāa hatvā viṃśatisāhasrān pāñcālānāṃ rathavrajānc atiṣṭhad āhave droṇo vidhūmo gnir iva jvalana tathaiva ca punaḥ kruddho bhāradvājaḥ pratāpavānc vasudānasya bhallena śiraḥ kāyād apāharata punaḥ pañcaśatān matsyān ṣaṭsahasrāṃś ca sṛñjayānc hastinām ayutaṃ hatvā jaghānāśvāyutaṃ punaḥa kṣatriyāṇām abhāvāya dṛṣṭvā droṇam avasthitamc ṛṣayo bhyāgamaṃs tūrṇaṃ havyavāhapurogamāḥa viśvāmitro jamadagnir bhāradvājo tha gautamaḥc vasiṣṭhaḥ kaśyapo triś ca brahmalokaṃ ninīṣavaḥa sikatāḥ pṛśnayo gargā bālakhilyā marīcipāḥc bhṛgavo ṅgirasaś caiva sūkṣmāś cānye maharṣayaḥa ta enam abruvan sarve droṇam āhavaśobhinamc adharmataḥ kṛtaṃ yuddhaṃ samayo nidhanasya tea nyasyāyudhaṃ raṇe droṇa sametyāsmān avasthitānc nātaḥ krūrataraṃ karma punaḥ kartuṃ tvam arhasia vedavedāṅgaviduṣaḥ satyadharmaparasya cac brāhmaṇasya viśeṣeṇa tavaitan nopapadyatea nyasyāyudham amogheṣo tiṣṭha vartmani śāśvatec paripūrṇaś ca kālas te vastuṃ loke dya mānuṣed brahmāstreṇa tvayā dagdhā anastrajñā narā bhuvid yad etad īdṛśaṃ vipra kṛtaṃ karma na sādhu tatd nyasyāyudhaṃ raṇe kṣipraṃ droṇa mā tvaṃ ciraṃ kṛthāḥd mā pāpiṣṭhataraṃ karma kariṣyasi punar dvijaa iti teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā bhīmasenavacaś ca tatc dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca saṃprekṣya raṇe sa vimanābhavata sa dahyamāno vyathitaḥ kuntīputraṃ yudhiṣṭhiramb yudhiṣṭhiram upāgamya droṇo vacanam abravītb satyaṃ kathaya rājendra yadi jīvati me sutaḥc ahataṃ vā hataṃ veti papraccha sutam ātmanaḥa sthirā buddhir hi droṇasya na pārtho vakṣyate nṛtamc trayāṇām api lokānām aiśvaryārthe kathaṃ canaa tasmāt taṃ paripapraccha nānyaṃ kaṃ cid viśeṣataḥc tasmiṃs tasya hi satyāśā bālyāt prabhṛti pāṇḍavea tato niṣpāṇḍavām urvīṃ kariṣyantaṃ yudhāṃ patimc droṇaṃ jñātvā dharmarājaṃ govindo vyathito bravīta yady ardhadivasaṃ droṇo yudhyate manyum āsthitaḥc satyaṃ bravīmi te senā vināśaṃ samupaiṣyatia sa bhavāṃs trātu no droṇāt satyāj jyāyo nṛtaṃ bhavetc anṛtaṃ jīvitasyārthe vadan na spṛśyate nṛtaiḥd kāminīṣu vivāheṣu gavām arthe tathā dhaned brāhmaṇābhyavapattau ca anṛte nāsti pātakama tayoḥ saṃvadator evaṃ bhīmaseno bravīd idamc śrutvaiva taṃ mahārāja vadhopāyaṃ mahātmanaḥa gāhamānasya te senāṃ mālavasyendravarmaṇaḥc aśvatthāmeti vikhyāto gajaḥ śakragajopamaḥa nihato yudhi vikramya tato haṃ droṇam abruvamc aśvatthāmā hato brahman nivartasvāhavād itia nūnaṃ nāśraddadhad vākyam eṣa me puruṣarṣabhaḥc sa tvaṃ govindavākyāni mānayasva jayaiṣiṇaḥa droṇāya nihataṃ śaṃsa rājañ śāradvatīsutamc tvayokto naiṣa yudhyeta jātu rājan dvijarṣabhaḥe satyavān hi nṛloke smin bhavān khyāto janādhipaa tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā kṛṣṇavākyapracoditaḥc bhāvitvāc ca mahārāja vaktuṃ samupacakramea tam atathyabhaye magno jaye sakto yudhiṣṭhiraḥc avyaktam abravīd rājan hataḥ kuñjara ity utaa tasya pūrvaṃ rathaḥ pṛthvyāś caturaṅgula uttaraḥc babhūvaivaṃ tu tenokte tasya vāhāspṛśan mahīma yudhiṣṭhirāt tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvā droṇo mahārathaḥc putravyasanasaṃtapto nirāśo jīvite bhavata āgaskṛtam ivātmānaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahātmanāmc ṛṣivākyaṃ ca manvānaḥ śrutvā ca nihataṃ sutama vicetāḥ paramodvigno dhṛṣṭadyumnam avekṣya cac yoddhuṃ nāśaknuvad rājan yathāpūrvam ariṃdamaa taṃ dṛṣṭvā paramodvignaṃ śokopahatacetasamc pāñcālarājasya suto dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ samādravata ya iṣṭvā manujendreṇa drupadena mahāmakhec labdho droṇavināśāya samiddhād dhavyavāhanāta sa dhanur jaitram ādāya ghoraṃ jaladanisvanamc dṛḍhajyam ajaraṃ divyaṃ śarāṃś cāśīviṣopamāna saṃdadhe kārmuke tasmiñ śaram āśīviṣopamamc droṇaṃ jighāṃsuḥ pāñcālyo mahājvālam ivānalama tasya rūpaṃ śarasyāsīd dhanurjyāmaṇḍalāntarec dyotato bhāskarasyeva ghanānte pariveśinaḥa pārṣatena parāmṛṣṭaṃ jvalantam iva tad dhanuḥc antakālam iva prāptaṃ menire vīkṣya sainikāḥa tam iṣuṃ saṃhitaṃ tena bhāradvājaḥ pratāpavānc dṛṣṭvāmanyata dehasya kālaparyāyam āgatama tataḥ sa yatnam ātiṣṭhad ācāryas tasya vāraṇec na cāsyāstrāṇi rājendra prādurāsan mahātmanaḥa tasya tv ahāni catvāri kṣapā caikāsyato gatāb tasya tv ahaś ca rātriś ca śarān abhyasato gamatc tasya cāhnas tribhāgena kṣayaṃ jagmuḥ patatriṇaḥa sa śarakṣayam āsādya putraśokena cārditaḥc vividhānāṃ ca divyānām astrāṇām aprasannatāma utsraṣṭukāmaḥ śastrāṇi vipravākyābhicoditaḥc tejasā preryamāṇaś ca yuyudhe so timānuṣama athānyat sa samādāya divyam āṅgirasaṃ dhanuḥc śarāṃś ca brahmadaṇḍābhān dhṛṣṭadyumnam ayodhayata tatas taṃ śaravarṣeṇa mahatā samavākiratc vyaśātayac ca saṃkruddho dhṛṣṭadyumnam amarṣaṇaḥd tataś ca pārṣato rājan samākṛṣya dhanur mahatd śaraṃ mumoca niśitaṃ bhāradvājajighāṃsayāa taṃ śaraṃ śatadhā cāsya droṇaś ciccheda sāyakaiḥc dhvajaṃ dhanuś ca niśitaiḥ sārathiṃ cāpy apātayata dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ prahasyānyat punar ādāya kārmukamc śitena cainaṃ bāṇena pratyavidhyat stanāntarea so tividdho maheṣvāsaḥ saṃbhrānta iva saṃyugec bhallena śitadhāreṇa cicchedāsya mahad dhanuḥa yac cāsya bāṇaṃ vikṛtaṃ dhanūṃṣi ca viśāṃ patec sarvaṃ saṃchidya durdharṣo gadāṃ khaḍgam athāpi caa dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ tato vidhyan navabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥc jīvitāntakaraiḥ kruddhaḥ kruddharūpaṃ paraṃtapaḥa dhṛṣṭadyumnarathasyāśvān svarathāśvair mahārathaḥc amiśrayad ameyātmā brāhmam astram udīrayana te miśrā bahv aśobhanta javanā vātaraṃhasaḥc pārāvatasavarṇāś ca śoṇāś ca bharatarṣabhaa yathā savidyuto meghā nadanto jaladāgamec tathā rejur mahārāja miśritā raṇamūrdhania īṣābandhaṃ cakrabandhaṃ rathabandhaṃ tathaiva cac praṇāśayad ameyātmā dhṛṣṭadyumnasya sa dvijaḥa sa chinnadhanvā viratho hatāśvo hatasārathiḥc uttamām āpadaṃ prāpya gadāṃ vīraḥ parāmṛśata tām asya viśikhais tīkṣṇaiḥ kṣipyamāṇāṃ mahārathaḥc nijaghāna śarair droṇaḥ kruddhaḥ satyaparākramaḥa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā tu naravyāghro droṇena nihatāṃ śaraiḥc vimalaṃ khaḍgam ādatta śatacandraṃ ca bhānumata asaṃśayaṃ tathābhūte pāñcālyaḥ sādhv amanyatac vadham ācāryamukhyasya prāptakālaṃ mahātmanaḥa tataḥ svarathanīḍasthaḥ svarathasya ratheṣayāc agacchad asim udyamya śatacandraṃ ca bhānumata cikīrṣur duṣkaraṃ karma dhṛṣṭadyumno mahārathaḥc iyeṣa vakṣo bhettuṃ ca bhāradvājasya saṃyugea so tiṣṭhad yugamadhye vai yugasaṃnahaneṣu cac śoṇānāṃ jaghanārdheṣu tat sainyāḥ samapūjayana tiṣṭhato yugapālīṣu śoṇān apy adhitiṣṭhataḥc nāpaśyad antaraṃ droṇas tad adbhutam ivābhavata kṣipraṃ śyenasya carato yathaivāmiṣagṛddhinaḥc tadvad āsīd abhīsāro droṇaṃ prārthayato raṇea tasyāśvān rathaśaktyāsau tadā kruddhaḥ parākramīc sarvān ekaikaśo droṇaḥ kapotābhān ajīghanata te hatā nyapatan bhūmau dhṛṣṭadyumnasya vājinaḥc śoṇāś ca paryamucyanta rathabandhād viśāṃ patea tān hayān nihatān dṛṣṭvā dvijāgryeṇa sa pārṣataḥc nāmṛṣyata yudhāṃ śreṣṭho yājñasenir mahārathaḥa virathaḥ sa gṛhītvā tu khaḍgaṃ khaḍgabhṛtāṃ varaḥc droṇam abhyapatad rājan vainateya ivoragama tasya rūpaṃ babhau rājan bhāradvājaṃ jighāṃsataḥc yathā rūpaṃ paraṃ viṣṇor hiraṇyakaśipor vadhea so carad vividhān mārgān prakārān ekaviṃśatimb darśayām āsa kauravya pārṣato vicaran raṇec bhrāntam udbhrāntam āviddham āplutaṃ prasṛtaṃ sṛtama parivṛttaṃ nivṛttaṃ ca khaḍgaṃ carma ca dhārayanc saṃpātaṃ samudīrṇaṃ ca darśayām āsa pārṣataḥd bhārataṃ kauśikaṃ caiva sātvataṃ caiva śikṣayād darśayan vyacarad yuddhe droṇasyāntacikīrṣayād caratas tasya tān mārgān vicitrān khaḍgacarmiṇaḥd vyasmayanta raṇe yodhā devatāś ca samāgatāḥa tataḥ śarasahasreṇa śatacandram apātayatc khaḍgaṃ carma ca saṃbādhe dhṛṣṭadyumnasya sa dvijaḥa te tu vaitastikā nāma śarā hy āsannaghātinaḥc nikṛṣṭayuddhe droṇasya nānyeṣāṃ santi te śarāḥa śāradvatasya pārthasya drauṇer vaikartanasya cab ṛte śāradvatāt pārthād droṇer vaikartanāt tathāc pradyumnayuyudhānābhyām abhimanyoś ca te śarāḥa athāsyeṣuṃ samādhatta dṛḍhaṃ paramasaṃśitamc antevāsinam ācāryo jighāṃsuḥ putrasaṃmitama taṃ śarair daśabhis tīkṣṇaiś ciccheda śinipuṃgavaḥb paśyatas tasya tān mārgān vicitrān khaḍgacarmaṇic paśyatas tava putrasya karṇasya ca mahātmanaḥe grastam ācāryamukhyena dhṛṣṭadyumnam amocayata carantaṃ rathamārgeṣu sātyakiṃ satyavikramamc droṇakarṇāntaragataṃ kṛpasyāpi ca bhāratae apaśyetāṃ mahātmānau viṣvaksenadhanaṃjayaua apūjayetāṃ vārṣṇeyaṃ bruvāṇau sādhu sādhv itic divyāny astrāṇi sarveṣāṃ yudhi nighnantam acyutame abhipatya tataḥ senāṃ viṣvaksenadhanaṃjayaua dhanaṃjayas tataḥ kṛṣṇam abravīt paśya keśavac ācāryavaramukhyānāṃ madhye krīḍan madhūdvahaḥa ānandayati māṃ bhūyaḥ sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥc mādrīputrau ca bhīmaṃ ca rājānaṃ ca yudhiṣṭhirama yac chikṣayānuddhataḥ san raṇe carati sātyakiḥc mahārathān upakrīḍan vṛṣṇīnāṃ kīrtivardhanaḥa tam ete pratinandanti siddhāḥ sainyāś ca vismitāḥc ajayyaṃ samare dṛṣṭvā sādhu sādhv iti sātvatame yodhāś cobhayataḥ sarve karmabhiḥ samapūjayan saṃjaya uvāca sātvatasya tu tat karma dṛṣṭvā duryodhanādayaḥ śaineyaṃ sarvataḥ kruddhā vārayām āsur añjasā kṛpakarṇau ca samare putrāś ca tava māriṣa śaineyaṃ tvarayābhyetya vinighnan niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ yudhiṣṭhiras tato rājā mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau bhīmasenaś ca balavān sātvataṃ paryavārayan karṇaś ca śaravarṣeṇa gautamaś ca mahārathaḥ duryodhanādayas te ca śaineyaṃ paryavārayan tāṃ vṛṣṭiṃ sahasā rājann utthitāṃ ghorarūpiṇīm vārayām āsa śaineyo yodhayaṃs tān mahārathān teṣām astrāṇi divyāni saṃhitāni mahātmanām vārayām āsa vidhivad divyair astrair mahāmṛdhe saṃprahṛṣṭācyuto dṛṣṭvā sādhu sādhv iti pūjayan taṃ yaudhāś cābhavan sarve karmaṇānena pūjayan evam uktvā mahārāja vāsudevaṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ prāyāt tava balaṃ jiṣṇur bhāradvājarathaṃ prati tatrāsīd bhairavo nādas tāvakānāṃ jayaiṣiṇām samabhidravatāṃ pārthaṃ daityānām iva vāsavam tatrākaron mahārāja mahīṃ śoṇitakardamām prācchinac cottamāṅgāni pārtho śvanaradantināma krūram āyodhanaṃ jajñe tasmin rājasamāgamec rudrasyeva hi kruddhasya nighnatas tu paśūn yathāa hastānām uttamāṅgānāṃ kārmukāṇāṃ ca bhāratac chatrāṇāṃ cāpaviddhānāṃ cāmarāṇāṃ ca saṃyuged rāśayaḥ sma vyadṛśyanta tatra tatra raṇājirea bhagnacakrai rathaiś cāpi pātitaiś ca mahādhvajaiḥc sādibhiś ca hataiḥ śūraiḥ saṃkīrṇā vasudhābhavata bāṇapātanikṛttās tu yodhās te kurusattamac ceṣṭanto vividhāś ceṣṭā vyadṛśyanta mahāhavea vartamāne tathā yuddhe ghore devāsuropamec abravīt kṣatriyāṃs tatra dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥe abhidravata saṃyattāḥ kumbhayoniṃ mahārathāḥa eṣa vai pārṣato vīro bhāradvājena saṃgataḥc ghaṭate ca yathāśakti bhāradvājasya nāśanea yādṛśāni hi rūpāṇi dṛśyante no mahāraṇec adya droṇaṃ raṇe kruddhaḥ pātayiṣyati pārṣataḥe te yūyaṃ sahitā bhūtvā kumbhayoniṃ parīpsataa yudhiṣṭhirasamājñaptāḥ sṛñjayānāṃ mahārathāḥc abhyadravanta saṃyattā bhāradvājaṃ jighāṃsavaḥa tān samāpatataḥ sarvān bhāradvājo mahārathaḥc abhyadravata vegena martavyam iti niścitaḥa prayāte satyasaṃdhe tu samakampata medinīc vavur vātāḥ sanirghātās trāsayanto varūthinīma papāta mahatī colkā ādityān nirgateva hac dīpayantīva tāpena śaṃsantīva mahad bhayama jajvaluś caiva śastrāṇi bhāradvājasya māriṣac rathāḥ svananti cātyarthaṃ hayāś cāśrūṇy avāsṛjana hataujā iva cāpy āsīd bhāradvājo mahārathaḥb prāsphuran nayanaṃ cāsya dakṣiṇo bāhur eva cab vimanāś cābhavad yuddhe dṛṣṭvā pārṣatam agrataḥc ṛṣīṇāṃ brahmavādānāṃ svargasya gamanaṃ pratie suyuddhena tataḥ prāṇān utsraṣṭum upacakramea tataś caturdiśaṃ sainyair drupadasyābhisaṃvṛtaḥc nirdahan kṣatriyavrātān droṇaḥ paryacarad raṇea hatvā viṃśatisāhasrān kṣatriyān arimardanaḥc daśāyutāni tīkṣṇāgrair avadhīd viśikhaiḥ śitaiḥa so tiṣṭhad āhave yatto vidhūma iva pāvakaḥc kṣatriyāṇām abhāvāya brāhmam ātmānam āsthitaḥa pāñcālyaṃ virathaṃ bhīmo hatasarvāyudhaṃ vaśīc aviṣaṇṇaṃ mahātmānaṃ tvaramāṇaḥ samabhyayāta tataḥ svaratham āropya pāñcālyam arimardanaḥc abravīd abhisaṃprekṣya droṇam asyantam antikāta na tvad anya ihācāryaṃ yoddhum utsahate pumānc tvarasva prāgvadhāyaiva tvayi bhāraḥ samāhitaḥa sa tathokto mahābāhuḥ sarvabhārasahaṃ navamc abhipatyādade kṣipram āyudhapravaraṃ dṛḍhama saṃrabdhaś ca śarān asyan droṇaṃ durvāraṇaṃ raṇec vivārayiṣur ācāryaṃ śaravarṣair avākirata tau nyavārayatāṃ śreṣṭhau saṃrabdhau raṇaśobhinauc udīrayetāṃ brāhmāṇi divyāny astrāṇy anekaśaḥa sa mahāstrair mahārāja droṇam ācchādayad raṇec nihatya sarvāṇy astrāṇi bhāradvājasya pārṣataḥa sa vasātīñ śibīṃś caiva bāhlīkān kauravān apic rakṣiṣyamāṇān saṃgrāme droṇaṃ vyadhamad acyutaḥa dhṛṣṭadyumnas tadā rājan gabhastibhir ivāṃśumānc babhau pracchādayann āśāḥ śarajālaiḥ samantataḥa tasya droṇo dhanuś chittvā viddhvā cainaṃ śilīmukhaiḥc marmāṇy abhyahanad bhūyaḥ sa vyathāṃ paramām agāta tato bhīmo dṛḍhakrodho droṇasyāśliṣya taṃ rathamc śanakair iva rājendra droṇaṃ vacanam abravīta yadi nāma na yudhyerañ śikṣitā brahmabandhavaḥc svakarmabhir asaṃtuṣṭā na sma kṣatraṃ kṣayaṃ vrajeta ahiṃsā sarvabhūteṣu dharmaṃ jyāyastaraṃ viduḥc tasya ca brāhmaṇo mūlaṃ bhavāṃś ca brahmavittamaḥa śvapākavan mlecchagaṇān hatvā cānyān pṛthagvidhānb bharanti hi sutān dārāṃs tvadvad ajñānamohitāḥc ajñānān mūḍhavad brahman jagāma paramaṃ sthānaṃ dehaṃ nyasya rathottamea dvau sūryāv iti no buddhir āsīt tasmiṃs tathā gatec ekāgram iva cāsīd dhi jyotirbhiḥ pūritaṃ nabhaḥe samapadyata cārkābhe bhāradvājaniśākarea nimeṣamātreṇa ca taj jyotir antaradhīyatac āsīt kilakilāśabdaḥ prahṛṣṭānāṃ divaukasāme brahmalokaṃ gate droṇe dhṛṣṭadyumne ca mohitea vayam eva tadādrākṣma pañca mānuṣayonayaḥc yogayuktaṃ mahātmānaṃ gacchantaṃ paramāṃ gatima ahaṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ pārthaḥ kṛpaḥ śāradvato dvijaḥc vāsudevaś ca vārṣṇeyo dharmarājaś ca pāṇḍavaḥa anye tu sarve nāpaśyan bhāradvājasya dhīmataḥc mahimānaṃ mahārāja yogamuktasya gacchataḥd brahmalokaṃ mahad divyaṃ devaguhyaṃ hi tat parama gatiṃ paramikāṃ prāptam ajānanto nṛyonayaḥc nāpaśyan gacchamānaṃ hi taṃ sārdham ṛṣipuṃgavaiḥe ācāryaṃ yogam āsthāya brahmalokam ariṃdamama prākrośan pāṇḍavāḥ sarve phalgunaś cāpluto rathātb na hantavyo na hantavya iti te sarvato bruvanb krośatsu pāṇḍaveyeṣu anudhāvati phalguneb vikṛtaḥ sarvabhūtasya brahmabhūtaṃ parāmṛśatc dhikkṛtaḥ pārṣatas taṃ tu sarvabhūtaiḥ parāmṛśata tasya mūrdhānam ālambya gatasattvasya dehinaḥc kiṃ cid abruvataḥ kāyād vicakartāsinā śiraḥa harṣeṇa mahatā yukto bhāradvāje nipātitec siṃhanādaravaṃ cakre ghātayiṣyasic jīvantam ānayācāryaṃ mā vadhīr drupadātmajaa na hantavyo na hantavya iti te sainikāś ca hac utkrośann arjunaś caiva sānukrośas tam ādravata krośamāne rjune caiva pārthiveṣu ca sarvaśaḥc dhṛṣṭadyumno vadhīd droṇaṃ rathatalpe nararṣabhama śoṇitena pariklinno rathād bhūmim ariṃdamaḥc lohitāṅga ivādityo durdarśaḥ samapadyatae evaṃ taṃ nihataṃ saṃkhye dadṛśe sainiko janaḥa dhṛṣṭadyumnas dudruvuḥ sarvatodiśama droṇas tu divam āsthāya nakṣatrapatham āviśatc aham eva tadādrākṣaṃ droṇasya nidhanaṃ nṛpaa ṛṣeḥ prasādāt kṛṣṇasya satyavatyāḥ sutasya caa   catvāras te ca mānuṣāḥa agner iva dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥc varūthinyām anṛtyetāṃ pariṣvajya parasparama abravīc ca tadā bhīmaḥ pārṣataṃ śatrutāpanamc bhūyo haṃ tvāṃ vijayinaṃ pariṣvakṣyāmi pārṣatae sūtaputre hate pāpe dhārtarāṣṭre droṇe hate rājan kuravaḥ śastrapīḍitāḥc hatapravīrā vidhvastā bhṛśaṃ śokaparāyaṇāḥd udīrṇāṃś ca parān dṛṣṭvā hṛṣyamāṇān punaḥ punaḥd aśrupūrṇekṣaṇās trastā dīnā hy āsan viśāṃ patea vicetaso hatotsāhāḥ abravīta dhṛṣṭadyumnasya yo mṛtyuḥ sṛṣṭas tena mahātmanāc yathā droṇasya pāñcālyo yajñasenasuto bhavata taṃ nṛśaṃsena pāpena krūreṇātyalpadarśināc śrutvā nihatam ācāryam aśvatthāmā kim abravīt saṃjaya uvācaa chadmanā nihataṃ śrutvā pitaraṃ pāpakarmaṇāc bāṣpeṇāpūryata drauṇī roṣeṇa ca nararṣabhaa tasya kruddhasya rājendra vapur divyam adṛśyatac antakasyeva bhūtāni jihīrṣoḥ kālaparyayea aśrupūrṇe tato netre apamṛjya punaḥ punaḥc uvāca kopān niḥśvasya duryodhanam idaṃ vacaḥa pitā mama yathā kṣudrair nyastaśastro nipātitaḥc dharmadhvajavatā pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ tad viditaṃ mamae anāryaṃ sunṛśaṃsasya dharmaputrasya me śrutamf asatyavākyaṃ yat tena lobhād uktaṃ durātmanāf rājyahetor nṛśaṃsena tac cāpi viditaṃ mayāa yuddheṣv api pravṛttānāṃ dhruvau jayaparājayauc dvayam etad bhaved rājan vadhas nidhanaṃ gataḥa yat tu dharmapravṛttaḥ san keśagrahaṇam āptavānc paśyatāṃ sarvasainyānāṃ tan me marmāṇi kṛntatid mayi jīvati yat tātaḥ keśagraham avāptavānd katham anye kariṣyanti putrebhyaḥ putriṇaḥ spṛhāma kāmāt krodhād avajñānād darpād bālyena vā punaḥc vaidharmikāni kurvanti tathā paribhavena caa tad idaṃ pārṣateneha mahad ādharmikaṃ kṛtamc avajñāya ca māṃ nūnaṃ nṛśaṃsena durātmanāa api bhāratad iccheyaṃ yadi dūrasthān nihaniṣyanti me śarāḥa yatheṣṭam aśmavarṣeṇa pravarṣiṣye raṇe sthitaḥc ayomukhaiś ca vihagair drāvayiṣye mahārathāne paraśvadhāṃś ca vividhān prasakṣye ham naḥ sarvān kṣapayed iti me matiḥa upacīrṇo gurur mithyā bhavatā rājyakāraṇātc dharmajñena satā nāma so dharmaḥ sumahān kṛtaḥd ciraṃ sthāsyati cākīrtis trailokye sacarācared rāme vālivadhād yadvad evaṃ droṇe nipātitea sarvadharmopapanno yaṃ mama śiṣyaś ca pāṇḍavaḥc nāyaṃ vakṣyati mithyeti pratyayaṃ kṛtavāṃs tvayia sa satyakañcukaṃ nāma praviṣṭena tato nṛtamc ācārya ukto bhavatā hataḥ kuñjara ity nyastaśastram adharmeṇa ghātayitvā guruṃ bhavānc rakṣatv idānīṃ sāmātyo yadi śaknoṣi pārṣatama grastam ācāryaputreṇa kruddhena hatabandhunāc sarve vayaṃ paritrātuṃ na śakṣyāmo dya pārṣatama sauhārdaṃ sarvabhūteṣu yaḥ karoty atimātraśaḥc so dya keśagrahaṃ śrutvā pitur dhakṣyati no raṇea vikrośamāne hi mayi bhṛśam ācāryagṛddhinic avakīrya svadharmaṃ hi śiṣyeṇa nihato guruḥa yadā gataṃ vayo bhūyaḥ śiṣṭam alpataraṃ ca naḥc tasyedānīṃ vikāro yam adharmo yatkṛto mahāna piteva nityaṃ sauhārdāt piteva sa hi dharmataḥc so lpakālasya rājyasya kāraṇān nihato guruḥa dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa bhīṣmāya droṇāya ca mahārathāḥc apriyaṃ vā priyaṃ vāpi mahārāja dhanaṃjayama tataḥ kruddho mahābāhur bhīmaseno bhyabhāṣatac utsmayann iva kaunteyam arjunaṃ bharatarṣabhaa munir yathāraṇyagato bhāṣase dharmasaṃhitamc nyastadaṇḍo yathā pārtha brāhmaṇaḥ saṃśitavrataḥa kṣatāt trātā kṣatāj jīvan kṣāntas triṣv api sādhuṣuc kṣatriyaḥ kṣitim āpnoti kṣipraṃ dharmaṃ yaśaḥ śriyama sa bhavān kṣatriyaguṇair yuktaḥ sarvaiḥ kulodvahaḥc avipaścid yathā vākyaṃ vyāharan nādya śobhased vartamāne yathā pāpe ugrakarmaṇi bhāratad svadharmam anavasthāpya kim etāni prabhāṣasea parākramas te kaunteya śakrasyeva śacīpateḥc na cātivartase dharmaṃ velām iva mahodadhiḥa na pūjayet tvā ko nvadya yat trayodaśavārṣikamc amarṣaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā dharmam evābhikāṅkṣased aham āvārayiṣyāmi gadayā sarvakauravānd tvayā vinā yadi mahīṃ dharmaputrāya dhīmated na dadyāṃ pañcame prāpte divase nāsmi kṣatriyaḥa diṣṭyā tāta manas te dya svadharmam anuvartatec ānṛśaṃsye ca te diṣṭyā buddhiḥ satatam acyutaa yat tu dharmapravṛttasya hṛtaṃ rājyam adharmataḥc draupadī ca parāmṛṣṭā sabhām ānīya śatrubhiḥd kathaṃ vṛddheṣu tiṣṭhatsu dhārmikeṣu mahatsu cad draupadī prāpnuyāt kleśaṃ veśyā yoṣeva bhāratad kim u teṣāṃ bilvaphalaṃ mukhe hy āsīn mahātmanāmd utāho badhirā hy āsan mūkā vāpi dhanaṃjayad andhā vasaṃs tadā te tu yaiś ca noktaṃ hitaṃ vacaḥd atha tatra bhaved dharmo na caivātrāsty anāryakamd anurūpaṃ kṛtaṃ cāpi satyadharmaratā vayamd tathā tan marṣayitvā tu yathā te utpathasthitāḥa etāny amarṣasthānāni marṣitāni tvayānaghac kṣatradharmaprasaktena sarvam etad anuṣṭhitama tam adharmam apākraṣṭum ārabdhaḥ upāśritaḥc amānuṣeṇa hanty asmān astreṇa kṣudrakarmakṛta tathā māyāṃ prayuñjānam asahyaṃ brāhmaṇabruvamc māyayaiva nihanyād yo na yuktaṃ pārtha tatra kima tasmiṃs tathā mayā śaste yadi drauṇāyanī tadartham aham utpannaḥ pāñcālyasya suto nalāta yasya kāryam akāryaṃ vā yudhyataḥ syāt samaṃ raṇec taṃ kathaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brūyāḥ kṣatriyaṃ vā dhanaṃjayaa yo hy anastravido hanyād brahmāstraiḥ krodhamūrchitaḥc sarvopāyair na sa kathaṃ vadhyaḥ puruṣasattamad viśeṣāt pitṛhantā me na sa vadhyaḥ kathaṃ mayād yo yaṃ pāpaḥ sudurmedhā bāndhavān yudhi jaghnivānd tasya viprabruvavadhe kathaṃ pāpaṃ bhaven mamaa vidharmiṇaṃ dharmavidbhiḥ proktaṃ teṣāṃ viṣopamamc jānan dharmārthatattvajñaḥ kim arjuna vigarhasea nṛśaṃsaḥ sa mayākramya ratha eva nipātitaḥc tan mābhinandyaṃ bībhatso kimarthaṃ vairaṃ mamācāryeṇa viśrutamd tathā jānāty ayaṃ loko na yūyaṃ pāṇḍunandanāḥa nānṛtaḥ pāṇḍavo jyeṣṭho nāhaṃ vādhārmiko rjunab na kṣatriya iti prāhur yo na hanti raṇājireb pitaraṃ vā guruṃ vāpi jighāṃsuṃ ākruśyati droṇe samakṣaṃ pāpakarmiṇaḥc nāmarṣaṃ tatra kurvanti dhik kṣatraṃ dhig amarṣitama pārthāḥ sarve ca rājānaḥ pṛthivyāṃ ye dhanurdharāḥc śrutvā kim āhuḥ pāñcālyaṃ tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya saṃjaya kṣatriyarṣabhāḥ saṃjaya uvācaa tataḥ sa kadanaṃ cakre ripūṇāṃ droṇanandanaḥc yugānte sarvabhūtānāṃ kālasṛṣṭa ivāntakaḥa dhvajadrumaṃ śastraśṛṅgaṃ hatanāgamahāśilamc aśvakiṃpuruṣākīrṇaṃ
