yasmād yudhyantam ācāryaṃ dharmakañcukam āsthitaḥc muñca śastram iti prāha kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥa tasmāt saṃpaśyatas tasya drāvayiṣyāmi vāhinīmc vidrāvya satyaṃ hantāsmi pāpaṃ pāñcālyam eva tua sarvān etān haniṣyāmi yadi yotsyanti māṃ raṇec satyaṃ te pratijānāmi parāvartaya vāhinīma tac chrutvā tava putras tu vāhinīṃ paryavartayatc siṃhanādena mahatā vyapohya sumahad bhayamd bherīś cāvādayan hṛṣṭāḥ paṭahān dundubhīṃś ca had āḍambarān mṛdaṅgāṃś ca jharjharīś cānakān apid maḍḍukān paṇavān vīṇā ḍiṇḍimāṃś ca sahasraśaḥd sarve caiva maheṣvāsā dadhmuḥ śaṅkhān mahāsvanānd tato nanāda vasudhā khuranemisamāhatād sa śabdas tumulaḥ khaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ ca vyanādayatd kurūṇām atha taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā ghoraṃ samutthitamd pāṇḍavāḥ somakaiḥ sārdhaṃ samapadyanta vismitāḥd te tu dṛṣṭvā kurūn rājan nadato bhairavān ravānd abhyavartanta vegena mṛtyuṃ kṛtvā nivartanama tataḥ samāgamo rājan kurupāṇḍavasenayoḥc punar evābhavat tīvraḥ pūrṇasāgarayor ivaa saṃrabdhā hi sthirībhūtā droṇaputreṇa kauravāḥc udagrāḥ pāṇḍupāñcālā droṇasya nidhanena caa teṣāṃ paramahṛṣṭānāṃ jayam ātmani paśyatāmc saṃrabdhānāṃ mahāvegaḥ prādurāsīd raṇājirea yathā śiloccaye śailaḥ sāgare sāgaro yathāc pratihanyeta rājendra tathāsan kurupāṇḍavāḥa tataḥ śaṅkhasahasrāṇi bherīṇām ayutāni cac avādayanta saṃhṛṣṭāḥ kurupāṇḍavasainikāḥd cukṣubhe pṛthivī sarvā diśaś ca pratisasvanuḥd saṃbhrāntāni ca bhūtāni jalajāny api māriṣad te ca sarve tathā yaudhāḥ saṃprahṛṣṭā yuyutsavaḥd vartamāne tathā śabde raudre tasmin bhayānaked saṃpatatsu rathaugheṣu tava teṣāṃ ca bhārataa tato nirmathyamānasya sāgarasyeva nisvanaḥc abhavat tasya sainyasya sumahān adbhutopamaḥa prāduścakre tato drauṇir astraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ tadāc abhisaṃdhāya pāṇḍūnāṃ pāñcālānāṃ ca vāhinīma prādurāsaṃs tato bāṇā dīptāgrāḥ khe sahasraśaḥc pāṇḍavān bhakṣayiṣyanto dīptāsyā iva pannagāḥa te diśaḥ khaṃ ca sainyaṃ ca samāvṛṇvan mahāhaveb tato ntarikṣaṃ khagamair nānāliṅgaiḥ subhairavaiḥc muhūrtād bhāskarasyeva rājaṃl lokaṃ gabhastayaḥa tathāpare dyotamānā jyotīṃṣīvāmbare malec prādurāsan mahīpāla kārṣṇāyasamayā guḍāḥa caturdiśaṃ vicitrāś ca śataghnyo tha hutāśadāḥc cakrāṇi ca kṣurāntāni maṇḍalānīva bhāsvataḥd pāśāś ca vividhākārā nārācāñjalikās tathād saṃpatantaḥ sma dṛśyante śataśo tha sahasraśaḥd yathā yugakṣaye ghore paribhūtaṃ jagad bhavetd tadvad āsīt tadā rājañ jyotirbhūtaṃ nabhaḥsthalama śastrākṛtibhir ākīrṇam atīva bharatarṣabhac dṛṣṭvāntarikṣam āvignāḥ pāṇḍupāñcālasṛñjayāḥa yathā yathā hy ayudhyanta pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathāḥc tathā tathā tad astraṃ vai vyavardhata janādhipaa vadhyamānās tathāstreṇa tena nārāyaṇena vaib prapetuḥ kuñjarās tatra śastrasaṃghair nipātitāḥb vyadīryamāṇā girayo vajranunnā yathā purāb hastihastaiś ca saṃchinnair gātraiś caiva viśāṃ pateb aparaiś ca tathā bāṇaiḥ kuntaiś ca kanakojjvalaiḥb saṃkīrṇā pṛthivī jajñe māṃsaśoṇitakardamāb gajebhyaś cyavamānānāṃ yantṝṇāṃ tatra bhāratab vibhujānāṃ viśīrṇānāṃ nyastakārmukavarmaṇāmb pūrṇam āyodhanaṃ jajñe pretarājapuropamamb aṅkuśair apaviddhaiś ca tomaraiś ca mahādhanaiḥb alaṃkāraiś ca nāgānāṃ graiveyaiś ca sakaṅkaṭaiḥb kakṣyābhir agnikuṇḍaiś ca yantraiś caiva patākibhiḥb śaktibhiś ca mahārāja bāṇaiś ca nataparvabhiḥb rathināṃ ca rathair bhagnaiś chinnair vā yugadaṇḍakaiḥb cakrair vimathitair bhagnair yugair akṣaiś ca bhūṣitāb tūṇīrair apaviddhaiś ca cāpaiś ca sumahādhanaiḥb anukarṣaiḥ patākābhir yoktraiś caiva viśāṃ pateb raśmibhiś ca pratodaiś ca kiṅkiṇībhiś ca māriṣab kavacaiś ca tathā dīptaiś cāmaravyajanair apib chattraiś ca candrasaṃkāśair vṛṣṭyātapanivāribhiḥb aṅgulitraiḥ sakeyūrair dīptair niṣkaiś ca kāñcanaiḥb karṇasūtraiḥ kirīṭaiś ca mukuṭaiś ca mahādhanaiḥb citrair vastrair alaṃkāraiḥ kuṇḍalaiś cāpi bhāratab apaviddhais tathā śīrṣair bāhubhiś ca mahātmanāmb saṃchannā pṛthivī reje tatra tatra yathātathamb uraśchadais tathā citrair ghaṇṭājālaiś ca bhāsvaraiḥb nihatais turagaiś caiva nirjihvaiḥ śoṇitokṣitaiḥb hayārohaparaiś caiva nirdagdhair astratejasāb nānāṅgāvayavair hīnā yaudhāḥ sasrur bhayārditāḥb cukruśus tāta tāteti hā hā putreti cāsakṛtb yaudhā nūnaṃ te nidhanaṃ prāptāḥ pāṇḍaveyā mahārathāḥb vāsudevaś ca vārṣṇeyas tathā somakasṛñjayāḥb jīvatsu samare teṣu na hi vīreṣu sainikāḥb imām avasthāṃ sahasā gaccheyur vai kathaṃ canab ity abruvaṃs tathā yaudhā hanyamānās tadā raṇeb kruddhena droṇaputreṇa kāleneva yugakṣayeb hanyamānās tathāstreṇa tena nārāyaṇena tec dahyamānānaleneva sarvato bhyarditā raṇea yathā hi śiśirāpāye dahet kakṣaṃ hutāśanaḥc tathā tad astraṃ pāṇḍūnāṃ dadāha dhvajinīṃ prabhoa āpūryamāṇenāstreṇa sainye kṣīyati cābhibhoc jagāma paramaṃ trāsaṃ dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥa dravamāṇaṃ tu tat sainyaṃ dṛṣṭvā vigatacetanamc madhyasthatāṃ ca pārthasya dharmaputro bravīd idama dhṛṣṭadyumna palāyasva saha pāñcālasenayāc sātyake tvaṃ ca gacchasva vṛṣṇyandhakavṛto gṛhāna vāsudevo pi dharmātmā kariṣyaty ātmanaḥ kṣamamc upadeṣṭuṃ samartho yaṃ lokasya kim utātmanaḥa saṃgrāmas tu na kartavyaḥ sarvasainyān bravīmi vaḥc ahaṃ hi saha sodaryaiḥ pravekṣye havyavāhanama bhīṣmadroṇārṇavaṃ tīrtvā saṃgrāmaṃ bhīrudustaramc avasatsyāmy asalile sagaṇo drauṇigoṣpadea kāmaḥ saṃpadyatām asya bībhatsor āśu māṃ pratic kalyāṇavṛtta ācāryo mayā yudhi nipātitaḥa yena bālaḥ sa saubhadro yuddhānām aviśāradaḥc samarthair bahubhiḥ krūrair ghātito nābhipālitaḥa yenāvibruvatā praśnaṃ tathā kṛṣṇā sabhāṃ gatāc upekṣitā saputreṇa dāsabhāvaṃ niyacchatīd rakṣaṇe ca mahān yatnaḥ saindhavasya kṛto yudhid arjunasya vighātārthaṃ pratijñā yena rakṣitād vyūhadvāri vayaṃ caiva dhṛtā yena jigīṣavaḥd vāritaṃ ca mahat sainyaṃ prāviśat tad yathābalama jighāṃsur dhārtarāṣṭraś ca śrānteṣv aśveṣu phalgunamc kavacena tathā yukto rakṣārthaṃ saindhavasya caa yena brahmāstraviduṣā pāñcālāḥ satyajinmukhāḥc kurvāṇā majjaye yatnaṃ samūlā vinipātitāḥd grahaṇe ca paro yatnaḥ kṛtas tena yathā mamad viditaṃ sarvam evaitad bhavatāṃ sarvayodhināma yena pravrājyamānāś ca rājyād vayam adharmataḥc nivāryamāṇenāsmābhir anugantuṃ tad eṣitāḥd vanavāsān nivṛttānāṃ samaye ca tathā kṛted snehaś ca darśito nityaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vo mahārathāḥa yo sāv atyantam asmāsu kurvāṇaḥ sauhṛdaṃ paramc hatas tadarthe maraṇaṃ gamiṣyāmi sabāndhavaḥa evaṃ bruvati kaunteye dāśārhas tvaritas tataḥc nivārya sainyaṃ bāhubhyām idaṃ vacanam abravīta śīghraṃ nyasyata śastrāṇi vāhebhyaś cāvarohatac eṣa yogo tra vihitaḥ pratighāto mahātmanāa dvipāśvasyandanebhyaś ca kṣitiṃ sarve varohatac evam etan na vo hanyād astraṃ bhūmau nirāyudhānd sāyudhān yudhyamānān vo hanyād etān api dhruvama yathā yathā hi yudhyante yodhā hy astrabalaṃ pratic tathā tathā bhavanty ete kauravā balavattarāḥd rāmeṇa pṛthivī sarvā niḥkṣatriyagaṇā kṛtād anenāstreṇa bhīmena kṣatram utsāditaṃ purād yat tan nārāyaṇaṃ tejaḥ astratejaḥpramardanamd tad astraṃ nirmitaṃ pūrvaṃ viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunād yadā nipātito daityo hiraṇyākṣo mahāsuraḥd tadā nārāyaṇāstraṃ hi pūrvasṛṣṭaṃ hi viṣṇunād taṃ nipātya mahādaityaṃ dvāparānte nṛpottamad rāmeṇa tapa āsthāya labdhaṃ pūrvaṃ mahātmanād devadevaṃ samārādhya viṣṇuṃ tribhuvaneśvaramd tasmād droṇam anuprāptaṃ sarvāstraprativāraṇamd tathaitad dhi mahāśastraṃ kena cin na nivāryated nārāyaṇāstrasya nṛpā eṣa yogo nivāraṇea nikṣepsyanti ca śastrāṇi vāhanebhyo varuhya yeb ye ñjaliṃ kurvate vīrā namanti ca vivāhanāḥc tān naitad astraṃ saṃgrāme nihaniṣyati mānavāna ye tv etat pratiyotsyanti manasāpīha ke canac nihaniṣyati tān sarvān rasātalagatān apia te vacas tasya tac chrutvā vāsudevasya bhāratac īṣuḥ sarve stram utsraṣṭuṃ manobhiḥ karaṇena caa tata utsraṣṭukāmāṃs tān astrāṇy ālakṣya pāṇḍavaḥc bhīmaseno bravīd rājann idaṃ saṃharṣayan vacaḥa na kathaṃ cana śastrāṇi moktavyānīha kena citc aham āvārayiṣyāmi droṇaputrāstram āśugaiḥa atha vāpy anayā gurvyā hemavigrahayā raṇec kālavad vicariṣyāmi drauṇer astraṃ viśātayana na hi me vikrame tulyaḥ kaś cid asti pumān ihac yathaiva savitus tulyaṃ jyotir anyan na vidyatea paśyadhvaṃ me dṛḍhau bāhū nāgarājakaropamāc samarthau parvatasyāpi śaiśirasya nipātanea nāgāyutasamaprāṇo hy aham eko nareṣv ihac śakro yathā pratidvaṃdvo divi deveṣu viśrutaḥa adya paśyata me vīryaṃ bāhvoḥ pīnāṃsayor yudhic jvalamānasya dīptasya drauṇer astrasya vāraṇea yadi nārāyaṇāstrasya pratiyoddhā na vidyatec adyainaṃ pratiyotsyāmi paśyatsu kurupāṇḍuṣud arjunārjuna bībhatso na nyasyaṃ gāṇḍivaṃ tvayād arjuna uvācad śaśāṅkasyeva te paṅko nairmalyaṃ pātayiṣyatid bhīma nārāyaṇāstre me goṣu ca brāhmaṇeṣu cad eteṣu gāṇḍivaṃ nyasyam etad dhi vratam uttamama evam uktvā tato bhīmo droṇaputram ariṃdamaḥc abhyayān meghaghoṣeṇa rathenādityavarcasād kampayan medinīṃ sarvāṃ trāsayaṃś ca camūṃ tavad śaṅkhaśabdaṃ mahat kṛtvā bhujaśabdaṃ ca pāṇḍavaḥd tasya śaṅkhasvanaṃ śrutvā bāhuśabdaṃ ca tāvakāḥd samantāt koṣṭhakīkṛtya śaravrātair avākirand samakampanta vitrastāḥ śakṛn mūtraṃ prasusruvuḥa sa enam iṣujālena laghutvāc chīghravikramaḥc nimeṣamātreṇāsādya kuntīputro bhyavākirata tato drauṇiḥ prahasyainam udāsam abhibhāṣya cac avākirat pradīptāgraiḥ śarais tair abhimantritaiḥa pannagair iva dīptāsyair vamadbhir analaṃ raṇec avakīrṇo bhavat pārthaḥ sphuliṅgair iva kāñcanaiḥa tasya rūpam abhūd rājan bhīmasenasya saṃyugec khadyotair āvṛtasyeva parvatasya dinakṣayea tad astraṃ droṇaputrasya tasmin pratisamasyatic avardhata mahārāja yathāgnir aniloddhataḥa vivardhamānam ālakṣya tad astraṃ bhīmavikramamc pāṇḍusainyam ṛte bhīmaṃ sumahad bhayam āviśata tataḥ śastrāṇi te sarve samutsṛjya mahītalec avārohan rathebhyaś ca hastyaśvebhyaś ca sarvaśaḥa teṣu nikṣiptaśastreṣu vāhanebhyaś cyuteṣu cab upariṣṭād bhraman yatra yatra yodhān prapaśyatib gṛhītaśastrān ārūḍhān vāhaneṣu mahātmasub yatra yatra prayāti sma kramamāṇaṃ raṇājireb tatra tatra vimuktās tāḥ sarve dṛśyanta saṃghaśaḥb tato paśyad raṇe bhīmaṃ gadāhastam ariṃdamamb asaṃbhrāntaṃ samāyāntaṃ droṇaputrarathaṃ pratic tad astravīryaṃ vipulaṃ bhīmamūrdhany athāpatata hāhākṛtāni bhūtāni pāṇḍavāś ca viśeṣataḥc bhīmasenam apaśyanta tejasā saṃvṛtaṃ tadā saṃjaya uvācaa bhīmasenaṃ samākīrṇaṃ dṛṣṭvāstreṇa dhanaṃjayaḥc tejasaḥ pratighātārthaṃ vāruṇena samāvṛṇota nālakṣayata taṃ kaś cid vāruṇāstreṇa saṃvṛtamc arjunasya laghutvāc ca saṃvṛtatvāc ca tejasaḥa sāśvasūtaratho bhīmo droṇaputrāstrasaṃvṛtaḥc agnāv agnir iva nyasto jvālāmālī sudurdṛśaḥa yathā rātrikṣaye rājañ jyotīṃṣy astagiriṃ pratic samāpetus tathā bāṇā bhīmasenarathaṃ pratid tad astraṃ vāruṇaṃ bhaktā nārāyaṇasamudbhavamd prajajvāla punar bhīmaṃ saṃvṛtya tu raṇājirea sa hi bhīmo rathaś cāsya hayāḥ sūtaś ca māriṣac saṃvṛtā droṇaputreṇa pāvakāntargatābhavana yathā dagdhvā jagat kṛtsnaṃ samaye sacarācaramc gacched agnir vibhor āsyaṃ tathāstraṃ bhīmam āvṛṇota sūryam agniḥ praviṣṭaḥ syād yathā cāgniṃ divākaraḥc tathā praviṣṭaṃ tat tejo na prājñāyata kiṃ canad tad astraṃ bhīmahuṃkārād apayāti punaḥ punaḥd punaḥ punas tam āyāti huṃkārāt taṃ vimuñcatid tato devā sagandharvā bhīmaṃ dṛṣṭvā suvismitāḥa vikīrṇam astraṃ tad dṛṣṭvā tathā bhīmarathaṃ pratic udīryamāṇaṃ drauṇiṃ ca niṣpratidvaṃdvam āhavea sarvasainyāni pāṇḍūnāṃ nyastaśastrāṇy acetasaḥc yudhiṣṭhirapurogāṃś ca vimukhāṃs tān mahārathāna arjuno vāsudevaś ca tvaramāṇau mahādyutīc avaplutya rathād vīrau bhīmam ādravatāṃ tataḥa tatas tad droṇaputrasya tejo strabalasaṃbhavamc vigāhya tau subalinau māyayāviśatāṃ tadāa nyastaśastrau tatas tau tu nādahad astrajo nalaḥc vāruṇāstraprayogāc ca vīryavattvāc ca kṛṣṇayoḥa tataś cakṛṣatur bhīmaṃ tasya sarvāyudhāni cac nārāyaṇāstraśāntyarthaṃ naranārāyaṇau balātd pātayām āsatuḥ punar bhīmasenaṃ raṇe balātd bhīmaṃ nirāyudhaṃ kṛtvā tadā kṛṣṇadhanaṃjayaua apakṛṣyamāṇaḥ kaunteyo nadaty eva mahārathaḥc vardhate caiva tad ghoraṃ drauṇer astraṃ sudurjayama tam abravīd vāsudevaḥ kim idaṃ pāṇḍunandanac vāryamāṇo pi kaunteya yad yuddhān na nivartasea yadi yuddhena jeyāḥ syur ime kauravanandanāḥc vayam apy atra yudhyema tathā ceme nararṣabhāḥa rathebhyas tv avatīrṇās tu sarva eva sma tāvakāḥc tasmāt tvam api kaunteya rathāt tūrṇam apākramaa evam uktvā tataḥ kṛṣṇo rathād bhūmim apātayatc niḥśvasantaṃ yathā nāgaṃ krodhasaṃraktalocanama yadāpakṛṣṭaḥ sa rathān nyāsitaś cāyudhaṃ bhuvic tato nārāyaṇāstraṃ tat praśāntaṃ śatrutāpanama tasmin praśānte vidhinā tadā tejasi duḥsahec babhūvur vimalāḥ sarvā diśaḥ pradiśa eva caa pravavuś ca śivā vātāḥ praśāntā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥc vāhanāni ca hṛṣṭāni yodhāś ca manujeśvaraa vyapoḍhe ca tato ghore tasmiṃs tejasi bhāratac babhau bhīmo niśāpāye dhīmān sūrya ivoditaḥa hataśeṣaṃ balaṃ tatra pāṇḍavānām atiṣṭhatac astravyuparamād dhṛṣṭaṃ tava putrajighāṃsayāa vyavasthite bale tasminn astre pratihate tathāc duryodhano mahārāja droṇaputram athābravīta aśvatthāman punaḥ śīghram astram etat prayojayac vyavasthitā hi pāñcālāḥ punar eva jayaiṣiṇaḥa aśvatthāmā tathoktas tu tava putreṇa māriṣac sudīnam abhiniḥśvasya rājānam idam abravīta naitad āvartate rājann astraṃ dvir nopapadyatec āvartayan nihanty etat prayoktāraṃ na saṃśayaḥa eṣa cāstrapratīghātaṃ vāsudevaḥ prayuktavānb astrasya tu hy eṣa veda mānuṣeṣu na vidyateb parāvarajño lokānāṃ na tad asti na vetti yatb tad etad astraṃ praśamaṃ yātaṃ kṛṣṇasya mantritec anyathā vihitaḥ saṃkhye vadhaḥ śatror janādhipaa parājayo vā mṛtyur vā śreyo mṛtyur na nirjayaḥc nirjitāś cārayo hy ete śastrotsargān mṛtopamāḥ duryodhana uvācaa ācāryaputra yady etad dvir astraṃ na prayujyatec anyair gurughnā vadhyantām astrair astravidāṃ varaa tvayi hy astrāṇi divyāni yathā syus tryambake tathāc icchato na hi te mucyet kruddhasyāpi puraṃdaraḥd ghnataitān sumahāvīrya śātravān yuddhakovida dhṛtarāṣṭra uvācaa tasminn astre pratihate droṇe copadhinā hatec tathā duryodhanenokto drauṇiḥ kim akarot punaḥa dṛṣṭvā pārthāṃś ca saṃgrāme yuddhāya samavasthitānc nārāyaṇāstranirmuktāṃś carataḥ pṛtanāmukhe saṃjaya uvācaa jānan pituḥ sa nidhanaṃ siṃhalāṅgūlaketanaḥc sakrodho bhayam utsṛjya abhidudrāva pārṣatama abhidrutya ca viṃśatyā kṣudrakāṇāṃ nararṣabhaḥc pañcabhiś cātivegena vivyādha puruṣarṣabhama dhṛṣṭadyumnas tato rājañ jvalantam iva pāvakamb tam ātmabhujavegena vikarṣantaṃ śarāsanamb taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā susaṃkruddhaṃ kālānalayamopamamb vimuñcan viśikhāṃs tūrṇaṃ pārṣato bhyadravad raṇeb tau drauṇiḥ krodhatāmrākṣo didhikṣann iva tejasāb chādayām āsa bāṇaughair dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ samantataḥb dhṛṣṭadyumno pi saṃbhrāntaḥ śareṇānataparvaṇāb pratyavidhyata saṃkruddhaḥ pārṣataṃ prayato balātb tasya drauṇir dhanuś chittvā sthūṇena paravīrahāb dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ trisaptatyā vivyādha niśitair nadanb tad apāsya dhanuś chinnaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ pratāpavānb anyat kārmukam ādāya so śvatthāmānam ārdayatb sa tad apy asya saṃkruddhaś ciccheda paramāstravitb taṃ cāpy avākirad bāṇair dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ paraṃtapaḥb tataḥ sa pārṣatas tūrṇaṃ śaktiṃ hemapariṣkṛtāmb cikṣepa paramakruddho jvalantīm aśanīm ivab tām āpatantīṃ sahasā vyālīkāla ivāhaveb ciccheda saptadhā rājañ śaraiḥ paramatejanaiḥb tāṃ nikṛttāṃ tato dṛṣṭvā drauṇinā pārṣatas tataḥb dhanur anyat samādāya samare vegavattaramb tato vidhyat sutīkṣṇābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ drauṇim āhaveb tato dvābhyāṃ sutīkṣṇābhyāṃ bhallābhyāṃ tatra kārmukamb drauṇir drupadaputrasya ciccheda prahasann ivab taṃ ca bāṇair mahātejāḥ punar anyaiḥ samāvṛṇotb sāśvasūtarathaṃ tūrṇaṃ chādayām āsa saṃyugeb tasya cānucarān sarvān dīptāstrān pārśvataḥ sthitānb vyadrāvayata saṃkruddhaḥ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥb brahmadattaṃ tato bāṇaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnajighāṃsayāb droṇaputraḥ pracikṣepa sātyakis tad dvidhācchinatb sātyakis tu tam ādāya rājaputraṃ śarārditamb aṣṭābhir niśitair bāṇair aśvatthāmānam ārdayatb aśītyā punar āhatya nānārūpair amarṣaṇaḥb vivyādhāsya tribhiḥ sūtaṃ caturbhiś caturo hayānb evam uktvā śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ sātyakiṃ tūrṇam āvṛṇotb saṃrabdhaḥ krodhatāmrākṣo droṇaputraḥ pratāpavānb sātyakis tu tataḥ kruddhaḥ śareṇānataparvaṇāb droṇaputraṃ samājaghne sarvasainyasya paśyataḥb tato drauṇir mahārāja bāṇaiḥ saṃchādya sātyakimb dhanuḥ krodhaparītātmā cicchedāśu mahāstravitb tataḥ śaktiṃ mahāghorāṃ hemadaṇḍām ayasmayīmb cikṣepa sātyakis tūrṇaṃ droṇaputrajighāṃsayāb tām āpatantīṃ sahasā śakramuktām ivāśanimb aprāptām eva ciccheda drauṇiḥ saptabhir āśugaiḥb tāṃ nikṛttāṃ śarair dṛṣṭvā drauṇinā sāyakair bhṛśamb so nyat kārmukam ādāya bhāraghnaṃ vegavattaramb tad vikṛṣya mahac cāpaṃ sātyakiḥ sātvatāṃ varaḥb sāyakair bahubhis tūrṇam aśvatthāmānam ārdayatb tato drauṇiḥ susaṃrabdhaḥ śarajālena mādhavamb chādayām āsa samare sātyakiṃ krodhamūrchitaḥb tāny asya śarajālāni antarikṣe viśāṃ pateb aprāptān eva ciccheda yuyudhāno mahārathaḥb tataḥ pūrṇāyatotsṛṣṭair hemapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥb bāṇair vivyādha sudṛḍhaṃ droṇaputram amarṣitaḥb tathā sa viddhaḥ subhṛśaṃ droṇaputro tyamarṣaṇaḥb śaineyaṃ samare kruddhaḥ pradahann iva cakṣuṣāb avākirad ameyātmā bāṇavarṣaiḥ samantataḥb parvataṃ vāridhārābhis tapānte jalado yathāc droṇaputraṃ triṣaṣṭyā tu rājan vivyādha patriṇāma sārathiṃ cāsya viṃśatyā svarṇapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥc hayāṃś ca caturo vidhyac caturbhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥa viddhvā viddhvānadad drauṇiḥ kampayann iva medinīmc ādadat sarvalokasya prāṇān iva mahāraṇea pārṣatas tu balī rājan kṛtāstraḥ kṛtaniśramaḥc drauṇim evābhidudrāva kṛtvā mṛtyuṃ nivartanama tato bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ droṇaputrasya mūrdhanic avāsṛjad ameyātmā pāñcālyo rathināṃ varaḥa taṃ drauṇiḥ samare kruddhaś chādayām āsa patribhiḥc vivyādha cainaṃ daśabhiḥ pitur vadham anusmarana dvābhyāṃ ca suvikṛṣṭābhyāṃ kṣurābhyāṃ dhvajakārmukec chittvā pāñcālarājasya drauṇir anyaiḥ samārdayata vyaśvasūtarathaṃ cainaṃ drauṇiś cakre mahāhavec tasya cānucarān sarvān kruddhaḥ prācchādayac charaiḥa pradrudrāva tataḥ sainyaṃ pāñcālānāṃ viśāṃ patec saṃbhrāntarūpam ārtaṃ ca śaravarṣaparikṣatama dṛṣṭvā ca vimukhān yodhān dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pīḍitamc śaineyo codayat tūrṇaṃ raṇaṃ drauṇirathaṃ pratia putre tava putro mahārathaḥf kṛpakarṇādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ śaraiḥ sātvatam āvṛṇotf duryodhanas tu viṃśatyā kṛpaḥ śāradvatas tribhiḥf kṛtavarmātha daśabhiḥ karṇaḥ pañcāśatā śaraiḥf duḥśāsanaḥ śatenaiva bharatarṣabhaf cintayām āsa duḥkhārto niḥśvasaṃś ca punaḥ punaḥf tato rathāntaraṃ drauṇiḥ samāruhya paraṃtapaḥf sātyakiṃ vārayām āsa kirañ śaraśatān bahūnf tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya bhāradvājasutaṃ raṇef virathaṃ vimukhaṃ caiva punaś cakre mahārathaḥf tatas te pāṇḍavā rājan dṛṣṭvā sātyakivikramamf śaṅkhaśabdān bhṛśaṃ cakruḥ siṃhanādāṃś ca nediref evaṃ taṃ virathaṃ kṛtvā sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥf prahasan vākyam abravīta śaineyābhyavapattiṃ te jānāmy ācāryaghātinaḥc na tv enaṃ trāsyasi mayā grastam ātmānam eva cad śape tmanāhaṃ śaineya satyena tapasā tathād ahatvā sarvapāñcālān yathā śāntim rudhirasiktaś ca rathopastha upāviśatc sūtenāpahṛtas tūrṇaṃ droṇaputrād rathāntarama athānyena supuṅkhena śareṇa nataparvaṇāc ājaghāna bhruvor madhye dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ paraṃtapaḥa sa pūrvam atividdhaś ca bhṛśaṃ paścāc ca pīḍitaḥc sasāda yudhi pāñcālyo vyapāśrayata ca dhvajama taṃ mattam iva siṃhena rājan kuñjaram arditamc javenābhyadravañ śūrāḥ pañca pāṇḍavato rathāḥa kirīṭī bhīmasenaś ca vṛddhakṣatraś ca pauravaḥc yuvarājaś ca cedīnāṃ mālavaś ca sudarśanaḥd ete hāhākṛtāḥ sarve pragṛhītaśarāsanāḥd vīraṃ drauṇāyaniṃ vīrāḥ sarvataḥ paryavārayand te viṃśatipade yattā guruputram amarṣaṇame pañcabhiḥ pañcabhir bāṇair abhyaghnan sarvataḥ samama āśīviṣābhair viṃśadbhiḥ pañcabhiś cāpi tāñ śaraiḥc ciccheda yugapad drauṇiḥ pañcaviṃśatisāyakāna saptabhiś ca śitair bāṇaiḥ pauravaṃ drauṇir ārdayatc mālavaṃ tribhir ekena pārthaṃ ṣaḍbhir vṛkodarama tatas te vivyadhuḥ sarve drauṇiṃ rājan mahārathāḥc yugapac ca pṛthak caiva rukmapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥa yuvarājas tu viṃśatyā drauṇiṃ vivyādha droṇaputreṇa pāṇḍavaḥd bhīmaseno mahābāhuḥ krodham āhārayat paramd tataḥ śaraśatais tīkṣṇaiḥ saṃkruddhāśīviṣopamaiḥd chādayām āsa samare droṇaputraṃ paraṃtapaḥd tato drauṇir mahātejāḥ śaravarṣaṃ agamad rājan raśmīn utsṛjya vājināmd tato śvāḥ prādravaṃs tūrṇaṃ mohite rathasārathaud bhīmasenasya rājendra paśyatāṃ sarvadhanvināmd taṃ dṛṣṭvā pradrutair aśvair apakṛṣṭaṃ raṇājirāta tān nihatya raṇe kīrtayiṣyāmi yathāprajñaṃ yathāśrutama na surā nāsurā loke na gandharvā na rākṣasāḥc sukham edhanti kupite tasminn api guhāgatāḥd dakṣasya yajamānasya vidhivat saṃbhṛtaṃ purāa vivyādha kupito yajñaṃ nirbhayas tu bhavas tadāc dhanuṣā bāṇam utsṛjya saghoṣaṃ vinanāda caa te na śarma kutaḥ śāntiṃ lebhire sma surās tadāc vidrute sahasā yajñe kupite ca maheśvarea tena jyātalaghoṣeṇa sarve lokāḥ samākulāḥc babhūvur vaśagāḥ pārtha nipetuś ca surāsurāḥa āpaś cukṣubhire sarvāś cakampe ca vasuṃdharāc parvatāś ca vyaśīryanta diśo nāgāś ca mohitāḥa andhāś ca tamasā lokā na prakāśanta saṃvṛtāḥc jaghnivān saha sūryeṇa sarveṣāṃ jyotiṣāṃ prabhāḥa cukruśur bhayabhītāś ca śāntiṃ cakrus tathaiva cac ṛṣayaḥ sarvabhūtānām ātmanaś ca sukhaiṣiṇaḥa pūṣāṇam abhyadravata śaṃkaraḥ prahasann ivac puroḍāśaṃ bhakṣayato daśanān vai vyaśātayata tato niścakramur devā vepamānā natāḥ sma tamc punaś ca saṃdadhe dīptaṃ devānāṃ niśitaṃ śaramd sadhūmavisphuliṅgābhaṃ vidyuttoyadasaṃnibhamd taṃ dṛṣṭvā tu surāḥ sarve praṇipatya maheśvarama rudrasya yajñabhāgaṃ ca viśiṣṭaṃ te nv akalpayanc bhayena tridaśā rājañ śaraṇaṃ ca prapedirea tena caivātikopena sa yajñaḥ saṃdhitas tadāc yattāś cāpi surā āsan yattāś cādyāpi taṃ pratia asurāṇāṃ purāṇy āsaṃs trīṇi vīryavatāṃ divic āyasaṃ rājataṃ caiva sauvarṇam aparaṃ mahata āyasaṃ tārakākṣasya kamalākṣasya rājatamc sauvarṇaṃ paramaṃ hy āsīd vidyunmālina eva caa na śaktas tāni maghavān bhettuṃ sarvāyudhair apic atha sarve marā rudraṃ jagmuḥ śaraṇam arditāḥa te tam ūcur mahātmānaṃ sarve devāḥ savāsavāḥb brahmadattavarā hy ete ghorās tripuravāsinaḥb pīḍayanty adhikaṃ lokaṃ yasmāt te varadarpitāḥb tvad ṛte devadeveśa nānyaḥ śaktaḥ kathaṃ canab hantuṃ daityān mahādeva tvaṃ hantā ca suradviṣāmc rudra raudrā bhaviṣyanti paśavaḥ sarvakarmasue nipātayiṣyase cainān asurān bhuvaneśvaraa sa tathoktas tathety uktvā devānāṃ hitakāmyayāb śalyam agniṃ ca vai kṛtvā puṅkhe somam apāṃ patimb sa kṛtvā dhanur oṃkāraṃ sāvitrīṃ jyāṃ maheśvaraḥb hayāṃś ca caturo vedān sarvavedamayaṃ rathamb prajāpatiṃ rathaśreṣṭhe viniyujya sa sārathimb gandhamādanavindhyau ca kṛtvā vaṃśadhvajau haraḥb pṛthvīṃ sasāgaravanāṃ rathaṃ kṛtvā tu śaṃkaraḥb akṣaṃ kṛtvā tu nāgendraṃ śeṣaṃ nāgaṃ trilocanaḥb cakraṃ kṛtvā tu candrārkau devadevaḥ pinākadhṛkb aṇī kṛtvailapatraṃ ca puṣpadantaṃ ca tryambakaḥb yūpaṃ kṛtvā ca malayam avanāhaṃ ca takṣakamb yoktrāṅgāni ca catvāri kṛtvā śarvaḥ pratāpavānb vedān kṛtvātha caturaś caturo śvān maheśvaraḥb upavedān khalīnāṃś ca kṛtvā lokatrayeśvaraḥb gāyatrīṃ pragrahaṃ kṛtvā sāvitrīṃ ca maheśvaraḥb kṛtvoṃkāraṃ pratodaṃ ca brahmāṇaṃ caiva sārathimb gāṇḍīvaṃ mandaraṃ kṛtvā guṇaṃ kṛtvā ca vāsukimb viṣṇuṃ śarottamaṃ kṛtvā śalyam agniṃ tathaiva cab vāyuṃ kṛtvātha vājābhyāṃ puṅkhe vaivasvataṃ yamamb vidyut kṛtvātha niśrāṇaṃ meruṃ kṛtvātha vai dhvajamb āruhya sa rathaṃ divyaṃ sarvadevamayaṃ śivaḥb tripurasya vadhārthāya sthāṇuḥ praharatāṃ varaḥb asurāṇām antakaraḥ śrīmān atulavikramaḥb stūyamānaḥ suraiḥ pārtha ṛṣibhiś ca tapodhanaiḥb sthānaṃ māheśvaraṃ kṛtvā divyam apratimaṃ prabhuḥc atiṣṭhat sthāṇubhūtaḥ sa sahasraṃ parivatsarāna yadā trīṇi sametāni antarikṣe purāṇi vaic triparvaṇā triśalyena tena tāni bibheda saḥa purāṇi na ca taṃ śekur dānavāḥ prativīkṣitumc śaraṃ kālāgnisaṃyuktaṃ viṣṇusomasamāyutamd purāṇi dagdhavantaṃ taṃ devī yātā pravīkṣitumd mumoca bhagavāñ śaṃbhuḥ purāṇy ādiśya vīryavānd tato daityā mahābhāga saputrāḥ saparigrahāḥd bhasmībhūtā durātmāno bhinnāś ca tripure purād hatvā daityān mahādevaḥ sarvadevaiḥ sabhājitaḥd ṛṣibhiḥ saṃstutaś caiva parāṃ mudam upāgamatd tato brahmā suraiḥ sārdhaṃ bṛhaspatipurogamaiḥd stutim ārebhire kartuṃ bhinne tripuramandired devyāḥ svayaṃvare vṛttaṃ śṛṇuṣvānyad dhanaṃjayaa bālam aṅkagataṃ kṛtvā svayaṃ pañcaśikhaṃ punaḥc umā jijñāsamānā vai ko yam ity abravīt surānd asūyataś ca śakrasya vajreṇa prahariṣyataḥa bāhuṃ savajraṃ śakrasya kruddhasyāstambhayat prabhuḥb prahasya bhagavāṃs tūrṇaṃ sarvalokeśvaraḥ śivaḥb tataḥ saṃstambhitabhujaḥ śakro devagaṇair vṛtaḥb jagāma śaraṇaṃ tūrṇaṃ brahmāṇaṃ prabhum avyayamb te taṃ praṇamya śirasā procuḥ prāñjalayas tadāb kim apy aṅkagataṃ brahman pārvatyā bhūtam adbhutamb bālarūpadharaṃ dṛṣṭvā nāsmābhis tac ca lakṣitamb tasmāt tvāṃ praṣṭum icchāmo nirjitā yena vai vayamb ayudhyatā hi bālena līlayā sapuraṃdarāḥb teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā brahmā brahmavidāṃ varaḥb dhyātvā sa śaṃbhuṃ bhagavān bālaṃ cāmitatejasamb uvāca bhagavān brahmā śakrādīṃś ca surottamānb carācarasya jagataḥ prabhuḥ sa bhagavān haraḥb tasmāt parataraṃ nānyat kiṃ cid asti maheśvarātb yo dṛṣṭo hy umayā sārdhaṃ yuṣmābhir amitadyutiḥb sa pārvatyāḥ kṛte devaḥ kṛtavān bālarūpatāmb te mayā sahitā yūyaṃ prapadyadhvaṃ tam eva hic sa eṣa bhagavān devaḥ sarvalokeśvaraḥ prabhuḥd evam uktā gatā devā yatra devo maheśvaraḥd athānyena svarūpeṇa brahmā dṛṣṭvā tam avyayama na saṃbubudhire cainaṃ devās taṃ bhuvaneśvaramc saprajāpatayaḥ sarve bālārkasadṛśaprabhama athābhyetya tato brahmā dṛṣṭvā ca sa maheśvaramc ayaṃ śreṣṭha iti jñātvā vavande taṃ pitāmahaḥd brahmovācad tvaṃ yajño bhuvanasyāsya tvaṃ gatis tvaṃ parāyaṇamd tvaṃ bhavas tvaṃ mahādevas tvaṃ dhāma paramaṃ padamd tvayā sarvam idaṃ vyāptaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamamd bhagavan bhūtabhavyeśa lokanātha jagatpated prasādaṃ kuru śakrasya tvayā krodhārditasya vaid vyāsa uvācad padmayoner vacaḥ śrutvā tataḥ prīto maheśvaraḥd prasādābhimukho bhūtvā cāṭṭahāsam athākarota tataḥ prasādayām āsur umāṃ rudraṃ ca te surāḥc abhavac ca punar bāhur yathāprakṛti vajriṇaḥa teṣāṃ prasanno bhagavān sapatnīko vṛṣadhvajaḥc devānāṃ tridaśaśreṣṭho dakṣayajñavināśanaḥa sa vai rudraḥ sa ca śivaḥ so gniḥ śarvaḥ sa sarvavitc sa cendraś caiva vāyuś ca so śvinau sa ca vidyutaḥa sa bhavaḥ sa ca parjanyo mahādevaḥ sa cānaghaḥc sa candramāḥ sa ceśānaḥ sa sūryo varuṇaś ca saḥa sa kālaḥ so ntako mṛtyuḥ sa yamo rātryahāni cac māsārdhamāsā ṛtavaḥ saṃdhye saṃvatsaraś ca saḥa sa ca dhātā vidhātā ca viśvātmā viśvakarmakṛtc sarvāsāṃ devatānāṃ ca dhārayaty avapur vapuḥa sarvair devaiḥ stuto devaḥ saikadhā bahudhā ca saḥc śatadhā sahasradhā caiva tathā śatasahasradhād dve tanū tasya devasya vedajñā brāhmaṇā viduḥd ghorā cānyā śivā cānyā te tanū bahudhā punaḥd ghorā tu yā tanus tasya so gnir vidyut sa bhāskaraḥd somārdhaṃ punar evāsya āpo jyotīṃṣi candramāḥd vedāṅgāḥ sopaniṣadaḥ purāṇādhyātmaniścayāḥd yad atra paramaṃ guhyaṃ sa vai devo maheśvaraḥa īdṛśaḥ sa mahādevo bhūyaś ca bhagavān ajaḥc na hi sarve mayā śakyā vaktuṃ bhagavato guṇāḥd api varṣasahasreṇa satataṃ pāṇḍunandanaa sarvair grahair gṛhītān vai sarvapāpasamanvitānc sa mocayati suprītaḥ śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇāgatāna āyur ārogyam aiśvaryaṃ vittaṃ kāmāṃś ca puṣkalānc sa dadāti manuṣyebhyaḥ sa caivākṣipate punaḥa sendrādiṣu ca deveṣu tasya caiśvaryam ucyatec sa caiva vyāhṛte loke manuṣyāṇāṃ śubhāśubhea aiśvaryāc caiva kāmānām īśvaraḥ punar ucyatec maheśvaraś ca bhūtānāṃ mahatām īśvaraś ca saḥa bahubhir bahudhā rūpair viśvaṃ vyāpnoti vai jagatc asya devasya yad vaktraṃ samudre tad atiṣṭhatad vaḍavāmukheti vikhyātaṃ pibat toyamayaṃ haviḥa eṣa caiva śmaśāneṣu devo vasati nityaśaḥc yajanty enaṃ janās tatra vīrasthāna itīśvarama asya dīptāni rūpāṇi ghorāṇi ca bahūni cac loke yāny asya kurvanti manuṣyāḥ pravadanti caa nāmadheyāni lokeṣu bahūny atra yathārthavatc nirucyante mahattvāc ca vibhutvāt karmabhis tathāa vede cāsya samāmnātaṃ śatarudrīyam uttamamc nāmnā cānantarudreti upasthānaṃ mahātmanaḥa sa kāmānāṃ prabhur devo ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥc sa vibhuḥ sa prabhur devo viśvaṃ vyāpnuvate mahata jyeṣṭhaṃ bhūtaṃ vadanty enaṃ brāhmaṇā munayas tathāc prathamo hy eṣa devānāṃ mukhād asyānalo bhavata sarvathā yat paśūn pāti taiś ca yad ramate punaḥc teṣām adhipatir yac ca tasmāt paśupatiḥ smṛtaḥa nityena brahmacaryeṇa liṅgam asya yadā sthitamc mahayanti ca lokāś ca maheśvara iti smṛtaḥa ṛṣayaś caiva devāś ca gandharvāpsarasas tathāc liṅgam asyārcayanti sma tac cāpy ūrdhvaṃ samāsthitamd urdhvaliṅgas tataś cokto bhagavān brāhmaṇaiḥ sadāa pūjyamāne tatas tasmin modate sa maheśvaraḥc sukhī prītaś ca bhavati prahṛṣṭaś caiva śaṃkaraḥa yad asya bahudhā rūpaṃ bhūtabhavyabhavatsthitamc sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva bahurūpas tataḥ smṛtaḥa ekākṣo jājvalann āste sarvatokṣimayo pi vāc krodhād yaś cāviśal lokāṃs tasmāc charva iti smṛtaḥa dhūmraṃ rūpaṃ ca yat tasya dhūrjaṭis tena ucyatec viśve devāś ca yat tasmin viśvarūpas tataḥ smṛtaḥa tisro devīr yadā caiva bhajate bhuvaneśvaraḥc dyām apaḥ pṛthivīṃ caiva tryambakaś ca tataḥ smṛtaḥa samedhayati yan nityaṃ sarvārthān sarvakarmasuc śivam icchan manuṣyāṇāṃ tasmād eśa śivaḥ smṛtaḥa sahasrākṣo yutākṣo vā sarvatokṣimayo pi vāc yac ca viśvaṃ mahat pāti mahādevas tataḥ smṛtaḥa dahaty ūrdhvaṃ sthito yac ca prāṇotpattisthitaś ca yatc sthitaliṅgaś ca yan nityaṃ tasmāt sthāṇur iti smṛtaḥd sūryācandramasor loke prakāśanty aṃśavaś ca yed te keśāḥ saṃjñitās tasya vyomakeśas tataḥ smṛtaḥd kapiḥ śreṣṭha iti prokto dharmaś ca vṛṣa ucyated sa devadevo bhagavān kīrtyate vai vṛṣākapiḥd brahmāṇam indraṃ varuṇaṃ yamaṃ dhanadam eva cad nigṛhya harate yasmāt tasmād dhara iti smṛtaḥd nimīlitābhyāṃ netrābhyāṃ bālyād devyā maheśvaraḥd lalāṭe netram asṛjat tena tryakṣaḥ sa ucyated bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca sarvaṃ sarvam aśeṣataḥd bhava eṣa tato yasmād bhūtabhavyabhavodbhavaḥa viṣamasthaḥ śarīreṣu samaś ca prāṇinām ihac sa vāyur viṣamastheṣu prāṇāpānaśarīriṣua pūjayed vigrahaṃ yas tu liṅgaṃ vāpi samarcayetc liṅgaṃ pūjayitā nityaṃ mahatīṃ śriyam aśnutea ūrubhyām ardham āgneyaṃ somārdhaṃ ca śivā tanuḥc ātmano rdhaṃ ca tasyāgniḥ somo rdhaṃ punar ucyatea taijasī mahatī dīptā devebhyaś ca śivā tanuḥc bhāsvatī mānuṣeṣv asya tanur ghorāgnir ucyatea brahmacaryaṃ caraty eṣa śivā yāsya tanus tayāc yāsya ghoratarā mūrtiḥ sarvān atti tayeśvaraḥa yan nirdahati yat tīkṣṇo yad ugro yat pratāpavānc māṃsaśoṇitamajjādo yat tato rudra ucyatea eṣa devo mahādevo yo sau pārtha tavāgrataḥc saṃgrāme śātravān nighnaṃs tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ pinākadhṛkd sindhurājavadhārthāya pratijñāte tvayānaghad kṛṣṇena darśite svapne yas te śailendramūrdhania eṣa vai bhagavān devaḥ saṃgrāme yāti te grataḥc yena dattāni te strāṇi yais tvayā dānavā hatāḥa dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ puṇyaṃ vedaiś ca saṃjñitamc devadevasya te pārtha vyākhyātaṃ śatarudriyama sarvārthasādhakaṃ puṇyaṃ sarvakilbiṣanāśanamc sarvapāpapraśamanaṃ sarvaduḥkhabhayāpahamd aśvamedhasahasrasya rājasūyaśatasya cad iṣṭasya phalam āpnoti durācāro pi mānavaḥd gavāṃ koṭiśatasyāpi dānasya phalam aśnutea caturvidham idaṃ stotraṃ yaḥ śṛṇoti naraḥ sadāc vijitya sarvāñ śatrūn sa rudraloke mahīyatea caritaṃ mahātmano divyaṃ sāṃgrāmikam idaṃ śubhamc paṭhan vai śatarudrīyaṃ śṛṇvaṃś ca satatotthitaḥd yaḥ śṛṇoti naro bhaktyā yaś cāpi parikīrtayetd divā vā yadi vā rātrau brahmahatyāṃ vyapohatia bhakto viśveśvaraṃ devaṃ mānuṣeṣu tu yaḥ sadāc varān sa kāmāṃl labhate prasanne tryambake naraḥa gaccha yudhyasva kaunteya na tavāsti parājayaḥc yasya mantrī ca goptā ca pārśvatas te janārdanaḥ saṃjaya uvācaa evam uktvārjunaṃ saṃkhye parāśarasutas tadāc jagāma bharataśreṣṭha yathāgatam ariṃdamad saṃjaya uvācad yuddhaṃ kṛtvā mahāghoraṃ pañcāhāni mahābalaḥd brāhmaṇo nihato rājan brahmalokam avāptavānd adhīte yat phalaṃ vede tad asminn api parvaṇid kṣatriyāṇām abhīrūṇāṃ viśuddhaṃ khyāpyate yaśaḥd ya idaṃ paṭhate parva śṛṇuyād vāpi nityaśaḥd sa mucyate mahāpāpaiḥ kṛtair ghoraiś ca karmabhiḥd idaṃ paṭhet sarvamahārthasaṃyutaṃd raṇe jayaṃ pāṇḍavavṛṣṇisiṃhayoḥd sadā śubhaṃ yaḥ śṛṇuyāt tathā naraḥd sa mucyate pāpakaro pi karmabhiḥd yajñāvāptir brāhmaṇasyeha nityaṃd yuddhe nityaṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ jayaś cad śeṣau varṇau kāmam iṣṭaṃ labheted putrān pautrān nityam iṣṭāṃs tathaivad etad ākhyāya vai sūto rājñaḥ sarvaṃ tu saṃjayaḥd prayātaḥ śibirāyaiva draṣṭuṃ karṇasya vaiśasam
